# closest ISO 639-3:    guz
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1990
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     EBIBILIA ENCHENU
# english_title:        The New Testament in Ekegusii

# notes:                Verses 44015010-44015025 are not available in this translation, probably because of the disputed issue of circumcision, which forms a strong part of the Kisii culture
40001001	Ebuku y'ekegori kiaye Yesu Kristo , omwana o Daudi , omwana o Ibrahimu .
40001002	Ibrahimu akamoibora Isaaka , n'Isaaka akamoibora Yakobo ; na Yakobo akamoibora Yuda nabamwabo ;
40001003	na Yuda akamoibora Perezu na Zara ase Thamaru ; na Perezu akamoibora Hezron ; na Hezron akamoibora Ramu ;
40001004	na Ramu akamoibora Aminadabu ; n'Aminadabu akamoibora Nahashon ; na Nahashon akamoibora Salumon ;
40001005	na Salumon akamoibora Boazu ase Rahabu ; na Boazu akamoibora Obedu ase Ruth ; n'Obedu akamoibora Yese ;
40001006	na Yese akamoibora omoruoti Daudi . Na Daudi akamoibora Sulemani asare oyio orenge omokungu bw'Uria ;
40001007	na Sulemani akamoibora Rehoboam ; na Rehoboam akamoibora Abia ; n'Abia akamoibora Asa ;
40001008	n'Asa akamoibora Yehoshafatu ; na Yehoshafatu akamoibora Yoram ; na Yoram akamoibora Uzia ;
40001009	n'Uzia akamoibora Yotham ; na Yotham akamoibora Ahazu ; n'Ahazu akamoibora Hezekia ;
40001010	na Hezekia akamoibora Manase ; na Manase akamoibora Amon , n'Amon akamoibora Yosia ;
40001011	na Yosia akamoibora Yekhonia nabamwabo , erio kare rigoro bakong'anyigwa gochia Babulon .
40001012	Erio as'okong'anyigwa gochia Babulon , Yekhonia akamoibora Shealitieli ; na Shealitieli akamoibora Zerubabeli ;
40001013	na Zerubabeli akamoibora Abihudu ; n'Abihudu akamoibora Eliakim ; n'Eliakim akamoibora Azoro ;
40001014	n'Azoro akamoibora Zadoko ; na Zadoko akamoibora Akhim ; n'Akhim akamoibora Eliudu ;
40001015	n'Eliudu akamoibora Eleazaru ; n'Eieazaru akamoibora Mathan ; na Mathan akamoibora Yakobo ;
40001016	na Yakobo akamoibora Yusufu , omosacha o Mariamu omoiborete Yesu okorokwa Kristo .
40001017	Igo biria chigori bionsi korwa Ibrahimu goika Daudi bire ebigori ikomi nabine ; na korwa Daudi goika riria okong'anyigwa gochia Babulon nebigori ikomi nabine ; na korwa koria okong'anyigwa kwa Babulon goika Kristo nebigori ikomi nabine .
40001018	Na Yesu Kristo okoiborwa kwaye nigo kwarenge iga ; rigoro Mariamu ng'ina ariereire boko na Yusufu , bataraikana ang'e , akarorekana ore morito as'Omoika Omochenu .
40001019	Noria omosacha oye , oria Yusufu , ekiagerete igarenge omonto oboronge , tarigetie komoa obosoku , akarengereria komotiga bobisi .
40001020	Rigoro arenge koyarengereria aya , ekero ekio rilaika ri'Omonene rikamochiera as'okorota , rikamotebia , Aye Yusufu , omwana o Daudi , toiroka komoira Mariamu mokao , ekiagera ekio giatongirwe oborito asare nekio Omoika Omochenu .
40001021	Nere naibore omwana omoisia ; nomoroke erieta riaye Yesu ; naki nere oratorie abanto baye nebibe biabo .
40001022	Naya onsi igabaire nario riraikerane eriakwanetwe n'Omonene as'omonwa bw'omobani , okobora ,
40001023	Rigereria , enyaroka nebe morito , naende naibore omwana omoisia , Nere erieta riaye nabamoroke Imanueli ; engecho yaye kariraonchorwe , Nyasaye amo naintwe .
40001024	Na Yusufu agachia koboka korwa ase chitoro chiaye agakora buna achigetwe ne rilaika ri'Omonene ; akaira mokaye ;
40001025	nonya komanya tamomanya goika kamoiboire omwana omoisia : akamoroka erieta riaye Yesu .
40002001	Nekero Yesu aiboretwe aria Bethilehemu ya Boyahudi , as'amatuko omoruoti Herode , ekero ekio abanto abang'aini bakorua ensemo ya mocha , bagacha Yerusalemu , bakobora ,
40002002	Ng'ai are oria oiborwa omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ? ekiagera eng'enang'ani yaye eyio twayerorire ase mocha , nigo twachire tonyare komosasima .
40002003	Ochia koigwa aria , omoruoti Herode akaondoka , ere na Yerusalemu yonsi amo nere .
40002004	Erio kabasangereirie abagaka abanene nabariki bonsi , akababoria , ng'ai Kristo agocha koiborerwa ?
40002005	Barabwo bakamotebia , Ase Bethilehemu ya Boyahudi , naki nabo arigetwe nokoboko kw'omobani ogotcha ,
40002006	Naye Bethilehemu , ense ya Yuda , Tori moke gatigati y'abanene ba Yuda : Naki korwa asore aye nache oyokogamba Orache kobagambia abanto bane Isiraeli .
40002007	Erio Herode akabarangeria bobisi baria abanto abang'aini , akabarigia ekeene ekero eng'enang'eni eria yarorekana .
40002008	Akabaira goika Bethilehemu , akabatebia , Genda morote mono as'amang'ana omwana oria ; aba momorora , moche gontebia , nainche ninyare kogenda komosasima .
40002009	Baria bachia koigwa amang'ana omoruoti bakagenda ; nero eng'enang'eni bakayerora mocha , eria , ebatang'aine , goika ekagenda egatenena igoro aroro as'omwana oria omoke arenge .
40002010	Bachia koyerora eria eng'enang'eni , bakagoka nomogoko omonene mono ,
40002011	Bachia gosoa enyomba bakarora omwana amo na Mariamu ng'ina , bakagwa inse , bakamosasima ; bagakunora enibo yabo , bakamokwaneria nebinto ebiya , ethahabu , ubani , na manemane .
40002012	Erio nyuma kabakurerwa na Nyasaye as'okorota tibairana ase Herode , bakabwatia enchera eng'ao bakagenda sobo .
40002013	Erio kabamanoire baria , oyo nere , rilaika ri'Omonene , rikamochiera Yusufu as'okorota rikamotebia , Imoka korwa agwo , omoire omwana na ng'ina , otame gochia Misiri , oikaranse aroro goika ningotebie , naki Herode namorigie oria omwana anyare komoita .
40002014	Nere agatenena akamoira omwana oria na ng'ina , akaimoka botuko , akagenda Misiri ;
40002015	akamenya aroro goika Herode agakwa , rinyare goikerana erio riatebetwe n'Omonene as'omonwa bw'omobani , korwa Misiri nkamorangeria Omwana one .
40002016	Erio Herode , akerora osekereirwe nabanto baria abang'aini , akaba nekeririanda mono , agatoma abanto , akabaita abana bonsi barenge Bethilehemu nechinsemo chiaye , aase onsi , abakorire emiaka ebere nabatarakora emiaka ebere , buna ekero akeragete nabanto baria abang'aini .
40002017	Ekero ekio rigaikerana riria riatebetwe as'omonwa bw'omobani Yeremia , ogoteba ,
40002018	Rama kwaigwekanire eriogi , Okorera nogokura ; Rakieli nkobarerare abana baye ; Tancheti akirigwe , ekiagera tibario .
40002019	Na Herode erio gakure , rora , rilaika ri'Omonene rikamochiera Yusufu aria Misiri as'okorota ,
40002020	rikamotebia , Imoka , omoire omwana na ng'ina , mogende ense y'Isiraeli : naki bakure baria barenge korigia obogima bw'omwana .
40002021	Akaimoka akaira omwana na ng'ina akagenda ense y'Isiraeli ,
40002022	korende agachia koigwa ng'a Arikhelau obaire omoruoti Boyahudi ribaga ria Herode ise , akaba nokoiroka as'okogenda aroro ; korende erio gakurerwa na Nyasaye as'okorota , akagenda ensemo ya Galili ,
40002023	akagenda agaikaransa omochie oyomo okorokwa Nazareti ; rinyare goikerana erio riatebetwe nomonwa bw'omobani , ng'a , igo ararokwe Omonazari .
40003001	As'amatuko aria akaoroka Omobatisi Yohana , okorandia arenge as'eroro ya Boyahudi , ogoteba ,
40003002	Onchoka , ekiagera obonda bw'igoro bwaikire ang'e .
40003003	Naki oyio nere bwatoretwe as'omonwa bw'omobani Isaya , are goteba , Eriogi ri'oyokoaka egeturi eroro ime : Rosia enchera y'Omonene ; Rongeyia chinchera chiaye .
40003004	Nomonyene oria Yohana chianga chiaye are kobeka nechia amarionya engamia , ore norokini rwe riyo kenema kiaye , nendagera yaye nechingige noboke bw'orosana .
40003005	chingaki echio akaba oria ngochierware nabanto aroro , bakorua Yerusalemu na Boyahudi bwonsi , nechinsemo chia Yorodan chionsi ;
40003006	bakobatiswa nere as'oroche rwa Yorodan , aroro bagoteba ebibe biabo .
40003007	Ochia korora abanto abange as'Abafarisai n'Abasadukai bakomochiera as'okobatisa kwaye , akabatebia , Inwe oroiboro rwe ching'iti . ning'o obakurerete gotama endamwamu egocha-gocha ?
40003008	Gaki ama amatunda agwenerete ogoonchoka :
40003009	nonya timonagoteba emioyo yaino ime , ng'a , Ntore na tata oito Ibrahimu : naki nabatebirie , ng'a namagena aya Nyasaye nanyare gokora abana as'Ibrahimu .
40003010	Iga bono egesire kiabekirwe as'emeri y'emete : ker'omote otameti amatunda amaya igo obutorwa otugutwa as'omorero .
40003011	Inche as'amache nkobatisera as'engecho y'ogoonchoka : korende ere orache nyuma yane nare nechinguru kombua , ntagwenere koimokeria ebikoroto biaye ; nere orabatise n'Omoika Omochenu , nomorero .
40003012	Oroieru rwaye nkoboko kwaye abwate , nekeoreri kiaye nagesibie : nengano nayebongererie gochia kiage ; korende nayasambe amatete as'omorero otakorimeka .
40003013	Erio Yesu akarua Galili , akagenda akamoorokera Yohana , as'oroche rwa Yorodan , anyare kobatiswa nere .
40003014	Korende Yohana akamotanga , ogoteba , Inche ndigetie kobatiswa naye , naye kogocha asende inche ?
40003015	Yesu akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Ancha iga bono ; naki naboigo etogwenerete goikerania oboronge bwonsi . Erio agwo akamwanchera .
40003016	Na Yesu erio abatiswa agatira korwa as'amache ; erio nario igoro akamomanokera akayorora Omoika o Nyasaye ogoika buna riruma , rigocha igoro asare .
40003017	Neriogi rikorua igoro rigoteba , Oyo nere Omwana one , omwanchi one , asare ere nimogokerete .
40004001	Erio Yesu akairwa eroro ime n'Omoika Omochenu , gochia gotemwa na saitani .
40004002	Rigoro eng'atire emebaso emerongo ene omobaso nobotuko , nyuma enchara ekamoroma .
40004003	Akagenda omotemi oria akamotebia , Onye naye Omwana o Nyasaye , yatebie amagena aya abe amakima .
40004004	Nere akamoiraneria akamotebia , Narikire , Omonto takoba nobogima as'obokima bwoka , nigo akoba nobogima ase kera ring'ana rikorua omonwa o Nyasaye .
40004005	Erio oria saitani akagenda nere goika omochie omochenu ; akamobeka igoro as'egesuri gie hekalu egetambe mono .
40004006	Akamotebia , Onye naye Omwana o Nyasaye , etugute gochia inse : naki narikire , Ere nabachike amalaika aye asore : Naende nabakoimokie as'amaboko abo , Tobaisa kogochwa okogoro kwao ase rigena .
40004007	Yesu akamotebia , Naende narikire , Tomotema Omonene Nyasaye oo .
40004008	Saitani akamoira naende , akagenda nere as'egetunwa egetambe mono , akamworokia amanda onsi ay'ense , nobonene bwaye ;
40004009	akamotebia , Ebio bionsi ninkoe , korantung'amere nagonsasima .
40004010	Erio Yesu akamotebia , Genda bwoo Saitani : ekiagera narikire , Mosasime Omonene Nyasaye oo , omokorere ere bweka .
40004011	Erio saitani akamotiga ; na rora , amalaika bagacha bakamokorera .
40004012	Yesu ochia koigwa ng'a Yohana obekirwe echela , akaimoka akagenda Galili .
40004013	Akaimoka korwa Nazareti , akagenda , agaikaransa Kaperinaum , noro nomochie ore as'enyancha as'amabebe a Zabulon na Nafutali :
40004014	rinyare goikerana eriatebetwe nomonwa bw'omobani Isaya , ogoteba ,
40004015	Ense ya Zabuloanense ya Nafutali , Enchera egochia enyancha ng'umbu ya Yorodan , Galili y'ebisaku ;
40004016	Abanto abamenyete omosunte ime Bakarora omobaso omonene , Nabaikaransete ense as'ekiriri ki'amakweri , Omobaso obacheire barabwo .
40004017	Korwa ekero ekio Yesu agachaka korandia nagoteba , Onchoka , naki bwaikire ang'e obonda bw'igoro .
40004018	Nere ochia kona goetanana chinsemo chi'enyancha ya Galili , akarora abanto habere , omonto noyomwabo , Simon okorokwa naende Petero , n'Anderea oyomwabo , bakoruta ekeonga enyancha ime ; ekiagera nabarubi barenge .
40004019	Akabatebia , Nchuo montunyane inche , nainche nimbakore mobe abarubi b'abanto .
40004020	Na barabwo bagatiga ebionga biabo erio kegima , bakamotunyana .
40004021	Erio akagenda korwa aroro , akarora habere naende , omonto noyomwabo , Yakobo omwana o Zebedi , na Yohana omwabo , bare obwato ime amo na Zebedi is'obo , bakorosia ebionga biabo ; akabarangeria .
40004022	Na barabwo bakabotiga obwato boria , bakamotiga is'obo , bakamotunyana .
40004023	Erio Yesu nigo arenge kona goetanana as'ense engima ya Galili , okworokereria ase chisunagogi chiabo , okorandia amang'ana amaya ay'obonda , okogwenia namarwaire amanene , noborwaire bwonsi bwarenge as'abanyene ense .
40004024	chinkuma chiaye chigakuma ense yonsi ya Sham ; bakamoretera bonsi abarenge abarwaire , babwatetwe noborwaire bondebonde , nobororo , nababwatetwe nebirecha , nabare chiosi , nabare bakoiguswa ; akabagwenia .
40004025	Ekamotunyana emeganda emenge bakorua Galili , na Dekapoli , na Yerusalemu , na Boyahudi , na ng'umbu ya Yorodan .
40005001	Ochia koyerora emeganda eria , akarina egetunwa ; na rigoro aikaransire , agachierwa naborokigwa baye ;
40005002	akamanora omonwa oye , akaborokereria , ogoteba ,
40005003	Mbare negesio abanyene obotaka bw'omoyo , ekiagera obonda bw'igoro nobwabo .
40005004	Mbare negesio abaichanete ; ekiagera nabwo bagocha koremigwa .
40005005	Mbare negesio abare nobwororo : ekiagera barabwo nabaire ense .
40005006	Mbare negesio abare nenchara nerang'o ya boronge : ekiagera barabwo nabaigorigwe .
40005007	Mbare negesio abare namabera ekiagera barabwo nababerwe .
40005008	Mbare negesio abachenu emioyo : ekiagera barabwo nabamorore Nyasaye .
40005009	Mbare negesio abagokora omorembe : ekiagera barabwo nabarokwe abana ba Nyasaye .
40005010	Mbare negesio abarosigwe as'oboronge : ekiagera obonda bw'igoro nobwabo .
40005011	More negesio inwe , ekero bakobarama nakobarosia , nokobatebera kera ring'ana ribe as'oborimo , konye nas'inche .
40005012	Mogoke , nogosasoka : ekiagera eng'eria yaino nenene aria igoro . Naki naboigo babarosetie ababani barenge ritang'ani riaino .
40005013	Inwe ninwe omonyo bw'ense : korende noria omonyo kosarekire , as'enchera ki orabekwe omonyo ? Togwenereti gento kende tatiga ogotugutwa isiko , otiringwe nabanto .
40005014	Inwe ninwe omobaso bw'ense . Omochie tokobiseka goikaransete as'egetunwa igoro .
40005015	Nonya nabanto tibagotongia etaya nakoyebeka egetonga ime ; korende nas'ekebekerero kiaye , ebaa omobaso bonsi abare nyomba ime .
40005016	Nomobaso oino obare boigo as'abanto bonsi , goika bayerore emeremo yaino emiya , bamotogie Iso oino ore igoro .
40005017	Timokaga ng'a nachire inche gosaria ogochika , gose chiria chibuku chi'ababani : tincheti as'ogosaria , korende as'ogoikerania .
40005018	Naki nekeene nabatebirie , ng'a goika igoro nense biete , tegoeta enuguta eyemo nonya negeke ekemo as'ogochika , goika bionsi biikerane .
40005019	Gaki omonto bwensi orasarie amachiko aya , erimo as'aya are amake , nakworokereria abanto boigo , oyo narokwe omoke mono as'obonda bw'igoro : noyorayakore nakoyorokereria , oyo nere orarokwe omonene as'obonda bw'igoro .
40005020	Naki nabatebirie inwe , obwo oboronge bwaino botabueti obwo bw'abariki n'Abafarisai , timogosoa nonya ng'ake as'obonda bw'igoro .
40005021	Mwaigwete ng'a abanto ba kare mbatebetigwe , Toita ; noyo oraite nabe omonto okonacherwa ekina ki'ogokwa .
40005022	Ko inche nabatebirie ng'a ker'onde omo orageche oyomwabo , oyo nere orabe omonto okonacherwa ekina ; noyoramomogorere oyomwabo , nabe omonto bw'ebarasa ( agambigwe ) ; noyoramoroke oyonde , Omokayayu , nomogwenere omorero o chaanam .
40005023	Gaki gokoreta esadaka yao as'esadaka ekoruerwa , gokwainyoire agwo ng'a oyomino nare nering'ana asore ,
40005024	yetige esadaka yao agwo as'esadaka ekoruerwa , genda ritang'ani , mwanchane noyomino , erio irana orue esadaka yao .
40005025	Anchana nomogosoeri oo bwango , ekero ore nere ' nchera , tabaisa gokoira as'omogambi , nomogambi akobeke as'okoboko gw'esagini , obaise kobekwa echela ime .
40005026	Nekeene nagotebirie , tokorua aroro nonya ng'ake goika oakane ebesa y'omoerio .
40005027	Mwaigwete ng'a riatebetwe kare , Totomana :
40005028	korende inche nabatebirie , ng'a ker'onde omo oramorigererie omokungu as'ogotomana , osaririe nere egeka ekio as'omoyo oye .
40005029	Naye onye eriso riao ri'okoboko gw'okorio rigokogocha , rirusie oritugute are naye ; naki nogwenerete gesire ekimo kiao ekemo , kobua gotugutwa omobere oo omogima ase chaanam .
40005030	Konye gokogochwa nokoboko kwao gw'okorio , konache ogotugute are naye ; naki nogwenerete gesire ekimo kiao ekemo , kobua gotugutwa omobere oo omogima ase chaanam ;
40005031	naende riatebetwe , Oyoratige mokaye , amoe rirube ri'okomotiga .
40005032	Korende inche nabatebirie , ng'a ker'onde omo oratige mokaye , otanga nas'engecho y'obotomani , nkomobekare as'ogotomana ; noyoramonyuome oyotigirwe otomanire .
40005033	Naende mwaigwete ng'a mbatebetigwe abanto ba kare , Toria emuma ya bosa , korende mochiikerie Omonene chiira chiao .
40005034	Korende inche nabatebirie , Totiana as'egento gionsi ; tari as'igoro , ekiagera nekerogo kia Nyasaye ;
40005035	gose as'ense , ekiagera nao agotorera amagoro aye ; gose ase Yerusalemu , ekiagera nomochie bw'Omoruoti omonene .
40005036	Gose as'omotw'oo totiana , ekiagera tokonyara gokora orochugu oromo robe ororabu gose oromwamu .
40005037	Amang'ana aino abe , Ee , ee ; Taibo , taibo ; naki ayakomenteka as'aya , ig'akorua as'oria omobe .
40005038	Mwaigwete ng'a mbatebetigwe , Eriso as'eriso , erino as'erino ;
40005039	ko inche nabatebirie , Timobaisa gotiemana noria omobe ; korende omonto karagoake emboto y'okorio , moonchorere neya kabere .
40005040	Nomonto origetie gogosoera nakoira eganchwa yao , motigere negoti nero .
40005041	Nomonto ogokoira nechinguru emaili eyemo , genda nere goika chimaili ibere .
40005042	Oyo kogosaba moe , noyo origetie singo , tomoa amagega .
40005043	Mwaigwete mbatebetigwe , Ancha omogisangi oo , nomobisa oo omogeche .
40005044	Ko inche nabatebirie , Banche ababisa baino , mobasabere ababarosirie ;
40005045	monyare koba abana b'Iso oino ore igoro : ekiagera ere nigo akobabareria omobaso oye , ababe nabaya , abatweria embura abakori boronge nabatakori boronge .
40005046	Naki kamoranche ababanchete , eng'eria ki more nero ? Inee , nonya mbaria bakobanga tibari gokora bo ?
40005047	Nainwe kamorakwanie abamino boka , mbuya ki mwamenta ? nonya mbaria ebisaku tibari gokora bo ?
40005048	Gaki inwe namobe abasera , buna Iso oino ore igoro are omosera .
40006001	Mwerende timokora obuya bwaino as'obosio bw'abanto babarore , naki komogokora ayio , timori neng'eria as'Iso oino ore igoro .
40006002	Gaki gokorua esadaka , tobugia eng'oma as'obosio bwao , buna baria abang'ainereria bagokora ase chisunagogi nase chinchera chinene chi'emechie , korigia kobakwa nabanto ; nekeene nabatebirie , banyorire eng'eria yabo .
40006003	Korende aye gokorua esadaka , nonya nokoboko kwao gw'okobee tikomanya eki kogokora okoboko kwao gw'okorio .
40006004	Enyare koba bobisi esadaka yao , n'Iso oyokorora bobisi nakoakane .
40006005	Kamogosaba , timokoba buna baria abang'ainereria : ekiagera barabwo igo banchete gosaba nagotenena ase chisunagogi nas'amatabekania e chinchera , banyare kororwa nabanto . Nekeene nabatebirie , banyorire eng'eria yabo .
40006006	Korende aye gogosaba , soa enyomba yao ime , naende kagwasiekire egesieri , mosabe Is'oo ore bobisi ; na Is'oo oyokorora bobisi nakoakane .
40006007	Korende kamogosaba timogotererera amang'ana a bosa buna baria b'ebisaku : naki barabwo nigo bagokaga ng'a nabaigugwe as'amang'ana abo are amange .
40006008	Gaki timoba omogwekano oyomo nabarabwo : naki Iso oino oyamanyire aya morigetie , rigoro motaramosaba .
40006009	Inwe gaki saba iga : Tata oito ore igoro , erieta riao ribe buya , obonda bwao boche .
40006010	Obwanchani bwao bokoreke ense , buna bwakoretwe igoro .
40006011	Toe ntwe rero endagera yaito .
40006012	Naye otige ebibe biaito buna intwe twatigire abagotokora bobe .
40006013	Togotoira as'ogotemwa , ko tokonye noria omobe . Naki obonda , nechinguru , nobonene , nobwao , emiaka nemiaka . Amina .
40006014	Naki inwe kamorababere abanto ogosaria kwabo , n'Iso oino o igoro nababere inwe .
40006015	Korende motababereti abanto ogosaria kwabo , n'Iso oino takobabera ogosaria kwaino .
40006016	Komokweng'ata timokonyiria amasio aino buna baria abang'ainereria , ekiagera barabwo nigo bakonyiria amasio abo banyare kororwa nabanto ng'a barabwo mbeng'atete . Nekeene nabatebirie , banyorire eng'eria yabo .
40006017	Korende aye gokweng'ata , eake amaguta omotwe oo , bwesibie nobosio bwao .
40006018	Tobaisa kororwa nabanto ng'a mbweng'atete , ororekane as'Is'oo ore bobisi ; na Is'oo , oyokorora bobisi , nakoakane .
40006019	Timogacha chinibo chiaino as'ense , as'ebio ebigwankwa nobobosu bigosaria , nabaibi bakobochora nakoiba :
40006020	korende chinibo chiaino chigache igoro , as'egento getagosareka as'ebigwankwa gose obobosu , nabaibi tibakobochora nonya nkoiba .
40006021	Naki as'enibo yao ere , nenkoro yao nao ekoba .
40006022	Etaya y'omobere neriso ; konye eriso riao rire buya , nomobere oo bwonsi nobe nomobaso .
40006023	Korende , eriso riao onye rire ribe , nomobere oo ig'orabe omosunte bwonsi . Noria omobaso ore ime asore , onye obaire omosunte , omosunte nobe omonene naki !
40006024	Onde tari oranyare kobakorera abanene habere , naki nageche oyomo naende nanche oyonde , gose nabwatane noyomo nagochaya oyonde . Timokonyara gokorera Nyasaye nenibo .
40006025	As'aya nabatebirie inwe , timona korengereria as'obogima bwaino , ekimorarie , gose ekimoranywe ; gose as'emebere yaino , ekimorabeke . Inee , boria obogima tibori obuya kobua endagera , noria omobere tori omuya kobua chianga ?
40006026	chirigererie chinyoni chi'igoro ; chirochio chitasimeka , chitagesa , chitasangereria as'ebiage ; na chirochio Iso oino o igoro nere ngochirageriare . Inee , inwe timogwenereti kobua chirochio ?
40006027	Korende ning'o asemore oranyare as'ogwechanda komenta as'obotambe bwaye ekerengo ki'okoboko okomo ?
40006028	Na chiria chianga na chirochio , naseki mogochiechandera ? Inyora ebisicha bi'ebirubo , buna bikomera ; tibirigokora emeremo nonya tibirigwesisa ;
40006029	korende nabatebirie , nonya Sulemani nobonene bwaye bwonsi , tabegete chianga buna kere egesicha ekemo ki'ebi .
40006030	Na boria obonyansi bw'ekerubo , bokororekana rero , na mambia bwarutwa as'endobe , onye Nyasaye okobobisia boigo , takomenta mono igo kobabisia inwe , inwe abake b'okwegena ?
40006031	Gaki , timogwechanda , mogoteba , Ninki torarie ? gose , Ninki toranywe ? gose , Ninki torabeke ?
40006032	Naki ebi bionsi bikorigigwa na baria b'ebisakusaku ; naki Iso oino o igoro omanyire buna morigetie chi bionsi .
40006033	Korende ritang'ani rigia obonda bwa Nyasaye noboronge bwaye , nebi bionsi namomenterwe inwe .
40006034	Gaki timogwechandera ay'ankio : ekiagera ankio nariechande rinyene . Bwaisanire rituko obobe bwaye .
40007001	Timogambia , monyare kogambigwa .
40007002	Naki ekina mokonacha , nakio morache konacherwa . Nekerengo mokorengera , nakio morarengerwe .
40007003	Naye inki ogokerigereria ekeogoto kere as'eriso ri'oyomino , ko tomanyeti omoribo ore eriso riao aye ?
40007004	Gose naki oratebie oyomino , Ntiga nkorusie ekeogoto ekio as'eriso riao , nomoribo nore eriso riao aye ?
40007005	Omong'ainereria , erusie aye omonyene omoribo ore eriso riao , nario orarore buya komorusia oyomino ekeogoto kere eriso riaye .
40007006	Ekere ekiya timoa chisese , gose timoitera chiruru chiaino as'obosio bwe chingurue , tichicha gochitacha namagoro abo , naende chibaonchokere chibatandore .
40007007	Saba , namoegwe , rigia namorore ; tura namoigorerwe .
40007008	Naki onde bwonsi ogosaba nkonyorare , noyokorigia nkororare , noyogotura naigorerwe .
40007009	Gose ning'o ore asemore , orasabwe obokima nomwan'oye , oramoe rigena ?
40007010	Gose , oyogosabwa enswe , oramoe eng'iti ?
40007011	Gaki , inwe abamore ababe , onye momanyete kobaa abana baino ebiegwa ebiya , inee , n'Iso oino ore igoro takomenta mono kobaa amaya abwo bakomosaba ?
40007012	Gaki ande onsi moyarigetie mokorerwe nabanto , nainwe bakorere bo . Ekiagera ayio naro ogochika nababani .
40007013	Soa inwe as'egesieri kere ekegote ; ekiagera egesieri nekegare , nenchera nengare ekogenda obosirij nabange bakogesoa ekio .
40007014	Ekiagera egesieri nekegote , nenchera nenyerere ekogenda as'obogima , nabakonyerora nabake .
40007015	Mwerende nababani b'oborimo , barabwo abwo bagocha asemore babegete chingobo chie ching'ondi , nabarabwo ime nigo bare chisese chi'orosana chikoria kegima .
40007016	As'amatunda abo namobamanye . Inee , mogotwa amasabibu as'amagwa ? gose amako as'amageri ?
40007017	Naboigo omote bwonsi omuya okwama amatunda amaya , nomote omobe nigokwama amatunda amabe .
40007018	Omote omuya tokonyara kwama amatunda amabe , nonya nomote omobe tokonyara kwama amatunda amaya .
40007019	Omote bwonsi otameti amatunda amaya nigokobutorwa otugutwa endobe .
40007020	Naboigo , nas'amatunda abo morabamanyere barabwo .
40007021	Tari omonto bwonsi ogontebia , Omonene , Omonene , orasoe ime as'obonda bw'igoro , korende noyogokora obwanchani bwa Tata one ore igoro .
40007022	Ase rituko riria nabange barantebie , Omonene , Omonene , intwe titware gokora obobani as'erieta riao ? nas'erieta riao goseria ebirecha , nas'erieta riao gokora ogokumia okonge ?
40007023	Nainche erio nimbatebie boronge abanto baria , Timbamanyeti inwe nonya ng'ake : karwe asende inwe abakori ebibe .
40007024	Gaki onde omo oyokoigwa amang'ana ane aya , nakoyabwata , nagwekanigwe nomosacha omonyene obong'aini , oagachete mwaye as'egetare igoro :
40007025	embura egatwa , omogoko ogacha , amo nomwaga , bigachia as'enyomba eria , tiyagwa : ekiagera oboroso bwaye boagachire as'egetare igoro .
40007026	Nonde omo oyokoigwa amang'ana ane aya , gotayabwata , nagwekanigwe nomosacha omokayayu , oagachete mwaye as'amaroba :
40007027	embura egatwa , omogoko ogacha , amo nomwaga , bikaaka enyomba eria ekagwa ; nokogwa kwaye gokaba okonene mono .
40007028	Yesu gakorire amang'ana aya , ekaba ngokumiere emeganda eria as'okworokereria kwaye ;
40007029	naki igarenge koborokereria buna oyore nechinguru , tari buna baria abariki .
40008001	Yesu ochia korua egetunwa igoro agatunyanwa nemeganda emenge .
40008002	Rora , agachierwa nomonyene oborwaire bokorokwa ukoma , akamosasima , akamotebia , Omonene , onye korigetie , nonyare gonsibia .
40008003	Agakorambora okoboko kwaye akamokuna ; akamotebia , Nanchire ; sibeka . Erio agwo akagwenigwa oborwaire bwaye .
40008004	Yesu akamotebia , Rigereria totebia ' mont'onde ring'ana ; genda omworokie omokuani omobere oo , orue ekeegwa giachigetwe na Musa , obe okweorokia asebare .
40008005	Naende ochia gosoa Kaperinaum , agachierwa nomonene oyomo bw'abasigari ,
40008006	okomosorora nakomotebia , Omonene , omosomba one nyomba araire , oborwaire b'okomoigusia , nigo akoromwa mono .
40008007	Yesu akamotebia , Inche ninchiche komogwenia .
40008008	Oria omonene bw'abasigari akamoiraneria akabora , Omonene , inche tari omonto orachicherwe naye osoe inse as'ekerama kiane : korende atora ring'ana erimo rioka , nomosomba one nagwene .
40008009	Naki ninche nomonto or'inse as'ogochika , ninde nabasigari inse asende ; nainche kondatebie oyo , Genda , ogenda ; kondatebie oyo , Nchuo , ocha ; kondatebie omosomba one , Kora eri , okora .
40008010	Yesu ochia koigwa ayio agaichana , akabatebia abamotunyanete , Nekeene nabatebirie , nonya nas'Isiraeli tinanyakorora okwegena okoreng'aine oko :
40008011	korende nabatebirie ng'a abange nabache korwa mocha na bosongo , nabaikaranse amo n'lbrahimu , n'lsaaka , na Yakobo , as'obonda bw'igoro ;
40008012	na baria abana b'obonda nabatugutwe isiko as'omosunte ; nakebe nekerefo nokoriania amaino .
40008013	Yesu akamotebia omonene bw'abasigari , Genda bwoo , nabe asore koreng'ana nogwancha kwao . Akagwenigwa oria omosomba oye as'ekero keria .
40008014	Yesu akagenda ' nyomba ase Petero , akarora ng'ina mokaye oraire , orwarete oborwaire .
40008015	Akamokuna okoboko kwaye , oborwaire bokamotiga ; akaimoka korwa as'araire , akaba nkomokorerare .
40008016	Bwachia koira , bakamoirera abanto abange ababwatetwe nebirechaakabarusia ebirecha ase ring'ana ; na bonsi konya banyarekire akabagwenia ;
40008017	rinyare goikerana erio riatebetwe nomobani Isaya , ogoteba , Omonyene akaimokia oboreu bwaito , akayabogoria namarwaire aito .
40008018	Na Yesu agachia korora oetananirwe nemeganda emenge , agachika koimoka korwa aroro kogenda ng'umbu .
40008019	Agachierwa nomonto oyomo omoriki , akamotebia , Aye Omworokia , ningotunye as'ogochia onsi .
40008020	Yesu akamotebia , Ebibwe mbire namakuruma , nechinyoni chi'igoro nchire nebiswa , korende Omwana-o-mwanyabanto tari naas'akobeka omotw'oye .
40008021	Noyonde as'aborokigwa baye , akamotebia , Omonene , ing'a ribaga ritang'ani ngende gotindeka tata .
40008022	Yesu akamotebia , Ntunyana inche , obatige abakure batindeke abakure babo .
40008023	Goika ochia korina obwato agatunyanwa naborokigwa baye
40008024	Rora , omwaga omonene ogasoa aria as'enyancha , goika obwato bokaba ngotubwabore nemerindo : nere omonyene konya orarire .
40008025	Bakamochiera aborokigwa baye bakamotura , bakomotebia , Omonene , tokonye ; ngosiratore !
40008026	Akabatebia , Naki mokwoboa inwe ! More nokwegena ogoke ! Erio agwo agaienena akayekania embeo nenyancha ; gokaba ogotoerera okonene .
40008027	Bagaichana baria abanto , bagateba , Omonto ki oyo , nonya nembeo nenyancha chikomoigwera .
40008028	Ogochia goika ng'umbu , ense y'Abagadari , akaorokerwa nabanto babere babwatetwe nebirecha , nabarabwo bakarua chimbera ; nabatindi mono abanto abwo , goika omonto onde takonyara goeta enchera eria ,
40008029	Nabarabwo bakaaka egeturi , bakobora , Inki ntwe tore naye , Omwana o Nyasaye ? Inee , ngwachire aiga gotoita ekero giaito getaraika ?
40008030	Riicho rie chingurue chinyinge ndiarenge aroro , rire are nabarabwo , rikorisia .
40008031	Ebirecha biria bikamosorora , bikobora , Onye gwatorusia , tiga tosoe ase riicho rie chingurue .
40008032	Akabitebia Genda . Bikarua abanto baria babere , bikagenda bigasoa ase chingurue ; narirorio , erio riicho rionsi rigatirimboka eora , rigasoa enyancha , chigakwa amache ime .
40008033	Nabarisia bagatama , bakagenda sobo ; bakagenda bakarandia ayabanyorete onsi , naya baria babwatetwe nebirecha ;
40008034	nekero ekio bagasoka abanto omochie omogima kogenda koumerana na Yesu : bachia komorora bakamosorora anyare korua ase chinsemo chiabo agende aande .
40009001	Agasoa obwato akamboka , akagenda omochie oye .
40009002	Na rigereria , bakamoimokia omonto ore noborwaire bw'okoigusia , oraire ' borere , bakagenda nere asare . Yesu ochia korora okwegena kwabo akamotebia omonyene oborwaire , Enkoro yao tiga ereme , omwana one ; ebibe biao biabeirwe .
40009003	Erio abande as'abariki bakabora as'emioyo yabo , Oyo Nyasaye akorama .
40009004	Yesu akamanya ebirengererio biabo , akabatebia , Naseki inwe mokorengereria ebirengererio ebibe ase chinkoro chiaino ?
40009005	Naki , erire eriango ndiriri , goteba , Biabeirwe asore ebibe biao , gose goteba , Imoka ogende ?
40009006	Korende monyare kemanya ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nare nokobua as'ense okwabera ebibe , ( erio agwo akamotebia oria omonyene oborwaire ) , Imoka , obogorie oborere bwao ogende mwao .
40009007	Agatenena akagenda mwaye .
40009008	Emeganda yachia korora aria egakumia , bakamotogia Nyasaye , oyokoa mwanyabanto okobua engecho eyio .
40009009	Goika Yesu ochia goeta korwa aroro akamorora omonto oyomo oikaransete aase bakobangerwa ebango , erieta riaye okorokwa Mathayo : akamotebia , Ntunyana . Akaimoka , akamotunyana .
40009010	Ekaba ekero ekio oikaransete enyomba okoria endagera , erio bagacha abakorusia ebango abange nabanyene ebibe , bagaikaransa amo na Yesu naborokigwa baye .
40009011	Na baria Abafarisai , bachia kobarora , bakababoria baria aborokigwa baye , Naki omworokia oino akoria amo nabakorusia ebango nabanyene ebibe ?
40009012	Ochia koigwa akabatebia , Abare buya tibakorigia omorwaria , korende abare abarwaire nabwo bakorigia omorwaria .
40009013	Genda morinyore engecho yaye ring'ana eri : Inche igo ndigetie amabera , tari ekeng'wanso : naki tincheti kobarangeria ababoronge , korende abanyene ebibe .
40009014	Erio bakamochiera aborokigwa ba Yohana , bakamotebia , Naki ntwe Abafarisai tokweng'ata botambe , naborokigwa bao tibakweng'ata ?
40009015	Yesu akabatebia , Tibakonyara korera abana b'enyangi kareo omonene bw'enyangi amo nabarabwo , korende amatuko nache arache korusigwa asebare omonene bw'enyangi ; nario barache kweng'ata .
40009016	Gose tari omonto onde okobeka ekeraka ki'eanga enyia as'eanga engotu : naki keria kiabegetwe nigo kegotandora eanga eria , nase yatandogete ake nigo ekonagochiererera .
40009017	Gose tibakonyara kobeka edivai enyia ase chichuba chingotu : kabarabeke bo , chiria chichuba nigo chigwateka , edivai yaiteka , nechichuba chiasira : korende edivai enyia nigo ekobekwa ase chichuba chinyia , chiasirana chionsi ibere .
40009018	Ekero akobatebia ayio , erio agacha omonene oyomo , ukamosasima okobora , Omoiseke one bono iga oisire gokwa ; korende nchuo aye , omobekere okoboko , nere nagwene .
40009019	Yesu akaimoka akamotunyana omonto oria , ere naborokigwa baye .
40009020	Ekero ekio omokungu oyomo , orenge noborwaire bw'okorua amanyinga korwa emiaka ikomi nebere , akamochiera korwa nyuma , agakuna omobarero bw'eanga yaye ;
40009021	ekiagerete agateba omoy'oye ime , Kondakune eanga yaye , ningwene :
40009022	korende Yesu agaonchoka , ochia komorora akamotebia , Kabe nomoyo omoremu , omosubati ; okwegena kwao gwakogwenirie . Akagwena omokungu oria , akaba omogima korwa ekero keria .
40009023	Yesu ochia goika enyomba y'omonto oria omonene , akabarora abakobugia ebiroria nabanto basangereregete bagokora riroroche ,
40009024	Akabatebia , Irana nyuma : naki omwana takweti , nokorara araire gwoka . Bakamosekerera mono .
40009025	Erio basokigwa isiko baria basangereregete amo , agasoa ime akamobwata okoboko ; akaimoka oria omwana .
40009026	Amang'ana aya agakuma ense eria yonsi .
40009027	Yesu ogoeta okorua aaria , abanto babere emeuko bakamotunyana , bakoaka egeturi , bakobora , Tororere amabera , omwana o Daudi .
40009028	Ochia gosoa nyomba bakamochiera asare emeuko , Yesu akababoria , Inee , mwanchire ng'a ninyare inche gokora ring'ana eri ? Bakamotebia , Ee , Omonene ,
40009029	Erio agwo akabakuna amaiso , akabatebia , Koreng'ana nokwegena kwaino abe asemore .
40009030	Amaiso abo akaramokia . Yesu akabachika bokong'u , Rigereria ' monto onde tabaisa komanya .
40009031	Barabwo bagasoka isiko , bakarandia amang'ana aye as'ense yonsi .
40009032	Baria bagochia gosoka isiko ekero ekio , abanto bakamoretera omonto rimama , ore nekerecha .
40009033	Ekerecha giachia goserigwa riria rimama rigakwana ; emeganda egakumia , ekobora , As'Isiraeli ' monto onde tararorekana engeoho buna eye .
40009034	Baria Abafarisai bakobora , Nigo akobarusia ebirecha as'omonene bw'ebirecha .
40009035	Yesu agaetanana emechie yonsi nebichie okworokereria ase chisunagogi chiabo , okorandia amang'ana amaya ay'obonda , nakogwenia obonyareku noborwaire bwonsi .
40009036	Ochia koyerora emeganda y'abanto , akabarorera amabera ; ekiagera barenge nokorosa , nogwatananeka buna ching'ondi chkari nomorisia .
40009037	Erio agwo akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Rigesa ekeene nerinene ; korende abakori emeremo nabake .
40009038	Gaki mosabe Omonene bwe rigesa abatome abakori emeremo ase rigesa riaye .
40010001	Akabarangeria baria aborokigwa baye ikomi nababere , akabaa okobua as'ebirecha ebibe , as'okobiseria , nokogwenia obonyareku bwonsi noborwaire bwonsi bwa mwanyabanto .
40010002	Namarieta abo baria abatomwa ikomi nababere naro aya : oyo bwe ritang'ani , Simon okorokwa Petero , n'Anderea momura omwabo ; Yakobo omwana o Zebedi na Yohana momura omwabo ;
40010003	Filipo , na Baritholomayo ; Thomas , na Mathayo , omobangi ebango ; Yakobo bw'Alufayo , na Thadayo ;
40010004	Simon Omokanani ; na Yudasi Omoisikariota , nere oyomoruete .
40010005	Aba ikomi nababere Yesu akabatoma , akabachika , agateba , Enchera y'ebisaku timogenda ende yonsi , nonya nomochie bw'Abasamaria timosoa onde bwonsi .
40010006	Ko mbuya morachichiere ching'ondi chinsiru chi'enyomba y'Isiraeli .
40010007	Nainwe as'okogenda kwaino , randia , motebe : Obonda bw'igoro bwaikire ang'e .
40010008	Nabarwarete bagwenie , abakure babokie , abare noborwaire bw'ukoma basibie , ebirecha birusie . Mwaeirwe bosa , karue bosa .
40010009	Timokora emonga y'ethahabu , gose efetha , gose chitai as'ebimoya biaino .
40010010	Timobogoria chisaro chi'orogendo nonya nechikansu ibere , nonya nebikoroto , nonya nenyimbo : naki omokori emeremo nagwenerete endagera yaye .
40010011	Nomochie onde bwonsi morasoe , nagachie gonsi , rigereria oyogwenerete ime , moikaranse aroro goika mosoke .
40010012	Nainwe ekero mogosoa enyomba eria , yekwanie .
40010013	Nero kegwenerete enyomba eria , omorembe oino nonyeikere igoro asere ; konye tegwenereti , omorembe oino nobairanere inwe .
40010014	Noyo otabaroiseti inwe onde bwensi , gose okoigwa amang'ana aino , mobe kamokorua enyomba eria gose omochie oria , kong'onta orotu rw'amagoro aino .
40010015	Nekeene nabatebirie , nebe buya kobua ase Sodomu na Gomora ase rituko ri'ekina kobua omochie oria .
40010016	Rigereria , nabatomire inwe , omogwekano bwe ching'ondi gatigati ye ching'iti chi'orosana . Naboigo mobe nobong'aini buna eng'iti , nobwororo buna riruma .
40010017	Nainwe erende na mwanyabanto ; naki barabwo nababasokie nakobaira ase chibarasa chiabo , nase chisunagogi chiabo , nababachwanie chinkini .
40010018	Nainwe namoirwe goika as'obosio bw'abagavuna nabaruoti asende , koba okweorokia asebare nas'ebisaku .
40010019	Korende rigoro bakobaira , timoichana buna mogocha koiraneria ase ' nchera ki gose as'amang'ana ki ; naki as'ekero keria namoegwe eri mogokwana ,
40010020	naki tari inwe mogokwana , n'Omoika o Iso oino ogokwana asemore ime .
40010021	Korende oyomwabo namorue oyomwabo akwe , n'ise namorue omwan'oye , nabaria abana nababaimokere abaibori babo kobabeka as'ogoitwa .
40010022	Nainwe namogechwe nabanto bonsi as'erieta riane ; korende oyoraremererie goika omoerio , oyio nakonyeke .
40010023	Nabarabwo kabarabarosie as'omochie oyo , tama gochia as'oyonde ; naki nekeene nabatebirie , timokoyekora emechie y'lsiraeli atacheti oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
40010024	Omworokigwa takoba omonene as'omworokia oye , gose omosomba takoba omonene as'omonene oye ,
40010025	yamoisanire omworokigwa koba buna omworokia oye , nomosomba buna omonene oye . Inee , ere omonyene enyomba onye bamorokire erieta ria Beelizebuli , tai kobua abwo bare b'enyomba yaye ?
40010026	Gaki timobairoka baria : ekiagera rinde tiriri riakunegetwe ritache gokunorwa kegima , gose riabisegete ritache komanyekana .
40010027	Eri nkobatebia omosunte ime , ritebe as'omobaso , neri mokoigwa as'ogoto , rirandie igoro ase chinyomba .
40010028	Nainwe timoiroka abagoita omobere , abatanyare goita oria omoika : kobua moiroke oyo oranyare kobiita omobere nomoika bionsi ase chaanam .
40010029	Inee , chinchiro ibere tichiri kogorwa egesabwa ekemo ? Ko nonya nakamo kaye tigakogwa inse Iso oino atamanyeti .
40010030	Korende inwe , nonya nechio chitukia chi'emetwe yaino chionsi chiabarirwe .
40010031	As'ayio timoiroka ; inwe nabaya kobua ebinyoni ebinge .
40010032	As'ayio ker'omonto oranyatore as'obosio bwa mwanyabanto , nainche nanche komwatora as'obosio bwa Tata one ore igoro .
40010033	Korende oyoranyange as'obosio bwa mwanyabanto , nainche namwange as'obosio bwa Tata one ore igoro .
40010034	Timokaga ng'a nachire kobeka omorembe as'ense : tincheti koyobeka omorembe , korende nachire kobeka omoro bw'esegi .
40010035	Naki eki nacheire inche , nokobatanana omonto n'ise , nomosubati na ng'ina , na moka-momura , na ng'inabiara .
40010036	Nababisa b'omonto nababe abanto b'enyomba yaye .
40010037	Oyo bwanchete ise gose ng'ina kobua inche , tangwenereti . Noyo bwanchete omwan'oye omomura , gose enyaroka , kobua inche , tangwenereti .
40010038	Noyo tabwateti omosalaba oye antunyane , tangwenereti inche .
40010039	Oyoranche obogima bwaye nabosirie , noyorabosirie obogima bwaye as'engecho yane naborore ,
40010040	Oyobanchire inwe , onyanchire nainche ; noyonyanchire inche , bwanchire noyo ontomete .
40010041	Oyobwanchire omobani as'erieta ri'omobani , nanyore eng'eria y'omobani ; noyobwanchire oyio oboronge , ekiagera nomonyene oboronge , nanyore eng'eria y'oyio oboronge .
40010042	Noyo oramosibie oyomo obo as'abake aba egetabo ki'amache amakendu oka as'erieta ri'omworokigwa , nekeene nabatebirie eng'eria yaye tegosira nonya ng'ake .
40011001	Ekaba Yesu agachia gokora okobachika aborokigwa baye ikomi nababere , akaimoka korwa aaria arenge , akagenda kworokereria nakorandia as'emechie yabo .
40011002	Nere Yohana ochia koigwa aaria as'agasibire ebitage bia Kristo , agatoma aborokigwa baye komoboria ,
40011003	Aye naye ogocha , gose nomoao tokoganya ?
40011004	Yesu akabairaneria akabatebia , Genda momoiranerie amang'ana Yohana ayamwaigwa naya mwarora ;
40011005	emeuko nkororere , nebirema nkogendabire , nabanyene ukoma ngosibigwabare , nemetino nkoigwere , nebitondo nkobokigwabire , nabataka nkoranderigwabare amang'ana amaya .
40011006	Nare negesio oyotagochiri asende inche .
40011007	Nabwo bachia koimoka , Yesu agachaka kobaboria baria emeganda ase Yohana : Inki mwachiete korora aria eroro ime ? Egetonto gegotengechigwa nembeo ?
40011008	Korende inki mwagendete isiko gokerigereria ? omonto oboirie chianga chinterere ? Rigereria , abakweboa chianga chinterere iga bare ase chinyomba chi'abaruoti .
40011009	Korende inki mwachiete korigereria aaria ? Nokorigia korora omobani ? Naboigo nabatebirie inwe , naende kobua omobani .
40011010	Naki oyo nere orikeretwe amang'ana aya : Rigereria , inche namotomire omotomwa one as'obosio bwao , Oyorache korosia enchera yao otang'aine asore .
40011011	Nekeene , nabatebirie inwe , onde taratoka as'abaiboire nabakungu ore omonene kobua Yohana Omobatisi : nere oyore omoke as'obonda bwa igoro nomonene kobua ere .
40011012	Korende korwa amatuko aye Yohana Omobatisi goika bono , obonda bw'igoro igo bogosogwa nechinguru , nabwo abanyene chinguru bakoboira nechinguru .
40011013	Naki ababani bonsi namachiko , iga barekobana goika Yohana .
40011014	Nainwe onye mwarigirie koriancha , ere nere . Elija ogocha-gocha .
40011015	Oyore namato akoigwa , aigwe .
40011016	Korende naki ndakegwekanie ekegori eke ? Nkegwekaine nabana bagoikaransa chichiro , bakobarangeria abagisangio babo , bagoteba ,
40011017	Twababugeirie ebiroria , nainwe timogotenga ; twarerire , timorigoichana .
40011018	Naki Yohana nachete , tarekoria gose tarekonywa : bagakwana , Nare nekerecha .
40011019	Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nachete okoria nakonywa : barabwo bagateba , Oyo nere , omonto omoribobe nagotinda nedivai , omosani bw'ababangi nabanyene ebibe ! Nobong'aini bwaeirwe oboronge nabana baye .
40011020	Erio agwo agachaka koyiomania emechie , as'ebitage biaye bie chinguru biakorekire ime ebinge , ekiagera etaonchogeti .
40011021	Obobe nobwao , Korazen ! obobe nobwao Bethisaida ! ekiagera onyore mbiakoregete ase Turo na Sidon ebitage bie chinguru biakoregete asemore , anga mbaonchogete kare nakobeka egetambaa gie chigunia neribu .
40011022	Nabatebirie inwe nakebe ekiororo ase Turo na Sidon ase rituko ri'ekina kobua ekiaino inwe .
40011023	Naye Kaperinaum oimokererigwe goika igoro , noche goikigwa goika as'amakweri . Ekiagera ebitage bie chinguru biakorekire asore aye , onye mbiakoregete ase Sodomu anga noikaransete omochie oyio goika rituko ria rero .
40011024	Korende nabatebirie , inwe , ng'a nakebe ekiororo as'ense ya Sodomu ase rituko ri'ekina kobua ekiao aye .
40011025	As'ekero keria Yesu akairaneria agakwana , Nakobakire aye Tata , Omonene o igoro nense , ekiagera amang'ana aya kwabisire abare nechisemi nobong'aini , kwabaigoreire abana .
40011026	Naboigo are , Tata , ekiagera nagwenerete asore abe bo .
40011027	Amang'ana onsi naeirwe inche na Tata one ; gose tari onde omomanyete Omwana tatiga ere Tata , nonya tari onde omomanyete Tata tatiga Omwana , nonde bwonsi oria Omwana aranche komoorokeria .
40011028	Nchuo asende inwe mwensi abwo mwarosigwe as'emeremo emerito , abwo mwabunekire nechigurube , nainche nimbatimokie .
40011029	Mwetweke egesibo kiane , mwegere asende , ekiagera inche nomwororonde , nomoitongo bw'omoyo : nainwe namorore ogotimoka as'emebere yaino .
40011030	Naki egesibo kiane nekiororo , negurube yane nengusu .
40012001	As'ekero keria Yesu nagendete rituko ri'esabato gatigati y'emegondo ; aborokigwa baye bakaba nenchara , bagachaka kobutora ebigara , bakaria .
40012002	Abafarisai bagachia korora , bakamotebia , Rigereria , aborokigwa bao buna bagokora eritagwenereti gokoreka ase rituko ri'esabato .
40012003	Nere akabatebia , Timwanyagosoma ayakorete Daudi ekero arenge nenchara , ere nabwo barenge komo ?
40012004	Asoete as'enyomba ya Nyasaye , akayeria eria emegati eyokworokereria , nero tiyagwenerete asare ayerie , gose as'abwo barenge amo nere , tatiga as'abakuani boka abanyene .
40012005	Gose timwasomete as'amachiko buna amatuko ye chisabato abakuani be hekalu igo bagosaria esabato , nabarabwo tibaba nokomocha ?
40012006	Nainche nabatebirie buna nare aiga oyore omonene kobua hekalu .
40012007	Korende onye mwamanyete engecho y'amang'ana aya , Nindigetie amabera , tindigetie ekeng'wanso , anga timwababegete ekina abatari nokomocha .
40012008	Naki oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere omonene bw'esabato ,
40012009	Akaimoka korwa aria , akagenda , agasoa esunagogi yabo .
40012010	Rora , narenge omonto agwo okoboko kwaye kwomete . Bakamoboria , bagoteba , Inee , negwenerete kogwenia ase rituko ri'esabato ? banyare komosoera .
40012011	Nere akabatebia , Ning'o asemore orabe neng'ondi eyemo : eng'ondi eyio keragwe eirima ase rituko ri'esabato takonyebwata ayerusie ?
40012012	Inee , omonto nabuete eng'ondi goika karenga ? gaki abaire naro , agwenerete gokora amaya rituko ri'esabato .
40012013	Erio agwo akamotebia omonto oria , Rambora okoboko kwao . Agakorambora , gokagwena , gokaba okogima buna okonde ,
40012014	Korende bakaimoka baria Abafarisai bakagenda bakamogamba bamoite ,
40012015	Yesu agachia komanya amang'ana aria , akarua aria akagenda ande : agatunyanwa nabanto abange , akabagwenia bonsi ,
40012016	Akabachika tibamoorokia :
40012017	rinyare goikerana eri'arigetwe nomobani Isaya , ogoteba ,
40012018	Oyo nere omosomba one nachorire ; Omwanchi one , omoy'one ogokigwe asare : Nimobekere Omoika one . Nere nabiranderie ebisaku ekina ,
40012019	Takwomana , gose takoaka egeturi ; Nonya nomont'onde takoigwa eriogi riaye ase chinchera chinene .
40012020	Egetonto giatachetwe tagokebuna , Buna egesibe ki'amatwaro gekoimoka erioki tagokerimia , Goika arete ekina as'okobua .
40012021	Nas'erieta riaye Ebisaku nabirisemerie .
40012022	Ekero ekio akareterwa omonyene ekerecha , nere nomouko , naende nerimama : akamogwenia , goika oria omoukorimama agakwana nakorora .
40012023	Emeganda eria yonsi ekaba ngokumiere , bagakwana , Inee , oyo nere omwana o Daudi ?
40012024	Korende Abafarisai bagachia koigwa bagakwana : Oyo tarikobarusia ebirecha tatiga ase Beelizebuli , omonene bw'ebirecha .
40012025	Agachia komanya ebirengererio biabo akabatebia , Ker'obonda bwatananekanire bwoka , tibogotenena ; na ker'omochie gose enyomba yatananekanire yoka , tegotenena .
40012026	Na Saitani karaserie Saitani , yabaire bwatananekanire nomobere oye ; Inee , obonda bwaye , naki boratenene ?
40012027	Nainche onye nase Beelizebuli ngoseria ebirecha , Inee , abana baino nase ng'o bakobaseria ? As'engecho eyio , barabwo nababe abagambi baino .
40012028	Onye nainche nas'Omoika o Nyasaye ngoseria ebirecha , gaki , obonda bwa Nyasaye nigo bwabacheire .
40012029	Gose omonto naki aranyare gosoa as'enyomba y'omonyene chinguru gosakora ebinto biaye , atatang'aneti ritang'ani komosiba oria omonyene chinguru ? Nario erio aramanye gosakora enyomba yaye .
40012030	Oyotari amo nainche igare ao nainche . Oyo otari gosangereria amo nainche , nigo agoserebania .
40012031	As'engecho eyio nabatebirie , ker'obobe nokorama , mwanyabanto nababerwe ; tatiga okorama as'Omoika tibakwaberwa .
40012032	Nomonto orakwane ring'ana as'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , nariaberwe asare ; korende omonto orakwane ring'ana as'Omoika Omochenu , tirikwaberwa asare as'ense eye , nonya nas'eria egocha koba .
40012033	Kora omote omuya , namatunda aye amaya : gose kora omote omobe , namatunda aye amabe : naki omote nigo okomanyekana as'amatunda aye .
40012034	Inwe oroiboro rwe ching'iti , naki moranyare gokwana amaya , onye more ababe ? Naki ebichire as'enkoro , nabio omonwa ogokwana .
40012035	Omonto omuya as'emonga engiya akorua amaya , nomonto omobe as'emonga embe akorua amabe .
40012036	Korende nabatebirie inwe , ng'a kera ring'ana ritari nenchera mwanyabanto barakwane , rituko ri'ekina nabache goteba okobara kwaye .
40012037	Naki as'amang'ana ao noegwe oboronge , nas'amang'ana ao nobugwe ng'a nomosaria .
40012038	Erio agwo bakamoiraneria abande as'abariki n'Abafarisai , bakobora , Omworokia , ntorigetie torore egekone asore .
40012039	Akabairaneria , akabatebia , Ekegori ekebe nobotomani kerigetie egekone , korende tigekoegwa egekone tatiga egekone ki'omobani Yona .
40012040	Naki buna Yona abete ime as'enda ye nyangumi ekero ki'amatuko atato nemebaso etato , n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere nabe ime as'enkoro y'ense boigo emebaso etato namatuko atato .
40012041	Abanto ba Nineva nabatenene as'ekina amo nabanto b'ekegori eke nabarabwo nabakenachere ekina gi'okomocha . Ekiagera barabwo nigo baonchogete as'okorandia kwa Yona , naki oyomobuete Yona naigare .
40012042	Omogambi eting'ana bw'ensemo ya sugusu natenene as'ekina amo nabanto b'ekegori eke , nere nakenachere ekina ng'a giasaririe : ekiagera aruete chinsinyo chi'ense anyare koigwa obong'aini bwa Sulemani , noyobuete Sulemani naigare .
40012043	Ekerecha ki'eubi gekorua as'omonto , gegoeta aas'atari amache , gekorigia ase gegotimokera , tigekonyora .
40012044	Erio kiabora , Ning'irane mwane ase naruete . Gegocha gekayerora nenchwa , yaabusirwe , yaomirwe .
40012045	Erio gekabwatia enchera , gekareta ebirecha binde bitano nabibere , ebibe gokebua ekenyene , bigasoa bikayeikaransa , akaba omonto oria okoba kwaye kw'omoerio nokobe kobua okwe ritang'ani . Naboigo erache koba as'ekegori eke kere ekebe .
40012046	Nere kare gokwana nemeganda , rora , ng'ina nabamura bamwabo nisiko bateneine , mbarigetie gokwana nere .
40012047	Omonto oyomo akamotebia , Rora , nyoko nabamura bamino mbare isiko , bateneine , mbarigetie gokwana naye .
40012048	Akamoiraneria , oria rigokwana komo , akabora , Baba nere ng'o ? Nabamura baminto mbarabi ?
40012049	Agakorambora okoboko kwaye ensemo y'aborokigwa baye , akabora , Rigereria baba nabamura baminto .
40012050	Naki oyo orakore obwanchani bwa Tata one ore igoro , oyo nere momura ominto , nere mosubati ominto , nere baba .
40013001	Ase rituko riria , Yesu akarua aria nyomba , akagenda agaikaransa as'enyancha mbarabare .
40013002	Abanto bakamosangererekera emeganda emenge , goika akarina obwato nagoikaransa : noria omoganda bw'abanto bagatenena engegu bonsi .
40013003	Agakwana nabarabwo amang'ana amange . Akayarenta as'emereng'anio akabora : Omobusuri omanoire kogenda kobusura embusuro .
40013004	Rigoro akobusura , chimbusuro chinde chikagwa ensemo y'enchera , chinyoni chigacha chigachiria :
40013005	nechinde chikagwa aas'amagena are , aase amaroba arenge amake : erio chigakumboka ekiagera amaroba atachieti inse .
40013006	Omobaso ochia kobara chigasusana ; nas'okomocha emeri chikoma .
40013007	Nechinde chikagwa as'amagwa ime , naria amagwa agakina agachimiga .
40013008	Nechinde chikagwa as'amaroba amaya , chikama , echi emia , nechi'emerongo etano nomo , nechi'emerongo etato .
40013009	Oyore namato aigwe .
40013010	Aborokigwa baye bakamochiera bakamotebia , Naseki aye kware gokwana nabarabwo as'emereng'anio ?
40013011	Akabairaneria akabatebia , Ekiagera inwe mwaeirwe koyamanya aya bobisi ay'obonda bwa igoro , korende barabwo tibaeiri .
40013012	Naki oyore nero naegwe , nere namenteranigwe ; korende oyotayebwati naurwe nonya neyio abwate ,
40013013	As'engecho eyio , inche ngokwana nabarabwo as'emereng'anio ; ekiagera abakorigereria namaiso tibarora , nabakoigwa namato tibaigwa , nonya nokoinyora tibainyora .
40013014	Nabarabwo ring'ana ri'Isaya , riabaikeire , rigoteba , Okoigwa namoigwe , ko timoinyora gento kende ; Nokorigereria as'amaiso namorigererie , ko timorora gento kende .
40013015	Naki chinkoro chi'abanto aba , chiabaire chinkong'u , Namato abo igo bakoigwa as'oborito . Namaiso abo bayamiamirie , Tibacha korora namaiso abo , Baigwe namato abo , Bainyore ase chinkoro chiabo , Baonchoke , mbagwenie .
40013016	Korende inwe mwasesenigwe amaiso aino , ekiagera akorora ; mwasesenigwe amato aino , ekiagera akoigwa .
40013017	Naki nekeene nabatebirie , nabange ababani nabanyene oboronge mbarengereretie koyarora ayio moroche inwe as'amaiso aino , tibayarora , nokoyaigwa ayamokoigwa inwe , tibayaigwa .
40013018	Gaki yoigwe omoreng'anio bw'omobusuri bw'embusuro ,
40013019	Omonto bwonsi orabe nkoigware ring'ana ri'obonda , gotarinyora , nigo agocha oria omobe , oritaboria riria riasimekirwre as'omoyo oye ; oyo nere obusuirwe enchera mbarabare ,
40013020	Noyo obusuirwe amagena ime nere okoriigwa riria ring'ana , akaribwata bwango nomogoko ;
40013021	korende tari nemeri omonyene , ogenderera egeka egeke ; korende emechando egochigocha , gose ogochandwa ekiagera ase ring'ana riria , erio ogochwa .
40013022	Noyo obusuirwe amagwa ime , Oyo nere okoigwa ring'ana riria , riba nkomigwarire ring'ana nokorengereria gw'ense , nokong'ainwa kw'enibo , takwama .
40013023	Noyo obusuirwe as'amaroba amaya , nere oria okoigwa ring'ana riria , oriinyora ; nere ekeene bwama amatunda , aya emia , naya emerongo etano nomo , naya emerongo etato .
40013024	Akabasokeria omoreng'anio onde , agakwana , Obonda bwa igoro nigo bogwekaine nomonto osimegete embusuro engiya as'omogondo oye ;
40013025	korende rigoro abanto bararire , omobisa oye akagenda agasimeka namabanchore ime as'engano , akagenda .
40013026	Egachia koorokia korwa inse ekama ebigara , erio namabanchore naro akarorekana .
40013027	Erio abasomba b'omonyene enyomba bagacha , bakamotebia , Omonene , tigwasimegete embusuro engiya as'omogondo oo ? Naki onyorekana namabanchore ?
40013028	Akabatebia , Nomonto omobisa okorete bo , Abasomba bakamotebia , Inee , norigetie tochie toyasangererie ?
40013029	Agateba , Yaya ; gose mokoba mogosangereria amabanchore namosimore engano amo naro ,
40013030	Bitige bikine bionsi bibere goika rigesa ; rigoro rigesa nintebie abakogesa , Sangereria ritang'ani amabanchore , moyaboe emesaima monyare koyasamba : nengano moyesangererie gochia kiage kiane ,
40013031	Akabasokeria omoreng'anio onde , agakwana : Obonda bwa igoro nigo bogwekaine nentetere y'ekaradali , omonto akayebogoria akayesimeka omogondo oye ime :
40013032	nero nenke mono kobua chimbusuro chionsi , korende koyamerire , ekaba enene kobua emete yonsi , ekaba omote , goika nechinyoni chia igoro chichia koagacha ebiswa biabo ase chinsagia chiaye .
40013033	Akabatebia omoreng'anio onde : Obonda bwa igoro nigo bogwekaine nememera , omokungu abogoretie akayebisa as'ebirengo bitato bi'obosie , goika bwonsi bokabota ,
40013034	Aya onsi nigo ayakwanete Yesu nabaria emeganda as'emereng'anio , natatiga as'emereng'anio tabatebetie ring'ana :
40013035	rinyare goikeranigwa riria riatebetwe nomobani , aregoteba , Nimanore omonwa one as'emereng'anio : Ninyatore ayabisegete korwa ogokorwa gw'ense .
40013036	Erio agwo Yesu akabatiga baria emeganda , akagenda enyomba ; aborokigwa baye bakamochiera , bakabora , Totebererie emereng'anio y'amabanchore a mogondo ,
40013037	Akabairaneria akabora , Oyogosimeka embusuro engiya n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ;
40013038	omogondo nense ; embusuro eyio engiya nabana b'obonda ; namabanchore nabwo abana b'oria omobe ,
40013039	Oria omobisa oyasimegete nere saitani : rigesa nomoerio bw'ense ; nabakogesa namalaika .
40013040	Buna amabanchore agosangererigwa asambwa nomorero naboigo omoerio bw'ense orache koba ,
40013041	Oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nabatome amalaika aye , nabarabwo nabasangererie korwa obonda bwaye , amagochwa onsi , nabagokora ebibe .
40013042	Babatugute as'eriko ri'omorero ; babe nekerero aroro nokoriania amaino .
40013043	Erio , abanyene oboronge nabagirigente buna erioba as'obonda bwa Ise obo , Oyore namato aigwe .
40013044	Naende obonda bwa igoro nomogwekano bw'enibo yabisire as'omogondo , omonto akayerora akayebisa ; as'omogoko oye akagenda , akagora ebiabwate bionsi , akagora omogondo oria ,
40013045	Naende obonda bwa igoro nomogwekano bw'omonto omokori ebiasara , okorigia chiruru chingiya :
40013046	nere agachikorora eruru eyemo ye rigori rinene , akaimoka akagenda , akagora ebiabwate bionsi akayegora .
40013047	Naende obonda bwa igoro nomogwekano bw'ekeonga , kiarutetwe as'enyancha , kegasangereria chie chingecho chionsi .
40013048	Erio . giaichoire bagakeng'usa gocha engegu ; bagaikaransa , bagasangereria chiria chingiya as'ebinto , nachiria chimbe bagachituguta .
40013049	Naboigo arache koba as'omoerio bw'ense ; baria amalaika nabaoroke , bache kobatigeria baria ababe korwa egati y'abanyene oboronge ;
40013050	babarute as'eriko ri'omorero . Agwo nebe nekerero nokoriania amaino .
40013051	Yesu akabatebia , Mwayainyoire aya onsi ? Bakamotebia , Ee ,
40013052	Akabatebia , As'engecho eye ker'omoriki oyokorirwe omworokigwa bw'obonda bwa igoro , obaire omogwekano bw'omonto omonyene enyomba , okorua as'enibo yaye ebinto ebiyia nebikoro .
40013053	Ekaba Yesu ochia gokora emereng'anio eye , akagenda aande .
40013054	Agachia goika ense yaye omonyene , akaborokereria ase chisunagogi chiabo , goika bagakumia , bagateba , Oyo ng'ai anyora chisemi echi , nogokora gwe chinguru oko ?
40013055	Oyo tari omwana bw'omobachi ? ng'ina tari oria okorokwa Mariamu , nabamura bamwabo tari Yakobo , na Yusufu , na Simon , na Yuda .
40013056	Nabasubati bamwabo bonsi tibari aa seito ? Gaki , oyo ng'ai ayanyora aya onsi ?
40013057	Ekaba bakagechigwa asare . Korende Yesu akabatebia , Omobani takomocha ogosikwa tatiga as'ense yaye na mwaye .
40013058	Korende takorete agwo ebitage ebinge bie chinguru ekiagera batarenge nokwegena .
40014001	Ekero keria omoruoti Herode akaigwa amang'ana a Yesu ,
40014002	akabatebia abasomba baye , Oyo nere Yohana omobatisi ; obokire korwa as'amakweri nas'ayio , chinguru : echio chiaorokire asare .
40014003	Naki oria Herode konya omobwatire Yohana , akamosiba , akamobeka echela as'okomobunia Herodia , moka Filipu omwabo .
40014004	Naki Yohana konya omotebirie , Tari buya asore , mokomenyana nere .
40014005	Goika agachia korigia komoita , akairoka abanto , ekiagera bamwanchire Yohana ng'a nomobani .
40014006	Rigachia goika rituko ri'okoiborwa kwaye Herode , eria enyaroka ya Herodia egatenga asebare gati , ekamogokia Herode .
40014007	Erio , akaria eira , komoa kende gionsi ekiararigie .
40014008	Nere akorokererigwa na ng'ina , akamotebia , Ing'a aiga omotwe o Yohana omobatisi as'esani .
40014009	Omoruoti agaichana ; korende as'eira yaye , nabaria abaikaransete as'endagera amo nere , agachika aegwe .
40014010	Agatoma omonto , akamonacha omotwe Yohana echela ime .
40014011	Omotwe oye okarentwe as'esani , enyaroka ekaegwa , ekaira ase ng'ina .
40014012	Aborokigwa baye bagachia , bakaira omobere oye , bakayotindeka ; bakagenda bakamotebia Yesu .
40014013	Yesu agachia koigwa , akarua agwo nobwato , akagenda bweka aase abanto batari . Nemeganda egachia koigwa , bakamotunya namagoro korwa emechie .
40014014	Nere Yesu agasoka , akarora emeganda emenge , akabarorera amabera , akabagwenia abarwaire babo .
40014015	Goika riachia koba mogoroba aborokigwa baye bakamochiera , bakabora , Aas'aa ' banto tibario , nechinsa chiaetire ; nyetige emeganda egende emechie , begorere endagera .
40014016	Yesu akabatebia , Tibarigeti kogenda ; inwe bae endagera .
40014017	Nabarabwo bakamotebia , Titobwati ' gento aiga , tatiga emegati etano nechinswe ibere .
40014018	Akabora , Ndetera aiga .
40014019	Agachika emeganda eikaranse inse as'obonyansi ; akabwata emegati etano nechinswe ibere , akarigereria igoro , akayesesinia , akayesamunyora , akabaa aborokigwa emegati eyio , naborokigwa bakabaa emeganda .
40014020	Bakaria bonsi , bakaigota : bakayebogoria eyatigara ebisamunye bi'emegati , ebitonga ikomi nabibere bichire .
40014021	Nabwo bariete igo barenge abasacha chilifu isano , tiga abakungu nabana abake .
40014022	Erio Yesu akababetereria aborokigwa baye barine obwato , bamotang'ane kogenda ng'umbu , goika ayetige emeganda egende .
40014023	Gatigire emeganda yachire , akarina egetunwa bweka gochia gosaba . Riachia koba mogoroba akaba agwo bweka .
40014024	Naborobwo obwato bwaikire enyancha gati , bokorunda-rundigwa namakundia ; naki omwaga norengeo obatangete .
40014025	Goika okorenda gwa kane kw'obotuko Yesu agacha asebare , okogenda namagoro as'enyancha igoro ,
40014026	Aborokigwa bagachia komorora okogenda namagoro enyancha igoro , bakaondoka , bakabora , Rirengari erio ; bakaaka egeturi as'okoiroka ,
40014027	Erio Yesu agakwana nabarabwo , akabora , Remia emioyo ; ninche ; timoiroka ,
40014028	Petero akamoiraneria , akabora , Omonene , onye naye , ntebia nchiche asore igoro as'amache ,
40014029	Akamotebia , Inchuo , Petero agaika korwa obwato , akagenda namagoro as'amache igoro ogochia ase Yesu .
40014030	Korende agachia korora omwaga bwe chinguru akairoka : agachaka korimera amache ime , akaaka egeturi , agateba , Omonene , nkonya .
40014031	Erio Yesu akarambora okoboko kwaye , akamobwata , akajnotebia , Aye omonyene okwegena ogoke , naki kwairoka ?
40014032	Bagachia korina obwato , omwaga okabutoka .
40014033	Nabarabwo abarenge obwato ime , bakamochiera , bakamosasima , bagateba , Ekeene aye n'Omwana o Nyasaye .
40014034	Bagachia kwamboka ng'umbu , bagaika ense ya Genesareti ,
40014035	Nabanto b'orogongo roria bagachia komomanya , bagatoma abanto bagende chinsemo chiria chionsi , bakamoretera bonsi abarenge abanyareku ;
40014036	bakamosorora bakune nonya nomobarero bw'eanga yaye ; nabakunete bonsi bakagwenigwa kegima .
40015001	Erio agwo agachierwa n'Abafarisai nabariki bakorua Yerusalemu , bakabora ,
40015002	Naki aborokigwa bao bagosaria amang'ana ay'abagaka ? Naki kabakoragera tibari goisaba amaboko ,
40015003	Akairaneria , akabatebia , Naki inwe mogosaria ogochika kwa Nyasaye namang'ana aino ?
40015004	Naki Nyasaye agachika agateba , Sika iso na nyoko : noyoratore bobe as'ise , gose ng'ina , nakwe ogokwa ;
40015005	korende inwe mogoteba , ng'a Oyoratebie ise gose ng'ina , Bionsi ebikogwenerete ogokonywa nainche nesadaka ;
40015006	atamosigeti ise nonya ng'ina , gaki . Mokarisaria ring'ana ria Nyasaye namang'ana aino ,
40015007	Inwe abang'ainereria ! mbuya Isaya abanete asemore , okobora ,
40015008	Abanto aba as'omonw'obo bagonchichera ang'e , Nas'ebikoba biabo bagonsika , Korende chinkoro chiabo igachire are nainche .
40015009	Ko barabwo mbosa bagonsasima , Nobong'aini bakworokereria , bakworokereria amachiko a mwanyabanto .
40015010	Akabarangeria emeganda bache asare , akabatebia , Igwa , moinyore ,
40015011	tari ekio gegosoa omonwa gekomobeka omonto riko ; korende egekorua omonwa nakio gekomobeka riko .
40015012	Erio aborokigwa baye bakamochiera bakamotebia , Inee , kwamanyire ng'a Abafarisai , rigoro baigwete ring'ana riria , mbagechetigwe ?
40015013	Akabairaneria akabora , Ker'omote otasimekiri na Tata one ore igoro , nosimorwe .
40015014	Batige : barabwo nemeuko , abatang'ani b'emeuko ; nomouko oise gotang'ana omouko onde , nigo baragwe engoro bonsi babere .
40015015	Petero akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Totebie , omoreng'anio oyio .
40015016	Akabora , Inee , nonya mbono nainwe timori nobong'aini ?
40015017	Timorainyora ng'a kende gionsi gegosoa omonto as'omonwa nigo gegoeta enda kiagwa kebara ?
40015018	Korende ebikorua omonwa , bikorua as'enkoro ; nabio ebio bikobeka omonto riko .
40015019	Naki as'enkoro nero ekorua okorengereria okobe , ogoita , ogotomana , obonyaka , okoiba , amang'ana ay'oborimo , nokorama .
40015020	Ayio naro akobeka omonto riko . Korende okoria as'amaboko ataisabiri tari kobeka omonto riko .
40015021	Yesu akarua aroro , akagenda chinsemo chia Turo na Sidon ,
40015022	naende , rora , omokungu o Kanani , nere nomonto bwe chimbebe chiria , akaoroka akaaka egeturi , akabora ; Nyabera Omonene , omwana o Daudi ; enyaroka yane yachandirwe mono nekerecha .
40015023	Nere tamoiraneria ring'ana . Bakamochiera aborokigwa baye , bakamosorora , bakobora , Aioserie , ekiagera akona gototunyana ogotoakera egeturi .
40015024	Akairaneria akabora , Tinatometwe tatiga ase ching'ondi chiasirete chi'enyomba y'Isiraeli .
40015025	Nere omokungu akamochiera , akamosasima , okobora , Omonene nkonya .
40015026	Akairaneria akamotebia , Tari buya koimokia obokima bw'abana gochirutera chisese .
40015027	Akabora , Ee , Omonene , naki nonya nechisese nkoriachire amatori akogwa korwa chimesa chi'abanene babo .
40015028	Erio agwo Yesu akamoiraneria akamotebia , Aye omokungu , okwegena kwao nokonene : tig'abe asore buna origetie . Enyaroka yaye ekagwena ensa eyio .
40015029	Yesu akarua aroro agwo , agacha ensemo y'enyancha ya Galili , akarina egetunwa , agaikaransa aroro .
40015030	Bakamochiera emeganda emenge barenge nebirema , nemeuko , namamansu , nebisegora , nabande abange , bakababeka as'amagoro a Yesu , akabagwenia .
40015031	Goika emeganda egakumia bachia korora amamansu agokwana , ebirema biabaire buya , ebisegora bikogenda , emeuko ekorora ; bakamobaka Nyasaye o Isiraeli .
40015032	Yesu akarangeria aborokigwa baye bache asare , akabora , Inche nayeroreire emeganda amabera , ekiagera rero aikire amatuko atato baikaransire nainche batari nendagera , nakobatiga kogenda nenchara tindigeti , tibabaisa koirwa nesiororia enchera .
40015033	Aborokigwa baye bakamotebia , Aa neroro , ng'ai toranyore emegati emenge eraisane abanto abange buna aba baigote ?
40015034	Yesu akabatebia , More nemegati erenga ? Bakabora , etano nebere , nechinswe chinsinini chinke igo .
40015035	Agachika emeganda eikaranse ,
40015036	akaimokia emegati eria etano nebere , nechinswe chiria , agasaba , akabisamunyora , akabaa aborokigwa baye , nabarabwo bakabaa emeganda eria .
40015037	Bakaria bonsi , bakaigota ; bakaimokia ebitigari biasamunyogete , ebitonga bitano nabibere bichire .
40015038	Nabariete nigo barenge abasacha chilifu inye , tiga abakungu nabana abake .
40015039	Agatiga emeganda egende , akarina obwato ime , akagenda chinsemo chia Magdala .
40016001	Bakamochiera Abafarisai n'Abasadukai , bakamotema , bakarigia aborokie ebikone korwa igoro .
40016002	Akabairaneria , akabatebia , Rikoba mogoroba , mwabora , Nerakere , ekiagera igoro abaririre :
40016003	na mambia mwabora , Rero nerirumbe ; ekiagera amare namabariri , asung'unanire . Inwe abang'ainereria , erioba rirorio morimanyete obosio bwaye , korende ebikone bi'ebiro ebi timokonyara kobinyora ?
40016004	Ekegori ekebe ki'obotomani nakio gekorigia egekone , ko tigekoegwa egekone tatiga egekone ki'omobani Yona . Erio akabatiga akagenda .
40016005	Aborokigwa bakagenda ng'umbu , bakeba kobogoria emegati .
40016006	Yesu akabatebia , Rigereria mwerende nememera y'Abafarisai n'Abasadukai .
40016007	Bakaborania bagoteba , Nekiagera mbuna totaretete emegati .
40016008	Yesu akamanya ring'ana riria , akabora , Inki kiagera mokona koborania , inwe abanyene okwegena ogoke , mbuna motabogoretie emegati ?
40016009	Timoramanya , gose timokoinyora emegati eria etano yaetwe baria chilifu isano , gose ebitonga mbirenga mwaimogetie ?
40016010	Nonya nemegati eria etano nebere neya baria chilifu inye , nebitonga . mbirenga mwaimogetie ?
40016011	Naki inwe motari koinyora , ng'a tari as'emegati nigo nkobatebia okwerenda nememera y'Abafarisai n'Abasadukai ?
40016012	Erio agwo bakainyora ng'a tari gwatora as'okwerenda nememera y'emegati , korende nememera y'okworokereria kw'Abafarisai n'Abasadukai .
40016013	Yesu akagenda chinsemo chia Kaisaria ase Filipi , akababoria aborokigwa baye aroro , okobora , Inee , abanto nigo bakobora Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere ng'o ?
40016014	Bakabora , Abande babora nomobatisi Yohana , nabande Elija , nabande Yeremia , gose oyomo as'ababani .
40016015	Akababoria , Nainwe mokobora ng'a ninche ng'o ?
40016016	Simon Petero akamoiraneria , akamdtebia , Aye naye Kristo , Omwana o Nyasaye ore moyo .
40016017	Yesu akamoiraneria akamotebia , Nore negesio Simon mosinto Yona , ekiagera eri tomanoreiri nomobere namanyinga ; oyokomanorera , Tata one ore igoro .
40016018	Nainche nagotebirie , ng'a aye naye Petero , nainche igoro as'egetare eke ning'agache ekanisa yane ; nebisieri bi'amakweri tibikonyebua chinguru .
40016019	Inche ninkoe ebigorero bi'obonda bwa igoro , nebio orasibe ense nabisibwe na igoro , nebio orasibore ense , nabisiboke na igoro .
40016020	Erio agwo akabachika baria aborokigwa baye tibatebia ' monto ng'a nere Kristo .
40016021	Korwa ekero ekio Yesu agachaka koborokereria aborokigwa baye ng'a nemogwenerete kogenda Yerusalemu , nogochandwa okonge nabakuani abanene , nabariki , nagoitwa , nakoboka ase rituko ria gatato .
40016022	Petero akamobwata agachaka komokania , okobora , Ayio tabaisa gokonyora , Aye Omonene ; takoba asore buna ayio .
40016023	Nere ageonchora , akamotebia Petero , Irana nyuma yane , Saitani : aye nigo origetie kongocha , ekiagera aye torengerereti aya Nyasaye , korende naya mwanyabanto .
40016024	Erio agwo Yesu akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Onye ' monto origetie kondwa nyuma , ekanye omonyene , etweke omosalaba oye , antunye .
40016025	Naki omonto bwonsi orarigie gokonya obogima bwaye , oyio nabosirie ; nomonto orasirie obogima bwaye asende inche , nabonyore naende .
40016026	Naki inki keramogwenere omonto karanyore ense yonsi , ko nere asirie obogima bwaye ? Gose omonto inki ararue ase ribaga ri'obogima bwaye ?
40016027	Naki oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto naoroke nobonene bwa Ise amo namalaika aye , nekero ekio ng'ae ker'omonto buna ebio aregokora .
40016028	Nekeene nabatebirie inwe , abanto mbare aiga as'aba bateneine , nabarabwo tibakoigwa amakweri nonya ng'ake goika bamorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ogocha as'obonda bwaye .
40017001	Naende kaerire amatuko atano narimo , Yesu akaira Petero , na Yakobo , na Yohana momura omwabo , akagenda nabwo , akarina egetunwa egetambe , barabwo boka .
40017002	Akaonchoka ekieni kiaye asebare , akagirigenta obosio bwaye buna erioba , chianga chiaye chikaraba buna omobaso .
40017003	Bakarorekana asebare Musa n'Elija bagokwana nere .
40017004	Petero akairaneria , akamotebia Yesu , Aye Omonene , mbuya intwe koba aiga ; onye gwanchire ninkore aiga chigutu bitato , ekemo kebe ekiao , nekemo kia Musa , nekemo ki'Elija .
40017005	Erio gagokwana , rora , rire rirabu rikabeka ekiriri , neriogi rikarua ase rire rigoteba , Oyo nere Omwana one , omwanchi one , nancheirwe asare , moigwere .
40017006	Aborokigwa bachia koigwa bakagwa inse maumama , bakabwatwa nokoiroka okonge .
40017007	Yesu akabachiera akabakuna , akabatebia , Imoka , timobaisa kwoboa .
40017008	Bagachia koramokia amaiso abo , tibarora ' monto tatiga Yesu bweka .
40017009	Bagotirimboka korwa egetunwa igoro , Yesu akabachika , akabora , Timotebia ' monto onde okorora oko , goika Omwana-o-mwanyabanto aboke korwa as'amakweri .
40017010	Aborokigwa baye bakamotebia , bakabora , Naki rende abariki bagokora , babora ng'a Elija nere orache ritang'ani ?
40017011	Nere akabairaneria , akabora , Nekeene Elija ogocha ritang'ani nere narosie onsi .
40017012	Korende nabatebirie , ng'a Elija otiekire gocha ; nabarabwo tibamomanyete , bakamokora buna barigetie : naboigo noria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , nere nachie konyora emechando asebare .
40017013	Erio agwo bakainyora baria aborokigwa baye , ng'a nomobatisi Yohana nere are kobatebia .
40017014	Bachia goika as'omoganda oria , omonto oyomo akamochiera agwo okona komotung'amera , nakobora ,
40017015	Omonene , inwabere omwana one ; ekiagera nare nendurume , nigo agochandwa mono . Naki ere botambe nigo akogwa omorero ime , na botambe amache ime .
40017016	Nkamoreta as'aborokigwa bao , tibanyara komogwenia .
40017017	Yesu akabairaneria , akabora , Inwe ekegori getari nokwegena , naende ekiangi , nimbe amo nainwe goika ririri ? Moimokie momondetere aiga .
40017018	Yesu akamokania , erio ekerecha gekamotiga , akagwena omwana oria ensa eyio .
40017019	Erio aborokigwa baria bakamochiera Yesu bobisi , bakabora , Naki intwe totanyara komorusia ekerecha ?
40017020	Akabatebia , Ekiagera motari nokwegena ; naki nekeene nabatebirie inwe , moise koba nokwegena koreng'aine nentetere ya garadaii . namogetebie egetunwa eke , Karue agwo asore , ogende aaria , nakerokio nakerue kegende : tirikoba ring'ana ritakonyarekana asemore .
40017021	Korende buna aya tagosoka tatiga as'ogosaba nokweng'ata .
40017022	Rigoro baikaransete aroro Galili , Yesu akabatebia , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare kobekwa as'amaboko a mwanyabanto ,
40017023	Nabarabwo nabamore , nerituko ria gatato naboke . Bagaichana mono .
40017024	Bachia goika Kaperinaum , bakamochiera Petero baria bare kobanga enusu-shekeli : ( ebango ye hekalu ) bakabora , Inee , enusu-shekeli omworokia oino takorua ? Akabora , nkorware .
40017025	Goika ekero agosoa enyomba , Yesu agatang'ana komoboria , ogoteba , Naki oroche Simon ? abaruoti b'ense igo bakorusia ebango , nogochoga , ase ng'o ? nas'abana babo , gose nas'abana b'abageni ?
40017026	Petero akamotebia , Nas'abana b'abageni . Yesu akamotebia , Gaki , abana babo barabwo mbasiboire ,
40017027	Korende titobaisa kobagochia , genda enyancha aye , orute endobio , enswe egocha ritang'ani , oyebwate : gokomanora omonwa oye norore shekeli , oyeire , obae abwo as'intwe , inche naye ,
40018001	Ensa eria bagachia baria aborokigwa ase Yesu , bakabora , Ning'o ore omonene as'obonda bwa igoro ?
40018002	Akarangeria akana agake , agakabeka agatenena gatigati yabo ,
40018003	akabora , Nekeene nabatebirie , motaonchogeti mobe buna abana abake , timogosoa obonda bwa igoro nonya ng'ake .
40018004	Gaki , onde bwonsi oyo orororobe omonyene koba buna omwana oyo , oyo nere ore omonene as'obonda bwa igoro .
40018005	Onde bwonsi oramwanche oyomo omogwekano bw'oyo , as'erieta riane , ninche anchire :
40018006	noyo oramogoche oyomo bw'aba abake abanchire asende inche , oyio igo agwenerete asungerwe rigoti riaye rigena rinene ri'ogosia , atugutwe as'endiba y'enyancha .
40018007	Obororo nobw'ense as'engecho y'okogochwa ! naki okogochwa tikoring'aina amacha ; korende obobe nobwaye omonto oyio okoreta okogochwa !
40018008	Nekerakogoche , onye nokoboko kwao , nonya nokogoro kwao , konache , ogotugute are naye : mbuya asore osoe as'obogima kore omonungu gose ekerema , kobua gotugutwa kore namaboko abere namagoro abere as'omorero o kare nakare .
40018009	Onye neriso riao rigokogocha , rirusie , oritugute are naye : mbuya asore osoe as'obogima kore egetong'o , kobua gotugutwa kore namaiso abere as'omorero bwe chaanam .
40018010	Rigereria timobaisa gochaya oyomo bw'abake aba , naki nabatebirie inwe , nonya namalaika abo igoro tibagotiga koborora obosio bwa Tata one ore igoro .
40018011	Naki Omwana-o-mwanyabanto igachete gotoria egiasirete .
40018012	Naki moroche ? Omonto karabe neching'ondi emia eyemo , neyemo kerasire , Inee , tagotiga chiria emerongo kianda nakianda , agende gochia ebitunwa , nakorigia eria yasirete ?
40018013	Karayenyore , nekeene nabatebirie , nagoke as'eria kobua chiria emerongo kianda nakianda chitasirete .
40018014	Naboigo takogwenera as'Iso oino ore igoro onde omo as'aba abake asire .
40018015	Oyomino karakore ebibe asore , genda omworokererie ogosaria kwaye , aye nere , inwe mweka , karakoigwere , kwamonyorire oyomino .
40018016	Karabe takoigwera , ira omonto oyomo gose babere , mogende asare mwensi : rinyare koba as'emenwa y'abarori babere gose batato , ring'ana rionsi ritenene .
40018017	Nere atabaigwereti abwo , tebia ekanisa ; naende ataigwereti ekanisa nero , asore aye tiga abe buna omonto bw'Ebisaku na buna abakorusia ebango .
40018018	Nekeene nabatebirie , ande onsi moraboe as'ense nabe aboirwe na igoro ; nande onsi morayasibore as'ense na igoro nasiborwe .
40018019	Naende eria kabere nabatebirie inwe , onye abande babere kabaratebanie as'ense ase ring'ana rinde rionsi bararisabe , nabakorerwe rirorio na Tata one ore igoro .
40018020	Naki asebare babere , gose batato , abasangererekeire erieta riane , nainche nao'nde agwo gatigati yabo .
40018021	Erio agwo Petero akagenda akamotebia , Aye Omonene , ng'ara karenga oyominto arankorere ebibe nainche mwabere ? goika gatano nakabere gose ?
40018022	Yesu akamotebia , Tingotebeti komwabera ara gatano nakabere ; mwabere nonya ng'ara gatano nakabere ara emerongo etano nebere .
40018023	Ekiagera obonda bwa igoro iga bogwekaine nomonto oyomo omonda origetie gokora okobara as'abasomba baye .
40018024	Agachia gochaka gokora okobara nabarabwo , akareterwa omosomba oyomo , omosira omoriete chitalanta chilifu ikomi .
40018025	Erio aborwa eki'akomoakana , omonene oye agachika agorwe , ere na mokaye , nabana baye , nebiabwate bionsi , na koakanwa ebio ariete .
40018026	Omosomba oria akagwa inse , akamosasima , ogoteba , Omonene , ing'ira ng'ora , nanche gokoakana bionsi .
40018027	Agasogwa namabera omonene bw'omosomba oria , akamosibora , akamwabera esira yaye .
40018028	Korende agachia korwa agwo omosomba oyio akarora as'abasomba bande , oyomo omoriete chidinari emia eyemo , akamobwata rigoti akabora , Ng'akana esira yane .
40018029	Oria omosemba akagwa inse akamosorora , ogoteba , Ing'ifa ng'ora , nanche gokoakana .
40018030	Tancha rinde , agachia akamoruta echela goika aakane esira eriaf
40018031	Abasomba bande bagachia bakamotebia omonene obo onsi ayakoreka .
40018032	Erio agwo omonene oye akamorangeria , akamotebia , Aye omosomba omobe , inche ngakwabera esira eria yonsi as'ogonsorora gwansorerete :
40018033	Inee , aye tikwagwenerete komwabera omosomba oria onde , buna nainche nakwaberete ?
40018034	Omonene oye akabea mono , akamobeka as'abasusuri , goika aakane ebiariete bionsi .
40018035	Naboigo na Tata one ore igoro arabakore nainwe motaberaneti ker'omonto noyomwabo as'emioyo yaino ime .
40019001	Erio Yesu agachia goikerania amang'ana ayio , akarua Galili , akagenda amabebe a Yudea are ng'umbu ya Yorodan ;
40019002	agatunyanwa nemeganda emenge , akabagwenia aroro ,
40019003	Abafarisai bakamochiera bakomotema aria , bakobora , Inee , mboronge omonto komotiga mokaye ase ring'ana rionsi ?
40019004	Akabairaneria akabatebia , Timwanyagosoma , buna oyobakorete korwa omochakano , akabakora omosacha nomokungu ,
40019005	nakobora , ekiagera ayio omonto namotige ise na ng'ina abwatane na mokaye , nabarabwo baria babere nigo barabe omobere oyomo ?
40019006	Goika baria tibaba babere naende , korende omobere oyomo . Naboigo eki Nyasaye asang'ananirie , mwanyabanto tagiatanana .
40019007	Bakamoboria , Nas'engecho ki gaki , Musa achigete komoa omokungu rirube ri'ogotigana nakomotiga ?
40019008	Akabatebia , Musa nas'engecho y'obokong'u bw'emioyo yaino arekobaa ribaga kobatiga abakungu baino korende korwa omochakano ayio tarenge bo .
40019009	Nainche nabatebirie inwe , Oyoratige mokaye tatiga as'engecho y'obotomani , nakomonyuoma oyonde , oyio otomanire ; naende oyoranyuome oyotigirwe , otomanire .
40019010	Bakamotebia baria aborokigwa baye , Amang'ana ay'omonto na mokaye karabe iga , tegwenereti konyuoma .
40019011	Akabatebia , Tari bonsi baranyare kobwata ring'ana eri , tatiga abwo baetwe .
40019012	Naki mbare abagomba babiaretwe bo korwa chinda chi'abang'ina babo , naende mbare abagomba bakoretwe koba abagomba nabanto ; naende mbare abagomba , bekorete boka abanyene koba abagomba as'engecho y'obonda bwa igoro . Oyoranyare koribwata ring'ana eri , tiga aribwate .
40019013	Erio akareterwa abana abake ababekere amaboko aye nakobasabera : korende aborokigwa baye bakabakania .
40019014	Yesu agateba , Batige abana abake , timobaisa kobatanga gocha asende , naki obonda bwa igoro nobwabo omoreng'anio bw'aba .
40019015	Goika ochia kobabekera amaboko aye , akaimoka korwa aroro akagenda .
40019016	Omonto oyomo akamochera , akabora , Omworokia omuya , ring'ana ki ndakore rigiya , goika mbe nobogima bwa kare nakare ?
40019017	Akamotebia , Naki okondoka omuya ? Tari omuya , tatiga Oyomo : konye naye gokorigia osoe as'obogima , bwata amachiko .
40019018	Akamotebia , Ayare buna arari ? Yesu akamotebia , Toita , totomana , toiba , tobaisa gokwana amang'ana ay'oborimo ;
40019019	Basike so na nyoko ; naende , ancha omogisangi oo buna omobere oo .
40019020	Oria omomura akamotebia , Onsi ayio nayabwatire , Ring'ana ki rimochete ?
40019021	Yesu akamotebia , Onye korigetie koba omonto omuya kegima , gachie , ogore ebiobwate bionsi , oe abataka ; naye nobe nenibo igoro ; erio oche ombwatie .
