40019022	Ochia koigwa ring'ana erio omomura oria akaimoka ore nobororo , ekiagerete narenge nebinto ebinge .
40019023	Yesu akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Nekeene nabatebirie , nabe akong'u as'omonto omonyene enibo enyinge gosoa as'obonda bwa igoro .
40019024	Naende nabatebirie inwe , Albwango engamia egoeta as'ekebao gi'esindani kobua oyore nenibo gosoa obonda bwa Nyasaye .
40019025	Aborokigwa bagachia koigwa aria , bakaba nogoichana mono nagoteba , Ning'o gaki oranyare gotoreka ?
40019026	Yesu akabarigereria , akabatebia , Ase mwanyabanto tirikonyarekana ring'ana eri , korende ase Nyasaye amang'ana onsi igakonyarekana .
40019027	Erio Petero akamoiraneria akamotebia . Rora , intwe twatigire bionsi twakobwatirie ; inki gaki toranyore ?
40019028	Yesu akabatebia , Nekeene nabatebirie , buna abwo mwantunyanire as'okoiborwa gwa kabere , ekero agocha goikaransa Omwana-o-mwanyabanto as'ekerogo ki'obonene bwaye , ekero ekio nainwe namoikaranse as'ebirogo ikomi nabibere , mokobigambera ebisaku ikomi nabibere bi'Abaisiraeli .
40019029	Nonde omo otigete enyomba , gose abamura bamwabo , gose abasubati bamwabo , gose ise , gose ng'ina , gose abana , gose emegondo . as'erieta riane , namenteranigwe ara emia , nobogima bwa kare nakare nabonyore .
40019030	Korende abanto abange abatang'ani nababe aba nyuma , nabare nyuma nababe abatang'ani .
40020001	Naki obonda bwa igoro nomogwekano bw'omonto omonyene enyomba osogete mambia chuni kogenda korika abaremi , bachie korema omogondo oye bw'emesabibu .
40020002	Gachia gotebania nabaremi rituko erimo somoni , akabaira as'omogondo oye bw'emesabibu .
40020003	Agasoka chinsa isato gachiaenre , akarora nabande bateneine echiro , batari nemeremo ;
40020004	akabatebia nabarabwo , Genda nainwe as'omogondo bw'emesabibu , naende nimbae ekere kia boronge . Bakagenda .
40020005	Agasoka naende chinsa isano nemo gachiaerire , naende chinsa kianda , akanagokora boigo .
40020006	Goika chinsa ikomi nemo gachiaerire , agasoka , akarora abande bateneine , akabatebia nabarabwo , Nk'igo mwateneneraa bwaira motari nemeremo ?
40020007	Bakamotebia , Ekiagera titorikiri nomonto . Akabatebia , Genda nainwe as'omogondo .
40020008	Erio rigoro riagoroba , oria omonene bw'omogondo akamotebia omorendi oye , Rangeria abaremi , obae eng'eria yabo , ochake korwa aba nyuma goika abe ritang'ani .
40020009	Bakagenda baria barigetwe chinsa ikemi nemo , bakaegwa ker'oyomo somonisomoni .
40020010	Goika bachia gocha abe ritang'ani , bagakaga ng'a nabatumanerigwe , bakanyora nabarabwo somonisomoni .
40020011	Erio kabaeirwe , bakaba nkwemurunganiabare as'omonyene enyomba ,
40020012	bakabora , Abwo b'omoerio igabakora emeremo y'ensa eyemo yoka , naye kwabatoreng'aneria naintwe , abaremereretie emechando neriberera ri'omobaso bwonsi ,
40020013	Nere akamoiraneria oyomo obo akamotebia , ' Mosani , tingokoreti bobe .
40020014	Titwatebanetie naye ase somoni ? Bwata ekeronge kiao , ogende as'ogochia ; nindigetie komoa oyo bw'omoerio koreng'ana naye .
40020015	Tingwenereti gokora buna ndigetie ' nche omonyene nebinto biane ? Gose eriso riao riabaire ribe ekiagera nde omuya ?
40020016	Naboigo aba nyuma nababe abatang'ani , nabatang'ani nababe aba nyuma .
40020017	Goika Yesu ochia gotira gochia Yerusalemu , akabaira bobisi baria aborokigwa baye ikomi nababere ; bachia goika ' nchera akabatebia .
40020018	Nama , ngotiratore gochia Yerusalemu , noria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nabekwe as'amaboko ay'abakuani nabariki , nabarabwo nabamonanchere ekina ki'amakweri .
40020019	Naende nabamobeke as'amaboko ebisaku , banyare komosekereria , naende komoaka chinkini , nakomobamba as'omosalaba . Goika rituko ri'atato naboke ,
40020020	Erio agwo agachierwa na ng'ina abana ba Zebedi amo nabana baye , akamosasima nakongia ring'ana asare .
40020021	Akamoboria , Inki origetie ? Akamotebia , Tebia abana aba bane babere baikaranse oyomo ensemo y'okorio kwao , noyomo ensemo y'okobee kwao , as'obonda bwao .
40020022	Yesu akairaneria agateba , Eri mokorigia timorimanyeti . Inee , namonyare konywera egekombe ndache konywera inche ?
40020023	Bakamotebia , Natonyare . Akabatebia , Egekombe kiane ekeene namonywe , korende aria ogoikaransa ensemo yane y'okorio , nensemo yane y'okobee tindi nogochika kobaa , tatiga ababekeirwe ang'e na Tata one .
40020024	Baria ikomi bachia koigwa , bakababea omonto oria na momura omwabo .
40020025	Ko Yesu ere akabarangeria bache asare , naende akabora , Mwamanyire ng'a abagambi b'ebisaku igo begarete , nabanene babo igo bare nokobua igoro asebare ,
40020026	K'ayio takoba bo asemore inwe , korende ' monto'nde bwonsi orarigie koba omonene asemore , igarabe omosomba oino ;
40020027	noyorarigie koba omotang'ani oino , igarabe omotomwa oino ;
40020028	buna Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere tachete gokorerwa , tatiga ogokora ere bweka omonyene , nakorua obogima bwaye koba okoboria as'abange .
40020029	Goika bachia korua Yeriko , agatunyanwa nomoganda omonene .
40020030	Nabwo abanto babere emeuko baikaransete ensemo y'enchera , bagachia koigwa ng'a Yesu ogoeta aroro , bakaaka egeturi , bakobora , Omonene , twabere , aye omwana o Daudi .
40020031	Noria omoganda okobatogonyera ng'a banyare gokira , tibakira rinde ; bakamenta okwoga , bakobora , Omonene , twabere , aye omwana o Daudi ,
40020032	Yesu agatenena , akabarangeria , erio akabora , Ring'ana ki morigetie mbakorere ?
40020033	Bakamotebia , Omonene , ntorigetie onye gwatoramokia amaiso aito .
40020034	Yesu agasogwa namabera , akabakuna amaiso abo , erio kegima amaiso abo akarora , bakamotunyana .
40021001	Goika bachia goika ang'e nomochie o Yerusalemu , bagaika ase Bethifage , as'egetunwa ki'Emezeituni . Erio Yesu agatoma aborokigwa baye babere akabatebia ,
40021002	Soa as'omochie okendokaine korwa as'obosio bwaino , erio namorore etigere esibire , nemori yaye amo nero ; mochisibore mondetere .
40021003	Nomonto karabatebia ring'ana momotebie , Omonene nachirigetie ; erio kegima nachitome .
40021004	Ayio onsi agakoreka anyare goikerana ayatebetwe nomobani , ogoteba ,
40021005	Motebie omoiseke o Zayoni , Oyo nere , Omoruoti oo okogochera ; Nomokanyeku , orinire etigere igoro , Nemori y'etigere , akamori g'etigere .
40021006	Baria aborokigwa bakagenda bagakora buna bachigetwe na Yesu .
40021007	Bakamoretera etigere nemori yaye , bagachiara chianga chiabo , nere akarina .
40021008	Nabange b'emeganda bakara chianga chiabo as'enchera : abande bakabutora amato emete , bakwara enchera .
40021009	Emfeganda ebatang'anete , nabare komorua nyuma , bakaaka egeturi , bagoteba , Hosana as'omwana o Daudi ; bwancheirwe oyochire as'erieta ri'Omonene ; Hosana as'igoro mono .
40021010	Erio ochia gosoa Yerusalemu ogasegasega omochie omogima , abanto bakabora , Ning'o oyio ?
40021011	Eria , emeganda ekabora , Oyo nere omobani , erieta riaye okorokwa Yesu , nomonto o Nazareti ya Galili .
40021012	Erio Yesu agasoa ase hekalu ya Nyasaye , akabasokia isiko bonsi abarenge gotonda nakogora aroro hekalu ime , agachionchorana nechimesa chi'abare goonchoreria chibesa , nebirogo bi'abare gotonda amaruma ;
40021013	nere akabatebia , Nerikire , Enyomba yane igerarokwe enyomba y'ogosaba , nainwe mokoyekora rikuruma ri'abaibi .
40021014	Bakamochiera emeuko nebirema aria ase hekalu , akabagwenia .
40021015	Nabakuani abanene nabariki bagachia kobirora ebirage bi'omoichano aregokora , nabana bakoaka egeturi ase hekalu , bakobora , Hosana as'omwana o Daudi , erio agwo bakabea .
40021016	Bakamotebia , Kwabaigure aba buna bakobora ? Yesu akabatebia , Ee ; timwasomete ng'a , Nas'emenwa y'abana nabakogonka gwaikeranirie ebako ?
40021017	Akabatiga agasoka isiko korwa as'omochie , akagenda Bethania , akarara aroro .
40021018	Mambia okoirana omochie , akaromwa nenchara .
40021019	Akarora omoko oyomo enchera , akayochiera , tarora gento asore , tatiga amato oka ; akayotebia , Goika kare nakare tokwama aye naende amatunda . Erio kegima omoko oyio okoma .
40021020	Aborokigwa bachia korora ring'ana riria bagaichana , bakobora , Naki bono omoko oyo okwoma bwango iga ?
40021021	Yesu akabairaneria , akabatebia , Nekeene nabatebirie , kamorabe nokwegena motakoreti ogosiereria konde , tari erio ri'omote rioka morakore , korende nonya namogetebia egetunwa eke , Tegoka , otugutwe enyancha ime , narikoreke .
40021022	Nebinto bionsi morasabe , as'ogosaba , komoregene namonyore .
40021023	Goika ochia gosoa hekalu ime okworokereria , agachierwa nabakuani abanene nabagaka b'abanyene ense , bagoteba , Nas'ogochika ki ogokora amang'ana aya ? Nere ng'o okoete egochika oko ?
40021024	Yesu akabairaneria , akabatebia , Ninche nimbaborie ring'ana erimo , Mokong'iraneria , nainche nimbatebie as'ogochika ki ngokora aya .
40021025	Inee , okobatisa gwa Yohana , ng'ai kwaruete ? Igoro kwaruete , gose iga kwaruete as'abanto ? Bono bakaba ngotebaniabare barabwo ase barabwo , bakobora , Togoteba , Igoro kwaruete , igaratoborie , Ninki rende engecho yaye motamwancheti ?
40021026	Naende togoteba , Nas'abanto kwaruete , twairoka omoganda , ekiagera abanto bonsi banchire ng'a Yohana nomobani .
40021027	Bakairaneria Yesu , bakamotebia , Titomanyeti . Nere akabatebia , Nonya ninche tinkobatebia as'ogochika ki ngokora aya .
40021028	Korende naki moroche ? Omonto gete narenge nabana babere ; akamochiera oria omonene agateba , Omwana one , genda rero okore emeremo ' mogondo .
40021029	Akamotebia , Tindigeti ; naende nyuma agaonchoka akagenda .
40021030	Nere akamochiera oyo kabere , akamotebia boigo . Akamoiraneria akabora , Nkogendande , Omonene ! gotagenda .
40021031	Inee , norori ase baria babere okorete obwanchani bwa ise ? Bakabora , Noria bwe ritang'ani . Yesu akabatebia , Nekeene nabatebirie ng'a abakorusia ebango nabakungu abatayayi ngotang'anabare asemore gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
40021032	Naki Yohana achete as'enchera y'oboronge , timwamwancha : korende abakorusia ebango , nabakungu abatayayi bakamwancha , nainwe , mokarora erio nyuma , timwaonchoka , monyare komwancha .
40021033	Tegerera omoreng'anio onde . Narenge omonto orenge nenyomba , nere agasimeka omogondo bw'emesabibu , akayoetananeria orobago , agakunya agakora egetera gi'okomitera amasabibu , akaagacha negesasimo , akayoatananera abaremi , akamanora , akagenda ense y'are .
40021034	Bono ekero ki'amatunda giachia goika ang'e , agatoma abasomba baye as'abaremi , baegwe amatunda aye .
40021035	Abaremi bakababwata abasomba baye , oyomo bakamoaka enyimbo , noyonde bakamoita , noyonde bakamoaka amagena .
40021036	Naende agatoma abasomba bande abange kobua abe ritang'ani : bakabakora bo .
40021037	Bono nyutna y'ayio onsi akamotoma omwana oye asebare , agateba , Nabamosike omwana one .
40021038	Abaremi bagachia komorora omwana oye , bagatebania boka abanyene ; Oyo nere omonyamwando . Gaki , tomoite , omwando oye toyoire .
40021039	Bakamobwata , bakamotuguta isiko as'omogondo bw'emesabibu , bakamoita .
40021040	Inee , karache omonene bw'omogondo , naki arabakore abaremi baria ?
40021041	Bakamotebia , Igarabasirie bobe ababe baria , nabatananere omogondo abaremi bande , abagocha komoa amatunda aye as'ebiro biabo .
40021042	Yesu akababoria , Timwanyagosoma as'amariko ? Rigena abaagachi bangete , Riabaire nario omotwe bw'egetankumba ; Riarure as'omonene ring'ana eri , Nario ri'ogoichania as'amaiso aito .
40021043	As'engecho eye nabatebirie , ng'a obonda bwa Nyasaye naborusigwe asemore , boegwe egesaku gekwama amatunda aye .
40021044	Noyoragwe igoro ase rigena eri nateke ebisamunye : nere oyoriragwere narirorio narimosie kegima .
40021045	Goika bachia koyeigwa emereng'anio yaye , abakuani abanene n'Abafarisai bakamanya ng'a mbarabwo agoteba .
40021046	Bagachia korigia komobwata , bakabairoka emeganda , ekiagera konya banchire ng'a nomobani .
40022001	Naende Yesu akairaneria agakwana nabarabwo as'emereng'anio eria kabere , akabora ,
40022002	Obonda bwa igoro igo bogwekaine nomonto omoruoti okorerete omwan'oye enyangi .
40022003	Akabatoma abasomba baye barangerie abarigirie as'enyangi : bakanga gocha .
40022004	Naende agatoma abande , akabatebia , Batebie abarigirie , eye nero , endagera yane naroisirie ; chiombe chiane nebinoru biane bianyenyirwe , nabionsi biabaire ang'e : inchuo enyangi .
40022005	Korende bakayakora amagusu amang'ana aya , bakagenda , oyomo as'omogondo oye , noyomo as'okoonchereria kwaye ;
40022006	nabatigarete bakababwata abasomba baye bakabakora bobe , bakabaita .
40022007	Oria omoruoti akabea mono , akarua emeganda yaye ekabasiria abaiti baria , nomochie obo akayosamba nomorero .
40022008	Erio agwo akabatebia abasomba baye , Enyangi ng'ang'ere , korende abarangeretigwe tibagwenerete .
40022009	Gaki genda as'amakori e chinchera , nabwo mokorora mobarangerie gocha enyangi .
40022010	Abasomba baria bagasoka , bagaika ase chinchera , bakabasangereria bonsi abwo baroche , nonya nababe nonya nabaya , enyangi egaichorwa nabageni .
40022011	Korende omoruoti ochia gosoa korigereria abageni , akarora omonto oyomo aroro otabegete eanga y'enyangi .
40022012	Akamotebia , ' Mosani , naki gwakorete ogasoa aiga naye otari neanga y'enyangi ? Agakirakiri .
40022013	Erio agwo omoruoti akabatebia abasomba , Moboe amaboko namagoro , momotugute as'omosunte o isiko mono : nakobe nokorera aroro nokoriania amaino .
40022014	Naki abarangerigwe nabange , k'abachorirwe nabwo abake .
40022015	Erio agwo Abafarisai bakagenda bagakora ekina buna bagocha komotega as'amang'ana .
40022016	Bakabatoma aborokigwa babo asare , amo Nabaherode , bakobora , Omworokia , twakomanyire ng'a igore omonto bw'ekeene , nenchera ya Nyasaye nkoyiorokereriore ekeene , nonya ' monto onde bwonsi torikomoiroka : naki torikorigereria amasio a abanto .
40022017	Gaki totebie naki oroche aye ? Mboronge koa Kaisari ebango , gose tai boronge ?
40022018	Yesu akamanya obobe bwabo , akabora , Naki mogontema , inwe abang'ainereria ?
40022019	Nyorokia efetha y'ebango . Bakamoretera edinari .
40022020	Akababoria , Nekiang'o ekieni eke , nekemanyererio eke ?
40022021	Bakamotebia , Nebia Kaisari . Erio agwo akabatebia , Gaki ebia Kaisari moa Kaisari , nebia Nyasaye moa Nyasaye .
40022022	Goika bachia koigwa ring'ana riria bagaichana , bakamotiga , bakagenda .
40022023	Rituko riria bakamochiera Abasadukai , nabarabwo nabanto abagoteba ng'a okobokigwa tikori ; bakamoboria ,
40022024	bakabora , Omworokia , Musa natebete ng'a omonto karakwe , nere onye taraibora abana , omomura omwabo oria okure rimenyane nomokungu oye , anyare komoteneneria egesaku .
40022025	Naboigo , mbarenge abamwabo batano nababere . Oyo bwe ritang'ani akanyuoma , erio agakwa , nekiagera tarenge nomwana , akamotigera omomura omwabo mokaye ,
40022026	Naboigo noyo kabere nere , noyo gatato , goika bakaera bonsi batano nababere .
40022027	Omoerio obo bonsi omokungu oria agakwa .
40022028	Inee , as'okobokigwa , mokang'o orabe omokungu oria ase baria batano nababere ? ekiagera bonsi barenge nere .
40022029	Yesu akabairaneria akabatebia , Mwasirire inwe ekiagera motamanyeti amariko , nonya nokobua kwa Nyasaye .
40022030	Naki as'okobokigwa , tibakonyuoma , tibakonyuomwa , korende igabarabe buna amalaika a Nyasaye are Igoro .
40022031	Naende as'okobokigwa , timorasoma eri mwatebetigwe na Nyasaye , aregoteba ,
40022032	Inche ninche Nyasaye o Ibrahimu , na Nyasaye o Isaaka , na Nyasaye o Yakobo ? Nyasaye tari Nyasaye bw'abwo bakure , korende bw'abare moyo .
40022033	Bachia koigwa aria , emeganda egakumia as'okworokereria kwaye .
40022034	N'Abafarisai bagachia koigwa buna abakiririe Abasadukai , bagasangerereka amo .
40022035	Oyomo ase barabwo , omworokia bw'amachiko , akamoboria as'okomotema , akabora ,
40022036	Aye Omworokia , ngochika ki kore okonene ime as'amachiko onsi ?
40022037	Yesu akamotebia , Mwanche Omonene Nyasaye oo , nomoy'oo bwonsi , nenkoro yao yonsi , nobong'aini bwao bwonsi .
40022038	Oko nakwo ogochika okonene , naende nakwo kwe ritang'ani .
40022039	Nogwa kabere kogwekaine nokwo , nakwo oko : Mwanche omogisangi oo buna gwanchire omobere oo .
40022040	As'amachiko aya abere igabwataine amachiko onsi nababani ,
40022041	Abafarisai bagachia gosangerereka , Yesu akababoria ,
40022042	Okobora , Naki inwe moroche ase Kristo ? Nomwana ong'o ? Bakamotebia , nomwana o Daudi .
40022043	Akababoria , Inki gekogera rende Daudi , as'Omoika , akomoroka Omonene ? okobora ,
40022044	Omonene namotebetie Omonene one , Ikaransa ensemo y'okoboko kwane gw'okorio , Goika mbabeke ababisa bao inse ase chimbaratero chiao .
40022045	Gaki onye Daudi okomoroka Omonene , naki achakoba omwana oye naende ?
40022046	Nonya nonde tarenge orekonyara komoiraneria ring'ana ; nonya nkorwa rituko riria ' mont'onde tamoboria ring'ana rinde .
40023001	Erio agwo Yesu agakwana nabaria emeganda naborokigwa baye , okobora ,
40023002	As'ekerogo kia Musa baikaransire abariki n'Abafarisai .
40023003	Gaki amang'ana onsi bakobatebia yakore , moyarende nakoyabwata ; korende timokora omogwekano bw'ogokora kwabo ; naki barabwo igo bagoteba , ko tibagokora .
40023004	Naki igo bakoboa chigurube chindito , batweka abanto bande amagega abo , ko naakong'u kochibogoria , barabwo abanyene tibagwancha kochinyegeria nekiara kiabo .
40023005	Nogokora kwabo gwonsi igo bagokora ng'a barorwe nabanto : naki igo bakogareyia chifulakteria chiabo , naende bamenta emebarero ye chianga chiabo .
40023006	Nabarabwo igo banchete aase e ritang'ani as'endagera , nagoikaransa aatang'ani ase chisunagogi ,
40023007	nagokwanigwa ase chichiro , nakorokwa nabanto , Rabii , Rabii .
40023008	Ko inwe timobaisa korokwa Rabii : naki omworokia oino noyomo , nainwe mwensi nabamo .
40023009	Nonya ninwe timobaisa komoroka omonto tata as'ense : naki Iso oino noyomo ore igoro .
40023010	Gose timobaisa korokwa abanene : naki omonene oino noyomo , nere Kristo .
40023011	Korende oyore omonene asemore igarabe omosomba oino .
40023012	Noyo oreimokererie igoro omonyene , oyio nairanigwe inse , noyorekeyie naimokererigwe igoro .
40023013	Korende obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera egesieri ki'obonda bwa igoro mwagesiekire as'abanto : nakt inwe abanyene timogosoa , nonya nabagosoa timori kobatiga basoe .
40023014	Obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera mokoria chinyomba chi'ababoraka , naende as'obong'amereiia mwasaba mono ; as'ayio namonyore ekina ekenene kobua .
40023015	Obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera mwasiongorokana enyancha nense enyomo konyora omotunyani oyomo ; okonyorekana mwamotiga oba omwana bwe chaanam ara kabere kobua inwe abanyene .
40023016	Obobe nobwaino , abarai emeuko ! inwe mogoteba ng'a , Oyorarie emuma ase hekalu , tari gento ; korende oyorarie emuma as'ethahabu ye hekalu , bwesibire .
40023017	Abakayayu inwe nemeuko ! naki rinene ndiriri ? nethahabu , gose neria hekalu egokora ethahabu enchenu ?
40023018	Naende , oyorarie emuma as'artiathabahu , tai gento ; korende oyorarie as'ekeng'wanso ker'igoro as'amathabahu , bwesibire oyio .
40023019	Abakayayu inwe nemeuko , Naki ekenene nkereki ? neria esadaka , gose naria amathabahu akoyekora enchenu esadaka eria ?
40023020	Gaki oyorire emuma as'amathabahu , orire nas'ebire igoro yaye .
40023021	Noyorire emuma ase hekalu , orire as'eyio , nas'oyo oikaransete ime .
40023022	Noyorire emuma as'erioba orire as'ekerogo kia Nyasaye nas'oyo oikaransete igoro .
40023023	Obobe , nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera iga mokorua etaisi y'ebinzari , nekumini , korende mwatiga amang'ana amanene ayogochika , ekina , namabera , nokwegena : naro ayio nabagwenerete koyakora , amo nagotatiga aria .
40023024	Abarai emeuko , mwakenonora egechuni , mwamera engamia .
40023025	Obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera egekombe nesani mwabisibia korwa isiko , ko ime biaichoire nobouri nobosiri .
40023026	Aye Omofarisai omoukof sibia ime egekombe nesani ritang'ani , erio n'isiko kenyare koba ekiya .
40023027	Obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera inwe mwagwekanire nechimbera chiaagetwe echoka ; isiko chiarorekana chingiya , ko ime chiaichoire namauga nchitondo , neuramba yonsi .
40023028	Nainwe nabo more , isiko mwarorekana as'abanto ng'a nab'ekeene more , ko ime mwaichoirwe nobong'ainereria nobobe obonge .
40023029	Obobe nobwaino , abariki n'Abafarisai , abang'ainereria ! ekiagera mwaagacha chimbera chi'ababani , nagochioma chimbera chi'ababoronge ,
40023030	naende mwateba , Onyore nintwe twarenge aroro kare amatuko ay'abatata baito , anga titwabwatanete na barabwo as'amanyinga ababani .
40023031	Igo mwetebire inwe abanyene , ng'a ninwe abana babo baria baitete ababani .
40023032	Gaki bono , geichorie ekerengo ki'abaiso baino !
40023033	Inwe ching'iti , abana be rirubi , naki morakore motame ekina kie chaanam ?
40023034	Ekiagera aya , rigereria , natomire asemore ababani nabanto b'obong'aini nabariki : abande babo namobaite , namobabambe , nabande babo namobaake chinkini chisunagogi chiaino ime , nakobaseria omochie as'omochie ;
40023035	nario arabachere igoro asemore amanyinga onsi aitegete korwa amanyinga Abeli oria omonyene oboronge , goika aya Zakaria , omwana o Barakia , mwamoitete gatigati ye hekalu namathabahu .
40023036	Ekeene nabatebirie , amang'ana aya onsi nache as'ekegori eke .
40023037	Aye Yerusalemu , Yerusalemu , aye oyogoita ababani , nakobaaka namagena abatometwe asore ! ng'ara karenga narenge korigia gosangereria abana bao , buna engoko ekobisangereria ebichuchu biaye ime ase chimbaba chiaye , gotimwancha .
40023038	Rigereria , enyomba yaino mwatigeirwe ritombe .
40023039	Naki nabatebirie , timokondora naende nonya ng'ake , goika motebe , Bwancheirwe oyogocha as'erieta ri'Omonene .
40024001	Erio Yesu ochia korua aria hekalu okogenda , aborokigwa baye bakamochiera korigia komworokia amaagacho e hekalu .
40024002	Akabairaneria akabatebia , Inee , mwabirorire ebi bionsi ? Nekeene nabatebirie , aiga tagotigara rigena erimo as'erinde igoro ritayeiri inse .
40024003	Erio gaikaransire as'egetunwa ki'Emezeituni , agachierwa naborokigwa baye bobisi , bakobora , Totebie , ndi arabe ayio , Naro nkemanyererio ki ki'ogocha kwao , nay'omoerio bw'ense ?
40024004	Yesu akabairaneria akabatebia , Erende timobaisa kong'ainwa na'monto onde bwonsi .
40024005	Naki abange nabache as'erieta riane , babore , Inche ninche Kristo ; nabasirie abanto abange .
40024006	Nainwe namoigwe amang'ana y'esegi nebirage bi'esegi ; rigereria timoondoka , naki bori nabe aya onsi ; k'omoerio toracha .
40024007	Naki ebisaku nabimokerane korwana nebisaku binde , nobonda naboimokerane korwana nobonda bonde ; naende enchara nebe , nomotengecho bw'ense , chinsemo-chinsemo .
40024008	Ayio onsi naro omochakano bw'obororo .
40024009	Erio agwo nababarusie monyare gochandwa nagoitwa ; nainwe namobe abanto bakogechwa nebisaku bionsi as'engecho y'erieta riane .
40024010	Nekero ekio abanto abange nabagochwe ; naende abande nababekane as'amaboko a ababisa babo , barabwo ase barabwo , naende nabagechane barabwo ase barabwo .
40024011	Nababani b'oborimo nabaimoke abange mono , basirie abanto abange .
40024012	Nekiagera okomenteka kw'ebibe , obwanchani bw'abange nabokende .
40024013	Korende Oyoraremererie goika omoerio , oyio nakonyeke .
40024014	Naende amang'ana aya amaya ay'obonda narandigwe as'ense yonsi koba ekiorokererio as'ebisaku bionsi ; erio omoerio ochiche .
40024015	Gaki naboigo kamogocha korora okogechia kw'ogosaria gwatebetwe nomobani Danieli gwatenenire aase aaya ( oyogosoma ainyore ) ,
40024016	erio agwo abare Boyahudi batame gochia ebitunwa ime .
40024017	Oyore igoro as'enyomba taika kogenda korusia gento mwaye :
40024018	oyore ' mogondo tairana nyuma gochia kobogoria chianga chiaye .
40024019	Korende obobe nobwabo abare abarito nabakogonkia as'amatuko aria .
40024020	Korende saba ogotama kwaino tikoba ekero ki'obokendu , gose kie rituko ri'esabato .
40024021	Naki agwo nebe emechando emenene ; etanakoba emechando engecho buna eyio korwa omochakano bw'ense goika bono , nonya nyuma tekoba nonya ng'ake .
40024022	Naende onye amatuko ayio atanachetwe , anga ' monto tatoregete ; korende as'engecho ya baria bachoretwe nanachwe amatuko ayio ,
40024023	Nekero ekio omonto karabatebie , Oyo nere Kristo , oyo aa ! gose , Oyio oragwo ! timwancha .
40024024	Naki nabaoroke Amakristo oborimo , nababani b'oborimo , nabakore ebikone ebinene namakumia , goika , keranyarekane , nabang'aine nonya nabachoretwe .
40024025	Nainwe , naro ayio natang'anire kobatebia !
40024026	Gaki bakobatebia , Oyo nere , eroro ime ; timosoka isiko : Oyio , ore ebinunchi bia bobisi ; timwancha .
40024027	Naki buna ekomesa korwa mocha yabara gochia bosongo , naboigo korabe ogocha kw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ,
40024028	Naki ase ribego rire , nao chinsoti chigosangerereka .
40024029	Korende nyuma y'emechando y'amatuko aria , erioba narionchoke ribe omosunte , nomotienyi tokobara , neching'enang'eni nachigwe , nechinguru chia igoro nachitengeche ,
40024030	erio nario kerache kororekana igoro egekone ki'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto : nario ebisaku bionsi bi'ense birarere ; naende nabamorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ogocha as'amare a igoro , nechinguru , nobonene obonge ,
40024031	Erio natome amalaika aye negeturi ekenene ki'egetureri , nabarabwo nabasangererie abachore baye amo , korwa ase chimbeo inye , korwa ensinyo y'ense goika ensinyo ende .
40024032	As'omoko eorokererie omoreng'anio . Omote oye gosebokire , naende omerire amato , mwamanyire ng'a ng'ang'e ekero ki'egurugura ;
40024033	naboigo nainwe morachie koyarora ayio onsi , momanye ng'ang'e are , ang'e nagesieri .
40024034	Nekeene nabatebirie , tigegoeta ekegori eke , goika aya onsi akoreke .
40024035	Igoro nense nachiete , ko ring'ana riane tirigoeta nonya ng'ake ,
40024036	Nebirage bie rituko riria nensa eria onde tari omanyete , nonya namalaika a igoro , tatiga Tata , ere bweka ,
40024037	Korende buna amatuko aria a Nuhu arenge , naboigo kogocha koba ogocha kw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
40024038	Naki buna barenge amatuko aria amache ataracha , bare koria , bakonywa , bakonyuoma , bakonyuomerigwa , goika rituko Nuhu asoete as'obwato , tibamanya rinde ,
40024039	goika amache amanene aria agacha , akabaira bonsi ; naboigo kogocha koba ogocha kw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
40024040	Engaki eyio abanto habere nababe omogondo ; oyomo airwe , oyomo atigwe ;
40024041	abakungu babere nababe bagosera orogena oromo ; oyomo airwe , oyomo atigwe .
40024042	Naboigo renda , naki timomanyeti rituko ki agocha Omonene oino .
40024043	Manya ring'ana eri erimo : onye oria omonyene enyomba namanyete ekero agocha-gocha oria omoibi , anga narendete gose anga tare gotiga enyomba yaye ebochorwe .
40024044	As'ayio nainwe kabe ang'e naki rias'ensa motakagereti agocha oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
40024045	Gaki ning'o oyio omosomba omwegeni , naende omong'aini , obegetwe nomonene oye igoro as'enyomba yaye , anyare kobaa endagera abasomba as'ekero kiaye ?
40024046	Nare negesio omosomba oria , rigoro omonene oye agocha amonyore ogokora iga .
40024047	Nekeene nabatebirie namotenenie igoro as'ebia abwate bionsi .
40024048	Korende omosomba oria omobe karabore as'omoyo oye , Omonene one otebanire ;
40024049	na karachake kobaaka abasomba b'omonene oye , nakoria nakonywa amo nabagotinda ;
40024050	erio omonene oye omosomba oria igarache komochiera ase rituko atakagereti , nensa atamanyeti ;
40024051	nere igaramonachane ebing'ese bibere , namobekere okobara kwaye amo nabang'ainereria , agwo nakebe nekerero nokoriania amaino .
40025001	Erio obonda bwa igoro naboreng'anigwe nabaiseke ikomi , basogete nechitaya chiabo gochia korotota omonene bw'enyangi .
40025002	Nase barabwo igo barenge abariri batano , nabang'aini batano .
40025003	Naki baria abariri bakaimokia chitaya chiabo , ko tibaimokia namaguta :
40025004	baria abang'aini bakaimokia amaguta as'ebinto biabo amo nechitaya chiabo .
40025005	Goika ochia gotebana omonene bw'enyangi , bagasundoka bonsi bakarara .
40025006	Botuko gati gekaba negeturi , Omonene bw'enyangi oyo ! soka momorotote .
40025007	Erio agwo bakaimoka abaiseke baria bonsi , bakaroisia chitaya chiabo .
40025008	Abariri bakabatebia abang'aini , Twatanere amaguta aino ; ekiagera chitaya chiaito chiarimire .
40025009	Baria abang'aini bakabairaneria , bakabora , Genda , takonyara gotoisana intwe nainwe twensi ; mbuya koinoragende kwegorera as'abakogora ,
40025010	Barabwo bagachia koimoka gochia kogora , agacha omonene bw'enyangi ; baria babete ang'e bagasoa amo nere as'enyangi , egesieri gegasiekwa .
40025011	Naende nyuma bagacha baria abaiseke bande bakobora , Omonene , omonene , toigorere !
40025012	Akabairaneria , akabora , Nekeene nabatebirie , timbamanyeti inwe .
40025013	Gaki kabe nokorenda , naki timomanyeti rituko nonya nensa .
40025014	Naki iganga buna omonto okogenda orogendo gochia goikaransa ense ende , akarangeria abasomba baye , akabeka asebare enibo yaye .
40025015	Akamoa oyomo chitalanta isano , noyo kabere akamoa chitalanta ibere , noyo gatato akamoa etalanta eyemo , ker'omonto koreng'ana nokonyara kwaye . Brio akagenda .
40025016	Akagenda oria oirete chitalanta isano , agakora emeremo nachio , akanyora chitalanta chinde isano .
40025017	Noria oirete ibere akanyora ebitoki ibere boigo .
40025018	Akaimoka oria oirete eyemo , akagenda agakunya inse , akayebisa efetha y'omonene oye .
40025019	Nyuma k'amatuko achia koera amange , agacha omonene bw'abasomba baria , akarigia ribara asebare ,
40025020	Akagenda oria oirete chitalanta isano , akabogoria nechitalanta isano chinde , akamoirera , akabora , Omonene , nkwang'ete chitalanta isano ; rora , nanyorire nechitalanta chinde isano :
40025021	Omonene oye akamotebia , Gwakorire buya aye , omosomba omuya nomwegeni : kwabaire omwegeni as'ebire ebike , ninkobeke igoro as'ebinge . Soa as'omogoko bw'omonene oo .
40025022	Naende akagenda oria oirete chitalanta ibere , akabora , Omonene , nkwang'ete chitalanta ibere ; rora , nanyorire ibere ching'ao ebitoki .
40025023	Omonene oye akamotebia , Gwakorire buya aye , omosomba omuya omwegeni : kwabaire omwegeni as'ebire ebike , ninkobeke igoro as'ebinge . Soa as'omogoko bw'omonene oo .
40025024	Nere agachia kogenda oria oirete etalanta eyemo , akabora , Omonene , iga nakomanyete ng'a nomonto omokong'u ore , igokogesa otasimegeti , igogosangereria otabusureti ;
40025025	erio nkairoka , nkagenda nkayebisa inse etalanta yao ; eyio nero , eyao ore nero .
40025026	Omonene oye akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Nomosomba omobe ore , nomworo , Nkwamanyete ng'a igo nkogesa ntasimegeti , naende iga ngosangereria ntabusureti :
40025027	gaki nkwagwenerete koyebeka efetha yane as'abakoonchoreria chifetha , nainche ngocha , anga nanyora eyane amo nebitoki biaye .
40025028	Moure gaki etalanta yaye , omoe omonyene chitalanta ikomi .
40025029	Naki oyo obwate igakoegwa , naende omenteranigwa ; k'oyo otabwati igakourwa eyare nero .
40025030	Noyo omosomba otagwenereti , motugute as'omosunte o isiko mono ; nakebe nekerero nokoriania amaino .
40025031	Ogocha gocha Omwana-o-mwanyabanto as'obonene bwaye , namalaika onsi amo nere , erio naikaranse as'ekerogo ki'obonene bwaye ,
40025032	nas'obosio bwaye nabisangerereke ebisaku bionsi : nere nabatanane abaiga naba , buna omorisia agwatanana ching'ondi chiaye nechimbori ;
40025033	ching'ondi achibeke as'okoboko kwaye gw'okorio , nechimbori achibeke as'okoboko kwaye gw'okobee .
40025034	Erio oria omoruoti nabatebie abare okoboko kwaye gw'okorio , Nchuo inwe mwasesenetigwe na Tata one , soa as'obonda mwaroiseretigwe korwa ogotongwa gw'ense .
40025035	Naki narenge nenchara , mokang'a endagera ; narenge nerang'o , mokang'a nkanywa ; narenge omogeni , mokandoisia ;
40025036	narenge bosa , mokambisia , narwarete , mogacha kondora , nasibetwe echela , moganchichera .
40025037	Erio baria abanyene oboronge nabamoiranerie , babore , A ! Omonene , naye ndi twakoroche kore nenchara , togakorageria ? Gose ndi twakoroche kore nerang'o , togakoa okanywa ?
40025038	Ndi twakoroche kore omogeni , togakoroisia ? gose ndi twakoroche kore bosa , togakobisia ?
40025039	Naende , ndi twakoroche kore omorwaire , gose gosibire echela , tokagochichera ?
40025040	Nomoruoti nabairanerie , abatebie , Nekeene nabatebirie inwe , koreng'ana buna mwaregokorera oyomo as'aba abaminto abare abake , ninche mwakororete .
40025041	Erio agwo nabatebie abare as'okoboko gw'okobee nabarabwo : Imoka korwa asende inwe mwaragereretigwe , mogende as'omorero o kare nakare , ogacheretwe saitani namalaika aye :
40025042	naki narenge nenchara , timwang'a endagera , narenge nerang'o , timwang'a inywe ;
40025043	narenge omogeni , timwandoisia ; narenge bosa , timwambisia : narwarete , nechela ime , timwacha kondora .
40025044	Agwo nabamoiranerie baria nabarabwo , babore , Omonene , ndi twakoroche aye kore nenchara , gose nerang'o , gose kore omogeni , gose kore bosa , gose korwarete , gose kore echela ime , titwagokorera ?
40025045	Agwo omoruoti nabairanerie , abore : Nekeene nabatebirie , koreng'ana buna motare gokorera oyomo as'aba abare abake , timwankororete inche .
40025046	Nabanto aba nabagende as'ogoitwa gwa kare nakare , k'abanyene oboronge nabagende as'obogima bwa kare nakare .
40026001	Erio Yesu kayakorire amang'ana aya onsi , agatebia aborokigwa baye ;
40026002	Alwamanyire ng'a nyuma as'amatuko abere nebe Epasaka , n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere nabekwe as'amaboko a ababisa baye anyare kobambwa .
40026003	Erio agwo abakuani abanene , nabariki , nabagaka b'abanto , bagasangerereka as'egora y'omokuani oyomo omonene , erieta riaye okorokwa Kaifa ;
40026004	bagakora ekina barabwo ase barabwo , banyare komobwata Yesu ase chisemi nakomoita .
40026005	Korende bakabora , takoba ase rituko rinene , tiricha koba riroroche as'abanto .
40026006	Nere Yesu rigoro arenge Bethania as'enyomba ya Simon oyorenge noborwaire bw'ukoma ,
40026007	agachierwa nomokungu ore nechuba y'alabastro y'amanukato aye rigori rinene , akamonyororokeria omotwe oye igoro aria aikaransete as'endagera .
40026008	Bagachia korora ring'ana riria , baria aborokigwa bakagecha , bakabora , Nobwaki obosiri obo ?
40026009	Naki amanukato aya anga tare kogorwa chishilingi chinyinge nakoegwa abataka ?
40026010	Yesu akamanya aria , akabatebia , Naki mokomoichania omokungu ? Ekiagera onkoreire emeremo emiya .
40026011	Naki abataka igo more nabarabwo amatuko onsi ;
40026012	Naki buna anyororokeria amanukato aya omobere one , nas'engecho y'ogotindekwa kwane akorerete bo .
40026013	Nekeene nabatebirie , naas'erarandigwe enchili eye as'ense yonsi , neri oyo akorete naritebwe koba okoinyora asare .
40026014	Nakero ekio akagenda oyomo ase baria ikomi nababere , nere okorokwa Yudasi Omoisikariota , akabachiera abakuani abanene ,
40026015	akabatebia , Ngento ki morang'e inyare kobamobekera as'amaboko aino ? Bakamorengera ebisamunye emerongo etato bi'efetha .
40026016	Korwa ekero ekio akaba nkoririgiare ribaga anyare komorua .
40026017	Rituko rie ritang'ani as'amatuko ay'omogati otabekiri ememera , Yesu agachierwa naborokigwa baye , bakabora , Ng'ai origetie tonyare koaroisia oriere epasaka ?
40026018	Akabora , Genda as'omochie , moike enyomba ya nyarebe , momotebie , Omworokia oborire , Engaki yane yabaire ang'e ; enyomba yao aye nao ndariere epasaka amo naborokigwa bane ,
40026019	Bagakora bo baria aborokigwa buna bachigetwe na Yesu ; bakaroisia epasaka .
40026020	Riachia koba mogoroba oikaransete as'endagera amo nabaria aborokigwa baye ikomi nababere .
40026021	Bagachia koba nkoriabare , akabora , Nekeene nabatebirie , Oyomo oino nandwe .
40026022	Bagaichana mono mono , bagachaka ker'oyomo komoboria , Inee , Omonene , ninche ?
40026023	Akabairaneria akabora , Oyo ogosoyia okoboko amo nainche as'esani , oyo nere orandwe .
40026024	Nekeene Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare buna arigetwe , korende obobe nobwaye omonto oria , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto arugwa nere . Anga mbuya asare nonya ataiboretwe omonto oria .
40026025	Yudasi akamoiraneria , nere ogocha komorua , akabora , Inee , Omonene , ninche ? Akamotebia , Aye gwatebire .
40026026	Bachia koba as'okoragera , Yesu akabogoria omogati , akayosesenia , akayosamunyora ; akabaa aborokigwa baye , akabora , Bogoria morie ; oyo noro omobere one .
40026027	Akabogoria negekombe , akagesesenia , akabaa , okobora , Kanywe yonsi eye ;
40026028	naki eye nero amanyinga ane ay'emuma enyia , aiteirwe as'abange , as'okorusia kw'ebibe .
40026029	Korende nabatebirie inwe , korwa bono tinkonywa as'okwama kw'omosabibu goika rituko ngocha gokonywa okoyia nainwe as'obonda bwa Tata .
40026030	Goika kobakorire ogotera , bagasoka isiko bakagenda egetunwa ki'Emezeituni .
40026031	Erio Yesu akabatebia , Obotuko bwa rero namogochwe asende inwe mwensi ; naki yarigetwe , Nimoake omorisia , neching'ondi chie riicho nachiserebekane .
40026032	Korende nyuma konabokire , nimbatang'ane as'obosio bwaino gochia Galili .
40026033	Petero akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Neba abanto bonsi nabagochwe asore aye , inche tinkogochwa nonya ng'ake .
40026034	Yesu akamotebia , Nekeene nagotebirie ritang'ani , Obotuko obo bwa rero etuoni etaragweya , nonkane ara gatato .
40026035	Petero akamotebia , Ningwenera gokwa amo naye , tinkogokana nonya ng'ake . Bagateba aborokigwa bonsi boigo .
40026036	Erio agwo Yesu akagenda nabarabwo , agaika aase akorokwa Gethisemane , akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Karansa aiga goika ngende gosaba aria .
40026037	Nere akamoira Petero na baria abana ba Zebedi babere , agachaka gosogwa nomoichano , noborito bw'omoyo .
40026038	Erio akabatebia , Omoyo one nore nobororo mono , goika ogokwa ; karansaa asemore , morende amo nainche .
40026039	Akagenda egeka egeke , akagwa maumama , agasaba nakobora , Aye Tata one , onye nanyarekana , egekombe eke kerwe asende : korende taba buna nyanchete , korende buna bwanchete aye .
40026040	Akabachiera baria aborokigwa , akabarora bararire , akamotebia Petero , Inee , iga timokonyara korenda nainche nonya nensa eyemo ?
40026041	Renda , mosabe , timobaisa gosoa as'ogotemwa : omoyo oro ekeene nore nobwanchani , korende omobere tori nechinguru ,
40026042	Naende akagenda eria kabere , agasaba ; okobora , Aye Tata one , onye egekombe eke tigekong'etera ntakenyweti , abe buna bwanchete .
40026043	Akagenda naende , akabarora bararire ; naki amaiso abo konya aritoire .
40026044	Akabatiga naende , akagenda ; agasaba eria gatato , agakwana amang'ana aria amatang'ani .
40026045	Erio agwo akabachiera aborokigwa baria , akabatebia , Raru bono , motimoke ; ekiagera yaikire ensa , n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , obekirwe as'amaboko a abanyene ebibe .
40026046	Imoka , togende , oyo nere oikire ang'e oria okondwa .
40026047	Goika erio ogokwana , Oyio nere , Yudasi akaoroka , nere noyomo ase baria ikomi nababere , ore nabanto omoganda omonene amo nere , baimogetie emioro y'esegi nechinungu , bakorua as'abakuani abanene nabagaka as'abanyene ense .
40026048	Noria okomorua , konya obaeire ekemanyererio okobora , Oyo ndanyunyunte nere oyio , mobwate .
40026049	Erio kegima agachiera Yesu , akabora , Masoge Omonene ; akamonyunyunta .
40026050	Yesu akamotebia , ' Mosani , kora eri gwachera . Erio agwo bakamorainborera Yesu amaboko , bakamobwata .
40026051	Noyomo obo as'abarenge amo na Yesu akarambora okoboko kwaye , akang'usa omoro oye , akomoaka omosomba bw'omokuani omonene , akamenacha ogoto .
40026052	Erio agwo Yesu akamotebia , Irania omoroo aase aye , ekiagera bonsi abakobwata omoro bw'esegi nabasire as'omoro .
40026053	Gose , tomanyeti ng'a ndaisa gosaba Tata bono iga , takondetera amalaika kobua emeganda ikomi nebere ?
40026054	Korende anga naki aikeranigwa amariko , onye nabo egwenerete koba ?
40026055	Ensa eria Yesu akabatebia emeganda eria y'abanto , Inee , iga mwachire buna mokoyuorera omoibi nemioro y'esegi nechinungu , kong'ira ? Amaluko onsi naikaransete ase hekalu ime , nkworokereria , korende timwumbwata .
40026056	K'ay'onsi abaire anyare goikerangiwa amariko a ababani . Erio agwo aborokigwa bonsi bakamotiga , bagatama .
40026057	Baria babwatete Yesu bakamoira as'omokuani omonene , Kaifa , ase basangererekanete abariki nabagaka .
40026058	Na Petero akamotunyana korwa nyuma egeka goika egora y'omokiiani omonene , Goika ochia gosoa ime agaikaransa amo nabasomba , ayorore omoerio .
40026059	Ekaba abakuani abanene nabe ' barasa yabo bonsi bakamorigeria Yesu amang'ana oborimo , banyare komoita ; tibayanyora .
40026060	Nonya bachete abarori abange b'oborimo , tibanyora .
40026061	Korende nyuma bagacha abarori babere , bakabora , Oyo niga atebete , Ninyare gotagora hekalu ya Nyasaye , nakoyeagacha as'amatuko atato .
40026062	Erio agatenena omokuani omonene , akamoboria , Tokoiraneria ring'ana ? Abaiga ring'ana ki bagogotebia ?
40026063	Yesu agakira . Erio omokuani omonene akamotebia , Nagotianirie ase Nyasaye ore moyo , ototebie gose naye Kristo Omwana o Nyasaye .
40026064	Yesu akamotebia , Aye gwatebire : korende nabatebirie inwe , korwa bono namomorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto oikaransete okoboko gw'okorio gwe chinguru , ogocha namare a igoro .
40026065	Erio agwo oria omokuani omonene agatandora chianga chiaye , akabora , Oramire Nyasaye oyo : abarori nabaki tokorigia ? Eye nero mwaigure emerumi yaye akorama .
40026066	Naki moroche ? Bakamoiraneria , bakabora , Omonto oyo igagwenerete ogokwa .
40026067	Erio agwo bakamotwera amate obosio , bakamoaka enkundi ; abande bakamoaka chindoe ;
40026068	bakabora , Totebie Kristo , ning'o okoagete ?
40026069	Na Petero oikaransete egora isiko ; omoiseke oyomo akamochiera , akabora , Naye nkomo kwarenge na Yesu Omogalili .
40026070	Nere agakana as'obosio bwabo bonsi ; akabora , Timanyeti ayio okobora .
40026071	Nere ochia gosoka isiko egesieri , omoiseke o kabere akamorora ; akabatebia abarengeo , Noyo nkomo arenge na Yesu Omonasareti .
40026072	Akabora eria kabere , akabeka neira , ng'a Omonto oyo timomanyeti inche .
40026073	Naende egeka egeke bakamochiera abateneine aroro , bakamotebia Petero , Ekeene bori naye noyomo ase barabwo , naki ogokwana kwao gwakoorokirie .
40026074	Erio agwo agachaka koragereria nagotiana , okobora , Inche timomanyeti omonto oyio . Erio kegima etuoni ekagweya ,
40026075	Erio Petero akainyora ring'ana riria Yesu atebete , ng'a ritang'ani etuoni etaragweya , nonkane ara gatato . Agasoka isiko , akarera nobororo .
40027001	Bwachia gokia mambia , abakuani abanene bonsi nabagaka as'abanyene ense bakagamba ekina ase Yesu , bamoite .
40027002	Bakamosiba , bakagenda nere , bakamobeka ase gavuna Pilato .
40027003	Erio agwo Yudasi , oria omonyene okomorua , agachia komorora onacheirwe ekina , ageitia , akaira biria chisamunye emerongo etato bi'efetha , akabirania as'abakuani abanene nabagaka :
40027004	akabora , Namochire as'okorua amanyinga atari nabobe bonde . Barabwo bakabora , Gaki , ayio nasetore are intwe ? Nabwerorere aye !
40027005	Nere ochia gotuguta ebisamunye bi'efetha biria ase hekalu ime , akaimoka , akagenda akeng'enta .
40027006	Abakuani abanene bakabimokia ebisamunye biria bi'efetha , bakabora , Tari boronge kobibeka as'ekungo y'esadaka ya Nyasaye , ekiagera birobio nerigori ri'amanyinga .
40027007	Bakagamba ekina , bagachia bakagora rigoko ri'omokori chinyongo , ribe aase gotindeka abageni .
40027008	As'ayio rigoko riria rikarokwa erieta riaye , Rigoko ri'amanyinga , goika rero .
40027009	Erio agwo rigaika eriatebetwe nomobani Yeremia , ogoteba , Bakabimokia ebisamunye emerongo etato bi'efetha , rigori riaye oria obegetwe rigori , nabana b'Isiraeli bamobegete rigori .
40027010	Bakabirwa as'okogora rigoko ri'omokori chinyongo , buna anchigete Omonene .
40027011	Nere Yesu agatenena ase gavuna ; na gavuna akamoboria , okobora , Naye omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ? Yesu akamotebia , Aye gwatebire .
40027012	Ochia gosoerwa n'Abakuani abanene nabagaka , tairaneria ring'ana rinde .
40027013	Erio agwo Pilato akamotebia , Toigweti amang'ana narenga bakonagoteba asore ?
40027014	Nere tairaneria rinde , nonya nering'ana erimo , nonya na gavuna agaichana mono .
40027015	Nekero kie rituko rinene gavuna engecho yaye kobasiborera omosibwa oyomo , oyo barigetie .
40027016	Rituko riria mbarenge nomosibwa oyomo omanyekanete , okorokwa Baraba .
40027017	Erio kobasangererekanire , Pilato akababoria , Norori morigetie mbasiborere , Baraba gose Yesu oyokorokwa Kristo ?
40027018	Ekiagera konya omanyire igo bamorure as'okogecha .
40027019	Pilato ochia goikaransa as'ekerogo gi'ekina , akareterwa amang'ana na mokaye , ogoteba , Oyio nomonto bw'oboronge tobaisa kwebwatia asare , ekiagera rero nachandetwe namange as'okorota asare .
40027020	Na baria abakuani abanene nabagaka bakabagenka emeganda banyare komorigia Baraba , na Yesu bamoite .
40027021	Gavuna akabairaneria akabatebia , As'abanto aba babere norori morigetie mbasiborere ? Bakamotebia , Baraba .
40027022	Pilato akabatebia , Nimokorere ki Yesu okorokwa Kristo ? Bakamotebia bonsi , Tiga aitwe !
40027023	Gavuna akabora , Aseki , mbobe ki akorete ? Barabwo bakamenta koaka egeturi , bakobora , Tiga aitwe !
40027024	Pilato agachia korora tirigwenereti ring'ana , neriroroche rioka rikonakobucha akaimokia amache agaisaba amaboko aye as'amasio emeganda , agateba , Inche igande omochenu as'amanyinga ay'omonto oyo bw'oboronge . Namwerorere abanyene ekerage eke .
40027025	Bakamoiraneria abanto bonsi , bakabora , Amanyinga aye abe asetore igoro , nas'abana baito .
40027026	Erio agwo akabasiborera Baraba , akamoaka Yesu orokini , akamobatigera anyare goitwa .
40027027	Erio agwo abasigari ba gavuna bakamoira Yesu rinyomba ime , bakamosangererekera emoganda omogima .
40027028	Bakamwaboria chianga chiaye ' , bakamobekera eanga embariri .
40027029	Bagatonga egutwa y'amagwa , bakamobekera omotwe , negetonto as'okoboko kwaye gw'okorio ; bagatung'sma namaru asare , bakomochecheria , nakobora , Masoge , Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi !
40027030	Erio bakamotwera amate , bagakebwata egetonto keria , bakamoaka-aka omotwe ;
40027031	rigoro bamochecheirie , bakamorusia eanga eria embariri , bakomobekera chianga chiaye , bakamotang'anania gochia komobamba .
40027032	Bagachia korua as'omochie bakarora omonto oyomo Omokurene , erieta riaye okorokwa Simon ; omonto oyo bakamobetereria ayobogorie omosalaba oye .
40027033	Bachia goika aase akorokwa Gologotha , engecho yaye erieta erio n'Aase Ekeore ,
40027034	bakamoa chinkama chisang'anirie nendorwe ; ogochia koigwa tancha konywa .
40027035	Kabamobambire bakagabana chianga chiaye , bagakora obomera , rinyare goikerana erietebetwe nomobani , Mbatananete chianga chiane egati yabo , nas'eanga yane mbakorete obomera .
40027036	Bagaikaransa komorigereria aria .
40027037	Bakabeka ogosoerwa kwaye igoro as'omotw'oye , korikire , Oyo Nere Yesu , Omoruoti Bw'Abayahudi .
40027038	Erio abaibi babere bakabambwa amo nere , oyomo okorio , noyomo okobee .
40027039	Nabarabwo abagoeta nchera bakamorama , bakoakaaka emetwe yabo , bakobora ,
40027040	Aye oyogotagora hekalu nakoyeagacha namatuko atato , etorie omonyene . Onye naye Omwana o Nyasaye , ika korwa agwo ore omosalaba .
40027041	Na baria abakuani abanene bagakora boigo , bakamokorera echeche amo nabakuani nabagaka , bakobora ,
40027042	Natoretie abanto , omonyene takonyara gwetoria . Onyore nomoruoti o Isiraeli , aike bono korwa as'omosalaba , naintwe rirorio natwanche asare .
40027043	Igegenete ase Nyasaye : amokonye bono , onye omorigetie ; ekiagera natebete ng'a Inche n'Omwana o Nyasaye .
40027044	Naboigo nabaria abaibi babambetwe amo nere , bakamwogerera .
40027045	Korwa chinsa isano nemo omosunte okaba ense engima , okaba goika chinsa kianda ,
40027046	chinsa kianda chiachia goika , Yesu akaaka egeturi neriogi rinene , okobora , Eli , Eli , lama sabakithani , engecho yaye , Nyasaye one , Nyasaye one , naki gwantigire ?
40027047	Bagachia koigwa abande ase baria bateneine aroro , bakabora , Elija akorangeria .
40027048	Erio oyomo obo akaminyoka , akaimokia esifunji , akayeichoria nechinkama , akayebeka as'egetonto , akamoa anywe .
40027049	Baria abande bakabora , Tiga torore gose Elija ogocha kemotoria .
40027050	Yesu akaaka eriogi rinene naende , erio agatwekamo .
40027051	Erio egetambaa gi'okonacha hekalu gegatandoka korwa igoro goika inse chinsemo ibere ; ense egatengecha ; amagena agatandoka ;
40027052	chimbera chikamanoka chigasama , nemebere emenge y'abanto abachenu abararete ekaimoka ;
40027053	ka barure chimbera , nyuma as'okoboka kwaye , bagasoa Omochie Omochenu , bakabaorokera abange .
40027054	Esagini y'abasigari emia , nabarenge amo nere , abanto barendete Yesu , bagachia koyorora omotengecho bw'ense nebirage biria biakorekire , bakairoka mono , bakabora , Nekeene oyo igarenge Omwana o Nyasaye .
40027055	Mbarenge aroro abakungu abange , barigereretie korwa are , nabarabwo abakungu abwo nabwo abatunyete Yesu korwa Galili bakomokorera ,
40027056	Ase barabwo abwo narengeo Mariamu Omomagidali , na Mariamu ng'ina Yakobo na Yose , na ng'ina baria abana ba Zebedi .
40027057	Riachia koba mogoroba akagenda omofrto oyomo omonda , omonto bw'Arimithea , okorokwa Yusufu , nere omonyene nomworokigwa o Yesu :
40027058	akagenda oyio ase Pilato , akarigia omobere o Yesu . Erio agwo Pilato agachika aegwe .
40027059	Yusufu akayoimokia oria omobere o Yesu , akayoboa egetambaa ekiya gi'egatani .
40027060	Akayobeka as'oboina bwaye oboyia , obwabachete as'egetare : naende agaturunkania rigena rinene as'egesieri ki'oboina , akagenda .
40027061	Mbarenge aroro Mariamu Omomagidali noria Mariamu o kabere , baikaransete obosio bw'oboina .
40027062	Rituko ria kabere , nerio nario rigotunya rituko ri'Okorosia , abakuani abanene n'Abafarisai bagasangerereka ase Pilato ,
40027063	bakabora , Omonene , twainyoire ng'a oria omonyaborimo natebete , rigoro are moyo , Nyuma as'amatuko atato nimboke .
40027064	Gaki chika oboina borendwe goika rituko ri'atato ; aborokigwa baye tibabaisa gocha komoiba , babatebie abanto , Obokire korwa as'abakure : kobaise koba okong'ainwa kw'omoerio nakobue koria kwe ritang'ani .
40027065	Pilato akabatebia , More nabarendi : genda moborende mono oboina buna moranyare .
40027066	Bakagenda bakaborenda mono oboina , bakabeka rigena ekemanyererio , amo nabarendi .
40028001	Esabato egachia koera , kobogokiamoka rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma , agacha Mariamu Omomagidali noria Mariamu o kabere korigereria oboina .
40028002	Rora , ogocha omotengecho omonene bw'ense ; ekiagera rilaika ri'Omonene riaigete korwa igoro , rikagenda rigatigeria ensemo riria rigena , rikarikaransera .
40028003	Nekieni kiaye igo kiarenge buna okomesa kw'embura .
40028004	Nas'okoiroka kwaye baria abarendi bakaiguswa , bakaba buna abanto bakure .
40028005	Rilaika rikabairaneria baria abakungu , rikabatebia , Timoiroka inwe , ekiagera namanyire ng'a Yesu mokorigia oria oitwa .
40028006	Tari aa , naki obokire buna atebete ; nchuo morigererie aase Omonene araire .
40028007	Na genda bwango , mobatebie aborokigwa baye gote obokire korwa as'abakwete ; nere otang'anire asemore gochia Galili : naroro nao moramorore ; bono inche nabatebirie .
40028008	Bakaimoka korwa as'oboina bwango , bare nokoiroka nomogoko omonge , bakagenda bwango , bakabaa amang'ana aborokigwa baye .
40028009	Noyo nere Yesu akaumerana nabarabwo , akabatebia , Masoge . Nabarabwo bagacha bakamobwata amagoro , bakamosasima .
40028010	Erio Yesu akabatebia , Timoiroka ! genda mobae abaminto amang'ana bagende Galili , nabarabwo nabandore aroro .
40028011	Nabarabwo bachia koba nkogendabare nchera , abande ase baria abarendi bagasoa omochie , bakaborokia abakuani abanene amang'ana onsi akoregete .
40028012	Bagachia gosangerekana nabagaka , bagakora ekina , bakabaa baria abasigari chishilingi chinyinge ,
40028013	bakobora , Teba , aborokigwa baye bachete botuko bakamoiba rigoro intwe twararire .
40028014	Ring'ana eri koriraigwekane ase gavuna , intwe natoche komogenka , nakomorusia inwe emechando .
40028015	Bakabogoria chishilingi chiria , bagakora buna borokereretigwe , rikagenda ring'ana eri rigakuma as'Abayahudi goika rituko ria bono .
40028016	Baria aborokigwa ikomi nomo bakagenda Galili , bagaika egetunwa abachigete Yesu .
40028017	Bagachia komorora bakamosasima , korende abande bagakora ogosiereria .
40028018	Yesu akagenda agakwana nabarabwo , akabatebia , Naeirwe okobua gwonsi as'igoro nense ,
40028019	Gaki genda mokore ebisaku bionsi koba aborokigwa , mokobabatisa as'erieta ria Tata , neri'Omwana , neri'Omoika Omochenu :
40028020	mokoborokereria koyabwata onsi nabachigete ; nainche igande amo nainwe amatuko onsi , goika omoerio bw'ense .
41001001	Omochakano bw'enchili ya Yesu Kristo , Omwana o Nyasaye .
41001002	Buna yarigetwe as'ebuku y'omobani Isaya , Rigereria , namotomire omotomwa one as'obosio bwao , Oyorarosie enchera yao ;
41001003	Eriogi ri'oyokoaka egeturi eroro ime , Yerosie enchera y'Omonene , Rosia ogoeta kwaye ;
41001004	Akaoroka Yohana , okobatisa eroro ime , nakorandia ebatiso y'okoonchoka ekoreta okorusia kw'ebibe .
41001005	Bakamogendera ense yonsi ya Boyahudi , nabarabwo bonsi ba Yerusalemu ; bakobatiswa nere as'oroche rwa Yorodan , bakabiorokia ebibe biabo .
41001006	Na Yohana igarenge kweboyia amarionya engamia , norokini rwe riyo ' kenema kiaye , iga are koria chingige noboke bw'orosana .
41001007	Akarandia , akabora , Ngochare nyuma asende oyore nechinguru kombua , omonto ntagwenere gotung'ama nagochisibora chinuga chi'ebikoroto biaye .
41001008	Inche nababatisire as'amache ; korende ere nababatise as'Omoika Omochenu .
41001009	Naende amatuko aria , agacha Yesu okorua Nazareti ya Galili , akabatiswa na Yohana ase Yorodan .
41001010	Erio ogofira korwa as'amache , akarora igoro amanokire , n'Omoika buna riruma rigoika igoro asare :
41001011	neriogi rikorua igoro , Aye naye Omwana omwanchani one , naye ongwenerete .
41001012	Erio Omoika okamoraa eroro ime .
41001013	Akaba aroro eroro ime amatuko emerongo ene ogotemwa na Saitani : nere igarenge amo neching'iti chintindi ; namalaika bakamokorera .
41001014	Goika nyuma Yohana kabekirwe echela ime , Yesu akagenda Galili , akarandia enchili ya Nyasaye ,
41001015	okobora , Ekero giaikeranire , nobonda bwa Nyasaye bwaikire ang'e : onchoka , yianche enchili ,
41001016	Nere agaeta ensemo y'enyancha ya Galili , akabarora Simon na Anderea omomura omwabo Simon bakoruta ekeonga enyancha ime : ekiagera nabarubi barenge .
41001017	Yesu akabatebia , Nchuo montunyane inche , nainche nimbakore mobe abarubi b'abanto .
41001018	Erio kegima bagatiga ebionga biabo , bakamotunyana .
41001019	Akagenderera ake , akamorora Yakobo omwana o Zebedi , na Yohana momura omwabo , nabarabwo bonsi barenge obwato ime bakobirosia ebionga biabo .
41001020	Erio akabarangeria : bakamotiga ise Zebedi ime as'obwatoamo nabanto b'eng'eria , bakagenda bakamotunyana .
41001021	Bakabwatia enchera goika Kaperinaum ; ne rituko ri'esabato agasoa esunagogi akorokereria .
41001022	Bagaichana as'okworokereria kwaye : naki arenge koborokereria buna oyore nechinguru , tari buna abariki .
41001023	Narengeo as'esunagogi yabo omonto omonyene ekerecha ki'eubi ; akaaka eriogi ,
41001024	okobora , Nki tore naye , Yesu o Nazareti ? gwachire gotosiria ? Nakomanyire aye , Omochenu o Nyasaye .
41001025	Yesu akamokania , okobora , Sieka omonwa , omorue .
41001026	Keria ekerecha ki'eubi , gekamogaragaria gekarera as'eriogi rinene , gekamorua .
41001027	Bagakumia bonsi , goika bakaborania , bakabora , Nki eke ? Obong'aini obo oboyia mbong'aini ki ? Ekiagera as'okobua akobichika ebirecha bi'eubi nabirobio bikomoigwera .
41001028	Erio chinkuma chiaye chigasarera ense yonsi ensemo ya Galili .
41001029	Erio agwo , kabasokire as'esunagogi , bagasoa enyomba ya Simon na Anderea , amo na Yakobo na Yohana .
41001030	Ng'ina moka Simon oraire orwarete esosera ; erio bakamotebia amang'ana aye :
41001031	akamoika ang'e akamoimokia as'okomobwata okoboko ; erio esosera ekamotiga , akabakorera .
41001032	Goika ekaba mogoroba , nerioba korikogwa , bakamoretera bonsi abarenge noborwaire , nabanyene ebirecha .
41001033	Nomochie bwonsi okaba ngosangererekana ore geita .
41001034	Akabagwenia abange abarenge namarwaire ande ande , agaseria ebirecha ebinge ; tabitiga ebirecha bikwane , ekiagera biamomanyete .
41001035	Kobogokia , botarakia mono , akaimoka agasoka , akagenda aase atari nabanto , agasaba aroro .
41001036	Simon nabarenge nere bakamotunyana ;
41001037	bakamorora , bakamotebia , Abanto bonsi ngokorigiabare .
41001038	Akabatebia , Togende aande goika ebichie bire ang'e , ninyare korandia naroro ; ekiagera as'ayio naro naorokeire .
41001039	Agasoa ase chisunagogi chiabo as'ense yonsi ya Galili , okorandia nagosrria ebirecha .
41001040	Agacha asare omonto omonyene ukoma , akamosorora , nakomotung'amera , nakomoichia , Korigetie , nonyare gonsibia .
41001041	Yesu agasogwa namabera , akarambora okoboko kwaye , akamokuna , akamotebia , Nindigetie ; sibeka .
41001042	Erio agwo obokoma bwaye bokamorua , agasibeka .
41001043	Akamokania bokong'u , akamotebia agende ,
41001044	akamotebia . Rigereria totebia ' monto onde bwonsi amang'ana aya : korende genda enchera yao , bweorokie as'omokuani , orue ekeegwa giachigetwe na Musa as'ogosibeka kwao , erinde obe okweorokia asebare .
41001045	Nere agasoka , agachaka korandia amange , nakoriorokia riria ring'ana , goika Yesu tanyara naende gosoa omochie ime maiso marore , korende akaba isiko aas'atari nabanto : bakamogendera korwa ker'aase .
41002001	Agasoa Kaperinaum naende nyuma as'amatuko amake , akaigugwa ng'a nao are enyomba .
41002002	Erio bagasangerereka abanto abange , tiriatigara ribaga asebare , nonya goika ' gesieri : agakwana nabarabwo ring'ana .
41002003	Bagacha abanto , bakamoretera omonto omonyene okoiguswa , obogoirie nabanto bane .
41002004	Bagachia koba tibanyara komoika ang'e as'engecho y'omoganda , bagakebochora ekerama aria as'arenge : kobatiekire gotagora , bakabotirimbokia oborere boria ararerete oria omonyene okoiguswa .
41002005	Yesu ochia korora okwegena kwabo akamotebia oria omonyene okoiguswa , Omwana one , ebibe biao biabeirwe .
41002006	Abande as'abariki baikaransete aroro , bakabora as'emioyo yabo ,
41002007	Naki oyo agoteba iga ? nkoramare : ning'o oranyare kwabera ebibe tatiga oyomo , nere Nyasaye ?
41002008	Erio Yesu akamanya omoyo oye ime buna bakorengereria iga emioyo yabo , akabatebia , Naki mokorengereria iga emioyo yaino ?
41002009	Ndiriri rire eriango , komotebia omonyene okoiguswa , Ebibe biao biabeirwe ; gose goteba , Imoka bwetweke oborere bwao , ogende ?
41002010	Korende monyare komanya ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nare nokobua as'ense okwabera ebibe ( okomotebia oria omonyene okoiguswa ) ,
41002011	Nagotebirie , Imoka , bwetweke oborere bwao , ogende mwao .
41002012	Erio akaimoka , agetweka oborere bwaye , akarua as'amasio abo bonsi ; goika bagakumia bonsi , bakamotogia Nyasaye , bakabora , Aya are iga titwanyakoyarora nonya ng'ake .
41002013	Agasoka naende akagenda ensemo y'enyancha ; emeganda yonsi bakamogendera , akaborokereria .
41002014	Goika ochia goeta , akamorora Lawi omwana bw'Alfayo oikaransete aase bakobangerwa ebango , akamotebia , Ntunyana . Akaimoka akamotunyana .
41002015	Ekaba ekero ekio Yesu gaikaransete enyomba mwaye oria , okoria endagera , abakorusia ebango abange nabanyene ebibe bagaikaransa amo na Yesu naborokigwa baye : ekiagera barenge abange , bakamotunyana .
41002016	Naende abariki b'Abafarisai , bagachia komorora okoria amo nabanyene ebibe , nabakorusia ebango , bakabatebia aborokigwa baye , Naseki akoria nakonywa amo nabakorusia ebango nabanyene ebibe ?
41002017	Yesu ochia koigwa , akabatebia , abare abagima tibakorigia omogwenia , tatiga abare noborwaire : Tincheti kobarangeria ababoronge , korende abanyene ebibe .
41002018	Aborokigwa ba Yohana n'Abafarisai barenge kweng'ata : bagacha bakamotebia , Naseki aborokigwa ba Yohana naborokigwa b'Abafarisai bakweng'ata , ko aborokigwa bao tibakweng'ata ?
41002019	Yesu akabatebia , Abana b'enyangi nabanyare kweng'ata , ekero omonene bw'enyangi are amo nabarabwo ? ekero omonene bw'enyangi are amo nabarabwo , tibakonyara kweng'ata .
41002020	Korende amatuko nache , ararusigwe asebare oria omonene bw'enyangi , erio barabwo nabeng'ate ase rituko riria .
41002021	Gose tari ' monto onde okobeka ekeraka ki'eanga enyia as'eanga engotu : naki keria kiabekwa nigo gegotandora eanga eria , keria ekeyia koyechierereria engotu , etandoke kobua .
41002022	Gose onde tari okobeka edivai enyia ase chichuba chingotu : gose eria edivai nechiate chichuba , edivai eiteke , ne chichuba chiasira : korende edivai enyia igo ekobekwa ase chichuba chinyia .
41002023	Ochia koba ngoetare as'emegondo y'engano rituko ri'esabato ; aborokigwa baye bagachaka , kabakogenda , bakobutora ebigara bi'engano .
41002024	Abafarisai bakamotebia , Rora , naki bagokora eritari boronge ase rituko ri'esabato ?
41002025	Akabatebia , Timwanya gosoma ayakorete Daudi ekero arenge nokorigia , akaba nenchara , ere , nabwo barenge amo nere ?
41002026	Buna asoete as'enyomba ya Nyasaye as'ekero Abiathar arenge omokuani omonene , akayeria emegati eyokworokereria , etari boronge koregwa tatiga nabakuani , naende akabaa nabwo barenge amo nere ?
41002027	Akabatebia , Esabato yakoretwe as'engecho y'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , tari Omwana-o-mwanyabanto as'engecho y'esabato :
41002028	naki oria Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere omonene bw'esabato .
41003001	Agasoa naende as'esunagogi ; narenge omonto agwo okoboko kwaye kwomete .
41003002	Bakamotega korora gose namokonye ase rituko ri'esabato ; banyare komosoera .
41003003	Akamotebia oria omonto okoboko kwomete , Tenena gati gati .
41003004	Akabatebia , Mboronge rituko ri'esabato gokora amaya , gose gokora amabe ? gokonya obogima gose goita ? Bagakira .
41003005	Akabamogoreria amaiso chinsemo chionsi as'okobea , akarora obororo as'engecho y'obokong'u bw'emioyo yabo , akamotebia oria omonto , Rambora okoboko kwao . Agakorambora : okoboko kwaye gokagwena .
41003006	Erio kegima bagasoka baria Abafarisai bakamokorera ekina amo n'Abaherodiano buna baramoite .
41003007	Erio Yesu akaimoka ere naborokigwa baye akagenda ensemo y'enyancha ; okamotunyana omoganda omonene , abanto barure Galili : nabaruete Boyahudi ,
41003008	na Yerusalemu na Idumea , na ng'umbu ya Yorodan , ne chinsemo chia Turo na Sidon , omosangererekano omonene , bachia koigwa ebirage bi'amang'ana onsi arenge gokora , bakamochiera .
41003009	Akabatebia aborokigwa baye ng'a obwato oboke bobe ang'e asare , as'engecho y'abanto , ekiagera emeganda temomiga .
41003010	Ekiagera akonyete abange ; goika bonsi abarenge nemechando bakamoimokera banyare komokuna .
41003011	Na ker'ebirecha bi'eubi , bigachia komorora , bikagwa as'obosio bwaye , bikarera bigateba , Aye naye Omwana o Nyasaye .
41003012	Akabikania mono tibimoorokia .
41003013	Akarina egetunwa , akabarangeria abarigetie omonyene ; bakamochiera .
41003014	Agachora ikomi nababere , banyare koba amo nere , nario aranyare kobatoma korandia ,
41003015	nababe nokobua goseria ebirecha ;
41003016	na Simon akamoroka erieta , Petero ;
41003017	na Yakobo , omwana o Zebedi , na Yohana momura omwabo Yakobo , akabaroka erieta Boanergi , engecho yaye , Abana b'enkoba :
41003018	n'Anderea , na Filipu , na Baritholomayo , na Mathayo , na Thomas , na Yakobo bw'Alufayo , na Thadayo , na Simon Omokanani ,
41003019	na Yudasi Omoisikariota , nere oyomoruete . Erio agasoa enyomba .
41003020	Nemeganda egasangerereka naende , barabwo abanyene tibanyara nonya nokoria omogati .
41003021	Abasani baye bagachia koigwa amang'ana , bagasoka kogenda komobwata : ekiagera batebete , Obwatirwe nebarimo .
41003022	Abariki abaruete Yerusalemu bakabora , Nare na Beelizebul , nas'okobua kw'omonene bw'ebirecha akobiseria ebirecha .
41003023	Akabarangeria bache asare , akabatebia as'emereng'anio , Naki Saitani aranyare goseria Saitani ?
41003024	Noboruoti koboratananeke ase borobwo obonyene , oboruoti boria tibokonyara gotenena .
41003025	Nenyomba keratananeke ero yoka , enyomba eria tekonyara gotenena .
41003026	Naende onye Saitani bweimokeire omonyene , gwatananeka , takonyara gotenena , korende nabe nomoerio .
41003027	Takonyara omonto gosoa as'enyomba y'omonto omonyene chinguru , nagosakora ebinto biaye , atamosibeti ritang'ani oria omonyene chinguru ; nario aramanye gosakora enyomba yaye .
41003028	Ekeene nabatebirie , Ebibe bionsi nababerwe mwanyabanto , nokorama kwabo bararame gwonsi :
41003029	korende omonto orarame Omoika Omochenu tari nokwaberwa , nonya ng'ake , igarabe nebibe goika kare nakare :
41003030	buna batebete , Nare nekerecha ki'eubi .
41003031	Bagacha ng'ina nabamwabo ; bateneine isiko , bakamotomera omonto komorangeria .
41003032	Nemeganda iga yarenge eikaransete emoetanaine ; bakamotebia , Nyoko nabamura bamino mbare isiko , mbakorigetie .
41003033	Akabairaneria , akabora , Baba nabamura baminto mbarabi ?
41003034	Akabarigereria abwo baikaransete bamoetanaine , akabora , Rora , baba nabamura baminto !
41003035	Ekiagera oyorakore obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , oyio nere momura ominto , na mosubati ominto , na baba .
41004001	Agachaka kworokereria naende ensemo y'enyancha . Bakamosangererekera omoganda omonene , goika ere akarina obwato ime , agaikaransa enyancha ; omoganda bwonsi nao orenge as'ense enyomo ensemo y'enyancha .
41004002	Akaborokereria amang'ana amange as'emereng'anio , akabatebia as'okworokereria kwaye ,
41004003	tegerera : Omobusuri agasoka kogenda kobusura :
41004004	agachia koba , nkobusurare , chimbusuro chinde chikagwa ensemo y'enchera , chinyoni chigacha chigachiria .
41004005	Nechinde chikagwa as'amagena are , aase amaroba arenge amake ; chikamera bwango ekiagera amaroba arenge amake :
41004006	omobaso ochia kobara , chigasusana ; ekiagera chitare nemeri chikonia .
41004007	Nechinde chikagwa as'amagwa ime , aria amagwa agakina , agachimiga , tichiama amatunda .
41004008	Nechinde chikagwa as'amaroba amaya , chikama amatunda , chikamera nagokina , nakwama ; eyemo emerongo etato , neyemo emerongo etano nomo , naende eyemo emia .
41004009	Akabora , Oyore namato akoigwera , tiga aigwe .
41004010	Agachia koba bweka , abanto bakamoetanana nabaria ikomi nababere bakamoboria amang'ana as'emereng'anio .
41004011	Akabatebia , Inwe mwaeirwe kobomanya obobisi bw'obonda bwa Nyasaye : korende baria bare isiko , amang'ana onsi igagocha asebare buna emereng'anio :
41004012	korende okorigereria nabarigererie , tibarora ; nokoigwa nabaigwe , tibainyora ; tibacha goonchoka , baberwe ebibe biabo .
41004013	Akabatebia , Timomanyeti omoreng'anio oyio ? Gaki emereng'anio yonsi naki morayemanye ?
41004014	Omobusuri ne ring'ana agosimeka .
41004015	Abwo nabwo bare ensemo y'enchera , rigosimekwa ring'ana ; nabarabwo bagotieka koigwa , bwango ocha Saitani , orirusia riria ring'ana riasimegetwe emioyo yabo .
41004016	Naboigo koreng'ana nabwo basimekire as'amagena , ekiagera kobarigure riria ring'ana , erio kegima baribwata nomogoko ;
41004017	naende tibari nemeri ime abanyene , korende bngenderera ekero egeke ; erio ekooroka emechando gose ogochandwa ekiagera ase riria ring'ana , bwango bagochwa .
41004018	Naende aba nabwo baria basimekire as'amagwa ; aba nabwo bakoigwa ring'ana ,
41004019	naende okorengereria gw'ense nokong'ainererigwa kw'enibo , naende okorengereria kw'amang'ana ande kogosoa , biarimiga riria ring'ana , riba tirikwama ,
41004020	Naende aba nabwo basimekire as'amaroba amaya ; nabanto bakorigwa riria ring'ana , nakoribwata , nakwama amatunda emerongo etato , emerongo etano nomo , naende emia .
41004021	Akabatebia , Naki moroche ? Etaya iga ekoretwa erinde yabekwa inse as'egeionga , gose nyaro y'oborore ? teri kobekwa igoro as'ekebekerero ?
41004022	Ekiagera tiriri ring'ana rirabiseke , tatiga rirache koorokigwa ; gose riabisegete , tatiga riche koorokigwa maiso marore ,
41004023	Omonto kare namato akoigwera , tiga aigwe .
41004024	Akabatebia , Rigereria eke mokoigwa : nekerengo mokorengera nakio morarengerwe : ekio naende namomenterwe .
41004025	Ekiagera oyore nero naegwe ; korende oyotabwati naurwe nonya neyio abwate .
41004026	Akabora , Obonda bwa Nyasaye nigo bogwekaine nomonto osimegete embusuro igoro as'ense .
41004027	Akarara nakoboka , obotuko nomobaso , nero embusuro ekamera nagokina , atamanyeti ere .
41004028	Ekiagera ense iga ekwama yoka , ritang'ani omwange , naende ekegara , erio obori oborera as'ekegara .
41004029	Nonya namatunda gakwama , bwango iga akoira omoyio , ekiagera rigesa riaikire ang'e .
41004030	Akabora , Tobogwekanie ki obonda bwa Nyasaye ? gose tobobeke as'omoreng'anio ki ?
41004031	Buna entetere y'ekaradali , ekero egosimekwa as'ense , nenke kobua chintetere chionsi chire as'ense ,
41004032	koyatiekire gosimekwa , ekina eba enene kobua emete yonsi ye chinyeni , ekoba nechinsagia chinene ; goika chinyoni chi'igoro chinyara goikaransa inse as'ekiriri kiaye .
41004033	As'emereng'anio emenge ere buna eye igarenge gokwana nabarabwo ring'ana , buna banyarete koigwa ;
41004034	gose onye tari omoreng'anio anga takwanete nabarabwo : ko akabatebereria aborokigwa baye amang'ana onsi bobisi .
41004035	Rituko riria , rigachia koba mogoroba , akabatebia ? Twamboke goika ng'umbu .
41004036	Bakabatiga emeganda , bakamoira amo nabarabwo buna arenge as'obwato boria . Namato ande narenge amo nere .
41004037	Gekaoroka ekerambauti ekenene ki'omwaga , emerindo egaaka obwato goika bogachaka goichora amache .
41004038	Ere omonyene igarenge korwa nyuma as'obwato , oraire igoro as'omoito : bakamotura , bakamotebia , Omworokia , tari gento asore gatogosira ?
41004039	Akaboka : akayekania embeo , akayetebia enyancha , Kira , tegerera . Embeo ekaera , gokaba ogotoerera okonene .
41004040	Akabatebia , Naki mokwoboa inwe ? Timoraba nokwegena ?
41004041	Bagasogwa nomoondoko omonene , bagatebania , Ning'o oyo , goika embeo nenyancha chikomoigwera ?
41005001	Bagaika ng'umbu y'enyancha , goika ense y'Abageraseni .
41005002	Nere agachia goika korwa obwato , bwango akanyorwa nomonto okorua ase chimbera nere igarenge nekerecha ki'eubi ,
41005003	obomenyo bwaye igo bwarenge aria ase chimbera : nonya nomonto tarenge ore konyara komosiba , nonya nase ebinyuri ;
41005004	ekiagera igarenge konya osibirwe ara aange ase chingatare nebinyuri , abibutora biria ebinyuri , nagochibunabuna chiria chingatare : nonya nomonto tarenge orenge nechinguru chi'okomobua .
41005005	Naende ker'amatuko onsi , obotuko nomobaso , aas'arenge chimbera nebitunwa , okorera , nagwekeba namagena .
41005006	Agachia komororera Yesu are , akaminyoka chimbero , akamosasima ;
41005007	akarera as'egeturi ekenene , akabora , Inki nde naye , Yesu , Omwana o Nyasaye ore Igoro Mono ? Nagotianirie ase Nyasaye ng'a tonsiria .
41005008	Ekiagera akamotebia , Aye ekerecha ki'eubi , morue omonto oyo .
41005009	Akamoboria , Erieta riao naki ? Akairaneria akamotebia , Erieta riane Nomoganda ; ekiagera ntore abange .
41005010	Akamosorora mono tabaira isiko y'ense eria .
41005011	Naria egetunwa ndiarenge riicho rinene rie chingurue rikorisia ,
41005012	Ebirecha bionsi bikamosorora , bikabora , Toire ase chingurue , tonyare gochisoa chirochio ,
41005013	Akabia ribaga . Biria ebirecha bi'eubi bigasoka , bigasoa ase chiria chingurue ; riicho rionsi rigatirimboka gochia eora , chigasoa enyancha ime , iga chiarenge buna chilifu ibere ; chigakwera enyancha ime .
41005014	Abarisia be chingurue chiria bagatama , bagateba amang'ana as'emechie nemegondo . Bagasoka barore amang'ana aorokire .
41005015	Bakamochiera Yesu , bakamorora oria omonyene ebirecha oikaransete , bweboetie chianga , ore nobong'aini bwaye , nere orenge nomoganda : bakairoka .
41005016	Nabarabwo abaroche bakaorokia amang'ana ki amonyora oria omonyene ebirecha , namang'ana chingurue .
41005017	Bagachaka komosorora arue ase chimbebe chiabo ,
41005018	Ochia korina obwato ime , oria orenge nebirecha akamosorora abe amo nere .
41005019	Yesu tamwanchera , korende akamotebia , Genda mwao , as'abanto baino , obatebie amang'ana amanene agokorera Omonene , naende buna akwabera .
41005020	Akagenda bwoye , agachaka korandia use Dekapoli , amang'ana amanene are naki Yesu amokorera : abanto bonsi bagakumia .
41005021	Goika Yesu kambokire koirana ng'umbu as'obwato boria , okamosangererekera omoganda omonene : nere igarenge ensemo y'enyancha .
41005022	Ani , ochire omonto oyomo as'abanene b'esunagogi , erieta riaye Yairo ; ochia komorora , akagwa amagoro aye ,
41005023	akamosorora mono , okobora , Enyaroka yane enke yaisire gokwa : nagosabire , oche obeke okoboko kwao igoro asare , anyare kogwena , nere abe moyo .
41005024	Akagenda amo nere : omoganda omonene okamotunyana , bakamomiga .
41005025	Nomokungu oyomo ore korua amanyinga korwa ekero ki'emiaka ikomi nebere ,
41005026	nogochandwa okonge as'amaboko abagwenia abange , agasiarera chinto bionsi arenge nabio , tikwaniogwenera nonya ng'ake , korende obogima bwaye bokamenteka bobe kobua ,
41005027	erio agachia koigwa amang'ana a Yesu , agaeta as'omoganda korwa nyuma , akayekuna eanga yaye .
41005028	Ekiagera agateba , Kondakune chianga chiaye chioka , ningwene .
41005029	Erio kegima ensoko y'amanyinga aye egakama ; akaigwa omobere oye ng'a ogwenire korwa as'emechando eria .
41005030	Yesu akamanya as'omoyo oye ng'a chinguru chiarure asare , ageonchora gati as'omoganda , akabora , Ning'o onkuna chianga chiane ?
41005031	Aborokigwa baye bakamotebia , Kwayororire omoganda buna okomigete , naye gokobora , Ning'o onkuna ?
41005032	Akarigereria chinsemo chionsi erinde amorore oria okora ring'ana eri .
41005033	Noria omokungu agasogwa nomoondoko nokoiguswa , akamanya eriamonyorire , agacha akamogwera , akamoorokeria ekeene gionsi .
41005034	Akamotebia , Enyaroka , okwegena kwao gwagokonyire , genda nomorembe , obe omogima korwa as'emechando yao .
41005035	Ekero are gokwana bagacha abanto korwa as'enyomba y'omonene bw'esunagogi , bakabora , Enyaroka yao yakure ; inki okomoroseria Omworokia ?
41005036	Ko Yesu , ochia koigwa ring'ana rigotebwa , akamotebia omonene bw'esunagogi , Toiroka , ancha rioka .
41005037	Tanchete omonto amotunyane , tatiga Fetero , na Yakobo , na Yohana omomura omwabo Yakobo .
41005038	Bagaika enyomba y'oria omonene bw'esunagogi ; akarora riroroche nabanto bakorera , nokweumia okonge .
41005039	Agachia gosoa , akabatebia , Naki mogokora riroroche nakorera ? omwana takweti , korende iga araire .
41005040	Bakamosekerera mono . Korende ere gatiekire kobasokia isiko bonsi , akamoira ise oria omwana na ng'ina na baria barenge amo nere , agasoa ime as'arenge oria omwana .
41005041	Akamobwata okoboko oria omwana , akamotebia , Talitha , kumi ; ogoonchorwa kwaye , Omwana , nagotebirie , Imoka .
41005042	Bwango agatenena oria omwana , akagenda ; ekiagera konya okorire emiaka ikomi nebere . Bagaichana nogoichana okonene .
41005043	Akabachika mono , ' monto onde tamanya amang'ana ayio : agachika aegwe endagera .
41006001	Akarua agwo ; agaika goika ense yaye omonyene ; aborokigwa baye bakamotunyana .
41006002	Nas'ekero gi'esabato agachaka kworokereria as'esunagogi : abange bakamoigwa bagaichana , bakabora , Oyo ng'ai ayanyorire aya ? mbong'aini ki obo aeirwe oyo , mbikone ki ebi ebinene biakorekire as'amaboko aye ?
41006003	Oyo tari oria omobachi , omwana o Mariamu , nabamura bamwabo Yakobo , na Yose , na Yuda , na Simon ? nabasubati bamwabo abaiseke tibari aiga seito ? Bakagechigwa nere .
41006004	Yesu akabatebia , Omobani takomocha ogosikwa , tatiga as'ense yaye , nas'eamate yaye , nas'enyomba yaye .
41006005	Gose tanyara gokora egekone ekenene aroro , tatiga abegete amaboko aye igoro as'abarwaire abagusu , akabagwenia .
41006006	Agakumia as'engecho y'ogotancha kwabo . Agaetanana as'emechie eria , okworokereria .
41006007	Akabarangeria baria ikomi nababere , agachaka kobatoma babere babere ; akabaa okobua igoro as'ebirecha bi'eubi ;
41006008	akabachika tibabogoria ' gento as'orogendo , tatiga enyimbo yoka ; nonya nomogati , nonya nesaro , nonya nechibesa chi'ekemoya ;
41006009	korende babeke ebikoroto ; akabora , Timweboyia chigansu ibere .
41006010	Akabatebia , Ande onsi komorasoe as'enyomba , ikaransa aroro goika ekero mokoimoka korwa aase aria ,
41006011	Nabanto bonsi batabaroiseti inwe , gose kobaigwa , komokorua aroro , rokong'onte orotu rore inse as'amagoro aino robe kirori asebare .
41006012	Bagasoka , bakarandia ng'a abanto baonchoke .
41006013	Bagaseria ebirecha ebinge , bakaaka abanto abange amaguta abarenge abarwaire , bakabagwenia .
41006014	Omoruoti Herode akaigwa amang'ana ; ekiagera erieta riaye rianyarire gokuma : akabora , Yohana Omobatisi obokire korwa as'amakweri , nas'ayio chinguru echi chigokora emeremo ime asare .
41006015	Abande bakabora , N'Elija . Abande bakabora , Oyo nomobani , ao gose oyomo as'ababani .
41006016	Korende Herode ochia koigwa , akabora , Oyo nere Yohana , nanachete omotwe , obokire .
41006017	Ekiagera Herode omonyene igatomete abanto , akamobwata Yohana , akamosiba echela as'engecho ya Herodias , moka Filipo momura omwabo : ekiagera amonyuomete .
41006018	Nabo Yohana amotebetie Herode , Tai boronge asore koba na moka momura omino .
41006019	Nabo oria Herodias akaba nokogecha asare , akarigia komoita ; tanyara ;
41006020	ekiagera Herode namoirogete Yohana , okomomanya ng'a nomonto oboronge , omochenu , akamorenda . Gachia komoigwa , agakora amang'ana amange , nere igarenge komoigwa nomogoko .
41006021	Goika rikaoroka rituko rigwenerete , na Herode ase rituko ri'omoyega bw'okoiborwa kwaye agachia kobakorera omoyega abanene , nabatang'ani b'esegi , nabanto abanene ba Galili ;
41006022	erio enyaroka yaye oria Herodias egasoa gotenga , ekamogwenera Herode nabarabwo abaikaransete amo nere as'omoyega ; omoruoti akamotebia oria omwana , Nsaba kende gionsi ekiorigetie , ninkoe .
41006023	Akamoriera eira , kende gionsi ekiorarigie asende , ninkoe , nonya nenusu y'oboruoti bwane .
41006024	Agasoka , akamotebia ng'ina , Nki ndasabe ? Agateba , Omotwe o Yohana Omobatisi .
41006025	Erio agasoa nokoayerera as'obosio bw'omoruoti , agasaba , akabora , Nindigetie ong'e bono iga as'esani omotwe o Yohana Omobatisi .
41006026	Omoruoti akaba nogoichana mono , korende as'engecho y'eira yaye , nas'engecho y'abwo abaikaransete as'omoyega , tarigetie kwanga ,
41006027	erio omoruoti agatoma omosigari bw'abarendi baye , agachika koreta omotwe oye : akagenda , akamonacha omotwe aria echela ime ,
41006028	akareta omotwe oye as'esani , akamoa oria enyaroka , nere akamoa ng'ina ,
41006029	Aborokigwa baye bagachia koigwa amang'ana , bakagenda , bakabogoria egetondo kiaye , bakamotindeka .
41006030	Nabatomwa bagasangerereka ase Yesu ; bakamotebia amang'ana onsi ayabakorete , namang'ana onsi ayaborokereretie ,
41006031	Akabatebia , Inchuo imweka abanyene bobisi , aase atari nabanto , motimoke ake . Ekiagera barengeo abanto abange , bagocha , bakogenda , nonya neribaga tiriarenge ri'okoria .
41006032	Bakagenda as'obwato , aase atari nabanto , abobisi ,
41006033	Abanto bakabarora bakogenda , abange bakabamanya , bakaminyoka bwango , korwa emechie yonsi , bagatang'ana goika asare .
41006034	Yesu agachia goika korwa obwato , akarora emeganda emenge , akayerorera amabera , ekiagera barenge buna ching'ondi chitari nomorisia : agachaka koborokereria amange .
41006035	Goika chinsa chigaeta chinyinge chi'omobaso ang'e namogoroba , aborokigwa baye bakamochiera , bakabora , Aase aa neroro , na bono riagorobire :
41006036	bae ribaga abanto aba , erinde bagende emegondo nemechie aria naria , begorere endagera .
41006037	Akairaneria , akabatebia , Bae inwe endagera . Bakamotebia , Inee , togende togore emegati ye chidinari chimia ibere , tobae barie ?
41006038	Akabatebia , Emegati nerenga mobwate ? genda morore . Bagachia komanya , bakabora , Netano , nechinswe ibere .
41006039	Akabachika baikaransie bonsi , ebiombe , ebiombe , as'obonyansi obobese .
41006040	Bagaikaransa ase chindwaro , chindwaro , echinde emia nechinde emerongo etano .
41006041	Akayebogoria eria emegati etano nachiria chinswe ibere , akarigereria igoro , nkabisesenia , akayesamunyora eria emegati ; akabaa aborokigwa baye kobaterekera ; nachiria chinswe ibere , akabagabera bonsi .
41006042	Bakaria bonsi , bakaigota .
41006043	Bagachora ebisamunye biasamunyoretwe , bikanyara goichora ebitonga ikomi nabibere , nabo nas'ebisamunye bie chinswe .
41006044	Nabasacha bariete eria emegati iga barenge chilifu isano .
41006045	Erio akababetereria aborokigwa baye barine obwato , batang'ane kogenda ng'umbu goika Bethisaida , ekero ere akoa emeganda ribaga bagende .
41006046	Goika agachia gokora gochikana nabarabwo , akagenda egetunwa gosaba .
