41006047	Bogachia koba mogoroba , obwato bokaba gati as'enyancha , nere bweka as'ense enyomo .
41006048	Akabarora bagwechanda kong'usa obwato , ekiagera embeo yarenge korua ase bakogenda , goika akabachiera ekero gia kane kia botuko , ogotara igoro as'enyancha ; akarigia kobaetania :
41006049	nabarabwo bagachia komorora ogotara igoro as'enyancha , bagakaga nerirengari , bakaaka eriogi :
41006050	ekiagera bonsi bamoroche , bakaondoka , Bwango agakwana nabarabwo , akabatebia , remia emioyo : ninche timoiroka .
41006051	Akarina obwato ime asebare ; omwaga ogakira : bagaichana mono ;
41006052	ekiagera tibainyorete amang'ana ay'eria emegati , korende emioyo yabo iga yarenge emekong'u .
41006053	Goika bachia kwamboka bagaika ense ya Genesareti , bakabeka ekerochi .
41006054	Bachia gosoka korwa obwato ime , abanto bakamomanya bwango ,
41006055	bakagenda bwango bagaetanana ense eria yonsi , bagachaka kobabogoria namarere abo abarenge abarwaire , bakagenda ker'aase bamoigwete ng'a nao are .
41006056	Ker'aase are kogenda , asoa ebichie , gose emechie , gose emegondo , bakababeka abarwaire chichiro , bakamosorora bakune nonya nomobarero bw'eanga yaye : nabarabwo bonsi abamokunete bakagwena .
41007001	Erio Abafarisai nabande as'abariki bakorua Yerusalemu , bagasangerereka asare ,
41007002	bakabarora abande as'aborokigwa baye bakoria endagera namaboko are riko , ekiagera ataisabiri .
41007003	Ekiagera Abafarisai n'Abayahudi bonsi bataisabeti amaboko ritang'ani , tibakoria , iga babwatete engecho y'abagaka babo :
41007004	naende kobakorua echiro , batesibeti , tibakoria : naende nare amang'ana ande banyarete koyabwata , buna ogosibia ebikombe , nebinyongo , nebinto bie chitai .
41007005	Nabo baria Abafarisai nabariki bakamoboria , Naki aborokigwa bao batari gochibwata chingecho chi'abagaka , korende bakoria endagera as'amaboko are neriko ?
41007006	Akabatebia , Isaya igabanete buya inwe abang'ainereria , buna yarigetwe , Abanto aba iga bansigete as'emenwa , Korende chinkoro chiabo iga chire are nainche .
41007007	Korende iga bagonsasima ogosasima kwa bosa , Kobakworokereria borokereria ayare amachiko a mwanyabanto .
41007008	Iga mogotiga amachiko a Nyasaye , nagochibwata chingecho chia mwanyabanto .
41007009	Akabatebia , Mwayangire buya amachiko a Nyasaye ng'a monyare kobwata chingecho chiaino .
41007010	Ekiagera Musa atebete , Basike ' so na nyoko ; oyorarame ise gose ng'ina , nakwe :
41007011	korende inwe mobora , Omonto karamotebie ise gose ng'ina , egento kiane kende gionsi ng'a nanyarete gogokonya , korende nekia Korban , engecho yaye , Ekiarurwe ase Nyasaye ;
41007012	timori komotiga naende amokorere ise gose ng'ina ring'ana rinde ;
41007013	igo mogwatanana ring'ana ria Nyasaye ase chingecho chiaino chia kare mobwate ; naende namange mwayakorire omogwekano bw'aya .
41007014	Akayorangeria omoganda naende , akabatebia , Nyigwa imwensi , inyora :
41007015	tari egento kere isiko as'omonto kegosoa keranyare komobeka riko : korende ebikorua omonto nabio bikomobeka riko omonto oria ,
41007016	Omonto kare namato akoigwera , tiga aigwe .
41007017	Goika agachia gosoa ' nyomba , koyotiga omoganda , aborokigwa baye bakamoboria amang'ana as'omoreng'anio oria .
41007018	Akabatebia , Iga nainwe timori nobong'aini ? Timoinyoreti ng'a ker'egento kere isiko as'omonto , gokeramosoe , tigekonyara komobeka riko ;
41007019	ekiagera tigekomosoa enkoro , tatiga enda yoka , erio giasoka kiagwa kebara ? As'ogoteba iga , osibirie chindagera chionsi .
41007020	Akabora , Egekomosoka omonto nakio gekomobeka riko .
41007021	Ekiagera ime , as'emioyo y'abanto , igakorua amarengererio amabe , nobonyaka bwonsi ,
41007022	oboibi , oboiti , obotomani , okorengereria okobe , obobe , okong'ainereria , okogania okobe , okomogorera , okorama , oboenenu , obokayayu ;
41007023	aya onsi amabe igakorua ime , naro akamobeka omonto riko .
41007024	Akaimoka korua aria , akagenda goika chimbebe chia Turo na Sidoni , Agasoa as'enyomba , akarigia tamanyekana nomonto ; korende tanyara kobiseka .
41007025	Erio agwo omokungu omwana oye enyaroka yarenge nekerecha ki'eubi , akaigwa amang'ana aye , agacha komogwera amagoro aye .
41007026	Noria omokungu n'Omoyunani , egesaku kiaye n'Omosurofenisa . Akamosaba amosererie ekerecha korwa as'enyaroka yaye .
41007027	Akamotebia , Batige abana baigote ritang'ani : ekiagera tari buya koyebogoria endagera y'abana , gotugutera chisese .
41007028	Nere akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Nabo , Omonene ; korende nonya nechisese nyaro ase chimesa iga chikoria amatori abana .
41007029	Akamotebia , Ekiagera ase ring'ana erio , genda ; ekerecha kiarure as'enyaroka yao .
41007030	Akagenda mwaye enyomba yaye , akamonyora oria omwana bwareirie ' borere , na keria ekerecha kiamorure .
41007031	Akarua naende ase chimbebe chia Turo agaeta gati gati ya Sidoni , akagenda goika enyancha ya Galili , egati ye chimbebe chia Dekapoli .
41007032	Bakamoretera omotino , nere orenge gotutura gagokwana ; bakamosorora abeke okoboko kwaye igoro asare .
41007033	Akamwatanana korwa as'emeganda bobisi , akabeka ebiara biaye amato aye , agatwa amate , akamokuna oromeme ;
41007034	akarigereria gochia igoro , agaichana , akamotebia , Effatha , engecho yaye , Igoreka .
41007035	Bwango amato aye akaigoreka , egesibo ki'oromeme rwaye gekororoba , agakwana buya .
41007036	Akabachika tibamotebia ' monto : korende buna amentete kobakania , nabo bamentete korandia amang'ana ,
41007037	bagaichana , mono kobua , bakabora , Okorire onsi buya : emetino obakorire baigwe , namamama bakwane .
41008001	Naende amatuko aria , ekiagera nemenge mono emeganda , nabarabwo tibarenge nagento bakoria , Yesu akabarangeria aborokigwa baye , akabatebia ,
41008002	Nabaroreire amabera emeganda , ekiagera abaire amatuko atato baikaransire amo nainche , batari nagento bakoria :
41008003	nonya nimbaa ribaga bagende chinyomba chiabo nenchara , nabairwe nesiororia ; nabande mbaruete are .
41008004	Aborokigwa baye bakamoiraneria , Naki aranyare omonto kobaigotia abanto aba naiga neroro ?
41008005	Akababoria , Emegati nerenga mobwate ? Bagateba , Netano nebere .
41008006	Akabachika emeganda eikaranse inse : akayebogoria eria emegati etano nebere , gasasimire , akayesamunyora , akabaa aborokigwa baye koyeterekera emeganda ; bakayeterekera emeganda .
41008007	Iga barenge nebiswe ebike : kabisesenirie , akabora , nebi baterekere .
41008008	Bakaria , bakaigota ; bagasangereria ebitigari ebisamunye ebitonga bitano nabibere .
41008009	Nabanto bariete iga barenge chilifu inye : akabaa ribaga .
41008010	Bwango akarina obwato amo naborokigwa baye , akagenda ensemo ya Dalumanutha .
41008011	Bakaoroka Abafarisai , bagachaka koborania nere , bakarigia asare egekone korwa igoro , bakomotema .
41008012	Agaichana mono as'omoyo oye , akabora , Naki ekegori eke gekorigia egekone ? Ekeene , nabatebirie , Tigekoegwa egekone ekegori eke .
41008013	Akabatiga , akarina naende obwato ime , akagenda goika ng'umbu .
41008014	Bakeba kobogoria emegati ; nonya nas'obwato tibarenge nagento tatiga omogati oyomo bwoka .
41008015	Akabachika , akabora , Rigereria , erende nememera y'Abafarisai nememera ya Herode .
41008016	Bakaamererania barabwo ase barabwo , bakabora , Titori nemegati .
41008017	Yesu akamanya , akabatebia , Naki mokoamererania , ekiagera motari nemegati ? Timorainyora gose timoramanya ? Emioyo yaino igere emekong'u goika bono ?
41008018	More namaiso , timorochi ? more namato , timoigweti ? gose timoinyoreti ?
41008019	Ekero nayesamunyorete eria emegati etano nakobaa baria chilifu isano , mwabogoretie ebitonga birenga bichire nebisamunye ? Bakamotebia , Ikomi nabibere .
41008020	Neria etano nebere kobaa baria chilifu inye , mokabogoria ebitonga birenga bichire nebisamunye ? Bakamotebia , Bitano nabibere .
41008021	Akabatebia , Naki motarainyora ?
41008022	Bagaika Bethesaida . Bakamoretera omouko , bakamosorora amokune .
41008023	Akamobwata okoboko oria omouko , akamoira isiko as'omochie ; kamotwereire amate as'amaiso , akabeka amaboko aye igoro asare , akamoboria , Kwarorire gento ?
41008024	Akarigereria igoro , akabora , Narorire abanto ; ko nabarorire buna emete , ekogenda .
41008025	Erio naende akabeka amaboko aye igoro as'amaiso aye ; akamochika arigererie mono , akagwena , akarora ebinto bionsi boronge .
41008026	Akamotebia genda mwao , akabora , Tosoa nonya nomochie .
41008027	Yesu agasoka naborokigwa baye bakagenda emechie ya Kaisaria ya Filipo : nas'enchera , akababoria aborokigwa baye , okobaboria , Abanto iga bakobora inche ninche ng'o ?
41008028	Bakamoiraneria , bakabora , Yohana Omobatisi : nabande , Elija ; nabande , Oyomo as'ababani .
41008029	Akababoria , Nainwe mokobora ng'a ninche ng'o ? Petere akamoiraneria akamotebia , Aye naye Kristo .
41008030	Akabachika tibamotebia ' monto amang'ana aye .
41008031	Agachaka koborokereria , ng'a nemogwenerete Omwana-o-mwanyabanto konyora emechando emenge , nakwangwa nabagaka , nabakuani abanene , nabariki , nagoitwa , na nyuma as'amatuko atato naboke .
41008032	Agakwana amang'ana aya maiso marore . Petero akamoira agachaka komokama .
41008033	Ageonchora , akabarigereria aborokigwa baye , akamokania Petero , akabora , Irana nyuma yane , Saitani : ekiagera toyarengerereti aya Nyasaye , korende naya mwanyabanto .
41008034	Akabarangeria emeganda naborokigwa baye , akabatebia , Oyorigetie gontunyana , ekanye omonyene , etweke omosalaba oye , antunyane .
41008035	Ekiagera oyorarigie gokonya obogima bwaye , nabosirie ; nemento orasiiie obogima bwaye as'engecho yane nas'engecho y'enchili , oyio nabokonye .
41008036	Naki aramogwenere omonto koyenyora ense yonsi , ko nere asirie obogima bwaye ?
41008037	Gose omonto inki ararue ribaga ri'obogima bwaye ?
41008038	Naki oyio oranyare kondorera obosoku inche namang'ana ane as'ekegori eke ki'obotomani nebibe , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto namororere obosoku ere gagocha as'obonene bw'Ise amo namalaika amachenu .
41009001	Akabatebia , ekeene nabatebirie , Mbare abanto as'aba bateneine aiga , abataigwe amakweri , goika baborore obonda bwa Nyasaye bogocha nechinguru .
41009002	Goika nyuma as'amatuko atano narimo Yesu akabaira Petero , na Yakobo , na Yohana , akabaira igoro as'egetunwa egetambe barabwo boka : agaonchoka ekieni kiaye asebare :
41009003	chianga chiaye chikamekameka , chikaba chindabu mono , buna omorosia bw'ense atanyare gochikora chindabu .
41009004	Bakaorokerwa n'Elija amo na Musa : nabarabwo iga barenge gokwana na Yesu .
41009005	Petero akairaneria akamotebia Yesu , Omonene , mbuya intwe koba aiga : koranche tokore ebigutu bitato ; ekemo ekiao , ekemo ekia Musa , nekemo ki'Elija .
41009006	Engecho yaye tamanyete eki agokwana ; ekiagera babete nomoondoko emonene .
41009007	Rikabao rire , rikababeka ekiriri : eriogi rikarua ase rire riria , Oyo n'Omwana one , omwanchwa one : moigwere .
41009008	Erio bwango kobarigereria aria naria , tibarora ' monto , tatiga Yesu bweka amo nabarabwo .
41009009	Kabagotirimboka korwa egetunwa , akabachika tibamotebia ' monto ayabaroche , goika Omwana-o-mwanyabanto kabokire korwa as'amakweri .
41009010	Bakaribwata ring'ana riria , bakaborania barabwo ase barabwo , ng'a okoboka korwa amakweri engecho yaye inki .
41009011	Bakamoboria , bakobora , Abariki iga bagoteba ng'a nemogwenerete Elija ache ritang'ani .
41009012	Akairaneria akabatebia , Nekeene Elija ochire ritang'ani , nakorosia onsi : korende , amo naya , naki arikire Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ng'a nachandwe namange nagochaywa ?
41009013	Korende nabatebirie , Elija otiekire gocha , nabarabwo bakamokorera onsi aya barigetie , buna arikeretwe .
41009014	Kabaikera aborokigwa , bakarora emeganda emenge abaetanaine , abariki bakoborania nabarabwo .
41009015	Erio emeganda yonsi , kobakomorora , bagaichana mono , bakamochiera bwango bakamokwania .
41009016	Akababoria , Ninki mokoborania nabarabwo ?
41009017	Omonto oyomo as'emeganda akamoiraneria , Omworokia , Namoreta omwana one asore , nare nekerecha ki'erimama ;
41009018	na gokiamobokire , iga gekomogaragaria : arua risombogoku , nakoriania amaino , as'ayio chinguru chiaye chisira : ngakwana naborokigwa bao banyare kogeseria ; tibanyara .
41009019	Akabairaneria , akabora , Inwe ekegori getari nokwegena , nimbe nainwe goika ririri ? nindemererie nainwe goika ririri ? mondetere .
41009020	Bakamoreta asare : ekero kiamorora , bwango keria ekerecha gekamogaragaria ; akagwa inse , akegaragaria , agasokia risombogoku ,
41009021	Akamoboria ise , Nkorua kero ki anyoretwe naya ? Agateba , Nkorwa obwana bwaye .
41009022	Ara aange kemoruta as'omorero nas'amache , kemosirie , korende koranyare ring'ana , tororere amabera , otokonye ,
41009023	Yesu akamotebia , Koranyare kwegena , onsi iga akonyarekana asare oyobwanchire .
41009024	Bwango ise oria omwana akaaka eriogi , akabora , Nanchire , nkonya as'ogotancha kwane .
41009025	Nere Yesu akarora ng'a emeganda ngosangererekanere bwango , akagekania keria ekerecha ki'eubi , agagetebia , Aye ekerecha rimama nomotino , inche nagochikire , mosoke , tomoiranera naende .
41009026	Gekarera , gekamogaragaria mono , gekamosoka ; akaba buna oyokure ; goika abange bakabora , Okure .
41009027	Korende Yesu akamobwata okoboko , akamoimokia ; nere agatenena .
41009028	Goika agachia gosoa enyomba , aborokigwa baye bakomoboria bobisi , Naki intwe totanyara kogeseria ?
41009029	Akabatebia , as'ayio tigekonyara korwa ase ring'ana rinde rionsi , tatiga as'ogosaba nokweng'ata .
41009030	Bakarua aria , bagaeta gati gati ya Galili ; nere tancha ' monto amanye .
41009031	Ekiagera arenge kworokereria aborokigwa baye , akabatebia , Ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare kobekwa as'amaboko abanto , nabarabwo nabamoite ; goika gatiekire goitwa , nyuma as'amatuko atato naboke .
41009032	Nabarabwo tibarimanya ring'ana riria , bakairoka komoboria .
41009033	Bagaika Kaperinaum : goika agachia koba ' nyomba , akababoria , Ninki mware koamererania ' nchera ?
41009034	Bagakira : ekiagera barenge koamererania barabwo ase barabwo , ning'o ore omonene .
41009035	Agaikaransa inse , akabarangeria ikomi nababere ; akabatebia , Omonto origetie koba oyo bwe ritang'ani , nabe oyo bw'omoerio kobua bonsi , nomokoreri o bonsi .
41009036	Akabogoria omwana omoke , akamobeka gati gati yabo ; akamoagata , akabatebia ,
41009037	Omonto oramwanche omwana oyomo buna oyo as'erieta riane , onyanchire inche : nomonto oranyanche inche , tanyancheti inche , korende ere oyontomete .
41009038	Yohana akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Omworokia , ntwamorora omonto ogoseria ebirecha as'erieta riao : tokamokania , ekiagera tari gototunya intwe .
41009039	Yesu agateba , Timomokania , ekiagera tari ' monto onde oranyare kobikora ebikone as'erieta riane , anyare ekero ekio ekio gonteba bobe .
41009040	Ekiagera oyo atari ao naintwe , nas'ensemo yaito are .
41009041	Ekiagera onde bwonsi orabasibie inwe egekombe ki'amache as'erieta riane , ekiagera inwe naba Kristo more , ekeene nabatebirie , tegosira eng'eria yaye nonya ng'ake .
41009042	Nonde bwonsi oranyare komogocha oyomo as'abake aba banyanchete , mbuya asiberwe rigena ri'ogosia rigoti riaye , nagotugutwa enyancha ime .
41009043	Nokoboko kwao gokorakogoche , konache : mbuya gosoa as'obogima kore ekerema , kobua koba namaboko abere , nakogenda ase riera rie chaanam , as'omorero otakorimeka :
41009044	aase amakonde abo atagokwa , nonya nomorero otakorimeka .
41009045	Nokogoro kwao gokorakogoche , konache : mbuya gosoa as'obogima kore egesegora , kobua koba namagoro abere , nagotugutwa ase riera rie chaanam .
41009046	Ekiagera amakonde abo tagokwa , nomorero tokorimeka .
41009047	Neriso riao korirakogoche , ritugute : mbuya gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye kore egetong'o , kobua koba namaiso abere , nagotugutwa ase riera ri'omorero :
41009048	aase amakonde abo atagokwa , nomorero otakorimeka .
41009049	Ekiagera ker'omonto nabekwe omonyo as'omonyo .
41009050	Omonyo nomuya , korende omonyo korasire obwansu bwaye , namoyobeke ki bwanse ? Mobe nomonyo asemore ime , moikaranse as'omorembe inwe as'inwe .
41010001	Akaimoka korwa agwo , agaika chimbebe chia Boyahudi , as'enchera ng'umbu ya Yorodan ; abanto abange bagasangerereka naende bakamochiera ; akaborokereria naende , buna anarete .
41010002	Abafarisai bakamochiera , bakamoboria , Inee , mboronge omonto komotiga mokaye ? bakomotema .
41010003	Nere akabairaneria , akabatebia , Inki Musa abachigete ?
41010004	Bagateba , Musa igaruete ribaga korika rirube ri'ogotigana , nakomotiga .
41010005	Yesu akabatebia , Nas'obokong'u bw'emioyo yaino abarikerete amachiko aya .
41010006	Korende korwa omochakano bw'ogotongwa gw'ense , Nyasaye iga abakorete omosacha nomokungu .
41010007	Ekiagera as'ayio omonto namotige ise na ng'ina , abwatane na mokaye ;
41010008	nabwo babere nababe omobere oyomo : goika tibaba babere naende , korende omobere oyomo .
41010009	Nabo ebiasang'ananirie Nyasaye , mwanyabanto tabiatanana .
41010010	As'enyomba naende aborokigwa bakamoboria engecho ye ring'ana erio .
41010011	Akabatebia , Ker'omonto oramotige mokaye , nakonyuoma oyonde , otomanire igoro asare :
41010012	nomokungu karamotige omosacha oye , nakonyuomwa nomonto onde , otomanire .
41010013	Bakamoretera abana abake , erinde anyare kobakuna : aborokigwa baye bakabakania .
41010014	Korende Yesu agachia korora , akabea mono , akabatebia , Batige abana abake bache asende ; timobatanga : naki obonda bw'igoro nobwabo omoreng'anio bw'aba .
41010015	Ekeene nabatebirie , Onde bwonsi otancheti obonda bwa Nyasaye buna omwana omoke tagosoa nonya ng'ake .
41010016	Akabaimokia as'amaboko aye , akabasesenia , okobeka amaboko aye igoro asebare .
41010017	Goika agachia koba ogosoka kogenda enchera , omonto oyomo agacha bwango , akamotung'amera , akamoboria , Omworokia omuya , nki ndakore inyare koba nobogima bwa kare nakare ?
41010018	Yesu akamotebia , Naki okondoka omuya ? tari omuya tatiga oyomo , nere Nyasaye .
41010019	Kwayamanyire amachiko , Toita , Totomana , Toiba , Toteba oborimo , Tong'aina , Basike'so na nyoko .
41010020	Akamotebia , Omworokia , aya onsi nayabwatire korwa obwana bwane .
41010021	Yesu akamorigereria mono , akamwancha , akamotebia , Kwaremeirwe ring'ana erimo : genda , ogore ebiore nabio bionsi , obae abataka , naye nobe nemonga igoro , erio oche , bwetweke omosalaba oo , ontunyane .
41010022	Korende ere akanyiria obosio ase ring'ana riria , akagenda nobororo , ekiagera arenge nebinto ebinge .
41010023	Yesu akarigereria chinsemo chionsi , akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Nabe aakong'u naki as'abanyene enibo gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye !
41010024	Aborokigwa bagaichana as'amang'ana aye , Yesu akairaneria naende , akabatebia , Abana , nabe aakong'u naki as'abagosemeria enibo gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye !
41010025	Mbwango engamia goeta as'engoro y'esindani , kobua omonda gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
41010026	Nabarabwo bagaichana mono , bakaborania , Ning'o rende , oranyare gokonyeka ?
41010027	Yesu akabarigereria akabora , Ase mwanyabanto takonyarekana , korende ase Nyasaye taibo : ekiagera onsi iga akonyarekana ase Nyasaye .
41010028	Petero agachaka komotebia , Rora , intwe twatigire bionsi , twagotunyanire .
41010029	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , Ekeene , nabatebirie , tari omonto otigire enyomba , gose bamura bamwabo , gose basubati bamwabo , gose ise , gose ng'ina , gose mokaye , gose abana , gose emegondo , as'engecho yane , gose as'engecho y'enchili ,
41010030	tatiga naegwe ara emia as'ekero kia bono , chinyomba , nabamura bamwabo , nabasubati bamwabo , nabang'ina , nabana , nemegondo , amo nemechando ; nas'ense egocha obogima bwa kare nakare .
41010031	Korende abange abare be ritang'ani nababe aba nyuma ; naba nyuma nababe abe ritang'ani .
41010032	Bakaba ' nchera , bagotira kogenda Yerusalemu ; na Yesu igarenge kobatang'ana : bagaichana ; abatunyanete bakairoka . Akabaira naende baria ikomi nababere , agachaka kobatebia ebirage bi'amang'ana agocha komonyora ,
41010033	akabora , Rigereria , ngotiratore kogenda Yerusalemu ; n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nabekwe amaboko abakuani abanene nabariki ; nabamogambie akwe , nabamobeke amaboko ebisaku :
41010034	nabarabwo nabamochecherie , nakomoaka chinkini , nakomotwera amate , nakomoita ; nyuma as'amatuko atato naboke .
41010035	Yakobo na Yohana , abana ba Zebedi , bakamochiera , bakamotebia , Omworokia , morigetie otokorere rinde rionsi toranyare gososaba .
41010036	Akabatebia , Morigetie mbakorere ki ?
41010037	Bakamotebia , Otwanchere intwe toikaranse , oyomo okoboko kwao gw'okorio , noyomo okoboko kwao gw'okobee as'obonene bwao .
41010038	Yesu akabatebia , Timomanyeti eke mogonsaba . Namonyare konywera egekombe nkonywera inche ? nakobatiswa ebatiso mbatisire inche ?
41010039	Bakamotebia , Natonyare . Yesu akabatebia , Egekombe nkonywera inche namokenywere , nebatiso mbatisire inche namobatiswe :
41010040	korende engecho y'ogoikaransa okoboko kwane gw'okorio nokoboko kwane gw'okobee tindi nogochika kobaa : tatiga barabwo baraegwe abagacheirwe .
41010041	Ekero baria ikomi bachia koigwa , bagachaka kobabea Yakobo na Yohana .
41010042	Yesu akabarangeria , akabatebia , Mwamanyire ng'a baria babarirwe koba abagambi b'Ebisaku bakobagambera nechinguru ; nabanene babo bakobachika barabwo .
41010043	Korende takoba bo asemore : korende omonto origetie koba omonene asemore , nabe omokoreri oino .
41010044	Nomonto orarigie koba oyo bwe ritang'ani asemore , nabe omosomba o bonsi .
41010045	Ekiagera Omwana-o-mwanyabanto tachete gokorerwa , korende gokora , nakorua obogima bwaye bobe okoboria kw'abange .
41010046	Bagaika Yeriko : goika agachia koba okobwatia enchera korwa Yeriko , amo naborokigwa baye nomoganda omonene , omwana o Timayo , Baritimayo , oria omouko , igarenge oikaransete ensemo y'enchera , ogosaba ebiegwa .
41010047	Agachia koigwa ng'a Yesu Omonasereti , agachaka koaka egeturi , nagoteba , Yesu omwana o Daudi , onyabere .
41010048	Abanto abange bakamotogonyera , ng'a anyare gokira : korende akamenta koaka egeturi kobua , Omwana o Daudi , onyabere .
41010049	Yesu agatenena , akabora , Morangerie . Bakamorangeria oria omouko , bakamotebia , Remia omoyo , imoka , okorangeirie .
41010050	Nere , agatuguta eanga yaye , agacharoka , akamochiera Yesu .
41010051	Yesu akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Ninki origetie ngokorere ? Oria omouko okamotebia , Rabii , inyare korora naende .
41010052	Yesu akamotebia , Genda : okwegena kwao kwagokonyire . Erio kegima akanyara korora , naende agatunyana Yesu gochia nchera .
41011001	Goika agachia goika Yerusalemu , ang'e na Bethifage , na Bethania , as'egetunwa ki'Emezeituni , akabatoma babere as'aborokigwa baye ,
41011002	akabatebia , Genda goika oria omochie mokoorokera , erio kamogosoa aroro , namonyerore emori y'etigere esibire , etana korinwa nomonto ; yesibore , moyendetere .
41011003	Nomonto karababorie , Naki mogokora iga ? teba , Omonene nayerigetie ; na bwango nayeiranie aa .
41011004	Bakagenda , bakayerora emori y'etigere esibire geita , isiko as'enchera enene ; bakayesibora .
41011005	Abande b'abanto bateneine aroro bakababorera , Naki mogokora mokoyesibora emori y'etigere ?
41011006	Bakabatebia buna Yesu abachigete : bakabatiga bagende .
41011007	Bakamoretera Yesu emori eria y'etigere , bakara chianga igoro asere ; agaikaransa igoro asere .
41011008	Abanto abange bakara chianga chiabo enchera ; abande bakanacha chinsagia chi'emete nagochiara enchera .
41011009	Abanto abatang'aine , nabaria bare komotunya , bakaaka eriogi , bakobora , Hosana ( otokonye ) ; nasesenigwe oyochire as'erieta ri'Omontne :
41011010	bwasesenigwe , oboruoti bogocha , oboruoti bwa tata oito Daudi : Otokonye bono , aye ore igoro .
41011011	Yesu agasoa Yerusalemu , goika ase hekalu ime : karigereria chinsemo chionsi , ekiagera iga kiarenge ekero kia mogoroba , agasoka akagenda Bethania amo nabaria ikomi nababere .
41011012	Goika mambia kobakorua Bethania akaigwa enchara .
41011013	Akarora korwa are omoko ore namato , akagenda , erinde gose narore egento igoro asore : agachia goika tarora gento tatiga amato ; ekiagera tikiarenge ekero ki'amako .
41011014	Yesu akairaneria , akayotebia , Korwa bono goika kare nakare omonto taria amatunda ao . Aborokigwa baye bakaigwa .
41011015	Bagoika Yerusalemu : Yesu agasoa ase hekalu ime , agachaka kobaseria abanto barenge kogora nagotonda ime ase hekalu , agaonchora chimesa chi'abare koonchoreria chifetha , nebirogo biabo abare gotonda amaruma ;
41011016	tatiga omonto abogorie egento as'egati ye hekalu .
41011017	Akorokereria , okobatebia , Tiyarigetwe , Enyomba yane nerokwe enyomba y'ogosaba as'ebisaku bionsi ? korende inwe mwayekorire koba ribwago ri'abauri .
41011018	Abariki n'Abakuani abanene bakanyora amang'ana bakarigia enchera y'okomosiria : ekiagera bamoirogete , naki emeganda yonsi egaichana as'obong'aini bwaye .
41011019	Kobwaba mogoroba akarua omochie .
41011020	Na mambia kobagoeta , bakayorora oria omoko bwomire bwonsi korwa as'emeri yaye .
41011021	Petero okoinyora amang'ana aye , akamotebia , Rabi , rora , omoko kwaragereretie bwomire .
41011022	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Mobe nokwegena ase Nyasaye .
41011023	Ekeene , nabatebirie , onde bwonsi oragetebie egetunwa eke , Tegoka , getugutwe enyancha ; oyo atakoreti ogosiereria omoyo oye , korende anchete ng'a ayio ateba nabe ; nakoreke ayio .
41011024	As'ayio nabatebirie , ebinto bionsi morasabe ; ancha ng'a mwabinyorire nabirobio nabibe ebiaino .
41011025	Nainwe , kera komogotenena nagosaba , abera , onye more nering'ana as'omonto ; erinde Iso oino ore igoro ababere nainwe okomocha kwaino .
41011026	Onyore inwe timokwabera ? nonya Iso oino ore igoro takobabera inwe okomocha kwaino .
41011027	Bagaika Yerusalemu naende ; ekero agotara hekalu , bakamochiera abakuani abanene nabariki nabagaka ;
41011028	bakamotebia , Nas'ogochika ki ogokorera aya ? Gose ning'o okoeire ogochika oko okoyakorera aya ?
41011029	Yesu akairaneria akabatebia , Ninche nimbaborie ring'ana erimo , nainwe mogontchia , erio nimbatebie as'ogochika ki ngokorera aya .
41011030	Ebatiso ya Yohana , iga eruete igoro , gose nase mwanyabanto ? ng'iranerie .
41011031	Bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , bakobora , Gatoratebe , Nkorua igoro ; nabore , Naki , rende motamwancheti ?
41011032	Gose gatoratebe , nkorwa ase mwanyabanto bakairoka abanto : ekiagera abanto bonsi bamomanyire Yohana ng'a nomobani bw'ekeene ;
41011033	Bakamoiraneria Yesu , bakobora , Titomanyeti . Yesu akabatebia , Nonya ninche tinkobatebia inwe as'ogochika ki ngokorera aya .
41012001	Agachaka gokwana nabarabwo as'emereng'anio . Omonto osimegete omogondo bw'emesabibu , agaetanania orobago , akarema agakora egetera akomitera , akaagacha egesasimo , akabeka abaremi , akamanora kogenda ense eng'ao .
41012002	Goika ekero gi'okwama kwaye agatoma omosomba ase abaremi baria , erinde anyore as'abaremi ensemo y'amatunda emesabibu .
41012003	Bakamobwata , bakamoaka , bakamosokia isiko tari nagento .
41012004	Agatoma naende asebare omosomba onde ; noyio bakamoaka chingoma as'omotwe , bakamosokia obekirwe obosoku .
41012005	Akamotoma oyonde ; noyio bakamoita ; nabande abange ; bakabaaka abande , nabande bakabaita .
41012006	Narenge nomwana oyomo ataratoma , omwanchani oye : oyo nere akamotoma asebare nyuma , akabora , Nabamosike omwana one .
41012007	Baria abaremi bagatchania , Oyo nomonyamwando ; gaki , tomoite , omwando obe oyoito .
41012008	Bakamobwata , bakamoita , bakamotuguta isiko as'omogondo bw'emesabibu .
41012009	Bono inki arakore oria omonene bw'emesabibu ? nachiche nakobasiria baria abaremi , noria omogondo bw'emesabibu nabae abande .
41012010	Nonya neririko eri timorarisoma ; Rigena abaagachi bangete , Riabaire rigena rinene ri'ekona ;
41012011	Riarure as'Omonene ring'ana eri , Narirorio nogokumia as'amaiso aito ?
41012012	Bakarigia komobwata ; bakairoka emeganda ; ekiagera bamanyete ng'a oria omoreng'anio nabwo agoteba : bakamotiga , bakagenda .
41012013	Bagatoma asare abande b'Abafarisai n'Abaherodiani , erinde bamobwate as'amang'ana .
41012014	Bagachia goika bakamotebia , Omworokia , twamanyire ng'a aye igore omonto bw'ekeene , gose torengerereti ' monto onde : ekiagera tori korigereria chieni bi'abanto . korende as'ekeene okoyiorokereria enchera ya Nyasaye : Inee , mboronge komoa Kaisari ebango gose taibo ?
41012015	Tomoe , gose titomoa ? Nere konya omanyire obong'ainereria bwabo , akabatebia , Naseki mogontema ? nyendetere eshilingi nyerore .
41012016	Bakayereta . Akabatebia , Nekiang'o ekieni eke namariko aya ? Bakamotebia , nebia Kaisari .
41012017	Yesu akairaneria akabatebia , Moe Kaisari chire bia Kaisari , nebia Nyasaye moe Nyasaye . Bakamokumia mono .
41012018	N'Abasadukai , nabanto bagotcha ng'a koboka tikori , bakamochiera ; bakamoboria , bakobora ,
41012019	Omworokia , Musa natorikerete , ng'a omomura omwabo omonto karakwe , amotige omokungu oye , onye tari nomwana , momura omwabo amotware oria omokungu oye , omonyorere omomura omwabo abana .
41012020	Nabo mbarenge abamura batano nababere : oyo bwe ritang'ani akabogoria omokungu , agakwa , tatiga abana ;
41012021	noyokabere nere akamotwaia , agakwa , nonya nere tatiga abana ; nonya noyo gatato bo ;
41012022	bakamotwara bonsi batano nababere tibatiga abana . Omoerio o bonsi oria omokungu agakwa nere .
41012023	Inee ! As'okobokigwa nabe mokang'o as'aba ? ekiagera bonsi batano nababere mbarenge nere .
41012024	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Inee ! Timori gosira ekiagera as'aya , ekiagera timomanyeti amariko , nonya nokobua kwa Nyasaye ?
41012025	Ekiagera kobaraboke korwa as'amakweri , tibakonyuoma gose tibakonyuomerigwa ; korende iga barabe buna amalaika bare igoro ,
41012026	Nas'amang'ana ebitondo , buna bakoboka ; timwanya gosoma as'ebuku ya Musa , egesieri ki'Omote , buna Nyasaye amotebetie , okobora , Inche Nyasaye o Ibrahimu , na Nyasaye o Isaaka , na Nyasaye o Yakobo ?
41012027	Ere tari Nyasaye bw'abakure , korende bw'abare moyo ; as'ayio iga mogosira mono .
41012028	Oyomo ase abariki agacha akabaigwa bagotebania nere , akamanya ng'a obairaneirie buya , akamoboria , As'amachiko onsi ndiriri rire rie ritang'ani ?
41012029	Yesu akamoiraneria , As'amachiko onsi eri rie ritang'ani nario eri , Igwa , Israeli ; Omonene Nyasaye oito , n'Omonene oyomo :
41012030	naye mwanche Omonene Nyasaye oo nomoyo oo bwonsi , nenkoro yao yonsi , nobong'aini bwao bwonsi , nechinguru chiao chionsi .
41012031	Nogwa kabere koreng'aine nakwo , noko , Mwanche omogisangi oo buna omobere oo . Amachiko tari amanene kobua aya .
41012032	Oria omoriki akamotebia , Ekeene , Omworokia , gwatebire buya ng'a Nyasaye noyomo , nonde tari tatiga ere :
41012033	nakomwancha as'omoyo bwonsi , nas'okoinyora gwonsi , nas'enkoro yonsi , nase chinguru chionsi , nakomwancha omogisangi oo buna omobere oo , nkogwenerete kobua omosango bwonsi nebing'wanso bionsi .
41012034	Yesu , agachia korora ng'a iga airaneria as'obong'aini , akamotebia , Aye tori are nobonda bwa Nyasaye . Erio nyuma omonto tamoboria ring'ana naende .
41012035	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , gakworokereria ime ase hekalu , Naki abariki bakobora ng'a Kristo n'Omwana o Daudi ?
41012036	Ekiagera Daudi omonyene iga atebete , as'Omoika Omochenu , Omonene akamotebia Omonene one , Ikaransa okoboko kwane gw'okorio , Goika mbakore ababisa bao koba inse as'amagoro ao .
41012037	Daudi omonyene iga akomoroka Omonene ; nabo naki aba omwana oye ? Noria omoganda omonene iga orenge komoigwa as'omogoko .
41012038	Akabatebia as'okworokereria kwaye , Erende nabariki , abanchete gotara beboete chianga chintambe , nagokwanigwa chichiro ,
41012039	nagoikaransa aas'eritang'ani as'obosio bw'esunagogi , naase eritang'ani ase emeyega .
41012040	Bakoria chinyomba chi'ababoraka , nase obong'ainereria basaba ogosaba ogotambe ; aba nabanyore ekina ekere ekenene .
41012041	Yesu agaikaransa koyerigereria esanduku y'emonga , akarigereria buna emeganda ekobeka chifetha as'esanduku : abange abarenge abanda bakabeka chinyinge .
41012042	Agacha omokungu oyomo , omoboraka , omotaka , akabeka ebisamunye bibere bie chitai , rigori ri'enusu y'ebesa eyenio .
41012043	Akabarangeria aborokigwa baye , akabatebia , Ekeene , nabatebirie , Oyo omoboraka omotaka obekire chinyinge kobua bonsi abakobeka as'esanduku y'emonga :
41012044	ekiagera aba bonsi iga babeka korwa as'obonge bw'enibo yabo ; korende oyo as'okoremerwa kwaye obekire bionsi ebiarenge nabio , nonya nobogima bwaye bwonsi .
41013001	Goika gachia gosoka korwa hekalu , oyomo bw'aborokigwa baye akamotebia , Omworokia , naki as'amagena nas'amaagacho !
41013002	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Noroche amaagacho aya amanene ? Aa tirigotigara rigena igoro ase rigena rinde , eritanyare gotagorwa .
41013003	Erio gaikaransire as'egetunwa ki'Emezeituni , korigereria hekalu , Petero na Yakobo na Yohana na Anderea bakamoboria bobisi ,
41013004	Totebie aya ndi arabe ? nkemanyererio ki'ekero ki'aya onsi arabe ang'e goikerana ?
41013005	Yesu akairaneria , agachaka kobatebia , Erende omonto tabang'aina nakobasiria .
41013006	Ekiagera abange nabache as'erieta riane , babore , Inche ninche ere ; nabasirie abange .
41013007	Naende komoraigwe esegi namang'ana esegi , timoichana : naki bori nabe aya onsi , k'omoerio toracha .
41013008	Naki egesaku nakeimoke korwana negesaku , nobonda naborwane nobonda : nobe omotengecho ase chinsemo chinsemo ; nebe nenchara : aya naro omochakanobw'obororo .
41013009	Nainwe mwerende emebere yaino : ekiagera nababaire as'amatongo ; nase chisunagogi namoakwe ; namoirwe gotenena as'amasio abagavuna nas'abaruoti as'engecho yane , koba kirori asebare .
41013010	Naende negwenerete enchili erandigwe ritang'ani as'ebisaku bionsi .
41013011	Ekero bakobaira as'ekina , kobabeka as'amaboko abanto , timochaka gwechanda korengereria ayamorigetie gokwana : korende rionsi moraegwe as'ensa eria , rikwane : ekiagera tari inwe mogokwana , korende n'Omoika Omochenu .
41013012	Na momura omwabo namorwe oyomwabo erinde aitwe , naise nomwana oye ; nabana nabaimoke igoro as'ababaibori babo , kobaita .
41013013	Nainwe namogechwe nabanto bonsi as'engecho y'erieta riane , korende oyoraremererie goika omoerio , oyio nakonyeke .
41013014	Korende komorakorore ogosareka kw'obobe , gogotenena aas'atagwenereti , ( oyogosoma ainyore ) , erio abare ase Boyahudi batamere ebitunwa :
41013015	nere oyore igoro as'ekerama taika gosoa enyomba ime , gose tasoa kobogoria egento korwa mwaye :
41013016	nere oyore as'omogondo tairana nyuma koyebogoria eanga yaye ,
41013017	Obobe nobwabo abare ' barito , nabarabwo abakogonkia amatuko aria !
41013018	Saba ogotama kwaino tikoba ekero ki'obokendu .
41013019	Ekiagera amatuko aria nebe emechando , engecho etana koba korwa omochakano bw'ogotonga atongete Nyasaye goika bono , gose tekoba bo naende nonya ng'ake .
41013020	Naende onye Omonene atayanachete amatuko aria , anga takonyegete omonto onde bwonsi ; korende as'engecho y'abachore , abachorete , oyanachire amatuko aria .
41013021	Nekero ekio omonto karabatebia , Rora , Oyo nere Kristo ; gose , Oria aria ; timwancha :
41013022	ekiagera nabaimoke Amakristo oborimo , nababani b'oborimo , nabaorokie ebikone nogokumia , banyare kobasiria , nonya mbaria abachorwa ,
41013023	Korende inwe mwerende : rora , natiekire koborokia onsi ritang'ani .
41013024	Korende amatuko aria , nyuma as'emechando eria , erioba naribekwe omosunte , nomotienyi tokorua omobaso oye ,
41013025	neching'enang'eni chi'igoro nachibe nkogwachire , nechinguru chire igoro nachitengechigwe .
41013026	Erio nario baramorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ogocha namare amo nechinguru chinyinge nobonene .
41013027	Erio nabatome amalaika aye , nakobasangereria abachorwa baye korwa chinsemo chie chimbeo inye , na korwa ensemo y'omoerio bw'ense goika ensemo y'omoerio o igoro .
41013028	As'omoko eorokererie omoreng'anio : orosagia rwaye korwachakire koba orobese , nakoorokia amato aye , mwamanyire ng'a ng'ang'e nekero gi'okwama ;
41013029	naboigo nainwe , komokoyarora aya aorokire , inyora ng'a abaire ang'e nagesieri .
41013030	Nekeene , nabatebirie , Ekegori eke tigegoeta nonya ng'ake goika aya onsi anyare koba .
41013031	Igoro nense nabiete ko amang'ana ane tagoeta nonya ng'ake .
41013032	Korende amang'ana erituko riria neusa eria onde tari omanyete , nonya namalaika are igoro , nonya n'Omwana , tatiga Tata .
41013033	Rigereria , renda , saba : ekiagera timomanyeti ekero keria keranyare koba .
41013034	Iga are buna omonto orekogenda ense eng'ao , konye otigire enyomba yaye , obaeire ogochika abasomba baye , naker'omonto emeremo yaye , akamochika omorendi arende .
41013035	Renda boigo : ekiagera timomanyeti kagocha omonene bw'enyomba , gose mogoroba , gose mbotuko gati , gose etuoni gekogweya , gose mambia ;
41013036	tacha ababosokane abanyore mwararire ,
41013037	Nerio nabatebirie inwe , nabatebirie inwe mwensi , Renda .
41014001	Nyuma as'amatuko abere rikaba rituko rinene ri'epasaka , nemegati etabekiri ememera : abakuani abanene nabariki bakarigia enchera bakomobwatera nechisemi , banyare komoita :
41014002	ekiagera batebete , Tari ekero kie rituko rinene , tanyara gocha koba riroroche as'abanto .
41014003	Ne rigoro arenge Bethania as'enyomba ya Simon oyorenge noborwaire bw'ukoma , gaikaransete as'endagera , agacha omokungu orenge nechuba engiya , ere namaguta amanukato agotioka buya , ay'erigori rinene ; akayiata echuba y'ogotioka , akamonyororokeria omotwe oye .
41014004	Mbarenge abanto bagechetigwe as'emioyo yabo , bakabora , Naseki gosiria amaguta engecho buna eye ?
41014005	Ekiagera amaguta aya anga nagorwa chidinari chimia isato nakobua , baegwe abataka , Bakamwemurunganeria omokungu oria mono .
41014006	Yesu agateba , Motige ; naseki mokomorosia ? onkoreire emeremo emiya .
41014007	Ekiagera amatuko onsi iga more nabataka amo nainwe , nakera eki mwanchete kobakorera namonyare kobakorera amaya ; korende timori nainche amatuko onsi .
41014008	Okorire eki anyarete : ong'akire omobere amanukato as'engecho y'ogotindekwa kwane .
41014009	Nekeene , nabatebirie , ker'aase ekorandigwa enchili as'ense yonsi , neri akora oyo nariatorwe as'okoinyora kwaye .
41014010	Yudas Omoisikariota , nere noyomo bwa baria ikomi nababere , akagenda as'abakuani abanene , anyare komorua asebare .
41014011	Nabarabwo , bagachia koigwa bakagoka , bagatebania komoa chifetha . Akarigia enchera akomorwera as'ekero kegwenerete .
41014012	Goika rituko rie ritang'ani ri'emegati etari nememera , ekero gi'okonyenya epasaka , aborokigwa baye bakamotebia , Ng'ai origetie togende tokoroserie oriere epasaka ?
41014013	Agatoma babere as'aborokigwa baye , akabatebia , Genda omochie namoumerane nomosacha obogoretie enyongo y'amache : motunyane ;
41014014	naande onsi arasoe , motebie omonyene enyomba , Omworokia otebire , Ng'ai ere enyomba y'abageni , ndiere epasaka amo naborokigwa bane ?
41014015	Nere omonyene naborokie enyomba enene y'igoro , yaroisigwe yabaire : agwo toroserie .
41014016	Aborokigwa bagasoka , bakagenda omochie , bakarora buna abatebetie : bakarosia epasaka .
41014017	Riachikoba mogoroba ogocha amo naikomi nababere .
41014018	Nabarabwo kobaikaransire as'endagera , bakoria , Yesu akabora , Nekeene nabatebirie , oyomo oino oyokoria amo nainche , nandwe .
41014019	Bagachaka goichana , bakamoboria oyomo oyomo , Ninche ?
41014020	Akabatebia , Noyomo bw'aba ikomi nababere , ere oyogosoyia amo nainche as'esani .
41014021	Ekiagera Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare buna arikeretwe : korende obobe nobwaye omonto oria , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto arurwe nere ! mbuya asare nonya ataiboretwe omonto oria .
41014022	Nabarabwo bakaba nkoriabare , akabogoria omogati , kayosesenirie , akayosamunyora , akabaa , akabora , Bogoria : oyo noro omobere one .
41014023	Akabogoria egekombe , kagesesenirie , akabaa : bagakenywera bonsi .
41014024	Akabatebia , Aya namanyinga ane , ay'emuma enyia , aitekire as'engecho y'abange .
41014025	Ekeene , nabatebirie , Tinkonywa naende nonya ng'ake okwalna Uw'emesabibu , goika rituko riria ndache konywa enyia as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
41014026	Kobakorire ogotera , bagasoka kogenda egetunwa ki'Emezeituni .
41014027	Na Yesu akabatebia , Namogochwe imwensi , naki arigetwe , Nimoake omorisia , neching'ondi nachiserebekane .
41014028	Korende nyuma as'okoboka kwane , nimbatang'anere kogenda Gaiili .
41014029	Petero akamotebia , Neba nabagechigwe bonsi , korende tai inche .
41014030	Yesu akamotebia , Ekeene , nagotebirie aye rero , obotuko obo , ekero etuoni etaragweya ara kabere , nonkane ara gatato .
41014031	Nere akamenta gokwana mono , Ningwenera gokwa naye , tinkogokana nonya ng'ake , Na bonsi bagateba boigo .
41014032	Naende bagaika aase erieta riaye Gethisemane ; akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Ikaransa aa , ekero ngosaba ,
41014033	Akamoira Petero na Yakobo na Yohana amo nere , agachaka goichana nagwechanda mono .
41014034	Akabatebia , Omoyo one nore nobororo obonge , koreng'ana ogokwa : ikaransa aiga , morende .
41014035	Akagenderera ake , akagwa maumama , ogosaba , onye keranyarekane , ensa eye emoetere .
41014036	Agateba , Abba , Tata , onsi iga akonyarekana asore ; onduserie egekombe eke : korende , tai buna ndigetie inche , korende buna origetie aye .
41014037	Akagenda , akabanyora bararire , akamotebia Petero , Simon , nkwararire ? Tonyareti korenda ensa eyemo ?
41014038	Renda , saba , timobaisa gosoa as'ogotemwa : omoyo nore nobwanchani , korende omobere tori nechinguru .
41014039	Akagenda naende , agasaba , agakwana amang'ana aria amatang'ani .
41014040	Naende , akagenda akabanyora bararire , ekiagera amaiso abo abaire amarito ; gose tibamanya eri bakomoiraneria .
41014041	Agacha eria gatato , akabatebia , Rara bono gaki , timoka : aisanire ; ensa yaikire ; rora , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto obekirwe amaboko abanyene ebibe .
41014042	Imoka , togende : rora , ere oyo omondwa oikire .
41014043	Erio kegima , kagokwana , Yudas agaika , oyomo bwa baria ikomi nababere , amo nere omoganda bare nemioro nechinungu , bakorua as'abakuani abanene , nabariki , nabagaka .
41014044	Nere okomorua konye obaeire ekemanyererio , ogoteba , oyo nkonyunyunta , oyio nere , mobwate , moire buya .
41014045	Agachia gocha bwango akamochiera , akabora , Rabii ; akamonyunyunta .
41014046	Erio bakamobwata , bakamoira .
41014047	Noyomo ase baria bateneine ang'e akang'usa omoro oye , akamoaka omosomba bw'omokuani omonene , akamobutora ogoto .
41014048	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Inee , iga mwachire buna mokoimokera omoibi nemioro nechinungu , gocha kong'ira ?
41014049	Iga narenge amatuko onsi amo nainwe ase hekalu ime kworokereria , ko timwambwata : korende aya , akorirwe amariko anyare goikerana .
41014050	Bonsi bakamotiga , bagatama .
41014051	Nomomura oyomo akamotunyana , bweboete egetambaa gi'egatani gioka ; bakamobwata ;
41014052	nere akagetiga keria egetambaa gi'egatani , agatama ore bosa .
41014053	Bakamoira Yesu as'omokuani omonene : bakamosangererekera bonsi , abakuani abanene nabagaka nabariki .
41014054	Petero akamotunyana korwa nyuma are , goika ime as'egora y'omokuani omonene ; agaikaransa amo nabasomba , gwota omorero .
41014055	Abakuani abanene nab'ebarasa bonsi bakarigia birori igoro ase Yesu banyare komoita , tibarora .
41014056	Ekiagera abange bagateba as'oborimo , nokorora kwabo tikwabwatana .
41014057	Goika abanto bagatenena bakamobekera oborimo , bakabora ,
41014058	Ntwamoigwete ogoteba , Inche nintagore hekalu eye eyakoregete as'amaboko , nas'amatuko atato ning'agache eyeride eyetakoregeti as'amboko .
41014059	Nonya iga oborori bwabo tibwarenge boronge .
41014060	Omokuani omonene agatenena gati gati , akamoboria Yesu , okobora , Tokoiraneria ' ng'ana ? Inki aba bakogosoera ?
41014061	Korende agakira , tairaneria ' ng'ana . Omokuani omonene akamoboria naende , akamotebia , Aye naye Kristo , Omwana bw'Omosesenigwa ?
41014062	Yesu agateba , ee Ninche ere : nainwe namomorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto oikaransete okoboko gw'okorio gwe chinguru , ogocha namare a igoro .
41014063	Omokuani omonene agatandora chianga chiaye , akabora , Ninki torigererie abarori bande ?
41014064	Mwaigure okorama kwaye : naki moroche ? Bonsi bakamonachera ekina ng'a nagwenerete gokwa .
41014065	Abande bagachaka komotwera amate , nakomomumekeria obosio , nakomoaka chinkundi , nakomotebia , Kora obobani : abasomba bakamoaka chindoe .
41014066	Na Petero igarenge egora inse , agacha omosomba oyomo bw'abaiseke b'omokuani omonene ;
41014067	akamorora Petero ogwota omorero , akamorigereria , agateba , Aye naye nkwarenge amo noria Omonazereri , Yesu .
41014068	Agakana akabora , Timomanyeti , nonya tinyigweti eki ogokwana : agasoka ' gesieri ; etuoni ekagweya .
41014069	Noria omoiseke akamorora naende , agachaka kobatebia abateneine ang'e , Oyo noyomo obo .
41014070	Agakana naende . Egeka egeke naende baria bateneine ang'e bakamotebia Petero , Ekeene igore oyomo obo ; ekiagera igore omonto o Galili .
41014071	Agachaka koragereria nagotiana , Timomanyeti omonto oyio mogoteba .
41014072	Erio etuoni ekagweya eria kabere . Petero akarinyora ring'ana riria atebetigwe na Yesu , ng'a ritang'ani etuoni etaragweya ara kabere , nonkane ara gatato . Agachia korirengereria , akarera .
41015001	Erio kobwachia koba mambia abakuani abanene bagakora ekina amo nabagaka nabariki , ne ritongo rigima , bakamosiba Yesu , bakamobogoiia , bakamoira ase Pilato .
41015002	Pilato akamoboria , Aye naye omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ? Akairaneria , akamotebia , Aye gwatebire .
41015003	Abakuani bakamosoera as'amang'ana amange .
41015004	Pilato akamoboria naende akabora , Tokoiraneria ' ng'ana ? rora amang'ana narenga bagosoeire .
41015005	Korende Yesu tairaneria ' ng'ana naende ; goika Pilato agakumia .
41015006	Nabo ase rituko rinene abasiborera omosibwa oyomo , oyobarigetie .
41015007	Narenge omonto ore korokwa Baraba , osibetwe amo nabanto abakorete eriomana , nagokora oboiti as'eriomana .
41015008	Emeganda ekaaka eriogi riabo , bagachaka gosaba buna anarete kobakorera .
41015009	Pilato akabairaneria , akabora , Morigetie mbasiborere omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ?
41015010	Ekiagera amanyete ng'a abakuani abanene iga bamorure as'okogecha .
41015011	Abakuani abanene bakabagenka emeganda , erinde anche kobasiborera Baraba .
41015012	Pilato akairaneria naende akabatebia , Nimokore naki oyo mogoteba ng'a n'Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ?
41015013	Bakaaka eriogi naende , Mobambe .
41015014	Pilato akabatebia , Naki , mbobe ki akorete ? Bakamenta mono koaka eriogi , Mobambe .
41015015	Pilato agancha kobakorera buya emeganda , akabasiborera Baraba , akamorua Yesu , ekero amoakire chinkini , abambwe ,
41015016	Abasigari bakamoira as'enyomba ime , nero Praitorio , bagasangerereka amo omoganda omogima .
41015017	Bakamoboyia eanga embariri , bagatonga engata y'amagwa , bakamobekera ' motwe ;
41015018	bagachaka komokwania , Mbuya ore , Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi !
41015019	Bakamoaka omotwe negetonto , bakamotwera amate , bakabeka amaru inse , bakamosasima .
41015020	Kobamochecheirie , bakamorusia eria eanga embariri , bakamoboyia chianga chiaye omonyene , Bakamoira isiko komobamba .
41015021	Bakamobetereria omonto orenge goeta , Simon Omokurene , okorua borabu , ( ise Isikanderi na Rufo ) , abogorie omosalaba oye .
41015022	Bakamoreta aase akorokwa Gologotha , ogoonchora kwaye , Aase ekeore .
41015023	Bakamoa edivai ebekire manemane anywe : nere tabwata ,
41015024	Bakamobamba , bagatanana chianga chiaye , bagachiakera obomera eki ker'omonto araire .
41015025	Ekaba chinsa isato , bakamobamba .
41015026	Namariko ay'ogosoerwa kwaye akarikwa igoro , Omoruoti Bw'Abayahudi .
41015027	Amo nere bakabambwa abaibi babere , oyomo okoboko kwaye gw'okorio noyomo okoboko kwaye gw'okobee .
41015028	Nabo ririko rigaikerana eriatebetwe , Obarirwe amo nabasaria .
41015029	Nabarabwo abare goeta bakamorama , bagotematema emetwe yabo , bagoteba , A ! aye oyogotagora hekalu nakoyeagacha as'amatuko atato ,
41015030	ekonye , ika korwa omosalaba .
41015031	Naboigo nabakuani abanene bakamosekereria barabwo ase barabwo , amo nabariki , bagateba , Nakonyete abande ; omonyene takonyara gwekonya .
41015032	Tiga Kristo , omoruoti bw'Abaisraeli , aike bono korwa omosalaba tonyare korora nagwancha . Nabarabwo ababambetwe amo nere bakamwomania .
41015033	Ekero chinsa isano nemo chiaika , okaba omosunte igoro as'ense yonsi , goika chinsa kianda .
41015034	Nechinsa kianda Yesu akaaka egeturi as'eriogi rinene , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabakthani ? ogoonchora kwaye , Nyasaye one , Nyasaye one naki ogontiga ?
41015035	Nabande b'abwo abarenge ang'e kobaigwa bakabora , Rora , nkomorangeriare Elija .
41015036	Omonto akaminyoka bwango , akaimokia esifunji , akayeichoria nendorwe , akayebeka igoro as'egetonto , akamoa anywe , akabora , Tiga torore gose Elija ngochare komoikia .
41015037	Yesu akarusia eriogi rinene , agatwekamo .
41015038	Egetambaa gi'okonacha hekalu gegatandoka chinsemo ibere korwa igoro goika nse .
41015039	Nabo eria esagini , yateneine emorigereretie , egachia korora ng'a okure , akabora , Ekeene omonto oyo igarenge Omwana o Nyasaye .
41015040	Mbarengeo abakungu barigereretie korwa are : as'aba igarenge Mariamu Omomagidali , na Mariamu ng'ina Yakobo omoke noyo Yose , na Salome :
41015041	aba nabwo bamotunyanete ekero arenge Galili , nakomokorera ; nabande abange abakungu batirete amo nere goika Yerusalemu .
41015042	Riachikoba mogoroba , ekiagera n'Okwerosia , nario rituko rire ritang'ani ri'esabato ,
41015043	agacha Yusufu , omonto o Arimithea , oyorenge omuya , omonto bwe ritongo ri'ebina , nere omonyene iga aboganyete obonda bwa Nyasaye ; agasoa noboremu as'obosio bwa Pilato akayosaba omobere o Yesu .
41015044	Pilato agakumia , ekiagera otiekire gokwa : akayerangeria eria esagini , akayeboria gose nkare akwete .
41015045	Goika agachia konyora boronge , akamoa Yusufu egetondo .
41015046	Akagora egetambaa gi'egatani , akamoikia , akamoboera keria egetambaa , akamobeka as'oboina bwabachetwe egetare ime ; akabeka rigena as'egesieri ki'oboina .
41015047	Mariamu Omomagidali na Mariamu o Yose bakarigereria as'abekwa .
41016001	Goika esabato koyatiekire goeta , Mariamu Omomagidali na Mariamu o Yakobo na Salome , bakagora amaguta amanukato , banyare kogenda komoaka .
41016002	Goika mambia chuni , rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuina , bakagenda oboina , erioba korikooroka .
41016003	Bagatebanta barabwo ase barabwo , ning'o oranyare gototigereria riria rigena korwa ' gesieri ki'oboina .
41016004	Goika bagachia korigereria bakarora ng'a riria rigena riatiekire gotigerigwa : narirorio iga riarenge rinene mono .
41016005	Bagosoa oboina ime bakarora omomura oikaransete ensemo y'okorio , bweboete eanga endabu ; bagaichana .
41016006	Nere akabatebia , Timoichana : nkomorigiamore Yesu Omonazareti , oyobambetwe : obokire , tari aiga : rigereria aase bamobegete !
41016007	Korende genda , mobatchie aborokigwa baye na Petero , Ng'a obatang'aneire kogenda Galili : agwo nao moramorore , buna abatebetie .
41016008	Bakarua agwo , bagatama korwa as'oboina ; ekiagera basoetwe nokoiguswa nogokumia : tibamotebetie ' monto ' ng'ana ; ekiagera bairogete .
41016009	Kabokire Yesu mambia rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma akamoorokera ritang'ani Mariamu Omomagidali , ere oria arusetie ebirecha bitano nabibere .
41016010	Oyo akagenda akabatebia baria abarenge amo nere korwa kare , bare kweumia nakorera .
41016011	Nabarabwo , bachia koigwa ng'a moyo are , ororirwe nere , tibancha .
41016012	Nyuma as'aya akabaorokera abanto babere , ore nekieni kende , ekero barenge gotara enchera kogenda borabu .
41016013	Nabarabwo bakagenda bakabatebia amang'ana baria abande : tibabancha aba .
41016014	Naende akarorekana nabaria ikomi nomo ekero barenge koragera ; akabomania as'ogotegena kwabo nobokong'u bw'emioyo yabo , ekiagera batabanchete abamoroche kabokire .
41016015	Akabatebia , Genda inwe as'ense yonsi , moyerandie enchili ase ker'egetongwa .
41016016	Oyoranche nakobatiswa nakonyeke ; ko oyotancheti , nagambigwe .
41016017	Nebikone ebi nabibatunyane abwo banchire , as'erieta riane nabaserie ebirecha ; nabakwane asechimemechinyia ;
41016018	nababwate ching'iti , gose nabanywa egento gegoita , tigekobaita nonya ng'ake ; nababeke amaboko abo igoro as'abarwaire , nabarabwo nabagwene .
41016019	Nabo Omonene , gakwanire nabarabwo , akabogorigwa gochia igoro , agaikaransa okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye .
41016020	Nabarabwo bakaimoka , bakarandia chinsemo chionsi , Omonene agakora emeremo amo nabarabwo , nakoriikerania ring'ana as'ebikone biatunyanete narirorio . Amina .
42001001	Ekiagera abanto abange babekire okoboko korika ebirage bi'amang'ana aria aikeranigwe egati yaito ,
42001002	buna batotebetie baria barenge abarori korwa omochakano , nabasomba be ring'ana ,
42001003	narorire buya nainche , konatiekire kwenyorera amang'ana onsi are boronge korwa omochako , gokorikera as'okoroberia , aye Theofilo bw'amasikani ;
42001004	onyare komanya oboene bw'amang'ana aria kworogetigwe .
42001005	Narenge as'amatuko Herode , omoruoti bw'Abayahudi , omokuani oyomo erieta riaye Zakaria , oyo bw'ensemo ya Abiya : narenge nomokungu oyomo bw'abaiseke ba Haruni , erieta riaye Elizabeti .
42001006	Nabarabwo bonsi babere nabanyene oboronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , bakogenderera as'amachiko nchina bionsi bi'Omonene batari nekemoa .
42001007	Nabarabwo tibarenge nomwana , ekiagera Elizabeti igarenge omogomba , nabarabwo bonsi babere abagotu mono .
42001008	Nabo agachia koba gagokora emeremo y'obokuani as'ensemo yaye as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
42001009	buna yarenge engecho y'omokuani ; emeremo yaye yarenge gosamba ubani gasoire ase hekalu y'Omonene .
42001010	Nomogsnda bwonsi bw'abanto iga barenge gosaba isiko , ensa y'ogosamba ubani ,
42001011	Akaorokerwa ne rilaika ri'Omonene , riteneine ensemo y'okoboko gw'okorio kw'amathabao y'ubani ,
42001012	Zakaria agaichana gachia komorora , omoondoko okamobwata .
42001013	Riria rilaika rikamotebia , Toiroka , Zakaria , ekiagera ogosaba kwao kwaigurwe , na mokao Elizabeti nakoiborere omwana omoisia , nerieta riaye nomoroke Yohana .
42001014	Naye nobe nomogoko nogosasoka ; nabanto abange nabagokere okoiborwa kwaye .
42001015	Ekiagera nabe omonene as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , takonywa edivai gose ogotinda ; nere naichorwe n'Omoika Omochenu , nonya nkorwa enda ya ng'ina ,
42001016	Nabange as'abana b'Isirael nabaonchore as'Omonene Nyasaye obo .
42001017	Nere natung'ane obosio bwaye as'omoyo nechinguru chi'Elija , koyeonchora emioyo y'abaise as'abana babo , nakobaonchora abamochi as'obong'aini bw'abanyene oboronge ; komobekera ang'e Omonene abanto baroisigwe .
42001018	Zakaria akamotebia rilaika , Naki ndamanye ayio ? ekiagera inche nomogotu , na mokane nomong'ina bw'amatuko amange .
42001019	Rilaika rikamoiraneria , rikamotebia , Inche Gabiriel , ogotenena obosio bwa Nyasaye ; ninche natomwa nkwane naye , nagogotebia amang'ana aya amaya .
42001020	Rora , naye nobe rimama , tonyara gokwana goika rituko riria agocha kooroka ayio , ekiagera otancha amang'ana ane , nayio naikeranigwe ekero kiaye .
42001021	Nabaria abanto iga bamoganyete Zakaria , bagakumia as'ogotebana kwaye aroro hekalu ime .
42001022	Goika ekero achia gosoka , tanyara gokwana nabarabwo : bakamanya ng'a igarora okorora aria hekalu ime : nere igarenge koborokereria nokoboko , akanakoba rimama .
42001023	Ekaba amatuko ogokora kwaye agachia koera , akagenda ' nyomba mwaye .
42001024	Nyuma y'amatuko aria mokaye Elizabeti akaba morito ; akebisa emetienyi etano , ogoteba ,
42001025	Iga nabo ankorera Omonene amatuko aria andigereretie , konduseria obosoku bwane as'obosio bw'abanto .
42001026	Omotienyi bw'etano nomo rilaika Gabiriel rigatomwa na Nyasaye kogenda omochie o Galili , erieta riaye Nazareti ,
42001027	as'omoiseke oriereirwe ' boko nomosacha , erieta riaye Yusufu , bw'enyomba ya Daudi , nerieta ri'oria omoiseke Mariamu .
42001028	Agacha asare akabora , Mbuya ore , oyokwaeirwe obuya , Omonene igare amo naye ,
42001029	Nere agaichana mono ase ring'ana eri , akarotarotia omoyo oye ime , Oko ngokwania ki ?
42001030	Rilaika rikamotebia , Toiroka , Mariamu ; ekiagera kwanyorire obuya ase Nyasaye .
42001031	Rora , nobe morito , noibore omwana omoisia , nomoroke erieta riaye Yesu .
42001032	Oyio nabe omonene , narokwe Omwana oye Oyore Igoro : n'Omonene Nyasaye namoe ekerogo gia Daudi is'oye :
42001033	nayegambere enyomba ya Yakobo goika kare nakare ; nonya noboruoti bwaye tibokoba nomoerio .
42001034	Mariamu agatchia rilaika , Naki rirabe ring'ana eri , ekiagera timomanyeti omosacha ?
42001035	Rilaika rikairaneria rikamotebia , Omoika Omechenu nogochere , nechinguru chiaye Oyore Igoro nachikobekere ekiriri : as'ayio oyoraiborwe narokwe omochenu , Omwana o Nyasaye .
42001036	Na rora , Elizabeti eamate yao , nere boigo nare noboriio bw'omwana omoisia as'obogotu bwaye : nomotienyi oyo noyo bw'etano nomo asare ere oyorogetwe omogomba .
42001037	Ekiagera ring'ana tiriri ritanyarekane ase Nyasaye .
42001038	Mariamu akabora , Rora , inche nenyaroka y'Omonene ; nabe asende buna ring'ana riao . Rilaika rikaimoka korwa asare .
42001039	Mariamu akaimoka amatuko ayio akagenda ebitunwa as'okoayerera , goika omochie oyomo o Yuda ;
42001040	agasoa ' nyomba mwa Zakaria , akamokwania Elizabeti .
42001041	Ekaba Elizabeti agachia koigwa ogokwania kwa Mariamu , omwana omoke agatuma as'enda yaye ime ; Elizabeti agaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu ;
42001042	akaaka eriogi riaye ase chinguru , agakwana , Gwasesenigwe aye as'abakungu , noroiboro rw'enda yao rwasesenigwe .
42001043	Ng'ai riarure ring'ana eri rianyorire , ng'ina Omonene one anchicheire inche ?
42001044	Ekiagera rora , eriogi ri'ogokwania kwao riachia gosoa amato ane , omwana omoke otuma as'omosasoko as'enda yane ime .
42001045	Nare negesio oyobwanchire , ekiagera as'amang'ana ayio atebigwe n'Omonene naikeranigwe .
42001046	Mariamu agateba , Omoyo one omotogirie Omonene ,
42001047	Enkoro yane yamogokeire Nyasaye Omokonyi one .
42001048	Ekiagera oborigereirie obwororo bw'enyaroka yaye : Ekiagera ekeene , korwa rero ebigori bionsi nabindoke omosesenigwa .
42001049	Ekiagera ere oyore nechinguru onkoreire amanene ; Nerieta riaye nerichenu .
42001050	Namabera aye korwa ebigori goika ebigori As'abwo bamosigete .
42001051	Okorire chinguru as'okoboko kwaye , Obaserebanirie abaenenu a ' ebirengererio bi'emioyo yabo .
42001052	Obaikirie abanene korwa asebirogo biabo , Obaimokirie abataka .
42001053	Abanyene enchara obaigotirie amaya ; Abanyene enibo obaseririe amaboko amasa .
42001054	As'okoinyora amabera Omokonyire Isirael omosomba oye .
42001055	( Buna abatebetie abatata baito ) As'Ibrahimu noroiboro rwaye , goika kare nakare .
42001056	Mariamu agaikaransa nere egeka ki'emetienyi etato , akairana ' nyomba mwaye .
42001057	Goika Elizabeti agaikeranigwa ekero kiaye gfekoibora ; akaibora omwana omoisia .
42001058	Bakaigwa abatureti baye neamate yaye ng'a Omonene omomenteire amabera aye ; bakagoka amo nere .
42001059	Ekaba rituko ri'atano natato , bagacha komosaia omwana ; bakarigia komoa erieta ria ise , Zakaria .
42001060	Ng'ina , akairaneria akabora , Taibo ; korende narokwe Yohana .
42001061	Bakamotebia , Tari nonya noyomo as'eamate yao okorokwa erieta erio .
42001062	Bakamworokia ise as'ebimanyererio , komoboria buna arigetie arokwe ,
42001063	Akarigia ebao y'okorika , akarika , akabora , Erieta riaye Yohana . Bagakumia bonsi .
42001064	Erio kegima agasiborwa omonwa noromeme rwaye , agakwana , okomosesenia Nyasaye .
42001065	Okoiroka gogasoa ase bonsi abaikaransete ang'e nabarabwo : agasarera amang'ana aya onsi as'ebitunwa bia Boyahudi .
42001066	Na bonsi abaigwete bakayabeka emioyo yabo ime , bakabora , ' Mwana ki rende orabe oyo ? Ekiagera okoboko kw'Omonene kwarenge amo nere .
42001067	Zakaria ise agaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , akagana , okobora ,
42001068	Abakwe Omonene , Nyasaye bw'Isirael ; Ekiagera obacheire abanto baye nakobaboria .
42001069	Naende otoimokeirie ogotoreka gwe chinguru As'enyomba ya Daudi omosomba oye .
42001070	( Buna atebete as'emenwa y'ababani baye abachenu korwa omochakano ) ,
42001071	Tokonywe nababisa baito , nas'amaboko abo bonsi abatogechete ;
42001072	Erinde abakorere amabera abatata baito , Nakoinyora emuma yaye enchenu ;
42001073	Eira amorierete Ibrahimu tata oito ,
42001074	Ng'a natoe intwe , gotorakonyeke namaboko ababisa baito Tomosasime totari nokoiroka ,
42001075	As'obochenu nas'oboronge as'obosio bwaye amatuko aito onsi .
42001076	Ee , naye , Omwana , norokwe omobani oye Oyore Igoro : Ekiagera notang'ane as'obosio bwaye Omonene oroisie chinchera chiaye ;
42001077	Obae abanto baye ogotoreka , Birusigwe ebibe biabo ,
42001078	As'amabera aye Nyasaye oito , As'ayio amasase a igoro natochere ,
42001079	Ababarere abaikaransete as'omosunte nekiriri ki'amakweri ; Nakoraa amagoro aito as'enchera y'omorembe .
42001080	Oria omwana agakina akamenteka chinguru as'omoyo , akabao ase chiroro ime goika rituko ri'okooroka kwaye as'Isiraeli .
42002001	Agachia koba as'amatuko aria , ogochika gokarua ase Kaisari Augusto , ng'a ense yonsi erikwe .
42002002	Okorikwa oko nakwo kwe ritang'ani kwarigetwe ekero Kurenio arenge gavuna o Sham .
42002003	Abanto bonsi bakagenda korikwa , ker'omonto as'omochie oye .
42002004	Na Yusufu nere akaimoka korwa Galili korwa as'omochie o Nazareti , agatira kogenda Boyahudi goika omochie o Daudi , okorokwa Bethilehemu , ekiagera igarenge oyo bw'enyomba neamate ya Daudi ,
42002005	erinde arikwe amo na Mariamu , ekiagera onyuomirwe nere , nere igarenge ' morito .
42002006	Agachia koba as'ogoikaransa kwabo aroro , amatuko aye agaika ay'okoibora ,
42002007	Akamoibora omwana oye omoisia omotangi ; akamobeka chianga chi'obwana , akamwareria as'obweri , ekiagera batanyorete ribaga as'enyomba y'abageni .
42002008	As'ense eyio mbarengeo abarisia baikaransete ebitii , nakorenda botuko riicho riabo .
42002009	Rilaika ri'Omonene rikabaorokera , obonene bw'Omonene bokababarera : bagasogwa nomoondoko omonge .
42002010	Rilaika rikabatebia ' , Timoiroka ; ekiagera nabareteire inwe amang'ana amaya ay'omogoko omonene , orabe as'abanto bonsi :
42002011	ekiagera rero as'omochie o Daudi oiboirwe Omokonyi as'engecho yaino , nere Kristo Omonene .
42002012	Neke nekemanyererio asemore ; Namomonyore omwana obekirwe chianga chi'obwana ; bwareirie obweri .
42002013	Erio bwango barengeo amo na riria rilaika , emeganda y'abanto b'igoro , bakomobaka Nyasaye , bakobora ,
42002014	Obonene ase Nyasaye oyore igoro mono , Nas'ense omorembe , as'abanto abagweneirwe pere .
42002015	Agachia koba , amalaika achia koimoka kobatiga kogenda igoro , baria abarisia bagatebania , Gaki togende goika Bethilehemu , torore ring'ana eri riakorekire , eri Omonene atotebirie .
42002016	Bakagenda bwango as'omoayerevo , bakamonyora Mariamu na Yusufu , nomwana bwareirie obweri ime .
42002017	Bagachia korora , bakaorokia amang'ana ering'ana batebetigwe , ri'oyio omwana .
42002018	Bonsi abaigwete bagakumia as'aria batebetigwe nabarisia .
42002019	Korende Mariamu akayagacha amang'ana aya onsi akayarengereria omoyo oye ime .
42002020	Abarisia bakairana , bakomotogia Nyasaye nakomobaka as'amang'ana onsi baigwete , nayabaroche , buna batebetigwe .
42002021	Agachia goika amatuko atano natato ayokomosara , akarokwa erieta riaye Yesu , riria riatoretwe ne rilaika ritang'ani atarabogorigwa oborito .
42002022	Naro amatuko ayogwesibia kwabo agachia goika , as'amachiko a Musa , bakamorfeta Yerusalemu , bamomoe Omonene
42002023	( buna arigetwe as'amachiko Omonene , ker'omoisia omotangi okoigora enda ya ng'ina narokwe omochenu as'Omonene ) ,
42002024	nas'okorua esadaka buna yaboretwe as'amachiko Omonene , Amaruma abere , gose amage aya amaruma abere .
42002025	Nabo narengeo omonto ase Yerusalemu , erieta riaye Simion ; noyio nomonto omonyene oboronge , omoronge , oganyete ogosemeria kwTsiraeli : n'Omoika Omochenu , igorenge igoro asare .
42002026	Nere iga aorokeretigwe n'Omoika Omochenu , ng'a takorora amakweri ataramorora Kristo bw'Omonene .
42002027	Nabo agacha hekalu ime as'Omoika : nekero abamoibori baye bachia komoreta omwana Yesu , bamokorere as'engecho y'amachiko ,
42002028	erio ere akamobwata as'amaboko aye , akamotogia Nyasaye , akabora ,
42002029	Bono Omonene otige omosomba oo agende as'omorembe , Buna gwatebete ;
42002030	Ekiagera amaiso ane arorire ogotoreka kwao ,
42002031	Oko kwabekire as'amasio abanto bonsi ;
42002032	Omobaso okomoreka ebisaku , Nobonene bw'abanto bao Isiraeli .
42002033	Yusufu na ng'ina bakaba bagokumia as'aria akwanwa igoro asare ;
42002034	Simeon akabasesenia , akamotebia Mariamu ng'ina , Ekeene oyo obekirwe as'okogwa , nogotenena as'abange asTsiraeli ; abe ekiorokererio giatebetwe ;
42002035	ee , omoro nokobete omoyo oo ; erinde bioroke ebirengererio bi'emioyo emenge .
42002036	Narenge oyomo Anna , omobani omokungu , enyaroka ya Fanueli , bw'egesaku ki'Asheri ; ( nere nomong'ina bw'amatuko amange , obete nomosacha emiaka etano nebere nyuma as'okoera kw'oboiseke bwaye ,
42002037	nere omoboraka bw'emiaka emerongo etano netato nene ) , atanakorua ase hekalu ime , as'okweng'ata nogosaba nogosasima obotuko nomobaso .
42002038	Akaoroka nere ensa eria , akamotogia Nyasaye , akabatebia amang'ana aye abanto bonsi barenge baganyete okoborigwa kwa Yerusalemu .
42002039	Nabarabwo bagachia go kora koyaikerania onsi ayareo as'amachiko Omonene , Dakairana Galili goika omochie obo Nazareti .
42002040	Omwana oria agakina , akamenteka chinguru , agaichorwa nechisemi ; nobuya bwa Nyasaye bokaba amo nere .
42002041	Nabo abamoibori baye barenge kogenda ker'omwaka ase Yerusalemu ase rituko rinene ri'epasaka .
42002042	Goika agachia koba nemiaka ikomi nebere , bagatira kogenda Yerusalemu , buna yarenge engecho ye rituko rinene ;
42002043	naende bachia goikerania amatuko , ekero barenge koirana , oria omwana Yesu agatigara nyuma Yerusalemu ; nabamoibori tibamanya ;
42002044	bagakaga igare as'omoganda obo , bakagenda orogendo rw'omobaso oyomo ; bakamorigia as'eamate yabo naende abwo rimanyaine :
42002045	ekero batamonyorete , bakairana Yerusalemu , bakomorigia .
42002046	Agachia koba nyuma as'amatuko atato , bakamonyora hekalu ime , oikaransete gati as'aborokia , okobaigwa , nakobaboria amaboria :
42002047	bonsi abamoigwete bagakumia as'obong'aini bwaye nokoiraneria kwaye .
42002048	Nabarabwo bagachia komorora bagaichana mono : ng'ina akamotebia , Omwana one , naki gwatokora iga ? rora , iso nainche twarenge gokorigia nomoichano .
42002049	Akabatebia , Naki mokondigia ? Timomanyeti ng'a nengwenerete koba as'enyomba ya Tata one ?
42002050	Tibamanya ring'ana riria abatebia ,
42002051	Agatirimboka amo nabarabwo , agaika Nazareti , akaba nkobaigwerare : ng'ina akayagacha amang'ana aya onsi omoyo oye ime .
42002052	Yesu akamenta kogenderera as'obong'aini , nas'omobere , nobuya ase Nyasaye nas'abanto .
42003001	As'omwaka o ikomi netano y'okogamba kwaye Kaisari Tiberio , Pontio Pilato narenge gavuna o Boyahudi , na Herode omoruoti o Galili , na Filipo momura omwabo omoruoti o Iturea nense ya Tarakoniti , na Lusania omoruoti o Abilene ,
42003002	ekero ki'obokuani obonene bw'Anna na Kaifa , ring'ana ria Nyasaye rikamoikera Yohana omwana o Zakaria , as'eroro .
42003003	Akagenda chinse chionsi chi'ensemo ya Yorodani , okorandia ebatiso y'ogoonchoka gokoreta okorusia kw'ebibe ,
42003004	buna yarigetwe as'ebuku y'amang'ana ay'omobani Isaya , Eriogi ri'oyokoaka egeturi eroro ime , Yerosie enchera y'Omonene , Rosia ogoeta kwaye ,
42003005	Ker'erigoko narichorigwe , Na ker'egetunwa , nekegoro nabikeigwe ; Aare bogeka narongeigwe , Nenchera ere ebitunwatunwa nebe enterere ;
42003006	Na bonsi abanyene omobere nababorore obuya bwa Nyasaye .
42003007	Nabo akayetebia emeganda yachete erinde ebatiswe nere , Inwe oroiboro rwe ching'iti , ning'o obakureire gotama endamwamu egocha gocha ?
42003008	Gaki ama amatunda agwenerete ogoonchoka , gose timochaka kobora emioyo yaino ime , Ntore na tata oito nere Ibrahimu : ekiagera nabatebirie , ng'a Nyasaye as'amagena aya nanyare koyatenenia koba abana ba Ibrahimu .
42003009	Bono egesire kiabekirwe as'emeri y'emete : nabo ker'omote otameti amatunda amaya onachwa otugutwa as'omorero .
42003010	Nabarabwo emeganda bakamoboria , bakabora , Tokore ki , rende ?
42003011	Akairaneria akabatebia , Oyore ne chiganchwa ibere amoe ere oyotari nero ; noyore nendagera , akore boigo .
42003012	Bagacha abakorusia ebango erinde babatiswe , bakamotebia , Omworokia , inki torakore ?
42003013	Akabatebia , Timorusia kobua biria mwachigetwe .
42003014	Abasigari nabarabwo bakamoboria bakabora , naintwe inki torakore ? Akabatebia , Timomokorera ' monto onde bwonsi oboenenu , gose timorusia egento getari ekia boronge ; naende eng'eria yaino ebaisane .
42003015	Nabo baria abanto bagachia koba as'okorigereria , bakarengereria bonsi amang'ana a Yohana , ng'a gose nere Kristo ,
42003016	Yohana akairaneria , akabatebia bonsi , Inche iga nkobabatisa as'amache ; korende ngochare oyore nechinguru kombua inche , tingwenereti gochisibora chinuga chi'ebikoroto biaye ; ere nabatise as'Omoika Omochenu nas'omorero .
42003017	Oroteru rwaye iga rore okoboko kwaye , nere nagesibie mono ekeoreri kiaye , nasangererie engano yaye kiage kiaye ; korende nayasambe amatete as'omorero otakorimeka .
42003018	Nabo as'ogosorora okonge akabaranderia abanto amang'ana amaya ;
42003019	korende Herode teteraka , agakanigwa nere as'engecho ya Herodia , omokungu o Filipo , momura omwabo , nas'engecho y'amabe onsi Herode akorete ,
42003020	akamenta neri igoro as'onsi akamosiba Yohana echela .
42003021	Agachia koba abanto bonsi kobabatiswa , Yesu , nere gatiekire kobatiswa , kagosaba , igoro akamanoka .
42003022	Omoika Omochenu ogaika igoro asare as'omogwekano bwe riruma , eriogi rikarua igoro , Aye naye omwana one , omwanchi one ; naye kwangweneire .
42003023	Nere Yesu omonyene ekero achagete kworokereria , emiaka yaye iga yarenge emerongo etato , agakagwa ng'a nomwana o Yusufu , o Eli ,
42003024	o Mathati , o Lawi , o Meliki , o Yanna , o Yusufu ,
42003025	o Matathia , o Amos , o Nahum , o Esili , o Nagai ,
42003026	o Maathi , o Matathia , o Semei , o Yosef , o Yuda ,
42003027	o Yohana , o Resa , o Zorobabel , o Salathieli , o Neri ,
42003028	o Meliki , o Addi , o Kosani , o Elimadamu , o Eri ,
42003029	o Yesua , o Eliazeru , o Yorimu , o Mathati , o Lawi ,
42003030	o Sumeoni , o Yuda , o Yusufu , o Yona , o Eliakimu ,
42003031	o Melea , o Mainani , o Mattatha , o Nathani , o Daudi ,
42003032	o Yese , o Obedi , o Boazu , o Salamoni , o Nahasoni ,
42003033	o Aminadabu , o Aramu , o Esiromu , o Fares , o Yuda ,
42003034	o Yakobo , o Isaaka , o Ibrahimu , o Tera , o Nahori ,
42003035	o Saruhu , o Ragau , o Felegi , o Eberi , o Sala ,
42003036	o Kainani , o Arifakisadi , o Semi , o Nuhu , o Lameki ,
42003037	o Methusela , o Enoku , o Yaredi , o Maleleeli , o Kainani ,
42003038	o Enosu , o Sethu , o Adamu , o Nyasaye .
42004001	Na Yesu agaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , akairana korwa Yorodani , agatang'anwa n'Omoika kogenda eroro ime ,
42004002	agatemwa na saitani ekero ki'amatuko emerongo ene . Namatuko aria tariete ' gento : goika agachia goikerana , akaigwa enchara .
42004003	Saitani akamotebia , Onye naye Omwana o Nyasaye ritebie rigena eri ribe omogati ,
42004004	Yesu akamoiraneria , Nerikire , Omonto takoba moyo as'omogati bwoka ,
42004005	Saitani akamoimokereria igoro , akamworokia amanda onsi ay'ense as'egeka ekemo .
42004006	Saitani akamotebia , Ninkoe obonene obo bwonsi , nobonguru bwaye ; ekiagera bwaeirwe inche ; ninche iga ndamoe oyo ndigetie .
42004007	Nabo aye korasasime as'obosio bwane , bionsi nabibe ebiao .
42004008	Yesu akamoiraneria akamotebia , Nerikire , Mosasime Omonene Nyasaye oo , omokorere ere bweka .
42004009	Nere akamotang'ana goika Yerusalemu , akamotenenia igoro as'egesuri gie hekalu egetambe mono , akamotebia , Onye naye Omwana o Nyasaye , etugute gochia inse korwa agwo :
42004010	Naki narikire , Ere nabachike amalaika aye bakorende ,
42004011	Naende , Nabakoimokie as'amaboko abo , Tobaisa kogochwa okogoro kwao ne rigena .
42004012	Yesu akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Netebire , Tomotema Omonene Nyasaye oo .
42004013	Goika ochia gokora ogotemwa kwaye gwonsi , saitani , akaimoka korwa asare akamotiga as'ekero .
42004014	Yesu akairann ase chinguru chi'Omoika goika Galili : chinkuma chiaye chikagenda ense yonsi chinsemo ne chinsemo .
42004015	Nere akorokereria ase chisunagogi chiabo , ogotogigwa nabanto bonsi .
42004016	Akagenda Nazareti . aria arereretwe : goika ase riiuko ri'esabato agasoa as'esunagogi yabo buna engecho yaye yarenge , agatenena gosoma .
42004017	Akaegwa ebuku y'omobani Isaya . Nabo akamanora ebuku eyio , akarora aas'arikire ,
42004018	Omoika bw'Omonene igore igoro yane , Ekiagera ombekeire amaguta kobaranderia aba aka amang'ana amaya : Ontomire kobakonya abasarigwe emioyo , na kobarat deria abasibwa ogosiborwa , Nemeuko enyare korora naende , Kobasibora abasionoretwe .
42004019	Korandia omwaka bw'Omonene bwancheretwe .
42004020	Akayemumekeria ebuku , akamoa omokori , agaikaransa : abanto bonsi abarenge as'esunagogi bakamorigereria namaiso .
42004021	Agachaka kobatchia , Rero okorika oko gwaikeranire asa'amato aino .
42004022	Bakantobera kirori , bakayakumia amang'ana ay'obuya aruete as'emonwa oye : bakabora , Oyo tari ere omwana o Yusufu ?
42004023	Akabatebia , Gose namontebie omoreng'anio oyo , Omogwenia , ekonye aye omonyene : amang'ina onsi twaigure akorekire Kaperinaum , yakore aiga as'ense yao .
42004024	Akabatebia , Ekeene nabatebirie , Omobani onde ari oranyare gwancherwa as'ense yaye omonyene .
42004025	Korende as'ekeene nabatebirie , mbarenge nababoraka abange ase Isiraeli as'amatuko Elija , ekero amare asiegetwe emiaka elato nemetienyi etano nomo , ekero enchara enene yasoete as'ense yonsi ;
42004026	tatometwe Elija as'oyomo obo , tatiga Sarepata , as'ense ya Sidon , as'omokungu oyorenge omoboraka .
42004027	Naende iga barenge abange abanyene ukoma as'Isirael as'ekero ki'omobani Elisha ; onde tari osibegete tatiga Naamani , omoato o Sham .
42004028	Bagaichorwa nendamwamu bonsi as'esunagogi kobachia koyaigwa aya ;
42004029	bakaimoka bakamosokia isiko as'omochie , bakamoira goika egemi y'egetunwa keria kiagachetwe omochie obo , banyare komoturunkania .
42004030	Korende ere agaeta egati gati yabo akagenda .
42004031	Agaikera Kaperinaum , omochie o Galili . Akaba nkworokereriare rituko ri'esabato :
42004032	bagakumia mono as'okworokereria kwaye , ekiagera ring'ana riaye riare nokobua .
42004033	Naende narenge omonto as'esunagogi yabo omonyene omoika bw'ekerecha ki'eubi ; akaaka eriogi ase chinguru , akabora ,
42004034	A ! nki tore naye Yesu o Nazareti ? gwachire gotosiria ? Nakomanyire aye , n'Omochenu o Nyasaye ,
42004035	Yesu akamokania , okobora , sieka omonwa , omosoke . Keria ekerecha gekamoiyeria gati gati , gekamorua , tikiamokorera ' gento .
42004036	Ogokumia gokabwata bonsi , bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , bakabora , Ing'ana ki eri , ekiagera ase chinguru nokobua akobichika ebirecha bi'eubi , nabirobio biasoka ?
42004037	Amang'ana aye agasarera as'ense yonsi chinsemo nechinsemo .
42004038	Akaimoka korwa esunagogi , agasoa as'enyomba ya Simon . Nabo ng'ina biara Simon igarenge konya obwatirwe noborwaire bw'esosera ; bakamosaba as'engecho yaye .
42004039	Agatenena ang'e nere akayekania eria esosera ; ekamotiga : bwango akaimoka akabakorera .
42004040	Goika erioba rigachia kogwa abanto bonsi abarenge abanyene oborwaire bare namarwaire ao ao bakabareta asare ; nere akabeka amaboko aye igoro ase ker'oyomo , akabagwenia .
42004041	Ebirecha bikabasoka abange , bikaaka eriogi , bikobora , Aye naye Omwana o Nyasaye . Akabikania tabitiga bikwane , ekiagera biamanyete ng'a nere Kristo .
42004042	Goika ekaba mobaso , agasoka akagenda aas'atari nabanto : emeganda ekamorigiarigia , bakamoikera , bakarigia komotanga taimoka korwa asebare .
42004043	Akabatebia , Nengwenerete korandia amang'ana amayaay'obonda bwa Nyasaye as'emechie ende nero : ekiagera as'ayio natometwe .
42004044	Akabaranderia ase chisunagogi chia Galili .
42005001	Agachia koba nkomigware noria omoganda erinde baigwe ring'ana ria Nyasaye , igarenge gotenena as'enyancha ya Gene ' sareti ;
42005002	akarora amato abere ateneine ensemo y'enyancha : nabarubi basokire korwa aroro , ngosibiabare ebionga biabo .
42005003	Akarina obwato obomo bw'ayio , obwarenge bwa Simion , akamorigia abotigerie are ake nengegu . Agaikaransa , akorokereria emeganda korwa as'obwato .
42005004	Goika agachia gokora ogokwana kwaye , akamotebia Simion , Sukia goika endiba , moikie ebionga biaino as'okoruba .
42005005	Simion akamoiraneria akamotebia , Omonene , nabo twakorire emeremo obotuko bwonsi titonyoreti gento : korende ase ring'ana riao natobiikie ebionga .
42005006	Bagachia gokora iga , bagasangereria chinswe chinyinge mono ; ebionga biabo bigachaka gotandoka ;
42005007	bakabasima abagisangio babo barenge as'obwato bwa kabere , bache kobakonya . Bagacha , bakayaichoria amato onsi abere , goika agachaka korimera .
42005008	Korende Simion Petero , agachia koyarora aya , akagwa as'amaru a Yesu , akabora , Karue asende ; ekiagera inche nomonto omonyene ebibe , Omonene .
42005009	Ekiagera konya oichanire , ere nabonsi abarenge amo nere as'oborubi bwe chinswe barubete ;
42005010	nabo Yakobo na Yohana abana ba Zebedi , igabarenge ababwatani na Simion . Yesu akamotebia Simion , Toiroka ; korwa bono nobe omorubi bw'abanto ,
42005011	Naende bachia koreta amato abo gochia engegu , bakabitiga bionsi , bakamotunyana .
42005012	Agachia koba , ekero arenge as'omochie oyomo obo ; rora , narenge omonto omosacha oichire n'ukoma ; nere agachia komorora Yesu , akagwa maumama , akamosorora , ogoteba , Omonene , korigetie nonyare gonsibia ,
42005013	Akarambora okoboko kwaye , akamokuna , akamotebia , Nindigetie ; sibeka . Erio ukoma bokamorua .
42005014	Akamochika , tomotebia omonto ; korende genda enchera yao , bweorokie as'omokuani , omobere oo , orue ogosibeka kwao buna Musa achigete , ebe ekiorokererio asebare .
42005015	Korende chinkuma chiaye chikamenteka gokuma : bagasangererekana emeganda emenge gocha komoigwa , nakogwenigwa namarwaire abo .
42005016	Nere akerusanania akagenda chiroro , agasaba .
42005017	Agachia koba rituko erimo ri'amatuko aria ekero arenge kworokia ; Abafarisai naborokia b'amachiko barenge aroro baikaransete , iga baruete korwa ker'omochie o Galili na Boyahudi , na Yerusalemu : nokobua kw'Omonene iga kwarenge amo nere anyare kobagwenia .
42005018	Na rigereria , abanto mbabogoretie omonto noborere omonyene okoiguswa : bakarigia komoira ime nakomobeka as'obosio bwaye .
42005019	Ekiagera batanyorete ribaga riokomoira ime ekiagera as'oria omoganda bw'abanto , bakarina igoro as'ekerama ki'enyomba , bakamoikia korwa kerama noborere bwaye goika gati gati as'obosio bwaye Yesu .
42005020	Agachia korora okwegena kwabo , akamotebia , Aye omonto , ebibe biao biabeirwe .
42005021	Baria abariki n'Abafarisai bagachaka korengereria , bakabora , Ning'o oyo ogokwana okorama ? Ning'o oranyare kwabera ebibe , tatiga oyomo , nere Nyasaye ?
42005022	Yesu akamanya okorengereria kwabo , akairaneria akabatebia , Naki mokorengereria as'emioyo yaino ?
42005023	Ndiriri eriango , goteba , Ebibe biao biabeirwe ; gose goteba , Imoka , ogende ?
42005024	Korende monyare komanya ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nare nechinguru as'ense kwabera ebibe ( akamotebia oria omonyene okoiguswa ) , Nagotchirie , Imoka , bwetweka oborere bwao ogende mwao .
42005025	Erio kegima agatenena as'obosio bwabo , agetweka boria are korarera , akagenda as'enyomba yaye , ogotogia Nyasaye .
42005026	Ogokumia gokababwata bonsi , bakamotogia Nyasaye ; bagaichorwa nokoiroka , bakabora , Twarorire amakumia rero .
42005027	Nyuma as'aya akaimoka , akarora omobangi ebango , erieta riaye Lawi , oikaransete aase bakobangera ebango , akamotebia , Ntunyana .
42005028	Agatiga bionsi akaimoka akamotunyana .
42005029	Nere Lawi akamokorera endagera enene ' nyomba mwaye : naende mbarenge nomoganda bw'abakorusia ebango , nabanto bande barengeo baikaransete amo nabarabwo as'endagera .
42005030	Abafarisai nabariki babo bakabemurunganeria aborokigwa baye , bakobora , Naseki mokoria nakonywa amo nabakorusia ebango nabanyene ebibe ?
42005031	Yesu akairaneria , akabarebia , Abare abagima tibarigeri omogwenia , tatiga abare noborwaire .
42005032	Tincheti kobarangeria ababoronge korende abanyene ebibe as'ogoonchoka .
42005033	Barabwo bakamotebia , nasek aborokigwa ba Yohana bakweng'ata ebiro ebinge nagosaba ; naborokigwa b'Abafarisai nabo bagokora ; korende abao iga bakoria nakonywa ?
