42005034	Yesu akabatebia , Inee ! namonyare kobang'atia abana b'enyangi ekero Omonene bw'enyangi are amo nabarabwo ?
42005035	Korende amatuko nache ; barache kourwa Omonene bw'enyangi , erio nario barache kweng'ata amatuko aria .
42005036	Akabatebia omoreng'anio ; Onde tari ogotandora ekeraka ki'eanga enyia nagokebeka as'eanga engotu : gose nayetandore nakeria ekeyia , nakeria ekeraka ki'eanga enyia tikeri kobwatana neanga eria engotu .
42005037	Gose omonto tari okobeka edivai enyia ase chichuba chingotu ; gose eria edivai enyia nechiate chiria chichuba , edivai enyene eiteke , chichuba chisire .
42005038	Korende edivai enyia negwenerete ebekwe ase chichuba chinyia .
42005039	Gose omonto tari onyure edivai ya kare , naende bwango arigie edivai enyia : ekiagera iga agotcha , Eria yakare nengiya kobua .
42006001	Ekaba rituko ri'esabato ngoeta arenge emegondo y'engano ; aborokigwa baye bakabutora ebigara , bakabiria , bakobibunga namaboko abo .
42006002	Nabo abande as'Abafarisai bakabatebia , Naki mogokora eritari boronge ase rituko ri'esabato ?
42006003	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Nonya nering'ana eri timwanyakorisoma , eriakorete Daudi , ekero arenge nenchara , ere , nabarenge amo nere ;
42006004	buna asoete as'enyomba ya Nyasaye , akayebogoria emegati eyokworokereria , akayeria , akabaa abwo abarenge amo nere ; etari yaboronge ekoregwa tatiga abakuani boka abanyene ?
42006005	Akabatebia ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere omonene bw'esabato .
42006006	Ekaba esabato ende agasoa as'esunagogi , akorokereria : narenge omonto agwo , okoboko kwaye gw'okorio kuomete .
42006007	Abafarisai nabariki bakamotega korora gose nagwenie ase rituko ri'esabato ; banyare komosoera .
42006008	Korende ere akamanya ebirengererio biabo ; akamotebia oria omonto omonyene okoboko kuomete , Imoka , otenene gati gati . Akaimoka , agatenena .
42006009	Yesu akabatebia , Nimbaborie ring'ana erimo , Mboronge rituko ri'esabato gokora amaya gose gokora amabe ? gokonya obogima , gose goita ?
42006010	Akabarigereria namaiso bonsi chinsemo chionsi , akamotebia oria omonto , Rambora okoboko kwao . Agakora bo : okoboko kwaye gokagwena .
42006011	Nabarabwo bagaichorwa nokobea ; bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , buna bakomokora Yesu .
42006012	Agachia koba as'amatuko aria , akaimoka akagenda as'egetunwa gosaba ; akabao obotuko bwonsi , okomosaba Nyasaye .
42006013	Bogachia gokia mambia akabarangeria aborokigwa baye : akabachora abanto ikomi nababere korwa asebare , as'abwo nabwo arogete abatomwa .
42006014	Simion nere aete erieta riakabere Petero , n'Anderea , momura omwabo ; Yakobo na Yohana , Filipo na Baritholomayo .
42006015	Na Mathayo na Tomasi , Yakobo bw'Alufayo , na Simion ore korokwa Zelote ,
42006016	Yuda o Yakobo : na Yuda Omoisikariota , nere oyomoruete :
42006017	agatirimboka amo nabarabwo , agatenena aas'ateremu , amo nomoganda bw'aborokigwa baye , nomoganda bw'abanto baruete Boyahudi onsi , na Yerusalemu , nengegu ya Turo na Sidoni , bagacha bakomoigwa na kogwenigwa amarwaire abo ;
42006018	nabarabwo abachandirwe nebirecha bi'eubi bakagwenigwa .
42006019	Emeganda yonsi bakarigia komokuna : ekiagera chinguru chiarenge komorua , chikabagwenia bonsi .
42006020	Nere akaimokia amaiso aye as'aborokigwa baye , akabora , More negesio inwe abataka : ekiagera obonda bwa Nyasaye nobwaino .
42006021	More negesio inwe abanyene enchara bono : ekiagera namoigotigwe . More negesio inwe abakorera bono : ekiagera namoseke .
42006022	More negesio inwe , ekero mwanyabanto bakobagecha , nakobarusanania , nakobachaya , nakorituguta erieta riaino isiko buna egento ekebe , as'engecho y'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
42006023	Goka ase rituko riria , mochenge : ekiagera ekeene eng'eria yaino nenene igoro : ekiagera as'engecho eyio abaise babo babakorerete ababani .
42006024	Korende obobe nobwaino inwe abanda ! ekiagera mwanyorire omogoko oino .
42006025	Obobe nobwaino inwe abamwaigotire ! ekiagera namobe nenchara . Obobe nobwaino inwe abamogoseka bono ! ekiagera namoichane nakorera .
42006026	Obobe nobwaino inwe , ekero mogotogigwa na mwanyabanto ! ekiagera engecho eyio abaise babo nabo babakorerete ababani b'oborimo .
42006027	Korende nabatebirie inwe moigwete , Ancha ababisa baino , bakorere amaya abwo babagechete inwe ,
42006028	basesenie abwo bakobaragereria inwe , basabere abwo ababarosirie inwe .
42006029	Oyo ogokoaka emboto eyemo , moonchorere neya kabere ; nere oyogokoura eganchwa yao , tomorina negoti .
42006030	Ker'oyogogosaba moe ; oyogokoura enibo yao , torigia akoiranerie .
42006031	Naende buna morigetie abanto babakorere inwe , nainwe bakorere bo .
42006032	Nabo komoranche ababanchete inwe , imbuya ki mobwate ? ekiagera nonya nabanyene ebibe iga babanchete abwo ababanchete ,
42006033	Kamorabakorere amaya abwo abakobakorera inwe amaya , mbuya ki mobwate ? Ekiagera nonya nabanyene ebibe nabo bagokora .
42006034	Naende komorarue singo as'abanto mosemeretie konyora egento asebare naende , imbuya ki mobwate ? Ekiagera nonya nabanyene ebibe iga bakorua singo as'abanyene ebibe , erinde banyore koreng'ana .
42006035	Korende banche ababisa baino , bakorere as'obuya , nakorua singo , motari korengereria konyora egento naende ; eng'eria yaino nebe enene , namobe abana b'Oyore Igoro Mono : ekiagera ere nomuya as'abanto batari nokoiraneria ng'a mbuya , nababe .
42006036	Nabo mobe namabera , buna Is'oino are namabera .
42006037	Timogambia , nainwe timogambigwa : timonachera , nainwe timonacherwa ; tigerana , nainwe namotigerwe :
42006038	karue , nainwe namoegwe ; ekerengo ekiya keigateire , kiainyageirwe , giaichoire , nakio abanto barabae inwe ebikuba biaino . Ekiagera ekerengo keria mokorengera , nakio morache korengerwa nainwe .
42006039	Akabatebia omoreng'anio , Omouko nonyare koraa omouko ? tibakogwa bonsi babere engoro ?
42006040	Omworokigwa tari igoro as'omworokia ; korende ker'oyomo gaikeranire , nabe buna omworokia oye .
42006041	Nabo , naki okorigereria ekeogoto kere as'eriso ri'oyomino , nomoribo ore eriso riao ime tori koyorora ?
42006042	Gose naki oratebie oyomino , Oyominto , ntige ndusie ekeogoto kere eriso riao , naye omonyene torochi omoribo ore as'eriso riao ? Omong'ainereria , rusia ritang'ani omoribo ore eriso riao , nario orarore buya korusia ekeogoto kere as'eriso ri'oyomino .
42006043	Ekiagera omote tori omuya okwama amatunda amabe ; gose omote omobe okwama amatunda amaya .
42006044	Ekiagera ker'omote iga okomanyekana as'amatunda aye . Ekiagera as'amagwa tibari gotwa amako , gose as'emekenene tibari gotwa emesabibu .
42006045	Omonto omuya as'enibo engiya y'omoyo oye igakorua ayare amaya ; nomonto omobe as'enibo embe y'omoyo oye igakorua ayare amabe : naki ebichire as'enkoro , nabio omonwa ogokwana ,
42006046	Naseki mokondoka Omonene , Omonene , nainwe timori koyakora aya ngoteba ?
42006047	Ker'omonto ogocha asende nakoyaigwa amang'ana ane nakoyakora nimborokie omogwekano :
42006048	igagwekaine nomonto okoagacha enyomba , agakunya akarema gochia inse mono , akabeka oboroso bwaye igoro as'egetare : ekero yachia gocha etoigo , eoro ekayeaka enyomba eria nechinguru , tiyanyara koyenyegeria , ekiagera oboroso bwaye bwabegetwe igoro as'egetare .
42006049	Nere oyokoigwa otari gokora iga agwekaine nomonto oagachete enyomba igoro as'amaroba atari noboroso ; nabo eoro ekayeaka nechinguru , ekagwa bwango , nokogwa kw'enyomba eria gokaba okonene .
42007001	Agachia koyakora amang'ana aye onsi as'amato abanto , agasoa Kaperinaum .
42007002	Nomosomba oyomo bw'omonene bw'abarwani , konya onyarekire ang'e nogokwa , nere nomonto bwanchire nere mono .
42007003	Agachia koigwa amang'ana a Yesu agatoma asare abagaka b'Abayahudi komosaba ache amokonye omosomba oye .
42007004	Nabarabwo bagachia goika ase Yesu , bakamosorora as'omokia , bakabora , Nagwenerete omokorere ring'ana eri :
42007005	ekiagera nanchete egesaku giaito , nere natoagacherete esunagogi yaito ,
42007006	Nabo Yesu akagenda amo nabarabwo . Goika agachia koba tari are as'enyomba yaye , oria omonene bw'abarwani agatoma abasani asare , okomotebia , Omonene , tibwerosia : ekiagera tingwenereti inche aye osoe inse as'ekerama kiane .
42007007	As'ayio iga neroche tingwenereti gocha asore : korende kwana ring'ana rioka , nomosomba one nagwene .
42007008	Naki ninche nomonto ore inse as'ogochika , ninde nabarwani inse asende : Kondamotebie oyo , Genda , ogenda ; noyo , Inchuo , oche ; nomosomba one , Kora iga , okora .
42007009	Yesu agachia koigwa aya akamoichanera , akayionchorera emeganda yarenge komotunyana , akabora , Nabatebirie , Nonya nase Isiraeli tindarora okwegena okonge buna oko .
42007010	Nabo baria batometwe bagachia koirana nyomba mwaye , bakamonyora oria omosomba , konya onyarekire , obaire omogima .
42007011	Egachia koba nyuma as'aya bwango , akagenda omochie okorokwa Naini ; aborokigwa baye bakagenda amo nere , nabanto abange .
42007012	Nabo , agachia goika ang'e as'egeita ki'omochie , rora , agwo nkiarengeo egetondo kebogoirie isiko , omwana omomoima ase ng'ina oye , nere nomoboraka ; nabanto b'omochie abange mbarenge amo nere .
42007013	N'Omonene agachia komorora akamororera amabera , akamotebia , Torera .
42007014	Akagenda ang'e akagekuna ekige ; baria ababogoria bagatenena . Agakwana , Omomura , nagotebirie , Imoka .
42007015	Keria egetondo gegaikaransa , gegachaka gokwana . Akamoa ng'ina .
42007016	Omoondoko okababwata bonsi : bakamotogia ' Nyasaye , bakobora , Omobani omonene oorokire as'egati yaito : na Nyasaye obacheire abanto baye .
42007017	chinkuma echio chigasarera asare ense yonsi ya Boyahudi , nas'ense yonsi yaetanaine .
42007018	Nabo aborokigwa ba Yohana , bakamotebia aya onsi .
42007019	Yohana akarangeria babere as'aborokigwa baye , akabatoma as'Omonene , ogoteba , Aye naye ogocha , gose nomoao tokoganya ?
42007020	Nabo abanto abwo bagaika asare , bakamotebia , Yohana Omobatisi ototomire asore okobora , Aye naye ogocha , gose nomoao tokoganya ?
42007021	As'ensa eria akabagwenia abanto abange amarwaire abo , nemechando yabo , nebirecha ebibe ; nemeuko emenge akayeramokia ekarora .
42007022	Akabairaneria , akabatebia , Genda , momotebie Yohana ayamwarora naya mwaigwa : emeuko nkororere , ebisegora ngotarabire , abanyene ukoma ngosibekabare , emetino nkoigwere , ebitondo nkobokigwabire , abataka nkoranderigwabare amang'ana amaya ,
42007023	Nare negesio onde bwonsi oyotagochiri nainche .
42007024	Nabaria abatomwa ba Yohana , bachia kogenda , agachaka koyetebia emeganda amang'ana a Yohana . Nki mwachiete korora aria eroro ime ? Egetonto gekonyegerigwa nembeo ?
42007025	Korende iga mwasogete kogenda korora ki ? Nomonto oboirie chianga chinterere ? Rigereria , abakweboa chianga chingiya mono nakoba moyo as'obwansu bw'ebinto bakoria , iga bare ase chinyomba chi'abaruoti .
42007026	Korende iga mwasogete kogenda korora ki ? Omobani ? Nabo , nabatebirie , kobua omobani .
42007027	Oyio nere orikeretwe amang'ana aya , Rigereria , inche namotomire omotomwa one as'obosio bwao , Oyoranyare korosia enchera yao as'obosio bwao .
42007028	Ekiagera nabatebirie , As'okoibora kw'abakungu omobani onde tari omonene kobua Yohana : korende oyore omoke as'obonda bwa Nyasaye nomonene kobua ere .
42007029	Abanto bonsi nabakorusia ebango bagachia koigwa , bakamoa Nyasaye oboronge , ekiagera babatisirwe as'ebatiso ya Yohana .
42007030	Korende Abafarisai naborokia b'amachiko bagekanera ekina kia Nyasaye ekiagera batabatisetwe nere .
42007031	Omonene akabora , Nimbareng'anie nagento ki abanto b'ekegori eke ? Nabarabwo iga bareng'aine naki ?
42007032	Iga bareng'aine nabana baikaransete echiro , bakorangerania ; bakobora , Twababugeirie ebiroria , nainwe timwatenga ; twarerire , nainwe timwarera .
42007033	Ekiagera Yohana Omobatisi igachete , tarekoria omogati gose tarekonywa edivai ; nainwe mogoteba , Nare nekerecha .
42007034	Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ochire , okoria nakonywa , nainwe mogoteba , Rora nomonto omoribobe , nogotinda neejivai , omosani bw'ababangi nabanyene ebibe !
42007035	Nobong'aini bwanyorire oboronge bwaye nabana baye bonsi .
42007036	Omonto oyomo as'Abafarisai akamorigia arie endagera amo nere . Agasoa as'enyomba yaye oria Omofarisai , agaikaransa as'endagera .
42007037	Na rora , omokungu oyomo as'omochie oria orenge omonyene ebibe ; agachia konyora amang'ana ng'a oikaransire as'enyomba y'oria Omofarisai , akareta echuba y'amaguta ayerimisu rigiya ,
42007038	agatenena korwa nyuma ang'e namagoro aye , okorera , agachaka komoiyereria amariga aye as'amagoro aye , nakoyatinyia as'etukia y'omotwe oye , okonyunyunta amagoro aye , nakoyaaka aria amaguta .
42007039	Oria Omofarisai omorangeretie , agachia koyarora aya , akeboria as'omoyo ime , ogoteba , Omonto oyo onye nomobani orenge , anga namomanya oyo ng'a nere ng'o ! gose ' mokungu ki okomokuna , ng'a nomonyene ebibe ,
42007040	Yesu akairaneria akamotebia , Simon , ninde nering'ana ngogotebia , akabora , Omworokia , kwana .
42007041	Omonto oyomo omorua singo orenge nabasira babere : oyomo omoriete esira ye chidinari chimia isano , noyokabere emerongo etano .
42007042	Nabarabwo tibarenge nagento bagoakana , akababera bonsi babere . Gaki as'abwo ning'o oramwanche kobua ?
42007043	Simon akairaneria akabora , Iga ndabore noria bwabeirwe nere ebinge . Akamotebia , Kwanachire boronge .
42007044	Akamweonchorera oriaomokungu , akamoteba Simon , Kwamororire omokungu oyo ? Nasoa enyomba yao , tikwang'a amache ay'ogwesibia amagoro : korende oyo osibirie amagoro ane namariga aye , nakoyabusa netukia y'omotwe oye .
42007045	Tonyunyunteti ; korende ere korwa ekero nasoete aa tatigeti konyunyunta amagoro ane .
42007046	Tong'ageti omotwe one amaguta : korende ere ong'akire amagoro ane amaguta agotioka buya .
42007047	As'engecho y'ayio , nagotebirie , ebibe biaye ebinge biabeirwe ; ekiagera ogwancha kwaye nokonge : nere oyokwaberwa ake iga anchete ake .
42007048	Akamotebia , Kwabeirwe ebibe biao .
42007049	Nabaria baikaransete amo nere bagachaka goteba ime as'emioyo yabo , Ning'o oyo okwabera nonya nebibe ?
42007050	Akamotebia oria omokungu , Okwegena kwao gwagokonyire ; genda nomorembe .
42008001	Ekaba bwango nyuma as'ekero keria , akaba ngoetananare as'emechie nebichie , okorandia nagotebia amang'ana amaya ay'obonda bwa Nyasaye . Nabaria ikomi nababere iga barenge amo nere .
42008002	Nabakungu bande abakonyetwe nere ebirecha ebibe namarwaire , Mariamu ore korokwa Magdalene , oruetwe nebirecha bitano nabibere ,
42008003	Na Yoana , moka Kuza omorendi bwe Herode , na Susana , nabande abange , iga barenge kobakorera as'enibo yabn .
42008004	Nekero emeganda emenge yasangererekanete , nabanto ba ker'omochie bakamochera , agakwana as'omoreng'anio :
42008005	Omobusuri omanoire kogenda kobusura embusuro yaye : ekero akobusura , echinde chikagwa ang'e nenchera ; chigatiringwa namagoro , chinyoni chi'igoro chigachiria .
42008006	Nechinde chikagwa as'egetare ; chikamera , chikoma as'okomocha amache .
42008007	Nechinde chikagwa gati as'amagwa : naro amagwa akamera amo nachirochio , agachimiga .
42008008	Echinde chikagwa ase riroba rigiya , chikamera , chikama emia eyemo . Ekero akobatchia aya , akaaka eriogi , akabora , Oyore namato aigwe .
42008009	Aborokigwa baye bakamoboria , bakobora , Omoreng'anio oyio ninki ?
42008010	Agateba , Inwe mwaeirwe kobomanya obobisi bw'obonda bwa Nyasaye : korende abande as'emereng'anio ; erinde bakorora , tibarora , naende bakoigwa , tibamanya .
42008011	Nomoreng'anio nor'oyo : Embusuro ne Ring'ana ria Nyasaye .
42008012	Nabaria b'enchera , nabwo bakoigwa ; erio ochicha saitani , nakorirusia riria ring'ana as'emioyo yabo , erinde tibacha gwancha bakonyeke .
42008013	Nabaria bare as'egetare nabwo baria , bakorigwa ring'ana , baribwata nomogoko ; naba tibari nemeri , bancha as'ekero egeke , nekero gi'ogotemwa berusia .
42008014	Nechio chiagwete as'amagwa , aba nabwo bakoigwa , nabarabwo kobakogenda enchera yabo bamigwa nokorengereria kw'enibo , nomogoko bw'obogima , tibama as'ogoikerania .
42008015	Nechinde chire as'amaroba amaya , aba nabwo as'emioyo emiya naende ey'ekeene , bakorigwa ring'ana , baribwata , bama noboremereria botambe .
42008016	Omonto onde tari ogotongia etaya nakoyemumeka negento gose koyebeka ' berere nyaro ; korende iga akoyebeke igoro as'ekebekerero kiaye , erinde abagosoa bayorore omobaso ,
42008017	Ekiagera ring'ana tiriri rirabiseke , ritache kooroka ; gose ring'ana rirabiswe , ritache komanyekana maiso marore .
42008018	Rigereria gaki inwe buna mokoigwa : ekiagera ere oyobwate , naegwe ; nere oyotabwati , naurwe nonya keria arengereretie abwate .
42008019	Ng'ina nabamura bamwabo bakamochiera , korende tibanyara komoika ang'e ekiagera as'omosangererekano .
42008020	Akairerwa amang'ana , bakamotebia , Nyoko nabamura bamino mbateneine isiko , mbarigetie gokorora .
42008021	Korende akairaneria akabatebia , Baba nabminto nabw'aba abakoigwa ring'ana ria Nyasaye nakorikora .
42008022	Rikaba rituko erimo ri'amatuko aria , akarina obwato , ere naborokigwa baye ; akabatebia , Twamboke goika ng'umbu y'enyancha : bakamanora ,
42008023	Kobachia kogenda , akarara chitoro ; ogacha omwaga omonene igoro as'enyancha ; obwato bagachaka goichorwa namache , bakaba as'emechando .
42008024	Bakamochiera , bakamotura , bakobora , Omworokia , omworokia , ngosiratore . Akaboka , akayekania embeo , nemerindo y'amache : bigakira , gokaba ogotoerera .
42008025	Akabatebia , Okwegena kwaino ng'ai kore ? bakairoka , bagakumia , bagatebania , Oyo nere ng'o , okobichika nonya nembeo nenyancha bikomoigwera ?
42008026	Bagaika engegu as'ense y'Abagadareni , erigereretie Galili .
42008027	Goika agachia goika engegu , akanyorwa nomonto oyomo bw'omochie oria , orenge nebirecha ; nas'ekero ekenene igarenge tarenge kweboyia chianga , tarenge goikaransa ' nyomba , tatiga ase chimbera ime .
42008028	Agachia komorora Yesu akaaka egeturi , akagwa as'obosio bwaye , agakwana as'eriogi rinene , Ninki nde naye , Yesu , Omwana o Nyasaye Ore Igoro Mono ? Nagosabire , tonchanda .
42008029	Ekiagera ogechikire keria ekerecha ki'eubi komosoka omonto oria . Ekiagera ebiro ebinge iga kiare komobwata : nere osibwa , orendwa nagosibwa nebinyuri ne chingatare ; abibutora biria ebisibo , agaserigwa nakeria ekerecha goika chiroro ime .
42008030	Yesu akamoboria , Naki okorokwa ? Agateba , Legioni ; ekiagera ebirecha ebinge biamosoire .
42008031	Bikamosorora tabichika bigende goika as'engoro entambe .
42008032	Ndiarengeo riicho rie chingurue chinyinge , chiare korisia egetunwa igoro : bikamosorora abie ribaga bichisoe . Akabia ribaga .
42008033	Biria ebirecha bikamorua omonto oria , bigachisoa chingurue : riicho riria rigatirimboka bwango eora goika chigakwa enyancha ime .
42008034	Abarisia bagachia korora , bagatama gochia ka , bagateba amang'ana omochie ime nas'emegondo .
42008035	Bagasoka barore amang'ana aorokire ; bakamochiera Yesu , bakamorora oria omonto osokirwe nabiria ebirecha , oikaransete as'amagoro a Yesu : obegete chianga , ore nobong'aini bwaye : bakairoka .
42008036	Nabarabwo abaroche bakaborokereria buna oria omonyene ebirecha akonywa .
42008037	Nabanto bonsi b'ense y'Abagadareni chinsemo chiria bakamosaba arue asebare : ekiagera babwatetwe nokoiroka okonge : nabo agasoa obwato akairana .
42008038	Noria omonto oruetwe nebirecha akamosorora abe amo nere : korende Yesu akamokania , akabora ,
42008039	Irana ' nyomba mwao , oyarandie amang'ana amanene agokoreire Nyasaye . Akagenda enchera yaye , akarandia omochie omogima amang'ana amanene aya Yesu amokorera .
42008040	Yesu agachia koirana emesangerereko ekamogokera ; ekiagera abanto bonsi bamoganyete .
42008041	Naende rora , omonto oyomo erieta riaye Yairo akamochera , nere igarenge omonene bw'esunagogi : akagwa as'amagoro a Yesu , akamosorora asoe enyomba yaye ;
42008042	ekiagera narenge nomoiseke , omwana omomoima , emiaka yaye konya okorire ikomi nebere , nere igarenge ang'e as'ogokwa . Nas'okogenda kwaye emeganda ekamomiga .
42008043	Naende omokungu oyomo oyorenge korua amanyinga korwa emiaka ikomi nebere , oyosiareire ebinto bionsi ebiarenge nabio as'abagwenia , tanyara kogwenigwa nabarabwo ,
42008044	akamochiera korwa nyuma , akamokuna omobarero bw'eanga yaye : erio kegima amanyinga aye agakama ,
42008045	Yesu akabora , Ning'o onkuna ? ekero abanto bonsi bagakana , Petero nabarabwo barenge amo nere bakamotebia , Omonene , emeganda nigo egoetanaine nagokomiga .
42008046	Yesu agateba , omonto onkunire : ekiagera narorire chinguru chiandure .
42008047	Oria omokungu agachia korora tabisegeti , agacha okoiguswa , akamogwera , amworokie as'abanto bonsi engecho yagera omokuna , naende buna agwenigwa ara rimo .
42008048	Akamotebia , Omwana one , okwegena kwao gwagokonyire : genda as'omorembe .
42008049	Erio kagokwana , omonto agacha , korwa as'enyomba y'oria omonene bw'esunagogi , akamotebia , Omoiseke oo okure , tomorosia Omworokia .
42008050	Yesu ochia koigwa erio , akamoiraneria akabora , Toiroka : ancha rioka , nere nakonywe .
42008051	Agachia goika ' nyomba , tamotiga omonto asoe amo nere , tatiga Petero , na Yakobo na Yohana , n'ise oria omwana na ng'ina .
42008052	Nabanto bonsi iga barenge korera , bakomweng'erereria ; korende akabora , Timorera : ekiagera takweti , korende igaraire .
42008053	Bakamosekerera mono , kobamanyire ng'a okure .
42008054	Nere akabaseria bonsi isiko , akamobwata okoboko kwaye , ogoteba , Omoiseke , imoka .
42008055	Omoika oye okairana , agatenena erio kegima : agachika aegwe endagera arie .
42008056	Aba moibori baye bagakumia mono , akabachika tibamotebia ' monto ayakoreka .
42009001	Akabarangeria baria ikomi nababere , akabaa okobua nechinguru igoro as'ebirecha bionsi , nakogwenia amarwaire .
42009002	Akabatoma koborandia obonda bwa Nyasaye nakogwenia abarwaire .
42009003	Akabatebia , Timobogoria ' gento ki'orogendo , nonya nenyimbo , gose esaro , gose omogati , gose chifetha ; naende timoba nechikansu ibere .
42009004	Naende enyomba ende yonsi morasoe , ikaransa aroro goika morue aroro .
42009005	Naende abatabaroiseti , komogosoka korwa omochie oria , kong'onta orotu rw'amagoro aino erinde robe kirori asebare .
42009006	Bakagenda , bagaetanana as'emechie , bakorandia enchili , nakogwenia chinsemo chionsi .
42009007	Herode omonene akaigwa onsi ayakoretwe nere : agaichanigwa mono , ekiagera abande bare goteba ng'a Yohana obokire korwa as'amakweri ;
42009008	nabande ng'a n'Elija oorokire ; nabande ng'a nomobani oyomo ase baria ba kare obokire .
42009009	Herode agateba , Yohana namonachete omotwe : korende ning'o oyo rende naigure amang'ana are buna aya ? Akarigia komorora .
42009010	Baria abatomwa bachia koirana bakamotebia amang'ana onsi ayabakora , Akabaira , akagenda bobisi as'omochie okorokwa Bethisaida .
42009011	Nemeganda egachia korora bakamotunyana : akabagokera , agakwana nabarabwo amang'ana obonda bwa Nyasaye , akabagwenia abarenge nokorigia okogwenigwa .
42009012	Erioba rigachaka kogwa na baria ikomi nababere bakamochiera , bakamotebia , Nyetige emeganda egende goika as'emechie nechinsemo chietanaine , banyore aase bakorara , nendagera : ekiagera aiga tore aase eroro .
42009013	Akabatebia , Inwe bae endagera , Bakabora , Titobwati gento tatiga emegati etano nechinswe ibere ; tatiga toragende kobagorera endagera abanto aba bonsi .
42009014	Ekiagera barengeo abasacha ang'e chilifu isano . Akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Baikaransie abanto as'ebiombe , ase ker'ekeombe abanto emerongo etano .
42009015	Bagakora bo , bakabaikaransia bonsi .
42009016	Akayebogoria eria emegati etano nachiria chinswe ibere , akarigereria igoro , kabisesenia , akabisamunyora , akabaa aborokigwa , kobibeka as'amasio emeganda .
42009017	Bakaria , bakaigota bonsi : nabiria ebisamunye ebiatigarete bigachorwa , ebitonga ikomi nabibere .
42009018	Agachia koba ngosabare ere bweka , aborokigwa baye iga barenge amo nere : akababoria , akabora , Emeganda iga ekobora ng'a ninche ng'o ?
42009019	Bakairaneria , bakabora , Yohana Omobatisi : nabande Elija ; nabande ng'a nomobani oyomo ase baria ba kare obokire .
42009020	Akabatebia , Nainwe iga mokobora ng'a ninche ng'o ? Petero akairaneria , akabora , Kristo o Nyasaye .
42009021	Akabachika nakobakania tibamotebia ' monto ring'ana eri ;
42009022	agateba , Nemogwenerete Omwana-o-mwanyabanto anyore ogochandwa okonge , nakwangwa nabagaka , nabakuani abanene , nabariki , nagoitwa , nerituko ria gatato naboke .
42009023	Akabatebia bonsi , oyokorigia gontunyana , ekanye omonyene , etweke omosalaba oye kera rituko , antunyane .
42009024	Naki omonto bwonsi orarigie gokonya obogima oyio nabosirie ; nere orasirie obogima bwaye as'engecho yane , oyio nabokonye .
42009025	Ekiagera inki keramogwenere omonto karanyore ense yonsi nagwesiria ? gose ogosiria obogima bwaye ?
42009026	Ekiagera ker'omonto orandorere obosoku inche namang'ana ane , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto namororere obosoku oyio kagocha as'obonene bwaye , nobw'Ise oye , nobw'amalaika amachenu .
42009027	Ancha , nabatebirie , Mbare abanto as'aba bateneine aa , abataigwe amakweri nonya ng'ake , goika baborore obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42009028	Agachia koba amatuko atano natato nyuma as'amang'ana aya , akamoira Petero na Yohana na Yakobo , akarina egetunwa gosaba .
42009029	Ekaba ochia gosaba , ekieni ki'obosio bwaye gegaonchoka , nechianga chiaye chikaba chindabu , chikamekameka .
42009030	Naende rora , abanto babere barenge bagokwana nere , nabarabwo Musa na Elija ;
42009031	barorekanete as'obonene , bagakwana amang'ana ogokwa kwaye nagwenerete goikerania Yerusalemu .
42009032	Petero , nabarabwo abarenge amo nere , konya banyarirwe nechitoro : korende bachia koboka , bakaborora obonene bwaye , nabaria abanto babere , batenenete amo nere .
42009033	Egachia koba ekero abwo barenge gweatanana nere , Petero akamotebia Yesu , Omonene , imbuya intwe koba aiga : tokore ebigutu bitato ; ekemo ekiao , ekemo ekia Musa , ekemo ekia Elija : nere tamanyete eki agokwana .
42009034	Ekero agokwana amang'ana aya , rikabao rire , rikababeka ekiriri : bakairoka kobachia gosoa ase rire .
42009035	Eriogi rigasoka ase rire riria rigoteba , Oyo n'Omwana one , omwanchi one , moigwere .
42009036	Neriogi eri riachia gocha , Yesu akarorekana bweka , Nabarabwo bagakira , tibamotebia ' monto as'amatuko aria ring'ana rinde rionsi ri'ayio ayabaroche .
42009037	Ekaba rituko ria kabere riaye , bagachia goika korwa egetunwa , omoganda okaumerana nere .
42009038	Naende rora , omonto oyomo as'oria omoganda akaaka egeturi , okobora , Omworokia , nagosabire , omorigererie omwana ene , ekiagera ere nomwana one omomoima :
42009039	na rora , ekerecha iga gekomobwata , nere bwango iga akorera ; naende iga gekomogaragaria , asokia amauro , korende tikeri komorua tatiga as'okomosionora mono .
42009040	Nabasaba aborokia bao bamoserie tibanyara .
42009041	Yesu akairaneria akabora , Inwe ekegori getari nokwegena naende ekebe , nimbe amo nainwe goika ririri ? morete omwana oo aiga .
42009042	Agachia koba nkomochierare , keria ekerecha gekamoiyeria gekamogaragaria . Yesu agagekania ekerecha keria , akagwenia oria omwana , akamoiraneria ise oye .
42009043	Abanto bonsi bagakumia as'okobua kwa Nyasaye . Korende ekero bonsi babete nogokumia as'amang'ana onsi ayakorete , akabatebia aborokigwa .
42009044	Yabeke amang'ana aya amato aino : ekiagera Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare kobekwa as'amaboko abanto .
42009045	Korende tibarimanyete ring'ana riria , rikaba ndiabiswa asebare tibanyara korimanya : bakairoka komoboria engecho ye ring'ana riria .
42009046	Okoamererania , gokabasoa , ning'o orabe omonene as'egati yabo .
42009047	Nere Yesu agachia korora okorengereria kw'emioyo yabo , akabogoria akana akamobeka ang'e asare ,
42009048	akabatebia , ker'omonto oraganche akana aka as'erieta riane , onyanchire inche : naende ker'omonto oranyanche inche , omwanchire ere oyontomete . Ekiagera ere oyore omoke as'egati yaino inwe , oyio nabe omonene .
42009049	Yohana akairaneria , akabora , Omworokia , ntwamorora omonto ogoseria ebirecha as'erieta riao , tokamokania , ekiagera latotunyanete intwe .
42009050	Yesu akamotebia , Timomokania : ekiagera oyo tari ao naintwe , igare as'ensemo yaito .
42009051	Rikaba rituko ri'okorinigwa kwaye igoro rigachia koba ang'e goikerana , ere omonyene akaboirania obosio bwaye kogenda Yerusalemu .
42009052	Agatoma abatomwa gotang'ana as'obosio bwaye : bakagenda bagasoa as'omochie bw'Abasamaria , erinde beroisie babe ang'e asare .
42009053	Nabarabwo tibamoroisia , ekiagera obosio bwaye oboonchoire kogenda Yerusalemu .
42009054	Aborokigwa baye Yakobo na Yohana bagachia korora aya , bakabora , Omonene , norigetie toyotebie omorero oike korwa igoro obasirie buna Elija akorete ?
42009055	Ageonchora , akabakania , akabora , Timomanyeti nomoyo ore naki more noro .
42009056	Ekiagera Omwana-o-mwanyabanto tachete kobosiria obogima bw'abanabamwanyabanto , korende kobokonya . Bakagenda as'omochie onde .
42009057	Naende bagachia koba nkogendabare ' nchera , omonto oyomo akamotebia , ningotunyane aande onsi okogenda , Omonene .
42009058	Yesu akamotebia , Ebibwe mbire namakuruma , nechinyoni chi'igoro nchire nebiswa biabo , korende Omwana-o-mwanyabanto tari naase akobeka omotwe oye .
42009059	Akamotebia oyonde , Ntunyane . Akabora , Omonene , ing'a ribaga ritang'ani ngende gotindeka tata .
42009060	Akamotebia , Batige abakure batindeke abakure babo ; korende aye genda oborandie obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42009061	Naende oyonde nere akabora , Ningotunyane , Omonene : korende ritang'ani ing'a ribaga mbaakere ng'a morare buya abanto b'enyomba yane .
42009062	Yesu akamotebia , Omonto tari orabeke okoboko kwaye as'obokombe , naende arigererie nyuma , oragwenere as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42010001	Nabo erio nyuma as'amang'ana aya , Omonene agachora abande emerongo etano nebere , akabatoma babere babere bamotang'anere kogenda ker'omochie naase arengereretie kogenda omonyene ,
42010002	Akabatebia , Rigesa nerinene , korende abakori emeremo nabake : mosabe gaki , Omonene bwe rigesa , anyare gotoma abakori emeremo ase rigesa riaye .
42010003	Genda chinchera chiaino : rigereria , nabatomire inwe buna chimanwa chie ching'ondi gati gati ye chisese chi'orosana ,
42010004	timobogoria ekemoya , gose esaro , gose ebikoroto : gose timomokwania omonto ' nchera ,
42010005	Nenyomba ende yonsi mogosoa , ritang'ani bora , Omorembe obe enyomba imaa .
42010006	Onye oreo omwana bw'omorembe , omorembe oino noikaranse asare : korende onye taibo , nobairanere inwe .
42010007	Ikaransa as'enyomba eyio eyio , morie nakonywa ebi bakobaa : ekiagera omokori emeremo nagwenerete koegwa eng'eria yaye . Timogenda enyomba as'enyomba .
42010008	Nomochie onde bwonsi morasoe , kobarabaroisie , birie ebinto biria biabekirwe as'amasio aino .
42010009	Bagwenie abarwaire bareo , batebie , Obonda bwa Nyasaye bwabaikeire ang'e .
42010010	Nomochie onde bwonsi morasoe , nabarabwo batabaroiseti , soka , komogoeta ase chinchera chiaye , nagoteba ,
42010011	nonya norotu oro rw'omochie oino , rwabwatanire namagoro aito , twarwabusire igoro asemore ; korende manya aya , ng'a obonda bwa Nyasaye bwaikire ang'e .
42010012	Nabatebirie , Nabe aororo Sodomu koremereria rituko riria kobua omochie oria .
42010013	Obobe nobwao , Korazin ! Obobe nobwao Bethisaida ! ekiagera onye mbiakoregete ase Turo na Sidon ebikone biakoregete asemore , anga mbaonchogete kare , baikaranse ase chianga chie chigunia neribu .
42010014	Korende nabe aororo Turo na Sidon koremereria rituko riria ri'ekina , kobua inwe .
42010015	Naye Kaperinaum , aye oyoimokererigwe goika igoro ; noche goikigwa goika amakweri .
42010016	Oyokobaigwera inwe , nanyigwere inche , nere oyokobanga inwe , onyangire inche ; nere oyokonyanga inche omwangire ere oyontomete .
42010017	Baria emerongo etano nebere bakairana nomogoko , bagoteba , Omonene , nonya nebirecha biatoigwereire as'erieta riao .
42010018	Akabatebia , Namororire saitani buna okomesa okogwa korwa igoro .
42010019	Rora , nabaire okobua gochitindacha ching'iti chionsi na nge , nechinguru chionsi chi'oria omobisa gose gento kende tikeri kerarete obororo asemore .
42010020	Korende timogoka as'aya ng'a ebirecha biabaigwereire ; korende goka ekiagera amarieta aino arikirwe igoro .
42010021	Ensa eria eria Yesu agasasoka as'Omoika Omochenu , akabora , Nakobakire , Tata , Omonene o igoro nense , ekiagera kwababisire abanyene obong'aini nechisemi amang'ana aya , okabayamanorera abana abake : nabo , Tata ; ekiagera nabio biagwenerete as'obosio bwao .
42010022	Naeirwe ebinto bionsi na Tata one : ' monto onde tari omomanyete Omwana gose nere ng'o , tatiga Tata : gose Tata nere ng'o , tatiga Omwana , nomonto onde bwonsi Omwana anchete iga akomoorokeria .
42010023	Akabeonchorera aborokigwa baye , akabatebia bobisi , Nare negesio amaiso arorire aya mwarorire inwe :
42010024	naki nabatebirie ; ababani abange nabaruoti bakarigia koyarora aya mwarorire inwe , tibayarora , nakoyaigwa aya mwaigure tibayaigwa .
42010025	Omwana bw'amachiko oyomo agatenena okomotema , akabora , Omworokia , inki ndakore nyore obogima bwa kare nakare ?
42010026	Akamotebia , As'amariko inki kerikire ? Naki ogosoma ?
42010027	Nere akairaneria akabora , Mwanche Omonene Nyasaye oo nomoyo oo bwonsi , nenkoro yao yonsi , nechinguru chiao chionsi , nobong'aini bwao bwonsi , nomogisangi'oo mwanche buna bwanchete omobere oo .
42010028	Akamotebia , Kwairaneirie buya : kora iga , nario orachie kare .
42010029	Nere akarigia gwekora omonyene oboronge , akamotebia Yesu , Nomogisangi one ning'o ?
42010030	Yesu akairaneria akabora , narenge omonto ore gotirimboka korwa Yerusalemu goika Yeriko : akagwa as'amaboko abauri , bakamorusia chianga , bakamoaka chingoma , bakagenda , bakamotiga oisire gokwa .
42010031	As'egesio akaoroka omokuani oyomo ogoeta as'enchera eria ; akamorora , agaeta ensemo .
42010032	N'Omolawi boigo agachia goika aase aria akamorora agaeta ensemo .
42010033	Korende Omosamaria oyomo gagotara , akamochiera : nere agachia komorora akamororera amabera ,
42010034	nabo akamoika ang'e , akamoboa chingoma chiaye , akabeka amaguta nedivai ; akamorinia igoro as'eng'iti yaye , akamoreta as'enyomba y'abageni , akamorwaria .
42010035	Goika mambia yaye akarua chishilingi ibere , akamoa omonyene enyomba , akamotebia , Morende buya ; nakende gionsi orarue kobua , kondairane naende , ningoakane .
42010036	Naki oroche rende as'abaiga batato , norori orenge omogisangio oye ere oyogwete as'amaboko abauri ?
42010037	Akabora , Noria omororerete amabera . Yesu akamotebia , Genda , naye okore boigo .
42010038	Nabarabwo bagachia koba nkogendabare , agasoa as'omochie oyomo : nomokungu oyomo , erieta riaye Maritha , akamoroisia as'enyomba yaye .
42010039	Nere narenge noyomwabo omokungu ore korokwa Mariamu , nere iga aikaransete as'amagoro a Yesu , okoigwa amang'ana aye .
42010040	Korende Maritha igarenge gochandeka as'ogokora okonge ; akamochiera , akabora , Omonene , noroche aye buna oyominto antigire gokora inche bweka ? Nabo motchie ankonye .
42010041	Omonene akamoiraneria akamotebia , Maritha , Maritha , iga okwerosia nagweichania as'engecho y'amang'ana amange :
42010042	korende nkore okorigia kw'egento ekemo gioka , na Mariamu oyechorire ensemo ere engiya , as'ayio takoyeurwa .
42011001	Egachia koba ore aase gete , ogosaba , gakorire , oyomo as'aborokigwa baye akamotebia , Omonene , tworokie ogosaba buna Yohana aborogetie aborokigwa baye .
42011002	Akabatebia , Komogosaba , teba : Tata oito ore igoro , Erieta riao ribe buya . Obonda bwao boche . Obwanchani bwao bokoreke ense buna bwakoretwe igoro .
42011003	Otoe kera rituko endagera yaito .
42011004	Otwabere ebibe biaito , buna tokwabera ker'omonto otokorire bobe . Totoira as'ogotemwa , korende otokonye noria omobe .
42011005	Akabatebia , Ning'o asemore ore nomosani oramochiere botuko gati amotebia , ' Mosani , ing'a singo emegati etato :
42011006	naki omosani one ochire asende , korwa orogendo , ninche tindi nagento nkomoterekera ;
42011007	noria ore ime namoiranerie , nagoteba , Tondosia : egesieri giasiekirwe , nabana bane bararire amo nainche ' borere ; tinkonyara koimoka nkoe .
42011008	Nabatebirie , Nataimoka amoe ekiagera nomosani oye , korende ekiagera oria tari gotiga ogosaba naimoke nakomoa ebi bionsi arigetie .
42011009	Nainche nabatebirie inwe , saba namoegwe ; rigia namonyore ; tura namoigorerwe .
42011010	Ekiagera ker'oyogosaba iga akoegwa : nere oyokorigia iga akonyora ; nere oyogotura iga akoigorerwa .
42011011	Ekiagera ning'o asemore ore ise , omwana oye amosabe obokima , inee , namoe rigena ? gose karamosabe enswe , ase ribaga ri'enswe namoe eng'iti ?
42011012	Gose karamosabe rigena , namoe nge ?
42011013	Nabo , onye inwe abamore ababe mwamanyire kobaa abana baino ebiegwa ebiya , inee , Tata oino ore igoro , takomenta mono kobaa bonsi abakomosaba Omoika Omochenu ?
42011014	Yesu ngoseria arenge ekerecha rimama . Gegachia koba keria ekerecha kogiasokire , omonto oria rimama rigakwana ; emegznda egakumia .
42011015	Abande babo bagateba , nase Beelizebuli , omonene bw'ebirecha akorusia ebirecha ,
42011016	Abande as'okomotema bakarigia egekone ki'igoro .
42011017	Nere , akabimanya ebirengererio biabo , akabatebia , ker'oboruoti bwatananekanire asebore obonyene iga bogokoreka amatongo ; nenyomba yatananekanire asere enyene igekogwa .
42011018	Nere Saitani naboigo karatananeke omonyene , oboruoti bwaye naki boratenene ? ekiagera inwe iga mogoteba ng'a iga ngoseria ebirecha ase Beelizebuli .
42011019	Korende inche kondaserie ebirecha ase Beelizebuli , abana baino iga bakobiseria ase ng'o ? nabo as'ayio iga barabe abagambi baino .
42011020	Korende kondaserie ebirecha as'ekiara kia Nyasaye , nabo obonda bwa Nyasaye bwabachicheire .
42011021	Oyore nechinguru , omonyene ebinto bi'esegi , gakorenda obweri bwaye , enibo yaye iga ekoba as'omorembe :
42011022	korende omonyene chinguru oyomobuete ere karache nakomobua , iga akomoura ebinto biaye bi'esegi bionsi ebiegenete , nebisakorwa biaye obiatanana ,
42011023	Omonto otari amo nainche igare ao nainche ; nere oyotari gosangereria amo nainche iga agoserebania .
42011024	Ekerecha ki'eubi gagekomorua omonto , iga gegoeta gati aas'atari namache , gekorigia as'ogotimokera : getanyoreti kiabora , Ning'irane as'enyomba yane aase naruete .
42011025	Gegocha , kiayerora yaabusirwe , yarosigwe .
42011026	Erio kiagenda , kiareta ebirecha bitano nabibere binde ebire ebibe gokebua ekenyene ; nabirobio biasoa nagoikaransa aroro : okoba kwaye kw'omoerio omonto oyio kwaba okobe kobua okwe ritang'ani .
42011027	Egachia koba gagokwana aya , omokungu oyomo as'emeganda akaaka eriogi , akamotebia , Nere negesio enda yakobogoretie , ne chimbere kwagongete .
42011028	Korende ere akabora , mbuya kobua , abare negesio korigwa ring'ana ria Nyasaye nakoribwata .
42011029	Emeganda iga yarenge emosangererekanerete , agachaka gokwana , Ekegori eke nekegori ekebe : gekorigia egekone ; korende tigekoegwa egekone tatiga egekone ki'omobani Yona .
42011030	Naki buna Yona abete egekone as'abanto ba Nineva , naboigo Omwana-o-mwanyabanto arache koba as'ekegori eke .
42011031	Omoruoti eting'ana ya Sugusu natenene as'ekina amo nabanto b'ekegori eke , nere nabanachere ekina ; ekiagera ere achete korwa ensinyo y'ense erinde aigwe chisemi chia Sulemani ; noyobuete Sulemani naiga are .
42011032	Abanto ba Nineva nabatenene as'ekina keria aino nekegori eke , nabarabwo nabakenachere ekina : ekiagera barabwo baonchogete as'okorandia kwa Yona ; na rora oyobuete Yona naiga are .
42011033	Omonto tari gatongirie etaya okoyebeka aas'abobisi gose inse as'egetonga , korende akoyebeka igoro as'ekebekerero , erinde abagosoa bayorore omobaso .
42011034	Etaya y'omobere neriso : nabo eriso riao korirabe rigiya , omobere oo bwonsi nore nomobaso ; korende eriso riao korirabe ribe , omobere oo bwonsi iga ore nomosunte .
42011035	Gaki rigereria , oria omobaso ore ime asore tocha koba omosunte .
42011036	Nabo , omobere oo bwonsi korabe nomobaso , ensemo ende teba nomosunte , omobere oo noichore nomobaso kegima , buna etaya ekomorekera amasase .
42011037	Erio gagokwana , Omofarisai oyomo akamorangeria arie endagera bwoye : agasoa , agaikaransa koria .
42011038	Oria Omofarisai agachia korora agakumia ekiagera atesibetie ritang'ani as'endagera .
42011039	Omonene akamotebia , Bono inwe Abafarisai iga mogosibia egekombe nesani korwa isiko ; korende ime yaino iga moichire obouri nobobe .
42011040	Inwe abakayayu , ere oyogekorete egia isiko , tari ere ogekorete nekia ime nakerokio ?
42011041	Korende karue esadaka ebire ebia ime ; naende rora , ebinto bionsi nebichenu asemore .
42011042	Korende obobe nobwaino Abafarisai ! ekiagera mokorua etaisi y'ebinzari , chinyeni , na ker'emboga , mokobotiga oboronge nobwanchani bwa Nyasaye : naro aya abagwenerete koyakora , amo nagotatiga aria .
42011043	Obobe nobwaino , Abafarisai , ekiagera mwanchete goikaransa aas'atang'ani ase chisunagogi nagokwanigwa ase chichiro .
42011044	Obobe nobwaino , ekiagera mogwekaine nechimbera chitari kororekana , nabanto bagoeta igoro aroro batachimanyeti .
42011045	Omonto oyomo omworokigwa bw'amachiko akairaneria akamotebia , Omworokia , gogoteba aya iga ogotwomania naintwe .
42011046	Agateba , Nainwe abana b'amachiko , obobe nobwaino ! ekiagera mokobatweka abanto chigurube chitakobogoreka , nainwe abanyene timori gokuna chigurube echio as'ekemo ki'ebiara biaino ,
42011047	Obobe nobwaino ekiagera mokoagacha chimbera chi'ababani nabaiso baino mbabaitete .
42011048	Naboigo inwe mwabaire abarori nagwancha ogokora kw'abaiso baino : ekiagera mbabaitete , nainwe mokoagacha chimbera chiabo ,
42011049	Nas'ayio chisemi chia Nyasaye chiatebire , Nintome asebare ababani nabatomwa ; nababaite abande babo , nakobachanda ;
42011050	erinde amanyinga ay'ababani bonsi , ay'aitegete korwa omochakano bw'ense narigigwe as'ekegori eke ;
42011051	korwa amanyinga Abel goika amanyinga a Zakaria , oria oitetwe gati as'amathabau ne hekalu : nabo , nabatebirie , narigigwe as'ekegori eke .
42011052	Obobe nobwaino , inwe abana b'amachiko , ekiagera mwabogoretie ekeigorero ki'obong'aini : nainwe abanyene timwasoa , nabaria abarenge gosoa mwabatangete .
42011053	Agachia gosoka korwa aroro , abariki n'Abafarisai bagachaka komotuoma bobe , nakomochegia akwane amang'ana amange ;
42011054	nakomoboera , kobwata ring'ana korwa as'omonwa oye , banyare komosoera .
42012001	Agwo nyuma , omosangerereko bw'abanto , abanio chilifu chinyinge bagachia gosangerereka goika bagatachana , agachaka kobatebia aborokigwa baye ritang'ani , Mwerende nememera y'Abafarisai , engecho yaye nobong'ainereria .
42012002	Korende ring'ana rinde tiriri riramumekerigwe , ritache komumoi wa : naende , eribisekanete ritache komanyeka naende ,
42012003	Nabo ande onsi ayamwakwanete omosunte , naigugwe as'omobaso : narirorio erimwatebete as'ogoto kw'onionto as'ebinyemba bi'ime narirandigwe igoro as'ekerama ,
42012004	Kerende nabatebiiie inwe abasani bane , Timobairoka abwo abagoita omobere na nyuma tibari negento barakore naende .
42012005	Korende nimbakurere oyo morairoke : Moiroke oria oo e nokobua nyuma as'ogoita omonto omoruta ase chaanum : nabo , nabatebirie , Moiroke oria .
42012006	Tichiri kogorwa chinchiro isano ase chibesa ibere ? naende nonya nakamo kabo tikari kwebwa as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
42012007	Korende nonya ne chitukia chi'emetwe yaino chiabarirwe chionsi . Timoiroka : inwe nabaya kobua chinchiro chinyinge .
42012008	Nainche nabatebirie , ker'oyoranyatore as'amasio abanto , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere namwatore as'amasio amalaika a Nyasaye :
42012009	nere oyorankane as'amasio abanto , nakanwe as'amasio amalaika a Nyasaye ,
42012010	Na ker'oyomo orakwane ring'ana igoro as'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , naberwe : korende ere oyorayorame Omoika Omochenu takwaberwa .
42012011	Naende kabakchaira as'obosio bw'esunagogi , nabagambi , nas'abanyene chinguru , timoichana buna morairanerie gose buna morakwane :
42012012	ekiagera Omoika Omochenu noborokererie ensa eyio eyio ayamogwenerete gokwana .
42012013	Omonto oyomo as'omoganda akamotebia , Omworokia , motebie momura ominto anyatanere omwando oito .
42012014	Akamotebia , Aye omonto oyo , ning'o ombekire koba omogambi gose omwatanani igoro asemore ?
42012015	Akabatebia , Rigereria , erende nokorengereria : ekiagera obogima bw'omonto tibori korua as'obonge bw'enibo yaye abwate .
42012016	Akabatebia omoreng'anio , akabora , Omogondo bw'omonto oyomo omonda , okama mono :
42012017	agachaka korengereria omoyo ime , agateba , Ninki ngokora , ekiagera tindi naase nkobeka okwama kwane ?
42012018	Akabora , Ninkore iga : nintagore ebiage biane , mbiagache chinene kobua : naroro nimbeke endagera yane yonsi , nenibo yane .
42012019	Erio ninyotebie omoyo one , Aye omoyo , nore nenibo enyinge kwegacheire enionga y'emiaka emenge ; timoka , orie , onywe , ogoke .
42012020	Korende Nyasaye akamotebia , Omokayayu aye , obotuko obo omoyo oo orangigwa ; erio ebio kwegacheire ang'e nebiang'o birabe ?
42012021	Naboigo are ere oyokwegachera omonyene emonga , tari omonda as'amaiso a Nyasaye .
42012022	Akabatebia aborokigwa baye , As'aya nabatebirie , Timona korengereria obogima bwaino , eki morarie ; gose emebere yaino eki morabeke .
42012023	Ekiagera obogima mbobuete endagera nomobere nobuete chianga .
42012024	Birengererie ebigonkoru , tibiri gosimeka , tibirikogesa ; tibiri naase bikobeka emonga gose ekiage ; na Nyasaye iga akobirageria . Inwe timobueti rigori rie chinyoni !
42012025	Ning'o ore asemore as'ogwechanda oranyare komenta ekerengo gi'okoboko okomo as'obotambe bwaye ?
42012026	Nabo onye timori konyara gokora nonya nering'ana rire erike , naseki mogwechandera amang'ana ande ?
42012027	Birigererie ebisicha buna bikomera : tibiri gokora emeremo , gose gwesisa ; nainche nabatebirie , nonya Sulemani as'obonene bwaye bwonsi , tabegete chianga buna ekemo ki'ebi ,
42012028	Nabo onye Nyasaye okoboyia obonyansi bw'egetii , oboreo rero , nankio bwatugutwa omorero ; takomenta kobaboyia inwe , abamore nokwegena ogoke ?
42012029	Nabo ninwe timorigia eki morarie , gose eki moranywe ; gose timoba nomoyo bw'ogosiereria .
42012030	Ekiagera ebisaku bi'ense iga bikoyarigia ayio onsi ; korende Iso oino omanyire ng'a morigetie ebinto ebi bionsi .
42012031	Korende borigie obonda bwa Nyasaye , nayio onsi namomenterwe inwe .
42012032	Timoiroka inwe omoganda omoke : naki Iso oino ororire buya kobaa obonda .
42012033	Bigore ebio more nabio , karue ebiegwa ; ekorere ebimoya , bitari kogota , emonga as'igoro etari gokea , aas'atagoika ang'e omoibi , gose chigwankwa gosaria .
42012034	Ekiagera as'emonga yaino ere nao emioyo yaino eranyare koba .
42012035	Tiga chinema biaino bisibwe , nechitaya chiaino chigwoka ;
42012036	nainwe mobe buna abanto bamoganyete omonene obo , gakoirana korwa as'omoyega bw'enyangi , erinde gagocha nagotura , banioigorere erio kegima .
42012037	Mbare negesio abasomba baria ekero omonene obo agocha abanyore barendete : ekeene nabatebirie , neboyie , abaikaransie , nache abakorere .
42012038	Naende karache okorenda gwa kabere gose karache okor'enda gwa gatato , nakobanyora iga , mbare negesio abasomba baria .
42012039	Korende manya aya onye omonyene enyomba namanyete ensa agocha-gocha omoibi , anga narendete , anga tatigete enyomba yaye ebochorwe .
42012040	Nainwe , nabo , mobe ang'e : ekiagera ensa motakagereti , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto agocha ,
42012041	Petero akabora , Omonene , nintwe ogotebia omoreng'anio oyio gose nas'abanto bonsi ?
42012042	Omonene akabora , Ning'o rende , ore omosomba omwegeni omonyene chisemi , obegetwe n'Omonene oye igoro as'enyomba yaye yonsi , abae abanto endagera ekerengo kiabo , as'ekero kegwenerete ?
42012043	Nare negesio omosomba oria ekero omonene oye agocha amonyore ogokora bo .
42012044	Ekeene , nabatebirie , namobeke igoro as'ebiabwate bionsi .
42012045	Korende omosomba oria karatebe omoyo oye ime , Omonene one otebanire gocha ; karachake kobaaka abasomba baye , abasacha nabakungu , nakoria nagotinda ;
42012046	erio , omonene bw'omosomba oria nachiche rituko atakagereti nensa atamanyeti , namonachane ebing'ese , namoe ensemo yaye amo nabatancheti .
42012047	Naende omosomba oria omanyete ogochika kw'Omonene oye , tebeka ang'e , gose gokora buna ogochika kwaye , naakwe ebiranya ebinge ;
42012048	korende oria otamanyeti , nere okorire ayagwenerete okoakwa , naakwe ebiranya ebike . Ker'oyoeirwe ebinge , asare ere nabirigigwe ebinge : nere oyobiaeirwe ebinge , asare ere nabarigie ebinge kobua .
42012049	Nachire koruta omorero as'ense ; naende gotiekire goiongigwa ninki ndigetie kobua ?
42012050	Ninde nebatiso nkobatiswa nero ; naende ninde nogochandeka okore naki korache goikeranigwa !
42012051	Inee ! mokagete iga nachete nyee ense omorembe ? Nabatebirie , Taibo , korende nogwatananeka .
42012052	Ekiagera korwa bono as'enyomba eyemo nababe abanto batano batananekanete , batato na babere , naende babere na batato .
42012053	Ise omonto atananeke nomwana oye , nomwana naise oye ; ng'ina biara na moka momura oye , na moka momura na ng'ina biara .
42012054	Akabatebia naende emeganda yonsi , Ekero mokorora rire rikoimoka bosongo , erio mwateba bwango , Embura neche ; yaba .
42012055	Naende ekero mokorora embeo korwa sugusu mwabora , nebe egurugura ; yaba .
42012056	Inwe abang'ainereria , mwamanyire goonchora obosio bw'ense nerioba ; korende naki yaba rende , mdtamanyeti kobionchora chiro ebi ?
42012057	Naende naki as'emioyo yaino motari gwatanana ayare boronge ?
42012058	Nabo , ekero mokogenda nomogosoeri oo as'obosio bw'omogambi , kora omokia gwatananeka nere nchera ; tachicha gogokurura as'obosio bw'omogambi , oria omogambi akobeke as'amaboko omorendi bw'echela , oria omorendi akorute echela .
42012059	Nagotebirie , Tokorua agwo nonya ng'ake goika oakane kegima egesabwa ki'omoerio .
42013001	Ekero ekio mbarenge aroro abanto bamotchetie amang'ana Abagalili baria Pilato asang'anetie amanyinga abo nekeng'wanso kiabo .
42013002	Akairaneria , akabatebia , Inee ! Mokagete ng'a Abagalili abwo iga barenge abanyene ebibe kobua Abagalili bonsi , ekiagera banyorete emechando buna eyio ?
42013003	Nabatebirie Taibo : korende motaonchogeti imwensi namosire boigo .
42013004	Ao gose baria ikomi nabatano nabatato bagweretwe negesasimo ase Siloam , gekabaita , mokagete ng'a iga barenge abasaria kobua abanto bonsi bamenyete Yerusalemu ?
42013005	Nabatebirie , Taibo : korende motaonchogeti , imwensi namosire boigo :
42013006	Agakwana omoreng'anio oyio ; Omonto oyomo orenge nomoko , osimegetwe as'omogondo oye bw'emesabibu ; akagenda korigia amatunda igoro asore , korende tanyora .
42013007	Akamotebia omorosia omogondo bw'emesabibu , Rora , emiaka etato eye ngecha korigia amatunda as'omoko oyo , tinkonyora : nyonache , naseki ogosaria ense yonsi ?
42013008	Akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Omonene , yotige omwaka oyo noro , goika nyoburugere , nakoyobekere obwoyo .
42013009	Noro korame amatunda , mbuya ; onye taibo , erio oyonache .
42013010	Akaba okworokereria as'esunagogi eyemo yabo rituko ri'esabato .
42013011	Naende rora , omokungu orenge nekerecha ki'oboreu emiaka ikomi netano netato : nere konya okogotaire , tare konyara kwerambora nonya ng'ake .
42013012	Ekero Yesu achia komorora , akamorangeria , akamotebia , Aye omokungu , gwasiboirwe as'oboreu bwao .
42013013	Akabeka amaboko aye igoro asare , akaramboka erio kegima , agachaka komotogia Nyasaye .
42013014	Omonene bw'esunagogi eria agasogwa nendamwamu ekiagera Yesu amokonya omonto rituko ri'esabato , akairaneria akayetebia emeganda , Nare amatuko atano narimo agwenerete mwanyabanto bakore emeremo : as'ayio , inchuo mokonywe , korende tari rituko ri'esabato .
42013015	Korende Omonene akamoiraneria , akabora , Aye omong'ainereria , Inee , ker'oyomo oino tari koyesibora eng'ombe yaye gose etigere yaye korwa ' bweri rituko ri'esabato , ogenda nero koyenyosia ?
42013016	Noyo , nenyaroka ya Ibrahimu , ekiagera Saitani omosibire emiaka ikomi netano netato eye , temogwenereti asiborwe egesibo eke rituko ri'esabato ?
42013017	Naende gagokwana aya , abanto bonsi abare koamererania nere bagasokigwa : omoganda bwonsi okagoka as'engecho y'amang'ana amanene akorirwe nere .
42013018	Nabo , akabora , Obonda bwa Nyasaye iga boreng'aine ki ? Nimboreng'anie naki ?
42013019	Mboreng'aine nentetere y'ekaradali , ayebogoretie omonto , akayeruta as'omogondo oye ; egakina , ekaba omote omonene ; chinyoni chi'igoro chigwa ase chinsagia chiaye .
42013020	Agakwana eria kabere , Nimboreng'anie ki obonda bwa Nyasaye ?
42013021	Iga boreng'aine nememera abogoretie omokungu akayebisa as'ebirengo bitato bi'obosie , goika bwonsi bokabota .
42013022	Akaba ogoetanana as'emechie nebichie , okworokereria , nakogenda Yerusalemu .
42013023	Omonto oyomo akamotebia Omonene , barabwo abaratorigwe nabake ? Akabatebia ,
42013024	Tenia gosoa as'egesieri kere ekegote ; ekiagera nabatebirie ng'a abanto abange nabarigie gosoa nabarabwo tibakonyara .
42013025	Korwa as'ekero keria omonyene enyomba araimoke nagosieka egesieri , nainwe mochake gotenena isiko , nagotura egesieri , mokobora , Omonene , toigorere ; nere nabairanerie abatebie , Timbamanyeti ase mokorua ;
42013026	nerio namochake goteba , Tokaria , nakonywa as'obosio bwao , naye nkworokereria kwarease chinchera chiaito ;
42013027	nere natebe , Nabatebirie , Timbamanyeti ase mokorua ; karue asende , inwe mwensi abakori obobe .
42013028	Erio nakobe nokorera nokoriania amaino , komoramorore Ibrahimu n'Isaaka na Yakobo nababani bonsi as'obonda bwa Nyasaye , nainwe abanyene mogotugutwa isiko .
42013029	Naende nabache abanto korwa mocha , na korwa bosongo na korwa irianyi , na korwa sugusu nabarabwo nabaikaranse as'obonda bwa Nyasaye ,
42013030	Inyora , mbare ab'omoerio barabe abe ritang'ani , naende mbare be ritang'ani barabe ab'omoerio .
42013031	Rituko riria abande as'Abafarisai bakamochiera , bakamotebia , Imoka korwa aa , ogende aria : ekiagera Herode narigetie gogoita .
42013032	Akabatebia , genda , moniotchie oria ekebwe , Rora , ngoseriande ebirecha , ngokorande emeremo y'okobagwenia abanto rero na mambia , nainche rituko ria gatato naikeranire .
42013033	Korende nengwenerete kobwatia enchera yane rero na mambia naankiende , naki temogwenereti omobani asirerigwe isiko tatiga Yerusalemu .
42013034	Aye Yerusalemu , Yerusalemu , okobaita ababani nakobaaka amagena abatomirwe asore ! Ng'ara karenga narigirie kobasangereria abana bao buna engoko ekobisangereria ebichuchu biaye inse ase chimbaba chiaye , korende timwancha !
42013035	Rora , enyomba yaino mwatigeirwe riiombe : Ancha nabatebirie , Timokondora nonya ng'ake , goika ekero keria moratebe , Osesenigwe ere oyorache as'erieta ri'Omonene .
42014001	Agachia koba ekero asoete as'enyomba y'omonto oyomo , omonene as'Abafarisai , rituko ri'esabato , arie endagera , mbarenge nkomorigereriabare .
42014002	Nabo as'obosio bwaye narenge omonto oyomo orenge noborwaire bw'okobimbia omobere .
42014003	Yesu akairaneria akabatebia aborokigwa b'amachiko n'Abafarisai , akabora , Inee , mboronge kogwenia rituko ri'esabato , gose taibo ?
42014004	Bagakira . Akamobwata , akamogwenia , akamoa ribaga agende .
42014005	Akairaneria akabatebia , Ning'o asemore omonyene etigere gose eng'ombe yagure engoro , otari koyerusia erio kegima rituko ri'esabato ?
42014006	Nabarabwo tibanyara komoiraneria as'aya .
42014007	Akabatebia omoreng'anio baria barangeretigwe , gachia korora buna bachorire ebirogo bie ritang'ani ; akabatebia ,
42014008	Gokorangerigwa nomonto enyangi , toikaransa as'ekerogo kie ritang'ani , ekiagera gose omonyene amasikani kobua aye orangerigwe nere ,
42014009	ogocha omonyene okorangeirie aye , nere , agotebie motigerere oyo ; erio nochake koba nobosoku gogoikaransa aase anyuma .
42014010	Korende gokorangerigwa , genda oikaranse aase anyuma ; erinde gagocha oyokorangeretie , agotebie , ' Mosani , tigera gocha aase ritang'ani ; erio nobe nogosikwa as'amaiso abo bonsi abaikaransete amo naye , it Ekiagera ker'oyokweimokereria igoro nairanigwe inse ; nere oyokweirania inse naimokererigwe igoro .
42014011	
42014012	Akamotebia oria oyomorangeretie , Gogokora endagera ya mambia gose eya mogoroba , tobarangeria abasani bao , gose abamino , gose eamate yao , gose abagisangio bao abanda ; babaise gocha nabarabwo gokorangeria aye , onyore ogoakanwa .
42014013	Korende gogokora omoyega , baragerie abataka , nebirerria , nebisegora , nemeuko ;
42014014	naye nobe negesio ; ekiagera tibari nagento bagokoakana ; ekiagera noakanwe as'okobokigwa kw'abanyene boronge .
42014015	Nabo omonto oyomo as'abwo baikaransete as'endagera amo nere , agachia koyaigwa aya , akamotebia , Nare negesio oyoranyare koria omogati as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42014016	Akamotebia , Omonto oyomo okorete omoyega omonene ; akarangeria abanto abange :
42014017	akamotoma omosomba oye ensa y'omoyega kogenda kobarangeria abarigirie , Inchuo ; ekiagera ebinto bionsi biabaire ang'e .
42014018	Bagachaka gokwana chintamera bonsi nomoyo oyomo . Oyo bwe ritang'ani akamotebia , nagorire omogondo , nindigetie kogenda koyorora : nagosabire onyabere .
42014019	Oyonde akabora , nagorire chieri chichoki isano , nkogendande gochitema : nagosabire onyabere .
42014020	Oyonde akabora , nanyuomire omokungu , nas'engecho eye tinkonyara gocha .
42014021	Oria omosomba agacha , akamworokia Omonene oye amang'ana aya . Erio oria omonyene enyomba akabea , akamotebia omosomba oye , Soka bwango ogenda ase chinchera nebichera bi'emechie , orete aa abataka , nebirema , nebisegora , nemeuko .
42014022	Oria omosomba akabora , Atiekire gokoreka ayio gwanchika , ko ribaga ndire .
42014023	Oria Omonene akamotebia omosomba oye , Genda ase chinchera nechimbebe , obabetererie basoe erinde enyomba yane enyare goichora .
42014024	Ekiagera nagotebirie ng'a as'abanto baria barangeretigwe tari nonya nomo oranyare koigwa omoyega one .
42014025	Iga yarenge amo nere emeganda emenge : ageonchora akabatebia ,
42014026	omonto gagocha asende , nere atamogecheti ise oye , na ng'ina , na mokaye , nabana baye , nabamura bamwabo , nabamwabo abakungu , ee , nobogima bwaye bwonsi , takonyara koba omworokigwa one .
42014027	Naende omonto onde bwonsi otabogoreti omosalaba oye nakorua nyuma yane , takonyara koba omworokigwa one .
42014028	Ekiagera ning'o as'inwe , onye origetie koagacha egesasimo , otari goikaransa ritang'ani kobara rigori , gose nabwate ebinto ebikogekora ?
42014029	Tacha gocha , tagekora kabekire oboroso , abanto bonsi bachake komosekerera ,
42014030	bakwane , Omonto oyo nachaka koagacha , korende tanyare gokora .
42014031	Gose , ' moruoti ki , gakogenda korwana nomoruoti onde , otari goikaransa ritang'ani nagokora ekina onye ere amo nabanto chilifu ikomi nanyare koumerana nere oyokomochera amo nabanto chilifu emerongo ebere ?
42014032	Onye taibo , iga agotoma omogai korigia enchera y'omorembe , omonto oria gakare are .
42014033	Nabo , ker'oyomo oino otabitigeti ebinto bionsi are nabio takonyara koba omworokigwa one .
42014034	Omonyo nomuya , korende oria omonyo korabe osarekire , ninki orabekwe bwansere ?
42014035	Togwenereti ense gose etui : abanto iga bakoyotuguta isiko . Oyore namato aigwe .
42015001	Nabo abakorusia ebango bonsi nabanyene ebibe iga bare komoika ang'e komoigwera .
42015002	Abafarisai nabariki bakemurungania , bakabora , Oyo iga akoroisia abanyene ebibe , nakoria amo nabarabwo .
42015003	Akabatebia omoreng'anio oyo akabora ,
42015004	' montoki oino oyore neching'ondi emia , asirerigwe neyemo , otari gochitiga chiria emerongo kianda na kianda eroro ime , nakoyegendera eria yasirire , goika ayerore ?
42015005	Nabo karayenyore oyebeka amareko aye , ogokigwa .
42015006	Nere gakoirana mwaye obarangeria abasani baye nabagisangio baye , obatebia , Goka amo nainche , ekiagera nayenyorire eng'ondi yane yasirete .
42015007	Nabatebirie , naboigo nobe omogoko igoro as'omonyene ebibe oyomo oonchokire , kobua as'abanyene oboronge emerongo kianda nakianda , abatarigeti ogoonchoka .
42015008	Gose ' mokungu ki ore nechishilingi ikomi , asirerigwe neyemo , otari gotongia etaya nakwabusa enyomba , origia nomokia , goika ayenyore ?
42015009	Nabo , okoyenyora , obarangeria abatureti baye nabagisangio baye , obora , Goka amo nainche ekiagera nayenyorire eria eshilingi nasiria ?
42015010	Naboigo nabatebirie inwe , Nore omogoko as'amasio amalaika a Nyasaye as'omonyene ebibe oyomo oonchokire .
42015011	Agateba , Omonto oyomo narenge nabana babere .
42015012	Oria orenge omoke akamotebia ise , Tata , ing'a ensemo y'enibo entungetie . Akabatananera ebinto biaye .
42015013	Goika nyuma y'amatuko atai ' mange oria omoke agasangereria ebinto biaye bionsi , akaimoka kogenda orogendo gochia ense y'are ; agasiarera agwo enibo yaye as'ogokora kw'obokayayu .
42015014	Agachia kobikora bionsi , enchara enene egasoa ense eria , nere agachaka kogania .
42015015	Akagenda akabwatana noyomo obo bw'abanyene ense eria ; nere akamoira ebitii biaye , korisia chingurue .
42015016	Akaba nkorengereriare koigotia enda yaye as'amasabo aria chikoria chingurue : ' monto onde tarenge ore komoa ' gento .
42015017	Goika ochia kweirana omonyene , akabora , Abasomba b'eng'eria mbarenga ba tata bakoria endagera nagotigaria , nainche aiga ngokwa as'enchara !
42015018	Ninyimoke , ngende ase tata , nimotebie , Tata , namochire igoro as'erioba , nas'obosio bwao :
42015019	tingwenereti naende ndokwe omwana oo : onkore imbe buna oyomo bw'abasomba bao .
42015020	Akaimoka , akagenda as'ise . Agachia koba okare are , ise akamorora , akamororera amabera , akaminyoka , akamogwera rigoti , akamonyunyunta mono .
42015021	Oria omwana akamotebia , Tata , nasaririe igoro as'erioba nas'obosio bwao : tingwenereti naende ndokwe omwana oo .
42015022	Korende ise akabatebia abasomba baye , Reta eganchwa ere engiya , momobekere ; beka ebonyi as'ekiara kiaye , nebikoroto as'amagoro aye .
42015023	Nyerete eria emori ere enoru , moyenyenye , torie nakogoka :
42015024	ekiagera oyo omwana one konya okure , na bono obokire ; konya osirire , nere ororekanire . Bagachaka gokora omogoko .
42015025	Nabo , oria omwana oye omonene igarenge ' mogondo : agachia gocha nagoika ang'e as'enyomba , akaigwa egeturi gi'ogotera nogotenga .
42015026	Akamorangeria oyomo obo bw'abasomba akamoboria , amang'ana ayio , engecho yaye inki ?
42015027	Akamotebia , ' Momura omino ochire ; na iso omonyenyeire eria emori enoru , ekiagera amonyora ore moyo ore nobogima .
42015028	Korende akabea , tarigia gosoa : nabo , ise agasoka akamosorora .
42015029	Akamoiraneria ise akamotebia , Rora , inche nagokoreire emiaka eye emenge : tinsareti ogochika kwao kero kende gionsi : korende tikwanakong'a inche emanwa y'embori , erinde ingoke amo nabasani bane :
42015030	korende ochia gocha omwana oo oyo , orire ebinto biao amo nabakungu abatayayi , kwamonyenyeire emori enoru .
42015031	Nere akamotebia , Omwana one , aye amatuko onsi igore amo nainche , nebinto bionsi inde nabirobio nchiao .
42015032	Naende gokora omogoko nakorora omogoko iga orenge oyoboronge : ekiagera oyo ' momura omino konya okure , nere obokire : konya osirire , nere ororekanire .
42016001	Naende Yesu akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Narenge omonto omonda , orenge nomorendi ; oyio agasoerwa asare ng'a osiareire enibo yaye .
42016002	Akamorangeria , akamotebia , Ninki eke naigure asore ? Orokia amang'ana oborendi bwao ; ekiagera tokonyara naende koba omorendi .
42016003	Oria omorendi akabora as'omoyo oye , Ninki ndakore , ekiagera omonene one , ondusirie oborendi bwane ? Tindi nechinguru korema ; ogosaba nobosoku .
42016004	Natiekire komanya eke ndakore , ekero nkorusigwa as'oborendi , bandoisie chinyomba chiabo .
42016005	Nabo akabarangeria abasira b'omonene , ker'oyomo , akamotebia oyo bwe ritang'ani , Ninki oriete ki'omonene one ?
42016006	Akabora , Ebirengo emia bi'amaguta . Akamotebia , Bogoria ekaratasi yao gaki , ikaransa bwango , rika emerongo etano .
42016007	Erio , akamotebia oyonde , Naye ninki oriete ? Agateba , Ebirengo emia bi'engano . Akamotebia , Bogoria ekaratasi yao , rika emerongo etano netato .
42016008	Oria omonene akamotogia omorendi otari oboronge , ekiagera akorete ase chisemi : ekiagera abana b'ense eye nabana be chisemi kobua abana b'omobaso , as'ekegori kiabo abanyene .
42016009	Nainche nabatebirie inwe , Ekorere obosani as'enibo y'obobe : erinde , ekorigia gokea , babaroisie inwe as'ebikaranso bia kare nakare .
42016010	Oyore omwegeni ase keria ekere egeke , nomwegeni nase keria kere ekenene : noyo otari boronge ase keria kere egeke , nabo tari boronge ase keria kere ekenene .
42016011	Nabo , onye timobeti abegeni as'enibo y'obobe , ning'o oranyare kobegena koba nenibo y'ekeene ?
42016012	Gaki onye timobeti abegeni as'ekio ki'omonto onde , ning'o oranyare kobaa ekio ekere kiaino abanyene ?
42016013	Tari omosomba oranyare kobakorera abanene babere : ekiagera gose namogeche oyomo , nakomwancha oyonde ; gose nabwatane noyomo , nakomochaya oyonde . Timokonyara komokorera Nyasaye nenibo .
42016014	Abafarisai abarenge abanchi enibo bakaigwa amang'ana aya onsi bakamochecheria .
42016015	Akabatebia , Inwe ninwe abanto bagwetogia ng'a iga more abanyene oboronge as'obosio bwa mwanyabanto ; korende Nyasaye omanyire emioyo yaino : ekiagera ekeimokererete igoro ase mwanyabanto , nekegechia as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
42016016	Ogochika nababani mbiarenge aroro goika Yohana : korwa ekero keria , amang'ana amaya obonda bwa Nyasaye arandigwe , na ker'omonto nabosoe ase chinguru .
42016017	Korende nebiango kobua igoro nense goeta , kobua enuguta eyemo y'amachiko koruao .
42016018	Ker'oyokomotiga omokungu oye nakomonyuoma oyonde otomanire : nere oyokomonyuoma ere oyotigirwe nomosacha oye , otomanire .
42016019	Narenge omonto omonda , ore kweboyia chianga chi monyinga nechi'egatani engiya orenge kwegokia kera rituko as'okoria .
42016020	Isiko as'egesieri kiaye narenge omotaka oyomo omosabi , erieta riaye Lazaro , orenge namaote ,
42016021	akarengereria koigotigwa namatori akogwa korwa as'emesa y'oria omonda ; goika chisese nachirochio chicha komomena amaote aye .
42016022	Egachia koba oria omotaka agakwa , akabogorigwa namalaika akabekwa as'egekuba ki'Ibrahimu : agakwa noria omonda boigo agatindekwa .
42016023	Nabo as'embera kare as'emechando , akaramokia amaiso aye , akamorora Ibrahimu ore are , na Lazaro ore egekuba kiaye .
42016024	Akarera , akabora , Tata Ibrahimu , onyabere , omotome Lazaro , akune amache nekiara kiaye mesia , arokendie oromeme rwane ; ekiagera nachandirwe as'omorero oyo .
42016025	Ibrahimu akabora , Omwana one , inyora buna kwanyorete amaya ao as'obogima bwao , na Lazaro boigo akanyora amabe : korende bono ere igare aiga ogokigwe , naye ngochandekore .
42016026	Nakobua as'aya onsi , egati yaito intwe nainwe eora nereo yabekirwe , erinde abanto abarigerie koruaa bamboke gocha asore , tibanyara , gose baria abaragwo tibamboka gocha asetore .
42016027	Akabora , Nagosabire tata , omotome as'enyomba ya taia ;
42016028	ekiagera ninde nabamura baminto batano ; abatebie tibacha nabarabwo aase aiga emechando .
42016029	Ibrahimu akabora , Mbare na Musa nababani ; babaigwere barabwo .
42016030	Akabora , Yaya , tata Ibrahimu : korende karagende asebare oyomo korwa as'abakure , nabaonchoke .
42016031	Akamotebia , bataigweti Musa nababani , naisa koimoka omonto korwa as'abakure , tibakoebererigwa banche .
42017001	Akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Takomocha kooroka amang'ana ay'okogocha : korende obobe nobwaye omonto oria okoyareta !
42017002	Iga emogwenerete oyio kobua rigena rigosia risungwe rigoti riaye arutwe enyancha ime , kobua komogocha oyomo bwaba abake .
42017003	Erende : oyomino karakore ebibe , mokanie ; karaonchoke , mwabere .
42017004	Naende karakore ebibe asore ara gatano nakabere ase rituko erimo , karakoiranere ara gatano nakabere , nagoteba , Naonchokire ; mwabere .
42017005	Abatomwa bakamotebia , Omonene , tomentere okwegena gwaito .
42017006	Omonene akabora , Komorabe nokwegena buna entetere ye karadali , anga mwayotebia omokenene oyio , Tegoka osimekwe ' nyancha : noro anga nobaigwete .
42017007	Korende ning'o asemore oyore nomosomba okorema , gose okorisia ching'ondi , oramotebie gakorigia gosoa okorua omogondo , Inchuo bwango ikaransa , orie endagera ?
42017008	Yaya ! kobua igaramotebie , Serora endagera , indie ; eboyie , onkorere goika ndagere nakonywa ; na nyuma norie nakonywa omonyene ?
42017009	Inee , nkomotebiare oria omosomba mbuya ekiagera akora egiachikwa ?
42017010	Naboigo nainwe , komorakore onsi aya mwachikirwe , teba , Intwe abasomba batagwenereti ; twakorire ayagwenerete gokora .
42017011	Egachia koba kobare ' nchera kogenda Yerusalemu , ngoeta arenge egati ya Samaria na Galili .
42017012	Agachia gosoa omochie oyomo , bakaumerana nere abanto ikomi abanyene ukoma , bateneine are :
42017013	nabarabwo bakaaka eriogi bakobora , Yesu , Omonene , twabere ,
42017014	Agachia kobarora , akabatebia , Genda mweorokia as'abakuani . Ekaba kobakogenda bagasibeka .
42017015	Oyomo obo gachia korora ng'a ogwenire , akairana akamobaka Nyasaye as'eriogi rinene ;
42017016	akagwa maumama as'amagoro aye , okomotogia , nere n'Omosamaria .
42017017	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , Tari bonsi ikomi basibeka ? baria kianda ng'ai bare ?
42017018	Tibanyorekanete abakoirana komoa Nyasaye ogotogia kwaye , tatiga omogeni oyo .
42017019	Akamotebia , Tenena , ogende : okwegena kwao gwagokonyire ,
42017020	Naende agachia koborigwa n'Abafarisai , Obonda bwa Nyasaye indi borache ? akabairaneria , akabora , Obonda bwa Nyasaye tibori gocha as'okomongerwa :
42017021	gose tibakobora , Rora aiga , gose , Aria ! naki obonda bwa Nyasaye iga bore ime asemore .
42017022	Akabatebia aborokigwa baye , amatuko nache morarengererie korora rituko erimo ri'amatuko Omwana-o-mwanyabanto korende timokorirora ,
42017023	Naende nababatebie , Rora aria , gose Rora aiga ! timoimoka korwa agwo asemore gose kobatunyana .
42017024	Naki buna okomesa gokomesa korwa ensemo eyemo inse as'erioba goika ensemo ende inse as'erioba ; nabo Omwana-o-mwanyabanto arache koba ase rituko riaye .
42017025	Korende ritang'ani nagwenerete konyora ogochandwa okonge , nakwangwa nekegori eke .
42017026	Naende buna yabete amatuko a Nuhu , nabo erabe nas'amatuko Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ,
42017027	Baienge koria , bakonywa , bakonyuoma , bakonyuomerigwa , goika rituko riria Nuhu asoete as'obwato , etoigo egacha , ekabasiria bonsi .
42017028	Naboigo buna yabete amatuko a Lut ; barenge koria , nakonywa , bagotonda , bakogora , bagosimeka , bakoagacha ;
42017029	korende ase rituko riria Lut akorua Sodomu emorero ogatwa nekebiriti korwra igoro , bikabasiria bonsi :
42017030	naboigo erabe ase rituko riria arache koorokigwa Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
42017031	Ase rituko riria , oyore kerama igoro , nebinto biaye bire as'enyomba ime , taika abibogorie : nere oyore mogondo naboigo tairana nyuma .
42017032	Moinyore moka Lut .
42017033	Oyorarigie gokonya obogima bwaye nabosirie : oyorasirie obogima bwaye nabonyore .
42017034	Nabatebirie , Obotuko boria abanto babere nababe as'oborere obomo ; oyomo nairwe , noyomo natigwe .
42017035	Abakungu babere nababe bagosia amo , oyomo nairwe , oyomo natigwe .
42017036	Abanto babere nababe omogondo , oyomo nairwe , oyomo natigwe .
42017037	Bakamoiraneria bakamotebia , Ng'ai Omonene ? Akabatebia , Ase ribego rire nao chinsoti chigosangererekana .
42018001	Akabatebia omoreng'anio ng'a nebagwenerete komosaba Nyasaye amatuko onsi , tibakwa emioyo ;
42018002	akabora , Narenge omogambi as'omochie gete , otasigete Nyasaye gose tare koyiera omonto :
42018003	naende as'omochie oyio narengeo omoboraka orenge komochiera botambe , ogoteba , Ngambera boronge as'omobisa ene .
42018004	Nere tancha ekero ki'amatuko atai make , nyuma agateba as'omoyo oye , Nenya inche tinsigeti Nyasaye gose tindi koyiera emonto ;
42018005	korende ekiagera omoboraka oyo ondosirie , nimonachere boronge , tacha kondosia as'ogonchichera botambe .
42018006	Omonene akabora , Igwa aya omogambi otari boronge agoteba .
42018007	Inee ! Nyasaye takobanachera boronge abachore baye abakomorera omobaso nobotuko , nere nomoremereria asebare ?
42018008	Nabatebirie nabanachere bwango boronge . Korende Omwana-o-mwanyabanto kagocha , nanyore okwegena as'ense ?
42018009	Yesu akabatebia omoreng'anio oyo as'abanto bare gwekaga ng'a nabanyene oboronge , bakobachaya abande bonsi :
42018010	Abanto babere bagatira gochia hekalu gosaba ; oyomo Omofarisai , oyo kabere omorusia ebango .
42018011	Oria Omofarisai agatenena , agasaba iga as'omoyo oye , Nyasaye nakoiranerie ng'a mbuya mono ekiagera inche tindi buna abanto bande , abauri , abatari boronge , abatomani , gose buna oyo omurusia ebango ,
42018012	Iga nkweng'ata ara kabere as'echuma ; ndua etaisi y'okonyora kwane gwonsi .
42018013	Noria omorusia ebango agatenena are , tarigia nonya nkoramokia amaiso aye igoro , korende akeakaaka egekuba , akabora , Nyasaye , ondorere amabera inche omonyene ebibe .
42018014	Nabatebirie inwe , oyio igaigete nyomba yaye akanyora oboronge kobua oria : ekiagera oyokweimokereria igoro nairanigwe inse , nere oyokweirania inse naimokererigwe igoro .
42018015	Bakamoretera abana abang'are , erinde abakune : korende aborokigwa baye bachia kobarora bakabakania .
42018016	Korende Yesu akabarangeria bache asare , agateba , Batige abana abake bache asende , timobaisa kobatanga : naki obonda bwa Nyasaye nobwabo abanto buna aba .
42018017	Ekeene nabatebirie , Onde bwonsi oyotabwancheti obonda bwa Nyasaye buna omwana omoke takobosoa nonya ng'ake .
42018018	Nomogambi gete akamoboria , okobora , Omworokia omuya , ninki ndakore inyare konyora obogima bwa kare nakare ?
42018019	Yesu akamotebia , Naki okondoka omuya ? Tari omuya tatiga oyomo , nere Nyasaye .
42018020	Kwayamanyire amachiko , Totomana , Toita , Toiba , Toteba oborimo , Basike ' so na nyoko .
42018021	Akabora , Aya onsi nayabwatire korwa obwana bwane .
42018022	Yesu agachia koigwa aya , akamotebia , Ring'ana erimo ndikoremerete : bigore ebinto bionsi ore nabio , obagabere abataka , naye nobe nenibo igoro . Erio ochiche ontunyane .
42018023	Korende agachia koigwa amang'ana aya akaba nogoichana okonge ; naki arenge omonda mono .
42018024	Nabo Yesu okomorigereria akabora , Nabe aakong'u abare nenibo gosoa obonda bwa Nyasaye !
42018025	Naki naororo engamia goeta as'ekebao gi'esindani , kobua omonda gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42018026	Nabarabwo bagachia koigwa , bakabora , Ning'o rende oranyare gokonyeka ?
42018027	Akabora , Ayatakonyarekana ase mwanyabanto , igakonyarekana ase Nyasaye .
42018028	Petero akabora , Rora , intwe twatigire bionsi twagotunyire aye .
42018029	Akabatebia , Ekeene nabatebirie , Tari omonto otigire enyomba , gose omokungu , gose abamwabo , gose abaibori , gose abana , as'engecho y'obonda bwa Nyasaye ,
42018030	korende nanyore kobua ara aange bono ekero eke , naende as'ense egocha obogima bwa kare nakare ,
42018031	Erio Yesu akabaira baria ikomi nababere akabatebia , Rora , ngotiratore kogenda Yerusalemu , naende naikeranigwe amang'ana onsi ayarikeretwe Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nababani .
42018032	Naki nabekwe as'amaboko Ebisaku , nakorerwe echeche nagochegigwa , nagotwerwa amate :
42018033	naende nabamoake nechinkini , nabamoite : nerituko ria gatato naboke .
42018034	Nabarabwo tibainyora aya nonya ng'ake ; ring'ana eri rikaba iga riabiswa asebare , gose tibayamanya ayatebetwe .
42018035	Agachia koba gagoika ang'e na Yeriko , narenge omouko oyomo , oikaransete ensemo y'enchera ogosaba ebiegwa :
42018036	agachia koigwa emeganda egoeta , akabora , inki ekio ?
42018037	Bakamotebia , ng'a Yesu o Nazareti ogoeta .
42018038	Akaaka eriogi , akabora , Yesu Omwana o Daudi , onyabere .
42018039	Nabwo batang'aine bakamokania , akire : kerende ere akamenta mono koaka eriogi , Omwana o Daudi , onyabere .
42018040	Yesu agatenena , agachika aretwe asare ; agachia komoika ang'e , akamoboria ,
42018041	Ninki origetie ngokorere ? Akabora , Omonene nyore okorora .
42018042	Yesu akamotebia , Oegwe okorora ; okwegena kwao gwagokonyire .
42018043	Erio kegima akanyora okorora , akamotunyana , okomotogia Nyasaye : nabanto bonsi bagachia korora bakamoa Nyasaye ogotogigwa .
42019001	Agasoa Yeriko akaba ngeetare egati gati yaye .
42019002	Narora , omonto oyomo , erieta riaye ore korokwa Zakayo , omonene bw'abakorusia ebango , nere nomonda .
42019003	Akarigia komorora Yesu , gose ' monto ki : tanyara as'engecho y'emeganda , ekiagera arenge omweng'e .
42019004	Agatang'ana bwango , akarina igoro as'omoko anyare komorora , ekiagera ngoeta arenge enchera eria .
42019005	Na Yesu , agachia goika aase aria , akarigereria igoro , akamorora , akamotebia , Zakayo , ika bwango ; naki rero ningwenerete goikaransa enyomba mwao .
42019006	Agaika bwango , akamoroisia as'omogoko ,
42019007	Goika abanto bachia korora bakemurungania bonsi bakabora , ng'a osoire goikaransa as'omonto omonyene ebibe .
42019008	Zakayo agatenena , akamotebia Omonene , Rora Omonene , enusu y'enibo yane nabaire abataka ; naende onye naurete omonto egento as'okomourereria namoiraneirie ara kane .
42019009	Yesu akamotebia , Rero ogotoreka gwaikire enyomba eye , ekiagera oyo nere nomwana o Ibrahimu ,
42019010	Naki Omwana-o-mwanyabanto igachete erinde arigie egiasirete na gogekonya .
42019011	Nabarabwo bagachia koigwa aya , akamenta akabatebia omoreng'anio , ekiagera konya oikire ang'e na Yerusalemu , nabarabwo bagakaga ng'a obonda bwa Nyasaye iga borarorekane ekero ekio kegima .
42019012	Nabo akabora , Omonto oyomo , omobiare , akagenda ense y'are erinde anyare kwenyorera oboruoti nakoirana .
42019013	Akabarangeria ikomi as'abasomba baye , akabaa ebirengo ikomi bie chifetha , akabatebia , Bionchorerie ebi goika ekero nkoirana .
42019014	Abanyene ense baye bakamogecha , bagatoma abatomwa komotunya nakobora , Titorigeti omonto oyo atogambere .
42019015	Agachia koba kairanire , kanyorire oboruoti , agachika abasomba baria baetwe chifetha barangerigwe , erinde anyare komanya ebibanyorete ebitoki as'ogokora kwabo .
42019016	Oyo bw'e ritang'ani agacha akabora , Omonene , ekerengo kiao kianyorire ebirengo ikomi .
42019017	Akamotebia Mbuya , aye omosomba omuya , ekiagera kwabaire omwegeni as'egento kere egeke , nabo , obe nechinguru igoro as'emechie ikomi .
42019018	Agacha noyo kabere , akabora , Ekerengo kiao , Omonene , kianyorire ebirengo bitano .
42019019	Akamotebia nere boigo , Naye obe igoro as'emechie etano .
42019020	Agacha oyonde akabora , Omonene , rora ekerengo kiao narenge nakio ekeiga , nakegachete as'egetambaa ;
42019021	naki nakoirogete , ekiagera aye igore omonto omokong'u : iga okobogoria otabegeti , iga okogesa eki otasimegeti .
42019022	Akamotebia , As'omonwa oo ninkogambie , aye omosomba omobe . Nkwamanyete ng'a inche nomonto omokong'u , nkobogoria eki ntabegeti , nakogesa eki ntasimegeti ,
42019023	naki , rende otabegete efetha yane as'emonga , ninche ngocha anga nayenyora amo nebitoki ?
42019024	Akabatebia abarengeo , Moure ekerengo kiaye , momoe oria oyore nebirengo ikomi .
42019025	Bakamotebia , Omonene , nare nebirengo ikomi .
42019026	Nabatebirie , Ker'oyore negento , naegwe ; korende ere oyotari negento , nonya nkeria are nakio naurwe .
42019027	Korende baria ababisa bane batarigeti mbagambere , barete aiga mobaita as'obosio bwane .
42019028	Agachia gokwana amang'ana aya , agatang'ana gotira kogenda ase Yerusalemu .
42019029	Goika agachia goika Bethifage na Bethania ang'e negetunwa kia Emezeituni , agatoma babere as'aborokigwa baye , akabora ,
42019030	Genda goika oria omochie mokoorokera inwe , mogosoa ime , namorore emori y'etigere esibire , etanya korinwa nomonto ; nyesibore , monyerete .
42019031	Naende omonto karabatebia , Naki mokoyesibora ? motebe iga , Omonene nayerigetie .
42019032	Nabo , baria batometwe bakagenda , bakarora bo buna abatebetie .
42019033	Naende bagachia koyesibora , emori y'etigere , abanyene bakababoria , Ninki mokoyesiborera emori y'etigere ?
42019034	Bakabora , Omonene nayerigetie .
42019035	Bakayereta ase Yesu : bakara chianga chiabo igoro as'emori eria y'etigere , bakamorinia Yesu ,
42019036	Nere gakogenda , bakara chianga chiabo ' nchera .
42019037	Agachia goika egetirimboko ki'egetunwa kia Emezeituni , omoganda bwonsi bw'aborokigwa baye bagachaka kogoka nakomobaka Nyasaye as'eriogi rinene , as'ebikone bionsi barorire ;
42019038	bakabora , Osesenigwe omoruoti ogocha as'erieta ri'Omonene : omorembe igoro , nobonene bore igoro .
42019039	Abande as'Abafarisai abarenge as'omosangererekano bakamotebia , Omworokia , bakanie aborokigwa bao .
