42019040	Akairaneria , akabora , Nabatebirie ng'a bagokira aba , amagena naake eriogi .
42019041	Nere agachia goika ang'e akarora omochie , akayorera ,
42019042	akabora , Onye nomanyete ase rituko eri , ayio ayare as'omorembe ! korende bono abisirwe as'amaiso aino ;
42019043	naki amatuko nagochere , ababisa bao barakoagachere oruaki goetanana omochie oo , bagosiongororokane , nakobatanga chinsemo chionsi ;
42019044	nabakoiyerie inse , nabana bao ime asore : tibagotigera rigena igoro ase rigena ; ekiagera otamanyete engaki y'ogocherwa kwao .
42019045	Agasoa hekalu ime , agachaka kobasokia abakogora nabagotonda ,
42019046	akabatebia , Nerikire , Enyomba yane nebe enyomba y'ogosaba : korende inwe mwayekorire koba ribwago ri'abaibi .
42019047	Akaba okworokereria kera rituko ase hekalu . Abakuani abanene nabariki nabanene b'abanto bakarigia komoita :
42019048	nabarabwo tibarora eri bagokora : naki abanto bonsi barenge ang'e nere , komoigwa .
42020001	Agachia koba rituko erimo , akaba nkoborokereriare abanto hekalu ime na korandia enchili , abakuani abanene nabariki , naende amo nabagaka , bakamoorokera ;
42020002	bagakwana nere bakabora , Totebie : nas'ogochika ki ogokora aya ? Ning'o okoete ogochika oko ?
42020003	Akairaneria , akabatebia , Nainche nimbaborie inwe ring'ana erimo ; montebie :
42020004	ebatiso ya Yohana , ng'ai yaruete , igoro , gose nase mwanyabanto ?
42020005	Bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , bakabora , Gotoratebe , Nkorua igoro ; natebe , Naki motamwancheti rende ?
42020006	Korende gatorabore , Nase mwanyabanto ; abanto bonsi nabatoake amagena ; naki banchire ng'a Yohana nomobani .
42020007	Bakairaneria bakamotebia , Titomanyeti as ' eruete .
42020008	Yesu akabatebia , Nonya ninche tinkobatebia iftwe gose nas'ogochika ki ngokora aya .
42020009	Agachaka kobatebia abanto omoreng'anio oyo : Omonto agasimeka omogondo bw'emesabibu , akayuatananera abaremi , akagenda ense endeas'ekero ki'amatuko amange .
42020010	Naende ekero kie rigesa agatoma omosomba ase baria abaremi erinde bamoe ensemo y'amatunda emesabibu : abaremi bakamoaka , bakamosokia tari nagento ,
42020011	Agatoma omosomba onde ; bakamoaka oyio boigo , bakamosokia , bakamoseria tari nagento ,
42020012	Agatoma naende oyo gatato , bakamoaka chingoma , bakamoseria .
42020013	Oria Omonene bw'omogondo bw'emesabibu akabora , Inki ndakore ? Nimotome omwana one , omwanchani one : gose bakomorora ere nabamosike .
42020014	Korende baria abaremi , bagachia komorora , bagakora ekina barabwo ase barabwo , bakabora , Oyo nere omonyamwando : tomoite gaki . omwando onyare koba oyoito .
42020015	Bakamoruta isiko as'omogondo bw'emesabibu , bakamoita . Nabo oria omonene bw'omogondo bw'emesabibu naki arabakore ?
42020016	Nache nakobasiria baria abaremi , noria omogondo bw'emesabibu nabae abande . Bagachia koigwa , bakabora , Nyasaye takora bo .
42020017	Akabarigereria , akabora , Engecho yaye ninki , ring'ana eri ririkire , Rigena bariangeti abaagachi , Eri riabaire rigena rinene ri'ekona ?
42020018	Ker'omonto okogwa igoro ase rigena erio nabuna-bunekane , nere oyo riragwere narimosie .
42020019	Abakuani abanene nabariki bakarigia komobwata ensa eyio eyio , bakairoka abanto : ekiagera bakamanya ng'a oria omoreng'anio nabwo agoteba .
42020020	Bakamoboera , bagatoma abaroti , nabarabwo bagekora buna nabanyene oboronge , erinde bamobwate as'ogokwana kwaye , bamobeke as'obonene nechinguru chia gavuna .
42020021	Bakamoboria , bakobora , Omworokia , twamanyire ng'a iga ogokwana ayare ekeene nakoyorokereria , gose tori koiroka obonene bw'omonto , korende as'ekeene iga okworokereria enchera ya Nyasaye :
42020022	Inee mboronge komoa Kaisari ebango gose taribo ?
42020023	Korende akamanya obong'ainereria bwabo , akabatebia ,
42020024	Inyorokia eshilingi , nekiang'o ekieni eke ? namariko aya ? Bakabora , nebia Kaisari .
42020025	Akabatebia , Nabo , moe Kaisari ebia Kaisari , nebia Nyasaye moe Nyasaye .
42020026	Tibanyara komobwata ase ring'ana riaye as'obosio bw'abanto : bagakumia as'okoiraneria kwaye , bagakira .
42020027	Erio abande as'Abasadukai bakamochiera , abanto bakobora ng'a okoboka tikori ; bakamoboria ,
42020028	bakobora , Omworokia , Musa natorikerete ng'a momura omwabo omonto karakwe , nere nare nomokungu , nomonto oyio akwe atari nomwana , nagwenerete momura omwabo amoire oria omokungu , amotenenerie momura omwabo egesaku .
42020029	Gaki , mbarenge abamura bamwabo batano nababere : oyo bwe ritang'ani akamobogoria omokungu , agakwa atari nomwana ;
42020030	noyo kabere ;
42020031	goika oyo gatato akamobogoria ; boigo noyo gatano nakabere tibatiga abana , bagakwa .
42020032	Omoerio bw'abwo bonsi oria omokungu agakwa nere .
42020033	Nabo as'okobokigwa , nabe mokang'o as'abwo ? ekiagera baria batano nababere barenge nere .
42020034	Yesu akairaneria akabatebia , Abana b'ense eye iga bakonyuoma na konyuomwa :
42020035	korende barabwo abarache kobarwa bagwenerete konyora ense eria , nakobokigwa korwa as'amakweri , tibakonyuoma gose tibakonyuomwa :
42020036	naki tibakonyara gokwa naende : ekiagera iga barabe koreng'ana buna amalaika ; naende nabana ba Nyasaye ekiagera nabana b'okobokigwa koria .
42020037	Korende ekiagera abakure bakobokigwa , Musa nere akorokereria as'egesieri as'Omote , agwo ekero akomwatora Omonene ng'a Nyasaye o Ibrahimu , naende Nyasaye o Isaaka , na Nyasaye o Yakobo .
42020038	Nabo , ere tari Nyasaye bw'abakure , korende Nyasaye bw'abare moyo : naki bonsi iga bare moyo asare .
42020039	Abande b'abariki bakairaneria bakabora , Omworokia , gwakwanire buya .
42020040	Naki ' monto onde taba okomoboria ring'ana nyuma as'aya .
42020041	Akabatebia , Naseki bagoteba ng'a Kristo nomwana o Daudi ?
42020042	Naki Daudi omonyene igagoteba as'ebuku ya Zaburi , Omonene akamotebia Omonene one , Ikaransa okoboko kwane gw'okorio .
42020043	Goika mbakore ababisa bao babe inse as'amagoro ao .
42020044	Daudi , akamoroka Omonene , naki rende aba omwana oye ?
42020045	Ka abanto bonsi bakomoigwa , akabatebia aborokigwa baye ,
42020046	Erende nabariki banchete gotara beboete chianga chintambe , nagokwanigwa chichiro na goikaransa aas'aatang'ani ase chisunagogi , naase are eritang'ani as'emeyega :
42020047	iga bakoria chinyomba chi'ababoraka , nas'obong'ainereria basaba ogosaba ogotambe : abwo nabanyore ekina kere ekenene kobua .
42021001	Akaramokia amaiso aye akabarora abanto abanda bakobeka ebiegwa biabo as'esanduku y'emonga .
42021002	Akamorora omoboraka oyomo omotaka , okobeka ebisabwa bibere .
42021003	Akabora , Ekeene nabatebirie , Oyo omoboraka omotaka obekire ebinge kobua bonsi :
42021004	naki aba bonsi babekire korwa as'obonge bw'enibo yabo , korende oyo as'okoremerwa kwaye obekire ebinto bionsi ebiarenge nabio .
42021005	Ekero abanto batai bake barenge gokwana amang'ana ase hekalu , buna erosirie as'amagena amaya , nechisadaka chi'abanto , agateba ,
42021006	Aya moroche , amatuko nache ritatigare rigena igoro ase rigena eritatagorwe .
42021007	Bakamoboria , bagoteba , Omworokia aya indi arabe rende ? Naende ninki ekiorokererio kiaye ekero aya onsi arabe ang'e goikerana ?
42021008	Akabora , Erende timong'aineka : naki abange nabache as'erieta riane , babore , Inche ninche , nengaki yaikire , nabo timobabwatia abwo .
42021009	Nainwe namoigwe amang'ana esegi nesugu , timoichanigwa : naki aya bori nache kooroka ritang'ani ; korende omoerio toraba ang'e .
42021010	Erio akabatebia , Egesaku nakeimoke korwana negesaku , nobonda korwana nobonda :
42021011	nebe emetengecho emenene y'ense chinsemo nechinsemo , nenchara , nenyamokirimbi ; nabe namang'ana ogoichania , nebikone ebinene bikorua igoro .
42021012	Korende ritang'ani as'aya onsi nabababwate nakobachanda , nababaire ase chisunagogi nechichela , namoirwe as'amasio abaruoti nabagavuna as'engecho y'erieta riane .
42021013	Korende aya nanyare koba ' kirori asemore .
42021014	Ancha gaki as'emioyo yaino , korwa bono ng'a timorengereria ritang'ani eki morairanerie :
42021015	naki inche nimbae omonwa nechisemi , abachandi baino tibanyara gokana gose koamererania nabio .
42021016	Nainwe namorugwe nababaibori baino , nabamura bamino , neamate yaino , nabasani baino ; nabarabwo nabababeke abande baino as'ogoitwa .
42021017	Namogechwe nabanto bonsi as'engecho y'erieta riane .
42021018	Nonya norochugu rw'etukia y'emetwe yaino tirogosira nonya ng'ake .
42021019	Nas'okoremereria kwaino namochinyore chinkoro chiaino .
42021020	Korende , komorarore Yerusalemu oetananirwe nemeganda , erio manya ng'a ogosareka kwaye gwaikire .
42021021	Erio abare ase Boyahudi batamere ebitunwa ; nabare egati gati yaye basoke isiko ; nabare borabu tibasoa aroro .
42021022	Ekiagera aya namatuko egesiomba , onsi ayarigetwe anyare goikeranigwa .
42021023	Obobe nobwabo abare barito nabakogonkia amatuko aria ! naki nebe emechando emenene igoro as'ense , nendamwamu as'abanto aba .
42021024	Nabarabwo nabagwe ase chinsonga chi'emioro , naboswe bairwe as'ebisaku bionsi : noro Yerusalemu notachwe n'Ebisaku , goika ebiro bi'Ebisaku biikerane .
42021025	Naende nabibe ebikone as'erioba nomotienyi neching'enang'eni ; nas'ense nemechando as'ebisaku , nabatang'ang'e as'okoruma kw'enyancha nemerindo yaye ;
42021026	abanto nabakwe as'okoiroka , nas'okoganya ayakoyechera ense : naki chinguru chia igoro nachinyegere .
42021027	Nerio nabanyare komorora Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ogocha as'amare ase chinguru nobonene obonge .
42021028	Ayio karachake koba , rigereria igoro ; moimokererie emetwe yaino igoro ; ekiagera okoboria kwaino gwaikire .
42021029	Akabatebia omoreng'anio ; Yorore omoko nemete yonsi :
42021030	ekero egochaka goseboka , mwarora nakomanya as'emioyo yaino ng'a egurugura yaisire koba ang'e .
42021031	Nainwe naboigo komokorora ayio abaire , manya ng'a obonda bwa Nyasaye ng'ang'e bore .
42021032	Ekeene nabatebirie , Ekegori eke tigegoeta nonya ng'ake goika aya onsi aikeranigwe .
42021033	Igoro nense nabiete : korende amang'ana ane tagoeta nonya ng'ake .
42021034	Nabo , erigererie , emioyo yaino techa korarerwa nokoria bobe nogotinda , nokwerosia kw'obogima obo , rituko riria ribachere as'omobosokano , buna obeto :
42021035	naki naboigo eranyare kobachera abanto bonsi baikaransete igoro as'obosio bw'ense yonsi .
42021036	As'ayio renda ker'ekero , mogosaba monyare kobarwa ng'a mwagweneire gokonyerwa aya onsi ayaranyare koba , naende gotenena aase aino as'obosio bw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
42021037	Naende kera rituko igarenge kworokereria hekalu ime , as'ekero kia mobaso ; na ker'obotuko asoka , nakorara as'egetunwa gekorokwa egetunwa ki'Emezeituni ,
42021038	abanto bonsi baka mochiera mambia chuni aria hekalu ime erinde banyare komoigwa .
42022001	Rigaika rituko rinene ri'emegati etabekire ememera , rikorokwa Epasaka .
42022002	Abakuani abanene nabariki bakarigia enchera y'okomoita , naki babairogete abanto .
42022003	Saitani akamosoa Yuda , okorokwa Omoisikariota , nere igarenge as'omobaro bwa baria ikomi nababere .
42022004	Akagenda agakwana n'Abakuani abanene nabatang'ani buna aranyare komobeka as'amaboko abo .
42022005	Bakagoka , bakabwatana komoa chifetha .
42022006	Agancha , akarigia ribaga komorua asebare emeganda etaiyo .
42022007	Rigaika rituko ri'emegati etabekire ememera , erio epasaka egwenerete konyenywa .
42022008	Agatoma Petero na Yohana , okobora , Genda motoroserie epasaka , erinde toyerie .
42022009	Bakamotebia , Ng'ai origetie toyerosie ?
42022010	Akabatebia , Rora ekero mwasoire omochie , namoumerane nomonto omosacha obo gorerie enyongo y'amache ; motunyane goika enyomba agosoa .
42022011	Naende namomotebie omonyene enyomba , Omworokia nkoborare , Ng'ai ere enyomba y'abageni , inyare koriera epasaka aroro amo naborokigwa bane ?
42022012	Nomonto oria naborokie enyomba y'igoro enene erosirie ; agwo toroserie .
42022013	Bakagenda bakarora buna abatebetie , bakayerosia epasaka .
42022014	Erio ensa egachia goika ang'e agaikaransa , nabatomwa amo nere .
42022015	Akabatebia , Nindengereretie mono koria epasaka eye amo nainwe , ntarachandwa :
42022016	naki nabatebirie , Tinkoria nonya ng'ake goika eikeranigwe as'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
42022017	Agakchwata egekombe , gasasimire , akabora , Bogoria eke , mwatanane inwe as'inwe :
42022018	naki nabatebirie , Tinkonywa korwa bono okwama kw'emesabibu goika obonda bwa Nyasaye boche .
42022019	Akabogoria omogati , gasasimire , akayosamunyora , akabaa , akabora , Oyo nomobere one orurue as'engecho yaino : kora iga as'okong'inyora .
42022020	Nakerokio egekombe nyuma as'okoria , akabora , egekombe eke nemuma enyia as'amanyinga ane , aitekire as'engecho yaino .
42022021	Korende rigereria , okoboko kwaye oyokondua iga kore amo nainche as'emesa .
42022022	Ekiagera Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nkogendare , buna yachigetwe : korende obobe nobwaye omonto oria as'engecho arurue nere !
42022023	Nabarabwo bagachaka koborania barabwo ase barabwo , ning'o ase barabwo oyorakore ring'ana eri .
42022024	Gokaba nokoamererania asebare , ning'o obarirwe koba omonene .
42022025	Akabatebia , abaruoti b'Ebisaku bakobagambera ; naende abare nechinguru igoro yabo barokwa Abakori abaya .
42022026	Korende asemore inwe taibo ; korende oyore omonene oino abe buna oyore omoke ; nere oyogotang'ana buna omokori .
42022027	Inee ! ning'o omonene , noyoikaransete as'endagera gose noyogokora ? tari ere oyogoikaransa as'endagera ? korende inche nde as'egati yaino buna omokori .
42022028	Nainwe ninwe mwabaire amo nainche as'ogotemwa kwane ;
42022029	nainche nababekeire inwe obonda , buna ambekerete Tata one ,
42022030	monyare koria nakonywa as'emesa yane as'obonda bwane ; nagoikaransa as'chirogo bi'obonene , nakobigambia ebisaku ikomi nabibere bi'Isiraeli .
42022031	Omonene akabora , Simion , Simion , rora Saitani nabarigetie inwe , anyare kobasonga buna engano :
42022032	korende nagosabeire , erinde okwegena kwao tigokea : naye gogoonchoka , obabeke abamino chinguru .
42022033	Akamotebia , Omonene , amo naye inche iga inde ang'e kogenda echela nagokwa .
42022034	Akabora , Nagotebirie , Petero , etuoni tekogweya rero , ekero otarankana ara gatato ng'a tomanyeti .
42022035	Akabatebia , Ekero nabatomete motare nebimoya nechisaro , nebikoroto , mwaremeretwe gento ? Bagateba , Yaya .
42022036	Akabatebia , Korende bono omonyene ekemoya akebogorie , nesaro boigo : nere oyotari nomoro , agore eganchwa yaye , atonde oyomo .
42022037	Naki nabatebirie , Eri riarigetwe ndigwenerete goikefanigwa asende , Oyobaretwe amo nabasaria ; naki eringwenerete ndire nomoerio .
42022038	Bagateba , Omonene , rora , emioro ebere eye . Akabatebia , Nabo aisanire .
42022039	Agasoka , akagenda goika egetunwa ki'Emezeituni , buna engecho yaye yarenge ; aborokigwa baye bakamotunyana .
42022040	Agachia goika aase aria , akabatebia , Saba , timosoa as'ogotemwa .
42022041	Ageatanana nabarabwo ekerengo gi'okoruta rigena ; akaaka amaru inse agasaba ,
42022042	ogoteba , Tata , koranche , onduserie egekombe eke : korende tari buna ndigetie inche , korende buna origetie aye bikoreke .
42022043	Rikamoorokera rilaika korwa igoro rikamobeka chinguru .
42022044	Nere ekiagera arenge nogoichana mono , akamenta gosaba nomokia : ebigeri biaye bikaba buna amatoima amanyinga akogwa inse .
42022045	Agachia koimoka korwa as'ogosaba , akabachera aborokigwa baye , akabanyora bararire as'ogoichana ,
42022046	akabatebia , Naki mwararire ? Imoka , mosabe , timonyara gosoa as'ogotemwa .
42022047	Nere gagokwana , rora , omoganda , nere oyokorokwa Yudas , oyomo as'ikomi nababere , otang'aine asebare , akamoika Yesu ang'e akamonyunyunta .
42022048	Yesu akamotebia , Yudas , kwamorure Omwana-o-mwanyabanto as'okomonyunyunta ?
42022049	Nabarabwo abarenge amo nere bagachia korora ayakorigia koba , bakabora , Omonene natoake nomoro ?
42022050	Oyomo obo akamoaka omosomba bw'omokuani omonene , akamonacha ogoto gw'okorio .
42022051	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , Tiga nkore iga . Akamokuna ogoto akamogwenia .
42022052	Yesu akabatebia abamocherete , abakuani abanene , nabanene be hekalu , nabagaka , Iga mwachire nemioro nechinungu buna as'omoibi .
42022053	Ekero narenge amo nainwe ase hekalu , kera rituko timwandamborerete amaboko : korende bono ensa eye neyaino , nobonene bw'omosunte .
42022054	Bakamobwata , bakamoira , bakamoreta nyomba ime as'omokuani omonene . Na Petero akamotunya korwa nyuma are ,
42022055	Bachia gouta omorero egati y'egora , bagaikaransa amo , na Petero agaikaransa as'egati yabo .
42022056	Erio , omoiseke oyomo akamorora oikaransete aas'omorero ogwoka , akamobeta amaiso , akabora , Oyo nere igarenge amo nere .
42022057	Agakana akabora , Omokungu , timomanyeti .
42022058	Naende ake oyonde akamorora , akabora , Naye noyomo obo . Petero akabora , Aye omonto , tai inche .
42022059	Na nyuma engaki y'ensa eyemo , omonto onde akabetereria mono , akabora , Ekeene noyo igarenge amo nere : naki nere n'Omogalili .
42022060	Petero akabora , Aye omonto , timanyeti eriogokwana . Erio kegima kagokwana , etuoni ekagweya .
42022061	Omonene ageonchora , akamorigereria Petero . Petero akainyora ring'ana ri'Omonene , buna amotebetie , Ritang'ani etuoni etaragweya rero , nonkane ara gatato .
42022062	Agasoka isiko , akarera nobororo .
42022063	Nabaria abanto bamobwatete Yesu , bakamosekereria , bakamoaka .
42022064	Bakamomumekeria amaiso , bakamoboria , bakobora , Bana : ning'o okoaka ?
42022065	Bakamokwana nayande amange as'okorama .
42022066	Bwachia gokia bagasangerereka abagaka b'abanto , nabakuani abanene , nabariki ; bakamoreta as'ekegambero kiabo , bakobora ,
42022067	Onye aye naye Kristo , totebie . Korende akabatebia , Ninsakobatchia , timokonyara gwancha :
42022068	nainche kondababorie timokong'iraneria .
42022069	Korende koiwa bono Omwana-o-mwanyabanto naikaranse okoboko gw'okorio kw'obonene bwa Nyasaye .
42022070	Bakabora bonsi , Nabo , aye naye Omwana o Nyasaye ? Akabatebia , Inwe mwatebire ng'a ninche ere .
42022071	Bakabora , Nabo , inki tokorigeria birori ? Naki intwe abanyene twaigure as'omonwa oye .
42023001	Bakaimoka bonsi , bakamoreta ase Pilato .
42023002	Bagachaka komosoera , bakabora , Twamororire omonto oyo oonchoire egesaku giaito , obakanirie abanto tibamoa Kaisari ebango , okobora ng'a ere omonyene nere Kristo , omoruoti .
42023003	Pilato akamoboria , akabora , Naye omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ? Akairaneria , akamotebia , Gwatebire aye .
42023004	Pilato akabatebia abakuani abanene nemeganda , Inche tindochi bobe bonde as'omonto oyo .
42023005	Nabarabwo bakamobetereria , bakabora , Obaburugire abanto , okoborokereria ase Boyahudi onsi , agachakera Galili goika aiga .
42023006	Pilato agachia koigwa ring'ana eri , akaboria , Omonto oyo n'Omogalili ?
42023007	Agachia komanya ng'a igare inse as'obogambi bwa Herode , akamoira ase Herode ; nere igarenge Yerusalemu amatuko aria ,
42023008	Na Herode agachia komorora Yesu , akagokigwa mono : naki korwa kare igarigetie komorora , ekiagera aigwete amang'ana aye ; asemeretie korora egekone gegokoreka asare .
42023009	Akamoboria as'amang'ana amange , ere tamoiraneria rinde rionsi .
42023010	Bagatenena abakuani abanene nabariki , bakamosoera ase chinguru .
42023011	Herode nabasigari baye bakamochaya , bakamosekereria , bakamobekera chianga chingiya mono , akamoirania ase Pilato .
42023012	Erio Herode na Pilato bakabwatana obosani , rituko riria : naki ritang'ani iga barenge nobobisa barabwo ase barabwo .
42023013	Pilato akabarangeria amo abakuani abanene , nabanene b'abanto ,
42023014	akabatebia , Mwandeteire omonto oyo , buna oyobaonchoire abanto : nainche nabo nachia komogambia as'obosio bwaino , tindochi bobe as'omonto oyo as'aria mwamosoera :
42023015	nonya Herode nere : naki omoiranirie asetore , rora , ring'ana tiriri rigwenerete ogokwa riakorirwe nere .
42023016	Erio konamoakire , nimosibore .
42023017	Ekiagera nebagwenerete kobasiborera oyomo ekero kie rituko rinene .
42023018	Bakaaka egeturi bonsi amo , bakabora , Moire oyo , tosiborere Baraba :
42023019	nere nomonto obegetwe as'echela as'engecho y'esugu yakoregete as'omochie ime , nas'oboiti .
42023020	Nabo eria kabere Pilato agakwana nabarabwo , akarigia ' komosibora Yesu .
42023021	Nabarabwo bakaaka eriogi , bakabora , Mobambe , mobambe .
42023022	Nere akabatebia eria gatato , Naki ? mbobe ki akorete oyo ? Tindochi nonya nering'ana asare rigwenerete ogokwa : nabo konamoakire nimosibore .
42023023	Korende bakabetereria kobora as'eriogi rinene , bakarigia abambwe . Eriogi riabo , neria abakuani abanene rikabua .
42023024	Pilato akanacha amang'ana akoreke buna barigetie .
42023025	Akamosibora ere oyobegetwe echela as'esugu noboiti , oyobarigetie ; akamorua Yesu as'okorigia kwabo .
42023026	Bagachia komoira , bakamobwata Omokurene Simion , orenge korwa borabu , bakamotweka omosalaba , ayobogorie nyuma yaye Yesu .
42023027	Ekamotunyana emeganda emenge y'abanto , nabakungu , bare kweakaaka , bakweng'ereria .
42023028	Yesu ageonchora , akabora , abaiseke ba Yerusalemu , timondera inche , korende erere abanyene , nabana baino .
42023029	Naki amatuko nache bararigie goteba , Mbare negesio abare abagomba , nechinda chitaiboreti , nechimbere chitanakogonkwa .
42023030	Erio nabachake kobitebia ebitunwa , Togwere ; nebigoro , Totube .
42023031	Ekiagera kobagokora aya ekero omote ore omobese , ekero ki'oria ore omwomo naki arabe ?
42023032	Bakairwa babere naende , abasaria baitwe amo nere .
42023033	Bagachia goika aas'akorokwa Ekeore , nao bamobambete , nabaria abasaria , oyomo okoboko gw'okorio , noyonde okoboko gw'okobee .
42023034	Yesu akabora , Tata , obabere ; ekiagera tibamanyeti eke bagokora . Bakagabana chianga chiaye , bagakora obomera .
42023035	Abanto bagatenena , bakarigereria . Nabarabwo abanene bakamokorera echeche , bakobora , Nakonyete abande ; tiga ekonye omonyene , onye oyo nere Kristo o Nyasaye , omochore oye .
42023036	Abasigari bakamosekereria , bakamochera , bakamoa chinkama ,
42023037	nakobora , Onye aye naye omoruoti bw'Abayahudi , ekonye .
42023038	Nkiarenge nekemanyererio igoro ' asare kerikire ase chinuguta chi'Ekeyunani , n'Ekerumi , n'Ekeibirania , Oyo Nere Omoruoti Bw'Abayahudi .
42023039	Oyomo bwa baria abasaria babambetwe akamorama , akabora , Pari aye ore Kristo ? Ekonye omonyene naintwe .
42023040	Oyo kabere akairaneria , akamokania akabora , Tori komoiroka aye nonya Nyasaye , kore as'ekina keria keria ?
42023041	Naintwe ekeene mboronge ; naki intwe twaeirwe eng'eria ya boronge y'ogokora gwaito : korende oyo takoreti ring'ana ritagwenereti .
42023042	Akamotebia Yesu , ong'inyore gogocha as'obonda bwao .
42023043	Yesu akamotebia , Ancha nagotebirie rero , nobe amo nainche Igoro .
42023044	Nekero ekio chikaba chinsa isano nemo , omosunte okaba igoro as'ense yonsi goika chinsa kianda .
42023045	Omobaso ogakea : egetambaa gi'okonacha hekalu gegatandoka gati gati .
42023046	Yesu akarera as'eriogi rinene akabora , Tata , as'amaboko ao nayobekire omoika one : ochia gokwana aya agatwekamo .
42023047	Omotang'anibw ' abasigari emia , agachia korora eriakoreka , akamotogia Nyasaye , akabora , Ekeene omonto oyo igarenge omonyene oboronge .
42023048	Nsende emeganda yonsi abasangererekanete korora aya bagachia korora ayakoreka , bakairana , bakweaka ebikuba .
42023049	Abasani baye bonsi bagatenenera are , nabarabwo abakungu bamotunyanete ere korwa Galili , bakarigereria aya .
42023050	Rora , narenge omonto , erieta riaye Yusufu , nere nomonto bw'ekegambero kiabo , omonto omoya , omonyene oboronge
42023051	( ere tanchete amang'ana abo nonya nogokora kwabo ) , omonyene bw'ense y'Arimathaya , omochie bw'Abayahudi , nere igaganyete obonda bwa Nyasaye :
42023052	omonto oyio akamochiera Pilato agasaba aegwe omobere o Yesu .
42023053	Akayoikia , akayotuba egetambaa ki'egatani , akayobeka as'oboina bwabachetwe as'egetare ; ase'monto onde atanya kobekwa .
42023054	Iga riarenge rituko ri'Okweroisia , esaboto egaika ang'e .
42023055	Abakungu abachete amo nere korwa Galili , bagatunyana , bakaborigereria oboina , naende buna obegetwe omobere oye .
42023056	Bakairana bakaroisia amaguta amanukato erimisu rigiya . Nerituko ri'esabato bagatimoka buna yachigetwe .
42024001	Ase rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma , kobogokiamoka , bakagenda oboina , bakareta amanukato aria ayababegete ang'e .
42024002	Bakarinyora riria rigena riatigerigwe are noboina .
42024003	Bagasoa , tibayonyora omobere ' bw'Omonene Yesu .
42024004	Agachia koba ekero baichanete as'aya , rora ! abanto babere mbateneine ang'e asebare , beboete chianga chikomekameka :
42024005	nabarabwo bagasogwa nokoiroka nagotung'ama maumama goika inse , bakabatebia , Naseki mokomorigia oyore moyo as'ebitondo ?
42024006	Tari aa , korende obokire : Inyora buna akwanete nainwe ekero arenge Galili ,
42024007	akabora , ng'a nemogwenerete Omwana-o-mwanyabanto abekwe as'amaboko abanto abanyene ebibe , nakobambwa , nakoboka rituko ria gatato .
42024008	Bakainyora amang'ana aya .
42024009	Bakairana korwa as'oboina , bakabatebia baria ikomi nomo nabaria abande bonsi amang'ana ayio onsi ,
42024010	Nabwo babatebetie abatomwa amang'ana aya , Mariamu Magidalene , na Yoanna , na Mariamu ng'ina Yakobo ; nabakungu bande barenge amo nabarabwo .
42024011	Amang'ana abo akarorekana koba ng'a naya bosa asebare ; gose tibababwatera .
42024012	Korende Petero akaimoka , akagenda bwango as'oboina , agatung'ama , akarigereria ime , , akabirora biria ebitambaa bibekire bioka , akairana bwoye , okumetie as'aria aoroka .
42024013	Rituko riria babere babo nkogenda barenge omochie , erieta riaye Emmao , orenge are ase Yerusalemu ang'e chimail isano naisato .
42024014	Nabarabwo ngokwanabare aya onsi akorekire .
42024015	Egachia koba kabagokwana nakoborania , Yesu omonyene agaika ang'e akagenda amo nabarabwo .
42024016	Amaiso abo akamumekerigwa , tibanyara komomanya .
42024017	Akabatebia , ' Mang'ana ki aya mokoborania as'orogendo rwaino ? naende amasio aino anyirire .
42024018	Akairaneria oyomo obo , erieta riaye Kiliopa , akamotebia Inee ? naye bweka ore omogeni ase Yerusalemu , otamanyeti ayare ime yaye amatuko aya ?
42024019	Akabatebia , ' Mang'ana ki ? Bakamotebia , Amang'ana a Yesu Omonazareti , orenge omonto omobani omonyene chinguru as'ogokora nase ring'ana as'obosio bwa Nyasaye nabanto bonsi :
42024020	buna abakuani abanene nabanene baito bamoruete as'ekina ki'ogokwa , bakamobamba .
42024021	Naintwe iga twasemeretie ng'a ere nere oraborie Isiraeli . Goika amo naya onsi , rero nerituko ria gatato korwa ekero abete aya .
42024022	Naende abakungu bande b'ensemo yaito batoichanetie abarenge as'oboina mambia :
42024023	nekero batanyorete omobere oye , bagacha , bakabora , ng'a baorokeirwe namalaika , bakabatebia ng'a moyo are .
42024024	Naende abande abarenge amo naintwe bakagenda oboina , bakarora bo buna abakungu batebete : korende ere tibamorora .
42024025	Nere akabatebia , Inwe abariri , nabanyene emioyo emerito as'okoyancha onsi batebete ababani !
42024026	Tiyamogwenerete Kristo konyora emechando eye , erio asoe obonene bwaye ?
42024027	Akachaka korwa Musa nababani bonsi akabaonchorera as'amariko onsi amang'ana are igoro asare .
42024028	Bakayoika omochie barenge kogenda ; nere agekora buna igarigetie goeta kogenda ,
42024029	bakamobetereria , bakabora , Ikaransa amo naintwe : ekiagera bwairire , nomobaso oerire bono . Agasoa goikaransa amo nabarabwo .
42024030	Ekaba gagoikaransa amo nabarabwo koragera , akabogoria omogati , akayosesenia , akayosamunyora , akabaa .
42024031	Akaramokigwa amaiso abo , bakamomanya ; agasira tarorekana nabarabwo .
42024032	Bagatebania , Inee ! Emioyo yaito tiyarenge gwoka ime yaito , ekero aba ngokwanare naintwe inchera , gagotoorokeria amariko ?
42024033	Bakaimoka ensa eria eria , bakairana Yerusalemu , bakabanyora baria ikomi nomo basangererekanire , nabarabwo abarenge amo nabarabwo ,
42024034	bakabora , Ekeene Omonene obokire , oorokeire Simion .
42024035	Nabarabwo bakabatebia aria ' nchera , buna amanyeka nabarabwo as'ogosamunyora omogati .
42024036	Ekero bagokwana igo ; Yesu omonyene agatenena egati gati yabo akabatebia , Omorembe obe asemore .
42024037	Bagaichana , bagasogwa nobwoba , bagakaga ng'a barorire rirengari .
42024038	Akabatebia , Naki mogoichana ? naende naki ogosiereria gwasokire korwa emioyo yaino .
42024039	Rora amaboko ane , namagoro ane , ng'a ninche omonyene : Mbwatabwata , morore ; ekiagera rirengari tiriri nomobere namauga , buna mondoche inche inde naro .
42024040	Naende gakwanire aya akaborokia amaboko aye namagoro aye .
42024041	Nabo bakaba batarancha as'omogoko , bagakumia , akabatebia , More negento mokoria aa ?
42024042	Bakamoa egesamunye ki'enswe giasambirwe noboke ' boke .
42024043	Akabibogoria , akabiria as'obosio bwabo .
42024044	Akabatebia , Aya naro amang'ana ane nabatebetie , rigoro narenge asemore , buna onsi agwenerete goikeranigwa ayanarikeretwe as'amachiko a Musa nas'ababani , nase Zaburi .
42024045	Erio akaigora obong'aini bwabo , banyare koyamanya amariko amachenu .
42024046	Akabatebia , Naboigo arigetwe ng'a nemogwenerete Kristo gochandwa , nakoboka rituko ria gatato ;
42024047	nebisaku bionsi biranderigwe as'erieta riaye ogoonchoka nokofusigwe kw'ebibe gochakera Yerusalemu .
42024048	Nainwe nabarori b'amang'ana aya .
42024049	Rora , nayetomire eira ya Tata one asemore : korende ikaransa as'omochie oyo Yerusalemu , goika mobekwe chinguru chikorua igoro .
42024050	Akabatang'ana gochia isiko goika Bethania : akaimokia amaboko aye , akabasesenia .
42024051	Agachia koba nkobaseseniare , ageatanana nabarabwo , akabogorigwa gochia igoro .
42024052	Nabarabwo bakamosasima , bakairana Yerusalemu nomogoko omonene :
42024053	bakaba botambe ime ase hekalu , bakomotogia Nyasaye .
43001001	Omochakano ndiarengeo Ring'ana , ne Ring'ana iga riarenge amo na Nyasaye , narirorio Ring'ana iga narenge Nyasaye .
43001002	Oyio omochakano igarenge amo na Nyasaye .
43001003	Bionsi bigakoreka as'oyio ; gose onye tari ere anga tigiakoregete kende gionsi egiakoregete .
43001004	Ime yaye nao bwarenge obogima ; naborobwo obogima iga bwarenge omobaso bw'abanto .
43001005	Noro omobaso obarire as'omosunte , erio omosunte toyonyara .
43001006	Akaoroka omonto , otometwe korwa ase Nyasaye , erieta riaye Yohana .
43001007	Oyo igachete abe kirori erinde atebe omobaso bonsi banyare gwancha asere .
43001008	Oyio tarenge oria omobaso , korende igachete as'oborori bw'omobaso .
43001009	Norengeo omobaso bw'ekeene , okomobeka omobaso ker'omonto ogocha as'ense ,
43001010	Nao arenge as'ense ime , ense egakorwa asere , nense tiyamomanya .
43001011	Agacha as'abaye , nabarabwo abare abaye tibamwancha .
43001012	Korende bonsi abamwanchete , akabaa okobua babe abana ba Nyasaye , nabwo barianchire erieta riaye :
43001013	abaiboirwe , tari as'amanyinga , gose tari as'obwanchani bw'omobere , gose tari as'obwanchani bw'omonto , korende ase Nyasaye .
43001014	Narirorio Ring'ana rigakoreka omobere , agaikaransa asetore , ( tokaborora obonene bwaye , obonene buna obw'omwana omomoima orure ase Tata ) , oichire obuya nekeene .
43001015	Yohana akamwatora , akaaka egeturi , akabora , Oyo nere natebete amang'ana aye , ng'a Oyorache nyuma yane igare ritang'ani asende : ekiagera arenge ritang'ani asende .
43001016	Naende as'ogoichora kwaye intwe twensi twanyorire , obuya igoro as'obuya .
43001017	Ekiagera amachiko aruetwe ase Musa ; obuya nekeene iga bwachete ase Yesu Kristo ,
43001018	Omonto onde tari omororire Nyasaye kero kende gionsi ; Omwana bweka ore as'egekuba kia Tata nere omoorokirie .
43001019	Naende obwo nabwo oborori bwaye Yohana , ekero Abayahudi batomete abakuani n'Abalawi korwa Yerusalemu bamoborie , Aye naye ng'o ?
43001020	Nere akaorokia , takana ; agateba , Inche tari nche Kristo .
43001021	Bakamoboria , Naki rende ? Naye Elija ? Akabora , Inche tari ere . Aye naye omobani oria ? Akairaneria , Yaya .
43001022	Nabo bakamotebia , Naye ng'o , tobae okoiraneria abatotomete . Naki ogweteba ?
43001023	Akabora , Inche neriogi ri'omonto okoaka eriogi eroro ime , Rongeyia enchera y'Omonene , buna atebete omobani Isaya ,
43001024	Nabarabwo abatometwe baruete as'Abafarisai .
43001025	Bakamoboria , bakamotebia , Naki rende okobatisa , onye aye tori Kristo , gose Elija , gose omobani oria ?
43001026	Yohana akabairaneria akabora , Inche iga nkobatisa as'amache : egati yaino otenenire oyomotamanyeti inwe .
43001027	Nere ogocha nyuma yane , oyorenge ritang'ani asende , gose inche tingwenereti nyesibore enuga y'egekoroto kiaye .
43001028	Aya iga akoregete Bethania ng'umbu ya Yorodan , nao arenge Yohana okobatisa .
43001029	Rituko ria kabere riaye Yohana akamorora Yesu ogocha asare , akabora , Rora , Emanwa y'Eng'ondi ya Nyasaye , oyobogoretie ebibe bi'ense !
43001030	Oyo nere nare goteba amang'ana aye , Ngochare omonto nyuma yane , oyore ritang'ani asende , ekiagera arenge ritang'ani asende .
43001031	Nainche tinamomanyete ; korende aorokigwe as'Abaisiraeli , nabo as'ayio ngacha nakobatisa as'amache .
43001032	Yohana agakwana , akabora , Nayororire Omoika ogoika korwa igoro buna riruma , rigaikaransa igoro asare .
43001033	Nainche tinamomanya : korende ere oyontomete kobatisa as'amache , oyio agantchia , Ere oyoranyare korora Omoika ogoika nagoikaransa igoro asere , oyio nere okobatisa n'Omoika Omochenu .
43001034	Nainche narorire , naende natebire ng'a oyo n'Omwana o Nyasaye .
43001035	Naende rituko ria kabere riaye Yohana igarenge otene ne nababere b'aborokigwa baye .
43001036	Akamorigereria Yesu ogotara , akabora , Rora , Emanwa y'Eng'ondi ya Nyasaye !
43001037	Baria aborokigwa babere bakamoigwa ogoteba , bakamotunyana Yesu .
43001038	Yesu ageonchora , akabarora bakomotunyana , akabatebia , Ninki mokorigia ? Bakamotebia , Rabii ( ogoonchorwa kwaye , Omworokia ) , ng'ai omenyete ?
43001039	Akabatebia , inchuo morore . Bagacha , bakarora aas'amenyete ; bakamenya asare rituko riria : iga yarenge ang'e chinsa ikomi .
43001040	Anderea , momura omwabo Simon Petero , igarenge oyomo bwa baria babere bamoigwete Yohana nakomotunyana .
43001041	Oyo akamonyora ritang'ani Simon momura omwabo omonyene , akamotebia , Twamonyorire Masihi , ( ogoonchorwa kwaye Kristo ) .
43001042	Akamoira ase Yesu . Yesu akamorigere ria , akabora , Aye Simon , omwana o Yona , norokwe Kefa ( ogoonchorwa kwaye , Petero ) .
43001043	Rituko ria kabere riaye Yesu akarigia koimoka kogenda Galili , akamonyora Filipo : akamotebia , Ntunyana .
43001044	Nere Filipo igarenge omonto o Bethisaida , omonto bw'omochie bw'Anderea na Petero .
43001045	Filipo akamonyora Nathaniel , akamotebia , Twamonyorire ere oyorikeretwe na Musa as'amachiko , nababani , Yesu omwana o Yusufu , omonto o Nazareti .
43001046	Nathaniel akamotebia , Nakenyare egento ekiya korua Nazareti ? Filipo akamotebia , Inchuo orore .
43001047	Yesu akamorora Nathaniel ogocha asare , agakwana asare , Rora , oyo n'Omoisiraeli ekeene ekeene , otari nobong'ainereria ime yaye .
43001048	Nathaniel akamotebia , Ing'ai kwamanyera ? Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Ritang'ani Filipo atarakorangeria , ekero kwarenge inse as'omoko , nakoroche .
43001049	Nathaniel akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Rabii , naye Omwana o Nyasaye , naye omoruoti bw'Abaisiraeli .
43001050	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Ekiagera nagotebia , nakoroche inse as'omoko , gwanchire ? Norore amang'ana amanene kobua aya .
43001051	Akamotebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , namoyerore igoro ekoigoka , namalaika a Nyasaye akorina , agoika igoro as'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
43002001	Naende rituko ria gatato yarenge enyangi ase Kana ya Galili ; na ng'ina Yesu nao arenge .
43002002	Yesu nere akarangerigwa amo naborokigwa baye as'enyangi .
43002003	Goika edivai egachia kobaremera , ng'ina Yesu akamotebia , Tibari nedivai .
43002004	Yesu akamotebia , Omokungu inki nde inche naye ? Ensa yane teraika .
43002005	Ng'ina akabatebia abasomba , Rinde rionsi arabatebie , rikore .
43002006	Nchiarenge aroro chinsiongo isano nemo chi'amagena , chiabekire aroro as'engecho y'ogwesibia kwabo Abayahudi , ker'eyemo iga yarenge ang'e ekerengo kia chigallon emerongo ebere .
43002007	Yesu akabatebia , Ichoria chinsiongo namache . Bagachichoria goika igoro .
43002008	Akabatebia , bono taa , moirere omonene bw'omoyega . Bakaira .
43002009	Omonene bw'omoyega agachia koyaigwa amache akoregete koba edivai , tamanya ase yarua , ( korende abasomba mbamanyete ababuchete amache ) , omonene bw'omoyega akamorangeria omonene bw'enyangi ,
43002010	akamotebia , Kera omonto ritang'ani iga agochaka edivai ere engiya , goika abanto kobatiekire konywa mono , erio oreta eyetari engiya : aye kwagachire edivai engiya goika bono ,
43002011	Oyio noro omochako bw'ebikone Yesu akorete Kana ya Galili , akaorokia obonene bwaye ; aborokigwa baye bakamwancha .
43002012	Nyuma as'aya akagenda goika Kaperinaum , ere , na ng'ina , nabamwabo , naborokigwa baye : bakamenya aroro amatuko amake .
43002013	Naende epasaka y'Abayahudi iga yarenge ang'e , Yesu akarina goika Yerusalemu .
43002014	Akarora hekalu ime abanto barenge gotonda chiombe neching'ondi namaruma , nabanyene koonchora chifetha , baikaransete :
43002015	agakora orokini ase chingori , akabasokia bonsi korwa ase hekalu , neching'ondi nechiombe ; agaitera chifetha chiabo abanyene goonchora chifetha , agachionchora chimesa chiabo ;
43002016	akabatebia baria barenge gotonda amaruma , Yatigerie aya ; timokora enyomba ya Tata one koba enyomba y'ebiasara .
43002017	Aborokigwa baye bakainyora ng'a nerikire , Risemi ri'enyomba yao riandire .
43002018	Nabo Abayahudi bakairaneria bakamotebia , Ngekone ki ogotworokia , ekiagera ogokora aya ?
43002019	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Yetagore hekalu eye , nainche as'amatuko atato ninyetenenie .
43002020	Abayahudi bakabora , Hekalu eye yaagachetwe as'engaki y'emiaka emerongo ene netano nomo , naye oyetenenie as'amatuko atato ?
43002021	Korende ere igare kobora amang'ana ase hekalu y'omobere oye .
43002022	Nabo agachia kobokigwa as'amakweri aborokigwa baye bakainyora ng'a igatebete ring'ana eri , bakariancha riria ririko nariria ring'ana atebete Yesu .
43002023	Goika agachia kobao Yerusalemu ekero ki'epasaka ase rituko rinene , abanto abange bakariancha erieta riaye , kobarora ebikone arenge gokora .
43002024	Korende Yesu tegenete asebare , naki abamanyete bonsi ,
43002025	naende ekiagera tarenge nokorigia as'abanto goteba amang'ana igoro ase mwanyabanto ; naki ere omonyene amanyete ayare ime as'abanto .
43003001	Narenge omonto oyomo bw'Abafarisai , erieta riaye Nikodemo , omonene bw'Abayahudi :
43003002	oyo agacha ase Yesu botuko , akamotebia , Rabii , twamanyire ng'a nomworokia ore , kwarure ase Nyasaye : naki omonto onde tari oranyare kobikora ebikone ebi ogokora , tatiga Nyasaye abe amo nere .
43003003	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , Omonto ataiboiri eria kabere , takonyara koborora obonda bwa Nyasaye .
43003004	Nikodemo akamotebia , Naki aranyare omonto koiborwa kare omogaka ? nanyare gosoa enda ya ng'ina eria kabere aiborwe ?
43003005	Yesu akairaneria , Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , Omonto ataiboiri as'amache n'Omoika , takonyara gosoa obonda bwa Nyasaye .
43003006	Ekeiboire as'omobere nomobere ; nekeiboire as'Omoika nomoika .
43003007	Tokumia ekiagera nagotebia , Nogwenerete koiborwa naende .
43003008	Embeo iga ekogenda as'erigetie , negeturi kiaye iga ogokeigwa , korende tomanyeti as'ekorua gose as'ekogenda : naboigo na ker'omonto oiboirwe as'Omoika .
43003009	Nikodemo akamoiraneria , akamotebia , Naki aranyare koba aya ?
43003010	Yesu akairaneria akamotebia , Inee ! Aye nomworokia as'Isiraeli , naya toyainyoreti ?
43003011	Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , Eritomanyete nario togokwana , neri toroche twariteba ; noborori bwaito timorigwancha .
43003012	Kerabe nkobatebia amang'ana ense , nainwe timogwancha , naki moranche , kondabatebie amang'ana a igoro ?
43003013	Naende omonto onde tari orinire igoro , tatiga ere oyoikire korwa igoro Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ore igoro .
43003014	Naende buna Musa aimogetie eng'iti eroro ime , naboigo Omwana-o-mwanyabanto agwenerete aimokererigwe :
43003015	erinde tasira omonto onde bwonsi oyomwanchire , korende abe nobogima bwa kare nakare .
43003016	Naki Nyasaye ayianchete ense , goika akarua Omwana oye omomoima , erinde ' monto onde bwonsi oyomwanchire tasira , korende anyore obogima bwa kare nakare .
43003017	Naki Nyasaye tamotomete as'ense Omwana oye agambie ense ; korende ense ekonywe nere .
43003018	Oyomwanchire takogambigwa ; oyotancheti otiekire kogambigwa , ekiagera atariancheti erieta ria Omwana oyomo bweka o Nyasaye .
43003019	Neke nakio ekina , ekiagera omobaso ochire ense , abanto bagancha omosunte kobua omobaso ; naki ogokora kwabo kwarenge okobe .
43003020	Naki kera oyogokora amabe igagechete omobaso , gose tagocha as'omobaso , ogokora kwaye tikobaisa gokanigwa .
43003021	Korende oyogokora ekeene igagocha as'omobaso , ogokora kwaye kororekane ng'a iga gwakorirwe ase Nyasaye .
43003022	Nyuma as'aya Yesu naborokigwa baye bakagenda goika ense ya Boyahudi , akabera aroro amo nabarabwo okobatisa ,
43003023	Yohana nere igarenge kobatisa aria Ainon , ang'e na Salim , ekiagera narenge amache amange : abanto bakomochiera bakobatiswa .
43003024	Naki Yohana konya tarabekwa echela .
43003025	Nabo , gokaoroka okoamererania as'aborokigwa ba Yohana n'Abayahudi as'amang'ana ogwesibia .
43003026	Bakamochiera Yohana , bakamotebia , Rabii , ere oyorenge amo naye ng'umbu ya Yorodan , oyio kwaorogetie aye , oyio nere nkobatisare , nabanto bonsi nkomochierabare .
43003027	Yohana akairaneria , akabora , Takonyara omonto konyora ring'ana rinde rionsi tatiga aegwe korwa igoro .
43003028	Inwe abanyene mwabaire kirori ng'a natebete , Inche tari Kristo , korende natomirwe gotang'ana asare .
43003029	Oyore nere omoriakari bw'enyangi nere omonene , korende omosani oye bw'omonene bw'enyangi iga agotenena nakomoigwa , origokera eriogi riaye omonene bw'enyangi : nabo oyo omogoko one oikeranire .
43003030	Ere nagwenerete amenteke , korende inche nkee .
43003031	Oyochire korwa igoro oyio igare igoro as'onsi : oyore bw'ense , noyo bw'ense , iga agokwana amang'ana ense : ere oyochire korwa igoro oyio igare igoro as'onsi .
43003032	Ayaroche nakoyaigwa , naro abereire kirori : gose onde tari oyobwanchire oborori bwaye .
43003033	Oyobwanchire oborori bwaye obekire ekemanyererio kiaye ng'a Nyasaye nekeene ,
43003034	Naki ere oyotometwe na Nyasaye igakoyakwana amang'ana a Nyasaye : naki Nyasaye tari komoa Omoika as'ekerengo .
43003035	Tata omwanchire Omwana , omoeire bionsi as'amaboko aye .
43003036	Oyoramwanche Omwana nare nobogima bwa kare nakare ; noyotamoigwereti Omwana takorora obogima , korende nendamwainu ya Nyasaye eramoikaransere .
43004001	Nabo Omonene agachia komanya ng'a Abafarisai baigure ng'a Yesu okorire aborokigwa abange kobua Yohana , nakobatisa ,
43004002	( Yesu omonyene tare kobatisa , korende naborokigwa baye ) ,
43004003	akarua Boyahudi akagenda Galili eria kabere .
43004004	Naende nagwenerete goeta gati ya Samaria .
43004005	Nabo agaika omochie o Samaria , okorokwa Sukar , ang'e nomogondo oria Yakobo amoete Yusufu omwana oye :
43004006	naende agwo yarenge ensoko ya Yakobo . Nabo Yesu , konya orosire as'orogendo rwaye , agaikaransa iga as'ensoko . Konya yabaire ang'e chinsa isano nemo .
43004007	Agacha omokungu o Samaria kobucha amache : Yesu akamotebia , Ing'a amache inywe .
43004008	Naki aborokigwa baye konya bachire omochie kogora endagera .
43004009	Nabo oria omokungu bw'Abasamaria akamotebia , Naki yaba aye Omoyahudi korigia amache asende , nainche nomokungu bw'Abasamaria ? ( naki Abayahudi tibari gosanga n'Abasamaria . )
43004010	Yesu akairaneria akamotebia , Onye nkwamanya ekeegwa kia Nyasaye , nere ng'o okogotebia , Ing'a amache inywe ; anga nkwamosaba ere , nere anga nakoa amache are moyo .
43004011	Oria omokungu akamotebia , Omonene , tori negento gi'okobuchera nensoko yachire inse mono : ng'ai kwayanyorire amache aya are moyo ?
43004012	Inee ! aye nomonene kobua tata oito Yakobo , oyotoete ensoko eye , nere omonyene akanywa amache aya , nabana baye bonsi netugo yaye ?
43004013	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Ker'oyokonywa amache aya narore erang'o naende :
43004014	korende onde bwonsi oyoranywe amache aria ndamoe inche , takoigwa erang'o kare nakare ; korende amache aria ndanyare komoa nabe ime yaye ensoko y'amache , agosoka goika obogima bwa kare nakare .
43004015	Omokungu oria akamotebia , Omonene , ing'a amache ayio tindora erang'o , gose timbaisa gocha aiga kobucha .
43004016	Yesu akamotebia , Genda , omorangerie omosacha oo oche nere aiga .
43004017	Omokungu oria akairaneria akamotebia , tindi nomosacha . Yesu akamotebia , gwakwanire buya , tindi nomosacha :
43004018	naki kwabaire nabasacha batano ; nere oyore nere bono tari omosacha oo : as'ayio gwakwanire ekeene .
43004019	Omokungu oria akamotebia , Omonene , narorire ng'a nomobani ore .
43004020	Abatata baito iga barenge gosasima as'egetunwa eke ; nainwe iga mogoteba ng'a Yerusalemu naase atogwenerete togosasimera .
43004021	Yesu akamotebia , Aye omokungu , inyancha , ensa neche , motpmosasime Tata as'egetunwa eke , nonya nase Yerusalemu .
43004022	Inwe iga mogosasima eki motamanyeti : intwe iga togosasima ekitemanyete : naki ogotoreka gokorua as'Abayahudi .
43004023	Korende ensa neche , nabono nere , abare nogosaba kw'ekeene nabamosasime Tata as'omoika nekeene : naki Tata iga akobarigia abanto buna abwo bamosasime .
43004024	Nyasaye n'Omoika , nabwo bakomosasima nebagwenerete komosasima as'omoika nekeene .
43004025	Omokungu oria akamotebia , Namanyire ng'a ngochare Masihi ( okorokwa Kristo ) : karache ere , natoorokerie onsi .
43004026	Yesu akamotebia , Inche ngokwana naye , nere .
43004027	Erio bagacha aborokigwa baye bagakumia ekiagera arenge gokwana nomokungu ; korende onde tarenge kobora , Inki okorigia ? gose , Naki ogokwana nere ?
43004028	Nabo oria omokungu akayetiga enyongo yaye , akagenda omochie ka , akabatebia abanto ,
43004029	Inchuo , morore omonto ontebirie amang'ana onsi ayanakorire : Inee ! oyio tari ere Kristo ?
43004030	Bakaimoka korwa omochie bakamochiera .
43004031	Agwo nyuma aborokigwa bakamosorora bakabora , Rabii , ragera .
43004032	Akabatebia , Inche ninde nendagera motayemanyeti inwe .
43004033	Aborokigwa baye bakaborania , Inee ? nomonto omoretera endagera ?
43004034	Yesu akabatebia , Endagera yane ney'ogokora obwanchani bwaye oyontomete , nagokora emeremo yaye .
43004035	Timori goteba inwe , Yatigaire emetienyi ene , erio riche rigesa ? Nainche nabatebirie , Ramokia amaiso aino moyerigererie emegondo , ng'a yatiekire koba emerabu ang'e ase rigesa .
43004036	Oyo okogesa nkonyorare eng'eria , nagosangereria amatunda as'obogima bwa kare nakare ; erinde ere oyogosimeka nere oyokogesa bagoke amo .
43004037	Naki ring'ana riria , Oyomo osimeka , oyonde ogesa , iga rire ekeene .
43004038	Inche nabatomete moyagese ayamotechandereti ; abande bakorire emeremo , nainwe mwasoire as'emeremo yabo .
43004039	Naende as'omochie oria Abasaniaria abange bagancha as'engecho y'amang'ana ay'oria omokungu , atebete ng'a , Nantebia amang'ana onsi ayanakorire .
43004040	Nabo ekero baria Abasamaria bachia komochiera , bakamosorora aikaranse amo nabarabwo : agaikaransa aroro amatuko abere .
43004041	Abanto abange kobua bagancha as'engecho ye ring'ana riaye ;
43004042	bakamotebia omokungu oria , Bono twanchire , tari ekiagera as'amang'ana ao : naki twaigure abanyene , naende twamanyire ekeene ng'a oyo n'Omekonyi bw'ense .
43004043	Nyuma as'amatuko ayio abere akaimoka korwa agwo , akagenda Galili .
43004044	Naki Yesu omonyene atebete , ng'a omobani tari nogosikwa as'ense yaye omonyene .
43004045	Nabo ekero achia goika Galili bakamwancha , ekiagera baroche amang'ana onsi ayakorete Yerusalemu ekero kie rituko rinene : naki nabarabwo bagenderete rituko rinene .
43004046	Agaika naende Kana ya Galili , agwo akorete amache akaba edivai . Naende yarenge esagini eyemo , yarenge nomwana omorwaire Kaperinaum .
43004047	Oyio agachia koigwa ng'a Yesu ochire korwa Boyahudi goika Galili , akamochiera , akamosorora achiche amokonye omwana oye ; ekiagera konya oisire gokwa .
43004048	Nabo Yesu akamotebia , Motarochi ebikone namakumigwa timogwancha nonya ng'ake .
43004049	Oria esagini akamotebia , Omonene , ika ritang'ani atarakwa omwana one .
43004050	Yesu akamotebia , Bwatia enchera yao : omwana oo moy'are . Omonto oria akariancha riria ring'ana atebetigwe na Yesu , akabwatia enchera .
43004051	Goika agachia koba ogoika , abasomba baye bagacha komorotota , bakamotebia , bakabora , Omwana oo moy'are .
43004052	Erio akababoria amang'ana ensa achagete koba buya . Bakamotebia , Igoro , chinsa isano naibere , esosera yamotigete .
43004053	Erio ise akainyora ng'a nensa eria eria atebetigwe na Yesu , Omwana oo moy'are : agancha ere , nenyomba yaye yonsi .
43004054	Neke negekone gia kabere akorete Yesu korwa ekero aruete Boyahudi kogenda Galili .
43005001	Nyuma as'aya ndiarenge rituko rinene ri'Abayahudi ; Yesu agatira kogenda Yerusalemu .
43005002	Naende aria Yerusalemu as'egesieri kie ching'ondi ndiarenge ritibo rikorokwa as'Ekeibirania Bethesaida , narirorio mbiarengeo ebisoero bitano .
43005003	Ime as'ebio mbarenge abanto abange abarwaire bakorara , emeuko , chirema , ab'ebimo biabo biomire , baganyete amache aseroke .
43005004	Naki ekero gete rilaika ngoika riarenge riasoa ase riria ritibo , koyaturubania amache : nabo ere oyore gosoa ritang'ani nyuma as'amache agoturubanigwa , igare kogwena oborwaire bwonsi obwamonyorete .
43005005	Narenge aroro omonto gete oyorenge noborwaire bw'emiaka emerongo etato netano netato .
43005006	Yesu agachia komorora oyio oraire , akamanya ng'a obaire engecho eye amatuko amange , akamotebia , Norigetie koba omogima ?
43005007	Oria omorwaire akamoiraneria , Omonene , tindi nomonto okombeka ritibo ime , amache gagoturubanigwa : korende ekero ngochicha inche , omonto onde osoa ritang'ani asende .
43005008	Yesu akamotebia , Tenena , etweke egesero kiao , ogende .
43005009	Erio kegima omonto oria akaba omogima , agetweka egesero kiaye , akagenda . Nabo yarenge esabato rituko riria .
43005010	Abayahudi bakamotebia oria okonyetwe , Rero nesnbato , tari boronge asore gwetweka egesero kiao .
43005011	Akabairaneria , Ere oyonkora koba omogima nere ontebia , Etweke egesero kiao , ogende .
43005012	Bakamoboria , Oria ogotebia , Etweke egesero kiao ogende , ning'o ?
43005013	Korende oria ogwenetigwe tamomanyete gose ning'o : naki Yesu erusananetie , ekiagera barenge abanto abange aas'aria .
43005014	Nyuma as'aya Yesu akamonyora hekalu itne , akamotebia , Rora , kwabaire omogima : tokora ebibe naende , ring'ana rire ribe kobua tiricha gokonyora .
43005015	Oria omonto akagenda , akabatebia Abayahudi amang'ana ng'a Yesu nere onkorete nkaba omogima .
43005016	As'ayio Abayahudi bagachaka komochanda Yesu , bakarigia komoita , ekiagera akora aya rituko ri'esabato .
43005017	Yesu akabairaneria , Tata one ngokorare emeremo nonya ngoika bono , nainche ngokorande emeremo .
43005018	Nabo ekiagera as'aya Abayahudi bakamenta korigia komoita , ekiagera atasareti esabato yoka , korende amo naya namorogete Nyasaye Tata oye , ogwekora koreng'ana buna Nyasaye .
43005019	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Omwana takonyara gokora ring'ana ere bweka , tatiga riria amororire Tata agokora : naki onsi agokora ere ayio naio n'Omwana agokora ,
43005020	Naki Tata amwanchire Omwana , okomworokia onsi ayagokora omonyene : nemeremo emenene kobua eyeiga namworokie erinde inwe monyare gokumia .
43005021	Naki buna Tata akobibokia ebitondo nakobia obogima , naboigo n'Omwana akobaa obogima abarigetie .
43005022	Ekiagera Tata tari komogambia omonto onde bwonsi , korende omoire Omwana okogamba gwonsi ;
43005023	erinde bonsi bamosike Omwana , buna bamosigete Tata . Oyotamosigeti Omwana tamosigeti Tata omotomete ,
43005024	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , oyokoigwa ring'ana riane , nakomwancha ere oyontomete nare nobogima bwa kare nakare , gose tagoika as'ekina , korende oetire korwa as'amakweri goika as'obogima .
43005025	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Ensa ngochere , nabono nere , ebitondo biraigwe eriogi ri'Omwana o Nyasaye ; nabaria bakorigwa nababe moyo .
43005026	Naki buna Tata are nobogima ime yaye omonyene ; naboigo omoeire n'Omwana koba nobogima ime yaye omonyene :
43005027	akamoa okobua kw'ogokora ekina ekiagera ere n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
43005028	Timokumia as'aya : naki ensa ngochere , ekero abanto bonsi bare ase chimbera ime baraigwe eriogi riaye ,
43005029	nabarabwo nabasoke ; baria abare gokora amaya as'okobokigwa kw'obogima ; nabaria abakorire amabe as'okobokigwa gw'ekina .
43005030	Inche omonyene tinkonyara gokora kende gionsi : buna nkoigwa , nabo nkogamba : nekina kiane iga kere boronge ; ekiagera tindi koborigia obwanchani bwane , korende nobwanchani bwaye Tata oyontomete .
43005031	Inche kondetebe omonyene , ogoteba kwane tari okw'ekeene .
43005032	Nare oyonde oyokombera kirori ; nainche namanyire ng'a oborori bwaye agonteba nobw'ekeene ,
43005033	Inwe mwatomete abanto ase Yohana , noborori bwaye nekeene .
43005034	Korende inche tindi konyora oborori korwa as'abanto : korende iga ngokwana aya erinde inwe mokonyeke .
43005035	Ere igarenge etaya egwoka nakomoreka : nainwe mwanchire koyosasokera omobaso oye ekero egeke .
43005036	Korende oborori nde naborobwo nobonene , kobua boria bwa Yohana : naki emeremo eria naetwe na Tata inyekore , emeremo eyio eyio nayekorire , yambereire kirori ng'a Tata nere ontomete .
43005037	Nere Tata ontomete obaire kirori asende . Eriogi riaye timwanya korigwa kero kende gionsi , gose ekieni kiaye timorakerora ;
43005038	naende ring'ana riaye timori narirorio ime yaino : naki inwe timwancheti ere oyotomirwe nere .
43005039	Iga mokorigiarigia mono amariko , ekiagera mokagete ng'a inwe more nobogima bwa kare nakare ime yaye , nayio naro are kirori asende ;
43005040	ko mwangire gocha asende , monyare koba nobogima .
43005041	Tindi konyora obonene as'abanto .
43005042	Korende nabsmanyire inwe ng'a timori nobwanchani bwa Nyasaye ime yaino .
43005043	Inche nachire as'erieta ria Tata one nainwe timori konyancha : oyonde karache as'eiieta riaye omonyene , namomwanche oyio .
43005044	Naki moranyare gwancha inwe abamokoenana obonene inwe as'inwe , nobonene boria bokorua ase Nyasaye ore bweka timori koborigia ?
43005045	Timokaga ng'a inche nimbasoere ase Tata : nare oyokobasoera , nere Musa , oyomosemeretie inwe .
43005046	Naki onye mwamwanchete Musa , anga mwanyancha inche ; ekiagera nere origete amang'ana ane .
43005047	Korende motayancheti amariko aye , naki morayanche amang'ana ane ?
43006001	Nyuma as'aya Yesu akagenda ng'umbu y'enyancha ya Galili , nero enyancha ya Tiberia ;
43006002	Omoganda omonene okamotunyana , ekiagera baroche ebikone abakorerete abarwaire .
43006003	Yesu akarina egetunwa , agaikaransa agwo amo naborokigwa baye .
43006004	Naende epasaka , rituko rinene ri'Abayahudi , yarenge ang'e .
43006005	Nabo Yesu agachia koramokia amaiso aye , akarora omoganda omonene ogocha asare , akamotebia Filipo , Ng'ai tokogora emegati , aba banyare koria ?
43006006	Iga aborete aya erinde amoteme : naki amanyete omonyene ekiarakore .
43006007	Filipo akamoiraneria , Emegati ye chidinari chimia ibere tekobaisana , ker'oyomo anyore omoke bwoka .
43006008	Oyomo bw'aborokigwa baye , Anderea , momura omwabo Simon Petero , akamotebia ,
43006009	Naraa omosae , oyore nemegati etano y'engano ne chinswe ibere : korende ebi inki as'abanto abange buna iga ?
43006010	Yesu akabora , baikaransie abanto . Mbwarenge aroro obonyansi obonge aase aria . Nabo abasacha bagaikaransa , omobaro obo chilifu isano .
43006011	Yesu akayebogoria emegati ; gasesenirie , akabagabera abaikaransete : naboigo nachiria chinswe koreng'ana buna barigetie .
43006012	Kobachia koigota , akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Sangereria ebisamunye biatigaire , ' gento tigesira .
43006013	Nabo bakabisangereria , bagaichoria ebitonga ikomi nabibere as'ebisamunye bi'emegati etano y'engano , ebiatigarete as'abwo bariete .
43006014	Ekero abanto baria , bachia korora egekone akorete Yesu , bakabora , oyo ekeene nomobani oria ochire as'ense .
43006015	Nabo Yesu , akamanya ng'a mbarigetie gocha komoira erinde bamokore omoruoti , akerusanania , akagenda naende egetunwa , ere bweka .
43006016	Egachia koba mogoroba , aborokigwa baye bagatirimboka gochia ' nyancha ;
43006017	bakarina obwato ime bagachaka kwamboka enyancha kogenda Kaperinaum . Naende omosunte konya obaire , na konya Yesu tarabachichera .
43006018	Enyancha egachaka koimoka , as'engecho y'embeo enyinge yagusete .
43006019	Nabo kabang'usire obwato chimaili isato gose inye , bakamorora Yesu okogenda igoro as'enyancha , ogoika ang'e as'obwato : bakairoka .
43006020	Akabatebia , Ninche , timoiroka .
43006021	Bagancha komosoyia obwato ime : erio kegima obwato bogaika ense barenge kogenda .
43006022	Inkio yaye omoganda oteneine ng'umbu y'enyancha bakarora ng'a obwato bonde tibwarenge aroro , tatiga boria obomo basoete aborokigwa baye , naende ng'a Yesu tasoete as'obwato boria amo naborokigwa baye korende naborokigwa baye bagendete boka .
43006023	( Korende amato ande agacha korwa Tiberia ang'e naas'aria bariete emegati ekero Omonene asesenetie ) :
43006024	ekero omoganda ochia korora ng'a Yesu tari aroro , nonya naborokigwa baye , barabwo abanyene bagasoa amato ime , bakagenda Kaperinaum bakomorigia Yesu .
43006025	Goika bagachia komorora ng'umbu as'enyancha , bakamotebia , Rabii , indi gwachete aa ?
43006026	Yesu akabairaneria , akabatebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Iga mokondigia , tari ekiagera mwaroche ebikone , korende ekiagera mwariete eria emegati , mokaigota .
43006027	Timoyekorera endagera eyegosareka , korende endagera ekobao goika obogima bwa kare nakare , Omwana-o-mwanyabanto aranyare kobaa : naki oyo nere obegetwe ekemanyererio na Tata , engecho yaye , Nyasaye .
43006028	Nabo bakamotebia , Ninki togokora tonyare koyekora emeremo ya Nyasaye ?
43006029	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Eye nero emeremo ya Nyasaye , momwanche ere oyotomirwe nere .
43006030	Bakamotebia , Mbikone ki gwakorire erinde torore twanche ? ' Meremo ki ogokora ?
43006031	Abatata baito mbariete manna as'eroro ime ; buna yarigetwe , Nabaete omogati korwa igoro barie .
43006032	Yesu akabatebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Tari Musa obaete omogati oria oruete igoro ; korende n'Tata one okobaa omogati bw'ekeene okorua igoro .
43006033	Naki omogati o Nyasaye noria ogoika korwa igoro , nakoyea ense obogima .
43006034	Nabo , bakamotebia , Omonene , amatuko onsi otoe omogati oyio .
43006035	Yesu akabatebia , Inche nomogati bw'obogima : ere oyogocha asende takoigwa enchara naende , nere oyoranyanche takoigwa erang'o nonya ng'ake .
43006036	Korende nabatebirie ng'a mwandorire ko timonyancheti .
43006037	Bonsi Omonene akong'a nabache asende ; nere oyogocha asende tinkomotuguta isiko nonya ng'ake .
43006038	Naki ting'igeti korwa igoro erinde nkore obwanchani bwane , korende obwanchani bwaye oyontomete .
43006039	Naende obwanchani bwaye Tata oyontomete nabw'obo , ng'a ase bonsi ang'eire tinsiria egento nonya nekemo , korende mbabokie ase rituko ri'omoerio .
43006040	Nobwanchani bwaye oyontomete nabw'obo , ng'a ker'oyokomorigereria Omwana nakomwancha , nabe nobogima bwa kare nakare ; ninche nimobokie ase rituko ri'omoerio .
43006041	Abayahudi bakamwemurunganeria , as'engecho atebete , Inche nomogati oigete korwa igoro .
43006042	Bakabora , Oyo tari Yesu , omwana o Yusufu , ntobamanyete ise na ng'ina ? Naki akobora oyo , Naikire korwa igoro ?
43006043	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Timwemurungania inwe as'inwe .
43006044	Omonto onde tari oranyare gocha asende , atang'usiri na Tata oyontomete : nainche nimobokie ase rituko ri'omoerio .
43006045	Nerikire as'ababani , Na bonsi naborokererigwe na Nyasaye . Kera oyokoigwa nakweorokereria ase Tata , igagocha asende .
43006046	Tari ng'a omonto omororire Tata , tatiga ere orure ase Nyasaye , oyio nere omororire Tata .
43006047	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Ere oyoranyanche inche nare nobogima bwa kare nakare .
43006048	Inche nomogati bw'obogima .
43006049	Abaiso baino mbariete manna eroro ime , naende bagakwa .
43006050	Oyo nomogati oikire korwa igoro , erinde omonto orayorie , tagokwa .
43006051	Inche nomogati bw'obogima oigete korwa igoro : omonto kararie omogati oyio , nabe moyo goika kare nakare : nomogati ndarue inche nomobere one , as'engecho y'obogima bw'ense .
43006052	Erio Abayahudi bakaamererania barabwo ase barabwo , bakabora , Naki omonto oyo aranyare gotoa intwe omobere oye toyorie ?
43006053	Yesu akabatebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Motayorieti omobere oye Omwana-o-mwanyabanto na koyanywa amanyinga aye , timori nobogima ime yaino .
43006054	Oyokoyoria omobere one nakoyanywa amanyinga ane nare nobogima bwa kare nakare : nainche nimobokie rituko ri'omoerio .
43006055	Naki omobere one nendagera y'ekeene , namanyinga ane nekenyugwa ki'ekeene ,
43006056	oyokoyoria omobere one nakoyanywa amanyinga ane igagoikaransa ime asende , nainche ime yaye .
43006057	Buna Tata are moyo antomete , nainche inde moyo as'engecho ya Tata ; koreng'ana ere oyorandie , nabe moyo as'engecho yane .
43006058	Oyio nomogati oikire kojwa igoro : tari buna abaiso baino bariete manna , bagakwa : oyorarie omogati oyio nabe moyo kare nakare .
43006059	Amang'ana aya iga ayakwanete esunagogi , kare kworokereria aria Kaperinaum .
43006060	Nabo abanto abange as'aborokigwa baye bagachia koigwa aya , bakabora , Ring'ana eri nerikong'u ; ing'o oranyare korigwa ?
43006061	Ko Yesu akamanya as'omoyo oye ng'a aborokigwa baye bariemurunganeirie ring'ana eri , akabatebia , Ring'ana eri ndiabagochirie ?
43006062	Naki erabe rende , komoramorore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto okorina aria aas'arenge ritang'ani ?
43006063	Omoika noro okobeka obogima ; omobere togwenereti gento : amang'ana nabatebirie nomoika , naende nobogima .
43006064	Korende mbare abande as'egati yaino batancheti . Naki Yesu amanyete korwa omochakano mbarabi abatancheti naende ning'o oranyare komorua .
43006065	Akabora , As'engecho eye nabatebirie , ng'a omonto onde tari oranyare gocha asende , tatiga oeirwe na Tata one .
43006066	As'engecho y'aya abange as'aborokigwa baye bakairana nyuma , tibamotunya naende .
43006067	Erio Yesu akabatebia ikomi nababere , Nainwe morigetie kogenda ?
43006068	Simon Petero akamoiraneria , Omonene ! togende ase ng'o ? Aye nore namang'ana obogima bwa kare nakare .
43006069	Naintwe twanchire , naende twamanyire ng'a aye naye Omochenu o Nyasaye .
43006070	Yesu akabairaneria , Inee ! timbachoreti inwe ikomi nababere , noyomo oino nekerecha ?
43006071	Iga amotebete Yudas , omwana o Simon Omoisikariota , ekiagera oyo nere oranyare komorua : nere noyomo bw'ikomi nababere .
43007001	Nyuma as'aya Yesu akaba ogotara ase Galili : naki tarigetie gotara ase Boyahudi , ekiagera Abayahudi iga barenge korigia komoita .
43007002	Naende rituko rinene ri'Abayahudi , rituko rinene ri'ebigutu , iga riarenge ang'e ,
43007003	Abamwabo bakamotebia , Imoka korwa aiga ogende Boyahudi , aborokigwa bao nabarabwo banyare koyerora emeremo yao eyogokora .
43007004	Naki omonto onde tari ogokora ring'ana bobisi , naende ere omonyene narigetie komanyekana . Kogokora aya , eorokie as'ense .
43007005	Naki nonya nabamwabo tibamwanchete .
43007006	Yesu akabatebia , Tikeraika ekero kiane ; korende ekero kiaino botambe nkere ang'e .
43007007	Ense tekonyara kobagecha inwe ; korende iga ekongecha inche , ekiagera inche nkoyeteba ng'a emeremo yaye nemebe .
43007008	Tira inwe mogende ase rituko rinene : inche tingotira kogenda ase rituko eri ; ekiagera ekero kiane tikeraika .
43007009	Agachia gokora kobatebia aya , agaikaransa ase Galili .
43007010	Goika ekero abamwabo bachia gotira , erio nere agatira kogenda ase rituko rinene , tari maiso marore korende ase bobisi .
43007011	Nabo Abayahudi bakamorigia ase rituko erio bakabora , Ng'ai are oyio ?
43007012	Gokaba okwemurungania okonene as'emeganda as'engecho yaye : abande bakobora , Igare omonto omuya ; nabande bakobora , Taibo , korende igagosiria emeganda .
43007013	Korende omonto tari omwatorete maiso marore ekiagera as'okobairoka Abayahudi .
43007014	Goika egachia koba gati gati ye rituko rinene Yesu agatira , agasoa hekalu ime akorokereria ,
43007015	Abayahudi bakamokumia , bakabora , Naki amanyete obong'aini , nere tarasoma ?
43007016	Yesu akabairaneria akabora , Okworokereria kwane tari okwane , korende nokwaye ere oyontomete .
43007017	Omonto karanche kobokora obwanchani bwaye , namanye amang'ana okworokereria oko , ng'a kwarure ase Nyasaye , gose ninche ngweteba omonyene .
43007018	Ere oyogwekwana bweka omo nyene iga akorigia obonene bwaye omonyene : korende ere oyokorigia obonene bwaye oyomotomete , oyio noyo bw'ekeene , nonya ime yaye tibori obobe .
43007019	Oyo obaete amachiko tari Musa ? korende tari oyomo oino okorete amachiko ? Naki mokorigia kong'ita ?
43007020	Emeganda ekairaneria , ekabora , Nore nekerecha : ning'o okorigia gogoita ?
43007021	Yesu akairaneria , akabatebia , Nakorete omoremo oyomo , nainwe mwensi mwakumirie .
43007022	Ekiagera as'aya Musa abaete okwaroka , ( tari ng'a iga kwaruete ase Musa korende ase chisokoro chiaino ) ; nainwe rituko ri'esabato iga mokomosara omonto .
43007023	Gaki onye omonto ogasarwa rituko ri'esabato , ogochika kwa Musa tigochagosareka ; naki mokombea ekiagera namokora omonto koba omogima kegima rituko ri'esabato ?
43007024	Timogamba ekina as'engecho y'ekieni , korende kora ekina kere kia boronge .
43007025	Erio ensemo y'abanto ba Yerusalemu bakabora , Oyo tari ere bakorigia komoita ?
43007026	Ani ! iga agokwana maiso marore gose tibari komotebia ing'ana ? Bori abanene bamanyire ng'a nere Kristo ?
43007027	Korende oyo twamanyire ase arure , korende Kristo karache , onde tari oramanye as'akorua .
43007028	Erio Yesu akaaka eriogi riaye ase hekalu , okworokereria , okobora , Inche mwamanyire , aase narure mwaamanyire : naende tinchicheti as'inche omonyene , tatiga ere oyontomete noyo bw'ekeene , motamomanyeti inwe .
43007029	Korende inche namomanyire ; ekiagera narure asare , nere ontomire .
43007030	Gaki bakarigia komobwata : korende onde tari oramborete okoboko kwaye erinde amobwate ekiagera ensa yaye konya teraika .
43007031	Abanto abange as'emeganda bakamwancha ; bakabora , Karachiche Kristo , inee ! nakore ebikone ebinge mono kobua ebiga akorire oyo ?
43007032	Abafarisai bakayeigwa emeganda bakwemurungania as'engecho yaye ; Abafarisai nabakuani abanene bagatoma abarendi erinde bamobwate .
43007033	Erio Yesu akabora , nkere ekero egeke inde amo nainwe , erio ningende asare ere oyontomete .
43007034	Namondigie korende timokonyora ; naase inde inche , timokonyara gocha .
43007035	Nabo Abayahudi bagatchania barabwo ase barabwo , Oyo ng'ai aragende goika intwe titonionyora ? Nagende as'Ogwatananeka kw'Abayunani nakoborokereria Abayunani ?
43007036	Ing'ana ki erio akwana , Namondigie korende timokonyora , naase inde inche , inwe timokonyara gocha ?
43007037	Nase rituko ri'omoerio , rituko riria rinene , Yesu agatenena . agakwana neriogi , okobora , Omonto karabe nerang'o , tiga ache asende any we .
43007038	Oyonyanchire inche buna amariko agoteba , chindoche chi'amache obogima namorue as'enda yaye .
43007039	Ring'ana eri igarikwanete as'engecho y'Omoika , ekiagera baria abamwanchire nabayonyore nyuma , naki Omoika Omochenu konya torarugwa ; ekiagera Yesu konya taraimokererigwa igoro .
43007040	Nabo abanto abange as'omoganda bagachia koigwa amang'ana ayio , bakabora , Oyo ekeene nomobani oria .
43007041	Abande bakabora , Oyo nere Kristo . Korende abande bakabora , Inee , Kristo iga ararue Galili ?
43007042	Okorika tikori goteba ng'a Kristo igagocha as'okoibora gwa Daudi , naende ase Bethilehemu , agachie karia aikaransete Daudi ?
43007043	Eriogogasoa as'emeganda ogwatananeka as'engecho yaye .
43007044	Ensemo yabo bakarigia komobwata ; korende omonto taramborete okoboko kwaye erinde amobwate ,
43007045	Baria abarendi bakabachiera abakuani abanene n'Abafarisai ; nabarabwo bakabatebia , Naki motamoreta ?
43007046	Baria abarendi bakairaneria , Tarakwana omonto onde bwonsi buna oyo agokwana .
43007047	Erio Abafarisai bakabairaneria , Inee ! inwe nainwe mwang'ainekire ?
43007048	Ning'o as'abanene bamwanchire , gose as'Abafarisai ?
43007049	Korende emesangerereko eyio etamanyete amachiko baragererigwe .
43007050	Nikodemo akabatebia ( noria omochierete botuko , ekiagera noyomo obo ) ,
43007051	Inee ! ogochika gwaito nkonacherware omonto ekina gotoramoigwa ritang'ani nakomanya eki akora ?
43007052	Bakairaneria , bakamotebia , Naye Galili kwarua ? Rigia , orore ng'a korua Galili taorogete omobani .
43007053	Bakagenda ker'omonto ' nyomba mwaye .
43008001	Korende Yesu akagenda as'egetunwa kie Emezeituni .
43008002	Mambia chuni agasoa naende hekalu ime , abanto bonsi bakamogendera ; nere agaikaransa akaborokereria .
43008003	Abariki n'Abafarisai bakareta omokungu obwatetwe as'ogotomana ; kabamobekire gati gati ,
43008004	bakamotebia , Omworokia , omokungu oyo igabwatwa ogotomana , gagokora bo .
43008005	Nabo as'amachiko a Musa iga atochigete kobaaka amagena abanto buna abwo : gaki naki aye ogoteba ?
43008006	Bagateba ring'ana eri bakomotema banyore enchera bakomosoera , Korende Yesu agekumba , akarika nekiara kiaye inse .
43008007	Nabarabwo bakamenta komoboria , akagororoka , akabatebia , Ere oyotari nebibe as'egati yaino abe oyo bwe ritang'ani komoruta rigena .
43008008	Agekumba naende , akarika , nekiara kiaye inse .
43008009	Nabarabwo , bagachia koigwa , bagasoerwa nebirengererio biabo , bagasoka oyomo oyomo bagachaka korwa as'abagaka goika as'ab'omoerio ; agatigara Yesu bweka , noria omokungu oteneine gati gati .
43008010	Yesu akagororoka tamorora omonto tatiga oria omokungu , akamotebia , Omokungu , ng'ai bare baria abagosoeri bao ? Onde tari ogokogambia ?
43008011	Akamotebia , Onde tari , Omonene . Yesu akamotebia , Ninche tingokogambia ; Genda ; korende tokora ebibe naende .
43008012	Yesu agakwana nabarabwo naende , akabora , Inche nomobaso bw'ense : oyogontunyana takogenda as'omosunte , korende nabe omobaso bw'obogima .
43008013	Erio Abafarisai bakamotebia , Aye igo kwebera kirori omonyene ; noborori bwao tibori obw'ekeene .
43008014	Yesu akairaneria akabatebia , Nonya ngwekwana inche omonyene , oborori bwane nobw'ekeene , ekiagera namanyire ase narure , nase nkogenda ; korende inwe timomanyeti ase narure gose ase ngochia .
43008015	Inwe iga mokogamba as'engecho y'omobere ; inche tindi komogambia omonto .
43008016	Naende ninsakogamba , okogamba kwane nokw'ekeene , naki tari inche bweka , korende inche na Tata oyontomete .
43008017	Naende as'amachiko aino iga arikire , ng'a oborori bw'abanto babere nobw'ekeene .
43008018	Inche ninche ngwekwana omonyene , nere Tata oyontomete igagoteba oborori asende .
43008019	Erio bakamotebia , Ng'ai are Iso ? Yesu akairaneria , Inche timomanyeti , nonya Tata timomomanyeti , onye momanyete inche , anga mwamomanyire na Tata one .
43008020	Amang'ana aya igakwanete Yesu okworokereria ase hekalu , as'enyomba y'emonga : omonto tari omobwatete , ekiagera ensa yaye konya teraika .
43008021	Yesu akabatebia naende , Inche nkogendande , nainwe namondigie , namokwe as'ebibe biaino : aase nkogenda inche , inwe timokonyara gocha ,
43008022	Abayahudi bakabora , Inee ? igareite , ekiagera akobora , Aase nkogenda inche timekonyara gocha ?
43008023	Akabatebia , Inwe naba inse ; Inche noyo igoro : inwe nabe ense eye ; Inche tindi oyo bw'ense eye ,
43008024	As'ayio nabatebia ng'a namokwe as'ebibe biaino : naki motancheti ng'a inche nere , namokwe as'ebibe biaino .
43008025	Nabo bakamotebia , Naye ng'o ? Yesu akabatebia , Ring'ana erio erio nakwanire nainwe korwa omochakano .
43008026	Ninde namang'ana amange ngokwana nakogamba as'engecho yaino : korende ere oyontomete noyo bw'ekeene ; nainche aya naigure asare , naro ngokwana as'ense .
43008027	Tibainyora ekiagera abatorera Tata .
43008028	Erio Yesu akabatebia , Ekero mwatiekire komoimokia Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , erio namomanye ng'a inche nere , naende ng'a tindi gokora ring'ana inche omonyene , korende buna Tata anyorokereretie , nabo ngokwana .
43008029	Nere oyontomete iga are amo nainche ; Tata tantigeti inche bweka ; naki inche ngokora amatuko onsi aya akomogwenera .
43008030	Kagokwana aya , abange bakamwancha .
43008031	Nabo Yesu akabatebia Abayahudi baria bamwegenete , Komoraikaranse ase ring'ana riane , erio more aborokigwa bane b'ekeene ;
43008032	naende namomanye ekeene , nakerokio ekeene nakebasibore .
43008033	Bakamoiraneria , Iga tore okoiborwa kw'Ibrahimu , na titoraba abasomba b'omonto kero kende gionsi ; ko naki ogoteba , Ng'a namosiborwe ?
43008034	Yesu akabairaneria , Ekeene ekeene ; nabatebirie , ker'oyogokora ebibe , nomosomba bw'ebibe ,
43008035	naende omosomba tari komenya ' nyomba botambe , korende omobiare iga akomenya amatuko onsi .
43008036	Gaki Omwana karabasibore namobe abasibore ekeene , ekeene .
43008037	Namanyire ng'a iga more okoiborwa kwa Ibrahimu ; korende iga mokorigia kong'ita ekiagera ring'ana riane tiriri ime as'emioyo yaino .
43008038	Aya narorire ase Tata naro ngokwana : nainwe naboigo ayamwarorire as'iso oino , naro mogokora .
43008039	Bakairaneria , bakamotebia , Tata oito nere Ibrahimu . Yesu akabatebia , Onye mwarenge abana ba Ibrahimu , anga mwakora emeremo yaye Ibrahimu .
43008040	Korende bono morigetie kong'ita , omonto oyobatebirie ekeene keria naigure ase Nyasaye ; Ibrahimu takorete iga .
43008041	Inwe iga mokoyekora emeremo y'iso oino . Bakamotebia , Intwe titoiboiri as'ogosaria ; iga tore na tata oyomo , nere Nyasaye .
43008042	Yesu akabatebia , Onye Nyasaye narenge iso oino , anga mwanyanchete inche : naki narure ase Nyasaye naende nachire ; gose tinchicheti as'inche omonyene korende nere ontomire .
43008043	Naki motainyoreti amang'ana ane aya ngokwana ? Nekiagera motakonyara korigwa ring'ana riane .
43008044	Inwe nab'iso oino saitani , nokorengereria kw'iso oino nakwo mwanchete gokora . Ere igarenge omoiti korwa omochakano , gose tatenenete as'ekeene , ekiagera ekeene tikeri ime yaye . Kagokwana oborimo , igagokwana ayare aya ye omonyene : naki are omonyaborimo , naise bw'obwo .
43008045	Nainche , ekiagera ngokwana ekeene , timori konyegena .
43008046	Ning'o oino ogonteba ng'a ninde nebibe ? Kongokwana ekeene naki inwe motakonyegena ?
43008047	Oyore o Nyasaye iga akoyaigwa amang'ana a Nyasaye : as'ayio inwe timori koigwa , ekiagera inwe timori aba Nyasaye .
43008048	Abayahudi bakairaneria bakamotebia , Titori gokwana buya intwe : ng'a aye igore Omosamaria , naende nore nekerecha ?
43008049	Yesu akairaneria , Inche tindi nekerecha ; korende iga nasigete Tata one , nainwe timonsigeti .
43008050	Nainche tindikoborigia obonene bwane : nare oyokorigia nakogamba .
43008051	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Omonto kararibwate ring'ana riane , takorora amakweri nonya ng'ake .
43008052	Nabo Abayahudi bakamotebia , Bono twamanyire ng'a nore nekerecha . Ibrahimu okure , nababani ; naye igogoteba , Omonto kararibwate ring'ana riane , takoigwa amakweri nonya ng'ake .
43008053	Aye nomonene kobua tata oito Ibrahimu , nere okure ? Naende nababani bakure : naye bwekora obe ng'o ?
43008054	Yesu akairaneria , Kondebake inche omonyene , obonene bwane tari gento : oyokombaka n'Tata one ; mokobora inwe ng'a Nyasaye oino ;
43008055	nainwe timomomanyeti ; korende inche namomanyire ; kondatebe ng'a timomanyeti nimbe omorimo buna inwe : korende namomanyire naende ring'ana riaye naribwatire .
43008056	Ibrahimu iso oino igagogete anyare korirora rituko riane ; akarora akagoka .
43008057	Abayahudi bakamotebia , Otaraba nemiaka emerongo etano , n'Ibrahimu kwamororire ?
43008058	Yesu akabatebia , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Ritang'ani Ibrahimu ataraba , Inche nao nare .
43008059	Erio bakabogoria amagena bamorute : korende Yesu akebisa agasoka korwa ase hekalu ime .
43009001	Agachia goeta akamorora omonto , omouko korwa okoiborwa kwaye .
43009002	Aborokigwa baye bakamoboria , bakobora , Rabii , ning'o okorete ebibe , nomonto oyo , gose nabamoibori baye , goika akaiborwa omouko ?
43009003	Yesu akairaneria , oyo takorete ebibe nonya nabamoibori baye ; korende nemeremo ya Nyasaye eorokigwe asare .
43009004	Nengwenerete inyekore emeremo yaye oyontomete ekero ore omobaso : obotuko ngochabore , atanyare omonto gokora emeremo .
43009005	Ekero inde as'ense , inche nomobaso bw'ense .
43009006	Agachia gokora gokwana aya , agatwa amate inse , agakora etintira as'aria amate , akamoaka omouko amaiso as'etintira eria ,
43009007	akamotebia , Genda bwesibie ase ritibo ria Siloam ( ogoonchorwa kwaye , Oyotomirwe ) . Erio akagenda agesibia , akairana , okorora .
43009008	Nabo abagisangio baye , nabaria abamoroche kare ekero arenge omouko , bakabora , Inee ! oyo tari ere oria orenge gosaba , oikaransete ?
43009009	Abande bakabora , Nere : abande bakabora , Yaya , igagwekaine nere . Ere omonyene akabora , Ninche ere .
43009010	Nabo bakamotebia , Amaiso ao naki aramokigwa ?
43009011	Ere akairaneria , akabora , Omonto okorokwa Yesu okorete etintira , akang'aka amaiso ane , agantebia , Genda goika ritibo ria Siloam , bwesibie ; nabo nkagenda ngesibia , nkanyora okorora .
43009012	Bakamotebia , Ng'ai are oyio ? Akabora , Timanyeti .
43009013	Bakamoira oria orenge omouko ritang'ani as'Abafarisai .
43009014	Bono iga riarenge rituko ri'esabato ekero Yesu akorete etintira nakomoramokia amaiso .
43009015	Erio Abafarisai nabarabwo bakamoboria naende buna anyorete okorora . Akabatebia , Iga abeka etintira igoro as'amaiso ane , ngesibia , na bono narorire .
43009016	Erio abande b'Abafarisai bakabora , Omonto oyo taruete ase Nyasaye , ekiagera tayebwateti esabato . Abande bakabora , naki aranyare omonto omonyene ebibe gokora ebikone buna ebi ? Gokaba ogwatananeka egati yabo .
43009017	Gaki bakamotebia oria omouko eria kabere , Aye naki okobora asare , ekiagera , akoramokia amaiso ? Akabora , Igare omobani .
43009018	Erio Abayahudi tibancha amang'ana aye ng'a igarenge omouko , naende anyarete korora , goika bakabarangeria abamoibori baye oria onyorete okorora ,
43009019	bakababoria , bakabora , Oyo nere omwana oino mogoteba ng'a iga aiboretwe omouko ? Naki akora orora bono ?
43009020	Abamoibori baye bakairaneria , bakabora , Twamanyire ng'a oyio nomwana oito , naende ng'a iga aiboretwe omouko :
43009021	korende buna arora bono , titomanyeti ; gose ning'o omoramokia amaiso titomanyeti : ere nomonto omogima , moborie omonyene , nekwanere .
43009022	Abamoibori baye iga bakwanete ' aya as'okoiroka Abayahudi : naki Abayahudi konya babwatanire ng'a omonto oramoorokie ng'a nere Kristo , aserigwe korwa as'esunagogi .
43009023	Nero engecho yagerete abamoibori baye bakabora , Ere nomonto omogima , moborie .
43009024	Erio eria kabere bakamorangeria omonto oria orenge omouko , bakamotebia , Moe Nyasaye obonene : intwe twamanyire ng'a omonto oyio nomonyene ebibe ,
43009025	Erio oria akairaneria akabora , Onye ere nomonyene ebibe timanyeti : namanyire ring'ana erimo , inche iga narenge omouko , korende bono narorire .
43009026	Bakamotebia naende , Naki agokorerete ? Naki akoramogetie amaiso ?
43009027	Akabairaneria , natiekire kobatebia , ko timoigweti : naki morigetie koigwa eria kabere ? Inwe nainwe morigetie koba aborokigwa baye ?
43009028	Erio bakamorama , bakabora , Naye omworokigwa oye ; korende intwe iga tore aborokigwa ba Musa .
43009029	Intwe twamanyire ng'a Nyasaye igare gokwana ase Musa : korende as'oyo titomanyeti as'arure .
43009030	Oria omonto akairaneria akabatebia , Ring'ana eri nerio ogokumia , ng'a inwe timomanyeti as'arure , nere ondamokirie amaiso .
43009031	Twamanyire ng'a Nyasaye tari kobaigwa abanyene ebibe : korende omonto karabe omosasimi Nyasaye , nagokora obwanchani bwaye , oyio nere akoigwa .
43009032	Korwa omochakano teraigugwa ng'a omonto oyaramokirie amaiso omouko oiboretwe engecho eye .
43009033	Onye oyo taruete ase Nyasaye , anga takonyara gokora gento .
43009034	Bakairaneria , bakamotebia , Aye iga kwaiboretwe as'ebibe bioka , naye ngotworokereriore intwe ? Bakamosokia isiko .
43009035	Yesu akaigwa ng'a bamosokirie isiko ; akamorora , akabora , Aye kwegenire Omwana o Nyasaye ?
43009036	Nere akairaneria , akabora , Ning'o Omonene , nyare komwegena ?
43009037	Yesu akamotebia , Kwamororire naende nere ogokwana naye nere oyio .
43009038	Akabora , Nanchire Omonene ; akamosasima .
