43009039	Yesu akabora , Inche nachire ense eye as'ekina , erinde abatari korora barore ; nabarabwo abakorora babe emeuko .
43009040	Ensemo y'Abafarisai abarenge amo nere bakaigwa aya , bakamotebia , Inee naintwe iga tore emeuko ?
43009041	Yesu akabatebia , Onye mwarenge emeuko , anga timori nebibe : korende bono iga mogoteba , Nkororatore : gaki ebibe biaino biaikaransire .
43010001	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Oyotasoeti as'egesieri ki'obueri bwe ching'ondi , korende arinere aande , oyio nomoibi naende nomouri .
43010002	Oyogosoa as'egesieri nomorisia bwe ching'ondi .
43010003	Omorendi iga akomoigorera oyo ; neching'ondi iga chikomoigwa eriogi riaye : nere igagochirangeria ching'ondi chiaye as'amarieta abo , igagochiira isiko .
43010004	Gagochirusia isiko ching'ondi echire echiaye , igagochitang'ana ; neching'ondi iga chikomotunyana : naki chiarimanyire eriogi riaye .
43010005	Omogeni tichikomotunyana nonya ng'ake , korende iga chiramotame ; ekiagera tichirimanyeti eriogi ri'abageni .
43010006	Omoreng'anio oyo Yesu akabatebia ; korende barabwo tibayamanyete amang'ana ayio abatebetie .
43010007	Erio Yesu akabatebia naende , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Ninche egesieri gie ching'ondi .
43010008	Bonsi abantang'anerete nabaibi , nabauri : korende ching'ondi tichiabaigwete .
43010009	Ninche nde egesieri : omonto gagosoa as'inche , nakonyeke , nasoe , nasoke , nanyore oborisia ,
43010010	Omoibi tagocha , tatiga aibe , anyenye , asarie ; inche iga nachete babe nobogima , nababe naborobwo obonge .
43010011	Inche ninche omorisia omuya : omorisia omuya igakobeka obogima bwaye as'engecho ye ching'ondi .
43010012	Omonto orikire , naende tari ere omorisia , ekiagera ching'ondi tichiri chiaye , gakoyerora esese y'orosana egocha , ochitiga ching'ondi , otama : nesese y'orosana yachisakora , na gochiserebania .
43010013	Ere igagotama ekiagera nomonto orikire , gose tarengerereti amang'ana e ching'ondi .
43010014	Inche ninche omorisia omuya ; nechire chiane nachimanyire , nechire chiane chiamanyire ,
43010015	buna Tata amanyete , nainche namomanyire Tata ; nobogima bwane nabobekire as'engecho ye ching'ondi .
43010016	Naende ching'ondi chinde mbwate , chitari chie riicho eri ; nachirochio nabo engwenerete gochireta , neriogi riane nachirigwe ; nachibe riicho erimo nomorisia oyomo .
43010017	As'ayio Tata nanyanchete , ekiagera nabekire obogima bwane , erinde inyare kobobogoria naende .
43010018	Tari omonto okonduseria , korende ninche nabobekire omonyene . Ninde nokobua kobobeka naende ninde nokobua kobobogoria naende . Ogochika oko iga nakonyorire ase Tata one ,
43010019	Erio gokaba naende ogwatananeka as'Abayahudi , as'engecho y'amang'ana aya .
43010020	Abange babo bakabora , Nare nekerecha , naende nebarimo ; naseki mokomoigwa ?
43010021	Abande bakabora , Amang'ana aya tari ay'omento omonyene ekerecha . Inee ! ekerecha nakenyare koyaramokia amaiso emeuko ?
43010022	Ndiarenge rituko rinene ri'ogosibigwa aria Yerusalemu ; nekero ki'obokendu .
43010023	Na Yesu igarenge gotara hekalu ime , as'egora ya Sulemani .
43010024	Erio Abayahudi bakamoetanana , bakamotebia , Ngoika ririri oratoichanerie emioyo yaito ? Onye naye Kristo , totebie maiso marore .
43010025	Yesu akabairaneria , Nabatebirie , nainwe timori gwancha : emeremo eye ngokora as'erieta ria Tata one , nero ekombera kirori .
43010026	Korende inwe timori gwancha ekiagera timori ase ching'ondi chiane .
43010027	ching'ondi chiane iga chikorigwa eriogi riane , nainche nachimanyire , nachirochio iga chigontunya :
43010028	nainche nachieire obogima bwa kare nakare ; na chirochio tichigosira nonya ng'ake , nonya nomonto tagochitaboria korwa as'okoboko kwane .
43010029	Tata one oching'eire nomonene kobua bonsi ; nonde takonyara gochitaboria korwa as'okoboko kwa Tata .
43010030	Inche na Tata nobomo .
43010031	Erio Abayahudi bagachora amagena naende , erinde bamoake .
43010032	Yesu akabairaneria , Emeremo emiya emenge naborokirie eruete ase Tata ; as'emeremo eyio nereri mokong'akera amagena ?
43010033	Abayahudi bakamoiraneria bakabora , As'emeremo emiya titogokoakera amagena , korende nas'okorama ; ekiagera aye , ore omonto , ogwekora omonyene ng'a naye Nyasaye .
43010034	Yesu akabairaneria , Tarikiri as'amachiko aino , ng'a inche natebete , Inwe iga more chinyasaye ?
43010035	Onye obarogete baria chinyasaye abacheretwe nering'ana ria Nyasaye ( namariko takonyara gosareka ) ,
43010036	Inee ! iga mogoteba asare , ere Tata asibetie akamotoma as'ense , Nkoramare : ekiagera nateba , Inche n'Omwana o Nyasaye ?
43010037	Onye tindi koyekora emeremo ya Tata one timonyancha .
43010038	Korende kondayekore , nonya timonyancheti inche , yianche eria emeremo ; monyare komanya nagwancha ng'a Tata igare ime yane , nainche ime ase Tata ,
43010039	Bakarigia eria kabere komobwata : akarua as'amaboko abo .
43010040	Akagenda naende ng'umbu ya Yorodan goika aas'aria Yohana are kobatisera ritang'ani ; agaikaransa agwo .
43010041	Abanto abange bakamochiera , bakabora , Yohana takorete egekone kende gionsi : korende onsi ayatebete Yohana as'omonto oyo igare ay'ekeene ,
43010042	Abange bakamwancha agwo .
43011001	Nabo omonto gete narenge omorwaire , erieta riaye Lazaro o Bethania , omonto bw'omochie o Mariamu na Maritha mosubati omwabo .
43011002	Nere Mariamu oria omoagete Omonene amaguta , nakamotinyia amagoro aye as'etukia yaye , naki momura omwabo Lazaro igarenge omorwaire .
43011003	Nabo baria basubati bamwabo bagatoma omotomwa asare , bakobora , Omonene , ere oyobwanchete orwarire .
43011004	Yesu agachia koigwa , akabora , Oborwaire obwo tari obw'amakweri , korende nas'obonene bwaye Nyasaye , erinde Omwana o Nyasaye abakwe as'obwo .
43011005	Nere Yesu igamwanchete Maritha , na mosubati omwabo , na Lazaro .
43011006	Erio agachia koigwa ng'a nomorwaire , agaikaransa amatuko abere aas'aria arenge .
43011007	Erio nyuma as'aya akabatebia aborokigwa baye , Togende Boyahudi naende .
43011008	Baria aborokigwa bakamotebia , Rabii , moisonde Abayahudi iga barenge korigia gokoaka amagena : naye nkogendore aroro naende ?
43011009	Yesu akairaneria , chinsa chi'omobaso tichiri ikomi naibere ? Omonto karagende ' mobaso tari kogochwa , ekiagera ayoroche omobaso bw'ense eye .
43011010	Korende omonto karagende botuko , igakogochwa , ekiagera omobaso tori ime yaye .
43011011	Akayakwana aya : erio nyuma as'aya akabatebia , Lazaro omosani oito orarire ; korende nkogendande inyare komotura .
43011012	Baria aborokigwa baye bakamotebia , Omonene , onye orarire nagwene .
43011013	Korende Yesu igakwanete amang'ana amakweri aye : nabarabwo bagakaga ng'a iga agokwana amang'ana okorara chitoro .
43011014	Erio agwo Yesu akabatebia maiso marore , Lazaro okure .
43011015	Nainche nagokire as'engecho yaino ekiagera ntarenge aroro , erinde monyare gwancha ; korende togende asare ,
43011016	Nabo Thomas , okorokwa Didumo akabatebia aborokigwa bamwabo , Togende naintwe , tokwe amo nere .
43011017	Erio agachia goika Yesu , akamonyora otiekire koba embera amatuko ane .
43011018	Bethania iga yarenge ang'e na Yerusalemu , orogendo rwe chimaili ibere ;
43011019	nabanto abange as'Abayahudi bagacha ase Maritha na Mariamu , erinde babaremie as'engecho y'oyomwabo .
43011020	Nabo Maritha agachia koigwa ng'a Yesu ochire , akagenda komorotota : korende Mariamu igaikaransete nyomba ime .
43011021	Erio Maritha akamotebia Yesu , Omonene onye naa kwarenge , momura ominto anga takwete .
43011022	Korende nonya mbono namanyire , ng'a kende gionsi oramosabe Nyasaye , Nyasaye nakoe .
43011023	Yesu akamotebia , Oyomino naboke naende .
43011024	Maritha akamotebia , Namanyire ng'a naboke as'okobokigwa kwe rituko ri'omoerio .
43011025	Yesu akamotebia , Inche nokobokigwa nobogima : oyonyanchire inche , nonya ogokwa , nanyare koba moyo .
43011026	Naendeker'oyore moyo nakonyancha inche tagokwa nonya ng'ake . Inee ! gwanchire aya ?
43011027	Akamotebia , Ee , Omonene : Inche nanchire ng'a aye naye Kristo , Omwana o Nyasaye , oria ogocha ense .
43011028	Naende gakwanire aya , akagenda , akamorangeria mosubati omwabo , Mariamu , bobisi , akabora , Omworokia ochire , ngokorangeriare .
43011029	Nere agachia koigwa , akaimoka bwango , akamochiera .
43011030	( Na Yesu konya taraika omochie ime , korende igarenge aria aria aase riaumeranete na Maritha . )
43011031	Erio baria Abayahudi barenge amo nere nyomba ime , abakomoremia , bagachia komorora Mariamu buna aimoka bwango nagosoka , bakamotunyana , bagakaga ng'a igakogenda oboina erinde arere aroro .
43011032	Erio Mariamu , agachia goika aria aas'arenge Yesu , akamorora , akagwa as'amagoro aye , akamotebia , Omonene , onye naa kwarenge , anga oyominto takwete .
43011033	Erio Yesu agachia komorora okorera , nabaria Abayahudi bachete amo nere bakorera , agasogwa nobororo as'omoyo oye , agaichana .
43011034	Akabora , ng'ai mwamobekire ? Bakamotebia , Omonene , nchuo orore .
43011035	Yesu akaiyeria amariga .
43011036	Erio Abayahudi bakabora , Rora buna amwanchete !
43011037	Korende abande bakabora , Inee ! oyoyaramogetie amaiso oria omouko , tanyarete komogwenia oyo takwa ?
43011038	Nabo Yesu oichanete naende as'omoyo oye , agaika oboina . Naborobwo iga bwarenge rikuruma , naende rigena ndiabegetwe igoro yaye .
43011039	Yesu akabora , Ritigerie rigena . Maritha , mosubati omwabo , oria okwete , akamotebia , Omonene , otiokire bono : naki obaire egetondo amatuko ane .
43011040	Yesu akamotebia , Tingotebeti ng'a koranche noborore obonene bwa Nyasaye ?
43011041	Nabo bakarirusia riria rigena . Yesu akaramokia amaiso aye igoro , akabora , Tata , nakoiraneirie ng'a mbuya mono ekiagera okong'igwa .
43011042	Nainche namanyete ng'a iga okong'igwa amatuko onsi : korende as'engecho y'omoganda oyo oetanaine , ngakwana aya , banyare gwancha ng'a naye gwantomete .
43011043	Erio gakwanire iga , akaaka eriogi rinene , Lazaro , soka isiko .
43011044	Agasoka oria okwete , oboirie egetambaa amagoro namaboko ; obosio bwaye boboirie egetambaa . Yesu akabatebia , Mosansore , momotige agende .
43011045	Nabo abange as'Abayahudi abachete ase Mariamu nakoyarora ayakorete Yesu , bakamwancha .
43011046	Korende abande babo bakagenda as'Abafarisai , bakabatebia ayakora Yesu .
43011047	Abakuani abanene n'Abafarisai bagasangerereka ritongo , bakabora , Ninki togokora , naki omonto oyo agokora ebikone ebinge .
43011048	Gatoramotige iga , abanto bonsi nabamwanche ; n'Abarumi nabache , nabarusie aase aito negesaku giaito .
43011049	Omonto oyomo asebare , Kaifa , oyorenge omokuani omonene omwaka oria , akabatebia , Inwe timomanyeti kende gionsi .
43011050	Gose timorengerereti ng'a negwenerete omonto oyomo akwe as'engecho y'abanto aba , ng'a egesaku tigesira ekegima .
43011051	Naende eri takwanete as'omoyo oye omonyene , korende ekiagera arenge omokuani omonene omwaka oria , akabana ng'a Yesu nakwe as'engecho y'egesaku keria ;
43011052	gose tari as'engecho y'egesaku keria gioka , korende amo naya abasangererie abana ba Nyasaye abatananekire babe abamo .
43011053	Nabo korwa rituko riria bagakora ekina banyare komoita .
43011054	Yesu tatarete naende ase maiso marore as'egati y'Abayahudi , korende akarua aria akagenda aase ang'e neroro , goika omochie okorokwa Efuraim ; agaikaransa aroro amo naborokigwa baye .
43011055	Naende epasaka y'Abayahudi iga yarenge ang'e : abange bagatira korwa chinse chionsi kogenda Yerusalemu ritang'ani as'epasaka , erinde besibie .
43011056	Nabo bakamorigia Yesu , bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , bagotenena ase hekalu , Naki moroche ? Tagocha nonya ng'ake ase rituko eri ?
43011057	Bono abakuani n'Abafarisai bakarua ogochika ng'a omonto karamomanye aas'are , arete amang'ana , banyare komobwata .
43012001	Nabo Yesu amatuko atano narimo ritang'ani ri'epasaka agaika Bethania , agwo aas'arenge Lazaro , oria okwete obogetigwe nere .
43012002	Bakamokorera endagera aria : Maritha akamokorera ; korende Lazaro igarenge oyomo ase baria baikaransete as'endagera amo nere .
43012003	Erio Mariamu akabogoria ekerengo ki'eratili eyemo y'amanukato , aye rigori rinene , akamoaka Yesu amagoro , akayatinyia amagoro aye netukia yaye : enyomba egaichora rimisu ri ' amaguta aria .
43012004	Korende Yudas Omoisikariota omwana o Simon , oyomo bw'aborokigwa baye , oyoramorue , akabora ,
43012005	Naki amaguta aya atagorua chidinari chimia isato , nakoegwa abataka ?
43012006	Iga akwanete aya , tari ng'a igarengereria abataka ; korende nekiagera arenge omoibi , naende obwate esanduku ye chishilingi , nagochirusia echiabekire aroro .
43012007	Erio Yesu agateba , Motige agache aya ase rituko ri'ogotindekwa kwane ,
43012008	Naki abataka more nabarabwo amatuko onsi amo nainwe ; korende timori nainche amatuko onsi ,
43012009	Nabo omoganda omonene bw'Abayahudi bakamanya ng'a ere nao are aria : bagacha , tari as'engecho yaye Yesu yoka , korende bamorore Lazaro , ekiagera amobogetie korwa as'ogokwa :
43012010	Abakuani abanene bagakora ekina bamoite Lazaro nere ;
43012011	naki as'engecho yaye abange b'Abayahudi bakagenda , bakamwancha Yesu .
43012012	Rituko ria kabere abanto abange abaricherete rituko rinene , kobachia koigwa ng'a Yesu ngochare Yerusalemu ,
43012013	bakabogoria chinsagia chi'amakendo bagasoka isiko kogenda komorotota , bakaaka eriogi , Hosana : Osesenigwe oyochire as'erieta ri'Omonene , omoruoti o Isiraeli .
43012014	Yesu akanyora emori y'etigeri akayerina ; buna yarigetwe ,
43012015	Toiroka , enyaroka ya Zayoni : rigereria , Omoruoti oo ochichire igaikaransete igoro as'emori y'etigere .
43012016	Amang'ana aya aborokigwa baye tibainyora agwo ritang'ani ; korende Yesu agachia kobakwa , erio bakainyora ng'a narikeire aya naende ng'a mbamokorerete aya .
43012017	Nabo bakamoorokia omoganda abarenge amo nere ekero amorangeretie Lazaro korwa as'oboina ime nakomobokia .
43012018	As'engecho eyio omoganda okagenda komorotota , naki baigure ng'a okorire egekone eke .
43012019	Erio Abafarisai bagatebania barabwo ase barabwo , Mwarorire ng'a timokonyara gokora gento ; ense yagendire komotunyana ere .
43012020	Naende mbarenge Abayunani batai bake ase barabwo abanto abatirete kogenda gosasima as'ekero kie rituko rinene ;
43012021	barabwo abwo bakamogendera Filipo o Bethisaida o Galili , bakamoboria , bakobora , Omonene , ntorigetie komorora Yesu .
43012022	Filipo akagenda , akamotebia Anderea : erio Anderea na Filipo bakamotebia Yesu .
43012023	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , Ensa yaikire , abakwe Omwana-o-mwanyabanto .
43012024	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Euyeke y'engano etagweti as'ense ekwe iga egoikaransa ero yoka ; korende kerakwej iga ekwama okwama okonge .
43012025	Oyoranche obogima bwaye nabosirie ; oyorabogeche obogima bwaye as'ense eye nabogache goika obogima bwa kare nakare .
43012026	Omonto karankorere , antunyane ; inche asende , nao nomosomba one aranyare koba ; naende omonto karankorere , Tata namosike .
43012027	Bono omoyo one oichanire ; ninki ngokwana ? Tata , onkonye nensa eye . Korende as'engecho y'ayio nayeikeire ensa eye .
43012028	Tata , oribake erieta riao , erio rigacha eriogi korwa igoro , rigoteba , Naribakire , nainche nandibake naende .
43012029	Nabo abanto batenenete ang'e bakaigwa , bakabora , ng'a kwabaire okogukura : abande bakabora , Rilaika rigokwana nere .
43012030	Yesu akairaneria , akabora , Eriogi eri tiribeti as'engecho yane , korende as'engecho yaino .
43012031	Bono ekina gi'ense eye nkere : bono omonene bw'ense eye natugutwe isiko .
43012032	Nainche kondaimokererigwe igoro as'ense , nimbang'use bonsi asende .
43012033	Agakwana aya , erinde aorokie amakweri ki aranyare gokwa .
43012034	Erio omoganda okameiraneria , Twaigure as'amachiko ng'a Kristo iga akobao goika kare nakare : naye naki okobora ng'a nemogwenerete Omwana-o-mwanyabanto aimokererigwe igoro ? Oyo Omwana-o-mwanyabanto nere ng'o ?
43012035	Yesu akabatebia , Omobaso igore amo nainwe ekero egeke . Genda ekero more noria omobaso , omusunte tocha kobabua : nere oyokogenda omosunte ime tamanyeti aas'akogenda .
43012036	Ekero more nomobaso , yuanche omobaso , monyare koba abana b'omobaso . Ayio akwanete Yesu , akagenda akebisa nabarabwo .
43012037	Nonya okorete ebikone ebinge as'amasio abo , tibamwanchete :
43012038	erinde riikeranigwe ring'ana riria ri'omobani Isaya aritebete , Omonene , ning'o oyanchire amang'ana aito ? Naende okoboko kw'Omonene kwamanoirwe nang'o ?
43012039	Naki as'engecho eye tibanyara gwancha , naki Isaya atebete naende ,
43012040	Obaukoirie amaiso , okorire chinkoro chiabo chinkong'u ; Tibacha korora as'amaiso abo nakomanya ase chinkoro chiabo , Beenchore , Mbagwenie .
43012041	Amang'ana ayio akwanete Isaya ekiagera akarora obonene bwaye ; agatora amang'ana aye .
43012042	Korende nonya nabo as'abanene abange bakamwancha ; korende ekiagera as'engecho y'Abafarisai tibaorogetie , tibacha korusigwa as'esunagogi :
43012043	naki mbabwanchete obonene bw'abanto kobua obonene bwa Nyasaye .
43012044	Yesu akaaka eriogi akabora , Oyonyanchire inche , tanyancheti inche , korende noyontomete .
43012045	Nere oyondigereirie inche , omorigereirie ere oyontomete .
43012046	Inche nachire imbe omobaso as'ense , erinde ker'oyonyanchire , taikaransa omosunte ime .
43012047	Naende omonto karaigwe amang'ana ane , ko tayabwata , inche tinkomogambia : ekiagera tincheti kogambia ense , korende nyekonye ense .
43012048	Oyoranyange inche otancheti amang'ana ane , nare noyoramogambie : ring'ana riria nakwanete , nario riranyare komogambia rituko ri'omoerio .
43012049	Naki inche tinkwaneti ase inche bweka omonyene ; korende nere ontomete , engecho yaye Tata , onchikire aya ngoteba naende ayst ngokwana .
43012050	Nainche namanyire ng'a ogochika kwaye nobogima bwa kare nakare : nabo aya ngokwana inche buna Tata antebetie , nabo ngokwana .
43013001	Goika ritang'ani rie rituko rinene ri'epasaka , Yesu akamanya ng'a ensa yaye yaikire akorua as'ense eye kogenda ase Tata , akaba akabancha abanto baye as'ense , akabancha goika omoerio .
43013002	Ekero ki'endagera , Saitani gatiekire komobeka Yudas omwana o Simon Omoisikariota , omoyo bw'okomorua ,
43013003	Yesu akamanya ng'a Tata omoeire bionsi amaboko aye , naende ng'a igaruete ase Nyasaye , naende nkogendare ase Nyasaye ,
43013004	akaimoka korwa as'endagera , akabeka ensemo chianga chiaye ; akabogoria egetambaa , akeboyia .
43013005	Erio akabeka amache as'esani agachaka kobasibia aborokigwa amagoro abo , nakoyatinyia na keria egetambaa keria eboeretie .
43013006	Naboagaika ase Simon Petero . Oyo akamotebia , Omonene ! Aye ngonsibiore amagoro ane ?
43013007	Yesu akairaneria , akamotebia , Ayangokora inche , tokoyamanya bono ; korende noyamanye nyuma .
43013008	Petero akamotebia , Togonsibia amagoro ane nonya ng'ake . Yesu akamotebia , Ntagosibeti , tori nensemo amo nainche .
43013009	Simon Petero akamotebia , Omonene tari amagoro ane oka , korende nonya namaboko nomotwe one .
43013010	Yesu akamotebia , Oyotiekire gwesibia tari nokorigia tatiga ogwesibia amagoro , korende obaire omochenu omobere bwonsi ; nainwe more abachenu , korende tai mwensi .
43013011	Naki amomanyete oyogocha komorua , as'ayio agareba , Timori abachenu imwensi .
43013012	Nabo ochia gokora kobasibia amagoro abo , nagochibogoria chianga chiaye , nagoikaransa naende , akabatebia . Mwamanyire eki nabakorera ?
43013013	Inwe iga mokondoka Omworokia , naende Omonene : naende inwe mbuya mokobora ; naki naboigo inde .
43013014	Nabo onye inche , inde Omonene naende Omworokia , nabasibirie amagoro aino , nebagwenerete inwe nainwe gosibania dmagoro .
43013015	Naki nabaire ekiorokererio erinde ayio nabakorera inwe , nainwe moyakore .
43013016	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Omosomba tari omonene kobua omonene oyej gose omotomwa tari omonene kobua ere oyomotomete .
43013017	Korhorayamanye ayio , more negesio komorayakore .
43013018	Tindi gokwana asemore imwensi : nabamanyire aba nachorire : erinde okorika konyare goikeranigwa , Oyokoria omogati amo nainche oimokereiri egetingiro kiaye igoro asende .
43013019	Korwa bono nabatebirie ritang'ani ataraoroka , erinde gakooroka , monyare gwancha ng'a inche nere .
43013020	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Ere oyokomwancha onde bwonsi oyo ngotoma , onyanchire inche ; nere oyokonyancha inche omwanchire ere oyontomete .
43013021	Agachia gokora gokwana aya , Yesu agaichana as'omoyo oye , akaoiokia , agakwana , Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Oyomo oino nandue .
43013022	Aborokigwa bakarigererania , bagasinywa komanya gose ning'o atora .
43013023	Narenge aroro oyomo bw'aborokigwa baye , oyobweegegete Yesu egekuba kiaye , oyo Yesu anchete .
43013024	Nabo Simon Petero akamosima , akamoboria , Totebie ning'o atora ?
43013025	Ere akamweegeka buna arenge as'egekuba kia Yesu , akamoboria Omonene ning'o ?
43013026	Erio Yesu akairaneria , Nomonto oria ngotongereria egesamunye nakomoa . Akamotongereria egesamunye akamoa Yudas , omwana o Simon Omoisikariota .
43013027	Naende nyuma ase keria egesamunye Saitani akamosoa . Erio Yesu akamotebia , Ayogokora , yakore bwango .
43013028	Tarenge omonto ase baria baikaransete as'emesa oyemanyete engecho yagera amotebia iga .
43013029	Naki abande , ekiagera Yudas are koyebogoria esanduku , bagakaga ng'a Yesu igakomotebia , Gora ebitorigetie ase rituko rinene ; gose ng'a abae abataka egento .
43013030	Nabo oyo , kanyorire keria egesamunye , agasoka bwango : naende iga bwarenge botuko .
43013031	Erio oyio gasokire , Yesu akabora , Bono obakirwe Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , naende Nyasaye obakirwe ime yaye .
43013032	Na Nyasaye namobake ime yaye omonyene , nerio kegima namobake .
43013033	Abana abake , nkere ekero egeke inde amo nainwe . Namondigie : naende buna nabatebetie Abayahudi , Ng'a aase ngochia inche , inwe timokonyara gocha ; bono nabatebirie nainwe .
43013034	Ogochika okoyia nabaire , mwanchane ; buna nabanchete inwe , nainwe mwanchane boigo .
43013035	Iga abanto bonsi nabamanye ng'a naborokigwa bane more , komorabe nobwanchani inwe as'inwe .
43013036	Simon Petero akamotebia , Omonene , ng'ai okogenda ? Yesu akamoiraneria , Aase ngochia , tokonyara gontunya , bono , korende nontunye nyuma .
43013037	Petero akamotebia , Omonene , naseki ntanyare gogotunyana bono ? Nimbobeke obogima bwane as'engecho yao .
43013038	Yesu akamoiraneria , Inee ! obogima bwao nobobeke as'engecho yane ? Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , etuoni tekogweya goika gwankanire ara gatato .
43014001	Timoichana emioyo yaino : mwanche ase Nyasaye mwanche n'asende .
43014002	As'enyomba ya Tata nere nobomenyo obonge ; onye taibo , anga nabatebia ; nkogendande kobaroseria aase .
43014003	Kondagende kobaroseria aase , ninchiche naende , nimbaroisie asende ; erinde asende inche , nainwe mobeo .
43014004	Naende aase nkogenda inche , mwayemanyire enchera .
43014005	Thomas akamotebia , Omonene , titomanyeti aas'ogochia , naki torayemanye enchera ?
43014006	Yesu akamotebia , Ninche inde enchera , naende ekeene , naende obogima : omonto onde tagocha ase Tata tatiga asende .
43014007	Onye mwamanyete inche , ang'a mwamomanyete naende Tata : korwa bono mwamomanyire , naende mwamororire .
43014008	Filipo akamotebia , Omonene , tworokie Tata , atoisane .
43014009	Yesu akamotebia , Nabaire amo nainwe amatuko aya onsi naye tomanyeti , Filipo ? Oyondorire inche , omororire Tata ; naki ogoteba aye , Tworokie Tata ?
43014010	Tibwancheti ng'a inche igonde ime ase Tata , na Tata ime yane ? Amang'ana nkobatebia inche , tindi gokwana inche bweka : korende Tata ore ime asende iga akoyekora emeremo yaye .
43014011	Inyancha ng'a inche igande ase Tata , naende Tata ime yane : gose nabo inyancha ekiagera as'emeremo emenyene .
43014012	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Oyoranyanche inche , emeremo ngokora inche nere nayekore ; nakore naende emenene kobua eye , ekiagera nkogendande ase Tata .
43014013	Naende komorasabe kende gionsi as'erieta riane , ekio nangekore , Tata abakwe ime as'Omwana .
43014014	Komorasabe kende gionsi as'erieta riane , ekio nangekore ,
43014015	Komoranyanche namoyabwate amachiko ane .
43014016	Naende inche nimosabe Tata , nere nabae Omokonyi onde , aikaranse nainwe goika kare nakare ,
43014017	Omoika bw'ekeene ; ense etanyare komwancha ; naki tibamorochi , nonya nkomomanya korende inwe mwamomanyire ; naki aikaransete asemore , nere nabe ime yaino .
43014018	Tinkobatiga inwe chintakana ; ninchiche asemore .
43014019	Nkere ekero egeke ense etandore naende ; korende inwe mwandorire , ekiagera inche moy'onde , nainwe namobe moyo .
43014020	Ase rituko riria namomanye , ng'a inche igande ime ase Tata , naende nainwe ime yane , nainche ime yaino .
43014021	Oyore namachiko ane , nakoyabwata , ere nere onyanchete : nere oyonyanchete nanchwe na Tata one , nainche , nimwanche , nakweorokia asare .
43014022	Yudas akamotebia ( tari ere Omoisikariota ) , Omonene , naki yaba , ng'a origetie kweorokia asetore , gose tari as'ense ?
43014023	Yesu akamoiraneria akamotebia , Omonto karanyanche , naribwate ring'ana riane ; naende Tata one namwanche , naintwe natoche asare , natokore obomenyo bwaito asare .
43014024	Oyotanyancheti , tayabwateti amang'ana ane : naende ring'ana mwaigure tari eriane korende neriaye Tata ontomete .
43014025	Aya nabatebirie , kong'ikaransete asemore .
43014026	Korende Omokonyi Omoika Omochenu , oyo Tata aratome as'erieta riane , ere naborokererie onsi , naende kobainyoria onsi ayanabatebirie .
43014027	Omorembe nabatigeire : omorembe one nabaruereire : tari buna ense ekorua , nabaruereire . Timoichana emioyo yaino gose timoba nobwoba .
43014028	Mwaigure ng'a inche nabatebetie , Nkogendande , naende ngochande asemore . Onye mwanyanchete , anga mwagogete , ekiagera nkogendande ase Tata naki Tata nomonene kobua inche .
43014029	Na bono nabatebirie ritang'ani ataraba , erinde akoba mwanche .
43014030	Tingokwana nainwe amang'ana amange naende , naki omonene bw'ense ochire : korende tari nagento asende ;
43014031	korende ense emanye ng'a nimwanchete Tata , naende buna Tata anchigete , nabo ngokora , Imoka , togende aria .
43015001	Ninche inde omosabibu bw'ekeene , naende Tata one nomoroseria .
43015002	Ker'orosagia ime asende rotameti , igakororusia : na ker'orokwama arosibia erinde romente kwama .
43015003	Inwe mwaikire koba abachenu as'engecho ye ring'ana nabatebia .
43015004	Ikaransa ime yane , nainche ime yaino . Buna orosagia rotanyare kwama rwoka oronyene , rotaikaranseti ime as'omosabibu ; naboigo nainwe , motaikaranseti ime yane .
43015005	Inche nomosabibu ; nainwe nechinsagia : Oyogoikaransa ime yane , nainche ime yaye oyio name mono : naki motari nainche timokonyara gokora kende gionsi .
43015006	Omonto ataikaranseti ime yane , igagotugutwa isiko buna orosagia , bwoma ; ochisangereria , ochituguta omorero , chiayia .
43015007	Komoraikaranse ime yane , namang'ana ane karaikaranse ime yaino , namosabe kera ekimorigeti , naende namokorerwe .
43015008	As'ayio abakwe Tata one , mwame mono ; nainwe namobe aborokigwa bane .
43015009	Buna Tata anyanchete inche , nainche nabanchire inwe ; ikaransa as'obwanchani bwane .
43015010	Komorayabwate amachiko ane , namoikaranse as'obwanchani bwane ; buna inche nabwatete amachiko a Tata one , nagoikaransa as'obwanchani bwaye .
43015011	Aya nabatebirie , erinde omogoko one obe ime yaino , naende omogoko oino oikeranigwe .
43015012	Ogochika kwane nakwo oko , mwanchane , buna nabanchete inwe .
43015013	Tari oyore nobwanchani obonge kobua obo , obw'omonto akobeka obogima as'engecho y'abasani baye .
43015014	Inwe iga more abasani bane , komorakore aya nabachikire .
43015015	Tinkobaroka naende abasomba ; naki omosomba tamanyeti eki agokora omonene oye : korende inwe nabarokire abasani ; naki onsi aya naigure ase Tata naborokirie .
43015016	Tari inwe mwanchorire inche , korende ninche nabachorire inwe , nababekire mogende mwame , okwama kwaino goikaranse : erinde rionsi mogosaba Tata as'erieta riane , igarabae .
43015017	Aya nabachikire , monyare gwanchana .
43015018	Ense kerabageche , mwamanyire ng'a yangechire inche etarabagecha inwe .
43015019	Onye mwarenge ab'ense , anga ense yancha ayare ayaye ; korende ekiagera inwe timori ab'ense , naki inche nabachorire inwe korwa as'ense , ekiagera ense yabagechire .
43015020	Rinyore riria ring'ana nabatebetie , Omosomba tari omonene kobua Omonene oye . Onye banchandete inche , nababachande inwe nainwe ; onye baribwatete ring'ana riane nabaribwate neriaino .
43015021	Korende aya onsi nababakorere as'engecho y'erieta riane , ekiagera tibamomanyeti oyontomete .
43015022	Onye machete gokwana nabarabwo , anga tibarenge nebibe : bono tibari nogotamera as'ebibe biabo .
43015023	Oyongechire inche , omogechire na Tata one .
43015024	Onye ntakorete emeremo asebare atakoreti omonto onde , anga tibabete nebibe : bono batororire inche na Tata one naende batogechire .
43015025	Korende riikerane ring'ana eriarigetwe as'ogochika kwabo , Iga bangechete bosa .
43015026	Korende gagocha Omokonyi , oyondabatomere korwa ase Tata , Omoika bw'ekeene okorua ase Tata , ere nambere kirori .
43015027	Naende inwe mwensi mwabaire birori , ekiagera korwa omochakano mwarenge amo nainche .
43016001	Amang'ana aya nabatebirie timocha kogochwa .
43016002	Nababaserie korwa chisunagogi : nabo , ensa yachire , igarakage ker'omonto karabaite ng'a omokoreire Nyasaye ekeng'wanso .
43016003	Naende ayio nababakore , naki tibamomanyeti Tata nonya ninche .
43016004	Korende nabatebirie aya , erinde kegocha ensa eria , moyainyore buna inche nabatebetie . Aya timbatebeti korwa omochakano , ekiagera narenge amo nainwe .
43016005	Korende bono nkogendande as'ere oyontomete ; gose onde tari oyomo oino okomboria , Ing'ai ogochia ?
43016006	Korende ekiagera nabatebirie aya ogoichana gwaichoire emioyo yaino .
43016007	Korende inche nabatebirie erire ri'ekeene ; nebagwenerete inwe inche nyimoke : naki ntaimogeti , Omokonyi tagocha asemore ; korende kondagende , nimotome asemore .
43016008	Naende gatiekire gocha ere , nayekanie ense as'amang'ana ebibe , naende oboronge , naende ekina :
43016009	as'amang'ana ebibe , ekiagera tibanyancheti inche ;
43016010	as'amang'ana oboronge , ekiagera nkogendande ase Tata , gose timokondora naende .
43016011	As'amang'ana ekina , ekiagera omonene bw'ense eye ogambigwe .
43016012	Ninde nayande amange atigarete nkobatebia , korende timokonyara koyaremereria bono .
43016013	Korende ogocha ere , Omoika bw'ekeene , nobarae as'onsi ayare ay'ekeene ; naki tagokwana ayare ayaye ere ; korende onsi ayaranyare koigwa nayakwane : naende amang'ana agocha nabatebie engecho yaye .
43016014	Ere nambake inche : naki nabogorie as'ayare ayane , nabayaorokerie .
43016015	Onsi ayare naro Tata nayane ; as'ayio ngateba ng'a nabogorie as'ayare ayane , nabayaorokerie .
43016016	Nkere ekero egeke , nainwe timokondora naende ; nkere ekero egeke namondore , naki nkogendande ase Tata .
43016017	Nabo abande b'aborokigwa baye bagatebania , Ring'ana ki eri agoteba , Nkere ekero egeke nainwe timokondora ; naende nkere ekero egeke morandore : ekiagera nkogendande ase Tata ?
43016018	Nabo bagateba , Ing'ana ki eri agoteba , ng'a nkere ekero egeke ? Titomanyeti eri agokwana .
43016019	Yesu akamanya ng'a mbarigetie komoboria , akabatebia , Eri nario mokoborania inwe as'inwe , erio natebire , Nkere ekero egeke nainwe timokondora , naende nkere ekero egeke naende morandore ?
43016020	Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Inwe namorere , nakweng'ereria , korende ense negoke : inwe namoichanigwe , korende ogoichana kwaino nagoonchoke koba omogoko .
43016021	Omokungu okogonkia , igare nogoichana ekiagera ensa yaye yaikire ; korende gatiekire kogonkia omwana , tari koboinyora naende obororo , ekiagera as'omogoko bw'okoiborwa omonto as'ense .
43016022	Nabo nainwe bono iga more nogoichana : korende nimbarore naende , nemioyo yaino negoke , nomogoko oino onde tari orabaure .
43016023	Ase rituko riria timokomboria ring'ana . Ekeene , ekeene , nabatebirie , Komoramosabe Tata ring'ana as'erieta riane nabae .
43016024	Goika rero timosabeti ring'ana as'erieta riane ; saba , namonyore , omogoko oino obe oikeranete .
43016025	Aya nayakwanire nainwe as'emereng'anio : ensa neche , tingokwana nainwe naende as'emereng'anio , korende nimborokie maiso marore amang'ana a Tata .
43016026	Ase rituko riria namosabe as'erieta riane : tinkobatebia , ng'a nimbasabere Tata ;
43016027	naki Tata omonyene iga abanchete inwe , ekiagera inwe mwanyanchire inche , mogancha ng'a inche iga naruete ase Tata .
43016028	Naruete ase Tata , na bono nachire as'ense : naende , nayetigire ense , nkogendande ase Tata .
43016029	Aborokigwa baye bakabora , Rora , bono igogokwana maiso marore , gose tori gokwana omoreng'anio onde bwonsi .
43016030	Bono twamanyire ng'a kwamanyire onsi , torigeti omonto akoborie : as'ayio twanchire ng'a iga kwaruete ase Nyasaye .
43016031	Yesu akabairaneria , Iga mwanchire bono ?
43016032	Rora , ensa neche , nabo , yatiekire gocha , namwatananeke , ker'oyomo ase mwaye , namontige inche bweka : korende ninche tari inche bweka , ekiagera Tata igare amo nainche .
43016033	Aya nabatebirie , monyare koba nomorembe ime yane . As'ense namonyore emechando : korende remia emioyo ; inche nayebuire ense .
43017001	Amang'ana ayio ayakwanete Yesu ; akaramokia amaiso aye korigereria igoro , akabora , Tata , ensa eria yachire ; mobake Omwana oo , erinde Omwana nere akobake aye :
43017002	buna kwamoete okobua igoro ase ker'oyore nomobere , erinde onsi aya kwamoeire , abae obogima bwa kare nakare .
43017003	Nobogima bwa kare nakare nobo , bakomanye aye , Nyasaye bw'ekeene bweka , naende Yesu Kristo kwamotomete .
43017004	Inche nakobakire as'ense , emeremo eria kwang'ete gokora nayekorire .
43017005	Na bono Tata , ombake inche amo naye , as'obonene boria narenge nabwo amo naye ritang'ani ense etaraba .
43017006	Erieta riao nabaorokeirie abanto baria kwang'ete korwa as'ense : iga barenge abao , okabang'a inche ; naende ring'ana riao baribwatire .
43017007	Bono bamanyire ng'a onsi aya kwang'ete igarure asore :
43017008	naki amang'ana kwang'ete nabaeire barabwo ; bakayabwata , bakamanya ekeene ng'a iga narure asore , bagancha ng'a naye gwantomete .
43017009	Inche nabasabeire barabwo : tindi koyesabera ense , korende barabwo aba kwang'aire ; naki barabwo nabao :
43017010	naende onsi ayare ayane nayao , nayare ayao nayane : nainche nabakirwe ime yabo .
43017011	Nainche tindi naende as'ense ime , ko aba mbare as'ense ime , nainche ngochande asore . Tata Omochenu obarende as'erieta riao baria kwang'ete , babe obomo , buna intwe .
43017012	Ekero narenge amo nabarabwo as'ense , iga nare kobarenda as'erieta riao baria kwang'ete : iga nabaritete , gose nonya noyomo obo tari oyosirire , tatiga oria omwana bw'ogosira : amariko anyare goikeranigwa .
43017013	Na bono ngochande asore ; naya nayakwanire as'ense ime , erinde babe nomogoko one oikeranigwe ime yabo .
43017014	Inche nabaeire ring'ana riao ; nense yabagechete , ekiagera barabwo tari abanto b'ense , buna ninche ntari oyo bw'ense .
43017015	Tinsabeti obarusie korwa as'ense , korende obarende noria omobe .
43017016	Barabwo tari ab'ense , buna ninche ntari oyo bw'ense .
43017017	Obasibie as'ekeene : ring'ana riao nario ekeene .
43017018	Buna gwantomete inche ime as'ense , nainche naboigo nabatomire barabwo as'ense ime .
43017019	Nas'engecho yabo nesibirie , erinde nabarabwo basibigwe as'ekeene .
43017020	Gose tari barabwo boka nasabeire , korende nabarabwo abaranyare gwancha as'engecho ye ring'ana riabo ;
43017021	bonsi babe obomo ; buna aye , Tata , ore ime asende , nainche ime yao , erinde naba babe obomo ime yaito ; ense enyare gwancha ng'a naye gwantomete .
43017022	Nobonene boria kwang'ete nabaeire barabwo ; babe obomo , buna intwe tore obomo ;
43017023	Inche ime yabo , naye ime yane , banyare goikerana babe obomo ; erinde ense emanye ng'a naye gwantomete , okabancha barabwo , buna kwanyanchete inche .
43017024	Tata , abwo aba kwang'ete , nindigetie babe amo nainche asende ; banyare koborigereria obonene bwane kwang'ete : naki nkwanyanchete ritang'ani okobekwa oboroso bw'ense .
43017025	Tata omonyene oboronge , ense tiyakomanyete , korende inche nakomanyete ; naba bamanyire ng'a naye gwantomete ;
43017026	nabaorokeirie erieta riao , naende nimboorokie ; erinde obwanchani boria kwanyanchete inche bobe ime yabo , nainche imbe ime yabo .
43018001	Yesu gakwanire amang'ana aya , akaimoka naborokigwa baye kogenda ng'umbu y'akaroche Kedron , aas'omogondo orenge , agasoa , ere naborokigwa baye .
43018002	Yudas nere , oria omoruete naamanyete aas'aria : naki Yesu are kogenda aroro ebiro ebinge amo naborokigwa baye .
43018003	Nabo Yudas gatiekire konyora omoganda bw'abasigari , naende abasomba baruete as'Abakuani abanene , n'Abafarisai , akagenda aroro nechitaya nebieri , nebinto bi'esegi .
43018004	Nabo Yesu , okomanya onsi ayaranyare komonyora , akaoroka , akabatebia , Ning'o mokorigia ?
43018005	Bakamoiraneria , Yesu Omonazereti . Yesu akabatebia , Ninche ere . Yudas nere oyomoruete igateneine amo nabarabwo .
43018006	Nabo ochia kobatebia , Ninche ere , bakairana nyuma , bakagwa inse .
43018007	Akababoria eria kabere , Ning'o mokorigia ? Bakabora , Yesu Omonazareti ,
43018008	Yesu akairaneria , natiekire kobatebia ng'a ninche ere : nabo komokondigia inche batige aba bagende :
43018009	erinde riikeranigwe riria ring'ana akwanete , Aba kwang'ete tinsireti nonya noyomo obo .
43018010	Nabo Simon Petero narenge nomoro , akayong'usa , akamoaka omosomba bw'omokuani omonene , akamonacha ogoto kwaye kw'okorio . Noria omosomba erieta riaye igare korokwa Maliko .
43018011	Erio Yesu akamotebia Petero , omoro oo yoiranie ekerende kiaye : egekombe ang'aire Tata , tinkenywera ?
43018012	Oria omoganda nomonene bw'esegi , nabaria abasomba b'Abayahudi bakamobwata Yesu , bakamosiba .
43018013	Bakamoira as'Anna ritang'ani ; naki arenge ise biara Kaifa , oria orenge omokuani omonene omwaka oria .
43018014	Na Kaifa nere obaete Abayahudi amang'ana ng'a negwenerete omonto oyomo akwe as'engecho y'abanto .
43018015	Simon Petero akamotunyana Yesu nomworokigwa onde . Oria omworokigwa iga amanyekanete nomokuani omonene , agasoa amo na Yesu egora ime y'omokuani omonene ;
43018016	korende Petero agatenena gesieri isiko . Nabo oria omworokigwa onde omanyegete nomokuani omonene , agasoka agakwana nomoiseke ore korenda egesieri , akamoreta Petero ime .
43018017	Erio oria omoiseke orenge omorendi egesieri akamotebia Petero , Aye naye oyomo obo bw'aborokigwa baye omonto oyo ? Ere akabora , tari inche .
43018018	Na baria abasomba nabasikari iga barenge bateneine , baroisirie omorero bw'amakara ; naki embeo yarenge ; bakaba ngwotabare omorero ; Petero nere , iga arenge amo nabarabwo , ogwota omorero .
43018019	Erio omokuani omonene akamoboria Yesu amang'ana as'aborokigwa baye , namang'ana okworokereria kwaye .
43018020	Yesu akamoiraneria , Inche nakwanire nense maiso marore : inche amatuko onsi iga narenge kworokereria ase chisunagogi nase hekalu , aase basangereregete Abayahudi amatuko onsi ; gose ase bobisi tintebeti ring'ana .
43018021	Naseki okomboria ? baborie baria baigwete eke nakwanete nabarabwo : barabwo bamanyire aya nabatebetie .
43018022	Gachia gokwana amang'ana aya , oyomo bwa baria abasomba otenenete ang'e akamoaka Yesu oroe , okobora , Igakomoiraneria iga omokuani omonene ?
43018023	Yesu akamoiraneria : Onye nakwanire amabe , yaorokie aria amabe : korende onye nakwanire amaya , ninki okong'akera ?
43018024	Nabo Anna akamoira osibire ase Kaifa omokuani omonene .
43018025	Na Simon Petero igarenge oteneine , ogwota omorero . Bakamotebia , Aye naye tori oyomo bw'aborokigwa baye ? Ere agakana , akabora , Tari inche .
43018026	Oyomo bw'abasomba b'omokuani omonene , nomoamate bw'oria onachetwe ogoto na Petero , akabora , Inche tinakoroche ime as'omogondo amo nere ?
43018027	Petero agakana naende ; erio kegima etuoni ekagweya .
43018028	Erio bakamoira Yesu korwa ase Kaifa goika enyomba enene y'ekegambero ; ekaba egokiamoka ; korende barabwo abanyene tibasoa ime as'ekegambero , tibabaisa gocha kobekwa eubi , korende bayerie epasaka .
43018029	Erio Pilato akabasokera isiko akabora , Mang'ana ki mwareta as'omonto oyo mokomosoera ?
43018030	Bakairaneria , bakamotebia , Onye oyo atarenge omonto omobe , anga titwamoreta asore .
43018031	Erio Pilato akabatebia , Moire inwe , momogambie as'ogochika kwaino . Abayahudi bakamotebia , Intwe titori neribaga goita omonto :
43018032	erinde ring'ana riaye Yesu riikeranigwe , eriakwanete , okoorokia ng'a makweri ki aranyare gokwa .
43018033	Erio Pilato agasoa ekegambero naende akamorangeria Yesu akamotebia , Aye naye omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ?
43018034	Yesu akairaneria , Naye gwatebire omonyene , gose nabanto bande bagotebirie amang'ana ane ?
43018035	Pilato akairaneria , Inee ? Inche n'Omoyahudi ? Egesaku kiao nabakuani abanene nabwo bakoreta asende : Ninki gwakorire ?
43018036	Yesu akairaneria , Oboruoti bwane tibori obw'ense eye : onye oboruoti bwane bwarenge as'ense eye anga abasomba bane mbandwanerera , tinyara kobekwa as'amaboko Abayahudi : korende bono oboruoti bwane tibori obwaa .
43018037	Erio Pilato akamotebia , Aye nomoruoti rende ? Yesu akairaneria , Aye kwaborire ng'a inche nomoruoti . Inche iga naiboretwe as'engecho y'aya , nas'engecho y'aya ngacha as'ense , erinde mbe kirori as'ekeene . Ker'oyore oyo bw'ekeene igakorigwa eriogi riane .
43018038	Pilato akamoboria , Ekeene ngento ki ? Gakwanire ring'ana eri akabasokera Abayahudi eria kabere , akabatebia , Inche tindochi bobe bonde asare .
43018039	Korende more nengecho , erinde mbasiborere omonto oyomo as'ekero ki'epasaka ; nabo , morigetie mbasiborere Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ?
43018040	Erio bakaaka egeturi eria kabere , bakabora , Tari oyo , korende Baraba . Nere Baraba igarenge omouri .
43019001	Erio Pilato akamoira Yesu , akamoaka chinkini .
43019002	Abasigari bagatwang'a egutwa y'amagwa , bakamobekera ' motwe , bakamobeka eanga embariri ;
43019003	bakamochiera , bakabora , Mbuya ore Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ! bakamoaka chindoe .
43019004	Pilato akaoroka naende isiko akabatebia , Rora , inche namoretire asemore , monyare komanya ng'a tindochi bobe bonde asare .
43019005	Erio Yesu agasoka isiko , obegete egutwa eria y'amagwa , neria eanga y'oboruoti embariri . Pilato akabatebia , Rora , Omonto oyo !
43019006	Erio baria abakuani abanene naende abasomba bagachia komorora , bakaaka eriogi , bakobora , Mobambe , mobambe , Pilato akabatebia , moire inwe , momobambe ; naki inche tindochi obobe asare .
43019007	Abayahudi bakamoiraneria , Intwe ntore nogochika , naende as'ogochika okwo nagwenerete akwe , ekiagera agwekora koba Omwana o Nyasaye .
43019008	Erio Pilato agachia koigwa ring'ana erio , akaba nobwoba kobua ;
43019009	agasoa as'ekegambero , akamotebia Yesu naende , Ing'ai okorua aye ? Korende Yesu tamoa okoiraneria konde .
43019010	Erio Pilato akamotebia , Tori gokwana nainche ? Tomanyeti ng'a ninde nokobua gokobamba naende ninde nokobua gogosibora ?
43019011	Yesu akamoiraneria , anga tori nokobua konde gwonsi , onye otaeiri korwa igoro : as'ayio ere oyombegete amaboko ao nare nebibe ebinene kobua .
43019012	Korwa agwo Pilato akarigia komosibora : korende Abayahudi bakaaka eriogi bakabora , Koramosibore oyo tori omosani o Kaisari : ker'oyogwekora koba omoruoti igare ao na Kaisari .
43019013	Erio Pilato , ochia koigwa amang'ana aya , akamoreta Yesu isiko , agaikaransa igoro as'ekerogo ki'ekina , aase akorokwa Atichire namagena , naende as'Ekeibirania , Gabbatha .
43019014	Nigo yarenge Okwerosia kw'epasaka : naende iga yarenge chinsa isano nemo . Akabatebia , Abayahudi , Rora , omoruoti oino !
43019015	Korende barabwo bakaaka eriogi , Morusie , morusie , mobambe . Pilato akabatebia , Imobambe omoruoti oino ? Abakuani abanene bakairaneria , titori nomoruoti tatiga Kaisari .
43019016	Erio agwo akamobeka amaboko abo abambwe . Nabo bakamobwata Yesu :
43019017	agasoka bwebogoreretie omosalaba oye , goika Aase akorokwa ekeore , as'Ekeibirania akorokwa Golgotha :
43019018	bakamobamba aroro , amo nabande babere , oyonde ensemo noyonde ensemo , na Yesu gati gati .
43019019	Pilato akarika ekemanyererio , agakebeka igoro as'omosalaba . Iga kiarigetwe , Yesu Omonazareti , Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi .
43019020	Nabo okorika okwo mbasomete abange as'Abayahudi ; naki aase aria abamberetwe Yesu igarenge ang'e nomochie ; nakorokwo iga kwarigetwe as'Ekeibirania , Ekerumi , n'Ekeyunani .
43019021	Erio abakuani abanene n'Abayahudi bakamotebia Pilato . Torika , ng'a Omoruoti bw'Abayahudi ; korende , ng'a igarenge kobora ng'a , Inche omoruoti bw'Abayahudi .
43019022	Pilato akairaneria , Aya narikire narikire .
43019023	Erio abasigari kobamobambire Yesu , bakabogoria chianga chiaye , bagakora chinsemo inye , ase ker'omosigari ensemo yaye ; nero eganchwa : naende eganchwa eria tiyasonetwa , iga yakoretwe yonsi korwa igoro .
43019024	Nabo bagatchania , Titoyetandora , korende toyekorere obomera , torore gose neyang'o ekoba ; okorika goikerane gogoteba , Mbatananete chianga chiane , Naende eganchwa yane bayekorerete obomera . Naboigo bakorete abasigari .
43019025	Korende as'omosalaba oye Yesu bagatenena ng'ina , naende oyomwabo ng'ina , Mariamu o Kiliopa , na Mariamu Magidali .
43019026	Erio Yesu ochia komorora ng'ina , naende oria omworokigwa anchete otenenete ang'e akamotebia ng'ina , Omokungu , rora , omwana oo !
43019027	Nyuma akamotebia omworokigwa , Rora , nyoko ! Erio korwa ensa eria omworokigwa oria akamoira bwoye .
43019028	Nyuma as'aya Yesu , akamanya ng'a onsi atiekire gokorwa , okorika goikeranigwe , akabora , Ninde nerang'o .
43019029	Nkiarenge aroro egento geichire chinkama , erio bakabeka egetonto geichire chinkama , igoro ase husopo , bakamobekera omonwa .
43019030	Erio Yesu ochia kochinyora chinkama , agateba , yaerire : agatureka omotwe , agatwekamo .
43019031	Erio Abayahudi , ekiagera n'Okwerosia , emebere teikaransa igoro as'omosalaba rituko ri'esabato ( naki rituko ri'esabato eria iga riarenge rituko rinene ) , bakamosaba Pilato , amagoro abo abunwe , erusigwe .
43019032	Erio abasigari bakagenda , bakamobuna amagoro oyo bwe ritang'ani , naende oyo okabere oyobambetwe amo nere .
43019033	Bagachia komochiera Yesu , bachia korora ng'a otiekire gokwa , tibamobuna amagoro ;
43019034	korende omosigari oyomo ne ritimo akamobeta rikere , akarua bwango amanyinga namache .
43019035	Nere oyoroche akaorokia , naende okoorokia kwaye nekeene , nere omanyire ng'a igagokwana ekeene , erinde inwe monyare gwancha .
43019036	Naki aya akaoroka okorika goikerane , Tirikonyara kobunwa riuga riaye .
43019037	Naende , okorika konde iga gokobora , Nabamorigererie ere oyobabetete .
43019038	Nyuma as'aya , Yusufu bw'Arimathaya , nere igarenge omworokigwa o Yesu , korende bobisi ( naki abairogete Abayahudi ) , akamosaba Pilato ribaga ayorusie omobere oye Yesu : Pilato akamoa ribaga . Erio akagenda akayorusia omobere oye .
43019039	Akagenda Nikodemo nere , oria omochierete botuko agwo ritang'ani , akareta ebinto bisang'ananirie manemane n'uudi ( ebinto bi'ogotioka ) oborito bwaye chiratili emia eyemo .
43019040	Erio bakayobogoria omobere o Yesu bakayoboa egetambaa ki'egatani , amo naria amaguta amanukato , buna yarenge engecho y'Abayahudi as'ogotindeka ,
43019041	Naende aase aria abamberetwe norengeo omogondo ; na ime as'omogondo oboina oboyia konya botarabekwa ' monto onde ime yaye .
43019042	Agwo ekiagera n'Okwerosia kw'Abayahudi , bakamobeka Yesu ; ekiagera boria oboina bwarenge ang'e .
43020001	Bono ase rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma Mariamu Magidali akagenda oboina kobogokiamoka , otarasira omosunte , akarirora rigena riarusigwe oboina .
43020002	Erio akagenda bwango goika ase Simon Petero , nas'omworokigwa oria onde bwanchetwe na Yesu , akabatebia , Bamorusirie Omonene oboina ime korende titomanyeti ase bamobeka .
43020003	Petero agasoka , akagenda amo nomworokigwa oria onde , bakabwatia enchera kogenda oboina .
43020004	Bakagenda ne chimbero bonsi babere : oria omworokigwa onde akagenda bwango kobua Petero , akaba oyo bwe ritang'ani goika as'oboina ;
43020005	agatung'ama , akabirora ebitambaa bibekire ; korende tasoa .
43020006	Erio agacha Simon Petero , akamotunya , agasoa oboina ; akabirora ebitambaa bibekire ,
43020007	na keria egetambaa ki'omotwe oye , tikiabekire amo nebitambaa binde , korende iga kiaringire , kebekire ao gioka .
43020008	Erio agwo agasoa omworokigwa oria onde orenge bwe ritang'ani goika oboina , akarora , agancha ,
43020009	Naki konya tibarainyora okorika , ng'a nemogwenerete koboka korwa as'amakweri .
43020010	Erio aborokigwa baria bakagenda soba ka .
43020011	Korende Mariamu igateneine isiko , ang'e noboina okorera ; nabo , gakorera , agatung'ama , akarigereria ime as'oboina ;
43020012	akarora amalaika abere , barenge nechianga chindabu , baikaransete , oyomo as'omotwe , naende oyomo as'amagoro , agwo aas'obegetwe omobere o Yesu .
43020013	Nabarabwo bakamotebia , Omokungu , inki okorera ? Akabatebia , Ekiagera bamorusirie Omonene one , korende timanyeti ase bamobeka .
43020014	Ochia gokwana aya , ageonchora gochia nyuma , akamorora Yesu oteneine , tamanya ng'a Yesu .
43020015	Yesu akamotebia , Omokungu , ninki okorera ? Ning'o okorigia ? Ere , agakaga ng'a nomorendi bw'omogondo , akamotebia , Omonene , onye naye kwamoira , ntebia aase kwamobeka , ninche nimorusie .
43020016	Yesu akamotebia , Mariamu , Ere ageonchora , akamotebia as'Ekeibirania , Raboni ( ogoonchora kwaye , Omworokia ) .
43020017	Yesu akamotebia , Tonkuna ; naki tindagenda ase Tata one : korende genda as'abaminto , obatebie , Nkogendande ase Tata one na Tata oino , ase Nyasaye one na Nyasaye oino .
43020018	Mariamu Magidali akagenda akabatebia aborokigwa amang'ana ng'a omororire Omonene , naende ng'a omotebirie aya .
43020019	Ekaba mogoroba ase rituko riria rie ritang'ani ri'echuma , nebisieri kobiasiekirwe aase agwo aborokigwa barenge , ekiagera as'okoiroka Abayahudi , agacha Yesu , agatenena gati gati , akabatebia , Omorembe obe asemore .
43020020	Gakwanire aya , akaborokia amaboko aye nerikere riaye . Erio aborokigwa bakagoka kobachia komorora Omonene .
43020021	Yesu akabatebia eria kabere , Omorembe obe asemore : buna Tata antomete , naboigo nabatomire inwe .
43020022	Gakwanire aya , akabautera omoika akabatebia , Monyore Omoika Omochenu :
43020023	bande bonsi morarusie ebibe barusigwe ; naende bande bonsi morasiekere , basiekeirwe .
43020024	Ko Thomas , oyomo bw'ikomi nababere okorokwa Didumo , tarengeo amo nabarabwo ekero achete Yesu .
43020025	Erio aborokigwa bande bakamotebia , Twamororire Omonene . Korende ere akabatebia , Ntarochi amaboko aye nebimanyererio bi'emesumari , nakobeka ekiara as'ebiorokererio bi'emesumari , nakobeka okoboko kwane rikere riaye ime , tingwancha nonya ng'ake .
43020026	Nyuma y'amatuko atano natato aborokigwa baye mbarenge aroro ime eria kabere , na Thomas amo nabarabwo . Yesu agacha , ebisieri bisiekire , agatenena gati gati , akabora , Omorembe obe asemore .
43020027	Erio akamotebia Thomas , Reta aiga ekiara kiao , orore amaboko ane ; korete okoboko kwao , obeka ase rikere riane : toba oyotancheti , korende oyo bwegenete .
43020028	Thomas akairaneria , akamotebia , Omonene one , na Nyasaye one .
43020029	Yesu akamotebia , Ekiagera kwandora , gwanchire : mbare negesio abataroche ko begenire ,
43020030	Nabo mbire ebikone binde ebinge akorete Yesu as'amasio aborokigwa baye , bitarikiri as'ebuku eye :
43020031	korende ebi biarikirwe monyare gwancha ng'a Yesu nere Kristo , Omwana o Nyasaye ; naende as'ogwancha mobe nobogima as'erieta riaye .
43021001	Nyuma as'aya Yesu akeorokia naende as'aborokigwa baye , as'enyancha ya Tiberia ; nere iga eorogetie iga .
43021002	Simon Petero , na Thomas okorokwa Didumo , na Nathaniel o Kana ya Galili , nabana na Zebedi , nabanto bande babere as'aborokigwa baye , barenge amo .
43021003	Simon Petero akabatebia , Nkogendande koruba chinswe . Bakamotebia , Naintwe natogende amo naye . Bagasoka , bakarina obwato ime ; nobotuko boria tibanyora gento .
43021004	Goika bogachia goikia mambia , Yesu agatenena engegu : korende aborokigwa tibamanya gose ng'a Yesu .
43021005	Erio Yesu akabatebia , Abana , more neki mokoria ? Bakamoiraneria , Yaya .
43021006	Akabatebia , Kerute ekeonga ensemo y'okorio y'obwato , nainwe namonyore . Erio bakaruta , korende tibanyara gokeng'usa as'engecho y'obonge bwe chinswe .
43021007	Omworokigwa oria Yesu anchete akamotebia Petero , Nere Omonene . Erio Simon Petero , agachia koigwa ng'a n'Omonene , akeboyia eanga yaye ( ekiagera arenge getirianda ) , akeruta enyancha ime .
43021008	Aborokigwa bande bagacha as'obwato ( naki tibarenge are as'ense enyomo , ang'e chifuti chimia isato ) , bakagekurura ekeonga geichire nechinswe .
43021009	Erio kobachia goika engegu , bakarora omorero bw'amakara aroro , naende enswe ebekire igoro yaye , nomogati .
43021010	Yesu akabatebia , Reta aiga ensemo ye chinswe echimwarubire bono ,
43021011	Erio Simon Petero akarina obwato ime , agakeng'usa ekeonga goika engegu , geichire chinswe chinene , emia namerongo etano naisato : nonya chiarenge chinyinge buna iga , ekeonga tigiatandogete .
43021012	Yesu akabatebia , Inchuo morie . Korende omonto onde ase baria aborokigwa tarenge oyorigetie komoboria , Aye ning'o ? mbamanyete ng'a n'Omonene .
43021013	Yesu akagenda akayobogoria omogati , akabaa , nechinswe boigo .
43021014	Eke nekero kia gatato Yesu arorekanete naborokigwa baye nyuma y'okoboka korwa as'amakweri .
43021015	Erio kobakorire okoragera , Yesu akamotebia Simon Petero , Simon o Yohana , nonyanchete kobua aba ? Akamotebia , Ee , Omonene , aye kwamanyire ng'a ningwanchete . Akamotebia , Risia chimanwa chie ching'ondi chiane .
43021016	Akamotebia , eria kabere , Simon o Yohana , nonyanchete ? Akamotebia , Ee , Omonene aye kwamanyire ng'a ningwanchete , Akamotebia , Risia ching'ondi chiane .
43021017	Akamotebia eria gatato Simon o Yohana , Nonyanchete inche ? Akamotebia , Omonene aye kwamanyire onsi ; kwamanyire ng'a ningwanchete . Yesu akamotebia , Risia ching'ondi chiane .
43021018	Ekeene , ekeene , nagotebirie , Gakwarenge omosae , iga kwarenge kweboyia , kwagenda aase origetie ; korende korabe omogaka , norambore amaboko ao , noyonde nagosibe , akoire as'otarigeti .
43021019	Agakwana eri as'okworokia amakweri ki aramotogie Nyasaye . Erio gakorire gokwana aya , akamotebia , Ntunyana .
43021020	Petero ogweonchora , akamorora omworokigwa oria bwanchetwe na Yesu ogotunya ; nere oria bweegegete gekuba kiaye ekero ki'okoria endagera ya mogoroba , nagokwana , Omonene ning'o orakorue ?
43021021	Petero ochia komorora oyio , akamotebia Yesu , Omonene , noyo rende ?
43021022	Yesu akamotebia , Kondarigie oyo aikaranse goika nchiche ninki erakogwenere ? Aye ontunye inche .
43021023	Erio ring'ana eri rigasarera as'abamwabo ng'a omworokigwa oria tagokwa : korende Yesu tamotebetie , tagokwa ; korende , Kondarigie aikaranse goika inchiche nki erakogwenere ?
43021024	Oyo noria omworokigwa oyaroche aya , naende origete aya ; naende twamanyire ng'a oborori bwaye nobw'ekeene .
43021025	Nare naende ayande amange ayakorete Yesu , naro kararikwe erimo erimo , iga ngokaga ng'a nonya nense yonsi tegoisana chibuku echiranyare korikwa .
44001001	Ebuku eria ye ritang'ani nakorete , Theofilo , ase chingecho chi'amang'ana onsi Yesu achagete gokora na kworokereria ,
44001002	goika rituko riria abachigete as'Omoika Omochenu abatomwa achorete , akabogorigwa gochia igoro .
44001003	Na nyuma as'ogochandwa kwaye , akabaorokera ng'a moyo are , as'ebiorokererio ebinge , are kobaorokera as'engaki y'amatuko emerongo ene , nagokwana chingecho chiagwenerete as'obonda bwa Nyasaye :
44001004	naende , agasangererekana nabarabwo , akabachika tibabaisa korwa Yerusalemu , korende baganye eira ya Tata , eria mwaigwete chingecho chiaye korwa asende :
44001005	naki Yohana akabatisa as'amache ; korende inwe namobatiswe as'Omoika Omochenu nyuma as'amatuko aya atai mange .
44001006	Erio ekero basangererekanete amo , bakamoboria bakobora , Omonene , ekero eke nario orabairanerie Abaisiraeli obonda bwabo ?
44001007	Akabatebia tari emeremo yaino komanya ebiro gose chingaki Tata abibekire as'okobua kwaye omonyene .
44001008	Korende namonyore chinguru , ekero obacheire Omoika Omochenu : nainwe namobe abarori bane ase Yerusalemu , nase Boyahudi yonsi na Samaria , na goika chinsinyo chi'ense .
44001009	Erio ochia gokwana aya , ekero barigerereti , akabogorigwa ; rire rikamobwata korwa as'amaiso abo .
44001010	Ekero barenge korigereria mono namaiso abo gochia igoro , ekero arenge kogenda , abanto babere bagatenena ang'e nabarabwo , abarenge nechianga chindabu ;
44001011	bakabora , Abanto ba Galili naki moteneine mokorigereria igoro ? oyo Yesu , obogorigwe korwa asemore kogenda igoro , nabo arache omogwekano oyio oyio buna mwamorora akogenda igoro .
44001012	Erio bakairana kogenda Yerusalemu korwa egetunwa gekorokwa Emezeituni , kiarenge ang'e na Yerusalemu , koreng'ana norogendo rw'esabato .
44001013	Goika bagachia gosoa , bakarina enyomba y'egoroba igoro , aase baikaransete Petero , na Yakobo na Yohana , na Anderea , na Filipo na Thomas , Baritholomayo na Mathayo , Yakobo bw'Alufayo , na Simon Zelote , na Yuda o Yakobo .
44001014	Abaiga bonsi igo barenge amo as'omoyo oyomo as'ogosaba , amo nabarabwo abakungu , na Mariamu ng'ina Yesu , nabamura bamwabo .
44001015	Amatuko ayio agatenena Petero gati y'aborokigwa , akabora ( omobaro bw'amarieta igaigete emia namerongo ebere ) ,
44001016	Baminto negwenerete ririko riikeranigwe , eriakwanete Omoika Omochenu kare as'omonwa o Daudi , ase chingecho chia Yudas , oyorenge omotang'ani obo abamobwatete Yesu .
44001017	Naki igarenge konya obarirwe amo naintwe , akanyora ensemo y'ogokora oko .
44001018	( Naboigo omonto oyo agorete omogondo as'eng'eria y'obobe ; akagwa maumama agatandoka , amara aye onsi agasoka .
44001019	Akamanyekana nabanto bonsi bamenyete Yerusalemu ; goika omogondo oria okarokwa as'omonwa obo Akeldama , engecho yaye , Omogondo bw'amanyinga . )
44001020	Naki narikire as'ebuku ya Zaburi , Egeikaro kiaye kebe ritongo , Nonya ' monto onde tabaisa komenyao : Oborendi bwaye omwao aboire .
44001021	Naboigo as'abanto batarete naintwe as'ekero gionsi eki Omonene Yesu arenge gosoa nagosoka korwa as'egati yaito ,
44001022	agachaka korwa okobatisa kwa Yohana , goika rituko riria aimogetigwe korwa asetore kogenda igoro , ogweneire oyomo obo akorwe kirori bw'okoboka kwaye amo naintwe .
44001023	Bakabeka babere , Yusufu orenge korokwa Barsaba , here oetwe erieta riakabere Yusto , na Mattiya .
44001024	Bagasaba , bakabora , Aye Omonene , omanyete emioyo y'abanto bonsi , tworokie , ning'o oyogwachorire as'abaiga babere ,
44001025	abogorie ensemo y'ogokora oko , nobotomwa obo , obwamochete Yudas agende aase aye .
44001026	Bakabakorera obomera ; obomera bokagwa ase Mattiya ; agachorwa koba amo nabatomwa ikomi nomo .
44002001	Goika rigachia goika rituko ria Pentekote nao barenge bonsi aase aamo .
44002002	Kogacha mobosokano okogusa korwa igoro buna okogusa gw'ekerambauti gekogenda nechinguru , gegaichora enyomba yonsi eria baikaransete .
44002003	Gokabaorokera chimeme chi'omorero ; obaikaranserete igoro ase ker'oyomo obo .
44002004	Bonsi bagaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , bagachaka gokwana as'emenwa ao ao , buna Omoika obaete ogwatora .
44002005	Naende mbarengeo Yerusalemu Abayahudi abamenyete , abanto abasike , abanto ba ker'egesaku inse as'erioba .
44002006	Naboigo eriogi eri rigachia koigugwa nomoganda osangererekanete , bakabwatwa nomoondoko , ekiagera ker'oyomo abaigwete bagokwana as'omonwa oye .
44002007	Bagaichana bonsi , bagakumia , bagotebania , Aba bonsi bagokwana tari Abagalili ?
44002008	Naki aba bono intwe toigwete ker'omonto as'omonwa oito twaiboretwe noro ?
44002009	Abaparthi , n'Abamedi , n'Abaelamiti , nabwo bamenyete Mesopotamia , Boyahudi na Kappadokia , Ponto na Asia ,
44002010	Furugia na Pamfulia , Misiri , nechinsemo chia Libya ang'e na Kurene , n'Abarumi abageni , Abayahudi nabande baonchogete .
44002011	Abakrete n'Abaarabu , twabaigure abaiga bagokwana as'amang'ana aito ogokora okonene kwa Nyasaye .
44002012	Bagaichana bonsi , bagasogwa nomoichano , bagatebania , Engecho yaye ninki amang'ana aya ?
44002013	Abande bagasekereria bagoteba , Igobatindire as'edivai enyia .
44002014	Korende Petero agatenena amo na baria ikomi nomo , akaaka eriogi riaye , akabatebia , Inwe abanto ba Boyahudi , nainwe mwensi momenyete Yerusalemu , ring'ana eri rimanyeke asemore , motegerere amang'ana ane .
44002015	Taibo buna mokagete ; abanto aba tibatindeti , ekiagera nechinsa isato chia mobaso ;
44002016	korende ring'ana erio ndiria riakwanetwe as'omonwa bw'omobani Yoel :
44002017	Nebe as'amatuko omoerio , otebire Nyasaye , Nimbaiterere abanto bonsi Omoika one ; Nabasae baino nabaiseke baino nababane , Nabamura baino nabarore okorora , Nabagaka baino nabarote chindoto :
44002018	Namatuko aria nimbaiterere abasomba bane abasacha nabakungu Omoika one , nabarabwo nababane .
44002019	Ning'orokie ogokumia as'igoro , Nebikone as'ense inse ; Amanyinga , nomorero , nerikundesi ri'erioki :
44002020	Erioba narionchoke ribe omosunte , Nomotienyi obe amanyinga , Ritaracha riria rituko ri'Omonene , Rire rinene kegima , namaiso marore :
44002021	Naende nebe ker'oyorarirangerie erieta ri'Omonene natorigwe .
44002022	Inwe abasacha b'Isiraeli , igwa amang'ana aya : Yesu o Nazareti , omonto oorogetigwe asemore na Nyasaye as'ebikone nogokumia nchirage chi Nyasaye akorete asare as'egati yaino , buna inwe abanyene momanyete ;
44002023	omonto oyo igairetwe nainwe as'ekina kia Nyasaye giatebetwe , nas'okomanya kwaye korwa kare , nainwe mokamorua as'amaboko amabe mokamoita :
44002024	Nyasaye akamobokia , akororobia obororo bw'amakweri , ekiagera tare konyarekana abwatwe naro .
44002025	Naki Daudi omwatoire amang'ana aye , Namororete Omonene as'obosio bwane amatuko onsi ; Naki igare as'okoboko kwane gw'okorio , tinyegerigwa :
44002026	As'ayio enkoro yane ekagokigwa , oromeme rwane rogasasoka : Na kobua omobere one noro noikaranse as'ogosemeria :
44002027	Ekiagera togontiga omoika one as'embera , Gose tokomorua Omochenu oo arore ogosareka ,
44002028	Kwanyorokereirie chinchera chi'obogima ; Nong'ichorie omogoko as'obosio bwao .
44002029	Baminto , ninyare gokwana nainwe ntari nobwoba as'obosio bwaino amang'ana ay'omogaka oito omonene Daudi , ng'a igakwete agatindekwa , nembera yaye nao ere naintwe goika rero .
44002030	Nabo ekiagera are omobani , amanyete ng'a Nyasaye omoriereire as'eira ng'a as'oroiboro rw'chibono biaye as'engecho y'omobere namoimokererie igoro Kristo , aikaranse as'ekerogo ki'obonene ; ere omonyene ;
44002031	agata ng'ana koyarora aya , agatora amang'ana okoboka kwaye Kristo , ng'a omoika oye totigetwe as'embera , nonya nomobere oye toroche ogosareka ,
44002032	Yesu oyio Nyasaye akamobokia , naintwe twensi igatore abarori baye .
44002033	Naboigo karinigwe goika as'okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye , nakonyora ase Tata eria eira y'Omoika Omochenu , ogeiteire egento eke mwakerorire bono na gokeigwa .
44002034	Naki Daudi tarinete erioba igoro ; korende ere omonyene igagoteba , Omonene namotebetie Omonene one , Ikaransa as'okoboko kwane gw'okorio ,
44002035	Goika mbabeke ababisa bao inse as'amagoro ao .
44002036	Naboigo tiga enyomba ya Isiraeli yonsi emanye boronge ng'a Nyasaye omokorire Yesu oyio mwabambete koba Omonene na Kristo .
44002037	Bagachia koyaigwa aya bagasambwa ase chinkoro chiabo , bakamotebia Petero nabatomwa bande , Inki togokora abaminto ?
44002038	Petero akabatebia , Onchoka mobatiswe ker'oyomo as'erieta riaye Yesu Kristo , monyore okorusigwa kw'ebibe ; nainwe namonyore ekeegwa ki'Omoika Omochenu .
44002039	Naki eira eye nas'engecho yaino , nabana baino , nabanto bonsi bare are , na bonsi abarache korangerigwa n'Omonene Nyasaye oito .
44002040	Akabaorokeria as'amang'ana ande amange mono na kobakurera , ogoteba , Etorie nekegori eke getari boronge .
44002041	Nabarabwo abaribwatete ring'ana riaye as'omogoko bakabatiswa : nerituko riria bakamenterwa abanto koreng'ana chilifu isato .
44002042	Bakaba ngoikaransabare agwo , as'okworokereria kw'abatomwa , nas'obomo , nas'ogosamunyora omogati , nas'ogosaba .
44002043	Ker'omonto agasogwa nokoiroka : ogokumia okonge nebikone bigakoreka as'amaboko abatomwa .
44002044	Na bonsi abanchete igo barenge aase aamo , naende bakaba nebinto bionsi obomo ;
44002045	bagatonda chinibo chiabo nebinto chibarenge nabio , nakobagabera abanto bonsi koreng'ana fauna ker'omonto arigetie .
44002046	Amatuko onsi as'omoyo oyomo bakaba ime ase hekalu , bagosamunyora omogati enyomba as'enyomba , nakonyora endagera yabo as'omogoko nas'omoyo omorabu ,
44002047	bakomobaka Nyasaye , nakobagwenera abanto bonsi . Omonene akabamentera kera rituko baria barenge gotorigwa .
44003001	Nabo Petero na Yohana bagachia gotira amo kogenda hekalu ime , chinsa chi'ogosaba , chinsa kianda .
44003002	Nomonto oyomo orenge ekerema korwa as'enda ya ng'ina orekobogorigwa nabanto , igo barenge komobeka kera rituko as'egesieri gie hekalu , kiarenge korokwa Ekiya , erinde asabe chimbesa as'abanto bagosoa ime ase hekalu .
44003003	Omonto oyo ochia kobarora Petero na Yohana bagosoa hekalu ime agasaba aegwe chimbesa .
44003004	Na Petero akamobeta amaiso , amo na Yohana , akabora , Torigererie intwe .
44003005	Akabarigereria , agasemeria ng'a naegwe egento nabarabwo .
44003006	Korende Petero agakwana , Efetha timbwati nonya nethahabu ; korende eki mbwate nakio ngokoa . As'erieta ria Yesu Omonazareti , tenena , ogende .
44003007	Akamobwata okoboko gw'okorio , akamoimokereria igoro : erio chimbaratero chiaye nechinengo chi'amagoro aye chikanyora chinguru .
44003008	Akaimoka bwango agatenena , agachaka kogenda ; agasoa ime ase hekalu amo nabarabwo , okogenda , nagotuma , okomobaka Nyasaye .
44003009	Abanto bonsi bakamorora gakogenda okomobaka Nyasaye : to bakamomanya ng'a nere oria orenge goikaransa nagosaba chimbesa aria as'egesieri Ekiya gie hekalu : bagaichorwa nogoichana bagakumia amang'ana aria amonyorete .
44003010	
44003011	Oria ekerema okonyetwe ekero arenge kobabwatabwata Petero na Yohana , abanto bonsi bakabasangererekanera bwango as'ensemo eria yarenge korokwa egesoero gia Sulemani , bagaichana mono .
44003012	Goika Petero agachia korora aya akabairaneria abanto , Inwe Abaisiraeli , nki mogokumeria aya ? gose naseki mogotobeta amaiso intwe , ng'a buna nintwe twamokora oyo ogenda ase chinguru chiaito intwe , gose as'obuya bvvaito intwe ?
44003013	Nyasaye o Ibrahimu na Isaaka na Yakobo , Nyasaye bw'abatata baito , omoimokereirie igoro omosomba oye Yesu ; inwe mwamoitete ere na komokana as'obosio bwa Pilato karenge kogamba ekina kiaye amosibore .
44003014	Inwe mokamokana oria Omochenu , oria Omonyene oboronge , mokarigia moegwe omoiti :
44003015	mokamoita oria Omonene bw'obogima , ere Nyasaye omobokirie ; naintwe igatore abarori baye ,
44003016	Nas'okwegena kw'erieta riaye erieta riaye riamobekire chinguru omonto oyo mwarorire aiga na komomanya : nokwegena koria kore as'enchera yaye ere kwamonyoreire oyo as'obosio bwaino inwe mwensi obogima obo oboikeranu .
44003017	Na bono baminto , namanyire ng'a igomwakorete aya as'ogotamanya kwaino , buna nabanene baino bakorete .
44003018	Korende amang'ana aria arandetie Nyasaye korwa kare as'emenwa y'ababani baye bonsi , ng'a Kristo nachandwe , oyaikeranirie bo .
44003019	Onchoka rende , moirane erinde ebibe biaino bitinyigwe , binyare gocha ebiro bi'ogotimokigwa korwa as'obosio bwaye Omonene ;
44003020	anyare komotoma Kristo oria orandetigwe asemore korwa kare , ere Yesu :
44003021	Ere yamogwenerete konyorwa igoro goika chiche chingaki chiogokorwa oboyia ebinto bionsi biakwanetwe na Nyasaye as'emenwa y'ababani baye korwa omochakano bw'ense .
44003022	Ekiagera Musa nabatebetie abatata baito , ng'a Omonene Nyasaye nabaimokererie omobani , oyorache korwa as'abamino baino , buna inche ; moigwere ere as'amang'ana onsi ayarakwane .
44003023	Naende nabe ng'a ker'omonto otamoigwereti omobani oyio igarasirigwe nagwatananwa nabanto baye .
44003024	Naboigo nababani bonsi korwa Samwel na baria bachete korwa nyuma yaye , bonsi abakwanete , igobare korandia amang'ana amatuko aya .
44003025	Inwe igomore abana b'ababani nab'emuma eria , ero Nyasaye abwatanete nabaiso baino , amotebetie Ibrahimu , as'okoibora kwao ebisaku bionsi bi'ense nabisesenigwe .
44003026	Nyasaye gatiekire komobokia omosomba oye Yesu , akamotoma asemore inwe ritang'ani , erinde abasesenie as'okomwatanana ker'oyomo oino nobobe bwaye .
44004001	Erio bagachia koba ngokwanabare nabanto baria , abakuani nomotang'ani bwe hekalu n'Abasadukai bakabaorokera ,
44004002	bagaichana ekiagera bakworokereria abanto nakorandia okobokigwa kw'abakure gokonyorekana ase Yesu .
44004003	Bakababwata bakababeka echela goika mambia : naki konya riabaire mogoroba .
44004004	Korende abange as'abwo abaigwete ring'ana riria bagancha ; nomobaro bw'abasacha igorenge koreng'ana chilifu isano .
44004005	Goika mambia abanene nabagaka nabariki bagasangererekana Yerusalemu ;
44004006	na Anna omokuani omonene narengeo , na Kaifa , na Yohana , na Iskanderi , nabonsi abarenge eamate yaye omokuani omonene .
44004007	Bakababeka gati gati , bakababoria , nase nguru ki naende nas'erieta riang'o mogokora aya inwe ?
44004008	Erio Petero agaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , akabatebia , Inwe abanene b'abanto nabagaka ba Isiraeli ,
44004009	onye tokoborigwa rero amang'ana ay'oria omonto omoreu buna akonywa :
44004010	manya inwe mwensi nabanto bonsi ba Isiraeli , ng'a as'erieta ria Yesu Omonazareti , ere inwe mwabambete , Nyasaye akamobokia , as'erieta erio omonto oyo otenenire asemore omogima as'obosio bwaino .
44004011	Ere nere rigena riria riachayetwe nainwe abaagachi , na rirorio riabekirwe koba rigena rinene ri'ekona .
44004012	Gose tikori gokonyeka as'onde bwonsi ; naki erieta rinde tiriri inse as'erioba eribaeirwe abanabamwanyabanto ritogwenerete gotorigwa narirorio .
44004013	Nabo kobachia korora oboremu bwa Petero na Yohana , nakomanya ng'a nabanto batanya kwegera , batari nobong'aini , bagakumia ; bakabamanya ng'a igo barenge amo na Yesu .
44004014	Bachia komorora oria okonyetwe oteneine amo nabarabwo tibarenge nering'ana bare koiraneria .
44004015	Bakabachika batigere korwa ase ritongo , bagakora ekina ,
44004016	bagoteba , Inki torabakorere abanto aba ? naki egekone ekenene giakorirwe nabarabwo , kere maiso marore as'abanto bonsi bamenyete Yerusalemu : gose titokonyara kogekana .
44004017	Korende ring'ana eri tiricha koranda as'abanto , tobairokie , tibakwana naende namonto onde bwonsi as'erieta eri .
44004018	Bakabarangeria , bakabatianera mono tibabaisa gokwana , nonya nkworokereria as'erieta ria Yesu .
44004019	Petero na Yohana bakabairaneria bakabatebia , Onye mboronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye kobaigwera inwe kobua Nyasaye , nacha inwe abanyene :
44004020	naki intwe titokonyara gotiga koyakwana , amang'ana ayatwaroche na koyaigwa .
44004021	Nabarabwo , kobabagosire , bakabasibora , tibarora enchera y'okobasiba , as'engecho y'abanto ; naki abanto bonsi igo barenge bakomobaka Nyasaye as'ayio akoregete .
44004022	Naki emiaka yaye omonto oria okoreretwe egekone eke ki'ogokonywa konya okorire emiaka emerongo ene .
44004023	Erio bachia gosiborwa bakagenda as'abanto baho , bakaborokia chingecho chi'amang'ana onsi batebetigwe nabakuani abanene nabagaka .
44004024	Nabarabwo bachia koigwa , bakamoakera Nyasaye amariogi abo as'omoyo oyomo , bakobora , Omonene , naye gwakorete igoro nense nenyancha nebinto bionsi bire imeo :
44004025	Naye ngwakwanete as'omonwa o Daudi omosomba oo , Naseki ebisaku biakorete riroroche , Nabanto barengereirie obokayayu ?
44004026	Abaruoti b'ense bechokire , Nabanene bakorire ekina amo , Igoro as'Omonene na igoro ase Kristo oye .
44004027	Naki nekeene , Herode na Pontio Pilato amo nebisaku nabanto ba Isiraeli , bagasangererekana igoro as'omosomba oo omochenu Yesu , oyokwabegete amaguta ,
44004028	erinde bakore onsi ay'okoboko kwao nebina biao biare goteba korwa kare aoroke .
44004029	Korende bono , Omonene , rigereria okoirokia kwabo ; obakonye abasomba bao gokwana ring'ana riao as'oboremu ,
44004030	orambore okoboko kwao kogwenia ; ebikone nogokumia bikoreke as'erieta ri'omosomba oo omochenu Yesu ,
44004031	Goika bagachia gokora gosaba , aas'aria basangeierekanete , agatengechigwa , bonsi bagaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , bagakwana ring'ana ria Nyasaye as'oboremu .
44004032	Nomoganda bw'abanto abanchete igo barenge enkoro eyemo nomoika oyomo : gose onde tarenge nonya nomo oregoteba ng'a gento kende gionsi eki arenge nakio nenibo yaye omonyene ; korende igo barenge nebinto bionsi obomo .
44004033	Nabatomwa bakaorokia amang'ana okoboka kwaye Yesu ase chinguru chinyinge . Obuya obonge bokaba igoro asebare bonsi .
44004034	Gose tarenge omonto nonya noyomo as'egati yabo , oyorenge nokoremerwa : naki abanto abarenge nemegondo gose chinyomba igobabigorete , bakareta rigori ri'ebinto biria biagoretwe ,
44004035	bakabibeka as'amagoro abatomwa : ker'omonto akagaberwa koreng'ana nokorigia kwaye .
44004036	Na Yusufu orogetwe nabatomwa Barnaba ( engecho yaye , omwana bw'omogoko ) , Omolawi , egesaku kiaye nomonto o Kupro ,
44004037	narenge nomogondo akayogora , agachireta chishilingi agachibeka as'amagoro abatomwa .
44005001	Korende omonto oyomo erieta riaye Anania , amo na Safira mokaye , akagora omogondo ,
44005002	agatanga bobisi ensemo ye rigori riaye , mokaye nere namanyete aya , akareta ensemo eyemo akayebeka as'amagoro abatomwa .
44005003	Petero akamotebia , Anania , inki kiagera Saitani agoichoire omoyo okomotebia oborimo Omoika Omochenu , na gotanga bobisi ensemo ye rigori ri'omogondo ?
44005004	Ekero orenge asore , torenge enibo yao ? Naende ekero ogorirwe torenge as'okobua kwao ? Naseki kwarengereria ring'ana eri omoyo oo ime ? Tikwamotebia oborimo mwanyabanto korende Nyasaye .
44005005	Anania agachia koigwa amang'ana aya akaaka nse agakwa . Okoiroka okonge gokabanyora abanto bonsi bayaigwete aya .
44005006	Abamura bakaimoka , bakamobeka as'egetambaa , bakamobogoria gochia isiko , bakamotindeka .
44005007	Goika ekero kie chinsa isato nyuma , mokaye agasoa , nere tamanyete ayio abete .
44005008	Petero akamoiraneria , Ntebia , Igomwagorete omogondo ase rigori erio ? Agateba , Ee , ase rigori erio .
44005009	Petero akamotebia , Naki abete mwatebanirie koyotema Omoika bw'Omonene ? rigereria , amagoro abo abamotindeka omosacha oo nar'agwo ' gesieri , nabarabwo nabakobogorie aye naye .
44005010	Erio akagwa as'amagoro aye agakwa : baria abamura bagasoa bakamonyora okure , bakamoimokia gochia isiko , bakamotindeka amo nomosacha oye .
44005011	Okoiroka okonge gokabanyora ekanisa yonsi nabanto bonsi abayaigwete aya .
44005012	Nas'amaboko abatomwa bigakoreka ebikone nogokumia okonge as'abanto : nabarabwo bonsi igo barenge as'okorengereria okomo as'egora ya Sulemani .
44005013	Nase bonsi onde tarenge nonya noyomo onyarete kobwatana nabarabwo ; korende abanto bakabatogia ;
44005014	abanchete bakamenteka as'Omonene , abange abasacha nabakungu ;
44005015	nonya nase chinchera chinene basokia abarwaire isiko , babareria igoro as'emeito namarere , erinde , Petero ogocha , omorengari oye bwoka omobekere ekiriri oyomo bw'abwo .
44005016	Nero emesangererekano y'emechie yare chinsemo chinsemo chia Yerusalemu egasangererekana , bakoreta abarwaire , nabwo bachandirwe nebirecha ebibe ; na bonsi bakagwenigwa .
44005017	Akaimoka omokuani ' omonene nabonsi abarenge amo nere , ( abwo nabwo barenge ensemo ya Abasadukai ) , bagaichorwa neribero ,
44005018	bakababwata abatomwa bakababeka ime as'echela .
44005019	Korende rilaika ri'Omonene rikaigora ebisieri bi'echela botuko rikabasokia , rigateba ,
44005020	Genda motenene ase hekalu ime mobatebie abanto amang'ana onsi ay'Obogima obo .
44005021	Nabarabwo bagachia koigwa bakagenda rituko ria mambia hekalu ime bagachaka kworokereria . Korende agacha omokuani omonene nabwo barenge amo nere bakabarangeria abanto be ritongo , nabagaka bonsi ab'abana ba Isiraeli , bagatoma abanto echela ime , erinde babarete .
44005022	Korende abasomba bagachia goika , tibabarora as'echela ime ; bakairana , bagakwana ,
44005023	bakabora , Echela igo twayenyora esiekire buya buya kegima , nabarabwo abarendi bateneine obosio bw'egesieri : korende twachia koigora titonyoreti monto ime .
44005024	Nabo omotang'ani bwe hekalu nabakuani abanene bagachia koigwa aya , bagasogwa nomoondoko as'engecho yabo , naki arabe amang'ana ayio ,
44005025	Omonto oyomo agacha akaborokia amang'ana ng'a , Abanto baria mwabegete echela ime , nchekalu ime bare , bateneine koborokereria abanto .
44005026	Erio oria omotang'ani akagenda amo nabasomba , bakabareta , korende tari ase chinguru : naki babairogete abanto , tibabaisa kobaruta amagena ,
44005027	Bakabareta , bakababeka ritongo . Omokuani omonene akababoria , akabora ,
44005028	Inee ! titwabachigete inwe ase chinguru , timworokereria as'erieta eri : rora , inwe mwaichoirie Yerusalemu , nokworokereria kwaino , naende morigetie koreta amanyinga ay'omonto oria igoro asetore .
44005029	Petero nabatomwa bakairaneria , bagakwana , Netogwenerete komoigwera Nyasaye kobua mwanyabanto .
44005030	Nyasaye bw'abatata baito omobogetie Yesu , ere inwe mwamoitete mokamosunga as'omote .
44005031	Omonto oyio Nyasaye omoimokereirie igoro as'okoboko kwaye gw'okorio , ab'Omonene naende Omokonyi , abae Abaisiraeli okoonchoka nokwaberwa kw'ebibe .
44005032	Naintwe igotore abarori b'amang'ana aya ; amo n'Omoika Omochenu oyio Nyasaye abaeire bonsi abamoigwerete .
44005033	Bagachia koigwa , bagasambwa chinkoro chiabo ; bakagamba ekina babaite .
44005034	Korende omonto oyomo Omofarisai , erieta riaye Gamaliel , omworokia bw'amachiko , omonto osikire nabanto bonsi , agatenena ase ritongo , agachika abatomwa babekwe isiko ake .
44005035	Akabatebia , Inwe abasacha ba Isiraeli , erende buna morabakore abanto aba ,
44005036	naki ritang'ani ri'amatuko aya , naimoka Theuda , agetogia ng'a ere nomonto omonene ; abanto koreng'ana chimia inye bakabwatana nere : nere agakwa ; na bonsi abamwanchete bagatananeka bakaba tari gento .
44005037	Nyuma as'omonto oyio , akaimoka Yudas Omogalili , amatuko aria ay'okorikerwa ebango , akabang'usa abanto batai bake komotunyana : nere boigo agasira ; na bonsi abamwanchete bagaserebekana .
44005038	Na bono nabatebirie , Eatanane nabanto aba , batige : naki ring'ana eri gose emeremo eye onye neya mwanyabanto , nesarigwe ;
44005039	korende onye neya Nyasaye timokonyara koyesaria ; mobaise kororekana ng'a Nyasaye mokorwania .
44005040	Bagancha amang'ana aye bakabarangeria abatomwa , bakabaaka , bakabachika tibakwana as'erieta riaye Yesu ; erio bakabatiga bagende .
44005041	Nabarabwo bakarua ase ritongo riria , bagogete ekiagera babarirwe ng'a bagweneire gosokigwa as'engecho y'erieta riaye .
44005042	Na kera rituko ime ase hekalu nechinyomba chiabo ime , tibatigete kworokereria nakorandia amang'ana amaya a Yesu ng'a nere Kristo .
44006001	Goika amatuko aria aborokigwa barenge komentekana omobaro obo , nkwabete okwemurungania kw'Abaelenisti igoro as'Abaibirania as'engecho y'ababoraka babo abebetwe as'ogokora gwa kera rituko .
44006002	Baria ikomi nababere bakabarangeria omoganda bw'aborokigwa , bagateba , Tegwenereti intwe koritiga ring'ana ria Nyasaye gokora emeremo y'emesa .
44006003	Gaki baminto , chora abanto batano nababere korwa gati asemore abagotebwa ng'a nabaya , baichire n'Omoika nechisemi , erinde tobabeke igoro ase ring'ana eri .
44006004	Naintwe natogenderere as'okomosaba Nyasaye na korikorera ring'ana riaye .
44006005	Ring'ana eri rikagwenera as'omosangererekano bwonsi : bakamochora Stefano , omonto oichire nokwegena n'Omoika Omochenu , na Filipo , na Prokoro , na Nikanora , na Timon , na Parmena , na Nikolao omworokigwa bw'Antiokia :
44006006	bakababeka as'obosio bw'abatomwa : erio bachia gokora ogosaba bakabeka amaboko abo igoro yabo .
44006007	Ring'ana ria Nyasaye rikamenteka ; nomobaro bw'aborokigwa okamenteka mono ase Yerusalemu : nomoganda omonene bw'Abakuani bakaigwera okwegena .
44006008	Na Stefano , oichire nobuya , nokobua , igarenge gokora ogokumia nebikone ebinene as'abanto .
44006009	Korende abanto bande b'esunagogi yare korokwa esunagogi y'Amaliberitino , ney'Abakurene ney'Abaisikanderia neya baria Abakilikia n'Asia , bakaamererania na Stefano .
44006010	Korende tibanyarete koamererania nechisemi chiaye nonya n'Omoika are gokwana noro .
