44006011	Goika bakabagenka abanto bare gokwana , twamoigure omonto oyo ogokwana amang'ana ay'okorama Musa na Nyasaye ,
44006012	Bagasega abanto nabagaka nabariki , bakamochiera , bakamobwata , bakamoira as'obosio bwe ritongo .
44006013	Bagatenenia abarori b'oborimo abare goteba , Omonto oyo tatigeti gokwana amang'ana ay'okorama igoro y'aase achenu na igoro y'amachiko :
44006014	naki twaigure ogoteba ng'a Yesu oyio Omonazareti naasarie aas'aa , nagochionchora chingecho echi twaetwe na Musa .
44006015	Abanto bonsi abaikaransete ase ritongo riria bakamobeta amaiso abo , bakamorora obosio bwaye bwabaire buna obosio bwe rilaika .
44007001	Omokuani omonene akabora , Inee ! Amang'ana ayio naboigo are ?
44007002	Nere agakwana , Baminto , nabatata bane , Igwa . Nyasaye bw'obonene namoorokerete tata oito Ibrahimu , ekero arenge ase Mesopotamia , ataramenya Haran ,
44007003	akamotebia , Karue as'ense yao , nas'eamate yao , ogende goika as'ense ndakworokie ,
44007004	Erio akarua as'ense y'Abakalidai , akamenya Haran : akarua agwo nyuma as'ogokwa gw'ise , Nyasaye akamong'anyia goika as'ense eye momenyete inwe bono :
44007005	nonya tamoete omwando imaa koreng'ana as'okobeka okogoro : akaria eira ng'a namoe , ebe obomenyo bwaye , ney'oroiboro rwaye , nyuma yaye , ekero atarenge nomwana .
44007006	Nyasaye agakwana iga , ng'a oroiboro rwaye nababe abageni as'ense y'abanto bande , nabarabwo nababakore koba abasomba babo , nakobakora bobe as'engaki y'emiaka chimia inye .
44007007	Negesaku keria kerabakore abasomba nimbanachere ekina inche , agateba Nyasaye : na nyuma as'ayio nabasoke , nabarabwo nabansasime aas'aiga .
44007008	Akamoa eira y'okwaroka : erio Ibrahimu akaibora Isaaka , akamosara rituko ri'atano natato ; Isaaka akamoibora Yakobo , Yakobo akabaibora baria ikomi nababere abagaka baito ,
44007009	Baria abagaka baito bakamororera ribero Yusufu , bakamogora gochia Misiri : Nyasaye akaba amo nere ,
44007010	akamorusia as'emechando yaye yonsi , akamoa egesio nechisemi as'obosio bwa Farao , omoruoti o Misiri ; nere akamokora gavuna o Misiri nenyomba yaye yonsi .
44007011	Erio enchara ekaba igoro as'ense yonsi ya Misiri na Kanani , nemechando emenge : nabatata baito tibanyorete endagera ebaisanete .
44007012	Goika Yakobo agachia koigwa ng'a aria Misiri ner'aroro endagera , akabatoma abatata baito ekero kie ritang'ani .
44007013	Nas'orogendo rwa kabere Yusufu akeorokia as'abamura bamwabo ; eamate ya Yusufu ekaorokigwa maiso marore ase Farao .
44007014	Yusufu agatoma abanto akamorangeria Yakobo ise neamate yaye yonsi pi , abanto emerongo etano nebere nabatano .
44007015	Yakobo agatirimboka goika Misiri ; agakwa ere , nabatata baito ;
44007016	bakaimokigwa goika Sukem , bagatindekwa as'embera eria Ibrahimu ayegorete ase rigori rie chifetha as'abana ba Emmor , aria Sukem .
44007017	Erio ekero ki'eira eria Nyasaye aete Ibrahimu gegachia koba ngoika kere , baria abanto bakamenteka nakobucha mono aria Misiri ,
44007018	goika omoruoti onde akaimoka , oyotamomanyete Yusufu .
44007019	Oyio akagekora bobe egesaku giaito , nakobakorera amabe abatata baito , akabachika batugute abana babo ebing'werere , erinde tibaba moyo .
44007020	Ekero ekio akaiborwa Musa , nere igarenge omuya mono ; akarerwa egeka ki'emetienyi etato as'enyomba ya ise :
44007021	goika agachia gotugutwa , omoiseke o Farao akamoira , akamorera abe buna omwana oye .
44007022	Musa akorokererigwa chisemi chionsi chia Misiri ; akaba omokong'u as'amang'ana nogokora .
44007023	Emiaka yaye egachia goika emerongo ene akarengereria omoyo oye kogenda kobarora abamura bamwabo abana ba Isiraeli .
44007024	Akamorora oyomo ogochandwa , akamokonya , akamoakanera egesiomba oria orenge gochandwa , akamoaka Omomisiri .
44007025	Igakagete ng'a abamwabo nabamanye ng'a Nyasaye obaeire ogokonyeka as'okoboko kwaye ; korende tibainyora .
44007026	Rituko ria kabere riaye akabaorokera ekero barenge koamererania , akarigia kobabwatania , agateba , Inwe abanene bane inwe igo more abamo ; nki mokwomanera ?
44007027	Korende oria orenge komochegia oyomwabo akamosukeria are , agateba , Ning'o okobeka obe omonene oito , nomogambi oito ?
44007028	Inee ! norigeti kong'ita inche buna kwamoita oria Omomisiri igoro ?
44007029	Musa agatama ase ring'ana erio , akamenya buna omogeni as'ense ya Midiani akaibora abana babere aroro .
44007030	Goika emiaka emerongo ene egachia koera , rilaika ri'omonene rikamoorokera as'eroro y'egetunwa Sinai , as'ogwoka kw'omorero , as'egetugi .
44007031	Musa agachia koyorora , agakumia okorora koria : agachia goika ang'e erinde arore , eriogi ri'Omonene rikamochera ,
44007032	Inche Nyasaye bw'abaiso bao , Nyasaye o Ibrahimu , na Nyasaye o Isaaka , na Nyasaye o Yakobo . Musa akaiguswa , tarigia korigereria .
44007033	Omonene akamotebia , Rusia ebikoroto biao naki aas'aiga oteneine naas'aachenu .
44007034	Bono narorire emechando y'abanto bane bareo Misiri , naigure okorera kwabo , naikire mbarusie : naboigo bono , ningotome goika Misiri .
44007035	Musa oyio bamwangete , bagoteba , Ning'o okobeka koba omonene nomogambi ? nere otometwe na Nyasaye koba omonene nomokonyi , as'okoboko kwa riria rilaika riamoorokerete ase keria egetugi .
44007036	Oyio nere obarusetie o , agakora ogokumia nebikone as'ense ya Misiri , nas'enyancha embariri , nas'eroro egeka ki'emiaka emerongo ene .
44007037	Musa oyio nere obatebetie abana ba Isiraeli , Omonene Nyasaye oino nabaimokererie igoro omobani korwa as'abamino , buna inche : namomoigwere oyio .
44007038	Ere nere orenge as'ekanisa eroro amo na riria rilaika eriakwanete nere as'egetunwa Sinai , naende amo nabatata baito ; nere onyorete amang'ana obogima atoe intwe :
44007039	omonto oyio abatata baito tibarigeti komoigwera , korende bakamosukeria are , nas'emioyo yabo bakairana Misiri .
44007040	Bakamotebia Haron , tokorere chinyasaye chiranyare gototang'ana , naki oyio Musa otoruseti as'ense ya Misiri , titomanyeti eriamonyorire .
44007041	Bagakora emori amatuko aria , bakareta ebing'wanso as'esanamu eria , bakagokera emeremo y'amaboko abo .
44007042	Korende Nyasaye akaonchoka akabatiga gosasima omoganda o igoro buna arigetwe as'ebuku y'ababani , Inee mwanduseretie ching'iti chinyenyire nebing'wanso , Emiaka emerongo ene as'eroro , Inwe enyomba ya Isiraeli ?
44007043	Nainwe mwabogoreti eema ya Molok , Neng'enang'eni ya nyasaye yaino Refan , chisanamu echimwakorete erinde mochisasime : Nainche nimbang'anyie mogende are goika Babeli .
44007044	Eema eria y'emuma igo yarenge amo nabatata baito as'eroro , buna achigete ere oyokwanete na Musa , ng'a ayekore boronge kegima buna omogwekano oria aroche .
44007045	Ero abatata baito mbayebwatete , bakayesoyia amo na Yoshua as'obomenyo bw'ebisaku biria , barabwo Nyasaye abaseretie as'obosio bw'abatata baito , goika amatuko a Daudi ;
44007046	oyonyorete ogwancherwa as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , nere igasabete amonyorere Nyasaye o Yakobo obomenyo .
44007047	Korende Sulemani namoagacherete enyomba .
44007048	Korende ere Oyore Igoro tari komenya ase chinyomba echiagachire namaboko , buna agoteba omobani ,
44007049	Erioba nekerogo kiane ki'obonene , Nense naase nkobeka amagoro ane : Inyomba ki moranyare kong'agachera ? otebire Omonene : Gose naase ki ndanyare gotimokera ?
44007050	Tari okoboko kwane kwayakorete aya onsi ?
44007051	Inwe abanyene ebigoti ebikong'u , motarogeti emioyo nonya namato , amatuko onsi igo mogotanga Omoika Omochenu : buna abaiso baino barenge gokora , nainwe naboigo .
44007052	Norori as'ababani abaiso baino batachandete ? nabarabwo mbabaitete baria babanete amang'ana ogocha kwaye oria Omonyene Oboronge : ere inwe bono mwabaire abakorua nabaiti ;
44007053	inwe mwanyorete amariko as'ogokora kw'amalaika , gose timwayabwatete .
44007054	Erio bagachia koigwa amang'ana aya , bagasambwa chinkoro , bakamoromananeria amaino .
44007055	Nere , oichire n'Omoika Omochenu , akarigereria namaiso aye , akarigereria igoro , akaborora obonene bwa Nyasaye , na Yesu oteneine okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye .
44007056	Agateba , Rora narorire igoro amanoirwe , n'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto otenenire okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye .
44007057	Bakaaka egeturi as'eriogi rinene , bagakuneka amato abo , bakamorindokera as'omoyo oyomo ;
44007058	bakamosokia isiko as'omochie , bakamoaka amagena : nabwo abarori bagachibeka chianga chiabo as'amagoro omomura oyomo orenge korokwa Saulo .
44007059	Bakamoaka amagena Stefano , nere agasaba , ogoteba , Omonene Yesu , ira omoika one .
44007060	Akaaka amaru inse , akarera as'eriogi rinene , Omonene , tobabarera ebibe ebi . Ochia gokora gokwana aya akarara , okorara gw'ogokwa .
44008001	Na Saulo akarora buya aitwe . Rituko riria emechando egacha emenge igoro as'ekanisa yarenge Yerusalemu ; bonsi bagatananekana as'ense ya Boyahudi na Samaria , tatiga abatomwa .
44008002	Abanto abegeni bakamotindeka Stefano , bakamorera okorera okonge .
44008003	Korende Saulo akayesaria ekanisa , agasoa ker'enyomba , nakobakurura abasacha nabakungu nakobaira echela .
44008004	Korende baria batananegete bakagenda chinsemo ne chinsemo bakorandia ring'ana .
44008005	Na Filipo agatirimboka agasoa omochie o Samaria , akabaranderia Kristo .
44008006	Nemeganda yonsi as'omoyo oyomo bagancha koigwa amang'ana onsi aregokwanwa na Filipo , bagachia koyaigwa nakorora ebikone ebiarenge gokora .
44008007	Naki abange barenge nebirecha bi'eubi bikarua asebare , bikarera as'egeturi ekenene : nabanto baringagete nebirema , bakagwenigwa .
44008008	Okaba omogoko omonge as'omochie oria .
44008009	Nomonto oyomo , erieta riaye Simon , igarenge gokora oborogi as'omochie oria korwa kare , okobaichania abanto ba Samaria , ogoteba ng'a ere nomonto omonene :
44008010	bonsi bakamwancha as'egeka ekenge , korwa abake goika abanene , bagoteba , Omonto oyo nokobua kwa Nyasaye koria gokorokwa Okonene .
44008011	Bakamoigwera , ekiagera egeka ekenene igarenge kobaichania as'oborogi bwaye .
44008012	Korende bagachia komwancha Filipo , ekero akorandia amang'ana amaya ay'obonda bwa Nyasaye , nerieta riaye Yesu Kristo , bakabatiswa abasacha nabakungu .
44008013	Nere Simon omonyene agancha akabatiswa , akaba amo na Filipo : agachia korora ebikone nogokumia okonene kware gokoreka , agaichana .
44008014	Nabatomwa abarenge Yerusalemu kobachia koigwa ng'a Abasamaria babwatire ring'ana ria Nyasaye , bakabatomera Petero na Yohana :
44008015	bagatirimboka , bakabasabera banyore Omoika Omochenu :
44008016	naki konyora torahaikera nonya noyomo obo : tatiga babatisetwe rioka as'erieta riaye Omonene Yesu .
44008017	Bakababekera amaboko abo igoro yabo , nabarabwo bakanyora Omoika Omochenu .
44008018	Goika Simon agachia korora ng'a abanto igo bakoegwa Omoika Omochenu as'okobekerwa amaboko nabatomwa , akarigia kobaa chifetha , agateba ,
44008019	Ing'a nainche okobua oko , erinde ker'omonto ndabekere amaboko ane , anyore Omoika Omochenu .
44008020	Petero akamotebia , chifetha chiao chisirere are amo naye , ekiagera ogokaga ng'a ekeegwa kia Nyasaye igo gekonyorekana as'enibo ,
44008021	Tori amo gose tori nensemo ase ring'ana eri : naki omoyo oo tori omoronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
44008022	Gaki , onchoka as'obobe bwao obo , omosabe Omonene erinde , keranyarekatte , bwaberwe ebirengererio ebi bi'omoyo oo .
44008023	Naki nakororire nore nobororo buna endorwe , naende igore as'egesibo ki'obobe .
44008024	Simon akairaneria , agateba , Insabera inwe ase Nyasaye , tabaisa konyora amang'ana aya onsi mwateba .
44008025	Nabarabwo bagachia koborokia nakorirandia ring'ana ri'Omonene , bakairana Yerusalemu bakorandia enchili as'ebichie ebinge bi'Abasamaria ,
44008026	Rilaika ri'Omonene rigakwana na Filipo , rikamotebia , Manora ogende ensemo ya sugusu goika enchera eria egotirimboka korwa Yerusalemu ekogenda Gaza , naroro neroro .
44008027	Akaimoka , akagenda : erio rora , akamorora omonto Omoethiopia , omogomba , orenge nobonene inse ase Kandake eting'ana ya Ethiopia , obegetwe igoro as'enibo yaye yonsi , nere igachete Yerusalemu gosasima ;
44008028	ekero akoirana oikaransete egari yaye ogosoma ebuku y'omobani Isaya .
44008029	Omoika okamotebia Filipo , Ika ang'e negari eye , obwatane nero .
44008030	Nabo Filipo akagenda bwango , akamoigwa ogosoma ebuku y'omobani Isaya , akabora , Inee ! Kwayamanyire aya onsi ogosoma ?
44008031	Akamoiraneria , Naki ndakore imanye , omonto atantang'aneti ? Akamosorora Filipo arine aikaranse amo nere .
44008032	Naase'ay'amariko arenge gosoma nar'aya , Akairwa buna eng'ondi egochia konyenywa : Naende buna emanwa y'eng'ondi etari kwana as'obosio bwaye oria okoyenacha amarionya , Naboigo ere nere tamanorete omonwa oye :
44008033	As'ogwekeyia kwaye ekina kiaye gekarusigwa : Ning'o oranyare koorokia ekegori kiaye ? Naki obogima bwaye bwarusigwe as'ense ,
44008034	Oria omogomba akamoiraneria Filipo , Nagosabire , omobani oyo igagokwana amang'ana aya ase ng'o ? nasere omonyene , gose namang'ana omonto onde ?
44008035	Filipo akamanora omonwa oye , ogochakera ririko eri , akamoranderia amang'ana amaya a Yesu .
44008036	Bakaba bakogenderera nchera bagaika as'amache are : oria omogomba akabora , Inki kerantange timbatiswa ?
44008037	Filipo agateba , koranche as'omoyo oo bwonsi , mbuya . Akairaneria , agakwana , Namwanchire Omwana o Nyasaye ng'a nere Yesu Kristo ,
44008038	Agachika egari eria etenene : bagatirimboka bonsi babere as'amache , Filipo noria omogomba ; akamobatisa .
44008039	Erio , bagachia korwa as'amache , Omoika bw'Omonene okamotaboria Filipo : oria Omogomba tamorora naende , naki igagendete ore nomogoko :
44008040	Filipo akarorekana as'Azoto , nekero arenge goeta akarandia enchili as'emechie yonsi , goika agaika Kaisaria .
44009001	Korende Saulo , akamenta okoirokia nakorengereria kobaita aborokigwa b'Omonene , akamogendera omokuani omonene ,
44009002	akarigia amoe amarube ay'okogenda Damesiki , ayarikire ase chisunagogi , erinde gakorora abanto b'Enchera eye , abasacha gose abakungu , abasibe nakobareta Yerusalemu ,
44009003	Goika ekero arenge kogenda agaika ang'e na Damesiki ; erio mobosokano amasase akamomesera korwa igoro :
44009004	akagwa inse , akaigwa eriogi rikomotebia , Saulo , Saulo , naki okondosia ?
44009005	Akabora , Naye ng'o Omonene ? Agateba , Inche ninche Yesu kwarosirie aye :
44009006	korende tenena , osoe omochie , notebigwe ayarakogwenere gokora .
44009007	Nabanto bagendete amo nere , bagatenena bagakirakiri , bakarigwa eriogi , ko tibarora monto .
44009008	Saulo akaimoka korwa inse ; namaiso aye agachia koramokia tarora gento : bakamobwata okoboko bakamoreta goika Damesiki .
44009009	Akaba amatuko atato atari korora , nonya nkoria , nonya nkonywa .
44009010	Nabo narenge omworokigwa Damesiki , erieta riaye Anania ; Omonene akamotebia as'okorora , Anania , Akabora , Nao ndaa Omonene .
44009011	Omonene akamotebia , Imoka ogende enchera eria ekorokwa Endonge , origie ime as'enyomba ya Yudas omonto erieta riaye Saulo o Tariso : ekiagera nao are agosaba ;
44009012	nere omororire omonto erieta riaye Anania , ogosoa , okobeka amaboko igoro asare , anyare korora .
44009013	Korende Anania akairaneria , Omonene , naigure chingecho chi'omonto oyio as'abanto abange , amabe amange ayabakoreire abachenu bao Yerusalemu :
44009014	goika aiga igare nokobua as'abakuani abanene abasibe bonsi abagwatora erieta riao .
44009015	Korende Omonene akamotebia , Bwatia enchera : naki oyio negento egechore asende aribogorie erieta riane as'obosio bw'ebisaku , nabaruoti , nabana ba Isiraeli :
44009016	naki nimworokie amang'ana amange amanene ayaramogwenere gochandwa as'engecho y'erieta riane .
44009017	Anania akagenda , agasoa aria nyomba ime ; akamobekera amaboko akabora , Oyominto Saulo , Omonene ontomire , Yesu , ere oyokoorokerete as'enchera kware gochichera , onyare ktfrora naende , oichorwe n'Omoika Omochenu .
44009018	Erio kegima akagwa korwa amaiso aye buna amasabo , akanyora okorora ; agatenena , akabatiswa ;
44009019	akaria endagera , akanyora chinguru . Akaba agwo amatuko atai make amo naborokigwa barenge Damesiki .
44009020	Erio akamorandia Yesu ase chisunagogi , ng'a ere n'Omwana o Nyasaye .
44009021	Na bonsi abaigwete bagaichana , bagateba , Tari ere oyo orenge kobabwata abare gwatora erieta eri Yerusalemu ? Naiga ochire as'engecho eye , erinde abasibe nakobaira as'abakuani abanene ?
44009022	Saulo akamenta koba nechinguru , akabatantania Abayahudi bamenyete Damesiki , akaborokia ng'a oyo nere Kristo .
44009023	Goika amatuko amange agachia goeta Abayahudi bagakora ekina erinde bamoite :
44009024	korende ogotiana kwabo gokamanyekana na Saulo . Bakamoboera geita mobaso na botuko banyare komoita .
44009025	Aborokigwa baye bakamoimokia botuko bakamotirimbokia as'oruaki , bakamoikia as'egetonga ime .
44009026	Na Saulo agachia goika Yerusalemu agatema kobwatana naborokigwa : nabarabwo igo barenge komoiroka bonsi , tibanyara gwancha ng'a ere nomworokigwa .
44009027	Korende Barnaba akamoira , akamoreta as'abatomwa , akaborokereria buna amoroche Omonene nchera , naende ng'a nakwanete nere , na buna arandeti noboremu ase Damesiki as'erieta riaye Yesu .
44009028	Nere akaba amo nabarabwo ase Yerusalemu , ogosoa nagosoka .
44009029	Akarandia as'erieta riaye Yesu noboremu atari nobwoba : agakwana nakoamererania n'Abaelenesti ; nabarabwo bagatema komoita .
44009030	Korende ekero abamwabo bachia konyora amang'ana , bakamoira goika Kaisaria , bakamotoma gochia Tariso .
44009031	Erio ekanisa ekanyora omorembe ase Boyahudi yonsi na Galili na Samaria , bakaagacherwa , bakagenderera as'okoiroka kw'Omonene , nokoremia kw'Omoika Omochenu , bakanienteka .
44009032	Egachia koba Petero ekero arenge konagoetanana chinsemo chionsi akabatirimbokera abachenu bamenyete Ludda .
44009033	Akamorora omonto oyomo aria , erieta riaye Ainea , omonto oyio oraire ' borere emiaka etano netato : ekiagera arenge omokogotaru .
44009034	Petero akamotebia , Ainea , Yesu Kristo ogokonyire : imoka , bware oborere bwao . Erio kegima akaimoka .
44009035	Nabanto bonsi bamenyete Ludda na Saron bakamorora , bakamoonchokera Omonene .
44009036	Nomworokigwa oyomo orenge Yoppa , erieta riaye Tabitha ( engecho yaye Dorika , gose engabi : ) omokungu oyo igarenge oichire nogokora okuya nchiegwa ebiarenge korua .
44009037	Ekaba amatuko aria akarwara , agakwa : erio kabamosibirie , bakamobeka egoroba .
44009038	Ekiagera Ludda orenge ang'e na Yoppa , nabarabwo baigure ng'a Petero nao are aria , bagatoma abanto babere asare , komosorora tatebana gocha asebare .
44009039	Petero akaimoka akagenda nabarabwo . Agachia goika bakamoira egoroba igoro : ababoraka bonsi bagatenena ang'e nere bakorera , nakomworokia chiganchwa nechianga echiare gokora Tabitha ekero keria arenge amo nabarabwo .
44009040	Petero akabasokia bonsi , agatung'ama , agasaba ; origereretie gochia as'oborere , agakwana , Tabitha , imoka . Nere akaramokia amaiso aye , agachia komorora Petero akaboka agaikaransa .
44009041	Akamoa okoboko , akamoimokia ; goika ochia kobarangeria baria abachenu nababoraka , akamobeka as'obosio bwabo ore moyo .
44009042	Akamanyekana ase Yoppa , as'omochie omogima : abanto abange bakamwegena Omonene .
44009043	Goika Petero akamenya amatuko atai make agwo Yoppa , enyomba y'omonto oyomo , erieta riaye Simon , omorosia amao .
44010001	Narenge omonto Kaisaria erieta riaye Kornelio , omotang'ani bw'omoganda orekorokwa Ekeitaliano ,
44010002	omonto omuya , oyosigete Nyasaye , ere nenyomba yaye yonsi , nere igarenge kobaa abanto ebiegwa ebinge , nagosaba Nyasaye amatuko onsi .
44010003	Akarora as'okorora maiso marore , ekero gie chinsa kianda chia niobaso , rilaika ria Nyasaye rikamochera nakomotebia , Kornelio !
44010004	Akamorigereria mono , akairoka , agateba , Inki Omonene ? Akamotebia , Ogosaba kwao nebiegwa biao biaikire igoro nakoba okoinyoria as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
44010005	Gaki toma abanto Yoppa , omorangerie Simon okorokwa Petero :
44010006	Ere nomogeni bw'omonto oyomo , erieta riaye Simon , omoroisia amao , enyomba yaye ere engegu y'enyancha , nagotebie ayakogwenerete gokora .
44010007	Riria rilaika riakwanete nere agachia koimoka , Kornelio akarangeria abasomba babere b'enyomba yaye , nomosigari oyomo omosike , ase baria bare komokorera botambe ;
44010008	agachia gokora kobatebereria amang'ana onsi akabatoma , bakagenda Yoppa .
44010009	Goika rituko ria kabere , ekero barenge kogenda nagoika ang'e omochie , Petero akarina kerama igoro , gochia gosaba , ekero gie chinsa isano nemo chia mobaso :
44010010	akaba nenchara , akarigia koria : korende ekero barenge koroisia ang'e , omoika oye okairwa as'okorota , akaba buna oyokure ;
44010011	akarora igoro amanokire , negento gekomoikera buna egetambaa ekenene , gegotirimbokigwa ase chinsemo chiaye inye goika inse :
44010012	ime yaye ebisaku bionsi bie ching'iti chire namagoro ane , neching'iti chi'orosana , nachirochio echikwagura , nechinyoni chi'igoro .
44010013	Eriogi rikamochera , Imoka Petero ; onyenye orie .
44010014	Petero akabora , Yaya Omonene , naki tinanya koria nonya ng'ake egento ekebe gose ekere neubi .
44010015	Eriogi rikamochera eria kabere , Egiasibigwe na Nyasaye , tokeroka ekebe .
44010016	Ring'ana eri rigakoreka ara gatato : naende egento keria gekaimokigwa gochia igoro .
44010017	Goika Petero agachia korora ogwechanda ime as'omoyo oye , inki engecho yaye okorora okwo aroche , rora , baria abanto batometwe na Kornelio , kobarorire enyomba ya Simon , bagatenena obosio bw'egesieri ,
44010018	bakarangeria , bakoboria onye Simon okorokwa Petero nao amenyete imeo .
44010019	Nekero Petero are korengereria , okorora , okwo , Omoika okamotebia , Mbare abanto batato bakorigetie .
44010020	Imoka , oike , ogende nabarabwo , toba nogotiting'ara : naki inche nabareta .
44010021	Petero akabaikera baria abanto batometwe asare na Kornelio , agakwana , Inche nere oyo mokorigia . Igo mwacha as'engecho ki ?
44010022	Bagateba , Kornelio omotang'ani , omonto omonyene oboronge , omoiroki Nyasaye , ore nokobakwa okuya as'egesaku gionsi ki'Abayahudi , nakurerwa nerilaika richenu gotoma abanto asore ogende enyomba yaye anyare koigwa amang'ana ao .
44010023	Agateba , soa ; akabaroisia . Goika rituko ria kabere Petero akaimoka amo nabarabwo , nabande b'abamwabo bamenyete Yoppa bakagenda nere ,
44010024	Goika rituko ria kabere riaye bagasoa , Kaisaria . Na Kornelio igarenge obaganyete , konya osangereirie eamate yaye nabasani baye .
44010025	Petero ekero arenge gosoa , Kornelio agasoka komorotota , akamogwera amagoro , akamosasima .
44010026	Petero akamoimokia , agateba , Tenena ; inche nainche nomonto .
44010027	Nas'ogokwana nere agasoa , akarora abanto abange basangererekanire :
44010028	akabatebia , Mwamanyire ng'a tari boronge omonto ore Omoyahudi abwatane nomonto ore bw'egesaku kende , nonya nokomogendera ; korende Nyasaye nankanetie , timoroka monto onde bwonsi , oyo bw'eubi gose omobe .
44010029	As'engecho eyio ngacha konarangeretigwe tinanga , gaki nkoboriande , ing'ana ki eri mwandangerereti ?
44010030	Kornelio agakwana , Rero nerituko ria kane korwa ekero narenge nyeng'atete goika ensa eye ; nechinsa kianda igo narenge ngosaba nyomba mwane ; ani ! omonto nateneine as'obosio bwane , oyore nechianga chikomekameka ,
44010031	agateba , Kornelio , ogosaba kwao kwaigurwe , nebiegwa biao biainyoirwe as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
44010032	Gaki toma abanto gochia Yoppa , omorangerie Simon okorokwa Petero , ache aiga ; igakamenyete as'enyomba ya Simon , omoroisia amao ang'e nengegu , nere karache nakwane naye .
44010033	Erio ngatoma abanto asore , naye gwakorire buya gwachire . Na bono intwe twensi nao tore aiga as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , tonyare koyategerera amang'ana onsi gwatebetigwe na Nyasaye .
44010034	Petero akamonora omonwa oye , akabora , Ekeene natiekire komanya ng'a Nyasaye tari nagwanchereria :
44010035	korende ase ker'egesaku omonto omoirogetp nagokora oboronge igagwancherwa nere ,
44010036	Ring'ana riria eri abairerete abana ba Isiraeli , are korandia amang'ana amaya ay'omorembe ase Yesu Kristo ( nere Omonene o bonsi ) â
44010037	Ring'ana riria mwarimanyire , riagendereire ase Boyahudi yonsi , rigachakera Galili , nyuma y'ebatiso Yohana arandeti ;
44010038	Amang'ana a Yesu o Nazareti buna Nyasaye amobegete amaguta as'Omoika Omochenu nechinguru : nere agatara chinsemo ne chinsemo , ogokora emeremo emiya nakogwenia bonsi abaregetwe na saitani ; naki Nyasaye arenge amo nere .
44010039	Naintwe igotore abarori b'amang'ana onsi ayarenge gokora as'ense y'Abayahudi nase Yerusalemu ; ere bakamoita bakamosunga as'omote .
44010040	Oyo Nyasaye akamobokia rituko ria gatato akamwanchera kooroka .
44010041	Tari as'abanto bonsi , tatiga as'abarori abachoretwe na Nyasaye , nabwo intwe , twarenge koria na konywa amo nere nyuma as'okoboka kwaye .
44010042	Agatochika tobaranderie abanto na kobaorokeria ng'a oyo nere ochoretwe na Nyasaye abe omogambi bw'abare moyo , nabakure .
44010043	Oyo ababani bonsi bakamwatora , ng'a as'erieta riaye ker'oyoramwanche naegwe okorusigwa kw'ebibe .
44010044	Petero ekero arenge gokwana amang'ana aya Omoika Omochenu okabaikera bonsi abaigwete amang'ana aye .
44010045	Na baria abarogete abanchete , bagaichana , abanto bonsi abachete amo na Petero , ekiagera ebisaku nabarabwo baikeirwe nekeegwa ki'Omoika Omochenu .
44010046	Naki babaigwete bagokwana as'emenwa , bakamotogia Nyasaye . Erio Petero akabora ,
44010047	Omonto nanyare kobakania aba amache , tibabatiswa , abanyorire Omoika Omochenu koreng'ana buna intwe ?
44010048	Agachika babatiswe as'erieta riaye Yesu Kristo . Erio bakamosorora amente komenya amatuko atai make .
44011001	Nabo abatomwa nabaminto barenge ase Boyahudi bakanyora amang'ana ng'a abanto b'ebisaku nabarabwo baribwatire ring'ana ri'Omonene .
44011002	Na Petero agachia gotira kogenda Yerusalemu , baria abaroku bakaamererania nere , bagoteba ,
44011003	Ngwasoa as'abanto batarogeti , okaragera nabarabwo .
44011004	Petero agachaka kobatebereria as'okoroberia amang'ana , agateba ,
44011005	narenge as'omochie o Yoppa , ngosaba : omoika one okairwa as'okorora , nkarora egento buna egetambaa ekenene gegoika , gegotirimbokigwa korwa igoro ase chinsemo chiaye inye ; gekang'ikera :
44011006	ngakerigereria mono , nkorengereria , nkarora ching'iti chi'ense chi'amagoro ane neching'iti chi'orosana , nechio chikwagura , nechinyoni chi'igoro .
44011007	Nkaigwa eriogi rigontebia , Imoka Petero ; onyenye orie .
44011008	Ngateba yaya , Omonene , naki egento ki'eubi gose ekere ekebe tikianyagosoa omonwa one ime .
44011009	Eriogi rikang'iraneria ara kabere korwa igoro , Ebiasibirie Nyasaye , tobiroka aye ebibe .
44011010	Ring'ana rigakoreka ara gatato : naende ebinto bionsi bikang'uswa gochia igoro .
44011011	Ani , erio agwo abanto batato mbateneine as'obosio bw'enyomba eria narenge ime , abatometwe asende korwa Kaisaria .
44011012	Omoika ogantebia ngende nabarabwo timbaisa koba nogotiting'ara . Nabaminto aba batano nomo nabarabwo bakagenda amo nainche , togasoa as'enyomba y'omonto oria :
44011013	agatworokia buna aroche rilaika riteneine mwaye , nakomotebia , Toma abanto kogenda Yoppa omorangerie Simon , okorokwa Petero ;
44011014	oyoragotebie amang'ana naro oratorigwe naro , aye nenyomba yao yonsi .
44011015	Ekaba ekero nachagete gokwana , Omoika Omochenu okabaikera buna otoikerete intwe omochakano .
44011016	Nkarinyora ring'ana riria ri'Omonene , buna atebete , Yohana igabatisete as'amache , korende inwe namobatiswe as'Omoika Omochenu .
44011017	Gaki onye Nyasaye obaeire barabwo ekeegwa keria keria atoete intwe , abatwamwanchete omonene Yesu Kristo , ninche ng'o ndanyare komotanga Nyasaye ?
44011018	Bagachia koigwa amang'ana aya bagakira , bakamotogia Nyasaye , bagoteba , Gaki , Nyasaye obancheire ebisaku nabarabwo okoonchoka gokoreta obogima .
44011019	Naboigo baria batananegete as'engecho y'emechando eria yabete as'amang'ana a Stefano , bakagenda goika Foiniki na Kupro , na Antiokia , tibarirandia riria ring'ana tatiga as'Abayahudi boka .
44011020	Na gati yabo mbarenge abanto ba Kupro na Kurene , nabarabwo bagachia goika Antiokia , bagakwana n'Abaelenesti , bakarandia amang'ana amaya Omonene Yesu .
44011021	Okoboko kw'Omonene gokaba amo nabarabwo : abanto abange bagancha , bakamoonchokera Omonene .
44011022	Amang'ana ayio ay'abanto abwo , agaika amato ekanisa yarenge ase Yerusalemu : bakamotoma Barnaba , agende goika Antiokia :
44011023	nere agachia goika nakorora obuya bwa Nyasaye akagoka ; akabasorora bonsi babwatane n'Omonene as'okorigia kw'omoyo .
44011024	Naki igarenge omonto omuya oichoretwe n'Omoika Omochenu nokwegena : abanto abange bakebeka ensemo y'Omonene .
44011025	Barnaba akarua agwo akagenda Tarso komorigia Saulo :
44011026	goika agachia komorora akamoreta Antiokia . Gekaba egeka ki'omwaka omogima bagasangererekana amo nekanisa nakoborokereria abanto abange . Naborokigwa agwo Antiokia nao batang'anete korokwa Abakristo .
44011027	Amatuko ayio ababani bagatirimboka korwa Yerusalemu goika Antiokia .
44011028	Agatenena oyomo obo erieta riaye Agabo , akorokia as'okobua kw'Omoika Omochenu ng'a enchara enene nechiche ang'e as'ense engima : nero ekaba as'amatuko a Klaudio Kaisari .
44011029	Nabaria aborokigwa , ker'omonto koreng'ana buna okonyara kwaye , bakang'ea gotoma ogokonywa as'abamwabo bamenyete Boyahudi :
44011030	bagakora bo , bakabatomera abagaka as'amaboko a Barnaba na Saulo .
44012001	Nabo as'engaki eria Herode omoruoti akarambora amaboko aye kobachanda mono abanto b'ekanisa .
44012002	Akamoita Yakobo oyomwabo Yohana as'omoro .
44012003	Erio karora ng'a abagweneire Abayahudi agachiererera akamobwata Petero nere . Amatuko ayio naro amatuko emegati etabekiri memera .
44012004	Ochia komobwata akamobeka echela ime , akamobeka amaboko abasigari bane bane , bamorende ; akarigia nyuma y'epasaka amosokie as'obosio bw'abanto .
44012005	Nabo Petero akarendwa echela ime , ogosaba gokaba ngokorekakore as'omokia mono nekanisa as'obosio bwa Nyasaye as ' engecho yaye .
44012006	Goika ekero Herode achia korigia komosokia , obotuko boria boria Petero igarenge oraire gati as'abasigari babere , osibire nebinyuri bibere : abarendi as'obosio bw'egesieri bakarenda echela .
44012007	Erio rilaika ri'Omonene rigatenena ang'e nere , amasase akamoreka nyomba ime : akamoaka Petero rikere riaye , akamotura , ogoteba , Imoka bwango . Ebinyuri bigasansoka korwa as'amaboko aye .
44012008	Rilaika rikamotebia , Eboyie , beka ebikoroto . Agakora boigo . Akamotebia , Beka eanga yao , ontunyane .
44012009	Agasoka , akamotunyana ; gose tamanyete ng'a namang'ana ay'ekeene ayakoregete ne rilaika , korende agakaga ng'a nokorota arorire .
44012010	Bachia goetania okorenda kwe ritang'ani nogwa kabere , bagachia goika egesieri gi'ekioma kegosoera omochie ime ; gekabaigokera : bagasoka , bagaeta as'enchera eyemo erio rilaika rikamotiga .
44012011	Goika Petero ochia komanya , agateba . Bono namanyire bori ng'a Omonene otomire rilaika riaye nakondusia as'okoboko kwa Herode , nokoganya kw'egesaku ki'Abayahudi .
44012012	Erio gakoyarengereria aya , agaika enyomba ya Mariamu ng'ina Yohana , erieta riaye ria kabere Mariko ; nabanto abange nao basangererekanete bagosaba .
44012013	Na Petero agachia gotura egesieri gia geita , omoiseke erieta riaye Roda , agacha koigwa .
44012014	Agachia komanya eriogi ria Petero , takeigora egesieri as'omogoko , korende akaminyoka chimbero , agasoa ime akabatebia ng'a Petero ngesieri ateneine .
44012015	Bakamotebia , Nebarimo ore . Korende akaamereria mono ogoteba ng'a naboigo are . Bagakwana , ne rilaika riaye .
44012016	Petero akaba okonagokong'onta : goika bagachia komoigorera bakamorora , bagakumia .
44012017	Nere akabakania nokoboko bakire , akaborokia buna Omonene amosokia korwa echela ime . Akabora , Genda momworokie Yakobo nabaminto amang'ana aya . Akaimoka akagenda ensemo ende .
44012018	Goika bogachia gokia abasigari bagasogwa nomoondoko omonge , naki Petero abete .
44012019	Na Herode agachia komorigia , tamorora , akababoria abarendi , agachika baitwe . Nere agatirimboka korwa Boyahudi kogenda Kaisaria , akamenya aroro .
44012020	Nere Herode nababeete mono abanto ba Turo na Sidon : bakamochiera as'omoyo oyomo , erio kobakorire obosani na Blasto , oienge korenda enyomba y'Omoruoti y'okorara , bakarigia omorembe , ekiagera ense yabo igo yare konyora endagera as'ense y'omoruoti ,
44012021	Erio rigaika rituko erimo ribekire , Herode akeboa chianga chi'oboruoti , agaikaransa as'ekerogo ki'obonene , agakwana nechinguru .
44012022	Abanto bakaaka eriogi , bagokwana , Neriogi ria nyasaye , tari eriogi ri'omonto .
44012023	Bwango rilaika ri'Omonene rikamoaka , ekiagera ataete Nyasaye obonene : akaregwa namakonde , agatwekamo ,
44012024	Ring'ana ri'Omonene rikamenta kogenderera .
44012025	Na Barnaba na Saulo , bagachia gokora goikerania obosomba bwabo , bakairana Yerusalemu bakamoirana amo nabarabwo Yohana ore korokwa Mariko .
44013001	Naria Antiokia as'ekanisa mbarenge aroro ababani naborokia , Barnaba na Sumeon okorokwa Niger , na Lukio Omokurene , naManaen oyorenge oyomwabo as'okogonkigwa amo na Herode omoruoti , na Saulo .
44013002	Naboigo abaiga ekero barenge komokorera Omonene na kweng'ata , Omoika Omochenu ogateba , Ndusananeria Barnaba na Saulo as'emeremo eria nabarangereretie .
44013003	Erio , kobakorire ogosaba nokweng'ata , bakabeka amaboko abo igoro asebare , bakabatiga bagende .
44013004	Nabo abanto abwo kobairwa n'Omoika Omochenu bagatirimbokera Selukia ; na korwa agwo bagaeta enyancha goika Kupro .
44013005	Nekero barenge Salamini , bakarirandia ring'ana ri'Omonene ase chisunagogi chi'Abayahudi : nabarabwo igo barenge na Yohana okobakorera .
44013006	Bagachia gokora goeta egati gati y'egesinka gionsi goika Pafo , bakarora omonto oyomo , omorogi , omobani bw'oborimo , Omoyahudi erieta riaye BarYesu ;
44013007	omonto oyo igarenge amo nomogambi Serigio Paulo , omonto omonyene obong'aini . Ere akabarangeria Barnaba na Saulo bache asare , akarigia koigwa ring'ana ria Nyasaye .
44013008	Korende Eluma oria omorogi ( nero engecho y'okoonchora kw'erieta riaye ) akaamererania nabarabwo , akarigia komobeka omogambi oria omoyo bw'ogotiga okwegena .
44013009	Korende Saulo , ere nere Paulo , agaichorwa n'Omoika Omochenu , akamotogoreria amaiso , agakwana ,
44013010	Aye oichire obong'ainereria , nobobe bwonsi , omwana o saitani , omobisa bw'oboronge bwonsi , torigeti gotiga gochikora bogeka chinchera chi'Omonene chire boronge ?
44013011	Bono , rora okoboko kw'Omonene igakore igoro asore , naye nobe omouko , torora erioba as'egeka egeke . Erio kegima orotutu rokamobwata nomosunte ; agatabataba komorigia omonto amobwate okoboko , na komoraa .
44013012	Erio omogambi agachia koyarora ayakoreka , akegena , agakumia okworokereria kw'Omonene .
44013013	Erio Paulo nabamwabo bakamanoria obwato bakarua Pafo , bagaika Perga ase Pamfulia : Yohana akabatiga akairana Yerusalemu .
44013014	Korende barabwo bakarua Perga , bagaeta egati y'ense bagaika Antiokia , omochie o Pisidia ; bagasoa ase esunagogi rituko ri'esabato , bagaikaransa .
44013015	Erio nyuma kamariko asomirwe nebuku y'ababani , abanene b'esunagogi bagatoma omonto asebare , nakobatebia , Baminto onye more nering'ana rikobagwenera abanto aba , rikwane .
44013016	Paulo agatenena akabaramborera okoboko , agakwana , Inwe abasacha ba Isiraeli , nainwe aba moirogete Nyasaye , tegerera .
44013017	Nyasaye bw'abanto abaiga Isiraeli nabachorete abatata baito , akabaimokereria igoro abanto , ekero bamenyete buna abageni as'ense ya Misiri , nas'okoboko kwaimokereretigwe akabarusiao , akabaraa ,
44013018	negeka ki'emiaka emerongo ene akaremereria nabarabwo as'eroro .
44013019	Agachia kobisiria ebisaku bitano nabibere as'ense ya Kanani , akabaa ense yabo ebe omwando , as'ekero ki'emiaka chimia inye namerongo etano .
44013020	Nyuma as'aya akabaa abagambi goika ekero gia Samweli .
44013021	Nyuma yaye bagasaba koegwa omoruoti : Nyasaye akabaa Saulo omwana o Kishi , omonto bw'egesaku kia Benjamini , as'egeka ki'emiaka emerongo ene .
44013022	Naende agachia komorusia oyio , akaimokereria Daudi igoro abe omoruoti obo : akamoorokia ogoteba , Namororire Daudi omwana o Yese , nomonto nyanchete oranyare gokora obwanchani bwane bwonsi .
44013023	As'oroiboro rwaye omonto oyio Nyasaye obareteire Abaisiraeli omokonyi , nere Yesu , buna ariete eira ,
44013024	Yohana konya obarandeirie abanto bonsi ba Isiraeli engecho y'ebatiso y'okoonchoka ritang'ani ri'ogocha kwaye .
44013025	Nere Yohana ekero arenge gokora orogendo rwaye nakwanete , Igo mogonkaga ng'a inche ng'o ? Inche tari ere . Korende , rigereria ngochare oyomo nyuma yane ere inche tinkogwenera komwororoberia ebikoroto bi'amagoro aye .
44013026	Abaminto , abana b'ororeria bw'Ibrahimu , nasemore abamomoirogete Nyasaye , asetore intwe ring'ana ri'ogokonyeka oko riatomirwe .
44013027	Naki abamenyete Yerusalemu nabanene babo , efeiagera tibamomanyete , nonya namariogi ay'ababani bare gosomwa ker'esabato , bayaikeranirie as'okomokanera .
44013028	Nonya tibanyorete enchera y'okomoita , bakamosaba Pilato aitwe .
44013029	Goika bagachia gokora onsi ayarikeretwe , bakamoikia korwa as'omote , bakamobeka embera .
44013030	Korende Nyasaye akamobokia korwa as'amakweri .
44013031	Akarorwa amatuko amange nabarabwo abare gotira nere korwa Galili goika Yerusalemu , nabwo mbarabwo bare abarori baye as'obosio bw'abanto bonsi .
44013032	Naintwe nkobaranderiatore eira eria baetwe abatata baito ,
44013033	buna Nyasaye atoisaneirie intwe abana babo eira eyio , as'okomobokia Yesu , buna arigetwe ase Zaburi ya kabere , Aye naye Omwana one , inche rero nakoiboire .
44013034	Naende ng'a igamobogeti korwa as'amakweri , tanyara koirana as'ogosareka , okwanire iga , Ninkoe aye chingecho chi'obochenu bwa Daudi chire chi'ogwancha .
44013035	As'ayio okwanire naende ase Zaburi ende , Tokomotiga Omochenu Oo korora ogosareka .
44013036	Naki Daudi , gatiekire gokorera ekina kia Nyasaye as'ekegori kiaye , nararete , akabekwa amo nabaise baye , akarora ogosareka .
44013037	Korende oyo obogetigwe na Nyasaye tarora ogosareka .
44013038	Naboigo , amanyekane asemore , baminto , ng'a as'oyo igomokoranderigwa okorusigwa kw'ebibe :
44013039	nas'oyo ker'oyoramwanche igakobarwa ng'a tari nabobe as'amang'ana aria atakpnyara kobarwa ng'a nare nobobeas'amariko a Musa .
44013040	Gaki , erende , tabaisa kobaikera amang'ana aria akwanetwe as'ababani ;
44013041	Rigereria inwe , abamochayete , moichane , mosire ; Naki nakorire emeremo inche amatuko aino , Emeremo motancheti nonya ng'ake , omonto naisa kobaorokeria .
44013042	Nekero barenge korwa as'esunagogi y'Abayahudi , abanto b'ebisaku bakabasoroia , kobatebia amang'ana aya esabato ya kabere .
44013043	Esunagogi egachia gwatananekana , Abayahudi abange naborokigwa abaya bakabwatana na Paulo na Barnaba : nabarabwo bagakwana nabarabwo , bakababeka omoyo bw'ogoikaransa as'obuya bwa Nyasaye .
44013044	Goika esabato ya kabere abanto abange , ang'e omochie bwonsi , bagasangererekana barigwe ring'ana ria Nyasaye .
44013045	Korende Abayahudi , bagachia korora omosangererekano , bagaichorwa neribero , bakayakana amang'ana are gokwanwa na Paulo , bakarama ,
44013046	Paulo na Barnaba bagakwana as'oboremu bagotcha , Igare ng'a negwenerete ring'ana ria Nyasaye rikwanwe asemore ritang'ani . Korende ekiagera mwarisukeirie are , gose timwerochi abanyene ng'a mogwenerete obogima bwa kare nakare , rigereria , twaonchokeire ebisaku .
44013047	As'engecho eye naboigo twachigetwe n'Omonene , ng'a Nakobekire obe omobaso bw'ebisaku , Onyare koba ogokonyeka goika omoerio bw'ense .
44013048	Ebisaku bagachia koigwa ayio bakagoka , bakaribaka ring'ana ri'Omonene : nabarabwo abarenge abachikeretwe obogima bwa kare nakare bagancha .
44013049	Ring'ana ri'Omonene rikaranda as'ense eria yonsi .
44013050	Korende Abayahudi bakabeka ogwatananeka as'abakungu abaya nabanto abanyene ogosika , nabanene b'omochie , bakagenka abanto babarosie Paulo na Barnaba ; bakabarusia korwa ase chimbebe chiabo .
44013051	Nabarabwo bakabakong'ontera orotu rw'amagoro abo , bakagenda Ikonio .
44013052	Naborokigwa bagaichorwa nomogoko n'Omoika Omochenu .
44014001	Ekaba agwo Ikonio bagasoa amo as'esunagogi y'Abayahudi bagakwana , goika omoganda omonene bw'Abayahudi n'Abayunani bagancha .
44014002	Korende Abayahudi batanchete bagasaria emioyo y'abanto b'ebisaku nakobabeka omoyo omobe igoro as'abaminto .
44014003	Naboigo bakamenya agwo egeka ekenene , bagokwana as'oboremu as'Omonene , orenge koriorokia ring'ana ri'obuya bwaye , ore kobanchera ebikone nogokumia bikoreke as'amaboko abo .
44014004	Korende omosangererekano bw'abanto b'omochie ogatananekana ; abaiga iga barenge ensemo y'Abayahudi nabaiga ensemo y'abatomwa ,
44014005	Goika gokaoroka okong'orerwa kw'abanto b'ebisaku n'Abayahudi amo nabanene babo igoro yabo , kobakorera amabe nakobaaka amagena ,
44014006	erio bakanyora amang'ana , bagatamera emechie ya Lukania , Lustra na Derbe , nechinse chiarenge chinsemo chinsemo : '
44014007	bakamenya aroro bakoyerandia enchili .
44014008	Nagwo Lustra narenge omonto oyomo , okwete amagoro , ekerema korwa enda ya ng'ina , ere tanyakogenda nonya ng'ake .
44014009	Omonto oyio akamoigwa Paulo kagokwana ; nere akamobeta amaiso akarora ng'a nare nokwegena gw'okogwenigwa ,
44014010	agakwana as'eriogi rinene , Tenena as'amagoro ao boronge . Agatenena bwango akagenda .
44014011	Nemeganda egachia korora ayakora Paulo , bakaaka amariogi abo , bagokwana as'Ekelukania , chinyasaye chiatoikeire as'emegwekano ya mwanyabanto .
44014012	Bakamoroka Barnaba Zeu ; na Paulo Herme , naki nere orenge omonene as'ogokwana .
44014013	Omokuani o Zeu ere hekalu yaye yarenge as'obosio bw'omochie , akareta chiombe negutwa y'ebisicha goika ebiita , akarigia korua ekeng'wanso amo nemeganda .
44014014	Korende abatomwa Barnaba na Paulo , bagachia konyora amang'ana , bagatandora chianga chiabo , bakagenda bwango , bagasoa as'emeganda , bakaaka egeturi ,
44014015	bagoteba , Obe abanene , naseki mogokora aya ? Intwe naintwe igotore abanto koreng'ana buna inwe , twabarandeirie amang'ana are amaya , moonchoke nagotiga chingecho echi chi'obokayayu na komoonchokera Nyasaye ore moyo , oyotongete igoro nense nenyancha , nebinto bionsi bire imeo :
44014016	kare as'ebiro biaetire igabatigete ebisaku bionsi batare ase chinchera chiabo abanyene .
44014017	Korende tetigete atarenge na birori ekiagera are gokora amaya , arekobaa embura korwa igoro , nechingaki chie rigesa , akabaichoria emioyo yaino endagera nomogoko .
44014018	Nas'amang'ana aya bakabatanga emeganda as'emechando , tibabaruseria ebing'wanso ,
44014019	Korende bagaika Abayahudi korwa Antiokia na Ikonia : bakayegenka emeganda goika bakamoaka Paulo amagena , bakamokurura gochia isiko as'omochie , bagakaga ngra okure .
44014020	Korende ekero aborokigwa bamoetanaine chinsemo chionsi , agatenena , agasoa omochie ime : ne rituko ria kabere riaye agasoka akagenda amo na Barnaba goika Derbe .
44014021	Goika bachia gokora koyerandia enchili as'omochie oria , nakonyora aborokigwa abange , bakairana goika Lustra na Ikonio na Antiokia ,
44014022	bakobeka chinguru chinkoro chi'aborokigwa nakoborokereria baikaranse as'okwegena , naende ng'a netogwenerete gosoa as'obonda bwa Nyasaye as'enchera y'emechando emenge .
44014023	Erio kobachorire abagaka ase ker'ekanisa nagosaba amo nakweng'ata , bakababeka as ' amaboko Omonene , oyo begenete .
44014024	Bagaeta gati ya Pisidia , bagasoa Pamfulia .
44014025	Na nyuma y'okorandia ase Perga , bagatirimboka goika Atalia ;
44014026	Na korwa agwo bagaetera enyancha kogenda Antiokia , Agwo nao basaberetwe obuya bwa Nyasaye as'emeremo eria banyarete goikerania ,
44014027	Goika bagachia goika , bagasangereria ekanisa , bakaborokia amang'ana onsi ayakorire Nyasaye amo nabarabwo , buna abaigoreire ebisaku egesieri gi'okwegena .
44014028	Bakaba agwo egeka getai geke amo naborokigwa .
44015001	Bagaika abanto baruete Boyahudi bakaborokereria abaminto ng'a , Motarogeti nagotunyana chingecho chia Musa , timokonyara gokonyeka ,
44015002	erio nyuma Paulo na Barnaba kobaamereranirie nabanto aba nakoborania nabarabwo mono . Abaminto bagachika ng'a Paulo na Barnaba nabande korwa egati yabo , batire kogenda Yerusalemu as'abatomwa nabagaka as'engecho y'okoboria okwo .
44015003	Erio bakairwa nekanisa bagaeta gati as'ense ya Foiniki na Samaria , bakorandia amang'ana okoonchoka kwabo ebisaku ; bakabagokia abaminto mono .
44015004	Bagachia goika Yerusalemu , bakaroisigwa nekanisa nabatomwa nabagaka , nabarabwo bakaborokia amang'ana onsi Nyasaye akorete amo nabarabwo .
44015005	Korende egati y'ensemo y'Abafarisai , abwo begenete bagatenena , bagateba , Negwenerete kobarokia nakobachika kobwata amachiko a Musa .
44015006	Abatomwa nabagaka bagasangererekana banyare korengereria ring'ana erio .
44015007	Na nyuma as'okoboria okonge Petero agatenena , akabatebia , Abaminto , inwe mwamanyire ng'a amatuko aye ritang'ani Nyasaye nachorete korwa asetore , ebisaku baribwate ring'ana ri'enchili korwa as'omonwa one , nakoriancha .
44015008	Na Nyasaye , omanyete chinkoro chi'abanto akabaorokeria , akabaa Omoika Omochenu koreng'ana buna atoete intwe ;
44015009	gose takorete gwatananekana egati yaito nabarabwo , akabasibia chinkoro mo , kobachora abanto , nakobatoma asemore amo nabanchwa baito Barnaba na Paulo ,
44015026	abanto babekire obogima bwabo as'engecho y'erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
44015027	As'ayio twabatomire Yudas na Sila , abaranyare kobatebia amang'ana ayio ayio as'emenwa yabo .
44015028	Ekiagera namogwenera Omoika Omochenu naintwe , titobatweka egurube tatiga eyio eyere boronge ;
44015029	mweatanane nabinto birure ebing'wanso ase chisanamu , namanyinga , neching'iti ching'entire , nobonyaka , kamoretange nayio namokore buya . Morare buya .
44015030	Erio baria ekero baegwa ribaga bagatirimbokera Antiokia ; nekero babasangereria omoganda bwonsi bakabaa rirube riria .
44015031	Bakarisoma , bakagoka as'engecho y'ogokonywa koria .
44015032	Naende Yudas na Sila ekiagera barabwo nababani barenge , bakabaremia emioyo abaminto as'amang'ana amange , bakabakong'ia .
44015033	Nabarabwo erio bamenya agwo egeka getai geke , bakaegwa ribaga , nabaminto bagende as'omorembe ase baria babatomete .
44015034	Korende Sila akarora buya komenya aroro ,
44015035	Paulo na Barnaba bakamenya agwo Antiokia , bakworokereria nakorirandia ring'ana ri'Omonene , amo nabanto bande abange .
44015036	Erio nyuma as'amatuko atai make Paulo akamotebia Barnaba , Imoka ! toirane bono , tobarore abaminto ase ker'omochie twarirandirie ring'ana ri'Omonene , gose mbuya bare .
44015037	Barnaba akarigia komobogoria Yohana orenge korokwa Mariko amo nabarabwo .
44015038	Korende Paulo tarora buya komoira oyio obatigete aaria Pamfulia , tagenda nabarabwo gokora emeremo eria .
44015039	Erio agasoka amang'ana ay'eriomana egati yabo goika bagatananekana ; Barnaba akamoira Mariko agasoa obwato kogenda Kupro ;
44015040	Paulo akamochora Sila , akaimoka , agasaberwa na baria abaminto , aegwe obuya bwa Nyasaye .
44015041	Agaeta ase Shami na Kilikia , akaremia chikanisa .
44016001	Agaika Derbe na Lustra : nagwo narengeo omworokigwa oyomo erieta riaye Timotheo , omwana bw'omokungu oyomo Omoyahudi oyobwegenete ; korende ise igarenge Omoyunani .
44016002	Omonto oyio natoretwe buya nabaminto bamenyete Lustra na Ikonia .
44016003	Paulo akamorigia oyo agende nere ; akamoira , akamosara as'engecho y'Abayahudi barenge aroro chinsemo chiria : naki bonsi mbamanyete ng'a ise n'Omoyunani .
44016004	Nabo ekero barenge goeta enchera yabo as'egati y'emechie eria , bakabaa amachiko aria ayachigetwe nabatomwa nabagaka barenge Yerusalemu erinde bayabwate .
44016005	Chikanisa chikabekwa chinguru as'okwegena , okobara kwabo gokamenteka kera rituko .
44016006	Bagaeta as'ense ya Furugia na Galatia , bagakanigwa n'Omoika Omochenu , tibarirandia ring'ana as'Asia ;
44016007	bagachia goika kororia Alusia , bagatema kogenda Bithunia ; korende Omoika o Yesu tobaa ribaga ;
44016008	bagaeta Musia bagatirimbokera Teroa .
44016009	Paulo akaorokerwa nokorora botuko ; akamorora omonto o Makedonia oteneine , okomosorora , okomotebia , Amboka oche Makedonia otokonye .
44016010	Naboigo gachia korora okorota koria , erio tokarigia koimoka kogenda Makedonia , ekiagera twaroche ekeene ng'a Nyasaye otorangeirie tabaranderie enchili .
44016011	Tokamanoria obwato korwa Teroa tokagenda boronge goika Samothraki , rituko ria kabere togaika Neapoli ;
44016012	na korwa agwo togaika Filipi , omochie o Makedonia , omochie ore omonene as'ensemo yabo , nero nense y'obogambi bw'Abarumi : takaba as'omochie oyo , togaikaransa amatuko atai make .
44016013	Ase rituko ri'esabato togasoka isiko ase geita , tokagenda ensemo as'oroche , togakaga ng'a nar'aroro aase ogosaba ; togaikaransa , togakwana nabakungu basangererekanete aria .
44016014	Omokungu oyomo erieta riaye Ludia orenge omoonia erangi emonyinga oyo bw'ense ya Thuatira , omosasimi Nyasaye , agatotegerera : enkoro yaye oyo ekaigorwa n'Omonene ayarore amang'ana aregokwanwa na Paulo .
44016015	Goika ochia kobatiswa , ere nenyomba yaye , agatosorora , ogoteba , Onye mwandorire ng'a nomwegeni nde as'Omonene , soa nyomba mwane moikaranse . Agatobetererie .
44016016	Egachia koba ekero twarenge kogenda aase aria as'ogosabera , omoiseke oyomo orenge nekerecha gi'okoorokia , agatonyora , orenge kobanyorera abanene baye enibo enyinge , as'oboragori .
44016017	Akamotunyana Paulo naintwe , okoaka eriogi , ogoteba , Abanto aba nabasomba ba Nyasaye Ore Igoro , abakobaranderia enchera y'ogokonyeka .
44016018	Akanagokora ayio amatuko amange . Korende Paulo akabea , ageonchora akamotebia ekerecha keria , Nagochikire as'erieta ria Yesu Kristo , morue oyo . Akamorua ensa eria eria .
44016019	Erio abanene baye bagachia korora ng'a ogosemeria kw'enibo yabo gwasirire , bakababwata Paulo na Sila , bakabakurura goika echiro as'obosio bw'abagambi b'omochie ;
44016020	bakabaira as'abagambi , bagateba , Abanto aba basaririe omochie oito , nabarabwo n'Abayahudi .
44016021	Naende igo bakorandia chingecho chi tari chia boronge asetore ng'a tochibwate , nonya nogochitunyana , ekiagera intwe n'Abarumi tore ,
44016022	Emeganda yonsi ekaimoka bakabachiera : abagambi bakabarusia chianga chiabo nechinguru , bakarua ogochika baakwe nechinyimbo .
44016023	Bagachia kobaaka okoakwa okonge bakabaruta echela ime , bakamochika omorendi bw'echela abarende mono .
44016024	Nere ochia konyora ogochika oko akabaruta as'akanyomba kaime , akabasiba amagoro ase chingatare .
44016025	Korende ekero ki'obotuko bw'ekeigoro Paulo na Sila igo barenge konakomosaba Nyasaye nakomoterera ogotera gw'okomotogia , nabasibwa bande igo barenge bagotegerera .
44016026	Mobosokano okaba omotengecho omonene bw'ense , goika oboroso bw'echela bogatengecha : erio bwango ebisieri bikaigoka ; chisibo bi'abanto bonsi bigasansoka .
44016027	Oria omorendi bw'echela akaboka , akarora ng'a ebisieri bi'echela biaigokire , akang'usa omoyio oye , akarigia gweita , agakaga ng'a abasibwa batamire .
44016028	Paulo akaaka eriogi rinene , agateba , Tibweita , naki intwe twensi nao tore aa .
44016029	Akarigia chitaya chiretwe , akarindoka gochia ime , okoiguswa as'omoondoko , akabagwera amagoro Paulo na Sila ;
44016030	akabareta isiko agateba , Abanene bane inki ndakore ntoreke ?
44016031	Bakamotebia , Mwanche Omonene Yesu Kristo , naye notoreke amo nenyomba yao .
44016032	Bakamotebia ring'ana ri'Omonene , ere nabanto bonsi barenge mwaye .
44016033	Akabaroisia ensa eria eria ya botuko , akabasibia chingoma chiabo , akabatiswa , ere nabanto bonsi ba mwaye ekero ekio .
44016034	Akabareta enyomba ime , akabarageria , akagoka mono , ere nenyomba yaye yonsi ekiagera konyora omwanchire Nyasaye .
44016035	Bogachia gokia abagambi bakabatoma abanene b'abasigari bagoteba , Batige abanto baria bagende ,
44016036	Oria omorendi bw'echela akaborokia Paulo amang'ana aya ng'a abagambi batomire abanto kobasibora : gaki bono , soka isiko , genda nomorembe .
44016037	Paulo akabatebia , Bagatosusura as'amaiso abanto bonsi , bataratogambia kina , naintwe n'Abarumi tore , naende bagatoruta echela ime ; na bono barigetie gotosokia bobisi ? yaya , tari bo ; tiga bache abanyene batosokie .
44016038	Abanene b'abasigari bakaborokia abagambi amang'ana aya : nabarabwo bakairoka ekero baigwa ng'a n'Abarumi :
44016039	bagacha bakabasorora ; erio babasokirie isiko bakabasaba basoke korwa omochie oria .
44016040	Nabarabwo bagasoka korwa echela , bagasoa enyomba ya Ludia ; bagachia kobarora abamwabo bakabaremia , bakagenda .
44017001	Erio bachia goeta egati y'Amfipoli na Apolonia bagaika Thesaloniki , naroro yarengeo esunagogi y'Abayahudi ;
44017002	na Paulo buna engecho yaye yarenge , agasoa aria ime ase barenge , akaamererania nabarabwo as'amang'ana amariko chisabato isato ,
44017003	okoborokereria nakobatebia ng'a nemogwenerete Kristo achandwe , nakoboka korwa as'amakweri ; naende ng'a Yesu oyo nkoborokia inwe amang'ana aye , nere Kristo ,
44017004	Abande bagancha , bakabwatana na Paulo na Sila ; n'Abayunani bamosigete Nyasaye abange mono , nabakungu bare nogosikwa batai bake .
44017005	N'Abayahudi abatanchete bakaba neribero , bakang'usa abanto batai bake korwa as'abanto ababe batari nogosikwa , bagasangereria omoganda , bagakora riroroche as'omochie ; bakabachiera abanto b'enyomba ya Yasoni , bakarigia kobaira as'obosio bw'abanto b'omochie ,
44017006	Ekero batabanyora , bakamokurura Yasoni nabande as'abaminto gochia as'obosio bw'abanene b'omochie , bakoaka eriogi , bagoteba , Abanto aba baonchoranire ense baikire nonya naa ;
44017007	Yasoni akabaroisia , naba bonsi igo bagokora chingecho chitari amo nogochika gwa Kaisari , bateba ng'a omoruoti onde nare , okorokwa Yesu .
44017008	Bakabaichania omoganda oria nabanene b'omochie , kobachia koyaigwa ayio .
44017009	Nabarabwo kobaruseria ekebwate giantenenera Yasoni nabamwabo , bakabatiga bagende ,
44017010	Erio abaminto bakabatoma Paulo na Sila botuko goika Beroya : bagachia goika aaria bagasoa as'esunagogi y'Abayahudi .
44017011	Abanto aba igo barenge abaya kobua baria ba Thesaloniki , ekiagera baribwatete ring'ana as'obwanchani bw'omoyo , bare korigarigia amariko barore gose amang'ana ayio nab'are .
44017012	Abanto abange bagancha korua asebare ; nabarabwo abakungu b'Abayunani abanyene ogosikwa , nabasacha batai bake .
44017013	Korende Abayahudi ba Thesaloniki bagachia konyora amang'ana ng'a ring'ana ria Nyasaye riarandigwe na Paulo ase Beroya , bakagenda aroro , bagasaria emeganda .
44017014	Erio agwo baria abaminto bakamotoma Paulo agende buna igakogenda enchera y'engegu : korende Sila na Timotheo , bagatigara aroro .
44017015	Nabarabwo bakamokoba Paulo bakamoikia goika Athene , erio kobanyorire ogochika kobareta Sila na Timotheo ng'a tibatebana komotunyana , bakagenda .
44017016	Ekero Paulo abaganyete as'Athene , akarora omochie oria oichire nechisanamu , omoyo oye okagechigwa mono .
44017017	Naboigo as'esunagogi akaamererania n'Abayahudi , nabarabwo abamosigete Nyasaye , na kera rituko as'echiro nabaria bare koumerana nere .
44017018	Nabande b'Abaepikurio n'Abastpiko , n'Abafilosofo bakaumerana nere . Abande bagateba , Orhonto oyo omonyene amang'ana amange , inki arigeti goteba ? Abande bagateba , Ororekanire buna omorandia bw'amang'ana e chinyasaye chingeni : ekiagera igarenge korandia amang'ana a Yesu nokobokigwa .
44017019	Bakamobwata bakamoira goika Areopago , bagateba , Inee , Natonyare komanya engecho ye chisemi chinyia echi chigokwana naye ?
44017020	Naki igokoreta amang'ana amageni as'amato aito : gaki ntorigetie komanya engecho y'amang'ana ayio .
44017021	( Ekiagera Abathene nabageni bamenyete agwo igobarenge tibare neribaga as'ing'ana rinde rionsi , tatiga okoorokia amang'ana nagotegerera engecho ye ring'ana riyia . )
44017022	Paulo agatenena gati gati y'Areopago , akabora , Inwe abanto b'Athene , as'amang'ana onsi narorire ng'a inwe nabanto morengereretie mono amang'ana ay'edini .
44017023	Naki ekero narenge goeta aria naria , nakoyarora amasasimo aino , nkayarora amathabau ayarikire amang'ana aya , Ase Nyasaye Oria Otamanyekaneti . Gaki inche nabarandeirie chingecho chiaye ere oria inwe mogosasima motamanyeti .
44017024	Nyasaye oyoyekorete ense nebinto bionsi bire imeo , ere , ekiagera n'Omonene o igoro nense , tari komenya ase chihekalu chiagachire namaboko ;
44017025	gose tari gokorerwa namaboko ay'abanabamwanyabanto , buna oyo oremeirwe gento kende gionsi , naki nere okobaa bonsi obogima nomoika , nebinto bionsi ;
44017026	nere agakora ker'egesaku ki'abanabamwanyabanto koba ab'omochakano oyomo , baikaranse igoro as'obosio bw'ense yonsi , gatiekire kobabekera ebiro ebiabachigete korwa kare , nechimbebe chi'obomenyo bwabo ;
44017027	erinde bamorigie Nyasaye , nonya nase ogotabataba , bamorore , nonya tari are na ker'oyomo oino .
44017028	Naki ime asare igatore moyo , igatogotara , igatore nobogima bwaito ; koreng'ana buna oyomo oino , omoriki bw'amang'ana akwanete , Naki ntwe twensi igatore abana baye .
44017029	Gaki , ekiagera intwe tore ababiare ba Nyasaye , tetogwenereti gokaga ng'a Obonyasaye nomogwekano bw'ethahabu , gose efetha , gose rigena , gose ebinto bibachire ase chisemi , nobong'aini bwa mwanyabanto .
44017030	Naboigo ebiro biria bi'oboriri Nyasaye igaombetie buna tarochi ; korende bono nkobaranderiare abanto bonsi ba ker'aase baonchoke :
44017031	ekiagera obekire rituko eriagocha kobanachera ekina , ab'ense as'oboronge as'omonto oria achorete ; nere obaeire abanto bonsi ekiorokererio ki'amang'ana aya as'okomobokia korwa as'amakweri .
44017032	Nabo bagachia koigwa amang'ana okobokigwa kw'abakure abande bagasekereria ; abande bagateba , Natogotegerere naende amang'ana ayio ,
44017033	Erio Paulo akaimoka akabatiga .
44017034	Abasacha gete bakabwatana nere , bagancha : as'abwo narenge aroro Dionuso Omoareopago , nomokungu erieta riaye Damari , nabande amo nabwo .
44018001	Nyuma as'amang'ana aya Paulo akarua Athene agaika Korintho ,
44018002	Akamorora Omoyahudi oyomo erieta riaye Akula omobiare o Ponto ; nere agacha korwa ense ya Italia amatuko a bwango amo na Priskilla mokaye , ekiagera Klaudio obachikire Abayahudi bonsi barue Rumi : agaika asebare .
44018003	Nekiagera emeremo yaye nemeremo yabo neyemo , agaikaransa nabarabwo , bagakora emeremo yabo ; naki barenge abarosia chiema ,
44018004	Akaborokereria ase chisunagogi ker'esabato , akabang'usa Abayahudi n'Abayunani bagancha .
44018005	Korende ekero Sila na Timotheo bachia gotirimboka korwa Makedonia , Paulo agasukigwa as'omoyo oye , okobaorokeria Abayahudi ng'a Yesu nere Kristo .
44018006	Bagachia koamererania nere nakorama , agakong'onta chianga chiaye , akabatebia , Amanyinga aino tiga abe igoro as'emetwe yaino ; inche nomochenu : korwa bono ningende as'abanto b'ebisaku .
44018007	Akaimoka korwa agwo agasoa as'enyomba y'omonto oyomo erieta riaye Yusto , omosasimi Nyasaye , ere enyomba yaye yarenge ensemo y'esunagogi .
44018008	Na Krispo , omonene bw'esunagogi , akamwancha Omonene amo nenyomba yaye yonsi ; Abakorinto abange bakaigwa , bagancha , bakabatiswa .
44018009	Omonene akamotebia Paulo ase okorora botuko , Toiroka , korende kwana , tokira .
44018010	Naki inche igonde amo naye , nonya omont'onde tari orakong'orere erinde agoite : naki inche ninde nabanto abange as'omochie oyo .
44018011	Akamenya agwo omwaka oyomo nemetienyi etano nomo , akaborokereria ring'ana ria Nyasaye .
44018012	Korende Gallio ekero arenge Prokonsuli y'Akaya , Abayahudi bakamochiera Paulo as'omoyo oyomo , bakamoreta as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina ,
44018013	bagateba , Omonto oyo igakobang'usa abanto ng'a bamosasime Nyasaye gotabwataini namachiko aito .
44018014	Na Paulo ochia korigia komanora omonwa oye , Gallio akabatebia Abayahudi , onye ndiakoregete ring'ana ri'okorega gose ri'okong'ainereria okobe , Inwe Abayahudi , anga mboronge nabategerera nainwe :
44018015	korende onye nokoboria igoro as'amang'ana namarieta namachiko aino , rigereria inwe abanyene ; ekiagera inche tindigeti koba omogambi bw'amang'ana ayio .
44018016	Akabaseria korwa as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina .
44018017	N'Abayunani bonsi bakamobwata Sosthene , omonene bw'esunagogi , bakamosusura as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina . Na Gallio tarora ng'a amang'ana ayio gose ngento .
44018018	Paulo akamenta goikaransa agwo amatuko amange , erio agatigana nabaminto akamanora agasoa obwato , akagenda Shami ; na Priskilla na Akula bakagenda amo nere ; erio kagingire omotw'oye ase Kenkrea ; naki narenge neira ,
44018019	Bagaika Efeso , akabatiga agwo : ere omonyene agasoa as'esunagogi akaamererania n'Abayahudi .
44018020	Bagachia korigia aikaranse ekero ekenge kobua , tancha ;
44018021	korende gatigana nabarabwo , agateba , Nengwenerete gokora rituko rinene eri rikare gocha Yerusalemu : korende ninyirane asemore naende , Nyasaye karanche . Akamanora , korwa Efeso .
44018022	Agachia gotirimbokera Kaisaria , agatira gochia kobakwania ekanisa , erio agatirimbokera Antiokia ,
44018023	Goika ochia goikaransa agwo amatuko atai make akaimoka , agaeta gati y'ense ya Galatia na Furugia , omochie as'omochie , okobaremia aborokigwa .
44018024	Nabo Omoyahudi oyomo , erieta riaye Apollo , omobiare o Isikanderia , omonto bwe chisemi , agaika Efeso ; nere igarenge omokong'u bw'amariko .
44018025	Omonto oyo konyora bworokererigwe enchera y'Omonene ; as'ayio enkoro yaye iga yarenge gwoka , agachaka gokwana nakworokereria boronge chingecho chi'Omonene ; nere igamanyete ebatiso ya Yohana yoka .
44018026	Agachaka gokwana atari nokoiroka as'esunagogi , Korende ekero Akula na Priskilla bachia komoigwa bakamoira mwabo , bakamworokereria enchera y'Omonene boronge kegima .
44018027	Erio agachia korigia kwamboka enyancha agende goika Akaya , abaminto bakamokonya , bakamorikera rirube aborokigwa baria bamoroisie ; nere agachia goika akabakonya mono baria abanchete as'obuya bwa Nyasaye .
44018028	Naki ababuete Abayahudi kegima kegima as'obosio bw'abanto bonsi , okoborokia as'amang'ana ay'amariko ng'a Yesu nere Kristo .
44019001	Egachia koba ekero Apollo arenge Korintho , Paulo gatiekire goeta egati ye chinse chia rogoro agaika Efeso , akanyorana naborokigwa batai bake agwo :
44019002	akababoria , Mwanyorete Omoika Omochenu ekero mwegenete ? Bakamoiraneria , Yaya , nonya no koigwa ng'a Omoika Omochenu nore titoigweti .
44019003	Akababoria , nas'ebatiso ki mwabatisetwe ? Bagateba , as'ebatiso ya Yohana ,
44019004	Paulo agateba , Yohana igabatisete as'ebatiso y'okoonchoka , okobatebia abanto bamwegene ere oyorache nyuma yaye , oyio nere Yesu .
44019005	Bagachia koigwa aya , bakabatiswa as'erieta ri'Omonene Yesu .
44019006	Na Paulo ochia kobeka amaboko aye igoro asebare , Omoika Omochenu ogacha igoro yabo ; bagachaka gokwana as'emenwa , nakobana .
44019007	Nomobaro obo igobarenge abasacha ikomi nababere .
44019008	Agasoa as'esunagogi ime , agakwana noboremu , okoamererania nabanto egeka ki'emetienyi etato , nakobang'usa banche amang'ana obonda bwa Nyasaye .
44019009	Korende ekero abande bakong'ete bakanga gwancha , bagokwana amabe as'Enchera eria as'obosio bw'omosangererekano ; erio akaimoka akabatiga , akabarusanania aborokigwa , akaamererania nabanto kera rituko as'esukul y'omonto oyomo , erieta riaye Tyriano .
44019010	Amang'ana aya akagenderera egeka ki'emiaka ebere ; goika bonsi bamenyete Asia bakarigwa ring'ana ri'Omonene , Abayahudi n'Abayunani .
44019011	Nyasaye agakora as'amaboko a Paulo ebikone ebinene mono ;
44019012	goika abarwaire bakareterwa ebitambaa nechianga echiakunete omobere oye , amarwaire abo akabarua , ebirecha ebibe bikabarua .
44019013	Abande as'Abayahudi bare abatayayi , nabarabwo nabaragori b'ebirecha , bagatema gwatora erieta ri'Omonene Yesu igoro yabo , ababwatire nebirecha ebibe , bagoteba , Twabachikire ase Yesu oria orandigwe na Paulo .
44019014	Nabarabwo abakorete aya igo barenge abana batano nababere , aba Sikewa Omoyahudi omokuani omonene .
44019015	Keria ekerecha ekebe gekabairaneria , Yesu namomanyire na Paulo namomanyire , korende inwe mbarabi ?
44019016	Noria omonto obwatetwe nekerecha ekebe akabarindokera , akabanyara , akababua , goika bagatama bwango korwa enyomba eria getirianda nechingoma baakirwe .
44019017	Amang'ana aya akamanyekana n'Abayahudi bonsi n'Abayunani bamenyete Efeso ; okoiroka gokabasoa bonsi , erieta ri'Omonene Yesu rikabakwa .
44019018	Nabange ba baria banchete bagacha bagakwana , nakoorokia ogokora kwabo ,
44019019	Nabarabwo abange ase baria bare gokorera chingecho chi'oboragori , bagasangereria ebitabu biabo , bakabisamba as'amaiso abanto bonsi ; bagakora okobara kwe rigori riaye bakarora ng'a nchisanete ebisamunye bi'efetha , chilifu emerongo etano .
44019020	Nabo ring'ana ria Nyasaye rikamenteka rikabua .
44019021	Amang'ana aya achia koera , Paulo akagania as'omoyo oye ime goeta egati ya Makedonia n'Akaya , agende Yerusalemu , ogoteba , Nyuma konabaire agwo nengwenerete koyorora na Rumi .
44019022	Agatoma abanto babere korwa ase baria bare komokorera gochia Makedonia , nabwo Timotheo na Erasto , ere omonyene agaikaransa as'Asia egeka .
44019023	Goika ekero ekio rigasoka eriomana ritaike as'amang'ana ay'Enchera eria .
44019024	Naki omonto oyomo , erieta riaye Demetrio , omoturi chifetha , emeremo yaye gokora chihekalu chie chifetha chi'Artemi , igarenge kobanyorera abarosia enibo enyinge ;
44019025	akabasangereria abwo , amo nabande abanyene emeremo eria , akabora , Inwe abasacha , mwamanyire ng'a obotenenku bwaito igo bwarure as'emeremo eye .
44019026	Naende mwarorire nakoigwa ng'a tari as'Efeso oka , korende nonya n'Asia yonsi pi , Paulo oyio obanchirie abanto abange , nakobaonchora , ogoteba ng'a chinyasaye chigokorwa as'amaboko tari chirochio Nyasaye ,
44019027	Tari ng'a nemeremo eye yaito ere nemechando y'ogochaywa ; korende , nonya ne hekalu ya nyasaye omokungu ore omonene , igarabarwe ng'a tari gento , nakourwa obonene bwaye , ere Asia yonsi nab'ense bonsi bakomosasima .
44019028	Bachia koigwa aya bagaichorwa nendamwamu , bakaaka eriogi bagoteba , Artemi bw'Abaefeso n'Omonene .
44019029	Omochie bwonsi ogaichorwa neriroroche : bakagenda bwango bagasoa theatro as'omoyo oyomo , erio bakababwata Gayo na Aristariko , abanto ba Makedonia , bare gotara amo na Paulo .
44019030	Na Paulo agachia korigia asoe egati y'abanto , aborokigwa tibamotiga asoe .
44019031	Korende abande b'abanene b'Asia , abarenge abasani baye , bagatoma abanto asare , bakamosorora tabaisa kweorokia omonyene ime ase theatro ( aase ogosangererekana ) .
44019032	Erio abande igabarenge bakorera iga , nabande iga : ekiagera omosangererekano oria konyora osarekire mono ; nabare abange tibamanyete engecho y'ogosangererekana kwabo amo .
44019033	Bakamorusia Iskander as'omosangererekano , Abayahudi bakamobeka as'amasio abanto . Iskander akabakaneria okoboko akarigia kobaa baria abanto okoiraneria .
44019034	Korende bachia komorora ng'a ere n'Omoyahudi , bakaaka eriogi bonsi pi as'omonwa oyomo as'egeka ki'ang'e chinsa ibere , bakorera , Aritemi bw'Abaefeso nomonene .
44019035	Nomoriki bw'omochie ochia kobakiria abanto , agateba , Inwe abasacha b'Efeso , monto ki otamanyeti ng'a omochie o Efeso nomorendi bwe hekalu y'Artemi , nyasaye omokungu ore omonene , naende omogwekano oria ogwete korwa igoro ?
44019036	Gaki , ekiagera amang'ana aya takonyara gokanwa , negwenerete gokira , timokora ring'ana ria bwango bwango .
44019037	Naki iga mwabareta abanto aba bataibeti ebinto bie hekalu gose komorama nyasaye oito omokungu .
44019038	Gaki onye Demetrio nababachi bare amo nere , bare nering'ana igoro as'omonto , ebigambero mbire , nabagambi mbare : tiga basoerane ,
44019039	Erinde onye mokorigia ring'ana rionsi as'amang'ana ande , igararosigwe as'ogosangererekana kwa boronge .
44019040	Naki ntore nemechando y'ogosoerwa neriomana as'engecho y'amang'ana a rero , kerabe onye ring'ana tiriri , rirorio as'engecho yaye titokonyara koorokia engecho as'omosangererekano oyo .
44019041	Erio ochia gokwana aya , akayosaria omosangererekano .
44020001	Egeturi keria gegachia koera , Paulo akabarangeria aborokigwa agatigana nabarabwo , akaimoka akagenda goika Makedonia .
44020002	Naende erio gaetire chinsemo chiria nakobaremia as'amang'ana amange , agaika Boyunani .
44020003	Erio ochia komenya aroro emetienyi etato , Abayahudi bakamokorera esugu , ochia korigia kogenda Shami as'enchera y'enyancha ; akarigia koirana as'enchera ya Makedonia ,
44020004	Abanto aba bakagenda nere goika Asia , Sopater Omoberoya , na Arisitariko na Sekundo , abanto ba Thesalonika , na Gayo omonto o Derbe , na Timotheo ; na Tukiko na Turufimo abanto b'Asia .
44020005	Abanto abwo konyora batang'anire bagatoganyera Teroa .
44020006	Intwe tokamanora nyuma y'amatuko emegati etabekiri memera , tokarua Filipi tokabaikera Teroa orogendo rw'amatuko atano , togaikaransa aroro amatuko atano nabere .
44020007	Goika rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma , aborokigwa kobasangererekanire , erinde basamunyore omogati , Paulo agakwana nabarabwo , akarengereria komanora rituko ria kabere riaye ; agachiererera amang'ana aye goika obotuko bw'ekeigoro .
44020008	Nchiarenge chitaya chinyinge as'egoroba aria aase basangererekanete .
44020009	Omomura oyomo , erieta riaye Eutuko , oikaransete as'edirisa , akaritoerwa nechitoro ; nas'ekiagera Paulo amentete korandia , akaritoerwa nechitoro akagwa korwa egoroba ya gatato , akabogorigwa konya okure .
44020010	Paulo agaika , akamogwera , akamoumamera , akabora , Timokora riroroche ; naki obogima bwaye , nao bore ime yaye .
44020011	Akarina igoro naende , agasamunyora omogati akaria , akamenta gokwana nabarabwo goika rituko ria mambia , erio akaimoka akagenda .
44020012	Bakamoreta omosae oria , ore moyo , bagasasoka omosasoko omonene mono ,
44020013	Intwe togatang'ana kogenda obwato , tokagenda goika Assos , tokarengereria komonyora Paulo aria : naki naboigo achigete ere , akarengereria agende namagoro .
44020014	Agachia gotoikera aria Assos , tokamosoyia , togaika Mitulene .
44020015	Tokamanora korwa agwo , nerituko ria kabere , togaika aas'arigerereti Kio ; rituko ria kabere riaye togaika Samos , togaikaransa Trogullio , rituko ria kabere riaye togaika Mileto .
44020016	Naki Paulo igarengereretie goeta Efeso nobwato , tabaisa gotebana as'Asia ; naki igare koayerera , akarigia goika Yerusalemu rituko ria Pentekote , keranyarekane .
44020017	Korwa Mileto Paulo agatoma abanto kogenda goika Efeso , akabarangeria abagaka b'ekanisa .
44020018	Bagachia goika asare , akabatebia , Inwe mwamanyire korwa rituko rie ritang'ani nachagete gotacha aiga Asia , buna narenge asemore ekero gionsi ,
44020019	nkomokorera Omonene as'obokanyeku bwonsi , namariga , nemechando emenge nanyorete as'ogotega kw'Abayahudi :
44020020	ng'a tinabisete ring'ana rinde rionsi eriranyare kobagwenera , korende naborogetie maiso marore enyomba as'enyomba .
44020021	Nakobaorokeria Abayahudi n'Abayunani okoonchoka kore ase Nyasaye , nokwegena kore as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
44020022	Gaki , bono rora , nabwatirie enchera kogenda Yerusalemu nasibirwe as'enkoro yane , timanyeti ayaranyore aria :
44020023	tatiga ng'a Omoika Omochenu omochie as'omochie igogontebia , ng'a ebisibo nemechando binganyete .
44020024	Korende timbobareti obogima bwane ng'a negento kie rigori asende , erinde ndokore orogendo rwane , nobosomba boria nanyorete as'Omonene Yesu , koorokia enchili y'obuya bwa Nyasaye .
44020025	Na bono inche namanyire ng'a inwe mwensi abanaranderetie obonda bwa Nyasaye , nare kogenda aria naria , timokondora obosio bwane naende .
44020026	As'ayio nabaorokeirie bonsi ase rituko eri ria rero , ng'a inche tindi nabibe as'amanyinga ay'omont'onde bwonsi .
44020027	Naki tinangete kobaranderia amang'ana ay'okworokereria gwonsi kwa Nyasaye .
44020028	Erigererie inwe abanyene , neriicho rionsi , erio Omoika Omochenu abaete mobe abarendi , koyerisia ekanisa yaye Nyasaye , eyenyorerete as'amanyinga aye omonyene .
44020029	Namanyire inche ng'a nyuma as'okoimoka kwane chisese chi'orosana chintindi nachiche asemore , tichiritigera riicho ;
44020030	naende korwa egati yaino nabaimoke abanto , bagokwana ay'obong'ainereria , babang'use aborokigwa gochia nyuma yabo .
44020031	As'ayio renda , mokoinyora ng'a emiaka etato , obotuko nomobaso , tinare gotiga komokurera ker'omonto as'amariga .
44020032	Gaki bono baminto nababekire as'amaboko a Nyasaye , nase ring'ana ri'obuya bwaye , asare ere oyoranyare kobaagacha nakobaa omwando amo nabarabwo bonsi abasibekire .
44020033	Tinarengereretie efetha , nonya nethahabu , nonya neanga y'omonto .
44020034	Inwe abanyene mwamanyire ng'a amaboko aya akoreire okorigia kwane , nokwabo abarenge amo nainche .
44020035	Nabaeire omogwekano ase chingecho chionsi , ng'a as'okobwata emeremo iga nebagwenerete kobakonya aba tari nechinguru , nakoyainyora amang'ana ay'Omonene Yesu , buna akwanete omonyene , Negesio korua kobua okonyora .
44020036	Ochia gokora gokwana aya agatung'ama agasaba amo nabarabwo bonsi .
44020037	Bakarera mono bonsi , bakamogwera Paulo rigoti riaye , bakamonyunyunta ,
44020038	bagaichana kobua as'engecho ye ring'ana riria atebete , ng'a timokondora obosio naende . Bakamokoba goika obwato .
44021001	Egachia koba ekero twatananekanire nabarabwo na komanora nobwato , tokagenda boronge goika Koos , ne rituko ria kabere riaye togaika Rodo , na korwa aroro togaika Patara :
44021002	tokanyora obwato oboranyare kwamboka goika Foiniki , tokarina obwato , tokamanora .
44021003	Erio togachia korora Kupro , togagetiga ensemo y'okobee ; tokagenda goika Shami , togaika Turo : naki agwo nao obwato bwaito bogoikeria ebinto biaye .
44021004	Twachia kobarora aborokigwa , togaikaransa agwo amatuko atano nabere : nabarabwo bakamotebia Paulo as'okobua kw'Omoika Omochenu tatira gochia Yerusalemu .
44021005	Goika togachia gokora amatuko aria , tokaimoka tokagenda as'orogendo rwaito ; nabanto bonsi , amo nabakungu babo , nabana babo , bagatokoba goika isiko as'omochie : bagatung'ama engegu , togasaba ,
44021006	na nyuma gatwatiganire ; tokarina obwato ime , nabarabwo bakairana nka .
44021007	Gotwachia gokora orogendo rwaito korwa Turo , togaika Ptolemai ; tokabakwania abaminto , togaikaransa nabarabwo rituko erimo .
44021008	Mambia yaye intwe tokaimoka na Paulo , togasoka , togaika Kaisaria , togasoa enyomba ya Filipo omorandia , orenge oyomo o baria batano nababere , togaikaransa nere .
44021009	Omonto oyo narenge nabaiseke bane abekungi , bare kobana .
44021010	Erio agwo twarenge toikaransete aroro amatuko amange , omobani oyomo erieta riaye Agabo agatirimboka korwa Boyahudi .
44021011	Agachia goika asetore , akarobogoria orokini rwa Paulo , agesiba amagoro namaboko , akabora , Omoika Omochenu otebire iga , Naboigo Abayahudi ba Yerusalemu barache komosiba omonto omonyene orikini oro , nabarabwo nabamobeke as'amaboko ay'abanto b'ebisaku .
44021012	Togachia koigwa aya , intwe , nabanto b'aria , tokamosorora tabaisa gotira gochia Yerusalemu ,
44021013	Erio Paulo akairaneria , Nki eke mogokora , mokorera na kong'ita enkoro ? naki inche tari as'ogosibwa gwoka , igonde ang'e nonya nogoitwa ase Yerusalemu as'engecho y'erieta riaye Omonene Yesu .
44021014	Erio kangire amang'ana aito togakira , togateba , Obwanchani bw'Omonene tiga bokoreke .
44021015	Nyuma as'amatuko aria tokabogoria ebinto biaito , togatira kogenda Yerusalemu .
44021016	Abande b'aborokigwa ba Kaisaria , bakagenda amo naintwe , bakamoretana na Mnason , omonto o Kupro , omworokigwa o kare , ere nere toraikaranse bwoye .
44021017	Togachia goika Yerusalemu , abaminto bagatoroisia as'omogoko .
44021018	Rituko ria kabere riaye Paulo agasoa ase Yakobo amo naintwe , nabagaka bonsi nao barenge .
44021019	Kabakwanirie , akaborokia amang'ana onsi erimo erimo aya Nyasaye akorire as'ebisaku as'obosomba bwaye .
44021020	Nabarabwo , bagachia koigwa , bakamobaka Nyasaye ; bakamotebia , Oyominto , kwarorire ng'a Abayahudi abanchire buna bare chilifu chinyinge ; nabarabwo bonsi igo bare abakong'u mono as'engecho y'amachiko :
44021021	nabarabwo batebigwe chingecho chiao , ng'a kwaborokereirie Abayahudi bonsi abamenyete as'ebisaku komotiga Musa , gokobatebia tibarokia abana babo gose tibatunyana chingecho .
44021022	Gaki , inki ? nebagwenerete abanto basangererekane ; naki nabaigwe ng'a gwachichire ,
44021023	Gaki kora ring'ana eri toragotebie ; Mbare aiga asetore abanto bane abare neira igoro yabo .
44021024	Imokia abanto aba bwesibie amo nabarabwo , orue eng'eria yabo , erinde bagingire emetwe yabo : erio abanto bonsi banyare komanya ng'a amang'ana aria batebigwe asore ng'a tari ay'ekeene ; korende aye omonyene igokogenda buya nakobwata amachiko .
44021025	Korende ase chingecho chi'abanto b'ebisaku banchire , twanyarire kobeka ekina giaito , barabwo tibabwata gento kende tatiga as'okwerenda emebere yabo nebinto biarusigwe ebing'wanso chisanamu , namanyinga , nebinto bing'entire , nobonyaka .
44021026	Erio Paulo akabaira abasacha baria , na rituko ria kabere riaye agesibia omobere oye amo nabarabwo , agasoa hekalu ime , goteba amang'ana ay'ogoikerania amatuko ogosibigwa , goika esadaka erusigwe as'engecho ya ker'oyomo obo .
44021027	Naboigo amatuko aria atano nabere achia koba ang'e goikerangiwa , Abayahudi baruete Asia bakamorora ase hekalu ime , bakabasegeta abanto bonsi , bakamobwata ,
44021028	bakaaka eriogi , Inwe abasacha ba Isiraeli , konya ; Omonto oyo nere oria okworokereria abanto ase ker'ensemo ayatagwenereti abanto , namachiko , naase aiga : naende , kobua aya , obasoirie Abayunani ase hekalu , obekire eubi aas'aiga aachenu .
44021029	Naki bamororire Turufimo Omoefeso , aino nere as'omochie , bagakaga ng'a Paulo namosoirie ase hekalu .
44021030	Omochie bwonsi ogasogwa nokobea , abanto bagasangererekana bwango bwango , bakamobwata Paulo , bakamokurura bakamosokia korwa ase hekalu : erio ebisieri bigasiekwa ,
44021031	Erinde bagachia koba kobakorigia enchera y'okomoita , amang'ana akamoikera omotang'ani bw'omoganda , ng'a omochie o Yerusalemu osarekire , omochie omogima .
44021032	Erio bwango akaimokia abasigari nechisagini akabaikera bwango . Nabarabwo bagachia komorora omotang'ani nabasigari , bagatiga komoaka Paulo .
44021033	Erio omotang'ani agaika ang'e akamobwata , agachika asibwe nebinyuri bibere ; akaboria , nere ng'o oyo ? naende inki akora ?
44021034	Abande as'omosangererekano bakaaka eriogi bagoteba iga , nabande iga : agachia koba tari konyara komanya oboronge bw'amang'ana aria as'engecho y'egeturi keria , agachika aretwe ime as'enyomba enene y'abasigari .
44021035	Nabo agachia goika ebirinero , akaba nkobogorigware nabasigari as'engecho y'obotindi bw'omoganda ;
44021036	naki omoganda omonene bw'abanto bakamotunyana bakoaka egeturi , Morusieo oyo .
44021037	Na Paulo ochia koba ngosoigware ime as'enyomba enene y'abasigari , akamotebia omotang'ani , Ninyore ribaga ngotebie ring'ana ? Nere akabora , Inee , nomanyete Ekeyunani ?
44021038	Aye tari oria Omomisiri , ere ritang'ani ri'amatuko aya oyobasegetete baria abanto chilifu inye , barogetwe Abaiti , akabatang'ana as'eroro ?
44021039	Paulo akabora , Inche n'Omoyahudi , omonto o Tariso , omochie o Kilikia omonyene ense bw'omochie otari moke : nagosabire ong'e ribaga nkwane nabanto aba .
44021040	Erio ochia komoa ribaga , Paulo agatenena ebirinero igoro , akabakiria nokoboko abanto baria ; bagachia gokira kiri kegima , agakwana nabarabwo as'omonwa bw'Ekeibirania , ogoteba ,
44022001	Inwe baminto nabatata bane , ntegerera , gonkwegambera omonyene as'amasio aino bono .
44022002	Bagachia koigwa ng'a igagokwana nabarabwo as'omonwa bw'Ekeibirania , bakamenta gokira : agakwana ,
44022003	Inche n'Omoyahudi , naiboretwe Tariso omochie o Kilikia , nkarererwa as'omochie oyio , as'amagoro a Gamalieli , nkorokererigwa ogochika kw'abatata baito as'oboronge , nkaba omonto oyore nomokia ase Nyasaye , buna inwe mwensi more rero iga .
44022004	Nkabarosia abanto b'Enchera eye goika ogoitwa , mbasiba , mbaruta echela ime , abasacha nabakungu .
44022005	Buna Omokuani omonene nere ambere kirori , nabagaka be ritongo bonsi pi ; ekiagera naetwe amarube nabarabwo as'abamwabo , nkagenda Damesiki , erio mbarete baria barenge agwo goika Yerusalemu , basibire erinde bachandwe .
44022006	Erio agwo ekero narenge kogenda , konaikire ang'e Damesiki , ekero kia mobasogati , mobosokano amasase amanene , aruete igoro akamoreka chinsemo chionsi .
44022007	Nkagwa inse , nkaigwa eriogi rigontebia , Saulo , Saulo , naki okondosia ?
44022008	Nkairaneria , naye ng'o Omonene ? Agantebia , Inche Yesu Omonazareti ere aye kwandosirie .
