44022009	Na baria barenge amo nainche mbayaroche amasase aria , bakaba nokoiroka , korende tibarigwete eriogi riria .
44022010	Ngateba , Ninki ndakore Omonene ? Omonene agantebia , Tenena ogende goika Damesiki ; nagwo notebigwe chingecho chi'amang'ana onsi ayachikirwe oyakore .
44022011	Naende ngachia koba tindikorora as'engecho y'obonene bw'amasase aria , nkarawa namaboko abo abarenge amo nainche , ngaika Damesiki .
44022012	Erio omonto oyomo , Anania , omoiroki Nyasaye as'ogotunyana amachiko , ore gotebwa buya n'Abayahudi bonsi bamenyete agwo .
44022013	Aganchichera , agatenena ang'e nainche , agantebia , Oyominto , Saulo , ramokia . Nkamoramokeria amaiso ane ensa eria eria .
44022014	Agateba , Nyasaye bw'abatata baito okorusananirie onyare komanya obwanchani bwaye , nakomorora Omonyene Oboronge , nakorigwa eriogi rikorwa as'omonwa oye ,
44022015	Naki nobe kirori oye as'abanto bonsi , bw'amang'ana ayakwarorire nakoyaigwa .
44022016	Gaki bono inki ogotebanera ? tenena obatiswe , bwesibie ebibe biao , gokorirangeria erieta ri'Omonene .
44022017	Gekaba nachia koirana Yerusalemu , ekero narenge gosaba ase hekalu ime , nkairwa as'okorota ,
44022018	nkamorora ogontebia , Ayerera bwango , karue ase Yerusalemu bwango : ekiagera tibagwancha oborori bwao ase chingecho chiane ,
44022019	Nainche nkabora , Omonene , bamanyire barabwo ng'a inche igo narenge kobasiba baria bagwanchete nakobaaka ase chisunagogi chiabo :
44022020	namanyinga a Stefano kirori oo ekero agoiterwa , nainche igo narenge nteneine ang'e , ngancha aitwe , ngachirenda chianga chiabo abamoitete .
44022021	Nere agantebia , Genda : naki inche ningotome are as'abanto b'ebisaku .
44022022	Bakamotegerera goika ring'ana riria ; erio bakaaka eriogi riabo , bagoteba , Morusieo oyo as'ense : naki tagwenereti abe moyo .
44022023	Bagachia koba bakonakoaka egeturi nakorusia chianga chiabo , na gosiarasiara ebuse gochia igoro ,
44022024	oria omotang'ani agachika aretwe ime as'enyomba enene y'abasigari , agachika aborigwe chingecho chiaye as'okoakwa , erinde amanye engecho bakomwogerera eriogi buna eri .
44022025	Goika bagachia komosiba as ' engori , Paulo akamotebia esagini oteneine ang'e nere , Inee ! mboronge komosusura omonto Omorumi , nere ataranacherwa kina ?
44022026	Oria esagini ochia koigwa , akagenda akamworokia oria omotang'ani okobora , Naki origeti gokora ? ekiagera omonto oyo n'Omorumi .
44022027	Omotang'ani agacha akamotebia , Ntebia , N'Omorumi ore ? agateba , Ee .
44022028	Omotang'ani akairaneria , Inche igo nanyorete obobiare obo kw'abanyene ense ase rigori ri'enibo enyinge . Paulo agateba , Nainche igo naiboretwe as'engecho eyio .
44022029	Erio baria barenge ang'e komoboria bakaimoka bakamotiga : noria omotang'ani akairoka , erio kamanya ng'a n'Omorumi , nas'engecho amosibire .
44022030	Rituko ria kabere riaye , akarigia komanya boronge , nas'engecho ki asoeirwe n'Abayahudi , akamosibora , agachika abakuani abanene neritongo bonsi bache . Akamoreta Paulo inse , akamobeka as'amasio abo .
44023001	Paulo akababeta amaiso abanto be ritongo akabora , Baminto , inche as'ebirengererio ebiya kegima igande moyo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye goika rero iga .
44023002	Omokuani akabachika baria bateneine ang'e nere komoaka omonwa oye .
44023003	Erio Paulo akamotebia , Naye Nyasaye nakoake , enyasi eakire echoka : aye gwaikaransire konachera ekina boronge koreng'ana buna ogochika , naye gogoteba ng'akwe as'enchera etari y'ogochika ?
44023004	Baria bateneine ang'e nere bakabora , Inee ! Nomokuani omonene o Nyasaye kwaramire ?
44023005	Paulo agateba , Tinamanyete baminto ng'a ere nomokuani omonene : naki narikire , Tomokwana amabe omonene bw'abanto bao .
44023006	Korende agachia komanya ng'a ensemo eyemo n'Abafarisai , nensemo ya kabere n'Abasadukai , akaaka eriogi ase ritongo riria , Baminto , Inche n'Omofarisai , omwana bw'Abafarisai : inche igo nkogambigwa as'engecho y'ogosemeria gw'okobokigwa kw'abakure .
44023007	Erio gakwanire aya , gokaba ogwatananekana egad y'Abafarisai n'Abasadukai , omosangererekano ogatananekana .
44023008	Naki Abasadukai bagoteba ng'a kobokigwa tikori , nonya namalaika , nonya nomoika : korende Abafarisai igo bagwatora onsi abere ,
44023009	Bikaba ebituri ebinge : abariki b'ensemo y'Abafarisai bagatenena , bakamwomanera , bagoteba , Titorochi bobe bonde as'omonto oyo : korende onyore omoika gose rilaika rigokwana nere titoamererania na Nyasaye .
44023010	Eriomana rinene riachia kooroka , oria omotang'ani akairoka Paulo tabaisa gotandoranwa nabarabwo , agachika abasigari baike nakomotaboria korwa as'amaboko abo , nakomoreta as'enyomba enene y'abasigari .
44023011	Obotuko boria Omonene agatenena ang'e nere , agateba , Obe nomoyo omoremu , Paulo ; naki buna kwaorokirie chingecho chiane Yerusalemu , nekogwenerete kong'orokia boigo Rumi .
44023012	Bogachia gokiamoka , ensemo y'Abayahudi bakabwatana , bakeng'ata as'eira bagoteba , Titokoria gose titokonywa goika gatwatiekire komoita Paulo .
44023013	Nabwo batiananetie igo barenge abanto kobua emerongo ene .
44023014	Nabarabwo bakagenda as'abakuani abanene nabagaka , bakabora , Tweng'atire as'eira , titoria gento goika ekero twamoitire Paulo .
44023015	Gaki bono inwe amo nabagaka be ritongo motebie omotang'ani amotirimbokie gocha asemore , buna nabanto morigetie komanya chingecho chiaye buya kobua : naintwe igotore ang'e komoita ataraika ang'e ,
44023016	Omoigwa o Paulo akaigwa amang'ana ay'okoboera kwabo , akagenda agasoa ime as'enyomba enene akamworokia Paulo amang'ana ayio .
44023017	Paulo akamorangeria esagini oyomo , agateba , moire oyo as'omotang'ani , ekiagera nabwate ring'ana akomworokia .
44023018	Erio akamoimokia , akamoira as'omotang'ani akamotebia , Paulo , oria omosibwa nandangeria , origia nkoretere omomura oyo ekiagera nare nering'ana agogotebia .
44023019	Oria omotang'ani akamobwata okoboko , akagenda nere ensemo , akamoboria bobisi , Ing'ana ki obwate origetie konyorokip ?
44023020	Akabora , Abayahudi babwatanire gogosaba omorete Paulo inse ankio , omobeke as'obosio bwe ritongo , ng'a igo morigetie komanya chingecho chiaye as'amaene kobua .
44023021	Gaki aye tibwancha : naki abanto kobua emerongo ene bamoboeire , beng'atire as'eira tibaria gose tibanywa goika kobamoitire Paulo : nabarabwo igo bare ang'e baganyete eira asore .
44023022	Erio oria omotang'ani akamotiga omomura oria agende , akamotebia , tomotebia monto onde bwonsi ng'a kwanyorokirie aya .
44023023	Akarangeria chisagini ibere , agateba , Beka ang'e abasigari chimia ibere kogenda Kaisaria , nabasigari abarini chibarasi emerongo etano nebere , nabanyene amatimo chimia ibere , ekero gie chinsa isato chia botuko .
44023024	Akabatebia kobeka ang'e ebarasi bamorinie Paulo nakomoira buya ase Feliki gavuna .
44023025	Akarika rirube buna iga :
44023026	Klaudio Lusia as'omonene gavuna Feliki , nagokwanirie .
44023027	Omonto oyo igabwatwa n'Abayahudi , akaba ang'e goitwa nabarabwo , nkagenda amo nomoganda bw'abasigari , nkamotoria , nachia konyora amang'ana ng'a ere n'Omorumi .
44023028	Naende konachia korigia komanya engecho yaye bakomosoera , nkamoreta inse , nkamobeka as'obosio bwe ritongo :
44023029	nkarora ng'a igasoeirwe as'engecho y'amaboria ay'amachiko abo , gose tasoeiri ase ring'ana rinde rigwenerete agoitwa nonya ngosibwa .
44023030	Goika nachia konyora amang'ana baboire omonto oyo , bono namotomire asore , nkabachika nabaria abasoete , bakwane amang'ana aye as'obosio bwao . Orare buya .
44023031	Erio , baria abasigari bakamoimokia Paulo buna bachigetwe , bakamoira goika Antipatiri botuko .
44023032	Erio mambia bakabatiga baria abarinete chibarasi bagende amo nere , nabarabwo bakairana as'enyomba enene y'abasigari :
44023033	nabaria , bagachia goika Kaisaria , bakamoa gavuna rirube riria , bakamobeka Paulo as'obosio bwaye .
44023034	Nere agachia korisoma , akabora , Omonto oyo noyo nse ki ? ochia kworokigwa ng'a nomonto o Kilikia , agateba ,
44023035	ninkoigwe amang'ana ao ekero barache baria abagosoerete : agachika arendwe ase Praitorio ya Herode .
44024001	Nyuma as'amatuko atano , Anania , omokuani omonene agatirimboka nabande as'abagaka amo nere , nomokwani oyomo , Teritullo ; nabarabwo bakainotebereria gavuna amang'ana a Paulo .
44024002	Naende agachia korangerigwa , Teritullo agachaka komosoera , agateba , Ekiagera asore , twanyorire omorembe omonge aye Feliki omonene , nas'okorigereria kwao amang'ana amabe iga akorosigwa as'engecho y'egesaku eke ,
44024003	gaki iga tokoyanyora ker'ekero na ker'aase , as'obuya bwonsi .
44024004	Korende tingochanda kobua , nagosoroire ototegerere amang'ana amake as'ogwancha kwao .
44024005	Naki twamororire omonto oyo omochege , omochaki bw'eriomana as'Abayahudi bare as'ense yonsi , naende nomotang'ani ensemo y'Abanazareti .
44024006	Naende igatemete koyebeka hekalu ebibe : tokamobwata : tokarigia komogambia as'ogochika gwaito .
44024007	Korende Lusia omotang'ani agaika , akamorusia as'amaboko aito nechinguru , akabachika baria abamosoeri bache asore ,
44024008	aye omonyene nonyare komoboria nakonyora engecho y'amang'ana aria twamosoeire intwe .
44024009	Abayahudi nabarabwo bakamosoera , bakabora naboigo are .
44024010	Erio gavuna akamworokia Paulo okoboko erinde akwane , akairaneria , Ekiagera namanyire ng'a aye kwabaire omogambi as'egesaku eke as'ekero ki'emiaka emenge , igo nakoiraneria as'omoyo bw'omogoko .
44024011	Ekiagera nonyare komanya ng'a taraeta amatuko kobua ikomi nabere korwa natirete kogenda Yerusalemu gosasima .
44024012	Abanto aba tibandochi ime ase hekalu , nkwomana nomonto gose ngokora eriogi as'omosangerereko , gose ase chisunagogi gose as'omochie ime .
44024013	Gose tibakonyara koyaorokia amang'ana aya bansoera bono .
44024014	Tatiga ring'ana eri naorokia asore , ng'a Enchera eria bakoroka ensemo y'obong'ainereria , nabo nkomosaba Nyasaye bw'abatata baito , nakoyancha onsi ayabwataine namachiko , nayarikire ase chibuku chi'ababani :
44024015	ninde nogosemeria ase Nyasaye , naende nonya mbarabwo nabarabwo iga bariganyete ng'a nakobe okobokigwa kw'abakure abanyene oboronge nabatari noboronge bonsi .
44024016	Nainche nabo natemire koba nebirengererio bitari nobobe as'obosio bwa Nyasaye nas'obosio bw'abanto .
44024017	Nyuma as'emiaka emenge ngaika mbaretere abanto b'egesaku kiane ebiegwa ne chisadaka .
44024018	Abande as'Abayahudi baruete Asia bakandora ime ase hekalu nasibigwe , timbeti amo nomoganda gose riroroche :
44024019	nebagwenerete barabwo koba aiga as'obosio bwao nagonsoera , onye barenge nering'ana rinde rionsi igoro asende .
44024020	Gose abanto aba abanyene batebe , nkomocha ki barora asende ekero natenena ase ritongo ,
44024021	tatiga as'engecho y'eriogi narerete gongotenena egati gati yabo , as'engecho y'okobokigwa kw'abakure nkogambigwa as'obosio bwao iga rero .
44024022	Korende Feliki , agachia koigwa aya , akabakiria , ekiagera amanyete boronge amang'ana Enchera eria , akabora , Lusia omotang'ani karatirimboke ninache amang'ana ao .
44024023	Akamochika oria esagini amorende Paulo , korende abe neribaga ; gose tamokania nonya noyomo obo bw'abasani baye komokorera , gose gocha komorora .
44024024	Nyuma as'amatuko atai make Feliki agaika na Drusilla mokaye oyorenge Omoyahudi , akamorangeria Paulo , akamoigwa amang'ana okwegena gwa Kristo .
44024025	Naende Paulo , agachia koba ngokwanare amang'ana aye as'amang'ana oboronge , oiokwerita , nekina gegocha , Feliki akaba nobwoba , akairaneria , Bono genda , nainche nkonyora ribaga ninkorangerie naende .
44024026	Naende igasemeretie ng'a naegwe chifetha na Paulo erinde amosibore : as'ayio akamorangeria ebiro ebinge gokwana nere .
44024027	Korende emiaka egachia koera ebere , Porikio Festo agasoa agambe ribaga riaye Feliki ; na Feliki , akarigia gwekorera obuya as'Abayahudi , akamotiga Paulo osibire .
44025001	Goika Festo gasoire as'obogambi bwaye , nyuma as'amatuko atato agatira gochia Yerusalemu korwa Kaisaria .
44025002	Abakuani abanene n'Abayahudi bakamotebia amang'ana a Paulo , bakamosorora ,
44025003	na komosaba abanchere , nakorua ogochika aretwe Yerusalemu , banyare komoboera nakomoitera enchera .
44025004	Festo akairaneria ng'a Paulo narendwe Kaisaria ; nere omonyene igare ang'e kogenda aroro bwango .
44025005	Agakwana , Baria bare nobonene as'egati yaino , nabatirimboke amo nainche bamosoere , onye ring'ana rire ribe as'omonto oyo .
44025006	Agachia goikaransa asebare amatuko atano natato gose ikomi , agatirimbokera Kaisaria ; goika rituko ria kabere agaikaransa as'ekerogo gi'ekina , agachika Paulo aretwe .
44025007	Agachia gocha , Abayahudi abaruete Yerusalemu bagatenena ang'e nere , bakareta amasoero amange namarito igoro yaye , ayabatanyare koyaorokia boronge ;
44025008	Paulo agekwanera iga , ng'a inche timocheti ring'ana igoro as'amachiko ay'Abayahudi , gose igoro ase hekalu , nonya igoro ase Kaisari .
44025009	Korende Festo akarigia kwegwenia as'Abayahudi , akamoiraneria Paulo , akabora , norigetie kogenda Yerusalemu , ogambigwe aroro as'obosio bwane ?
44025010	Paulo agateba , Inche natenenire aiga as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina kia Kaisari , angwenerete kogambigwa : timbamochereti Abayahudi ring'ana buna aye omanyete buya .
44025011	Onye namochire gose nakorire ring'ana rigwenerete ogokwa , tinyangeti gokwa : korende , onye tari ekeene ring'ana eri bansoeire , onde tari oranyare kombeka amaboko abo . Nindigeti apili ase Kaisari .
44025012	Erio Festo agachia gokora ogokwana nabanto be ritongo , akairaneria , Norigetie apili ase Kaisari : gaki nogende ase Kaisari .
44025013	Amatuko atai make agachia goeta , Agrippa omoruoti na Bereniki bagaika Kaisaria , bakamokwania Festo .
44025014	Naende bagachia goikaransa aroro amatuko amange , Festo akamotebia omoruoti amang'ana a Paulo , agateba , Nar'aa omonto otigetwe na Feliki osibire :
44025015	nainche ekero narenge Yerusalemu , Abakuani abanene nabagaka b'Abayahudi bagantebia amang'ana aye , bakarigia agambigwe .
44025016	Nkabairaneria ng'a tari engecho y'Abarumi komorua omonto onde bwonsi aitwe , ritang'ani omonto oria osoerwa atararorana nabamosoeri baye obosio as'obosio , nakoegwa ribaga gwekwanera as'amasoero aye .
44025017	Nabo bagachia gosangererekana aiga tintebaneti , korende rituko ria kabere ngaikaransa as'ekerogo gi'ekegambero , ngachika omonto oyio aretwe .
44025018	Nabaria abamosoeri bagachia gotenena ang'e nere , tibamosoera ase ring'ana ribe , buna nakagete ;
44025019	korende iga barenge namaboria igoro asare as'edini yabo abanyene , nas'amang'ana omonto oyomo Yesu , oyotiekire gokwa , oyio Paulo akonagoteba ng'a moyo are .
44025020	Nainche ngatantana buna nkorigia ekeene ki'amang'ana aya , nkamoboria gose narigetie kogenda Yerusalemu agambigwe aroro as'amang'ana aya .
44025021	Korende Paulo akarigia abekwe agambigwe n'Augusto , ngachika arendwe goika moire ase Kaisari .
44025022	Agrippa akamotebia Festo , nainche nindigetie komoigwa omonto oyo , Akabora , Nomoigwe mambia .
44025023	Goika mambia Agrippa agacha amo na Bereniki as'obonene obonge , bagasoa aase bakoigwera amang'ana , amo nechisagini chinene nabanto abanene b'omochie , Festo akarua ogochika Paulo aretwe .
44025024	Festo agateba , Omoruoti Agrippa , nainwe mwensi aba moraa amo naintwe , mwamororire omonto oyo , as'ere omoganda bwonsi bw'Abayahudi aria Yerusalemu naa onsi mbandigetie mbakonye , bakoaka eriogi ng'a temogwenereti koba moyo .
44025025	Korende ngachia korora ng'a takoreti ring'ana rigwenerete aitwe : nere omonyene karigetie agambigwe na Augusto , nkarigia komotoma asare .
44025026	Nainche tindi nering'ana ri'ekeene komorikera omonene one . As'ayio namoretire aiga obosio bwaino , kobua as'obosio bwao aye omoruoti Agrippa , erinde gatiekire koborokia amang'ana aye , inyore ring'ana nkomorikera .
44025027	Naki narorire nering'ana ritari nenchera komoira omosibwa , ataorokiri amasoero aria asoerwa .
44026001	Agrippa akamotebia Paulo , Nore neribaga gokwana amang'ana ao . Erio Paulo akarambora okoboko kwaye , agekwanera .
44026002	Nerorire omonyene ng'a ninde negesio , aye omoruoti Agrippa , ekiagera ninyekwanere as'obosio bwao rero , as'amang'ana aria onsi nasoerwa n'Abayahudi .
44026003	Nabo ekiagera aye kwamanyire mono engecho namaboria onsi bare naro Abayahudi : as'ayio nagosabire onyigwe as'oboremereria .
44026004	Abayahudi bonsi bamanyire obogima bwane korwa oboke bwane , bwarenge korwa omochakano as'egesaku kiane , nase Yerusalemu , onye mbancha koorokia ,
44026005	buna narenge Omofarisai as'okobwata engecho y'edini yaito ere yaboronge kegima .
44026006	Naende bono natenenire aiga ngambigwe as'engecho y'ogosemeria kw'eira baetwe abatata baito na Nyasaye ;
44026007	as'eyio ebisaku biaito ikomi nabibere basemereti koyeikera , kobaramokerere Nyasaye as'omokia omobaso nobotuko . Nainche nasoeirwe n'Abayahudi as'engecho y'ogosemeria okwo , Aye omoruoti !
44026008	Naseki rigokagwa nainwe koba nering'ana ritanchegeti , ng'a Nyasaye nkobabokiare abakure ?
44026009	Ekeene , inche omonyene naroche ng'a nengwenerete gokora amang'ana amange ayatananegete nerieta riaye Yesu Omonazareti .
44026010	Nkayakora aya Yerusalemu : nkabasiba abange as'egati y'abachenu as'echela , konatiekire koegwa ogochika nabakuani abanene , kobagoitwa , iga nanchete abe bo asebare .
44026011	Naende ebiro ebinge ase chisunagogi chionsi nkabachanda , mbabetereria korama ; nkabarorera endamwamu buna igande nebarimo , nkabachanda goika nonya nemechie y'abageni .
44026012	Nabo as'emeremo eyio iga narenge kogenda Dameski , naeirwe okobua namachiko nabakuani abanene .
44026013	Aye omoruoti , ekero kia mobasogati as'enchera nkarora amasase akorua igoro abuete okobara kw'erioba , akambarera chinsemo chionsi , naende baria barenge amo nainche .
44026014	Tokagwa inse ntwensi , nkaigwa eriogi rigokwana nainche as'omonwa bw'Ekeibirania , Saulo , Saulo , naseki okondosia ? naakong'u asore koyeaka chintacho ensimano ,
44026015	Nainche nkabora , Naye ng'o Omonene ? Omonene agantebia , Ninche Yesu , aye kwandosirie .
44026016	Korende imoka , otenene : naki nakoorokeire as'engecho y'ogogochora obe omokori na kirori bw'amang'ana aya kwarora , namang'ana ayio ndeorokerie asore ;
44026017	kondagokonye nabanto bao , nabanto b'ebisaku , as'abwo ndagotome ,
44026018	obaramokie amaiso abo , badge omosunte nakoyoiranera omobaso , nagochitiga chinguru chia Saitani nakomoonchokera Nyasaye , banyore okwaberwa kw'ebibe biabo , nomwando as'egati yabo abasibigwe as'okwegena kore ime asende .
44026019	As'ayio aye omoruoti Agrippa , tinsareti okorora koria kw'igoro :
44026020	korende ritang'ani iga nabarandereti baria ba Damesiki , na Yerusalemu , nase ense yonsi ya Boyahudi , nabanto b'ebisaku , baonchoke bamoonchokere Nyasaye , bagokora ogokora kobwataine nokoonchoka kwabo .
44026021	Naki as'ayio Abayahudi bakambwata ime ase hekalu , bagatema kong'ita .
44026022	Erio konatiekire gokonyora ogokonywa gokorua ase Nyasaye , natenenire goika rero iga nakobatebia abake nabanene , gose tindi gokwana ring'ana tatiga aria ababani na Musa bayakwanete , ng'a nabe ;
44026023	buna Kristo agwenerete achandwe , naende buna ere ritang'ani , as'okobokigwa korwa as'abakure narandie amang'ana omobaso as'abanto baye nas'abanto b'ebisaku .
44026024	Agachia gwekwanera iga , Festo agakwana as'eriogi rinene , Paulo nebarimo ore ; ogosoma kwao okonge gwagoonchoire obong'aini bwao .
44026025	Korende Paulo agakwana , Tindi ebarimo , aye Festo omonene ; korende iga ngokwana amang'ana ekeene nay'obong'aini kegima .
44026026	Naki omoruoti omanyire engecho y'amang'ana aya naende ninyare gokwana nere ntari nokoiroka : ekiagera namanyire mono ng'a ring'ana tiriri , nonya nerimo as'ayio atamanyeti ; naki ring'ana erio tirikoregeti bobisi ,
44026027	Omoruoti Agrippa , kwabanchire ababani ? Namanyire ng'anobanchete ,
44026028	Agrippa akamotebia Paulo , as'amang'ana amake norigetie gonkora imbe Omokristo .
44026029	Paulo akamoiraneria , Namosabire Nyasaye ng'a as'amang'ana amake gose as'amange tari aye bweka , korende naba bonsi abang'igure rero , babe buna inche , tatiga as'ebisibo ebi .
44026030	Agachia gokora gokwana aya , omoruoti na gavuna na Bereniki nabaria baikaransete amo nabarabwo bagatenena :
44026031	bakagenda are ake bagatebania , bakabora , Omonto oyo takoreti ring'ana rigwenerete ogokwa nonya nogosibwa .
44026032	Agrippa akamotebia Festo , Omonto oyo anga nanyara gosiborwa onye atanacha apili ase Kaisari .
44027001	Nabo egachia gochikwa togende goika Italia , bakamobeka Paulo nabasibwa bande as'amaboko esagini eyemo , erieta riaye Yulio , bw'omoganda bw'Augusto .
44027002	Togasoa as'obwato bw'Adramutio bwarenge ang'e kogenda goika emechie ye chingegu chi'Asia , tokaimoka , Arisitariko , Omomakedonia o Thessalonika , igarenge amo naintwe .
44027003	Rituko ria kabere togaika Sidoni ; Yulio akamwancha Paulo mono , akamoa ribaga kogenda as'abasani baye gokonywa nabarabwo .
44027004	Korwa agwo tokagenda as'enyancha orogendo maate ase Kupro , erinde tokengane embeo , ekiagera embeo yarenge korua obosio .
44027005	Tokayeeta enyancha ensemo ya Kilikia na Pamfulia , togaika Mura , omochie o Lukia .
44027006	Naria oria esagini akanyora obwato bw'Iskanderia , bwarenge ang'e kogenda goika Italia , agatorinia .
44027007	Tokagenda ng'ora as'ekero ki'amatuko amange , togaika Kinido as'emechando ; nekiagera embeo yatotangete , togaeta ang'e na Kirete maate , erinde twekenge embeo , ang'e na Salmone ;
44027008	tokayeeta as'emechando engegu as'engegu , togaika aase akorokwa Ekiambokero Ekiya . Ang'e nagwo narenge omochie okorokwa Lasaya .
44027009	Naende ekero ekenge konya giaetire , norogendo rore nemechando bono , ekiagera amatuko Okweng'ata konya aetire , Paulo akabatebia , akabora ,
44027010	Abasacha , narorire ng'a orogendo oro narobe nemechando nogosira okonge , tari as'ebinto nobwato bioka , korende nobogima bwaito bwonsi .
44027011	Korende oria esagini akabaigwera omogendia nomonyene obwato , kobua aria akwanete Paulo .
44027012	Nekiagera ekiambokero tikiarenge buya abanto baikaranse ime yaye ekero ki'obokendu , abange bagateba togende torua aiga erinde banyare goika Foiniki , keranyarekane , nagoikaransa aroro ekero ki'obokendu ; nakerokia nekiambokero kia Kirete , erigerereti gati irianyi na mocha na sugusu na mocha ,
44027013	Naende embeo ya sugusu egachia kogusa ake , bagakaga banyorire eki barigetie konyora , bakarusia ekerochi , bakagenda ang'e na Kirete ang'e mono nengegu .
44027014	Nyuma as'ekero egeke omwaga bwe chinguru ore buna ekerambautia , ekorokwa Eurakulo , okaaka obwato :
44027015	bokabogorigwa , ekiagera tibwanyarete koamererania nomwaga , tokabotiga etoire as'egochia .
44027016	Togaeta bwango ang'e negesinka egeke gekorokwa Kilaudia , tokanyara as'emechando , kobotiria obwato :
44027017	bagachia gokora kobotiria , bagakora ogokonywa , bakaboa obwato as'ogoetia engori inse yaye ; bakairoka ng'a tibabaisa koratera ase Surtis , bakarusia egetambaa bakairwa igo .
44027018	Nekiagera konya twaakirwe mono noria omwaga , rituko ria kabere riaye bagachaka gotuguta ebinto enyancha ime ;
44027019	rituko ria gatato bagatuguta ebinto bi'obwato as'amaboko abo abanyene .
44027020	Erioba neching'enang'eni tichiarorekanete as'ekero ki'amatuko amange , nomwaga nemerindo emenge egatotuba , tokerusia moyo as'ogokonyeka .
44027021	Togachia goikaransa ekero ekenene totari koria endagera , Paulo agatenena gati gati yabo , akabora , Abasacha , anga yabete egesio onye mwang'igwete , titorua aria Kirete , nakonyora emechando nogosira buna oko ,
44027022	Bono nabatebirie , mobe nomoyo omoremu : naki omonto tagosira , tatiga obwato bwoka .
44027023	Ekiagera obotuko obo bwa rero rilaika ria Nyasaye , oria inche inde omonto oye , naende nere ngokorera ,
44027024	agatenena ang'e nainche agmtebia , Toiroka , Paulo , nogwenerete gotenena as'obosio bwa Kaisari : naende rora , Nyasaye okoeire abanto bonsi abakogenda amo naye .
44027025	As'ayio abasacha , remia emioyo , naki namwegenire Nyasaye , ng'a nabe buna natebetigwe .
44027026	Korende netogwenerete gotugutwa as'egesinka ekemo .
44027027	Goika obotuko bw'ikomi nane bogachia goika , tokorutwa aria naria as'enyancha y'Adria , obotuko gati abairi bagakaga ng'a baikire ang'e ense enyomo .
44027028	Bakaruta ekerengo , bakanyora emerongo ebere : bakagenderera ake bakaruta ekerengo naende , bakanyora ebirengo ikomi nabitano .
44027029	Bakairoka ng'a tibabaisa gotuomerigwa as'ebitare , bakaruta ebirochi bine , bagasaba bokie .
44027030	Naende abairi bagachia korigia gotama nagotiga obwato , bakaboikia obwato oboke enyancha buna mbarigetie koruta ebirochi korwa obosio bw'obwato .
44027031	Paulo akabatebia esagini nabasigari , Aba bataikaranseti ime as'obwato timokonyara gokonyeka .
44027032	Erio abasigari bakachinacha chingori chi'obwato , bakabotiga bogwe .
44027033	Bogachia gokiamoka , Paulo akabasorora bonsi barie endagera , akabora , Rero namatuko ikomi nane koganya nokweng'ata , timorieti gento kende gionsi .
44027034	Gaki nabasoroire morie , nebe as'ogotoreka kwaino : naki tirogosira nonya norochugu rw'emetwe yaino korwa asemore mwensi .
44027035	Gachia gokwana aya akabogoria omogati , akamosasima Nyasaye as'amasio abo bonsi : akayosamunyora , agachaka koria .
44027036	Erio bonsi bakagongomoka , bakaria endagera abanyene .
44027037	Naintwe iga twarenge ime as'obwato abanto chimia ibere nemerongo etano nebere nabatano nomo .
44027038	Bagachia koigota , bagakeania ebinto bi'obwato , bakayetuguta engano enyancha .
44027039	Bogachia gokiamoka , tibayemanya ense eria ; tatiga baroche ekiambokero kere nomokenye , bagatebania kobosoyia obwato aroro , keranyarekane .
44027040	Bakabituguta biria ebirochi , bakabitiga nyancha , bagachiororobia chingori chi'egeonchori ; bagatiria egetambaa kie ritang'ani embeo ekebwate , bagakegendera ekiambokero .
44027041	Bagaika aase chinsangio chia chinyancha ibere , bakabororia obwato aroro bokaratera , obosio bogasensema omokenye , bokabwatwa kegima , tibwanyegera nonya ng'ake , korende korua nyuma bogatagorwa ase chinguru chi'emerindo .
44027042	Ekina ki'abasigari iga kiare abasibwa baitwe , omonto terema abaise gotama .
44027043	Korende esagini ekarigia komokonya Paulo , akabajanga ; tibakora buna barengereretie ; akabachika baria baranyare kwerema basoe enyancha , baike ense enyomo :
44027044	nabarabwo abagotigara , abande igoro ase chibao , nabande as'ebinto binde bi'obwato . Naboigo abanto bonsi bakanyara goika ense enyomo buya .
44028001	Togachia gokonyeka , twensi , erio tokamanya ng'a egesinka keria iga gekorokwa Melita .
44028002	Abanyene ense bagatokorera obuya boetete engecho : naki bautete omorero , bagatoroisia intwensi , as'engecho embura yatwete , nekiagera as'embeo .
44028003	Paulo iga arenge gosangereria chinko , nakobeka igoro as'omorero , eng'iti egasoka as'engecho y'omorero oria , ekamwenarera as'okoboko kwaye .
44028004	Abanyene ense eria bagachia koyerora eng'iti eria egosung'unana korwa as'okoboko kwaye , bagatebania , Takomocha omonto oyo koba omoiti , nonya okonyegete as'enyancha , ekeene tigekomotiga koba moyo .
44028005	Korende akayesamunsera riko , taba bobe bonde .
44028006	Bakamorigereria mono bagakaga ng'a nabimbe , gose kogwa inse nagokwa bwango : bagachia korigereria mono , ng'a obobe bonde tibomonyoreti , bagaonchora ebirengererio biabo , bakabora ng'a ere nyasaye .
44028007	Ang'e naase aria yarengeo emegondo y'omonene bw'egesinka , erieta riaye Publio ; omonto oyo agatoroisia as'omoyo bw'obosani , agatokora abageni baye as'ekero ki'amatuko atato .
44028008	Ekaba ise Publio narenge omonyareku esosera nagosaa amanyinga ; Paulo agasoa asare agasaba , akabeka amaboko aye igoro yaye akamogwenia .
44028009	Ayio agachia gokoreka , abande abarenge namarwaire as'egesinka bagacha , bakagwenigwa .
44028010	Nabarabwo bagatosika as'ogosika okonene ; naende togachia gosoa obwato bagatoa ebinto biria twaremeirwe nabirobio .
44028011	Nyuma as'emetienyi etato tokagenda as'obwato bw'Isikanderia , bwarenge bwamenyete aria egesinka ekero ki'embeo , nekemanyererio kiaye Diosikuri ( engecho yaye abamura chisare ) .
44028012	Togaika Surakusa , tokamenyao amatuko atato .
44028013	Korwa agwo togaetanana , togaikera Regio : Nyuma ye rituko erimo embeo ya sugusu ekagusa , rituko ria kabere togaika Puteoli .
44028014	Agwo tokanyora abaminto , togasororwa nabarabwo tomenye amatuko atano nabere : naboigo togaika Rumi .
44028015	Nakorua agwo abaminto , bagachia koigwa amang'ana aito , bagacha gotorotota goika Appiiforo na Trestaberne . Paulo agachia kobarora akamobaka Nyasaye , akarema .
44028016	Togachia gosoa Rumi , esagini akababeka abasibwa as'amaboko omotang'ani bw'abarendi ba Praitorio : korende Paulo akaegwa ribaga komenya bwoye omonyene amo nomosigari ore komorenda .
44028017	Akaba nyuma amatuko atato , akabarangeria abanene b'Abayahudi basangerereke : goika bagachia gocha akabatebia , Baminto , gose tinkoreti ring'ana ribe as'abanto baito , gose ring'ana riatananegete nechingecho chi'abatata baito , nkabekwa as'amaboko Abarumi , ngasibwa , korwa Yerusalemu :
44028018	nabarabwo bagachia gokora komboria bakarigia gonsibora , ekiagera tibabete nengecho ende yonsi y'ogoitwa kwane .
44028019	Korende Abayahudi bagachia gosokia okoboria igoro as'ekina eke nkabetererigwa korigia apili ase Kaisari ; tari ng'a narenge nering'ana ri'okobasoera abanto b'egesaku kiane .
44028020	Nabo as'engecho y'ayio , nabarangeirie moche kondora nagokwana nainche ; ekiagera nasibirwe as'ekenyuri eke as'engecho y'ogosemeria gw'Isiraeli .
44028021	Baria bakamotebia , Intwe titonyoreti amarube are namang'ana ao korwa Boyahudi , gose onde ominto tari nonya noyomo oikire aiga ipgototebia amang'ana , gose okwanire ring'ana ribe igoro yao .
44028022	Korende ntorigetie koigwa asore buna oroche aye : naki ase chingecho chi'amang'ana ayio twatiekire komanya ng'a akwanirwe bobe ker'aase .
44028023	Bachia gokora kobekerana ase rituko , bagacha asare enyomba yaye , abanto abange mono ; akabatebereria as'okoorokia amang'ana obonda bwa Nyasaye , akabatebia amang'ana aye Yesu , as'amang'ana amachiko a Musa nababani , korwa mambia goika mogoroba .
44028024	Abande bagancha ayakwanete , abande tibayancha .
44028025	Nabo kaba tibabwatana barabwo ase barabwo , bakagenda , Paulo agachia gokora gokwana ring'ana eri erimo ng'a Omoika Omochenu okwanete buya nabatata baito , as'omonwa bw'omobani Isaya ,
44028026	Ogoteba , Genda as'abanto aba , obatebie , Okoigwa namoigwe , korende timokoinyora ; Naende okorora namorore , korende timokonyara komanya ring'ana :
44028027	Naki emioyo y'abanto aba yakong'ire , Naende amato abo namarito as'okoigwa , Namaiso abo bayamiamirie ; Tibabaisa gocha korora as'amaiso abo , Naende koigwa as'amato abo , Nakoinyora as'emioyo yabo , Nagoonchora emioyo yabo , Mbakonye .
44028028	Nabo emanyekane asemore ng'a ogokonyeka oko kwa Nyasaye kwairirwe as'ebisaku : nabarabwo nabaigwe .
44028029	Agachia gokora gokwana aya , Abayahudi bakagenda bakaborania amange barabwo ase barabwo .
44028030	Paulo akamenya ekero ki'emiaka ebere emegima as'enyomba yaye are korua rigori , akabaroisia abanto bonsi abarenge komochiera ,
44028031	okorandia amang'ana obonda bwa Nyasaye , nakoborokereria abanto amang'ana Omonene Yesu Kristo , as'oboremu obonge , takanigwa namonto .
45001001	Paulo , omosomba o Yesu Kristo , orangeretigwe koba omotomwa , orusananetigwe koyerandie enchili ya Nyasaye ,
45001002	ero Nyasaye atang'anete koria eira as'emenwa y'ababani baye as'amariko amachenu ,
45001003	as'amang'ana Omwana oye , oyoiboretwe as'egesaku gia Daudi as'engecho y'omobere ,
45001004	akaorokigwa as'okobua koba Omwana o Nyasaye , as'engecho y'omoika bw'obochenu , as'okobokigwa kw'abakure ; Yesu Kristo Omonene oito ,
45001005	asare ere ntwanyorete obuya nobotomwa , erio ebisaku bionsi binyare koigwera as'okwegena , as'engecho y'erieta riaye .
45001006	As'abaiga nainwe mwabaire mwarangerigwe na Yesu Kristo :
45001007	ase bonsi abare Rumi abanchire na Nyasaye , barangeretigwe koba abachenu : obuya bobe asemore nomorembe bokorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito , nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
45001008	Ritang'ani namoakeire mbuya mono Nyasaye one ase Yesu Kristo as'engecho yaino mwensi , ekiagera okwegena kwaino kwarandigwe as'ense yonsi .
45001009	Naki Nyasaye , oyongosasima as'omoyo one as'enchili y'Omwana oye , nere kirori one koreng'ana buna nkonakobatora ntari gokira , botambe as'ogosaba kwane ,
45001010	igo ngosaba nchiche asemore amatuko ay'aiga aya , Nyasaye karanche gonsesenia as'orogendo rwane .
45001011	Naki igondengereretie mono kobarora , nyare kobaa ekeegwa ki'omoika , erio mobekwe chinguru ;
45001012	ayio ng'a tobekane oboremu inche nainwe , ker'omonto as'okwegena kw'oyonde , okwaino nokwane .
45001013	Bono timbarigetie timomanya abaminto , ng'a ekero ekenge narengereretie gocha asemore ( ngatangwa goika bono ) , erinde nyare koba namatunda asemore mwensi koreng'ana buna nde naro as'ebisaku binde .
45001014	As'Abayunani nabanto b'Ebisaku , nabanyene chisemi nabariri , ninde nesira .
45001015	As'ayio koreng'ana as'okobua kwane , inche igande ang'e koyerandia enchili nonya nasemore abamomenyete Rumi .
45001016	Naki tinkoyerorera enchili obosoku : ekiagera nero nokobua kwa Nyasaye gokoreta ogotoreka , as'onde bwonsi oyoranche ; as'Omoyahudi ritang'ani , nonya nase Omoyunani boigo .
45001017	Naki oboronge bwa Nyasaye bwaorokigwe ime yaye korwa okwegena goika okwegena : buna yarigetwe , Omonyene oboronge nabe moyo as'okwegena .
45001018	Naki endamwamu ya Nyasaye yaorokigwe korwa igoro , igoro as'ogosaria gwonsi nobobe bwa mwanyabanto , bagotanga ekeene as'obobe bwabo .
45001019	Ekiagera aya amanyekanire na Nyasaye aorokirie ime yabo ; naki Nyasaye nabaorokeretie .
45001020	Naki amang'ana onsi atarikororekana korwa ogotongwa gw'ense arorekanire , amanyekanire as'ebitongwa biaye , naro nokobua kwaye gwa kare nakare , nobonyasaye bwaye ; tibaba nogotamera :
45001021	naki kobamomanyire Nyasaye tibamobaka buna Nyasaye , nonya nkomoakera ng'a mbuya mono ; korende bagasira as'ebirengererio biabo , nemioyo yabo y'oboriri ekabekwa omosunte .
45001022	Bagateba ng'a nabanyene chisemi , bakaririeka .
45001023	Baboonchoreria obonene bwa Nyasaye otari nogosareka as'omogwekano bw'ekieni kia mwanyabanto oyore nogosareka , nobwe chinyoni , nobwe ching'iti chire namagoro ane , nobwe ching'iti echikwagura ,
45001024	As'ayio Nyasaye akabatiga as'okorengereria kw'emioyo yabo , batunyane eubi , goika bagasarerania ogosika as'emebere yabo :
45001025	as'engecho baonchorete ekeene kia Nyasaye as'oborimo , bagasasima nagokorera egetongwa ribaga ri'Omotongi , oyosesenetigwe kare nakare . Amin .
45001026	As'ayio Nyasaye akabatiga batunyane okorengereria kwabo kw'obosoku , goika abakungu bagaonchoreria ogokora kwabo kw'omobere gochikire as'ogokora gotarenge kwa boronge .
45001027	Nabasacha naboigo bagatiga ogokora kw'omokungu okwa boronge , bagasamba as'okorengereria abasacha ase abasacha , bagakora ayatabagwenereti , bakanyora as'emebere yabo okoakanwa kw'ogosira kwabo okwarenge ekeene kiabo .
45001028	Naende buna bangete koba na Nyasaye ase okorengereria kwabo , Nyasaye akabatiga batunyane obong'aini bwabo botagwenereti bayakore ayatabagwenereti ;
45001029	bagaichorwa nobobe bwe chingecho chinyinge , nebibe , nobokayayu , nokorengereria okobe ; bagaichorwa ne ribero , noboiti , neriomana , nobong'ainereria , nokogechana ; nobogenki ,
45001030	abang'achi , abamogechete Nyasaye , abachayi , abaenenu , abetogia , abakorosia amang'ana amabe , abatari nokoigwera as'abaibori babo ,
45001031	batari nokoinyora , abagosaria okobwatana , batancheti abamwabo , batari namabera :
45001032	barabwo abanyene bamanyete mono ogochika kwa Nyasaye , ng'a abakoyakora ay'aiga bagweneire amakweri , tibakorete ay'oka , korende igobagwancherana nabwo bakoyakora .
45002001	As'ayio , aye omonto okogambia onde bwonsi , tori nogotamera ; naki as'ayio okonachera omonto onde ekina naye okwenachera as'omobere oo ; naki aye okogambia , naro ogokora .
45002002	Na twamanyire ng'a ekina kia Nyasaye negi'ekeene igoro as'abwo bagokora ayio .
45002003	Aye omwana o mwanyabanto okobagambia baria bagokora ayio , naye omonyene naro ayio ogokora , inee ! nokagete ng'a aye notame korwa as'ekina kia Nyasaye ?
45002004	Gose ngwachayire obonge bw'obuya bwaye nogotigera kwaye , noboremereria bwaye , tokomanya ng'a obuya bwa Nyasaye igobogokong'usera ogoonchoka ?
45002005	Korende koreng'ana as'obokong'u bwao , nomoyo otari nogoonchoka , kwegacheire emonga y'endamwamu ase rituko riria ri'endamwamu nokomanoka gw'ekina kia boronge kia Nyasaye ,
45002006	oyoranyare komoa ker'omonto koreng'ana nogokora kwaye ;
45002007	ase baria as'okoremereria as'ogokora amaya igobakorigia obonene nogosika , nakorusia ogosareka , obogima bwa kare nakare ;
45002008	korende ase baria abanyene eriomana , bataigwereti ekeene , korende banchete obobe , endamwamu nekeririanda ,
45002009	emechando , nobororo , igoro ase ker'omoyo bw'omwana o mwanyabanto oyogokora obobe , ritang'ani Omoyahudi , n'Omoyunani boigo ;
45002010	korende obonene nogosika nomorembe , ase ker'omonto oyogokora amaya , ritang'ani Omoyahudi n'Omoyunani boigo :
45002011	naki gwanchereria tikori ase Nyasaye .
45002012	Naki bonsi abamochire batari namachiko , nabasire batari namachiko : na bonsi abamochire bare namachiko , nabo baranacherwe ekina as'amachiko ;
45002013	ekiagera tari abwo bakoigwa amachiko bare abanyene oboronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , tatiga baria bagokora amachiko baranyare kobarwa ng'a nabanyene oboronge :
45002014	naki abanto b'ebisaku batari namachiko bagokora ase chingecho chiabo ayare ime as'amachiko , abwo batari namachiko , babaire namachiko boka abanyene ;
45002015	abwo igobakoyeorokia emeremo y'amachiko arikirwe ime ase chinkoro chiabo , ebirengererio biabo bikobaorokia , ebirengererio biabo nabinyare kobasoera omonto as'omonto , bikobanachera ekina gose biabatiga ;
45002016	ase rituko riria Nyasaye agocha konacha ekina igoro as'obobisi bwa mwanyabanto , koreng'ana nenchili yane , ase Yesu Kristo .
45002017	Korende aye , onye gokorokwa Omoyahudi nagosemeria amachiko , nagwetogia ase Nyasaye ,
45002018	nakobomanya obwanchani bwaye , nakoyamanya amang'ana ayare amaya , kwang'ainiigwe as'amachiko ,
45002019	nakomanya ng'a aye omonyene igore omotang'ani bw'emeuko , omobaso obo abare omosunte ,
45002020	omworokia bw'abariri , omworokia bw'abana abake , omonyene chingecho chie chisemi nechi'ekeene as'amachiko ;
45002021	korende aye okomworokereria oyonde , inee ! tokweorokereria omonyene ? aye okorandia ng'a omonto taiba , igokoiba aye omonyene ?
45002022	Aye ogoteba ng'a omonto tatomana , igogotomana aye omonyene ? Aye ogechete chisanamu , igogosakora chie hekalu ?
45002023	Aye ogwetogia as'amachiko , as'ogosaria kwao kw'amachiko igokomosareria Nyasaye ogosika ?
45002024	Naki erieta ria Nyasaye igarigokwanwa bobe as'ebisaku as'engecho yaino , buna arigetwe .
45002025	Naki okwaroka nkogwenerete onye kore omokori bw'amachiko : korende kore omosaria bw'amachiko , okwaroka kwao kwabaire ogotaroka .
45002026	Karabe ere oyotarogeti okoyabwata amachiko , inee , ogotaroka kwaye tigokobarwa ng'a kwabaire okwaroka ?
45002027	Nere oyotarogeti as'ekeene , kabwate amachiko , tagokonachera ekina aye , oyore namariko nokwaroka osaririe amachiko ?
45002028	Naki ere tari Omoyahudi ore Omoyahudi as'isiko oka ; gose okwaroka tari koria gokororekana isiko :
45002029	korende ere n'Omoyahudi ore Omoyahudi as'ime ; nokwaroka nogw'enkoro , as'omoyo , tari as'amariko , nogotogigwa kwaye tikorueti ase mwanyabanto korende nase Nyasaye .
45003001	Gaki Omoyahudi nkogwenera ki abwate ? nokwaroka inki kogwenerete ?
45003002	Nkogwenerete mono ase ker'enchera : ritang'ani ekiagera baetwe amachiko a Nyasaye .
45003003	Inki rende onyore abande tibegenete ? Ogotegena kwabo nakoonchore okwegena kwa Nyasaye ?
45003004	Yaya ! Nyasaye arorekane ng'a nekeene , na ker'omonto omorimo , buna arigetwe , Erinde oegwe oboronge as'amang'ana ao , Obue ekero ogosoa as'ekina .
45003005	Korende kerabe obobe bwaito bokoboorokia oboronge bwa Nyasaye , inki toratebe rende ? Nyasaye nomobe okoreta endamwamu ? ( Nakwanire as'engecho ya mwanyabanto . )
45003006	Yaya : onye nabo naki Nyasaye aranyare kogamba ense ?
45003007	Korende kerabe ekeene kia Nyasaye kiamentekire as'engecho y'oborimo bwane goika akanyora obonene , naseki inche nonya mbono nkonakogambigwa buna omonyene ebibe ?
45003008	Naki totagokora obobe , erinde obuya boche ? ( buna twang'achirwe nabande â na buna abande bakong'irie goteba ng'a nintwe togokwana ) , okogambigwa kwabo iga kore boronge .
45003009	Ninki rende ? Nabaya tore kobua abande ? Nonya ng'ake : naki twabasoeire Abayahudi n'Abayunani ng'a bonsi igobare inse as'ebibe ;
45003010	Buna yarigetwe ng'a , Tari onde omonyene oboronge nonya noyomo ;
45003011	Tari onde ore nokoinyora , Onde tari okomorigia Nyasaye ;
45003012	Bonsi bachire bogeka , bagundire bonsi ; Onde tari oyogokora amaya , nonya noyomo :
45003013	Emioyo yabo noboina bwasie ; Ase chimeme chiabo bakorire obong'ainereria : Obosongo bwe ching'iti igobore as'ebikoba biabo :
45003014	Emenwa yabo yaichoirwe nokoragereria nobororo :
45003015	Amagoro abo igare amango goitera amanyinga ;
45003016	Obosareku nemechando ase chinchera chiabo .
45003017	Nenchera y'omorembe tibayemanyeti .
45003018	Okomoiroka Nyasaye tikori as'amaiso abo .
45003019	Twamanyire ng'a amang'ana onsi agokwanwa namachiko igagokwanwa ase baria bare inse as'amachiko ; erio ker'omonwa bwonsi osiekwe , ense yonsi ebekwe inse as'ekina kia Nyasaye .
45003020	Ekiagera as'ogokora kw'amachiko omonyene omobere onde tari oyoranyare kobarerwa oboronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye : naki as'okomanya ebibe igokogocha as'enchera y'amachiko .
45003021	Korende bono oboronge bwa Nyasaye bwaorokire ' machiko atari , bwatebetwe namachiko nababani ;
45003022	noboronge bwa Nyasaye , bogocha as'okwegena kwa Yesu Kristo , bokobachera abanto bonsi abanchete ; naki gwatananeka tikori ;
45003023	naki bonsi bakorire ebibe , barorire ng'a baremeirwe nobonene bwa Nyasaye ;
45003024	baeirwe oboronge bosa as'obuya bwaye , as'enchera y'okoborigwa kore ase Yesu Kristo :
45003025	ere Nyasaye omobekire abe omobwatania as'amanyinga aye , as'enchera y'okwegena , erinde aorokie oboronge bwaye , as'engecho y'okobitiga ebibe biatang'anete , as'oboremereria bwa Nyasaye ;
45003026	erinde aorokie oboronge bwaye ekero ekeiga : abe omonyene ekeene , nomonyene okomoa oboronge ere oyore nokwegena ase Yesu .
45003027	Ng'ai kore rende ogwetogia ? Gwasiekeirwe egesieri . As'ogochika kore naki ? As'ogochika kw'ogokora ? Yaya : korende as'ogochika gw'okwegena .
45003028	Naboigo , tokobara ng'a omonto igakoegwa oboronge as'okwegena kore ao as'ogokora kw'amachiko .
45003029	Gose Nyasaye n'Nyasaye bw'Abayahudi boka ? Tari ere Nyasaye bw'ebisaku bionsi boigo ? Ee , noyo bw'ebisaku bionsi :
45003030	onye togwatora ng'a Nyasaye noyomo , oranyare kobaa baria barogete oboronge bwarure as'okwegena , nabwo batarogeti as'enchera y'okwegena .
45003031	Korende inee ; twagoonchoreire ogochika as'okwegena okwo ? Yaya : iga togoikerania ogochika .
45004001	Inki toratebe rende ? Ibrahimu sokoro yaito as'engecho y'omobere inki anyorire ?
45004002	Ekiagera onye Ibrahimu oetwe oboronge as'engecho y'ogokora kwaye , fiare neki agwetogeria ; korende tari as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
45004003	Naki amariko agoteba ? Ibrahimu igamwanchete Nyasaye , nokwegena kwaye gokabarwa asare koba oboronge .
45004004	Korende as'omonto ogokora emeremo y'eng'eria yaye tekobarwa buna nobuya , korende igekoba esira ,
45004005	Korende as'omonto otari gokora emeremo , korende igegenete ere oria okobaa ababe oboronge , okwegena kwaye omonto oyio kwabarirwe ng'a nokwa boronge .
45004006	Buna Daudi agoteba egesio kiaye omonto oria ere Nyasaye abarire koba noboronge atari nogokora ,
45004007	Mbare negesio ababeirwe ebibe biabo , Nabwo ebibe biabo biatubirwe ,
45004008	Nare negesio omonto oria ere Omonene atabarereti ebibe .
45004009	Bono egesio eke nas'abwo barogete , gose nas'abwo batarogeti bonsi ? naki togoteba , Ibrahimu as'engecho y'okwegena kwaye akabarwa ng'a noboronge .
45004010	Naki abaretwe ? nekero konya arokire gose nekero konya atararokigwa ? Tari ekero konya arokire , korende nekero konya atararokigwa :
45004011	nere iganyorete ekiorokererio eke gi'okwarokigwa : ekemanyererio ki'oboronge bw'okwegena arenge nakorokwo rigoro atararokigwa : anyare koba ise obo bonsi abanchire , nonya tibarogeti , erinde oboronge bobarwe asebare ;
45004012	na ise bw'okwaroka tari as'abwo abarokire boka , korende as'abwo abagotunyana chimbaratero chi'okwegena kwaye tata oito Ibrahimu arenge nakorokwo ekero konya atararokigwa .
45004013	Naki eira eria aetwe ng'a naire omwando bw'ense aetwe Ibrahimu nokoibora kwaye , tari as'amachiko korende as'oboronge anyorete as'okwegena .
45004014	Naki onye baria b'amachiko mbarabwo b'omwando , okwegena kwabaire okwa bosa , neira yasarekire ;
45004015	Naki ogochika nakwo gokoreta endamwamu ; korende as'ogochika gotari komocha tikori .
45004016	As'engecho eyio igaruete as'okwegena , ebe as'enchera y'obuya ; erinde eria eira enyare koba eng'ikeranu as'oroiboro rwonsi ; tari ase baria b'amachiko boka , korende nase baria ab'okwegena kw'Ibrahimu , ere ore tata oito intwe twensi .
45004017	( Buna yarigetwe ng'a , Nakobekire koba ise bw'ebisaku ebinge ) as'obosio bwaye ere oyomwanchete , nere Nyasaye , omonyene okobabokia abakure , oyokobiatora ebinto bitario , buna mbireo .
45004018	Ere akegena as'ogosemeria ayatanyare gosemerigwa , erinde abe ise bw'ebisaku ebinge , buna akwanetwe , Naboigo rorabe oroiboro rwao .
45004019	Tarenge omwororo as'okwegena , ekero akarora ng'a omobere oye obaire buna okure ( ekero konya akorire emiaka emia ) nonya nas'ogokwa kw'enda ya Sara :
45004020	gose tabete nogosiereria konde as'eira eria ya Nyasaye , as'ogotegena , korende igo abegetwe chinguru as'okwegena kwaye , akamobaka Nyasaye ,
45004021	Akamanya boronge ng'a Nyasaye nanyare gokora aria abekeire eira .
45004022	As'engecho eyio ekabarwa asare ng'a noboronge .
45004023	Korende tiyarigetwe as'engecho yaye yoka , ng'a igo yabaretwe asare ;
45004024	korende nas'engecho yaito , intwe abwo togocha kobarwa boigo , intwe aba tomwegenete ere oyomobogetie Yesu korwa as'amakweri , Omonene oito ,
45004025	oyoruetwe as'engecho y'okomocha gwaito , nakobokigwa erio tonyare koegwa oboronge .
45005001	Naboigo ekero twabareirwe oboronge bokorwa as'okwegena , tiga tobe nomorembe ase Nyasaye , as'enchera y'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ;
45005002	asere twanyorire enchera y'okwegena goikera obuya obo iga toteneine ime yaye ; naende togogete as'ogosemereia kw'obonene bwa Nyasaye .
45005003	Gose tari igo rioka , korende igotokogoka nas'emechando yonsi : nakomanya ng'a emechando emeremo yaye nokoreta oboremereria ;
45005004	nemeremo y'oboremereria oboremu bw'omoyo , nemeremo y'oboremu bw'omoyo , ogosemeria :
45005005	nogosemeria tikori korora obosoku ; ekiagera obwanchani bwa Nyasaye bwanyororokigwe as'emioyo yaito as'Omoika Omochenu twaetwe intwe .
45005006	Naki rigoro twarenge intwe to tarenge nechinguru , erio ekero giaigete , Kristo agakwa as'engecho y'abanyene ebibe .
45005007	Naki naakong'u omonto gokwa as'engecho y'omonto omonyene oboronge : korende nanyarekane omonto koremereria gokwa as'engecho y'omonto ore omuya .
45005008	Korende Nyasaye oorokirie obwanchani bwaye asetore , ekiagera Kristo nakwete as'engecho yaito , ekero twarenge abanyene ebibe .
45005009	Naboigo kobua mono gatwaeirwe oboronge as'amanyinga aye natotorigwe nendamwamu asare .
45005010	Naki ekero twarenge ababisa tokabwatanigwa na Nyasaye as'amakweri Omwana oye , na kobua mono nyuma gatwabwatanigwe , natotorigwe as'obogima bwaye ;
45005011	gose tari boigo rioka , korende igo tokogoka ase Nyasaye as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , ere asare twanyorire okobwatanigwa .
45005012	As'ayio buna as'omonto oyomo ebibe bigasoa as'ense , nas'ebibe ebio amakweri ; naboigo amakweri akabaikera abanto bonsi , naki bonsi bakorire ebibe ; â
45005013	naki ebibe mbiarenge as'ense amachiko atarabekwa : korende ebibe tibikobarwa amachiko ataiyo .
45005014	Korende amakweri akagamba korwa Adamu goika Musa , naro igagambete nonya nas'abwo batakoreteebibe koreng'ana nokomocha kw'Adamu , ore omogwekano oye ere oyogocha .
45005015	Korende ekeegwa keria tikiarenge buna okomocha koria . Naki , ekiagera as'okomocha kwaye oria oyomo abange bagakwa , kobua mono obuya bwa Nyasaye , nekeegwa igokere as'obuya bw'omonto oyomo Yesu Kristo , kiamentekire as'engecho ya baria abange .
45005016	Ekeegwa keria tikeri koreng'ana buna okomocha kw'omonto oyomo ; naki ekina igo giachete as'enchera y'omonto oyomo gekareta emechando , korende ekeegwa ki'obuya gegacha as'engecho y'okomocha okonge , gekareta okwaberwa .
45005017	Naki onye as'okomocha kw'omonto oyomo amakweri akagamba as'engecho y'oria oyomo ; kobua mono barabwo babwatire obonge bw'obuya , nakeria ekeegwa ki'oboronge nabagambe as'obogima as'oria oyomo , Yesu Kristo .
45005018	Naboigo , buna okomocha kw'omonto oyomo abanto bonsi bakanacherwa ekina ; ee naboigo as'ogokora okomo kw'oboronge kw'omonto oyomo , abanto bonsi bakaegwa oboronge bw'obogima .
45005019	Naki buna as'ogosaria kwaye omonto oyomo abanto bonsi bagasoigwa as'engecho y'abanyene ebibe , naboigo as'okoigwera kwaye omonto oyomo abanto bonsi nabasoigwe as'engecho y'abanyene oboronge .
45005020	Ogochika kogasoa erinde okomocha koria kobe okonene mono ; nebibe kobiamentekire , obuya bokamenteka bokaba obonge kobua :
45005021	erinde , buna biria ebibe biagambete as'amakweri , naboigo as'enchera y'oboronge obuya bogambe as'obogima bwa kare nakare ase Yesu Kristo Omonene oito .
45006001	Ninki toratebe ? Tomenye as'ebibe , erinde obuya bobe obonge kobua ?
45006002	Yaya . Intwe abwo twakure as'ebibe naki torabe moyo as'ebibe naende ?
45006003	Timomanyeti ng'a intwe twensi twabatisetwe ase Yesu Kristo igo twabatisetwe as'amakweri aye ?
45006004	Naboigo twatindegetwe amo nere as'enchera y'ebatiso as'amakweri aye : koreng'ana buna Kristo abogete as'enchera y'obonene bw'Ise , naboigo naintwe , totare as'oboyia bw'obogima .
45006005	Naki onye twabwatanire amo nere as'omogwekano bw'amakweri aye , naboigo nas'omogwekano bw'okoboka kwaye ;
45006006	gotwamanyire aya , ng'a omonto oito o kare igabambetwe amo nere , erinde omobere bw'ebibe osire , titoba abasomba b'ebibe naende ;
45006007	naki ere oyokure otigirwe obaire are nebibe .
45006008	Korende onye twakwete amo na Kristo twegenire ng'a natobe moyo amo nere ;
45006009	gotwamanyire ng'a Kristo gatiekire koboka tagokwa naende ; amakweri takomobua naende .
45006010	As'ogokwa koria kwaye , igakwerete ebibe ara rimo rioka : korende koria okoba moyo kwaye , igare moyo ase Nyasaye .
45006011	Naboigo ninwe mwebare ng'a mwabaire abakure as'ebibe , korende mwabaire moyo ase Nyasaye ase Yesu Kristo .
45006012	Bono ebibe tibigamba ime as'emebere yaino , ekonyorekana namakweri , mobaise koigwera okorengereria kwaye :
45006013	gose timobaisa korua ebimo biaino koba ebinto biogokorera as'ebibe ; korende mwerue emebere yaino ase Nyasaye buna abare moyo nyuma as'ogokwa , nebimo biaino ase Nyasaye bibe ebinto bi'oboronge .
45006014	Naki ebibe tibikobagambera inwe : naki timori inse as'ogochika , korende inse as'obuya .
45006015	Ninki rende ? Tokore ebibe as'engecho totari inse as'ogochika , korende inse as'obuya ? Yaya !
45006016	Timomanyeti ng'a asere oria mwarure emebere yaino koba abasomba baye nakomokorera , igo more abasomba baye ere oria moigwerete : onye nobosomba bw'ebibe bokoreta amakweri , gose obosomba bw'okoigwera bokoreta oboronge ?
45006017	Korende Nyasaye aakerwe ng'a mbuya mono , ekiagera mwarenge abasomba b'ebibe korende mokaigwera as'emioyo yaino buna okworokererigwa koria mwabegetwe inse asekore ;
45006018	nekero mwasiboretwe korwa as'ebibe mogakorwa abasomba b'oboronge .
45006019	Nakwanire as'engecho ya mwanyabanto ekiagera as'oboreu bw'emebere yaino : naki koreng'ana buna mwaruete ebimo biaino bikorerwe as'eubi nebibe monyare gosaria , naboigo na bono karue ebimo biaino bikorerwe as'oboronge monyare gosibigwa .
45006020	Naki ekero mwarenge abasomba b'ebibe igo mwarenge abasibore as'oboronge .
45006021	Ngokonywa ki rende mwanyorete amatuko aria ase chingecho echio mwasokeire bono ? Ekiagera omoerio bw'amang'ana aya namakweri .
45006022	Korende bono ekero mwatiekire gosiborwa , nakoba are nebibe , nagokorwa abasomba ba Nyasaye , ogokonywa kwaino more nakwo , nkorokwo ogosibigwa , nomoerio oye , nobogima bwa kare nakare .
45006023	Naki eng'eria y'ebibe namakweri ; korende ekeegwa kia Nyasaye nobogima bwa kare nakare ase Yesu Kristo Omonene oito .
45007001	Timomanyeti , baminto , ( naki ngokwana nabwo abamanyete amachiko ) , ng'a amachiko igakogamba igoro as'omonto ekero are moyo .
45007002	Naki omokungu ore nomosacha oye igasibire namachiko as'oria omosacha ekero are moyo : korende karakwe omosacha oria , osiboirwe korwa as'amachiko omosacha .
45007003	Naboigo ekero are moyo omosacha oye , abe nomosacha onde , igakorokwa omotomani : korende karakwe omosacha oye osiboirwe , tasibiri namachiko ayio , goika ere tari omotomani nonya naba nomosacha onde .
45007004	As'ayio , abaminto , ninwe mwakwereire amachiko as'enchera y'omobere o Kristo ; monyare kobwatana nomoao , nonya asare ere oyobogete , erinde tomwamere Nyasaye amatunda .
45007005	Naki ekero twarenge as'omobere , okorengereria kw'ebibe , okwarengeo as'engecho y'amachiko , gogakora emeremo as'ebimo biaito goika tokamera amakweri okwama .
45007006	Ko bono twarusigwe as'amachiko , twakwereire ebibe biria biatobwatete : tonyare gokora intwe engecho enyia ime as'emioyo , tari as'engecho ya kare , as'amachiko arigetwe .
45007007	Naki rende torakwane ? amachiko nebibe ? Yaya : Korende tinare komanya ebibe tatiga as'amachiko : naki tinarekomanya okorengereria , onye ogochika gotagoteba , Torengereria :
45007008	korende ebibe bikanyora ribaga ase koria ogochika , bigakora ime asende kera chingecho chi'okorengereria : naki ebibe bitari nogochika mbikwete .
45007009	Nainche igo nare moyo agwo ritang'ani gochika gotarenge : korende ekero acha amachiko aria , ebibe bikaboka , nainche ngakwa ;
45007010	nkarora ogochika koria gokoreta obogima , ng'a asende inche kwaretire amakweri :
45007011	naki ebibe bikanyora ribaga as'ogochika koria , bikang'aina , bikang'ita ase korokwo .
45007012	Naboigo aria amariko namachenu na koria ogochika nogochenu , nokwa boronge , namaya .
45007013	Bono inee , riria rire rigiya asende ndiabaire amakweri asende ? Yaya ! tatiga ebibe , erinde birorekane ng'a nebibe biankorerete amakweri as'enchera y'aria amaya , erinde as'ogochika koria ebibe bimenteke koba ebibe mono .
45007014	Naki twamanyire ng'a amachiko ekeene kiaye nay'omoyo : korende inche nomonto bw'omobere , igonkorire inse as'ebibe .
45007015	Naki timanyeti eri ngokora : ekiagera riria nyanchete , tindi korikora , na riria mbeete nario ngokora .
45007016	Korende onye ngokora riria ntancheti , igo nkoorokia ng'a amachiko aria namaya .
45007017	Bono , tari inche ngokora korende nebibe biria bimenyete ime asende .
45007018	Naki namanyire ng'a ime asende , as'omobere one , tirimenyeti ring'ana rigiya : okorigia nkoreo , korende chinguru tichiri chi'ogokora erire rigiya .
45007019	Naki riria rigiya nyanchete tindi korikora ; korende riria ribe ntancheti , nario ngokora .
45007020	Bono onye riria ntancheti ndirorio ngokora , tari inche nkorikora , korende nebibe biria bimenyete ime asende .
45007021	Bono narorire ogochika oko , ng'a , kondigeti gokora rigiya , erire ribe ng'ang'e rire nainche .
45007022	Naki nakogokeire ogochika kwa Nyasaye as'omonto oime ;
45007023	korende as'ebimo biane narorire ogochika konde gokorwana esegi nogochika koria kw'obong'aini bwane , nagonkora omosakorwa bw'ogochika koria kw'ebibe kore as'ebimo biane .
45007024	Obobe nobwane inche Omwana-o-mwanyabanto ! ning'o orankonye nomobere oyo bw'amakweri ?
45007025	Namoakeire Nyasaye ng'a mbuya mono , ase Yesu Kristo Omonene oito . Ee , onye naboigo , as'obong'aini bwane igongogokorera ogochika kwa Nyasaye ; korende as'omobere one nkorera ogochika kw'ebibe .
45008001	Na bono ' kina tikeri igoro as'abwo bare ase Kristo Yesu , batancheti gotara as'ogotunyana chingecho chi'omobere , tatiga echi'Omoika .
45008002	Naki ogochika kw'Omoika bw'obogima boria bore ase Kristo Yesu bwansiboire , nkaba are nogochika kw'ebibe namakweri .
45008003	Naki aria atari konyarekana as'ogochika , ekiagera igo kwarenge okoreu as'engecho y'omobere , Nyasaye , as'okomotoma Omwana oye omonyene as'omogwekano bw'omobere ore bw'ebibe , nas'engecho y'ebibe akabigambia ebibe as'omobere :
45008004	erinde ekerigirie ime as'amachiko geikeranigwe ime yaito , abatari gotara as'ogotunyana chingecho chi'omobere , korende chingecho chi'omoika .
45008005	Naki baria bagotunyana chingecho chi'omobere igo barengereretie chingecho chi'omobere ; korende baria bagotunyana chingecho chi'omoika , igo barengereretie chingecho chi'omoika .
45008006	Naki okorengereria kw'omobere namakweri ; korende okorengereria gw'omoika nobogima nomorembe :
45008007	ekiagera okorengereria koria kw'omobere nobobisa igoro ase Nyasaye ; naki tikori koigwera ogochika kwa Nyasaye , gose tikori konyara .
45008008	Abagotunyana chingecho chi'omobere tibakonyara komogwenera Nyasaye .
45008009	Korende korabe Omoika o Nyasaye noikaransete ime yaino , inwe timorigotunyana chingecho chi'omobere , korende chingecho chi'omoika . Korende monto onde bwonsi atari n'Omoika o Kristo , oyio tari omonto oye .
45008010	Na Kristo karabe ime yaino , omobere okure as'engecho y'ebibe ; korende emeika yaino igere moyo as'ensemo y'obogima , ekiagera as'oboronge .
45008011	Korende onye Omoika oye ere oyomobogetie Yesu korwa as'amakweri omenyete ime yaino , ere oyomobogetie Yesu nabokie nemebere yaino yanyorekanire namakweri , as'Omoika oye oikaranste ime asemore .
45008012	Naboigo baminto , igotore abasira , tari as'omobere , erinde tonyare koba moyo as'ogotunyana chingecho chi'omobere :
45008013	naki komorabe moyo as'ogotunyana chingecho chi'omobere iga moranyare gokwa ; korende komoraite ogokora kw'omobere as'omoika , namobe moyo .
45008014	Naki bonsi baria bagotang'anwa n'Omoika o Nyasaye , abwo nabwo abana ba Nyasaye .
45008015	Naki timonyoreti omoika bw'obosomba bokoreta okoiroka ; korende igo mwanyorete omoika bw'ogokorwa abana , as'ayio torera , Tata , Oito .
45008016	Omoika omonyene obaire kirori amo nemeika yaito , ng'a intwe nabana ba Nyasaye :
45008017	onye tore abana , naboigo tore ab'omwando , ab'omwando ba Nyasaye , abararie omwando amo na Kristo ; nabo gatorachandwe amo nere , erinde tobakwe amo nere .
45008018	Naki nayebarire emecharido y'ekero kia bono ng'a teri gento onye nenyare koreng'anjgwa nobonene boria bogocha koorokigwa asetore .
45008019	Naki ebitongwa bionsi igobiganyete okogania okonge rituko riria bagocha koorokerigwa abana ba Nyasaye .
45008020	Naki ebitongwa bionsi bikaigwerigwa inse as'engecho ya bosa , tari as'ogwancha kwabo , tatiga as'engecho yaye oyobigwereti ,
45008021	as'ogosemeria , ng'a ebitongwa ebinyene nabirobio nabibekwe ebisibore nakorusigwa as'obosomba bw'ogosareka , bisoe ime as'ogosiborwa kw'obonene bw'abana ba Nyasaye .
45008022	Naki twamanyire ng'a ebitongwa bionsi igobigwechanda amo naende bure nobororo amo nonya goika bono .
45008023	Gose tari boigo rioka , korende nabo naintwe abanyene abatore nogotongora kw'Omoika , igo togwechanda emioyo yaito , gatoganyete gokorwa abana , okoborigwa kw'emebere yaito .
45008024	Naki igotwatoretigwe as'ogosemeria , korende egento keria giasemeretigwe kokiarorekanire , gosemeria tikori naende ; ekiagera keria omonto aroche , naseki aragesemerie ?
45008025	Korende gatoragesemerie egento totakerochi , igo togokeganya as'oboremereria .
45008026	Naboigo n'Omoika noro igogotokonya oboreu bwaito : naki titomanyeti gosaba buna etogwenerete ; korende Omoika Omonyene igogotosabera as ogwechanda gotakonyarekana gwatorwa ,
45008027	Nere oyokorigarigia emioyo namanyete okorengereria kw'Omoika ng'a igo gokobasabera abachenu buna Nyasaye anchete ,
45008028	Na twamanyire ng'a amang'ana onsi igakoba amo as'ogokora okomo , erio abanyorera amaya baria bamwanchete Nyasaye , barabwo baria barangerigwe as'engecho yaye .
45008029	Naki baria abwo amanyete korwa kare , akabachora korwa kare bareng'anigwe nomogwekano bw'Omwana oye , erinde abe omotangi as'abamwabo abange :
45008030	na baria achorete korwa kare , abwo akabarangeria : na baria arangeretie , abwo akababarera oboronge : na baria abarerete oboronge , aba igakobabaka .
45008031	Bono , nki toratebe nyuma as'ayio ? Nyasaye kare ensemo yaito ning'o ore igoro yaito ?
45008032	Ere oyotamotigete Omwana oye ere , korende akamorua as'engecho yaito intwe twensi , naki aramoche gotoa nebinto bionsi amo nere ?
45008033	Ning'o oranyare kobasoera abachore ba Nyasaye ? Nyasaye nere okobabarera oboronge .
45008034	Ning'o oranyare kobanachera ekina ? Kristo nere okwete , ee na kobua as'aya obokire korwa as'amakweri , nere igare as'okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye , naende nere ogotosabera .
45008035	Ning'o oratwatanane nobwanchani bwa Kristo , Inee , nogochandwa , gose obororo , gose nokorosigwa , gose nenchara , gose gesobono , gose nemechando , gose nemioro ?
45008036	Buna yarigetwe , As'engecho yao igotogoitwa omobaso boira ; Twabarirwe koba buna ching'ondi chi'okonyenywa .
45008037	Korende as'amang'ana aya onsi twabaire ababui , nakobua nas'ere oyotwanchete .
45008038	Naki natiekire komanya boronge ng'a nonya namakweri takonyara gotwatanana , nonya nobogima , nonya namalaika , nonya nabanyene chinguru , nonya nabanyene okobua , nonya nayare aroro , nonya nayagocha kobao ,
45008039	nonya nayare igoro , nonya nayare inse , nonya negetdngwa kende gionsi , tigekonyara gotwatanana nobwanchani bwa Nyasaye bore ime ase Yesu Kristo Omonene oito .
45009001	Natebire ekeene ase Yesu Kristo , tintebeti borimo , okorengereria kwane igokote kirori as'Omoika Omochenu ,
45009002	ng'a ninde nobororo obonge , nogwechanda gotari nomoerio as'omoyo one ,
45009003	Naki nasabete inche omonyene mbe ndagererigwe , nagwatananwa na Kristo as'engecho y'abaminto , eamate yane as'engecho y'omobere :
45009004	barabwo n'Abaisiraeli ; abakorirwe abana , ab'obonene , nechimuma , abakoegwa amachiko , nekeng'wanso kia Nyasaye , nechiira chiaye ;
45009005	ekiagera chisokoro nechiabo barabwo , nas'abwo nao aruete Kristo as'engecho y'omobere , oyore igoro as'amang'ana onsi , Nyasaye oyokobakwa kare nakare . Amin .
45009006	Tari ng'a ring'ana ria Nyasaye riagure . Naki tari bonsi bare Abaisiraeli , bare b'egesaku kia Isiraeli :
45009007	gose tari bonsi bare abana b'Ibrahimu , ekiagera baruete as'okoibora kwaye : tatiga , as'Isaaka oroiboro rwao rorarangerigwe .
45009008	Naki , tari abana bare as'engecho y'omobere bare abana ba Nyasaye ; korende abana b'eria eira bakobarwa ng'a nokoibora .
45009009	Naki ring'ana ri'eira neri , Ekero kere bun'eke ninchiche , na Sara nabe nomwana .
45009010	Gose tarigo rioka ; korende Rebeka nere , kabogoirie oborito as'oyomo , nere nere Isaaka tata oito . â
45009011	Naki bataraiborwa baria abana , nonya konya tibarakora ring'ana rigiya nonya neribe , erinde gotenene okorigia kwa Nyasaye gw'ogochora , tari as'engecho y'ogokora , korende as'engecho y'okorengereria kwaye ere oyokorangeria ,
45009012	igatebetigwe iga , Omonene namokorere omoke .
45009013	Buna yarigetwe , Namwanchire Yakobo , korende Esau namogechire .
45009014	Naki toratebe rende ? Obobe mbore ase Nyasaye ? Yaya .
45009015	Naki igamotebetie Musa , Nimororere amabebe ere ndarorere amabebe , nimwabere ere oyondabere .
45009016	Bono , onye naboigo , tari as'okobua kw'oria oyorigetie , nonya nokw'oria okominyoka chimbero , korende nokw'oria okororera amabebe nere Nyasaye .
45009017	Naki amariko atebire ase Farao , iga , Nagotenenetie , erinde nyorokie chinguru chiane asore , nerieta riane rirandigwe as'ense yonsi .
45009018	Ee onye naboigo oyo arigetie kororera amabebe , igakomorera amabebe , noyo arigetie gokora omokong'u , igakomokora omokong'u .
45009019	Gaki , nontebie , naseki nonya mbono akonyora okomocha ? Naki ning'o oranyare koamererania nokorigia kwaye ?
45009020	Yaya tari boigo , aye Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , aye naye ng'o okoiraneria Nyasaye ? Inee , egento getongire nakemotebie ere oyogetongete , ng'a ninki gwankorerete iga ?
45009021	Gose omokori chinyongo tari nechinguru igoro as'esike , ase ribomba erimo ri'esike gokora egento ekemo , kebe eki'ogosika , nekemo kebe getari nogosika ?
45009022	Naki onye Nyasaye as'okorigia koorokia endamwamu yaye , nakobamanyia okobua kwaye as'oboremereria obonge , akabogorerania nabiria ebinto bi'endamwamu biakorirwe ang'e as'ogosareka :
45009023	naende aorokie obonda bw'obonene bwaye , ase biria ebinto bi'amabera ebiaroseti korwa kare binyore obonene ,
45009024	nabwo intwe twarangeretigwe nere , tari abanto b'Abayahudi boka , korende nabanto b'Ebisaku boigo ?
45009025	Buna akwanete ase Hosea , Nimbarangerie baria abatarenge abanto bane , babe abanto bane ; Nere omwanchani ofte oyotarenge omwanchani one .
45009026	Nabe aase aria batebigwe , Inwe timori abanto bane , Agwo nabarokwe abana ba Nyasaye ore moyo .
45009027	Isaya nere osokirie eriogi riaye igoro as'Isiraeli , Okobara kw'abana ba Isiraeli nonya bare buna omokenye o nyancha , nabatigarete babo boka barache gotorigwa :
45009028	naki Omonene naikeranie ring'ana riaye igoro as'ense , arikore nakorinacha .
45009029	Na buna Isaya atang'anete gokwana , Onye Omonene o Sabaoth ( Omonene bw'emeganda ) atatotigerete oroiboro , Anga igatore buna Sodomu , anga igo toreng'anirie na Gomora ,
45009030	Naki toratebe rende ? Ng'a abanto b'Ebisaku , batari kobotunya oboronge , mbanyorete oboronge , oboronge boria bore bw'okwegena :
45009031	korende Abaisiraeli bare gotunyana amachiko a boronge , tibaikerete amachiko aria .
45009032	Naseki ? ekiagera batayatunyanete as'enchera y'okwegena , korende buna nas'enchera y'ogokora . Bakagochwa igoro ase rigena riria rikogocha ;
45009033	Buna yarigetwe , Rigereria nabekire ase Zayoni rigena rikogocha negetare gekoiyeria : Nonde bwonsi oramwanche takorora obosoku .
45010001	Baminto , okorengereria okuya kw'omoyo one , nogosaba kwane nkomosaba Nyasaye as'engecho y'Abaisiraeli nakw'oko , bakonyeke .
45010002	Naki nabatebirie ng'a mbare nekinda as'engecho ya Nyasaye korende teri nechisemi .
45010003	Naki kobarabe tibamanyeti oboronge bwa Nyasaye , naende , bakorigia koboikerania oboronge bwabo abanyene , tibebegeti inse as'oboronge bwa Nyasaye .
45010004	Naki Kristo nere omoerio bw'amachiko erinde onde bwonsi oyoranche anyore oboronge .
45010005	Naki Musa igarigete , oboronge boruete as'amachiko , ng'a omonto orakore aya nabe nobogima as'aya .
45010006	Korende oboronge boria bokonyorekana as'okwegena , igo bogoteba iga , Toteba as'enkoro yao , ning'o orarine ogoro ? ( engecho yaye komoreta Kristo ins'aa : )
45010007	gose , Ning'o oranyare goika gochia as'engoro entambe ? ( engecho yaye komoreta Kristo igoro , korwa as'amakweri . )
45010008	Korende , naki agoteba ? Ring'ana riria igorire ang'e naye , as'omonwa oo , nas'enkoro yao ; nering'ana riria neri'okwegena ndiria tokorandia :
45010009	korende koramoorokie Yesu Kristo as'omonwa oo , nakomwancha as'omoyo oo , ng'a Nyasaye namobogetie korwa as'amakweri , nokonyeke :
45010010	naki as'enkoro abanto igobakwegena baikera oboronge ; nas'omonwa oorokia goika onyora ogotoreka .
45010011	Naki amariko igagoteba , ker'oyoramwanche takorora obosoku .
45010012	Korende gwatananeka tikori as'Abayahudi nas'Abayunani : naki ere oria n'Omonene o bonsi , nobonda bobagwenerete abanto bonsi bakomorangeria :
45010013	naki , onde bwonsi orarangerie erieta ri'Omonene nakonyeke .
45010014	Inee naki baramorangerie ere bataramwancha ? Naende naki baramwanche ere bataramoigwa ? Naende naki baramoigwe batari nomorandia ?
45010015	Naende , barandie , batatomiri ? Koreng'ana buna arigetwe ? Naki are amaya amagoro abo baria bakoreta amang'ana amaya ay'ogokora okuya !
45010016	Korende tari bonsi baigwerete amang'ana amaya . Naki Isaya natebete , Omonene , ning'o bwanchire amang'ana aito ?
45010017	As'ayio okwegena igagogocha as'enchera y'okoigwa , nokoigwa igogogocha ase ring'ana riaye Nyasaye ,
45010018	Bono , nkoboriande , Barabwo tibaigwete ? Ee mbaigwete , Eriogi riabo riasokire riachire ense yonsi , Namang'ana abo goika omoerio bw'ense .
45010019	Korende nkoboriande , Abaisiraeli tibamanyete ? Agwo ritang'ani Musa agakwana , Nimbabekere omoyo bwe ribero as'abanto batari egesaku , As'egesaku getari nobong'aini igo ndababeyie .
45010020	Na Isaya nare noboremu obonge nagoteba , Nanyorekanete nabatare kondigia ; Naorogete asebare abatare komboria .
45010021	Korende as'Isiraeli igagoteba , Omobaso boira narekobaramborera amaboko abanto batare nokoigwera noboamereria .
45011001	Ninde nokoboria , Nyasaye igabatuguterete are abanto baye ? Yaya : naki inche nainche n'Omoisiraeli nde , oyomo as'okoibora kw'Ibrahimu , omonto bw'egesaku kia Benjamin .
45011002	Nyasaye tabatugutete abanto baye baria amanyete korwa kare . Gose timomanyeti aria akwanetwe namariko igoro as'Elija ? buna amosororete Nyasaye igoro as'Abaisiraeli ,
45011003	Omonene , babaitire ababani bao , batagoire amathabao ao , nainche natigaire inche bweka , nabarabwo nkondigia bare obogima bwane .
45011004	Korende okoiraneria koria naki gokomotebia ? Netigeire abanto chilifu isano naibere batarabeka amaru inse as'obosio bwa Baal .
45011005	Nabo ekero kia bono , mbare abatigari abachorirwe as'obuya bwa Nyasaye .
45011006	Korende onye nas'obuya bwaye , tibokoba as'ogokora naende , onye taribo obuya tibokoba obuya naende , nonye nas'ogokora , tibokoba obuya naende , naende agwo ogokora tikwabete ogokora .
45011007	Naki abaire rende ? Egento keria Isiraeli are gokerigia takenyoreti ; korende baria bachoretwe mbarabwo bakenyorete , nabande bakabekwa obokong'u :
45011008	buna arikire , Nyasaye akabaa omoika bwe chitoro , amaiso erinde tibarora , namato erinde tibaigwa goika rero iga .
45011009	Na Daudi otebire , Emesa yabo ebe egesugunia , nobeto , Negento gekobagocha , nokoakana asebare :
45011010	Amais'abo abekwe omosunte tibarora , Obakumbe omogongo obo amatuko onsi .
45011011	Bono ngokwana , Inee ! igobagochirwe goika bagure kegima ? Yaya : korende as'okomocha kwabo , ogokonyeka gwaikeire abanto b'Ebisaku , erinde barabwo babekwe ribero .
45011012	Bono onye okomocha kwabo kwabaire obonda bw'ense , nogokea kwabo kwabaire obonda bw'abwo abanto b'Ebisaku , inee , tari kobua mono as'oboikeranu bwabo ?
45011013	Korende ngokwanande ninwe , abanto b'Ebisaku . Koreng'ana buna nde omotomwa bw'abanto b'Ebisaku , nabakire ogokora kwane :
45011014	erinde inyare kobabeka ribero abare amanyinga ayamo nainche , nakobakonya abande babo .
45011015	Naki onye ogotugutwa kwabo gokoreta okobwatania as'ense , inee , ogwancherwa kwabo inki korabe onye tari obogima nyuma as'ogokwa ?
45011016	Naende onye ensemo ye ritang'ani kerabe enchenu , naboigo neribomba rionsi : neritina korirabe richenu , nechinsagia chiaye nabo chire .
45011017	Korende chinsagia chinde gachirabe chianachirwe , naye , omozeituni bw'orosana , igo gwachomirwe gati yabo okaba obomo bwe ritina ri'omozeituni , nobonoru bwaye ;
45011018	tibwetogia igoro ase chinsagia ; korende onye gogwetogia , tari aye oimogeti ritina korende neritina rikoimogetie aye .
45011019	Bono notebe , chinsagia igochianachetwe erinde inche nchomwe .
45011020	Ee , mbuya , bakanachwa as'ogotegena kwabo , naye igoteneine as'okwegena kwao . Toenena korende oiroke :
45011021	naki onye Nyasaye taberete chinsagia chia boronge , nonya naye tagokwabera .
45011022	Inyora obuya nobotindi bwa Nyasaye : ase baria bagure as'obotindi ; korende asore obuya bwa Nyasaye , koraikaranse as'obuya obwo : onye taribo , aye naye nonacherwe are .
45011023	Nabwo bonsi bataikaranseti as'ogotancha kwabo , nabachomwe , ekiagera Nyasaye nanyare kobachoma naende .
45011024	Naki onye aye kwanachetwe okarusigwa as'omozeituni bw'orosana , ogachomwa as'ogochomwa gotagwenereti , as'omozeituni ore omuya : tari kobua mono aba abare abanyene , bachomwe as'omozeituni obo abanyene .
45011025	Naki tindigeti abaminto timomanya ayobobisi obo , timwerora ng'a igomore abanyene obong'aini , ng'a ensemo y'obokong'u bwabanyorire Abaisiraeli , goika ogoikerana kw'Ebisaku goikerane ;
45011026	na iga , Abaisiraeli bonsi nabakonyeke , buna yarigetwe , Ere oyogokonya nache korwa Zayoni ; Namorusananie Yakobo nobobe bwaye ,
45011027	Neye nero emuma yane nabarabwo , Ngocha kobaruseria ebibe biabo .
45011028	Naboigo as'amang'ana enchili , babaire ababisa as'engecho yaino : korende as'engecho y'ogochorwa koria , babaire abanchani as'engecho ye chisokoro chiaito .
45011029	Naki ebiegwa bia Nyasaye nokorangeria kwaye tibiri nogweitia .
45011030	Naki buna inwe kare motarenge nokoigwera ase Nyasaye , korende bono mwanyorire okwaberwa as'ogotancha kwabo ,
45011031	naboigo nabwo bataigwereti bono , erinde as'okwaberwa kwaino inwe , nabarabwo banyore okwaberwa .
45011032	Naki Nyasaye obasibire bonsi amo as'ogotaigwera erinde ababere bonsi .
45011033	Aa ! obonda botakorengeka mbore ime ase chisemi nokomanya kwa Nyasaye . Ebina biaye tibikomanyeka , nechinchera chiaye tichikorigeka !
45011034	Naki ning'o omanyete omoyo bw'Omonene ? Gose ning'o okomworokereria ebina biaye ?
45011035	Gose ning'o omoete ere egento ritang'ani , nere naakanwe ?
45011036	Ekiagera ebinto bionsi igobikorua asare , igabire moyo asare , mbire nomoerio asare . Obonene bore nere kare nakare . Amin .
45012001	Gaki , nabasoroire mono , abaminto , as'amabera aye Nyasaye , morue emebere yaino ebe ekeng'wanso kere moyo , egechenu , ekeranyare gwanchwa na Nyasaye , nakio ogosasima kwaino kobagwenerete .
45012002	Gose timwereng'ania chingecho chi'ense eye : korende moonchorwe as'ogokora okuya as'emioyo yaino , monyare komanya boronge obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , bomogwenerete noboikeranete .
45012003	Naki as'obuya naeirwe igo nkomotebia ker'omonto oyore asemore , tarengereria ayare amanene kobua buna emogwenerete korengereria ; korende abe nokorengereria koreng'ana , buna Nyasaye atananeire ker'omonto as'ekerengo gi'okwegena kwaye .
45012004	Koreng'ana buna as'omobere oyomo tore nebimo ebinge , nabirobio ebimo bionsi tibiri gokora omoremo oyomo :
45012005	naboigo naintwe , tore abange tore omobere oyomo ase Kristo , naintwe twensi igotore nebimo ker'oyomo as'oyomwabo .
45012006	Naboigo ekiagera tore nebiegwa bire ao ao , koreng'ana as'obuya twaeirwe , onye nobobani tobane koreng'ana as'okwegena ;
45012007	onye nas'ogokora , tobeo as'ogokora gwaito ; omonyene okworokereria , as'okworokereria kwaye ;
45012008	omonyene ogokonya as'amang'ana , as'ogokonywa kwaye : oyokorua arue as'omoyo oyomo ; oyogotenenera , as'omokia ; oyokwabera as'omogoko .
45012009	Obwanchani bobe botari nobong'ainereria . Mogeche erire ribe ; bwatana nerire rigiya .
45012010	As'obwanchani bw'abamwabo , mobe nokorengereria okuya inwe as'inwe ; as'ogosika mogotang'aneria abamino ;
45012011	as'ekinda , timoba aboro : mobe nomokia as'emioyo yaino , mokomokorera Omonene ;
45012012	as'ogosemeria , niogoke ; as'emechando moremereria ; as'ogosaba , morende ;
45012013	as'okorua as'okoremerwa kw'abachenu ; as'okoroisia abageni , mobe abanyamokia .
45012014	Basesenie abakobarosia ; sesenia , timoragereria .
45012015	Goka amo nabwo bakogoka ; rera amo nabwo bakorera .
45012016	Mobe nokorengereria okomo inwe as'inwe . Timorengereria ayare amanene , korende morengereria ayare ay'oboitongo . Timoba abanto bakoenenera obong'aini .
45012017	Timomoa omonto obobe as'obobe , tang'ania ayare amaya as'amaiso abanto bonsi .
45012018	Keranyarekane ensemo yaino mobe nomorembe nabanto bonsi .
45012019	Timorigia korusia egesiomba abanchani , korende kamwakorirwe bobe tiga ribaga as'endamwamu ya Nyasaye : naki narikire , Egesiomba nekiane inche ; inche ning'akane , otebire Omonene .
45012020	Naboigo omobisa oo karabe nenchara moragerie ; karabe nerang'o , moe anywe ; ekiagera kogokora iga , nomobekere amakara omorero omotwe oye .
45012021	Tobugwa nobobe , korende obue obobe as'obuya .
45013001	Ker'omonto bwonsi abe inse as'okoigwera as'abare nobonene : ekiagera obonene bonde tibori botarueti ase Nyasaye ; namanene ayareo achikirwe na Nyasaye .
45013002	Naboigo oyotarikomoigwera omonyene obonene , igakoamererania namachiko a Nyasaye ; nabarabwo abakoamererania nabenyorere ekina .
45013003	Naki abakogamba tibari obwoba as'engecho y'ogokora okuya , korende as'engecho y'ogokora okobe . Bono , igorigetie tomoiroka oyore nobonene ? Kora ayare amaya , nonyore okobakwa as'amaya aria :
45013004	naki ere nomosomba o Nyasaye asore as'engecho y'amaya . Korende korakore amabe , iroka ; naki tabogoreti omoro bosa : ekiagera nomosomba o Nyasaye okoakana egesiomba as'omokori amabe as'engecho y'endamwamu .
45013005	As'ayio mogwenerete koigwera , tari as'engecho y'endamwamu yoka , korende nas'engecho y'ebirengererio .
45013006	As'engecho eyio naende nakio mokoruera ebango ; naki barabwo nabasomba ba Nyasaye , kobagokora emeremo eyio eyio .
45013007	Bae bonsi ebia boronge biabo : omonto bw'ebango ebango , nomonto bw'ogochoga ogochoga ; oyogwenerete okoirokwa oirokwa ; oyogwenerete ogosikwa ; osikwa .
45013008	Timoba nesira as'onde bwonsi , tatiga ogwanchana : naki oyomwanchete omonto omwabo oikeranirie amachiko .
45013009	Naki koria , Totomana , Toita , Toiba , Toba kirori ki'oborimo , Torengereria , na gokorabeo gochika konde gwonsi , kwabekeranigwe ase ring'ana eri , ng'a Mwanche omogisangi oo buna omobere oo .
45013010	Obwanchani tibokomokorera omogisangio ring'ana ribe ; naboigo obwanchani nabwo oboikerania bw'amachiko .
45013011	Nas'ayio , tonyare komanya ekero , ng'a engaki y'okoboka korwa ase chitoro yaikire : naki bono ogokonyeka igokore ang'e naintwe kobua ekero twegenete .
45013012	Obotuko bwaerire , omobaso oikire : naboigo torusie ogokora kw'omosunte , tweboe ebinto bi'esegi bi'omobaso .
45013013	Buna egwenerete nomobaso totare as'oboronge ; tari as'okoria bobe nokogosoria , nogotinda , tari as'okorengereria nechingecho chi'obotomani , tari as'eriomana ne ribero .
45013014	Korende mweboe Omonene Yesu Kristo , timoa omobere ribaga goikerania ebirengererio biaye .
45014001	Korende ere oyotari nguru as'okwegena , moroisie , timomogambia as'ebirengererio biaye .
45014002	Omonto nare nokwegena , nigakoria bionsi , korende oria otari nguru igakoria chinyeni .
45014003	Ere oyokoria tamochaya oria otari koria , nere oyotarikoria tamogambia oria okoria , naki Nyasaye omwancheire .
45014004	Aye naye ng'o okomogambia omosomba bw'omonto onde ? As'Omonene oye omonyene igateneine gose igakogwa . Ee , natenenigwe , naki Omonene nare nokobua komotenenia .
45014005	Omonto oyomo narengereretie rituko kobua erinde , noyonde arora ng'a amatuko onsi igareng'aine . Ker'omonto atenene as'obong'aini bwaye omonyene .
45014006	Ere oyoikeranetie rituko igakoikerania as'Omonene : nere oyokoria igakoria as'Omonene , ekiagera igakomoakera Nyasaye mbuya mono ; nere oyotari koria tari koria as'Omonene , nere amoakera Nyasaye mbuya mono .
45014007	Ekiagera onde tari as'egati yaito ore moyo as'omobere oye omonyene , nonde tari ogokwa bweka omonyene as'omobere oye .
45014008	Naki onye tore moyo , igo tore moyo as'Omonene ; gose onye togokwa igo togokwa as'Omonene : naboigo onye tore moyo gose onye togokwa , igotore ab'Omonene .
45014009	Ekiagera Kristo nakwete naende akaboka akaba moyo as'engecho eye , erinde abe Omonene as'abare moyo nabakure bonsi .
45014010	Korende aye inee ! naseki okomogambia oyomino ? Naye inee naseki okomochaya oyomino ? Ekiagera intwe twensi natotenene as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina gia Kristo .
45014011	Naki nerikire , As'obogima bwane okwanire Omonene , amaru onsi nabekwe inse as'obosio bwane , Nechimeme chionsi nachimwatore Nyasaye .
45014012	Bono onye naboigo , ker'omonto ime asetore narusie amang'ana aye omonyene as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
45014013	As'ayio titoba nkonakogambania tore , korende anga mbuya mogambe ekina iga , oyominto tabekwa egento gekomogocha gose gi'okomoiyeria .
45014014	Namanyire naende naenekirie mono as'Omonene Yesu , ng'a gento tikeri kere neubi ekenyene , tatiga asare oyo ogokerora ng'a negento ekebe , asare oyio egento keria nekebe .
