45014015	Noyomino karabe nogoichana , as'engecho y'endagera , gwatigire kogenda as'obwanchani . As'endagera yao tomosaria omonto oria ere Kristo akwete as'engecho yaye .
45014016	Naboigo tibwatorwa bobe as'obwo obuya bwaino .
45014017	Naki obonda bwa Nyasaye tari okoria nokonywa , korende as'oboronge nomorembe nomogoko as'Omoika Omochenu .
45014018	Ekiagera ere oyokomokorera Kristo as'amang'ana aya onsi igakomogwenera Nyasaye , naende igagwancherwa na mwanyabanto .
45014019	Korende onye naboigo , tiga totunyane chingecho chi'omorembe nechingecho chigwenerete as'okoagachana .
45014020	As'engecho y'enyama tosaria emeremo ya Nyasaye . Bionsi nebichenu ; korende mbobe omonto kararie nokwegocha .
45014021	Mbuya ogotaria enyama nonya nokonywa edivai gose gokora ring'ana riria riagochire oyomino gose riamoiyeirie gose riamokorire omoreu .
45014022	Okwegena kwao obe nakorokwo as'omoy'oo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye . Nare negesio omonto oria otenachereti ekina ase ring'ana riria anchire .
45014023	Korende oyore nemioyo ebere , onye okoria , onacheirwe ekina , ekiagera tarieti as'okwegena . Nogokora gwonsi gotarueti as'okwegena okwo nebibe .
45015001	Naboigo atogwenerete intwe abwo tore nechinguru kobobogoria oboreu bwabo abatari nechinguru , tetogwenereti kwegwenera emebere yaito .
45015002	Ker'omonto ore ime yaito tiga amogwenere omogisangio anyore amaya ayaranyare komoagacha .
45015003	Naki Kristo nere tegwenerete omonyene ; korende buna yarigetwe , Emerumi yabo bakoramete yanyorete inche .
45015004	Naki onsi ayatang'anete korikwa igarigetwe as'ogotworokereria intwe , erinde as'oboremereria nogokonywa kw'amariko tonyare koba nogosemeria .
45015005	Na Nyasaye omonyene oboremereria nogokonya , abakonye korengereria ayamo inwe ase inwe , buna Yesu Kristo :
45015006	erio as'omoyo oyomo nas'omonwa oyomo monyare komobaka Nyasaye , Tata bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
45015007	Naboigo moroisanie , buna Kristo nere abaroisirie , erinde Nyasaye abakwe .
45015008	Bono nakwanire , Yesu Kristo okorekire omosomba bw'okwarokigwa as'engecho y'ekeene kia Nyasaye , erinde achiikeranie chiira baetwe abatata baito ,
45015009	Nebisaku bamobake Nyasaye as'engecho y'amabera aye ; buna yarigetwe , As'engecho eye ninkobake as'Ebisaku , Nerieta riao ninditere .
45015010	Naende , otebire , Goka , Ebisaku , amo nabanto baye .
45015011	Naende , Mobake Omonene Ebisaku bionsi ; Abanto bonsi bamobake .
45015012	Naende Isaya agakwana , Naribe ritina ria Yesse , Nere naoroke kobagambera Ebisaku ; Nere Ebisaku barasemerie .
45015013	Naboigo Nyasaye bw'ogosemeria abaichorie omogoko bwonsi nomorembe nas'okwegena , monyare komenta mono as'ogosemeria , nase chinguru chi'Omoika Omochenu .
45015014	Nainche omonyene namanyire kegima amang'ana aino , abaminto , ng'a inwe nainwe mwaichoirwe namaya , mwaichoirwe nobong'aini bwonsi , namonyare kworokererania .
45015015	Korende nabarikeire , abaminto bane , as'oboremu kobua as'ensemo ye rirube eri , ng'a nkobainyoria as'obuya boria naetwe na Nyasaye ,
45015016	erinde mbe omosomba o Yesu Kristo as'abanto b'Ebisaku , nkorere enchili ya Nyasaye emeremo y'obosomba , erinde ebisaku babe nesadaka eyancheire , koyasibigwe n'Omoika Omochenu .
45015017	Bono ninde nengecho y'okwebaka ase Kristo Yesu as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
45015018	Naki tinkonyara gwatora ring'ana eriatakorete Kristo ase emeremo yane , ebisaku binyare koigwera ase ring'ana gose as'ogokora ase chinguru nebikone nogokumia ,
45015019	ase chinguru chi'Omoika Omochenu ; erinde korwa ase Yerusalemu nechinsemo chiaye goika Illuriko , natiekire koyerandia enchili ya Kristo as'ogoikerania .
45015020	Naboigo ngakora okorengereria kwane , koyerandia enchili , timbaisa korandia aria as'erieta ria Kristo riatoirwe , erinde timbaisa koagacha igoro as'oboroso bw'omonto onde .
45015021	Korende , buna yarigetwe , Baria batarandeirie amang'ana aye nabarore , Na baria bataigweti nabainyore .
45015022	Nakio kiagerete ngatangwa ebiro ebinge tinaika asemore .
45015023	Korende bono , ekiagera tindi neribaga naende ase chinsemo echi , naende korwa emiaka emenge , narenge nokorengereria goika asemore ,
45015024	kero kende gionsi , gonkogenda Hispania ninchiche asemore , as'engecho inde namaiga kobarora inwe as'orogendo rwane ; nagokobwa nainwe , nomoyo one kogokigwa nainwe ekero egeke .
45015025	Na bono ningende Yerusalemu , mbe nkobakorerande abachenu .
45015026	Naki abagweneire abanto ba Makedonia n'Akaya gokora okorua as'engecho y'abachenu ba Yerusalemu abare abataka .
45015027	Ee , abagweneire , naende nabasira babo . Naki onye abanto b'ebisaku babwatanire nabarabwo nebinto biabo bi'omoika , igobaraakanwe nabarabwo as'okobakorera as'ebinto biabo bi'omobere .
45015028	Naboigo kondaikeranie ring'ana eri nakobabekera ekemanyererio kie ritunda eri , ning'ete asemore , na nkorua asemore ngende Hispania .
45015029	Nainche namanyire ng'a kondache asemore ninchiche as'oboichore bw'egesio gi'enchili ya Kristo .
45015030	Nabasoroire , abaminto , as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo nas'obwanchani bw'Omoika , kabe nomokia amo nainche as'ogosaba kwaino as'engecho yane as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ;
45015031	erinde ntorigwe na baria bataigwereti ase Boyahudi , naende ogokora kwane inde nakorokwo aria Yerusalemu kogwenere as'abwo abachenu ;
45015032	inyare goika asemore nomogoko Nyasaye karanche , inyare konyora ogotimoka amo nainwe .
45015033	Nyasaye bw'omorembe abe amo nainwe mwensi . Amin .
45016001	Nabaeire okobakwa okuya kwa Foibe oyominto , oyore omosomba as'ekanisa ere Kenkrea :
45016002	erinde monioroisie as'Omonene , buna ebagwenerete abachenu , momokonye ase ring'ana rinde rionsi ararigie asemore , ekiagera ere nere obaire omokonyi bw'abanto abange , agankonya nainche omonyene .
45016003	Nkwaneria Priska na Akula , abakori emeremo amo nainche ase Kristo Yesu ,
45016004	babete ang'e nonya nkonachwa omotwe as'engecho y'obogima bwane ; barabwo nabaakeire ng'a mbuya mono , gose tari inche bweka korende chikanisa chi'Ebisaku :
45016005	nkwaneria ekanisa ere as'enyomba yabo , Nkwaneria Epaineto omwanchi one , ore bwe ritang'ani as'Asia ase Kristo .
45016006	Nkwaneria Mariamu bwechandete mono as'engecho yaino .
45016007	Nkwaneria Androniko na Yunia , abaamate baito , basibetwe amo nainche , abamanyekanete as'abatomwa ; na barabwo igo barenge ase Kristo ritang'ani asende .
45016008	Nkwaneria Amplia , omwanchi one as'Omonene .
45016009	Nkwaneria Urubano , omokori emeremo amo nainche ase Kristo , na Staku , omwanchi one .
45016010	Nkwaneria Apele oyo bwancheretwe ase Kristo . Nkwaneria abanto b'enyomba ya Aristobulo .
45016011	Nkwaneria Herodioni , omoamate one . Nkwaneria abanto b'enyomba ya Nakisso bare ase Kristo .
45016012	Nkwaneria Turufena na Turufosa , abagokora emeremo as'Omonene . Nkwaneria Perisi omwanchwa , oyokorire omokia mono as'Omonene .
45016013	Nkwaneria Rufo , omorusananigwa ase Kristo , na ng'ina ore baba , nainche .
45016014	Nkwaneria Asunkrito , Elegoni , Herme , Patroba , Herma , nabaminto abare amo nabarabwo .
45016015	Nkwaneria Fililogo na Yulia na Nereu , noyomwabo , na Olumpa , nabachenu bonsi bare amo nabarabwo .
45016016	Bankwanerie as'ogokwania ogochenu . chikanisa chionsi chia Kristo chiabakwanirie .
45016017	Nabasoroire , abaminto , mobarigererie baria bakoreta ogwatananeka nechingecho chi'okogocha , kore ao nokworokererigwa mweorokereirie , mweatanane nabarabwo .
45016018	Naki abwo mbarabwo batari komokorera Omonene oito Kristo , korende nechinda chiabo abanyene ; nas'amang'ana amaroro nay'okwegweneria , bang'aina emioyo y'abanto batari ababe .
45016019	Naki okoigwera kwaino , gwaikeire abanto bonsi . Naboigo nagokire as'engecho yaino , korende nindigetie mobe abanyene chisemi as'amang'ana amaya , nabariri as'amang'ana amabe .
45016020	Nyasaye bw'omorembe namotache Saitani inse as'amagoro aino bwango . Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe .
45016021	Timotheo , omokori emeremo amo nainche obakwanirie ; na Lukio na Yasoni na Sospatro , abaamate bane .
45016022	Inche Teritio , oyokorika rirube eri , nabakwanirie as'Omonene .
45016023	Gayo omoroisia one noyo bw'ekanisa engima , obakwanirie . Erasto omogachi bwe chishilingi bw'omochie obakwanirie , na Kwarito oyominto .
45016024	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe mwensi . Amin .
45016025	Bono asare ere oyoranyare kobakong'ia as'enchili yane , nas'okorandigwa kwa Yesu Kristo , nas'okomanoka kw'obobisi boria bwabisegete korwa kare nakare ,
45016026	korende bono bwaorokire as'amariko ay'ababani , amanyekanire as'ebisaku bionsi buna Nyasaye o kare nakare achigete erinde baigwere okwegena ;
45016027	Nyasaye omonyene chisemi ere bweka , abakwe ase Yesu Kristo , kare nakare , Amin .
46001001	Paulo , orangeretigwe koba omotomwa o Yesu Kristo as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , na Sosthene oyominto ,
46001002	as'ekanisa ya Nyasaye ere ase Korintho , as'abwo basibigwe ase Kristo Yesu , abarangerigwe babe abachenu amo na bonsi abakorirangeria erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ker'aase , Omonene obo noyoito :
46001003	obuya bobe asemore nomorembe okorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito , nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
46001004	Namoakeire Nyasaye ng'a mbuya mono amatuko onsi as'engecho yaino , as'engecho y'obuya bwa Nyasaye mwaetwe ase Kristo Yesu ;
46001005	ekiagera ase kera ring'ana mogatenengeka as'ere , as'amang'ana onsi , nechisemi chionsi ;
46001006	buna oborori bwa Kristo bwaikeranire asemore :
46001007	na bono timoremeiri ekeegwa kende gionsi , komoganyete mono okoorokigwa kwaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo :
46001008	nere nabakong'ie goika omoerio , timoba nokomocha ase rituko riria ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
46001009	Nyasaye noyo bw'ekeene , as'ere mwarangerigwe nere mosoe as'okobwatana kw'Omwana oye , Yesu Kristo Omonene oito .
46001010	Nabasoroire inwe , baminto , as'erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , mokwane mwensi ayamo , tikoba asemore ogwatananeka ; korende mobe moikeranetie as'okorengereria okomo nokorenga okomo .
46001011	Naki natebigwe amang'ana aino , baminto , na baria bare b'enyomba ya Kloe , ng'a eriomana ndire asemore .
46001012	Engecho yaye yagera nakwana bo , ng'a ker'omonto ore asemore igagoteba , Inche noyo Paulo ; nainche noyo bw'Apolo ; nainche noyo Kefa ; nainche noyo Kristo .
46001013	Inee , Kristo bwatananekire ? Paulo igabambetwe as'engecho yaino ? gose iga mwabatiswa as'erieta ria Paulo ?
46001014	Namoakeire Nyasaye ng'a mbuya mono , as'engecho ntabatisete monto asemore otatiga Krispo na Gayo ;
46001015	omonto tabaisa goteba ng'a mwabatisetwe as'erieta riane .
46001016	Naende nkabatisa abanto b'enyomba ya Stefano : kobua as'abwo , timanyeti gose nabatisa ' monto onde .
46001017	Naki Kristo tantometi ng'a mbatise , korende ndandie enchili : tari ase chisemi chi'amang'ana , omosalaba o Kristo tobaisa koba egento kia bosa .
46001018	Naki ase ring'ana ri'omosalaba as'abwo bagosira nobokayayu ; korende asetore intwe twakonyirwe nechinguru chia Nyasaye .
46001019	Naki nerikire , Ninsarie chisemi chiabo abanyene chisemi , Nobong'aini bwabo abanyene obong'aini nimbwange .
46001020	Ng'ai are omonyene chisemi ? ng'ai are omoriki ? ng'ai are oyokoamererania namang'ana ay'ens'eye ? inee , Nyasaye takorete chisemi chi'ens'eye koba oboriri ?
46001021	Naki ase chisemi chia Nyasaye , ense etanyarete komomanya Nyasaye ase chisemi chiaye , Nyasaye agancha kobakonya abanchete as'oboriri bwe ring'ana riria rikorandigwa .
46001022	Ekiagera Abayahudi barigetie ebikone , n'Abayunani bakorigia chisemi :
46001023	korende intwe iga tokomorandia Kristo , oyobambetwe , as'Abayahudi nekegocha , nas'Abayunani noboriri ;
46001024	korende as'abwo bakorokwa Abayahudi n'Abayunani bonsi , Kristo nechinguru chia Nyasaye , nechisemi chia Nyasaye .
46001025	Ekiagera oboriri bwa Nyasaye mbore nechisemi kobua echia mwanyabanto ; noboreu bwa Nyasaye mbore nechinguru kobua echia mwanyabanto .
46001026	Naki rora okorangerigwa kwaino , baminto , ng'a tari abange abanyene chisemi chi'omobere , tari abange abanyene chinguru , tari abange bare nobonene , barangerigwe ;
46001027	korende Nyasaye agachora amariri ense abasokie abanyene chisemi ; naende akabichora ebinto ebireu bi'ense erinde abare nechinguru basokigwe ;
46001028	nere akabichora ebinto ebioro bi'ense nebichaire , ee , nebinto ebitaiyo , erinde abiranie inse ebireo :
46001029	erinde omonyene omobere bwonsi tobaisa gwetogia as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
46001030	Korende as'ere inwe mwanyarire koba ase Kristo Yesu , orenge asetore chisemi chiruete ase Nyasaye , noboronge , nogosibigwa , nogotorigwa :
46001031	ng'a , buna arigetwe , Ere oyogwetogia tigetogie as'Omonene .
46002001	Nainche , ekero nachete asemore baminto , tincheti kobaranderia obobisi bwa Nyasaye as'obuya bw'amang'ana , gose ase chisemi .
46002002	Naki narengereretie timanya ring'ana rinde rionsi asemore otatiga Yesu Kristo , nere obambirwe .
46002003	Nainche iga narenge asemore as'oboreu nokoiroka , nokoiguswa okonge .
46002004	Nering'ana riane nokorandia kwane tikwarenge as'amang'ana aye chisemi chia mwanyabanto echi'okoebereria obong'aini bw'abanto , korende as'ekiorokererio ki'Omoika nechinguru :
46002005	okwegena kwaino tikoba ase chisemi chi'abanto , korende ase chinguru chia Nyasaye .
46002006	Korende nchire chisemi togoteba egati y'abaisanire : nachirochio tari chisemi chi'ens'eye , gose echiabo abagambi ens'eye , abakoonchorerigwa :
46002007	korende tokwana chisemi chia Nyasaye as'obobisi , echio chiabisetwe , echia Nyasaye atebete korwa omochakano as'obonene bwaito :
46002008	ekiagera abare kogamba ens'eye tibayemanyete nonya noyomo ; ng'a onye mbamanyete anga tibamobambete Omonene bw'obonene ;
46002009	korende buna yarigetwe , Amang'ana ay'eriso ritayaroche gose ogoto tikwayaigwa Gose tasoete as'enkoro ya mwanyabanto , Amang'ana aya Nyasaye abaroseirie abamwanchete .
46002010	Korende Nyasaye otoorokeirie intwe as'Omoika oye , naki Omoika origirie onsi , nonya nobobisi bwa Nyasaye .
46002011	Naki ning'o oyamanyire amang'ana aya mwanyabanto , otatiga omoyo o mwanyabanto ore ime asare ? naboigo amang'ana a Nyasaye tari onde oyamanyete otatiga Omoika o Nyasaye .
46002012	Naintwe titwanyorete omoika bw'ense , korende omoika oruete ase Nyasaye ; tonyare koyamanya aya twaeirwe na Nyasaye .
46002013	Naro toyakwana , tari as'amang'ana tworokererigwe nechisemi chia mwanyabanto , korende tworokererigwe n'Omoika ; tokoyareng'ania amang'ana omoika namang'ana omoika .
46002014	Nabo mwanyabanto ore nechingecho chia kare takoyanyora amang'ana omoika o Nyasaye , naki asare oyo noboriri ; gose takonyara koyamanya , ekiagera igakomanyekana as'engecho y'omoika .
46002015	Korende omonto bw'omoika igakoyamanya onsi , gose ere takomanyigwa nomonto .
46002016	Naki ning'o omanyete ebirengererio bi'Omonene , amworokererie ? Korende intwe ntore nebirengererio bia Kristo .
46003001	Nainche , baminto , tinanyarete gokwana , buna abanto b'omoika , korende buna abanto b'omobere , buna nabana abake ase Kristo .
46003002	Nabarageirie amabere , timbaragereti endagera ; ekiagera konya timorayenyara : ee , nonya mbono timorayenyara :
46003003	ekiagera nonya mbono iga more abanto b'omobere : naki onye more neribero neriomana , nogwatananeka , inee , timori abanto b'omobere inwe , naende iga mokogenda ase chingecho chia mwanyabanto ?
46003004	Ekiagera ekero omonto oyomo akobora , inche noyo Paulo : noyonde inche noyo Apolo : inee , timori abanto b'omobere ?
46003005	Gaki Apolo ning'o ? Na Paulo ning'o ? Nabakori emeremo ekiagera asebare mwanyorire ogwancha , ker'omonto buna Omonene amoete .
46003006	Inche ngasimeka , Apolo akabeka amache , korende oyogokinia Nyasaye .
46003007	Onye nabo oyosimegete tai gento nonya noyokobeka amache , korende Nyasaye ogokinia .
46003008	Naboigo oyogosimeka , noyokobeka amache nabamo : na ker'omonto nanyore eng'eria yaye koreng'ana buna emeremo yaye omonyene .
46003009	Naki intwe nabakori emeremo amo na Nyasaye : inwe nomogondo o Nyasaye , noboagacho bwa Nyasaye .
46003010	As'okoreng'ana nobuya bwa Nyasaye naetwe inche , buna omonene bw'abaagachi omonyene chisemi , nabobekire oboroso , nomonto onde oagacha igoro yaye . Korende ker'omonto arigereria buna aagachire igoro aroro .
46003011	Naki'boroso bonde tibori ' monto aranyare kobeka , otatiga boria bwatiekire kobekwa , nabwo Yesu Kristo .
46003012	Korende omonto karaagache igoro as'oboroso ethahabu , gose efetha , gose ebinto bie rigori rinene , gose emete , gose obonyansi , gose chinsiaga ;
46003013	emeremo ya ker'omonto ing'ebe maiso marore . Naki rituko erio ng'eorokie , ekiagera neorokigwe as'omorero ; noyio omorero noteme emeremo ya ker'omonto , ng'a naki ere ,
46003014	Emeremo y'omonto aagachete igoro yaye , kerabue oria omorero nanyore eng'eria .
46003015	Emeremo y'omonto kerayie nasire bosa , korende bweka nakonyeke , korende koria ogokonywa buna ogotaborigwa korwa as'omorero .
46003016	Timomanyeti ng'a inwe ne hekalu ya Nyasaye , ney'Omoika Omochenu oikaransete ime asemore ?
46003017	Gose omonto karasarie hekalu ya Nyasaye , Nyasaye namosarie omonto oyio ; ' naki hekalu ya Nyasaye nechenu , nero ninwe .
46003018	Omonto tabaisa kweng'aina omonyene . Omonto karerore ng'a nomonyene chisemi gati asemore as'ens'eye , tiga abe omoriri , erinde abe omonyene chisemi .
46003019	Naki chisemi chi'ens'eye noboriri ase Nyasaye . Naki yarikirwe , Ereoyokobabwata abare nechisemi as'obong'ainereria bwabo :
46003020	naende , Omonene omanyire okorengereria kw'abanyene chisemi , ng'a nokwa bosa .
46003021	As'ayio omonto tetogia ase mwanyabanto .
46003022	Naki bionsi nebiaino ; onye Paulo , gose Apolo , gose Kefa , gose ense , gose obogima , gose amakweri , gose biria bire bono , gose ebio birachekoba , bionsi nebiaino ;
46003023	nainwe naba Kristo ; na Kristo noyo Nyasaye ,
46004001	Omonto natobare iga , ng'a nabasomba ba Kristo , nabarendi b'obobisi bwa Nyasaye .
46004002	Naende ayarigirie as'abarendi , naro omonto arorekane ng'a noyo bw'ekeene .
46004003	Asende , taigento ngambigwe nainwe , gose nokogambigwa kwa mwanyabanto : gose tinkwegambia nonya nomobere one .
46004004	Naki timanyeti engecho y'ogwesoera omobere one ; korende timbareiri oboronge as'engecho y'ayio : korende oyorangambie n'Omonene .
46004005	As'ayio timogamba ring'ana ritang'ani as'ekero kiaye , goika Omonene ache , nere orabaorokerie ayabisegete as'omosunte , nakoyaorokia amang'ana aye chinkoro ; erio ker'omonto aranyore okobakwa kwaye ase Nyasaye .
46004006	Amang'ana aya , baminto , nayakorire koba omogwekano one noyo bw'Apolo as'engecho yaino , erinde as'amang'ana aito monyare kweyorokereria timotamboka as'amang'ana arikire , omonto onde taenena as'omogisangio , as'engecho y'omonto onde .
46004007	Naki ning'o ogwatananire aye noyonde ? inki ore nakio otaranyora ? onye gwakenyorire , inki ogwetogeria buna tonyoreti ?
46004008	Mwatiekire koigota , mwatiekire konyora obotenenku , mwagambire motari naintwe : anga mbuya onye mwagambete , erinde naintwe togambe amo nainwe .
46004009	Naki , mbora Nyasaye otochorire intwe abatomwa omoerio , buna abanto bagambigwe baitwe : ekiagera twabaire ekiorokererio as'ense , nas'amalaika , nase mwanyabanto .
46004010	Intwe iga tore abariri as'engecho ya Kristo , korende inwe more abang'aini ase Kristo , intwe nabareu , korende inwe more nechinguru ; inwe more nobonene , korende intwe titokonyora ogosikwa .
46004011	Nonya negeka eke kia bono , ntore nenchara , nerang'o , mbosa tore , igatokoakwa , titori nobomenyo :
46004012	naende torosa gatogokora emeremo as'amaboko aito abanyene : tokoramwa , twasesenia , tokorosigwa , twaremereria ;
46004013	tokobeigwa , twasorora : twakorirwe buna eogoto y'ense , neubi y'ebinto bionsi goika bono .
46004014	Tinyarigeti aya kobasokia , korende kobakania buna abana nyanchete .
46004015	Naki nonya more naborokia chilifu ase Kristo , timori abaise abange . naki ase Kristo Yesu nababoire as'enchili .
46004016	Gaki nabasoroire , mobe abatunyani bane .
46004017	As'ayio namotomire Timotheo asemore , ore omwana one omwanchwa , oyo bw'ekeene as'Omonene , orabainyorie chingecho chiane chire ase Kristo , buna nkworokereria ker'aase ase ker'ekanisa .
46004018	Abande baenenire ng'a buna tindi gocha asemore .
46004019	Korende ninchiche asemore bwango , Omonene karanche ; nainche nimanye , tari ring'ana riabo abakoenena , korende chinguru chiabo .
46004020	Naki obonda bwa Nyasaye tibori ase ring'ana , korende ase chinguru .
46004021	Inki morigetie ? Ninchiche asemore nenyimbo , gose as'obwanchani nomoika bw'obwororo ?
46005001	Korende amang'ana atebirwe ng'a obotomani mbore as'egati yaino , naende nobotomani buna obo tibwanyakororekana nonya nas'Ebisaku , ng'a omonto oyomo oino nare na moga'ise .
46005002	Inwe mwaenenire gose timoichaneti , erinde arusigwe egati yaino ere oyokorire ring'ana erio ,
46005003	Korende inche ekeene , nintaba aroro as'omobere , korende kondabeo as'omoika , natiekire komogambia ere oyokorire ring'ana erio , buna nao narenge .
46005004	As'erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , inwe komogosangererekana amo nomoika one , amo nokobua kw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ,
46005005	komoa saitani omonto oyio omobere oye osarigwe erinde omoika okonywe ase rituko ri'Omonene Yesu .
46005006	Okwebaka kwaino tikori okuya . Timomanyeti ng'a ememera emeke iga ekobotia ribomba rigima ?
46005007	Esibie , moyerusie ememera eria ya kare , erinde mobe neribomba riyia , buna more motabekiri memera . Naki epasaka yaito yatiekire korugwa ekeng'wanso as'engecho yaito , nere Kristo .
46005008	Gaki torosie as'ekeng'wanso , tari as'ememera ya kare , gose as'ememera y'obobe nobokayayu , korende as'omogati otabekiri memera , nabwo oborabu bw'omoyo nekeene .
46005009	Nabarikerete ase rirube riane , ng'a timosang'anana nabatomani .
46005010	Tintebeti timosang'anana kegima kegima nabatomani b'enseye , gose abanyene okorengereria , gose abauri , gose abagosaba chisanamu ; korende anga iga mwarua as'ense .
46005011	Korende bono nabarikeire ng'a timosang'anana nomonto okorokwa oyomino , karabe omotomani , gose oyokorengereria , gose oyogosaba chisanamu gose omorami , gose oyogotinda gose omouri ; omonto onga buna oyo timwancha nonya nkoria nere .
46005012	Korende nangwenerete ki kobagambia baria bare isiko ? Nainwe timori kobagambia abare ime ?
46005013	Korende abwo bare isiko Nyasaye nabagambie . Moserie omonto oria omobe , taba asemore .
46006001	Inee ! omonto onde oino karabe nering'ana as'oyomwabo agweneire agambigwe as'abwo batari boronge gose tari as'obosio bw'abachenu ?
46006002	Gose timomanyeti ng'a abachenu nabagambie ense ? na onye ense negambigwe nainwe , inee ! timogwenereti kogamba ebina ebire ebike ?
46006003	Timomanyeti ng'a natogambie amalaika ? tari kchua mono amang'ana obogima obo ?
46006004	Gaki komorabe mokogamba obogima obo , iga mokobeka kogamba abwo batabariri buna negento as'ekanisa ?
46006005	Natebire aya as'okobasokia . Inee , naboigo , ng'a asemore onde tari nonya nomonto oyomo ore nechisemi , oranyare konacha amang'ana ayabamwabo .
46006006	Korende mwasoerana , abamino nabamino , naende as'obosio bwabo abatancheti .
46006007	Gaki kwabaire okoremerwa asemore kegima ng'a ngosoerana more inwe as'inwe . Tari buya gokorerwa bobe ? Gaki taibuya kourwa enibo yaino ?
46006008	Korende inwe mwakorire abanto bobe , nakobaura enibo yabo ; ee nas'abamino .
46006009	Gose timomanyeti ng'a ababe tibakoira omwando bw'obonda bwa Nyasaye ? Timong'aineka : abanyaka tibakonyora obonda bwa Nyasaye , gose abasabi chisanamu , gose abatomani , gose abare buna abakungu , gose abasacha abagwesaria nabasacha ,
46006010	gose abaibi , gose abarengereria , gose abagotinda , gose abarami , gose abauri .
46006011	Nabande asemore mwarenge abanto buna aba : korende mogasibigwa , korende mwabarirwe koba noboronge as'erieta ri'Omonene Yesu nas'Omoika o Nyasaye oito .
46006012	Ebinto bionsi mbigwenerete asende , korende tai bionsi bigwenerete . Ebinto bionsi mbigwenerete asende , korende tinkobekwa inse as'okobua kw'egento kende .
46006013	Endagera ney'enda , nenda ney'endagera ; korende Nyasaye nasarie bionsi bibere , enda nendagera . Nomobere tori as'obotomani , korende nas'Omonene : nere Omonene nas'omobere .
46006014	Na Nyasaye akamobokia Omonene , naende natobokie naintwe as'okobua kwaye .
46006015	Timomanyeti ng'a emebere yaino nebimo bia Kristo ? gaki nimbogorie ebimo bia Kristo nakobikora ebimo bi'omokungu omotayayi ? Yaya .
46006016	Timomanyeti ng'a ere oyobwatanigwe nomokungu omotayayi nomobere oyomo nere ? naki otebire , Baria babere nababe omobere oyomo .
46006017	Korende ere oyobwatanigwe n'Omonene nomoika oyomo .
46006018	Tama obotomani . Ker'ebibe bigokorwa na mwanyabanto iga bire isiko as'omobere ; korende ere oyogokora obotomani okorire ebibe as'omobere oye omonyene .
46006019	Gose timomanyeti ng'a omobere oino ne hekalu y'Omoika Omochenu ore ime asemore , mwaeirwe na Nyasaye ? nainwe timori abaino abanyene ;
46006020	naki mwagorirwe ase rigori : as'ayio motogie Nyasaye as'emebere yaino , nase chinkoro chiaino , nachirochio nechia Nyasaye .
46007001	Gaki as'amang'ana mwandikerete : Mbuya omosacha takuna omokungu .
46007002	Korende as'engecho y'obotomani ker'omonto abe na mokaye omonyene , na ker'omokungu abe nomosacha oye .
46007003	Omosacha ae omokungu ekemogwenerete : naboigo omokungu ae omosacha ekemogwenerete .
46007004	Omokungu tari nokobua igoro as'omobere oye , korende nomosacha oye : naboigo nomosacha tari nokobua as'omobere oye , korende nomokungu oye .
46007005	Timorinana otatiga mwatebanirie as'egeka , erinde monyare kwerua as'okweng'ata nogosaba , erinde mobe amo jiaende , erio Saitani tabaisa kobatema as'engecho y'okwerina kwaino .
46007006	Korende natebire aya , nkorusia ayare ayane ; tindueti amachiko .
46007007	Korende ayanyanchete nabanto bonsi babe buna inche omonyene . Korende kera omonto nare nekeegwa kiaye omonyene gekorua ase Nyasaye , oyo iga , noyo iga .
46007008	Korende nabatebirie baria bataranyuoma , n'ababoraka mbuya babe buna inche inde .
46007009	Korende onye tibakonyara gwetanga , tiga banyuome : naki mbuya konyuoma kobua gwoka omorero .
46007010	Korende baria batiekire konyuomana nachikire , gose tari inche , korende Omonene , Omokungu tatigana nomosacha oye .
46007011	Korende , karabe otiganire nere , aikaranse tanyuomwa , gose abwatane nomosacha oye naende ; naende omosacha tamotiga mokaye .
46007012	Korende abanto bande nabatebirie inche , gose tari Omonene : Onye onde ominto ore nomokungu otancheti , nomokungu bwanchire koba nere , tamotiga .
46007013	Nomokungu ore nomosacha otancheti , omosacha oye karanche koba nere , tamotiga .
46007014	Naki oria omosacha otancheti osibigwe ase mokaye , noria omokungu otancheti osibigwe as'omosacha oye : onye taibo abana baino anga tibari abachenu ; korende bono nabachenu .
46007015	Korende oria otancheti karagende , tigagende : oyominto omosacha gose oyominto omokungu tasibiri : korende Nyasaye otorangeirie as'omorembe .
46007016	Naki ng'ai oramanyere aye omokungu , onye nomokonye omosacha oo ? gose ng'ai oramanyere aye omosacha onye nomokonye omokungu oo ?
46007017	Korende Nyasaye buna abagabeire ker'omonto buna amorangeirie ker'omonto , tiga agende boigo . Naboigo nachigete ase chikanisa chionsi .
46007018	Mont'onde bwonsi orangerigwe nere otiekire kwaroka ? tekora buna tarogeti ? Mont'onde orangerigwe tarogeti ? taroka .
46007019	Okwaroka tai gento , nogotaroka tai gento ; korende nokoyabwata amachiko a Nyasaye .
46007020	Ker'omonto tiga aikaranse as'aria arenge naro gakorangerigwa .
46007021	Inee , kwarangeretigwe kore omosomba ? torora ng'a mbobe : korende koranyare gosiborwa , mbuya obe bo .
46007022	Naki oyorangeretigwe as'Omonene karenge omosomba , nomosiborwa as'Omonene : naboigo noyorangeretigwe osiboire , nomosomba o Kristo .
46007023	Mokagorua ase rigori : timoba abasomba b'abanto .
46007024	Ker'omonto , baminto , tiga aikaranse boigo buna arangeretigwe .
46007025	As'amang'ana abaiseke abekungi tindi namachiko as'Omonene : korende nabaeire ayane , buna oyonyorire okwaberwa korwa as'Omonene koba omwegeni .
46007026	Narorire ng'a ring'ana eri nerigiya as'engecho y'emechando eye tore nero , ng'a mbuya omonto aikaranse buna are .
46007027	Gwasibirwe as'omokungu ? torigia gosiborwa . Gogwasiboirwe ? torigia omokungu .
46007028	Korende , koranyuome , tori nabibe ; nomoiseke omwekungi okonyuomwa , tari nebibe . Korende abanto abwo nababe nemechando as'omobere : korende nindigetie kobatanga as'eyio .
46007029	Korende , natebire iga , baminto , ekero getigarete tai kenene ; gaki korwa bono baria bare nabakungu tiga babe buna tibabwati ;
46007030	na baria bakorera buna tibari korera ; na baria bakogoka buna tibagogeti ; na baria bakogora babe buna tibari nagento .
46007031	Na baria bamenyete enseye , babe buna batayerengereretie mono ; naki amang'ana enseye ngoetare .
46007032	Korende nindigetie ng'a timoba nogwechanda . Oyotaranyuoma igarengereretie amang'ana Omonene , buna aramogwenere Omonene ;
46007033	korende oyonyuomire igakorengereria amang'ana enseye , buna aramogwenere mokaye .
46007034	Naende ogwatananeka nkore egati y'omokungu nomoiseke omwekungi . Ere oyotaranyuomwa igakorengereria amang'ana Omonene , anyare koba omochenu as'omobere nas'emoika : korende oyonyuomirwe igakorengereria amang'ana ense , buna aramogwenere omosacha oye .
46007035	Natebire aya , as'okobakonya : tari buna iga nabategera obeto , nas'engecho ya biria bigwenerete , monyare komokorera Omonene motang'usiri namang'ana ande ;
46007036	korende omonto onde bwonsi kararore ng'a tamokorereti omoiseke omwekungi ayamogwenerete , na onye oeteire obuya bw'obwana bwaye , onye origetie , tiga akore buna aroche ; takoreti bibe ; tiga banyuomane .
46007037	Korende oyotenenire as'oboremu bw'omoyo oye , tari nokorigia , korende onyarire kogambera ebirengererio biaye , naende orengereirie omoyo oye komorenda omoiseke omwekungi oye , nakore buya .
46007038	Gaki oyomonyuomire omoiseke omwekungi okorire buya ; noyotamonyuometi okorire buya kobua .
46007039	Omokungu igasibire ekero omosacha oye are moyo , korende omosacha oye gakure , osiboirwe ; nanyare konyuomwa nomonto onde bwonsi oyomorigeti ; ko as'Omonene oka .
46007040	Korende anga mbuya kobua karaikaranse buna are ; igo nabo ndoche inche : nainche narengereirie ng'a ninde n'Omoika bw'Omonene .
46008001	Nas'amang'ana ebinto bikorugwa ekeng'wanso as'esanamu : Twamanyire ng'a intwe intwensi ntore nobong'aini . Obong'aini iga bokoreta oboenenu , korende obwanchani iga bokoagacha .
46008002	Omonto karakage ng'a namanyete ring'ana rinde rionsi , taramanya nonya mbono , buna amogwenerete amanye .
46008003	Korende omonto karamwanche Nyasaye , oyo omanyirwe nere .
46008004	Gaki as'amang'ana okoria ebinto bikorugwa ekeng'wanso as'esanamu , twamanyire ng'a esanamu tai gento as'ense , naende twamanyire ng'a Nyasaye onde tari ande otatiga oyomo bweka .
46008005	Gaki nonya bare abande bakorokwa chinyasaye , kobarabe igoro gose ense , buna bare chinyasaye chinyinge , nabanene abange ;
46008006	korende asetore intwe nare Nyasaye oyomo bweka , ore Tata , nebinto bionsi biarure asare , naintwe iga tore moyo asare ; nare Omonene oyomo Yesu Kristo , nas'engecho yaye nebinto bionsi biabaire , naintwe ntore moyo asare .
46008007	Korende obong'aini obo tibori ime as'abanto bonsi : korende abande as'okwenaria esanamu eria goika bono , baria buna egento kiarurue ekeng'wanso ase esanamu ; nokorengereria kwabo , ekiagera iga kore okoreu , kwabekwa eubi .
46008008	Korende enyama tegotoreta ang'e ase Nyasaye : ekiagera gatorarie tegotomenta gento , natotaria tegotokeyia gento .
46008009	Korende rigereria okonyara kwaino tigocha kobagocha baria bare abareu .
46008010	Naki omonto karakorore aye omanyete chingecho , goikaransete as'endagera ime ase hekalu y'esanamu , inee , ebirengererio bi'omonto oyo , kare omoreu , takonyora oboremu goika arie ebinto bikorugwa ekeng'wanso as'esanamu ?
46008011	Noria omoreu osirigwa as'engecho yao , nere noyomino Kristo akwete as'engecho yaye .
46008012	As'ayio komorabakorere ebibe abamino nagosaria ebirengererio biabo bire ebireu , mwakoreire Kristo ebibe .
46008013	As'ayio enyama kerabe nokogocha oyominto tinkoria enyama goika kare nakare , timbaisa komogocha oyominto .
46009001	Inee , inche tindi omotomwa ? inche tindi omosiborwa ? timorochi Yesu Kristo Omonene oito ? inwe tari emeremo yane as'Omonene ?
46009002	Naki onye inche tindi omotomwa as'abande , korende nomotomwa asemore inwe : naki ekemanyererio ki'obotomwa bwane , ninwe as'Omonene .
46009003	Okoiraneria kwane baria bakomboria noko .
46009004	Inee ! titori nokobua gw'okoria nakonywa ?
46009005	Titori nokobua kobogoria amo naintwe omokungu ore oyominto , buna abwo abatomwa bande , nabamwabo Omonene , na Kefa ?
46009006	Gose inee , ninche bweka na Barnaba totari nokobua gokora emeremo ?
46009007	Ning'o okogenda esegi kero kende gionsi as'eng'eria yaye omonyene ? ning'o osimekire omogondo bw'emesabibu otarie amatunda aye ? gose ning'o okorisia riicho , otakonywa amabere aye riicho ?
46009008	Inee , iga nakwanire aya buna mwanyabanto ? gose amachiko naro tari goteba boigo ?
46009009	Naki as'amachiko a Musa narikire , tobaisa kobeka eng'ombe ekeokio ekero chigotindacha engano as'okoora . Inee , Nyasaye narengereretie amang'ana aye chiombe ?
46009010	Gose otebire ayio as'engecho yaito ? Ee , igarikire as'engecho yaito : buna oyokorema nagwenerete korema as'ogosemeria ; nere oyokoora igakoora ogosemeria kwaye konyora ensemo y'ogosemeria kwaye .
46009011	Onye intwe twabasimekeire ebinto bi'omoika inee ! nering'ana rinene gatoragese ebinto biaino bi'omobere ?
46009012	Onye abande babwatanire okobua oko igoro asemore , intwe tari kobua ? Korende titorigokorera okobua oko ; korende iga tokoremereria amang'ana onsi , titobaisa gotanga enchili ya Kristo .
46009013	Timomanyeti ng'a baria bagokora emeremo ye hekalu iga bakoria ensemo y'ebinto bie hekalu , na baria bagokorera amathabau mbare nensemo yabo as'ebimo bi'amathabau ?
46009014	N'Omonene naboigo ochikire ng'a baria bakoyerandia enchili banyora korwa enchili .
46009015	Korende tindakorera amang'ana aya nonya ndimo . Gose tinyarigeti aya erinde abe boigo asende ; naki mbuya ninkwa kobua omonto onde bwonsi goonchora okobaka kwane kobe bosa .
46009016	Naki nonya nkorandia enchili , tindi neri ingwetogeria ; naki tindi nande goika nkore ; naende obobe nobwane ntayerandeti .
46009017	Naki kondakore emeremo eye as'ogwancha kwane , ninde neng'eria ; onye tari as'ogwancha kwane , korende negenirwe as'oborendi .
46009018	Gaki eng'eria yane inki ? Neye , ng'a gonkorandia nindue enchili ya Kristo eng'eria etaiyo , erinde nintasaba oboronge bwane inde naborobwo as'enchili .
46009019	Naki nonya inde nsiboire as'abanto bonsi , nekorire omosomba o bonsi , erinde nyore abanto abange kobua .
46009020	Narenge Omoyahudi as'Abayahudi , erinde mbanyore Abayahudi ; ase baria bare inse as'amachiko , narenge buna inse as'amachiko , erinde mbanyore baria bare inse as'amachiko .
46009021	Ase baria batari namachiko nkaba buna tindi namachiko . Tari buna tindi namachiko as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , korende oyore inse as'amachiko ase Kristo , erinde mbanyore abatari namachiko .
46009022	As'abareu nkaba omoreu , erinde mbanyore abareu . Iga narenge chinsemo chionsi chi'abanto bonsi , erinde inyare kobakonya abanto ase chinchera chionsi .
46009023	Nainche iga ngokora aya onsi as'engecho y'enchili inyare koba amo nabande .
46009024	Timomanyeti ng'a abwo bakoamererania as'okominyoka chimbero , baminyoka bonsi korende noyomo okonyora ekeegwa ? Minyoka boigo , erinde monyore .
46009025	Na kera oyokoamererania ase chigosori igagwetanga as'onsi . Nabo abwo bagokora bo , erinde banyore egutwa egosareka ; korende intwe neyetagosareka .
46009026	Nonya ninche nkominyokande chimbero boigo , tari buna oyogotiting'ara ; naboigo nkorwana tari buna oyokorwana nembeo .
46009027	Korende igankoyoaka omobere one nakoyokoria ; teba as'enchera ende yonsi konarandeirie abande , inche omonyene mbe omonto okwangwa .
46010001	Baminto tindigeti momoche koinyora ng'a abatata baito bonsi iga barenge inse as'amare , bonsi bagaeta egati y'enyancha ;
46010002	bonsi bakabatiswa ase Musa as'amare nas'enyancha ;
46010003	bonsi bakaria endagera eria , eria y'omoika ;
46010004	bonsi bakanywa okonywa koria koria kw'omoika : naki bakanywa as'egetare ki'omoika kiabatunyanete : negetare keria nakio Kristo .
46010005	Korende abare abange Nyasaye tagweneretwe nabarabwo : naki basiretigwe as'eroro .
46010006	Aya igarenge ebiorokererio asetore , erinde intwe titoba abanto b'okorengereria amabe , buna baria barengereretie .
46010007	Gose timoba abasabi esanamu , buna abande babo ; buna arikire , Abanto igabaikaransete koria nakonywa , bagatenena kogosoria .
46010008	Gose titokora obotomani , buna abande babo bakorete , bakagwa ekero kie rituko erimo abanto chilifu emerongo ebere naisato .
46010009	Gose titomotema Omonene , buna abande babo , bamotemete , bagasirigwa neng'iti .
46010010	Gose timokwemurungania buna abande babo bemurunganetie , bagasirigwa noria omoiti .
46010011	Aya akabanyora abwo , as'engecho y'ebiorokererio ; akarikwa erinde gotokania intwe , abwo togoikerwa nomoerio bw'ense .
46010012	Gaki oyogwekaga ng'a nateneine arigereria tagwa .
46010013	Ogotemwa tikwabanyorete inwe , tatiga koreng'ana buna okwa mwanyabanto baranyare koremereria : korende Nyasaye noyo bw'ekeene , takobatiga motemwe kobua oko moranyare ; korende amo nakoria ogotemwa nakore egesieri mogosokera erinde monyare koremereria .
46010014	As'engecho y'ayio , abanchani bane , tama ogosasima esanamu .
46010015	Iga ngokwana buna as'abanto bare nobong'aini ; moyarenge aya ngokwana .
46010016	Egekombe keria ki'ogosesenia togosesenia , inee tari okobwatana amanyinga a Kristo ? Omogati oria togosamunyora tari okobwatana omobere o Kristo ?
46010017	Naki omogati noyomo , naintwe tore abange igatore omobereoyomo ; naki intwe twensi tonyora ensemo y'oria omogati oyomo .
46010018	Barigererie Abaisiraeli abare as'engecho y'omobere : abwo bare koria ekio ekeng'wanso , inee , tibar kobwatana namathabau ?
46010019	Gaki nkwane ki ? ng'a esanamu negento ? gose ng'a keria gekorugwa ekeng'wanso as'esanamu negento ?
46010020	Taibo , korende ebinto biria bakorua as'Ebisaku , igabakoruera ebirecha , gose tari Nyasaye : nainche tinyancheti inwe kobwatana amo nebirecha .
46010021	Timokonyara konywera egekombe ki'Omonene , negekombe ki'ebirecha : timokonyara kobwatana as'emesa y'Omonene nas'emesa y'ebirecha .
46010022	Gose iga torigetie Omonene abe neribero ? Gose ntore nechinguru kobua ere ?
46010023	Ebinto bionsi mboronge asende ; korende tari ebinto bionsi bigwenerete . Ebinto bionsi mboronge asende ; korende tari ebinto bionsi bikoagacha .
46010024	Omonto tarigia ebiaye , korende ebi'omogisangio .
46010025	Ker'egento gegotondwa echiro karie , toboraboria as'engecho y'ebirengererio ;
46010026	naki ense ney'Omonene , nabionsi ebichireo .
46010027	Nomonto otancheti karabarangerie inwe , as'endagera , nainwe morigetie kogenda ; karie ker'egento kiabekirwe as'obosio bwaino motari koboraboria as'engecho y'ebirengererio .
46010028	Korende omonto karabatebie , Egento ekio kiarurwe ekeng'wanso as'esanamu , timoria , as'engecho yaye ere akworokia , nas'engecho y'ebirengererio :
46010029	nakwanire , ebirengererio , korende tari ebiao , korende nebia oria oyonde ; aseki nkogambigwa ogosiborwa kwane nebirengererio bi'omonto omwao ?
46010030	Kondarie ensemo yane as'okoiraneria ng'a mbuya , naseki nkoramwa as'egento nasabeire ?
46010031	Gaki komokoria , gose mokonywa , gose mogokora ring'ana rinde rionsi kora onsi as'obonene bwa Nyasaye .
46010032	Timogocha Abayahudi gose Abayunani gose ekanisa ya Nyasaye :
46010033	koreng'ana buna inche nkobagwenera abanto bonsi as'amang'ana onsi , tinarigia kwegwenera inche omonyene , korende okogwenera kwabo bare abange , erinde banyare gokonywa .
46011001	Mobe abatunyani bane buna inche inde omotunyani o Kristo .
46011002	Naende nabatogirie baminto as'engecho mwang'inyoire as'amang'ana onsi , nainwe mwayabwatire aria nabaete koreng'ana buna nabaete .
46011003	Korende nindigetie momanye ng'a omotwe o ker'omonto omosacha noyo Kristo ; nomotwe o ker'omokungu noyo bw'omosacha ; nomotwe o Kristo noyo Nyasaye .
46011004	Ker'omosacha , kagosaba , gose okorua obobani , nere nare negento omotwe , tasigeti omotwe oye .
46011005	Korende ker'omokungu kagosaba , gose okorua obobani , otabiseti omotwe oye , tasigeti omotwe oye : igareng'aine nere oyonachete etukia yaye .
46011006	Naki omokungu otabiseti tiga agingire : onye nas'obosoku omokungu kogingira etukia yaye gose kogingirwa , abisie .
46011007	Naki temogwenereti omosacha kobisigwa omotwe , ekiagera nomogwekano nobonene bwa Nyasaye : korende omokungu nobonene bw'omosacha .
46011008	Ekiagera omosacha tarueti as'omokungu ; korende omokungu as'omosacha .
46011009	Gose omosacha tatongetwe as'engecho y'omokungu ; korende omokungu as'engecho y'omosacha .
46011010	As'ayio nemogwenerete omokungu abe nekemanyererio gie chinguru omotwe oye , as'engecho y'amalaika .
46011011	Korende omosacha takoba atari nomokungu , gose omokungu otari nomosacha as'Omonene .
46011012	Naki buna omokungu aruete as'omosacha , naboigo omosacha nere igakoiborwa nomokungu , korende nebinto bionsi igabiruete ase Nyasaye .
46011013	Egambie inwe abanyene as'emioyo yaino . Inee ! nagwenerete omokungu amosabe Nyasaye atabiseti omotwe oye ?
46011014	Inee , ogochika kw'ebitongwa tikori kworokia ng'a omosacha karabe netukia entambe nobosoku asare ?
46011015	Korende omokungu karabe netukia entambe nobonene bwaye : naki oeirwe eria etukia entambe as'okwebisia .
46011016	Korende omonto onde bwonsi , karigetie koreta amang'ana as'engecho eyio , intwe titori nengecho ende , nonya nase chikanisa chia Nyasaye .
46011017	Korende as'okobaa amachiko ayio tinkobatogia , ekiagera iga mogosangererekaha tari as'ogokonya korende ase bosa .
46011018	Naki ritang'ani komogosangerereka as'ekanisa naigure ng'a ogwatananeka nkore asemore ; ayande as'ensemo nanchire .
46011019	Naki nkogwenerete ogwatananeka kobe as'egati yaino , erinde abancheirwe babe maiso marore asemore .
46011020	Gaki komogosangererekana amo , tegwenereti koria endagera y'Omonene :
46011021	naki ker'oyomo igagotang'ana ko bogoria endagera yaye as'okoria , oyomo nare nenchara , noyonde otindire .
46011022	Inee , timori nenyomba y'okoragera nakonywera ? gose mwayechaire ekanisa ya Nyasaye nakobasokia abwo batari nagento ? Naki ndabatebie ? nimbatogie as'aya ? tinkobatogia .
46011023	Naki inche nkanyora as'Omonene ayanabaeire inwe , ng'a Omonene Yesu obotuko boria aruetwe , akabogoria omogati ;
46011024	gatiekire koiraneria ng'a mbuya , agasamunyora , akabora , Oyo noro omobere one ore as'engecho yaino : kora iga as'okong'inyora inche .
46011025	Naboigo nekio egekombe nyuma as'okoria , akabora , Egekombe eke neki emuma enyia as'amanyinga ane : kora iga ekero mokonywa as'okong'inyora inche .
46011026	Naki ekero mokoria omogati oyo nakonywera egekombe eke , mwarandirie amakweri Omonene goika achiche .
46011027	Gaki ker'oyokoria omogati oyo , gose konywera egekombe eke , atagwenereti , nabe nkwenyorerare obobe as ' engecho y'omobere namanyinga Omonene .
46011028	Korende omonto erenge omonyene , erio arie omogati nakonywera egekombe .
46011029	Naki oyokoria nakonywa otagwenereti igakoria nakonywa ekina as'omobere oye , as'ogotamanya omobere bw'Omonene .
46011030	As'engecho eyio mbare abange asemore abareu nabarwaire , nabanto batai bake bararire .
46011031	Korende gotoregambie buya emioyo yaito anga titwagambigwa .
46011032	Gotokogambigwa , igatogokanigwa n'Omonene , titobaisa konacherwa ekina amo nense .
46011033	Gaki , baminto , komogosangerereka as'okoria moganyane .
46011034	Omonto karabe nenchara arie ase mwaye ; timobaisa gosangerereka as'ekina . N'ayio ayatigaire ngocha ninyarosie .
46012001	As'amang'ana ebiegwa bi'omoika baminto , tindigeti momoche komanya .
46012002	Mwamanyire ng'a ekero mwarenge ab'Ebisaku iga mware koirwa ase chisanamu chitagokwana , buna mware gotang'anwa .
46012003	As'ayio nabatebirie , ng'a ' monto onde ogokwana as'Omoika o Nyasaye , ogokwana , Yesu anathema ; gose omonto takonyara gokwana , Yesu n'Omonene , otatiga as'Omoika Omochenu .
46012004	Nkore ogwatananeka kw'ebiegwa , korende Omoika noro oria oria .
46012005	Nkore ogwatananeka as'ogokora , n'Omonene nere oria oria .
46012006	Nkore ogwatananeka kw'ogokora emeremo , korende Nyasaye nere oria oria ogokora emeremo yonsi ase bonsi .
46012007	Korende ker'oyomo oeirwe okomanorerwa kw'Omoika , erinde akonye bonsi .
46012008	Naki omonto oyomo as'Omoika aegwa ring'ana ri'obong'aini ; nonde ring'ana rie chisemi , as'Omoika oyomo :
46012009	onde okwegena as'Omoika oyomo ; nonde okoegwa gw'okogwenia , as'Omoika oyomo ;
46012010	nonde gokora emeremo y'ebikone ; nonde obobani ; nonde ogwatanana emeika ; nonde chingecho chi'emenwa ; nonde ogoonchora emenwa .
46012011	Korende emeremo eye yonsi ekorwa n'Omoika oyo oyomo , oria oria , okogabera ker'oyomo buna anchete ere .
46012012	Naki buna omobere ore oyomo , noro nore nebimo ebinge , nebimo bionsi bi'omobere oria , nabirobio nebinge ; nomobere noyomo ; naboigo na Kristo .
46012013	Naki as'Omoika oyomo intwe intwensi tokabatiswa togasoa as'omobere oyomo , nonye tore Abayahudi , gose tore Abayunani , onye tore abasomba , gose tore abasibore ; naintwe intwensi tokanyoisigwa Omoika oyomo .
46012014	Naki omobere tori ekimo ekemo , korende ebinge .
46012015	Okogoro gokoratebe , Inche tindi okoboko , gose tindi oyo bw'omobere , inee ! iga tikori okw'omobere as'engecho eyio ?
46012016	Nogoto gokoratebe , Inche tindi eriso , inche tindi oyo bw'omobere ; inee ! tikori okw'omobere as'engecho eyio ?
46012017	Onye omobere bwonsi ore eriso , ng'ai kore okoigwa ? Onye bwonsi nogoto ng'ai kore okonyonka ?
46012018	Korende Nyasaye obekire ebimo ker'ekemo as'omobere buna arigetie .
46012019	Korende onye bionsi bire ekimo ekemo , omobere anga ng'ai ore ?
46012020	Korende bono ebimo nebinge , nomobere noyomo .
46012021	Neriso tirikonyara gotebia okoboko tinkorigeti aye , gose naende omotwe tokonyara gotebia amagoro , timbarigeti inwe .
46012022	Korende kobua mono biria ebimo bi'omobere bigokagwa ng'a tibiri nechinguru , iga birigirie kobua .
46012023	Na biria bigokagwa ng'a tibiri nogosika , ebimo biria twabieire ogosika kobua ; nebimo biaito bitari nobuya , mbire nobuya kobua mono .
46012024	Naki ebimo biaito bire nobuya tibiremeiri : korende Nyasaye obwatanirie omobere , nagokea ogosika keria ekimo kerenieire ;
46012025	erinde tibiba nogwatananeka as'omobere korende ebimo birendane .
46012026	Nekimo ekemo kogiachandirwe , ebimo bionsi biachandwa nabirobio , nekimo ekemo gekobakwa , ebimo bionsi bigoka amo .
46012027	Nainwe more omobere o Kristo , nebimo bi'omobere oyio , oyomo eke noyomo eke .
46012028	Na Nyasaye obekire abande as'ekanisa , abe ritang'ani abatomwa , abakabere ababani , abagatato aborokia , erio ebikone , erio okoegwa gw'okogwenia oborwaire , nogokonyana , nokogamba , nechingecho chi'emenwa .
46012029	Inee ! bonsi nabatomwa , bonsi nababani ? bonsi naborokia ? bonsi ngokora bare ebikone ?
46012030	Bonsi mbare nokoegwa gw'okogwenia abarwaire ? bonsi ngokwanabare emenwa ? bonsi ngoonchorabare ?
46012031	Rigia mono ebiegwa ebiya kobua . Naende naborokirie enchera ere engiya mono .
46013001	Kondakwane as'emenwa ya mwanyabanto neya amalaika , onye tindi nobwanchani , nabaire buna etai ekwoga , gose endege ekobuga .
46013002	Nimba nobobani , nakomanya obobisi bwonsi , nechisemi chionsi : nimba nokwegena gwonsi koranyare kong'anyia ebitunwa , korende onye tindi nobwanchani tindi gento inche .
46013003	Naende ningabera abataka ebinto biane bionsi , naende nindwa omobere one oyie omorero , onye tindi nobwanchani tangwereti gento .
46013004	Obwanchani iga bokoremereria , iga bogokora amaya ; obwanchani tibori koba neribero ; tiborikoenena , tiborigwetogia ,
46013005	tibokomocha koba nogosika , tibokorigia ayaye , tibori nendamwamu , tibori kobara amabe ;
46013006	tibokogokera obobe , korende bogoka amo nekeene ;
46013007	boremereria onsi , bwancha onsi , bosemeria onsi , bwaremereria onsi .
46013008	Obwanchani tibokoremerwa : korende koborabe obobani nabosire ; kerabe emenwa neere ; kochirabe chisemi nachisire .
46013009	Naki twamanyire as'ensemo , ngokoratore obobani as'ensemo :
46013010	korende nagecha ekia boronge , ekere as'ensemo nagesire .
46013011	Ekero narenge omwana omoke , ngakwana buna omwana , nkamanya buna omwana , nkarengereria buna omwana : korwa bono konabaire omonto omonene , nayatigire amang'ana obwana .
46013012	Naki ekero kia bono igatokorora as'ekerore , buna omogwekano : ekero keria obosio as'obosio : ekero kia bono namanyire as'ensemo ; ekero keria nimanye mono , buna namanyekanete nainche mono .
46013013	Gaki , bono gwatigaire okwegena , ogosemeria , obwanchani , aya atato ; erire rinene as'aya nobwanchani .
46014001	Tunyana obwanchani , rigia mono ebiegwa bi'omoika , korende kobua monyare kobana .
46014002	Naki oyogokwana as'omonwa , tari gokwana nabanto , korende ase Nyasaye ; naki onde tari okoigwa ; korende igagokwana amang'ana a bobisi as'omoika .
46014003	Korende ere oyokobana igagokwana nabanto amang'ana ay'okobaagacha , nakobaremia , nakobabeka chinguru .
46014004	Oyogokwana as'omonwa igakweagacha omonyene : korende oyokobana igakwaagacha ekanisa .
46014005	Nainche nindigeti inwe mwensi mokwane as'emenwa , korende kobua mono monyare kobana : naki ere oyokobana nomonene kobua oyogokwana as'emenwa , otatiga as'ogoonchora , erinde ekanisa enyare koagachwa .
46014006	Gaki , baminto , kondache asemore nagokwana as'emenwa , inki ndabagwenere , otatiga nkwane nainwe as'enchera y'okomanoka , gose as'enchera y'obong'aini , gose as'enchera y'okobana , gose as'enchera y'okworokereria ?
46014007	Nonya nebinto bitari nobogima , buna ekeroria , gose obokano , nabinyare korua eriogi , ko bitakorua eriogi rire ogwatananeka , naki koramanyekane , ngotera ki gokobugigwa as'ekeroria gose as'obokano ?
46014008	Ekiagera egetureri gogekobuga egeturi getamanyekaneti ning'e orabe ang'e as'esegi ?
46014009	Naboigo nainwe motakwaneti oria omonwa ring'ana rire maiso marore , ring'ana riria rigokwanwa naki riramanyekane ? naki morabe iga mogokwana as'embeo yoka .
46014010	Inyora nere emenwa ere chingecho chinyinge ense , gose onde tori nonya noyomo , otari nengecho yaye .
46014011	Gaki ntamanyeti engecho y'oria omonwa , nimbe asare ere oyogokwana buna omonanageria , nere nabe asende buna omonanageria .
46014012	Naboigo nainwe , ekiagera morigeti mono koba abanto bare nekeegwa ki'omoika , rigia momente mono koba nakio erinde mwaagache ekanisa .
46014013	As'ayio ere oyogokwana as'omonwa tiga asabe abe omoonchori .
46014014	Naki kondasabe as'omonwa , omoika one ig'ogosaba , korende obong'aini bwane tiborikwama .
46014015	Naki rende ? Ninsabe as'omoika , ninsabe as'obong'aini ; nintere as'omoika na nintere as'obong'aini .
46014016	Naki aye gogosesenia as'omoika , ere oyoikaransete otamanyeti naki araitabe Amin as'ogosasima kwao , nere tayamanyeti ay'ogokwana ?
46014017	Naki nekeene , aye gwasasimire buya , korende oria oyonde taagachiri .
46014018	Namoakeire Nyasaye one ng'a mbuya , ngokwana as'emenwa kobua inwe mwensi :
46014019	korende nanchire gokwana amang'ana atano as'ekanisa as'obong'aini bwane , nyare koborokereria abande , kobua as'ogokwana amang'ana chilifu ikomi as'omonwa .
46014020	Baminto , timoba abana abake as'obong'aini bwaino : korende as'obobe mobe buna abana abake , korende as'obong'aini bwaino mobe abanto abanene .
46014021	Narikire as'amachiko , ng'a , Ninkwane nabanto aba as'abanto b'emenwa emeao , nemenwa y'abageni ; nonya niga tibakonyigwera otebire Omonene .
46014022	Gaki emenwa nekemanyererio tari as'abanchire , korende as'abatancheti . Korende obobani , nekemanyererio tari as'engecho yabwo abatancheti korende as'engecho yabwo banchire .
46014023	Gaki onye ekanisa yonsi egosangerereka amo , nabonsi bagokwana as'emenwa , erio basoe abanto abariri gose abatancheti , inee , tibagotcha ng'a igamore chibarimo ?
46014024	Korende bonsi barabane , ogosoa omonto otancheti , gose omoriri , omanigwa na bonsi , agambigwa na bonsi ;
46014025	naboigo obobisi bw'enkoro yaye bwaba maiso marore ; nabo igaragwe maumama , namosasime Nyasaye , atore ng'a Nyasaye igare gati asemore ekeene .
46014026	Naki rende abaminto ? komogosangerereka amo , ker'oyomo nare nogotera , nare nokworokereria , nare nomonwa , nare nokomanoka , nare nogoonchora . Amang'ana onsi tiga akoreke as'engecho y'okoagacha .
46014027	Onye omonto ogokwana as'omonwa , bakwane babere gose batato tai kobua , ko ker'omonto ase ribaga riaye ; oyomo aonchore :
46014028	korende atario oyogoonchora tiga akire as'ekanisa ; akwane asare bweka omonyene na Nyasaye .
46014029	Nababani bakwana babere , gose batato , nabande batanane .
46014030	Korende oyonde oyoikaransete , karaigorerwe ring'ana , oria bwe ritang'ani tiga akire .
46014031	Naki imwensi ng'a monyare kobana oyomo oyomo , erinde bonsi banyare kweorokereria , na bonsi baremigwe .
46014032	Nemeika y'ababani ebaigwera ababani .
46014033	Naki Nyasaye tari Nyasaye bw'eburuburu , korende oyo bw'omorembe ; naboigo are ase chikanisa chionsi chi'abachenu .
46014034	Abakungu bakire ase chikanisa , naki tibari neribaga ri'ogokwana ; korende baigwere , buna gogoteba ogochika .
46014035	Na kobarigeti kweorokereria ring'ana , tiga baborie abasacha babo boka chinyomba chiabo : naki nobosoku , abakungu gokwana as'ekanisa .
46014036	Inee , ring'ana ria Nyasaye riarure asemore ? gose riabaikeire inwe imweka ?
46014037	Omonto karerore ng'a nomobani , gose oyo bw'omoika , tiga ayamanye aya nabarikeire , ng'a namachiko Omonene .
46014038	Korende omonto karabe omoriri , tiga abe omoriri .
46014039	As'ayio baminto , rigia mono okobana , gose timokania as'ogokwana emenwa .
46014040	Amang'ana onsi akoreke as'obuya nokoroberigwa .
46015001	Nabatebirie , baminto , enchili nabarandeirie ; nero mwanyorire , as'eyio nero moteneine ,
46015002	nas'eyio mwakonyirwe ; onye mwayabwatire mono amang'ana nabarandeirie ; otatiga mwanchete bosa .
46015003	Naki nkabaranderia amang'ana ayananyorete ritang'ani , ng'a Kristo igakwete as'engecho y'ebibe biaito , buna agoteba amariko ;
46015004	naende ng'a agatindekwa , naende akaboka , rituko ria gatato , buna agoteba amariko ;
46015005	naende akarorekana na Kefa ; naende nabaria ikomi nababere ;
46015006	nyuma akarorekana nabaminto kobua chimia isano amo ; as'abwo abare abange moyo bare nonya mbono , abande bakure ;
46015007	nyuma , akarorekana na Yakobo , erio as'abatomwa bonsi .
46015008	Nomoerio bw'abanto bonsi akarorekana nainche , buna naiboretwe tari as'ekero kiaye .
46015009	Naki inche nomoke as'abatomwa , ntagwenereti gwatorwa omotomwa , ekiagera nachandete ekanisa ya Nyasaye .
46015010	Korende as'obuya bwa Nyasaye nabaire buna inde ; nobuya bwaye bore asende tibwarenge bosa ; korende nkamenta mono kobwata emeremo kobua bonsi : korende tari inche , korende obuya bwa Nyasaye obwarenge amo nainche .
46015011	Gaki onye ninche , onye mbaria , naboigo tokorandia , naboigo mwanchete .
46015012	Gaki , onye Kristo orandigwe asemore ng'a obokire , naki abande asemore bagoteba ng'a kobokigwa tikori okw'abakure ?
46015013	Korende onye tikori okobokigwa kw'abakure Kristo nere tabogetigwe :
46015014	naende onye Kristo tabogetigwe , okorandia gwaito mbosa , nokwegena kwaino mbosa .
46015015	Ee , naintwe twarorekanire ng'a igatore abarori b'oboriino ba Nyasaye , ekiagera twatebire na Nyasaye ng'a igamobogetie Kristo ; ere anga tamobogeti , onye abakure tibakobokigwa .
46015016	Naki onye abakure tibakobokigwa , Kristo nere tabogetigwe .
46015017	Na onye Kristo tabogetigwe , okwegena kwaino mbosa ; igamore nonya mbono as'ebibe biaino .
46015018	Nagwo abwo nabarabwo abakure ase Kristo basirire .
46015019	Buna as'obogima obo bwoka tosemeretie Kristo , intwe nabataka kobua abanto bonsi .
46015020	Korende bono Kristo obokire , buna ogotongorwa kwabo abakure .
46015021	Naki amakweri akaretwa nomonto , naboigo nokobokigwa gokaretwa nomonto .
46015022	Ekiagera as'Adamu bonsi bagakwa , naboigo nase Kristo bonsi nababokigwe .
46015023	Korende ker'oyomo aase aye ; agatongora Kristo , nyuma abare abaye Kristo , kagocha .
46015024	Erio ocha oria omoerio , gakomoa Nyasaye Tata oboruoti , gagoonchora obogambi bwonsi , nokobua gwonsi nechinguru .
46015025	Naki negwenerete agambe ere , goika abeke ababisa bonsi inse as'amagoro aye .
46015026	Omobisa bw'omoerio orasirigwe namakweri .
46015027	Naki , akabeka ebinto bionsi inse as'amagoro aye . Korende ogoteba , Bionsi biabekirwe inse , maiso marore ng'a ere oyobibegete ebinto bionsi , taiyo .
46015028	Gaki , ebinto bionsi kobiabekirwe inse asare , erio agwo Omwana nere bweka nabekwe inse asare oyo omobekerete ebinto bionsi asare , erinde Nyasaye abe bionsi ase bionsi .
46015029	Aba bakobatiswa as'engecho y'abakure , naki bagokora gaki , onye abakure tibakoboka ? Naseki bakobatiswa as'engecho yabo ?
46015030	Naintwe , naseki tore nemechando ker'ensa ?
46015031	Ekeene as'ogwetogia kwane nde nakwo asemore ase Kristo , Yesu Omonene oito , iga ngokwa kera rituko .
46015032	Onye , nas'engecho ya mwanyabanto , nkarwana neching'iti chintindi aria Efeso , inki ekongwenera , batarikoboka abakure ? torie , tonywe , naki ankio natokwe .
46015033	Timong'aineka , ogokwana okobe igakogosaria engecho engiya .
46015034	Boka buna egwenerete as'oboronge , timokora ebibe ; naki abande tibamomanyeti Nyasaye : natebire aya as'okobasokia .
46015035	Gose omonto natebe , naki baraboke abakure ? Nas'omobere ki barache noro ?
46015036	Omokayayu ! eke ogosimeka aye , tikeri komera getakweti :
46015037	nero eyogosimeka , torigosimeka omobere oria ogocha koba , korende embusuro yoka , onye nengano gose ende yonsi ;
46015038	korende Nyasaye ayea omobere buna anchete , na ker'embusuro omobere oye .
46015039	chinyama chionsi tari chinyama echimo ; korende echinde chia mwanyabanto , echinde echie ching'iti , echinde echie chinyoni , echinde chie chinswe .
46015040	Naende nere emebere y'igoro , nemebere y'ense , korende obonene bwaye bw'igoro iga bore ao , nobonene bwaye bw'ense iga bore ao .
46015041	Obonene bw'erioba mbore ao , nobonene bw'omotienyi iga bore ao , nobonene bwe ching'enang'eni , iga bore ao ; naki nkore ogwatananeka okonene ching'enang'eni ase ching'enang'eni .
46015042	Naboigo nokobokigwa okw'abakure . Osimekwa as'ogosareka , oboka as'ogotasareka .
46015043	Osimekwa as'obosoku , oboka as'obonene : osimekwa as'oboreu ; oboka ase chinguru .
46015044	Osimekwa omobere bori ; oboka omobere bw'omoika . Onye ore omobere bori noyo bw'omoika nore .
46015045	Naboigo arikire , Omonto bwe ritang'ani Adamu orenge omobere ore moyo . Adamu bw'omoerio akaba omoika bw'okobokia .
46015046	Korende oria orenge bw'omoika , tari oyo bwe ritang'ani , korende noria omobere bori orenge ritang'ani , nyuma oria bw'omoika .
46015047	Omonto bwe ritang'ani akarua inse , as'amaroba : omonto okabere akarua igoro .
46015048	Buna are oyo bw'amaroba , naboigo bare abare ab'amaroba : na buna are ere oyo igoro , naboigo bare ab'igoro .
46015049	Na buna tobogoretie ekieni kiaye oyo bw'amaroba , naboigo torabogorie ekieni ki'oyo igoro .
46015050	Aya ngokwana naya , baminto , ng'a omobere namanyinga tibikonyora omwando bw'obonda bwa Nyasaye : gose ogosareka tigokonyora omwando bw'ogotasareka .
46015051	Rigereria , nabatebirie aya bobisi : Titogokwa intwe twensi , korende twensi natoonchoke ;
46015052	as'etagika eyemo , okojniamia nakoramokia , ekero ki'egetureri ki'omoerio , ekiagera egetureri nakebuge , nabakure nababoke , tibaba nagosareka , naintwe natoonchoke .
46015053	Naki ogweneire oyosarekire bweboe ogotasareka , noyo bw'ogokwa bweboe ogotakwa .
46015054	Korende oyosarekire koranyore ogotasareka , noyo bw'ogokwa koranyore ogotakwa , erio naribe riria ring'ana riarigetwe , Amakweri amerirwe as'okobua .
46015055	Amakweri ng'ai okobua kwao . kore ? Amakweri ng'ai obororo bwao bore ?
46015056	Obororo bw'amakweri nebibe , nechinguru chi'ebibe namachiko .
46015057	Korende mbuya mono ase Nyasaye otoeire okobua as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
46015058	Gaki , baminto abanchani , mobe nechinguru , motakonyegerigwa , momente mono gokora emeremo y'Omonene amatuko onsi , ekiagera emeremo yaino teri bosa as'Omonene .
46016001	Bono as'esadaka y'abachenu , buna nachigete chikanisa chia Galatia , nainwe kora boigo .
46016002	Rituko rie ritang'ani ri'echuma ker'omonto agache emonga asare , koreng'ana buna ogosesenigwa kwaye , erinde esadaka terugwa ekero nachire .
46016003	Nainche kondaike nintome baria morachore as'amarube , baire obuya bwaino goika Yerusalemu .
46016004	Onye ngwenerete kogenda inche nabagende amo nainche .
46016005	Korende ninchiche asemore , ekero naetire egati ya Makedonia ; naki ning'ete egati ya Makedonia .
46016006	Gose nimenye amo nainwe , ee nimenye seino ekero ki'obokendu , monyare gonkoba ekero kende gionsi aase ndigetie kogenda .
46016007	Naki tindigeti kororana nainwe bono , as'ogoeta gwoka , ekiagera ndigetie komenya seino egeka egeke Omonene karanyanchere .
46016008	Korende nimenye as'Efeso goika Pentikote ;
46016009	naki naigoreirwe egesieri ekenene kegwenerete mono , mbare abange abagontanga .
46016010	Korende , Timotheo ogocha , rigereria amenye amo nainwe koiroka gotari ; naki ngokorare emeremo y'Omonene buna inche :
46016011	gaki mont ' onde bwonsi tamochaya , korende mokobe as'omorembe , erinde ache asende , naki nimoganyete amo nabaminto .
46016012	Korende as'amang'ana Apolo , oyominto , nkamosorora mono achiche asemore amo nabwo baminto ; nere tancha rinde gocha bono ; korende nachiche karanyore ribaga .
46016013	Renda , tenena nechinguru as'okwegena , mobe abasacha , mobe abaremu .
46016014	Amang'ana aino onsi akoreke as'obwanchani .
46016015	Naende nabasoroire baminto , ( mwayemanyire enyomba ya Stefano nentang'ani as'Akaya , nabarabwo bebekire as'emeremo y'okobakorera abachenu ) ,
46016016	baigwere abanto buna aba , na ker'omonto oyogokonya emeremo amo nabarabwo , nagokora bo .
46016017	Nainche nagokire ekiagera as'ogocha kwabo Stefano na Fortunato , na Akaiko ; naki aba bakamenta as'amange aya naremeirwe korwa asemore .
46016018	Naki bakandemia omoyo one nemioyo yaino yonsi : gaki bamanye abanto buna abwo .
46016019	chikanisa chi'Asia babakwanirie , Akula na Priskilla babakwanirie mono as'Omonene amo nekanisa ere ime as'enyomba yabo .
46016020	Abaminto bonsi babakwanirie . Kwanania as'okonyunyuntana ogochenu .
46016021	Oko nogokwania kwane inche Paulo as'okoboko kwane omonyene .
46016022	Mont'onde bwonsi otamwancheti Omonene Yesu Kristo nabe Anathema . Maranatha .
46016023	Obuya bw'Omonene Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe .
46016024	Ogwancha kwane kobe amo nainwe imwensi ase Kristo Yesu . Amin .
47001001	Paulo , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , na Timotheo oyominto , as'ekanisa ya Nyasaye ere ase Korintho , amo nabachenu bonsi abare as'ense yonsi y'Akaya :
47001002	Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe , okorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
47001003	Abakwe Nyasaye , Tata bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , Tata bw'amabera , Nyasaye bw'okoremia gwonsi ;
47001004	oyogotoremia as'emechando yaito yonsi erinde tonyare kobaremia baria bare as'emechando ende yonsi , as'okoremia twaremigwe na Nyasaye .
47001005	Naki buna emechando ya Kristo yamentekanire asetore , naboigo okoremigwa gwaito kwamentekanire as'enchera ya Kristo .
47001006	Korende onye intwe tore as'emechando , nas'engecho y'okoremigwa kwaino nogotoreka kwaino , gogokora emeremo yaye as'okoremereria emechando eria eria togochandwa naintwe : gose karabe twaremigwe as'engecho y'okoremigwa kwaino nogotoreka kwaino .
47001007	Nogosemeria gwaito as'engecho yaino iga kore ogokong'u ; gatoramanye ng'a naboigo more ababwatani b'eria emechando , naboigo more ababwatani ase koria okoremigwa .
47001008	Ekiagera twanchete , baminto , momanye amang'ana ay'emechando eria yatonyorete as'Asia , naki togachandwa mono , kobua chinguru chiaito , goika tokerusia moyo koba moyo .
47001009	Ee , naintwe abanyene iga twarenge nekina ki'amakweri as'emioyo yaito , erinde titwesemeria emebere yaito , korende Nyasaye , okobabokia abakure :
47001010	agatokonya intwe namakweri amanene are buna aria , naende natokonye : asare twamosemeirie ng'a nonya mbono natokonye .
47001011	Inwe nainwe komorakonyane as'engecho yaito as'ogosaba ; erinde as'engecho ya biria ebiegwa twaeirwe intwe as'emeremo y'abanto abange , abanto abange baake ng'a mbuya mono as'engecho yaito .
47001012	Naki ogwetogia gwaito noko , nas'oborori bw'ebirengererio biaito , ng'a as'obochenu noborabu bw'omoyo okorua ase Nyasaye , tari ase chisemi chi'omobere , korende as'obuya bwa Nyasaye , iga twagendete as'ense , korende kobua asemore inwe .
47001013	Naki titobarikereti inwe ring'ana , tatiga aria mogosoma , nakomanya , nainche nasemeirie ng'a namoyamanye goika omoerio :
47001014	naboigo buna mwatomanyete as'ensemo , ng'a intwe iga tore ogwetogia kwaino , buna inwe more asetore intwe , ase rituko riria ri'Omonene Yesu .
47001015	Nas'ogosemeria okwo , nkarigia gocha asemore agwo ritang'ani , erinde monyore ekeegwa gia kabere ;
47001016	na goeta seino nakogenderera goika Makedonia ; naende korwa Makedonia koiranera seino , namonkobe inwe kogenda Boyahudi .
47001017	Gaki , ekero narengereretie aya nakorerete ensara kabere ? gose nare korosia amang'ana , iganarosetie as'engecho y'omobere erinde abe iga asende , goteba ee , ee , gose taibo , taibo ?
47001018	Korende buna Nyasaye are oyo bw'ekeene ring'ana riaito asemore tiriarenge ee gose taibo .
47001019	Naki Omwana o Nyasaye , Yesu Kristo , orandetigwe naintwe gati yaino , nainche na Silivano na Timotheo , tabete ee gose taibo ; korende as'ere ee ekanyara kobao .
47001020	Naki chiira chionsi chia Nyasaye igachire asare ee ; nas'ere n'Amina , Nyasaye anyare kobakwa as'emeremo yaito .
47001021	Gaki Nyasaye oyotokong'irie amo nainwe ase Kristo , nagotobeka amaguta ;
47001022	nere nere otobekerete ekemanyererio , agatoa eira y'Omoika ase chinkoro chiaito .
47001023	Korende inche iga nkorigia Nyasaye abe omorori igoro as'omoyo one , ng'a as'okobarorera amabera tindagenda Korintho .
47001024	Tari ng'a ntore nobonene as'okwegena kwaino ; korende iga tore abakonyi b'bmogoko oino : ekiagera moteneine as'okwegena ,
47002001	Korende nkarengereria iga as'omoyo one , tinchicha seino naende as'ogoichana .
47002002	Naki inche kondababeke ogoichana , gaki ning'o orangokie , tatiga oria naichanirie inche ?
47002003	Nainche nabarikerete ring'ana eri eri , erinde ngocha timbekwa ogoichana na baria ngwenerete kobagokera ; nasemeretie inwe mwensi ng'a omogoko one ng'a noyoino mwensi pi ,
47002004	Naki as'emechando emenge nas'obororo bw'enkoro iganabarikerete nakorua amariga amange ; tari ng'a moichanigwe , korende monyare komanya obwanchani bwane inde nabwo asemore buna bore obonge .
47002005	Korende onye ore omonto oretire ogoichana , tang'ichaneti inche , korende as'ensemo yaino mwensi , tincha kobararereria mwensi .
47002006	Amoisanire omonto ore engecho buna eye , obororo boria aetwe nabare abange ;
47002007	korwa nyuma as'aya , mbuya momwabere nakomoremia omonto buna oyo , tabaisa kobekwa as'ogoichana goetete ekerengo .
47002008	As'ayio nabasoroire momworokie obwanchani bwaino .
47002009	Naki nkarika as'engecho eye boigo , erinde mbateme inwe komanya onye mwabaire abaigweri as'amang'ana onsi .
47002010	Naki buna moramwabere omonto rinde rionsi , nainche nanyare kwabera boigo : naki nainche eki nabeire omonto , ring'ana rinde rionsi , namwabeire as'engecho yaino as'obosio bwa Kristo ;
47002011	Saitani tabaisa konyara gotobua ; naki intwe titori abariri , as'okorengereria kwaye .
47002012	Gaki ekero naigete Troa as'engecho y'enchili ya Kristo , nkaigorerwa egesieri as'Omonene ,
47002013	tinanyora omogoko as'omoyo one , ekiagera tinamoroche Tito oyominto , korende nkabatebia morare buya , nkaimoka nkagenda Makedonia .
47002014	Nyasaye tiga abakwe , ere oyogotoa okobua botambe ase Kristo , oyokoorokia ogotioka okuya gwe chisemi chiaye ker'aase as'emeremo yaito .
47002015	Naki intwe igatore ogotioka okuya gwa Kristo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , as'abwo bagokonywa , nas'abwo bagosira ;
47002016	as'abwo ogotioka okuya kw'amakweri abo abakogenda goika amakweri ; as'abwo abande ogotioka kw'obogima abwo bakogenda goika obogima . Ning'o oraisane as'amang'ana aya ?
47002017	Naki intwe tari buna abange , bagosaria ring'ana ria Nyasaye : korende buna abanto bagokwana as'oborabu bw'omoyo , buna abanto batomire na Nyasaye , as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , iga togokwana ase Kristo .
47003001	Korende twachakire , naende gwetogia abanyene ? gose ntorigetie buna abande , amarube are nogotogigwa gwaito asemore , gose ayakorua asemore ?
47003002	Rirube riaito ninwe , ririkire ase chinkoro chiaito , rimanyekanete nagosomwa nabanto bonsi ;
47003003	mwaorokigwe ng'a mwabaire rirube ria Kristo , erire emeremo y'ogokora gwaito , eririkire tari as'ewino , korende as'Omoika o Nyasaye ore moyo ; tari ase chibao chi'amagena , korende ase chibao chie chinkoro chi'omobere .
47003004	Nas'ogosemeria okwo tore nakwo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ase Kristo :
47003005	tai ng'a twaisanire intwe abanyene , korengereria ring'ana rinde rionsi ng'a neriaito abanyene ; korende ogoisanera gwaito iga koruete ase Nyasaye ;
47003006	oyotoisaneirie as'okoba abakori b'emuma enyia ; tari ase ririko , korende as'omoika ; naki ririko iga rigoita , korende omoika orua obogima .
47003007	Gaki gokorabe ogokora kw'amakweri as'amariko , ayarikire as'amagena , agacha as'obonene , goika abana ba Isiraeli tibanyarete korigereria namaiso obosio bwa Musa , as'engecho y'obonene bw'obosio bwaye ; nobwo obonene bwarenge gosira ;
47003008	Inee ! ogokora kw'omoika tigokomenta koba as'obonene ?
47003009	Naki gokorabe ogokora gw'ekina nkore nobonene , ogokora kw'oboronge mbore nobonene kobua mono .
47003010	Naki koria kobakire tikware nobonene as'engecho eye , as'engecho y'obonene kobua mono ,
47003011	Ekiagera , koborabe boria boetete mbwarenge nobonene bwaye , kobua mono boria boreo mbore nobonene bwa botambe .
47003012	Gaki ekiagera ntore nogosemeria kore buna oko , igatogokorera oboremu obonge gatogokwana .
47003013	Naintwe titori buna Musa obegete egetambaa gotuba obosio bwaye , erinde abana b'Isiraeli tibarigereria mono omoerio bw'oria orenge ogoeta :
47003014	amo nayio okorengereria kwabo gokabekwa obokong'u : ekiagera nonya ngoika rero egetambaa ekio ekio , ekero egosomwa emuma enkoro , keba tigekorusigwa ; ekiagera kiarusigwe ase Kristo ;
47003015	korende nonya ndero , Musa gagosomwa , egetambaa ngeikaransete ase chinkoro chiabo .
47003016	Korende ekero gionsi bakomoonchokera Omonene , nakeria egetambaa iga gekorusigwa .
47003017	Gaki Omonene nere Omoika oyio ; korendeas'ore Omoika bw'Omonene , agwo naoogosibora kore .
47003018	Korende intwe ntwensi as'obosio botabekiri egetambaa , gotokoborigereria obonene bw'Omonene , buna as'ekerore , igatokoonchorwa na kogwekanigwa nomogwekano oyio oyio , korwa as'obonene goika as'obonene , buna as'obonene bokorua as'Omonene oyore Omoika .
47004001	As'ayio ekiagera ntore nobosomba obo , buna twabeirwe , titokwa emioyo :
47004002	korende twangire amang'ana obosoku ayabisegete , gose titorikogenda as'obong'ainereria , gose korisang'ania ring'ana ria Nyasaye noborimo ; korende as'okoorokia ayare ay'ekeene tweorokirie ng'a ntore nekeene , as'ebirengererio bi'abanto bonsi as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
47004003	Nonya nenchili yaito yabisekanete , iga yabisekanire as'abwo bagosira :
47004004	as'ayio nyasaye bw'ense eye obamumekeirie obong'aini bw'abwo abatancheti , ng'a tobaikera omobaso bw'enchili y'obonene bwaye Kristo oyore ekieni kiaye Nyasaye ,
47004005	naki titori kweranderia abanyene , korende Kristo Yesu Omonene ; naintwe abanyene buna abasomba baino as'engecho ya Kristo .
47004006	Ekiagera Nyasaye , agateba , Omobaso nobare korwa omosunte , nere obarete ase chinkoro chiaito , gotoa omobaso bwe chisemi chi'obonene bwa Nyasaye as'obosio bwa Yesu Kristo .
47004007	Korende ntore nobotenenku obo as'ebinto bi'amaroba , erinde okobua okonene gwe chinguru kobe okwa Nyasaye , korende tari ogwaito intwe .
47004008	chinsemo chionsi iga tokomigwa , korende titokomigeka ; iga togoichanigwa , korende titogokwa emioyo ;
47004009	igatogochandwa , korende titorigotigwa ; iga tokoakwa inse , korende titorigosirigwa ;
47004010	amatuko onsi iga tokobogoria omobere bw'ogoitwa kwaye Yesu , erinde obogima bwa Yesu naborobwo boorokigwe as'emebere yaito .
47004011	Naki intwe abatore moyo amatuko onsi twarurue tokwe as'engecho ya Yesu , erinde obogima bwa Yesu boorokigwe as'emebere yaito , ekonyorwa namakweri ,
47004012	Gaki amakweri iga agokora emeremo yaye ime yaito , korende obogima ime yaino .
47004013	Korende ekiagera ntore nomoika oria oria bw'okwegena , buna arikire , Negenete , nas'engecho eyio ngakwana ; intwe naintwe twegenire , nas'engecho eye iga togokwana ;
47004014	twamanyire buna ere oyomobogetie Omonene Yesu natobokie naintwe amo na Yesu , nagotoorokia amo nainwe .
47004015	Naki amang'ana onsi nas'engecho yaino , erinde obuya obwo bomentwe mono as'abwo abange , okoaka mbuya mono komentwe , Nyasaye abakwe .
47004016	As'ayio titogokwa emioyo ; korende nonya omonto oito o isiko ogosarigwa , korende omonto oito oime akorwe oboyia rituko ase rituko .
47004017	Naki emechando yaito nemegusu , eyere y'ekero egeke gioka , egotokorera obonene bwa kare nakare obore obonge mono kobua ;
47004018	titobirigereria ebikororekana , korende ebitakororekana : naki ebikororekana nebi'ekero egeke gioka ; korende ebitakororekana nebia kare nakare .
47005001	Naki twamanyire ng'a enyomba y'obomenyo bwaito eyere as'ense kerasarigwe , ntore nokoagacha koruete ase Nyasaye , enyomba etakoriri as'amaboko , eyere ya kare nakare as'igoro .
47005002	Naki naintwe as'aya iga togwechanda , tokorengereria mono tobekwe okweboyia konde , nakwb obomenyo bwaito bokorwa igoro ;
47005003	kerabe twabekirwe titokororekana tore bosa .
47005004	Naki intwe abatore as'obomenyo obo iga togwechanda , tokorarererigwa ; tari ng'a iga torigetie korusigwa , korende nokoboyigwa konde , erinde egekonyorwa namakweri kemerwe nobogima .
47005005	Gaki ere oyotokorete as'engecho ye ring'ana eri Nyasaye , oyotoete ekebwaterero ki'Omoika buna as'eira .
47005006	Gaki amatuko onsi ntore nomoyo omoremu , naende twamanyire ng'a ekero tore aa as'omobere , iga toikaransete are as'Omonene .
47005007	( Ekiagera iga tokogenda as'okwegena , tari as'okorora . )
47005008	Korende ntore nomoyo omoremu ; natwarorire buya kobua korua as'omobere nakomenya amo n'Omonene .
47005009	As'ayio , naende , onye tore aa , gose onye titori aa , twerosie komogwenera ere .
47005010	Naki netogwenerete intwe intwensi koorokigwa as'obosio bw'ekerogo gi'ekina gia Kristo ; erio ker'omonto anyore koreng'ana buna are gokora as'omobere , onye bire ebiya gose ebire ebibe .
47005011	Nabo gatoramanye okoiroka kw'Omonene , twabang'usire mwanyabanto ; korende kwaorokigwe as'obosio bwa Nyasaye . Nainche nasemeirie ng'a twaorokigwe ime as'ebirengererio biaino mwensi .
47005012	Ekiagera titokwebaka abanyene as'obosio bwaino eria kabere , korende twabaire ribaga ri'okwebaka as'engecho yaito , erio monyare koba nakwo as'obosio bwabo as'abakwebaka as'amang'ana ay'isiko oka , gose tari as'amang'ana enkoro ime .
47005013	Naki onye twasirerigwe nobong'aini bwaito obogima , nas'engecho ya Nyasaye ; ao gose onye ntore nobong'aini bwaito obogima , nas'engecho yaino .
47005014	Naki obwanchani bwa Kristo bwatobetereirie ; ekiagera twanachire iga , ng'a onye oyomo okure as'engecho ya bonsi , nabo bakure Bonsi ;
47005015	naende agakwa as'engecho ya bonsi , erio abare moyo tibaba moyo asebare boka abanyene , korende as'engecho yaye ere oyokwete akaboka as'engecho yabo .
47005016	Goika yabaire , intwe korwa bono titomomanyeti onde'bwensi as'engecho y'omobere , tatiga intwe twamomanyire Kristo as'engecho y'omobere , korende bono titokomomanya iga naende .
47005017	As'ayio omonto karabe ime ase Kristo negetongwa ekeyia ; ebia kare biaetire ; rora , bionsi biabaire ebiyia .
47005018	Korende bionsi bikorua ase Nyasaye , oyotobwatanirie intwe nomobere oye ase Kristo , nere otoeire obosomba bw'okobwatania ;
47005019	ekiagera , Nyasaye arenge ime ase Kristo , akayebwatania ense nomobere oye , tababarera okomocha kwabo , nere obekire asetore ring'ana ri'okobwatania .
47005020	Nabo tore abagai ase Kristo , buna Nyasaye okobasorora as'emenwa yaito : twabasabeire as'engecho ya Kristo mobwatanigwe na Nyasaye .
47005021	Ekiagera omokorire ere otamanyeti ebibe koba ebibe asetore , erio intwe tobe noboronge ase Nyasaye asere .
47006001	Naintwe gatogokora emeremo amo nere twabasoroire timobwata obuya bwa Nyasaye bosa ,
47006002	( naki otebire , Ekero giancheire nakoigwete , Rituko ri'ogotoreka nagokonyete : rora , bono nario ekero giancheire mono ; rora , bono nario rituko ri'ogotoreka ) :
47006003	titoba nekegocha asebare , ase ring'ana rinde rionsi , obosomba bwaito tibwomanigwa ;
47006004	korende ase kera ring'ana twenyorere ogotogigwa okuya , buna abasomba ba Nyasaye , as'okoganya okonge , as'emechando , as'okoremerwa , as'ogochandwa ,
47006005	as'okoakwa , as'ogosibwa , as'eriomana , us'emeremo , as'okorenda , as'okweng'ata ;
47006006	as'okoba omochenu , as'obong'aini , as'okoremereria , as'obuya , as'Omoika Omochenu , as'obwanchani botari nobong'ainereria .
47006007	Ase ring'ana ri'ekeene , ase chinguru chia Nyasaye ; as'ebinto bi'esegi bi'oboronge bi'okoboko gw'okorio , nebi'okoboko gw'okobee .
47006008	As'obonene , nobosoku , as'ogotebwa bobe nas'ogotebwa buya ; buna bakong'aina , korende nabanto b'ekeene ;
47006009	buna abatamanyegeti , korende abamanyegete mono ; buna abakure , na rora , moyo tore ; buna abagosusurwa , korende abatagoitwa ; to buna abare nomoichano , korende amatuko onsi abanyene omogoko ; buna abataka , korende twatenenkire nebinge ; buna abatari nagento , korende abanyene ebinto bionsi .
47006010	
47006011	Emenwa yaito yabamanokeire inwe , Abakorintho , chinkoro chiaito chiagareyigwe .
47006012	Timogotigerigwa ime asetore , korende iga mogotigerigwa as'ebirengererio biaino .
47006013	Nabo , erio moe koreng'ana ekerengo keria keria mwaetwe , nakwanire nainwe buna abana bane , mogareyigwe nainwe chinkoro chiaino .
47006014	Timosiberanigwa rikorogoto amo nabatancheti : naki nkobwatana ki kore gati as'oboronge nogosaria ? naende nkobwatana ki kore gati as'omobaso nomosunte ?
47006015	Naende nkobwatana ki gati ase Kristo na Belial ? gose oyobwanchete nare nensemo ki amo noyotancheti ?
47006016	Naende nkobwatana ki ase hekalu ya Nyasaye nechisanamu ? naki inwe ne hekalu ya Nyasaye ore moyo ; buna Nyasaye atebete , Nimenye ime yabo , naime asebare nintare , ninche nimbe Nyasaye obo , nabarabwo nababe abanto bane .
47006017	As'ayio , Soka korwa egati yabo , mwatananwe nabarabwo , otebire Omonene , Gose timokuna egento ki'eubi ; Nainche nimbarosie ,
47006018	Nimbe Iso asemore , Nainwe namobe asende abana abamura , nabaiseke , otebire Omonene Omobui .
47007001	Nabo , ekiagera tore nechiira echio , abanchani , twesibie emebere yaito eubi yonsi y'omobere nomoyo , toikeranie obochenu as'ogosika Nyasaye .
47007002	Toigorere chinkoro chiaino ; titomokorereti obobe omonto , titomosareti omonto , titomorieti omonto kiaboama .
47007003	Tintebeti ring'ana eri erinde mbagambie inwe ; naki natang'anire goteba ng'a inwe iga more ase chinkoro chiaito goika ogokwa amo , na koba moyo amo .
47007004	Ninde noboremu obonge kongokwana nainwe , ogwetogia kwane asemore nokonge : naichoirwe nokoremigwa , as'ogochandwa gwaito gwonsi naichoirwe omogoko goeta ekerengo .
47007005	Naki togachia koba ngoikatore Makedonia , emebere yaito tiyanyorete ogotimoka , korende togachandwa chinsemo chionsi ; isiko ekaba esegi , ime okoiroka .
47007006	Korende Nyasaye , omonyene okobaremia abaichani , agatoremia as'ogocha kwaye Tito .
47007007	Gose tari as'ogocha kwaye gwoka , korende ase koria okoremigwa aremetigwe nainwe , agatotebia amang'ana okogania kwaino , nokweng'ereria kwaino , nomokia oino asende , goika nkamenta kogoka .
47007008	Naki nonya nabaichanetie ase rirube riria tingweitia , nonya neitetie ; ekiagera narorire ng'a rirube riria ndiabaichanetie , korende nas'ekero .
