47007009	Bono nagokire , tari ekiagera mogaichanigwa , korende ekiagera mwaichanetigwe goika mogaonchoka ; naki mwaichanetigwe as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , timonyora ogosira as'ogokora gwaito ase ring'ana rionsi .
47007010	Naki ogoichana kore as'obosio bwa Nyasaye iga gogokora okoonchoka gokoreta ogotoreka gotari nagweitia : korende ogoichana gw'ense iga gogokora amakweri .
47007011	Ekiagera , rora ogoichanigwa okwo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye iga gwakora omokia ore naki ime asemore , ee , nagwekwanera , ee , nokobea , ee , nokoiroka , ee , amaiga , ee , nogwekong'ia , ee , negesiomba ! Ase ker'enchera mweorokererie koba abachenu ase ring'ana erio .
47007012	Nabo , nonya nabarikera , tindigeti as'engecho yaye ere okorete bobe , gose tari asere oyokoreretwe bobe , korende as'amaiga aino asetore anyare koorokigwa asemore as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
47007013	As'ayio tokaremigwa : nas'okoremigwa gwaito tokagoka mono kobua ekerengo ekiagera as'omogoko o Tito ; ekiagera omoyo oye otimokigwe nainwe mwensi .
47007014	Naki , onye ngwetogia asare as'engecho yaino , tinasogetigwe ; korende buna twabatebia amang'ana onsi as'ekeene , naboigo nogwetogia gwaito , ase Tito iga kwarenge gw'ekeene .
47007015	Nobwanchani bwaye bw'omoyo asemore bwabaire obonge kobua ekerengo , gakoinyora okoigwera kwaino inwe imwensi , buna mwamoroisetie as'okoiroka nokoiguswa .
47007016	Nagokire , ekiagera ase kera ring'ana ninde nomoyo omoremu as'engecho yaino .
47008001	Naende rwabatebirie inwe , abaminto , amang'ana ay'obuya bwa Nyasaye , bwaetwe chikanisa chia Mekedonia ;
47008002	ekero barenge bagotemwa as'emechando emenge , obonge bw'omogoko obo nobotaka bwabo bokaba obonge , bokabamentera obonda bw'okorua kwabo .
47008003	Naki as'okobua kwabo , nabaire kirori , ee , naende as'ogoeta okobua kwabo , bakarua as'omoyo bw'ogwancha .
47008004	As'okorigia kwabo abanyene bakarua ebinto biabo ; bagatosaba amo nagotosorora tobwate obuya obo , nakobwatana nabarabwo agwo kobakorera abachenu .
47008005	Naende bagakora iga , tari buna twasemereti , korende ritang'ani bakerua abanyene as'Omonene ; erio bagatoa naintwe , as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye ,
47008006	goika tokamosaba Tito kobaisaneria obuya obo buna abochagete .
47008007	Korende buna more nobonge bw'ebinto bionsi , okwegena , nogwatoka , nobong'aini , nomokia bwonsi , nobwanchani bwaino asetore intwe : nabo , mobe nobonge bw'obuya obo bwonsi .
47008008	Tinkwaneti erinde mbachike , korende as'omokia bw'abanto bande nteme ekeene ki'obwanchani bwaino .
47008009	Naki mwamanyire obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , buna abete omotaka as'engecho yaito , karenge omonda , erinde inwe monyare koba abanda as'obotaka bwaye .
47008010	Nainche ase ring'ana eri nabaire okorenga kwane : naki ring'ana eri ndibagwenerete inwe abachagete omwaka oeta , iga mwatang'anete tari as'ogokora gwoka korende nonya nokorigia gokora .
47008011	Korende bono moikeranie koria ogokora nakorokwo ; nabo buna mwarenge ang'e korigia , naboigo mobe ang'e goikerania as'okonyara kwaino .
47008012	Naki , as'omoyo ore , iga bigwancherwa koreng'ana as'ebiare nabio omonto , tari as'ebi atabwanti .
47008013	Naki tindi goteba aya , erio abande babatigere inwe morarerigwe .
47008014	Korende amang'ana abe areng'aine ; ekero eke kia bono obonge bwaino bobagwenere okoremerwa kwabo , erio obonge bwabo bobagwenere nainwe okoremerwa kwaino ; erio amang'ana abe areng'aine .
47008015	Buna yarigetwe , Oyosangereretie ebinge , tamentegeti , nere oyosangereretie ebike taremeiri .
47008016	Korende Nyasaye aakerwe mbuya mono , oyobekire omokia oria asemore as'omoyo o Tito .
47008017	Naki abwatete kobua aria amang'ana ane ; nere akamenta koba nomokia , agatara gocha asemore as'ogwancha kwaye omonyene .
47008018	N'amo nere twamotomire oyominto oria ogotogigwa kwaye as'enchili gwakumire ase chikanisa chionsi .
47008019	Gose tari as'ayio oka , korende agachorwa nechikanisa atare amo naintwe ase ring'ana ri'obuya obo rigokorerwa naintwe , erinde Omonene abakwe , nakoorokia ng'a emioyo yaino iga yarenge ang'e .
47008020	Twerende nering'ana eri , omonto tacha gotuomania as'amang'ana okoegwa oko gogokorwa naintwe ;
47008021	gatoratang'ane korengereria ayare amaya , tari as'obosio bw'Omonene bweka , korende nas'obosio bwa mwanyabanto .
47008022	Naintwe amo nabarabwo twamotomire oyominto , oyotoroche as'amang'ana amange ng'a nare nomokia , na bono nare nomokia kobua , ekiagera as'ogosemeria are nakorokwo asemore .
47008023	Nabo omonto kararigie komanya amang'ana a Tito , ere nesemba yane , naende omokori emeremo amo nainche , naende kararigie amang'ana aya abaminto , barabwo nabatomwa be chikanisa , naende obonene bwa Kristo .
47008024	Nabo boorokie as'obosio bwe chikanisa obwanchani bwaino , nas'ogwetogia gwaito asemore .
47009001	As'amang'ana okobakorera abachenu tindi nokorigia kobarikera .
47009002	Naki namanyire ogwancha kwaino , netogereti as'Abamakedonia , ng'a Akaya iga orenge ang'e korwa omwaka omogima ; nomokia oino obabekire omoyo abanto abange .
47009003	Korende nabatomire abaminto , as'engecho yaino ; nario ogwetogia kwane asemore tikoba bosa ase ring'ana eri ; monyare koba ang'e buna natebete :
47009004	ekiagera , bagocha Abamakedonia amo nainche , nakobanyora timoraba ang'e , titocha gosoka intwe , ( titoteba inwe ) , as'engecho eye y'ogosemeria .
47009005	Nabo narorire ng'a negwenerete mbatebie abaminto aba batang'ane goika asemore , nakorosia bwango okorua kwaino mwatebete korwa kare , konyare koba ang'e , kobe buna ekerugwa , gose tari buna egento kerure as'obong'iti .
47009006	Korende natebire ring'ana eri , oyogosimeka ebike igakogesa ebike ; oyogosimekaas'ebinge nagese as'ebinge .
47009007	Ker'omonto akore buna arengerereti as'enkoro yaye , tari as'ogoichana , gose tari as'okobetererigwa : naki Nyasaye bwanchire ere oyokorua nomogoko .
47009008	Na Nyasaye nanyare kobaichoria obuya bwonsi as'obonge ; erio inwe , komorabe nogoisanera gwonsi as'ebimo bionsi , monyare komenta mono as'ogokora okuya :
47009009	Buna arikire , Osiareire , obaeire abataka , Oboronge bwaye iga boikaransete kare nakare ,
47009010	Nere okorua chimbusuro nakomoa omonyene okobugura , nomogati as'endagera , nabae embusuro y'okobusura asemore naende namente , nere namenteranie amatunda oboronge bwaino .
47009011	Ekiagera mwatenenkigwe as'ebimo bionsi monyare koba nokorua gwonsi , gokonyorera Nyasaye mbuya mono as'emeremo yaito .
47009012	Naki emeremo y'ogokora oko tikori kobaisaneria abachenu ogoisanera baremeirwe gwoka , korende omentekire mono koba as'okoaka mbuya mono ara ange ase Nyasaye ;
47009013	ekiagera komoratemwe as'ogokora okwo , namomobake Nyasaye as'okoigwera kwaino as'okoyiatora enchili ya Kristo , nas'okorua kwaino mwabakoreire barabwo nabanto bonsi .
47009014	Nabarabwo abanyene , kobakobasabera inwe , babarengereirie inwe mono ekiagera ase boria obuya bwa Nyasaye bwamentekire mono ime asemore .
47009015	Nyasaye airanerigwe mbuya mono as'engecho y'ekeegwa kiaye , totanyare gokebara buna egwenerete .
47010001	Nainche Paulo , nabasoroire as'oboitongo nobwororo bwa Kristo , inche inde omoitongo , konde amo nainwe , korende ntari aroro nomonyene oboremu asemore :
47010002	ee , nasabire ng'a kondeo , timba omokong'u as'ogokwana noboremu , ekiagera nabarire koba noboremu igoro ase baria bakagete ng'a intwe iga tokogenda as'engecho y'omobere ,
47010003	Naki nonya tokogenda as'omobere , titori gokora esegi as'engecho y'omobere ,
47010004	( naki ebinto bi'esegi biaito tibiri ebi'omobere , korende mbire nokobua ase Nyasaye koiyeria chinduaki ) ;
47010005	koiyeria ebirengererio na ker'egento keimokererete igoro , keimokererete igoro as'obong'aini bwa Nyasaye ; nagosiba ker'ekerengererio kenyare komoigwera Kristo ;
47010006	gatorabe ang'e gokania obobe bwonsi , okoigwera kwaino gokoraikerane .
47010007	Iga mokoyarigereria ayare as'obosio bwaino . Omonto karesemerie omonyene ng'a ere nomonto o Kristo , tiga arengererie iga omonyene , ng'a buna ere are omonto o Kristo , naboigo naintwe tore abanto ba Kristo .
47010008	Naki , ninsagwetogia kobua ake as'engecho y'okobua gwaito ( twaeirwe n'Omonene , tonyare kobaagacha inwe gose tari as'okobaiyeria ) tingosoka :
47010009	timbaisa gocha kororekana buna iga nindigeti kobairokia as'amarube ane .
47010010	Naki batebe , Amarube aye namarito , namakong'u ; korende kareo omonyene omobere igare omoreu , namang'ana aye tari gento .
47010011	Omonto buna oyio arengererie iga . ng'a buna tore as'amang'ana ay'amarube totari aroro , naboigo tore as'ogokora gatoreo .
47010012	Naki titorigeti kwebara amo nabarabwo abanyene ogwetogia as'emebere yabo , gose kwereng ania nabarabwo : korende barabwo berenge emebere yabo nenvbere yabo , na kwereng'ania emebere yabo nemebere yabo , tibari nobong'aini .
47010013	Korende intwe titokwebaka kobua ekerengo giaito , korende as'ekerengo ki'oborengi twarengeirwe na Nyasaye , nonya ngoika asemore .
47010014	Naki titori gwekinia abanyene goeta ekerengo giaito ; buna ng'a titobaikera inwe ; naki twaikire goika asemore as'enchili ya Kristo .
47010015	Titori gwetogia kobua as'ekerengo giaito , as'emeremo y'abanto bande ; korende gatorabe nogosemeria ng'a koreng'ana buna okwegena kwaino gokomenteka , natobakwe asemore koreng'ana as'ekerengo giaito .
47010016	Nakonyora koyerandia enchili ase chinse chire ng'umbu as'orobebe rwaino , titwebaka as'okobua kw'omonto onde as'amang'ana atiekire korosigwa .
47010017	Korende ere oyogwetogia , tiga etogie as'Omonene .
47010018	Naki omonto omonyene bwancheire tari ere oyogwetogia , korende noyogotogigwa n'Omonene .
47011001	Anga naba buya onye mwanyabera ake obokayayu bwane : nabe , nyabera .
47011002	Naki nabaroreire ribero , neribero Tia Nyasaye ; naki nabanyuomeire omosacha oyomo , erinde nyare kobareta buna omoiseke omwekungi omochenu ase Kristo .
47011003	Korende nairokire ; buna eria eng'iti yamong'ainete Hawa as'obong'ainereria bwaye , ebirengererio biaino tibisareka mobotige obuya , nobochenu bwaino ase Kristo .
47011004	Naki ere oyogocha okorandia Yesu onde , ere totamorandeti intwe , gose komoranyore Omoika onde motanyoreti , gose enchili ende motayiancheti , mwakorire buya koremereria nere .
47011005	Ekiagera iga nkagete ng'a inche tindemeiri gento bare nakio abatomwa abare abanene .
47011006	Korende aande timanyeti engecho y'ogokwana , korende obong'aini nimbwate ; nase kera ring'ana twaorokirie asemore .
47011007	Inee ! nakorire ebibe as'okweirania inse erio mokinigwe , ekiagera nabarandeirie enchili ya Kristo ntari neng'eria ?
47011008	Nachiurire chikanisa chinde enibo yabo , ndusie eng'eria yane asebare , mbakorere inwe .
47011009	Nainche ekero narenge amo nainwe ekero naremeretwe , timorarereti omonto ; naki abaminto bagachia gocha korwa Makedonia bakang'a koreng'ana as'okoremerwa kwane ; nas'amang'ana onsi nkerenda as'omobere one timbararereria nonya ng'ake ; naende ninyerende bo .
47011010	Naende buna ekeene gia Kristo kere ime asende , tari omonto oranyare gontanga as'ogwetogia oko , ase chimbebe chi'Akaya .
47011011	Aseki ? nekiagera timbancheti inwe ? Nyasaye omanyire .
47011012	Korende eringokora ninkore , erinde mbatange abakorigia ribaga tibanyora ribaga ; erio ase ring'ana erio abagwetogia barorekane koba buna intwe .
47011013	Naki abwo nabatomwa b'oborimo , bagokora emeremo as'okong'ainereria , abagweonchora babe omogwekano bw'abatomwa ba Kristo .
47011014	Gose tari ogokumia . Ekiagera Saitani omonyene igagweonchora abe omogwekano bwe rilaika ri'omobaso .
47011015	Nabo tari ring'ana rinene abakori baye nabarabwo bagweonchora babe omogwekano bw'abakori b'oboronge . Omoerio obo nabe koreng'ana nemeremo yabo .
47011016	Nakwanire naende , omonto takaga ng'a inche nomokayayu ; korende namonkaga bo , monyanche ng'a nomokayayu ; inche nainche ninyare gwetogia ake .
47011017	Eri ngokwana tindi korikwana as'ogochika kw'Omonene , korende buna omoriri , as'oboremu obo bw'ogwetogia .
47011018	Nonya abange bagwetogia as'engecho y'omobere , nainche nanyetogie .
47011019	Inwe , ekiagera more nobong'aini , iga mokoremereria nabariri as'omogoko .
47011020	Naki igamokoremereria nomonto , karababeke obosomba , karabamere , abasakore , kareimokererie igoro , karabaake inwe as'obosio .
47011021	Iga ngokwana as'engecho y'ogwekeyia buna intwe iga twarenge abareu . Korende , onye ore omonto ore noboremu ase rinde rionsi , ( nakwanire as'obokayayu ) , nainche ninde noboremu .
47011022	Barabwo n'Abaibirania ? nainche . Barabwo n'Abaisiraeli ? nainche . Barabwo noroiboro rw'Ibrahimu ? nainche .
47011023	Barabwo abakori ba Kristo ? ( iga ngokwana buna ebarimo ) , Inche kobua ; as'emeremo kobua mono ; as'okoakwa goeta ekerengo ; as'ogosibwa kobua mono , as'amakweri ebiro ebinge .
47011024	As'Abayahudi ara gatano nkanyora okoakwa emerongo ene tatiga okomo .
47011025	Ara gatato nkaakwa chinyimbo , ara rimo nkaakwa amagena , ara gatato ngatekerwa obwato , omobaso oyomo nobotuko nkanyara goikaransa as'endiba ;
47011026	as'orogendo ara aange ; as'emechando ye chindoche , as'emechando y'abauri , as'emechando y'eamate , as'emechando y'Ebisaku , as'emechando y'emechie ime , as'emechando y'eroro ; as'emechando y'enyancha ime , as'emechando as'abaminto b'oborimo ;
47011027	as'emeremo nogochandeka , as'okogesa ara aange , as'enchara nerang'o , as'okweng'ata ara aange , as'embeo nakoba getirianda .
47011028	Tatiga as'amang'ana onsi ay'isiko , nare agonchichera kera rituko , naro okorigereria gwe chikanisa chionsi .
47011029	Ning'o ore omoreu , timba omoreu nainche ? ning'o ogochigwe , nainche tingechigwa ?
47011030	Kongwenerete gwetogia , ninyetogerie amang'ana ay'oboreu bwane .
47011031	Nyasaye , Tata bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , oyokobakwa goika kare nakare , omanyire ng'a tindi gokwana oborimo .
47011032	Ase Damesiki gavuna o Areta omoruoti , oyorenge koyorenda omochie o Damesiki , akarigia kombwata ;
47011033	ngatirimbokigwa ime as'egetonga , as'edirisa y'oruaki ime , ngakonyeka as'amaboko aye .
47012001	Ningwenerete gwetogia , nonya tikongwenereti ; korende ning'ikere okorota nokoorokigwa kw'Omonene .
47012002	Namanyire omonto ase Kristo , yaetire bono emiaka ikomi nene , ( onye orenge as'omobere timanyeti ; onye orenge isiko as'omobere timanyeti , Nyasaye omanyete ) , omonto oyio akabogorigwa gochia igoro goika igoro ya gatato .
47012003	Nainche namomanyire omonto oyio , ( onye orenge as'omobere timanyeti ; onye orenge isiko as'omobere timanyeti , Nyasaye omanyete ) ,
47012004	igabogoretigwe goika Obonda bwa Nyasaye , akaigwa amang'ana atagwatoreka , ayatagwenerete omonto ayakwane .
47012005	As'amang'ana omonto oyio ninyetogie ; korende as'engecho yane omonyene tingwetogia , tatiga as'oboreu bwane .
47012006	Naki onye narigetie gwetogia anga timbeti omoriri , ekiagera nintebe ekeene . Korende ninyetange , omonto tambarera kobua as'aya ayaroche asende gose koyaigwa asende .
47012007	Nekiagera obonge bw'okooroka okwo , naki as'okwo , tinyara koenena goeta ekerengo , nkaegwa rigwa as'omobere , omotomwa bwe Saitani erinde ang'ake , tinyara gocha koenena goeta ekerengo .
47012008	As'engecho y'egento eke nkamosaba Omonene ara gatato kendwe .
47012009	Agantebia , Obuya bwane bwagoisanire : naki okobua kwane gwaikeranire as'oboreu . Nabo ninyetogerie amareu ane as'omogoko omonge , erio okobua gwa Kristo goikaranse igoro asende .
47012010	As'ayio nagweneirwe namareu , ogoichanigwa , okoremerwa , nokorosigwa , nemechando yonsi , as'engecho ya Kristo : naki konde omoreu erio ninde nechinguru .
47012011	Nabaire omokayayu , inwe mwambetereirie ; naki nengwenerete ntogigwe nainwe ; ekiagera tinarenge inse as'abatomwa baria abanene , nonya tindi gento .
47012012	Ekeene ebikone bi'abatomwa bigakorwa egati yaino as'oboremereria bwonsi , as'ebikone namakumigwa , nechinguru chinyinge .
47012013	Naki ngento ki mwaremeirwe kobua chikanisa chinde , tatiga as'ekiagera inche timbararereti ? monyabere okomocha okwo .
47012014	Rora ekero eke , negia gatato inche nabaire ang'e gocha asemore ; tinkobararereria : naki tindi korigia ebinto biaino , tatiga inwe : ekiagera tibagwenereti abana kobagachera emonga abaise , korende abaise kogachera abana .
47012015	Nas'omogoko omonge ninyebeke , naende ninyerue as'engecho y'emioyo yaino . Nonya nkomenta kobancha mono , naremeirwe ogwanchwa ?
47012016	Korende abe bo , inche timbararereria ; korende ekiagera ninde omong'aini nkabanyora as'obong'ainereria .
47012017	Inee ! Omonto onde bwensi natomete asemore , as'omonto oyio nabaurete egento ?
47012018	Nkamworokereria Tito , nkamotoma oria oyominto amo nere . Inee ! Tito nabaurete gento ? titogendeti as'Omoika oro oria , nase chimbaratero chiria chiria ?
47012019	Iga mokagete ng'a igatokwegwenia asemore naende ? As'obosio bwa Nyasaye twakwanire ase Kristo . Korende aya onsi abanchani , as'okobaagacha .
47012020	Naki nairokire , kondache , timbaisa kobanyora gose tari buna ndigetie kobanyora , ndorekane asemore tari buna morigetie ; tinchicha konyora gose eriomana , ribero , nendamwamu , okoame rerania , nogochayana , nokong'acha , noboenenu , neriroroche ;
47012021	nainche ngocha naende , Nyasaye one ambeke inse asemore , mbaichanere mono abamochete kare , abataonchogete korwa as'eubi , nobotomani , nobonyaka bw'omobere bakorete .
47013001	Ekero eke negia gatato ngocha asemore . As'emenwa y'abarori babere gose batato kera ring'ana naritenene .
47013002	Natang'anire kobatebia , ekero narengeo eria kabere , naboigo bono ntaracha natang'anire kobatebia barabwo abakorete ebibe kare , nabande bonsi , ng'a ngocha , tinkwabera ;
47013003	ekiagera morigetie ekiorokererio gia Kristo oyogokwana ime asende ; oyotari omoreu asemore , korende nare nokobua ime asemore .
47013004	Naki , nonya obambetwe as'oboreu , korende moyo are as'okobua kwa Nyasaye . Naki intwe naintwe ntore abareu as'ere ; korende natobe moyo amo nere as'okobua kwa Nyasaye , kore ime asemore .
47013005	Erenge emioyo yaino gose more as'okwegena ; eteme emioyo yaino . Gose timwemanyeti emioyo yaino , ng'a Yesu Kristo nare ime asemore , tatiga mwangirwe ?
47013006	Korende nasemeirie ng'a namomanye ng'a intwe titwangiri .
47013007	Twamosabire Nyasaye , timokora rinde erire ribe ; tari ng'a intwe tororekane twancheirwe , korende inwe mokore erire rigiya , natoisa koba intwe buna abangirwe .
47013008	Naki titokonyara gokora ring'ana igoro as'ekeene , korende as'ekeene .
47013009	Naki twagokire , ekero tore abareu , nainwe more nechinguru : naende twasabire eri narirorio , moikerane .
47013010	As'ayio , narikire ayio ekero ntari agwo , erinde nkoba agwo tinkorera obotindi , as'ekerengo ki'okobua koria naetwe n'Omonene erinde ng'agache , tari as'ogotagora .
47013011	Omoerio , abaminto , morare buya . Moikerane ; moremigwe ; mobe nomoyo oyomo ; moikaranse as'omorembe ; na Nyasaye bw'obwanchani nomorembe abe amo nainwe .
47013012	Kwanania as'okonyunyuntana ogochenu .
47013013	Abachenu bonsi babakwanirie .
47013014	Obuya bw'Omonene Yesu Kristo , nobwanchani bwa Nyasaye , nokobwatana kw'Omoika Omochenu , oikaranse nainwe mwensi .
48001001	Paulo , omotomwa ( tari omotomwa bw'abana ba mwanyabanto , gose tatometwe nomwana o mwanyabanto , korende ase Yesu Kristo , na Nyasaye Tata omobogetie ) ,
48001002	nabaminto bonsi bare amo nainche , ase chikanisa chia Galatia :
48001003	Obuya bobe asemore , nomorembe okorua ase Nyasaye Tata , nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo ,
48001004	bweruete omobere oye as'engecho y'ebibe biaito , erinde atokonye nense eye embe ere bono , buna anchete Nyasaye , Tata oito :
48001005	asare ere ore nobonene bwa kare nakare . Amin .
48001006	Nakumirie ekiagera iga mokomotiga bwango ere oyobarangeretie as'obuya bwa Kristo ,
48001007	mokaonchokera enchili ere eng'ao , korende tari eyende : korende mbare abanto bande bakobachanda bakorigia goonchora enchili ya Kristo .
48001008	Korende intwe , gose rilaika ri'igoro , tokobaranderia enchili ende yonsi atatiga eria twabaranderetie , naragererigwe .
48001009	Buna twatang'anete gokwana , na bono ninkwane naende , Omonto onde bwonsi karabaranderie enchili ende yonsi atatiga eria twabaranderetie , naragererigwe .
48001010	Naki bono rende , iga ndigetie kobwata emioyo ya mwanyabanto , gose Nyasaye ? gose nindigetie kobagwenera mwanyabanto ? onye nabete goika bono ng'a nagweneire mwanyabanto , anga tinabete omosomba o Kristo .
48001011	Naki nindigetie koborokia baminto , ng'a enchili nabaranderetie , teri ey'engecho ya mwanyabanto .
48001012	Naki tinanyorete korwa ase mwanyabanto , gose tinorokereretigwe nomonto , korende as'okomanoka kwa Yesu Kristo .
48001013	Naki mwaigure ebirage bi'orogendo rwane kare as'edini y'Abayahudi , buna nachandete ekanisa ya Nyasaye goeta ekerengo , nkayesaria :
48001014	nainche natang'anete as'edini y'Abayahudi kobua abange barenge ekegori kiane as'egesaku kiane , ngakora omokia mono as'okobwata chingecho chi'abatata bane .
48001015	Korende Nyasaye ondusananetie korwa enda ya baba one akandangeria as'obuya bwaye ,
48001016	komoorokia Omwana oye ime asende , erinde ndanderie Ebisaku amang'ana aye ; erio tinarigia koborania nabanyene omobere namanyinga :
48001017	gose tinatirete kogenda Yerusalemu as'abwo barenge abatomwa ritang'ani riane ; korende nkagenda Arabia ; nkairana naende Damesiki .
48001018	Erio nyuma as'emiaka etato , ngatira kogenda Yerusalemu erinde tororane na Kefa , nkamenya nere amatuko ikomi natano .
48001019	Korende tinarora omotomwa onde atatiga Yakobo oyomwabo Omonene ,
48001020	Nayio nabarikeire , rigereria , as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , tindi gokwana oborimo .
48001021	Erio nkagenda ensemo ya Shamu na Kilikia .
48001022	Korende tinamanyekana obosio bwane nechikanisa chia Boyahudi chire ase Kristo .
48001023	Korende baigure as'okoigwa gwoka , ng'a ere oria otochandete ritang'ani , bono nkorandiare okwegena koria asaretie kare .
48001024	Bakamotogia Nyasaye as'engecho yane .
48002001	Korende nyuma y'emiaka ikomi nene , ngatira kogenda Yerusalemu amo na Baranaba , nkamoira Tito amo nainche .
48002002	Nainche nkagenda as'okoigorerwa ; nkabatebia enchili eria nkorandia as'Ebisaku , korende ase bobisi as'abwo abanyene okobakwa , teba gose igo nkominyoka bosa , gose igo naminyogete bosa .
48002003	Korende Tito orenge amo nainche oyorenge Omoyunani tabetereretigwe okwarokigwa :
48002004	korende as'engecho y'abaminto b'oborimo basoetigwe bobisi , abwo basoete bobisi banyare kounia ogosiborwa gwaito tore nakorokwo ase Yesu Kristo , erinde batobeke as'obosomba naende ,
48002005	Korende nonya nensa eyemo titwebegete inse asebare , erinde ekeene gi'enchili geikaranse amo nainwe .
48002006	Korende baria abanyene okobakwa ng'a mbare nobonene ( ng'a tari gento asende , nonya mbarenge nobonene bore naki : Nyasaye tari gwanchereria ekieni kia mwanyabanto ) â nakwanire , baria bare nokobakwa tibamenterete gento :
48002007	korende bagachia korora inche ng'a naeirwe enchili y'abatarogeti , buna riria Petero aetwe enchili ya baria bakwaroka
48002008	( naki ere oyomonyareire Petero koba omotomwa bw'abarogete , nere onyareire kogenda as'Ebisaku ) ;
48002009	naende bachia komanya obuya boria naetwe , Yakobo , na Kefa , na Yohana , abanyene okobakwa bare buna chisiro , bakang'a inche na Baranaba okoboko gw'okorio gw'okobwatana , erinde intwe togende as'Ebisaku , nabarabwo bagende as'abanto b'okwaroka ;
48002010	korende ring'ana erimo batorigetie tokore , tobainyore abataka ; nering'ana erio igo narenge nomokia korikora .
48002011	Korende Kefa agachia gocha Antiokia , nkaamererania nere obosio as'obosio , ekiagera konyora otiekire konacherwa ekina .
48002012	Naki konyora bataracha abanto batai bake baruete ase Yakobo , naragerete amo nabanto b'Ebisaku : korende bachia gocha akairana nyuma ageatanana , akabairoka abarogete .
48002013	Nabwo Abayahudi bande bageonchora amo nere , goika Baranaba agasirigwa nokong'ainereria kwabo .
48002014	Korende , ngachia korora ng'a enchera yabo tiyare kogenda boronge nekeene gi'enchili , nkamotebia Kefa as'obosio bw'abanto bonsi , Korabe aye kore Omoyahudi kobwatete chingecho chi'Ebisaku , gose tari echia Abayahudi , naseki okobibetereria Ebisaku bibwate chingecho chi'Abayahudi ?
48002015	Intwe tore Abayahudi as'okoiborwa gwaito , gose tari abanyene ebibe bi'Ebisaku ,
48002016	gatomanyete ng'a omonto takobarwa ng'a noyo bw'oboronge as'ogokora kw'amachiko , korende as'okwegena kwa Yesu Kristo , intwe twanchete Yesu Kristo , erinde tobarwe ng'a nab'oboronge as'okwegena gwa Kristo , tari as'ogokora amachiko ; korende as'ogokora kw'amachiko tari onde omonyene omobere oranyare kobarwa ng'a noyo bw'oboronge .
48002017	Korende onye intwe abanyene igo twarenge korigia tobarerwe oboronge ase Kristo , ng'a igo twarorekanete tore abanyene ebibe , Inee ! Kristo obaire omosomba bw'ebibe ? Yaya .
48002018	Korende kondayaagache naende aria natagorete , neorokirie omonyene ng'a nomomochi .
48002019	Naki inche as'amachiko nakwereire amachiko , erinde imbe moyo ase Nyasaye .
48002020	Nabambirwe amo na Kristo ; gose tari inche naende , korende Kristo moyo are ime asende : nobogima inde naborobwo bono as'omobere ninde naborobwo as'okwegena kw'Omwana o Nyasaye onyanchete , akerwa omobere oye as'engecho yane .
48002021	Tinkoonchora obuya bwa Nyasaye ; naki , kerabe oboronge bokonyorekana as'amachiko , gaki Kristo igo akwete bosa .
48003001	Inwe Abagalatia motari nobong'aini , ning'o obarogete , timwancha ekeene , inwe as'amaiso aino Kristo abegetwe as'okobambwa ?
48003002	Nindigetie kweorokereria ring'ana eri erimo asemore . Inee , igo mwanyorete Omoika as'ogokora kw'amachiko , gose as'okoigwa gokorua as'okwegena ?
48003003	Inee ! iga more abariri buna iga ? mogachaka as'Omoika , igamorigetie goikeranigwa bono as'omobere ?
48003004	Inee ! igo mwanyorete emechando emenene engecho buna eye bosa ? gaki kerabe bosa ?
48003005	Nabo ere oyokobaa inwe Omoika nagokora ebikone egati yaino , igagokora ayio as'ogokora kw'amachiko , gose as'okoigwa gokorua as'okwegena ?
48003006	Buna Ibrahimu amwanchete Nyasaye , akabarwa ng'a nomonyene oboronge .
48003007	Manya gaki , baria bare as'okwegena , abwo nabwo bare abana b'Ibrahimu .
48003008	Korende ayio amariko akarora korwa kare ng'a Nyasaye nabibarerwe Ebisaku oboronge as'okwegena , akaranderia Ibrahimu enchili kare , okobora , ng'a asore ebisaku bionsi nabisesenigwe .
48003009	Gaki abwo bare nokwegena nabasesenigwe amo n'Ibrahimu oyo orenge omwegeni .
48003010	Naki baria bonsi bare as'ogokora kw'amachiko , igo bare inse as'okoragererigwa : naki nerikire , Oragererigwe ker'omonto oyotari kobwata onsi ayarikire as'ebuku y'amachiko , ayakore .
48003011	Igare maiso marore ng'a tari monto onde obareirwe ng'a nomonyene oboronge as'obosio bwa Nyasaye as'amachiko : naki , Omonyene oboronge nabe moyo as'okwegena .
48003012	Namachiko tachete as'okwegena korende , Omonto orakore ayio nabe moyo as'ayio .
48003013	Kristo natoboretie nokoragererigwa kw'amachiko , ekiagera akoretwe okoragererigwa as'engecho yaito : naki , nerikire , Oragererigwe ker'omonto obambirwe igoro as'omote :
48003014	erinde egesio ki'Ibrahimu geikere Ebisaku ase Yesu Kristo ; erinde tonyare koegwa eira y'Omoika as'enchera y'okwegena .
48003015	Abaminto , ngokwanande buna engecho ya mwanyabanto . Nonya ere emuma y'omwana o mwanyabanto , korende keranyare konacheka , monto onde tari oranyare korionchora , gose korimenta ring'ana .
48003016	chiira chiakwanetwe as'Ibrahimu , nas'omoiborwa oye . Takwaneti as'oroiboro buna as'abanto abange ; korende buna ng'a noyomo as'omoiborwa oo , nere Kristo .
48003017	Ayangokwana naya ; Emuma yakoretwe kegima ritang'ani na Nyasaye , amachiko aorogete emiaka chimia inye namerongo etato , nyuma takoonchora , erinde eira eria ebe eya bosa .
48003018	Naki omwando korabe as'amachiko , takoba naende as'eira : korende Nyasaye akamoa Ibrahimu as'eira .
48003019	Amachiko ninki rende ? Agasoigwa as'engecho y'okomocha , goika omoiborwa oranyare gocha oetwe eira ; egachikwa as'obokori bw'amalaika as'okoboko kw'omobwatania .
48003020	Oyore omobwatania tari omobwatania bw'oyomo ; korende Nyasaye noyomo .
48003021	Korende , amachiko tabwataini nechiira chia Nyasaye ? Yaya : naki , onye amachiko naruetwe akonyara gokora moyo , anga oboronge igo bwanyorekanete as'amachiko .
48003022	Korende amariko ayasiekire onsi inse ase chinguru chi'ebibe , erinde abagwancha baegwe eira as'okwegena kwa Yesu Kristo .
48003023	Korende ekero okwegena gotaracha igo twarenge inse as'amachiko , twasibetwe goika goche koria okwegena korache koorokigwa .
48003024	Naboigo amachiko abaire omworokia ogotorenta ase Kristo erinde tobarerwe oboronge as'okwegena .
48003025	Korende bono ekiagera okwegena gwachire , titori naende inse as'omworokia .
48003026	Naki inwe mwensi nabana ba Nyasaye as'enchera y'okwegena ase Yesu Kristo .
48003027	Ekiagera inwe mwensi mwabatisetwe nagosoigwa ase Kristo mwamweboete Kristo .
48003028	Tari Omoyahudi gose Omoyunani , tari omosomba gose omosibore , tari omonto omosacha , gose omonto omokungu : naki inwe imwensi noyomo ase Kristo Yesu .
48003029	Onye inwe naba Kristo , rirorio , mwabaire oroiboro rwa Ibrahimu , nabanyamwando as'eira .
48004001	Korende nakwanire ng'a omonyamwando , ekero gionsi are omwana , tari nogwatananekana nomosomba , nonya ore omonene as'onsi ;
48004002	korende igare inse as'abariti nabarendi , goika engaki yachigetwe naise .
48004003	Nabo naintwe ekero twarenge abana , twarenge gokorigwa buna obosomba , inse as'okworokererigwa kwe ritang'ani gw'ense .
48004004	Korende agwo ogoikerana gw'ekero gwachia gocha , Nyasaye akamotoma Omwana oye , oiboretwe nomokungu , akaiborerwa inse as'amachiko .
48004005	Erinde , ababorie baria barenge inse as'amachiko , tonyare gosoigwa tobe abana .
48004006	Nekiagera inwe more abana , Nyasaye agatoma Omoika bw'Omwana oye ase chinkoro chiaito , okorera , Abba , Tata .
48004007	Onye naboigo , aye tori omosomba naende korende kwabaire omwana ; nonya kore omwana , erio nomonyamwando o Nyasaye ase Kristo .
48004008	Korende engaki eria , ekiagera motamomanyete Nyasaye , mogachikorera chirochio echitarenge boronge buna chinyasaye :
48004009	korende bono kamwatiekire komomanya Nyasaye , gose kobua komanyekana na Nyasaye , naseki rende mokoiranera as'okworokererigwa kwe ritang'ani okore okworo nokw'obotaka , as'ayio naende morigetie koyakorera ?
48004010	Mobwatete amatuko nemetienyi , nebiro , nemiaka .
48004011	Nabairokire , teba gose ng'a nerosirie bosa asemore .
48004012	Nabasoroire , abaminto , mobe buna inche inde , naki inche igande buna inwe . Timonkorerereti bobe bonde :
48004013	korende mwamanyire , ng'a nabaranderetie enchili , ritang'ani ekiagera as'oboreu bw'omobere ;
48004014	na koria okwarenge buna ogotemwa as'omobere one timwanchayete gose timwanyangete ; korende mokandosia buna rilaika ria Nyasaye , buna Yesu Kristo .
48004015	Ng'ai kore , rende koria ogwetogia kwaino abanyene ? naki nabaire kirori , ng'a onye , nanyarekanete , anga mwarusetie amaiso aino , mong'e inche .
48004016	Korende inee ! nabaire omobisa oino ekiagera nabatebirie ayare ekeene ?
48004017	Mbare nomokia asemore korende tari as'enchera engiya , korende mbarigetie kobasiekera isiko erinde mobarigie barabwo .
48004018	Korende mbuya amatuko onsi korigigwa as'omokia ase ring'ana rire rigiya , tari buna inde agwo amo nainwe rioka .
48004019	Abana bane abake , ekiagera nabaroreire obororo goika Kristo akorwe ime yaino .
48004020	Ee , anga nancha koba amo nainwe bono , nakoonchora eriogi riane ; ekiagera nabaichanire inwe .
48004021	Ntebia , inwe morigetie koba inse as'amachiko , timori koigwera aria amachiko ?
48004022	Naki nerikire , Ibrahimu narenge nabana babere abamura , oyomo bw'omoreri , noyomo bw'omokungu omosibore .
48004023	Korende oria bw'omoreri akaiborwa as'omobere ; noria bw'omokungu omosibore akaiborwa as'eira .
48004024	Amang'ana aya igagokwanwa as'omoreng'anio : naki , abakungu aba babere nabwo chimuma ibere ; oyomo korwa egetunwa gia Sinai , gekoibora abana as'obosomba , nere Hajiri .
48004025	Naki Hajiri negetunwa gia Sinai kere Arabia kereng'aine na Yerusalemu ya bono ; naki igare as'obosomba amo nabana baye .
48004026	Korende Yerusalemu y'igoro nomosibore , nero baba oito .
48004027	Naki yarikirwe , Goka aye otari koibora ; Aka eriogi , orere , aye otari nobororo ; Naki abana baye oria otigetwe nabange kobua abaye oyore nomosacha .
48004028	Gaki , abaminto , intwe ntore abana b'eira buna Isaaka .
48004029	Korende buna as'ekero keria oria oiboretwe as'engecho y'omobere , ochandete oria oiboretwe as'engecho y'Omoika , goika nonya mbono naboigo .
48004030	Korende amariko naki agoteba ? Moserie oyo omoreri amo nomwana oye : naki omwana bw'omoreri takonyora omwando nonya ng'ake amo nomwana bw'omokungu omosibore .
48004031	Naboigo abaminto , intwe titori abana b'omoreri , korende ntore abana b'omokungu omosibore .
48005001	Kristo agatokora abasibore as'ogosiborwa ; gaki , tenena boigo , timobwatwa naende as'egesibo ki'obosomba .
48005002	Inche Paulo nabatebirie inwe ng'a kamorarokigwe , Kristo takobagwenera kende .
48005003	Ee , natebire naende ase ker'omonto okonyora okwarokigwa , ng'a obaire nesira as'ogoikerania amachiko onsi .
48005004	Mwatananirwe na Kristo , inwe morigetie kobarerwa oboronge as'amachiko , mwagure korwa as'obuya .
48005005	Naki intwe as'Omoika ntoganyete ogosemeria kw'oboronge as'enchera y'okwegena .
48005006	Naki ase Kristo Yesu okwaroka tikogwenereti ing'ana rinde rionsi gose ogotaroka : korende okwegena kogokora emeremo as'obwanchani .
48005007	Mwarenge kominyoka buya ; ning'o obatangete timoigwera ekeene ?
48005008	Okoebereria oko tikwaruete asare ere obarangeretie .
48005009	Ememera emeke igo ekobotia ribomba rigima .
48005010	Ninde nogosemeria asemore nas'Omonene , ng'a timokoba nebirengererio binde bionsi : korende ere oyokobachanda nabogorie ekina kiaye , onde bwonsi .
48005011	Korende inche , abaminto , kerabe nkorandia amang'ana ayokwaroka , na bono , naseki ngochandwa ? erio ekegocha ki'omosalaba kiaonchokire
48005012	Anga nancha abwo bakobabeka emechando benache emebere yabo .
48005013	Korende inwe abaminto , mwarangeretigwe monyore ogosiborwa ; korende ogosiborwa kwaino tikoba as'engecho y'okobwatia omobere , mbuya mokorerane inwe as'inwe as'enchera y'obwanchani .
48005014	Korende amachiko onsi aisanerigwe ase ring'ana erimo , narirorio nario eri , Omwanche omogisangi oo buna omobere oo .
48005015	Korende kerabe mokoromana nakoriana , rigereria timocha gosirania .
48005016	Korende , nakwanire , genda as'Omoika , inwe timokonyara goikerania ebirengererio bi'omobere .
48005017	Naki omobere norengereretie koamererania n'Omoika , n'Omoika norengereretie koamererania nomobere ; ekiagera ebi iga bikorwana ; goika timokonyara gokora ayamorigetie gokora .
48005018	Korende komoratang'anwe n'Omoika , timori inse as'amachiko .
48005019	Nogokora kw'omobere igo kore maiso marore , nakwoko ; obonyaka , eriko , okorengereria kw'omobere ,
48005020	ogosasima chisanamu , oborogi , obobisa , eriomana , ribero , endamwamu , esugu , ogwatananekana , okwerusanania ,
48005021	emoko , nogotinda , chigosori chimbe , nayande areng'aine buna ayio : igoro as'aya natang'anire kobatebia buna riria nakwanete maiso marore , ng'a abwo bagokora amang'ana ayio tibakonyora omwando bw'obonda bwa Nyasaye .
48005022	Korende okwama kw'Omoika , nobwanchani , omogoko , omorembe , oboremereria , ogokora amaya , obuya , okwegena ,
48005023	obwororo , okwerita as'onsi , igoro as'aya onsi machiko tari .
48005024	Nabwo bare abanto ba Kristo Yesu babambire omobere amo nokogania okobe nokorengereria kwaye .
48005025	Gatorabe moyo as'Omoika togende as'Omoika .
48005026	Titwetogia bosa , gotogochegania , nakoba nemoko intwe as'intwe .
48006001	Abaminto , omonto karabugwe as'okomocha konde gwonsi , inwe abamore ab'omoika , moiranie omonto oyo as'omoika bw'obwororo , nakwerigereria aye omonyene tobaisa gotemwa .
48006002	Bogorerania chigurube inwe as'inwe , moikeranie boigo amachiko a Kristo .
48006003	Naki omonto karekage ng'a negento , nere tari gento , igakweng'aina omonyene .
48006004	Korende ker'omonto arenge emeremo yaye omonyene , erio nabe nengecho y'ogwetogia omonyene bweka , korende tari okwereng'ania nomogisangio oye .
48006005	Naki ker'omonto nabogorie egurube yaye omonyene .
48006006	Korende ere oyokworokererigwa ring'ana , abwatane nere oyokworokereria as'ebimo ebiya bionsi .
48006007	Timong'aineka ; Nyasaye akorerwe echeche : naki kende gionsi arasimeke omonto , nakio arache kogesa .
48006008	Naki ere oyorasimeke as'omobere oye , as'omobere oye nagese ogosareka ; korende ere oyorasimeke as'Omoika , as'Omoika nagese obogima bwa kare nakare .
48006009	Titorosa as'ogokora amaya ; naki natogese as'ekero kiaye , totakweti emioyo .
48006010	Nabo , gatorabe neribaga tobakorere abanto bonsi amaya ; korende kobua abwo abare as'enyomba y'okwegena .
48006011	Rigereria , buna chire chinene chinuguta nabarikeire as'okoboko kwane omonyene .
48006012	Bonsi barigetie kororekana buya as'omobere , abwo nabwo bakobachika mwarokigwe ; ng'a tibachandwa as'engecho y'omosalaba o Kristo .
48006013	Naki nonya barabwo abanyene abarokire , tibabwateti amachiko ; korende mbabarigetie inwe mwarokigwe , erinde banyare gwetogeria emebere yaino .
48006014	Kobe are nainche , ogwetogia , tatiga as'omosalaba bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , as'oro ense yabambirwe asende , nainche as'ense .
48006015	Naki okwaroka tai gento , gose ogotaroka tai gento , korende egetongwa ekeyia .
48006016	Na bonsi abaragendere ogochika oko , omorembe obe asebare , namabera , n'igoro as'Abaisiraeli ba Nyasaye .
48006017	Korwa bono monto tambeka emechando ; naki naimokirie ekemanyererio kia Yesu omobere one .
48006018	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nemioyo yaino . Amin .
49001001	Paulo , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , as'abachenu bare as'Efeso , nabegeni ase Kristo Yesu :
49001002	Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe korua ase Nyasaye Tata oito nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
49001003	Abakwe Nyasaye , Tata bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , oyotosesenetie ogosesenia gwonsi kw'omoika , aas'are igoro ase Kristo :
49001004	buna atochorete asere , ritang'ani ense etarabekwa oboroso , erinde tobe abachenu , totari nekemoa as'obosio bwaye , as'obwanchani :
49001005	ekiagera atochorete korwa kare erinde tokorwe abana baye ere as'enchera ya Yesu Kristo , as'obwanchani bw'okorigia kwaye ,
49001006	erinde , bobakwe obonene bw'obuya bwaye , atoeire as'oyo Omwanchi oye :
49001007	asare ntore nokoborigwa as'amanyinga aye , okwabera as'ebibe biaito , as'obonge bw'obuya bwaye ,
49001008	akabokora goichora asetore ase chisemi , nobong'aini bwonsi ,
49001009	gatiekire gotworokia obobisi bw'obwanchani bwaye , koreng'ana nobwanchani bwaye , ayakwanete as'ere oyo ,
49001010	goika as'ekero ki'ogoikeranigwa kw'ebiro , nabekeranie ebinto bionsi bibe nobomo ase Kristo , ebinto bire igoro , nebire as'ense ; as'ere oyo :
49001011	ekiagera ime yaye intwe twanyorire omwando , twatang'anire gochorwa korwa omochakano as'okorigia kwaye ere oyokorete onsi as'engecho y'okorigia kwaye ;
49001012	erinde intwe tobe ogotogigwa kw'obonene bwaye , abwo twatang'anete komogachera Kristo ogosemeria gwaito :
49001013	As'ere nainwe , komwatiekire koigwa ring'ana ri'ekeene , amang'ana amaya ay'ogokonyeka kwaino , â as'oyio naende komwatiekire komwancha , mokabekwa ekemanyererio n'Omoika oria Omochenu bw'eira .
49001014	Nere ore ntenenera bw'omwando oito , goika okoborigwa kwe biaye omonyene Nyasaye , as'ogotogigwa kw'obonene bwaye .
49001015	As'engecho eyio nainche korwa ekero nanyorete amang'ana okwegena kwaino more nakorokwo as'Omonene Yesu , mokworokia as'abachenu bonsi ,
49001016	tintigeti koiraneria ng'a mbuya as'engecho yaino ; nakobainyora as'ogosaba kwane ;
49001017	erinde Nyasaye bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , Tata bw'obonene , abae omoyo bwe chisemi noyo okomanoka as'okomomanya ere ;
49001018	amaiso aye chinkoro chiaino abekwe omobaso , momanye ogosemeria gw'okorangeria kwaye , buna bore obonda bw'obonene bw'omwando oye as'abachenu ,
49001019	nobuya bw'obonene bw'okobua kwaye bwatoikeire intwe abatwanchete , as'ekerengo ki'emeremo ye chinguru chiaye nobokong'u .
49001020	Akorete ase Kristo ekero amobogetie , akamobeka okoboko kwaye gw'okorio as'igoro ,
49001021	igoro mono kobua okogamba gwonsi , nokobua , nechinguru , noboruoti , na kera erieta rigwatorwa , tari ense eye ime oka , korende neria egocha nero ;
49001022	akabibeka ebinto bionsi inse as'amagoro aye , akamobeka abe omotwe igoro y'ebinto bionsi as'engecho y'ekanisa ,
49001023	eyere omobere oye , ogoichoria kwaye ere oichoirie ebinto bionsi ase bionsi .
49002001	Nainwe agwo ekero mwarenge ebitondo , as'engecho y'okomocha kwaino nebibe biaino , akababokia ,
49002002	mwagenderete kare as'ogotunyana chingecho chi'ense eye , nagotunyana oboruoti bw'okobua kw'amare omoika gati , omoika oria ogokora emeremo bono as'abana b'ogosaria ;
49002003	ebio naintwe intwensi togachigendera , agwo kare , as'okorengereria kw'emebere yaito , togaikerania obwanchani bw'emchere yaito , nebirengererio biaito , tokaba as'orogendo rwaito abana b'endamwamu buna abwo abande : â
49002004	korende Nyasaye ekiagera arenge nobonge bw'amabera , as'obwanchani bwaye obonene atwanchete ,
49002005	nonya ekero keria twarenge ebitondo as'okomocha gwaito , agatobokia amo na Kristo ( mwakonyirwe as'obuya ) ,
49002006	agatobokia amo nere , agatoikaransia amo nere aase a igoro ase Kristo Yesu :
49002007	erinde as'ebiro birache naorokie obonge bw'obuya bwaye boetete ekerengo ki'obuya bwaye , asetore ase Kristo Yesu .
49002008	Naki mwakonyirwe as'obuya , as'enchera y'okwegena ; nas'ayio taruete asemore abanyene ; nekeegwa kia Nyasaye :
49002009	gose tari as'ogokora , tacha monto onde bwonsi gwetogia .
49002010	Naki iga tore emeremo yaye , togatongwa ase Kristo Yesu , tokore ogokora okuya , okwo Nyasaye arosetie korwa omochakano erinde totare naro .
49002011	As'engecho y'ayio inyora ng'a kare , inwe iga mwarenge abanto b'Ebisaku as'engecho y'emebere , mwarangeretigwe as'erieta riaino buna abanto batarogeti , nabaria barangerigwe as'erieta riabo abarogetigwe , engecho yaye okwaroka kw'omobere as'amaboko ;
49002012	ng'a engaki eria ya kare timwarenge na Kristo , iga mwatananekanete neamate y'Abaisiraeli , abageni , abatarenge nechimuma chi'eira , timwarenge nagosemeria , timwarenge na Nyasaye as'ense .
49002013	Korende bono , ase Kristo Yesu , inwe mwarenge are agwo ritang'ani , mwabaire ang'e as'amanyinga a Kristo .
49002014	Naki nere omorembe oito , otokorete intwe intwensi twarenge babere , koba oyomo , agatagora etoto yarenge gati yatwatananete ,
49002015	gatiekire koborusia as'omobere oye boria obobisa , nonya nogochika kw'amachiko are as'amachiko ; erinde akore babere koba omonto omoyia oyomo ime as'omobere oye , ogokora omorembe ;
49002016	nakobabwatania bonsi babere na Nyasaye as'omobere oyomo , as'omosalaba , gatiekire goita boria obobisa as'oyio omosalaba :
49002017	agacha korandia omorembe asemore inwe mwarenge are , nas'abwo abarenge ang'e .
49002018	Naki as'ere intwe intwensi twanyorire enchera y'okomoika ang'e Nyasaye Tata , as'Omoika oyomo .
49002019	Gaki korwa bono inwe timori abaeti gose abageni , korende inwe nabanyene amo nabachenu , abanto b'enyomba ya Nyasaye ,
49002020	mwaagachirwe igoro as'oboroso bw'abatomwa nababani , na Kristo Yesu omonyene nerigena rinene ri'ekona ;
49002021	as'ere oboagacho bwonsi kaborabwatanigwe buya , nabokine bobe hekalu enchenu as'Omonene ;
49002022	as'ere nainwe mwaagachirwe amo koba obomenyo bwa Nyasaye as'Omoika ,
49003001	As'engecho eyio inche Paulo , omosibwa o Yesu Kristo as'engecho yaino inwe Ebisaku ,
49003002	onyore mwaigure amang'ana oborendi bw'obuya bwa Nyasaye naetwe as'engecho yaino ;
49003003	buna as'okomanorerwa natebetigwe obobisi boria , buna natang'anete korika as'amang'ana amake ,
49003004	as'ayio komokoyasoma , namonyare koinyora okomanya kwane as'obobisi bwa Kristo ;
49003005	buna atabatebetie abana ba mwanyabanto as'ebigori binde , buna abaigorerete abatomwa baye abachenu nababani as'Omoika ;
49003006	erinde , ng'a Ebisaku biabaire ebinyamwando , amo naintwe , ab'omwando oyomo , nomobere oyomo , nababwatani amo naintwe eira yaye ere ase Kristo as'enchera y'enchili .
49003007	Nabo ngakorwa omokori oye , as'ekerengo gi'ekeegwa ki'obuya bwa Nyasaye naetwe as'ekerengo ki'ogokora emeremo as'okobua kwaye .
49003008	As'inche , oyore omoke kobua , oyore omoke as'abachenu bonsi , naetwe obuya obo , kobaranderia Ebisaku obonda bwaye Kristo botakorengeka ;
49003009	nakobabareria abanto bonsi , bamanye oborendi nobobisi boria , ekiagera korwa kare onsi bwabisekanete ase Nyasaye , oyotongete bionsi ;
49003010	erinde bono , as'enchera y'ekanisa , chisemi chia Nyasaye chire chingecho chinyinge chimanyekane namaruoti nechinguru ch'igoro ;
49003011	as'okoreng'ana nokorigia kwaye gwa kare nakare arigetie ase Kristo Yesu Omonene oito .
49003012	As'ere ntore noboremu bw'okobua ogosoa as'ogosemeria as'enchera y'okwegena kwaye .
49003013	Gaki nabasabire , timokwa emioyo as'engecho yaino , eyere obonene bwaino .
49003014	As'ayio natung'amire ase Tata ,
49003015	ekiagera as'erieta riaye ker'obotata bwonsi bw'igoro nobw'ense igo bokorangerigwa ,
49003016	erinde abae , as'okoreng'ana nobonda bw'obonene bwaye , momentwe chinguru as'Omoika oye as'omonto oino oime ;
49003017	Kristo amenye ase chinkoro chiaino as'okwegena ; erinde inwe , komorabe nemeri noboroso as'obwanchani ,
49003018	monyare koinyora amo nabachenu bonsi , amagare namatambe , na gochia igoro na gochia inse ,
49003019	nakomanya obwanchani bwaye Kristo , boetete okoinyora , erinde monyare goichorwa goika ogoikera ker'ogoichora kwa Nyasaye .
49003020	Gaki , asare ere oranyare gokora ebitage bi'ogokumia mono kobua bionsi togosaba gose ebitokorengereria , as'okoreng'ana gwe chinguru chigokora emeremo ime asetore ,
49003021	Asare ere obonene as'ekanisa nase Kristo Yesu goika ebigori bionsi bia kare nakare . Amin .
49004001	Gaki nabasoroire , inche omosibwa as'Omonene , mogende buna egwenerete okorangerigwa kwaino mwarangereretigwe ,
49004002	as'obokanyeku bwonsi nobwororo , as'oboremereria , mokobogorerania as'obwanchani ;
49004003	mokore omokia konyora obomo bw'Omoika as'egesibo ki'omorembe .
49004004	Omobere noyomo , n'Omoika noyomo , buna mwarangeretigwe as'ogosemeria okomo gw'okorangerigwa kwaino ;
49004005	Omonene oyomo , okwegena okomo , ebatiso eyemo ,
49004006	Nyasaye oyomo , nere Tata o bonsi , oyore igoro ase bonsi , nas'onsi , naime ase bonsi .
49004007	Korende ker'oyomo oito naetwe obuya , as'okoreng'ana ekeegwa gia Kristo .
49004008	As'ayio otebire , Ekero arinete igoro , agasakora abasakore , Akabaa abanto ebiegwa .
49004009	( Gaki , ring'ana riria , Akarina , engecho yaye inki tatiga igaigete nonya goika ensemo y'ense inse ?
49004010	Oyoigete nere orinete igoro mono kobua igoro onsi , ebinto bionsi bichore nere . )
49004011	Nere akabaa abande babe abatomwa ; nabande babe ababani ; nabande babe abarandia ; nabande babe abarisia naborokia ;
49004012	as'okobaikerania abachenu , as'ogoikera emeremo y'obosomba , omobere o Kristo oagachwe :
49004013	goika intwensi toranyare koboikera obomo bw'okwegena , nakomomanya mono Omwana o Nyasaye , tobe abanto abaikeranu , goika obonene bw'ogokina kw'oboikeranu bwa Kristo ;
49004014	erinde titoba naende abana abasinini , togotugutwa aria naria , nakoirwa ase ker'embeo y'okworokereria , as'obobe bw'abanto , as'obong'ainereria , tokobwatia chinchera chi'ogosira ;
49004015	korende as'ogokwana ekeene as'obwanchani , tokine goika tomoikere ere as'onsi , ore omotwe , Kristo ;
49004016	as'ere omobere bwonsi korasang'ananigwe kobwatanigwa , as'ogokonya gwa ker'ekimo , as'okoreng'ana emeremo ya ker'ensemo eyemo eyemo , egokinia omobere onyare kweagacha omonyene as'obwanchani .
49004017	Gaki nakwanire ring'ana eri , naende natebire as'Omonene , korwa bono timogenda buna Ebisaku bikogenda , as'oboenenu bwe chisemi chiabo ,
49004018	obong'aini bwabo bwabekirwe omosunte , bamenyeire are nobogima bwa Nyasaye , ekiagera as'oboriri bwabo bore asebare , as'engecho y'obokong'u bwe chinkoro chiabo ;
49004019	abanto basarekire kegima , bebekire ase chingecho chimbe chi'omobere banyare gokora kera chingecho chi'eubi as'okorengereria .
49004020	Korende inwe timweorokerereti iga amang'ana a Kristo ;
49004021	onye mwamoigwete mokorokererigwa asere , buna kere ekeene ase Yesu :
49004022	morusie as'amang'ana ay'engecho ye ritang'ani omonto okare , oyosarigwe as'okobwatia okorengereria gw'okong'ainereria ;
49004023	mokorwe abayia as'omoika bw'ebirengereria biaino ,
49004024	mweboyie omonto omoyia , oyotongetwe as'engecho ya Nyasaye as'oboronge nobochenu bw'ekeene .
49004025	Gaki , borusie oborimo , mokwane ekeene ker'omonto nomogisangi oye : naki igatore ebimo intwe as'intwe .
49004026	Mobee , korende timokora ebibe : erioba tirigwa nainwe more nendamwamu :
49004027	gose timoa saitani ribaga .
49004028	Omoibi taiba naende : mbuya akore emeremo nomokia as'amaboko aye gokora ayare amaya , erinde abe negento akomwatanera oyoremeire .
49004029	Ring'ana rionsi rire ribe tirirua omonwa oino , korende erire rigiya ri'okomogwenera oyore nokorigia , ribae obuya abakoigwa .
49004030	Gose timoichania Omoika oria Omochenu o Nyasaye ; asere mokabekwa ekemanyererio goika rituko ri'okoboria .
49004031	Obororo bwonsi , nendamwamu , nokobea , neriomana , nemeruini , bimsigwe asemore , amo na ker'obobe :
49004032	mobe nobuya inwe as'inwe , nakororerana amabebe , nakwaberana inwe as'inwe , buna na Nyasaye ase Kristo ababerete inwe .
49005001	Gaki mobe abatunyani ba Nyasaye , buna abana banchire ;
49005002	mogende as'obwanchani , buna Kristo abanchete inwe , akerua as'engecho yaito , esadaka nekeng'wanso ase Nyasaye , kobe ogotioka okuya .
49005003	Korende obotomani , neubi yonsi , gose okorengereria , tigokwanwa asemore kegima , buna ebagwenerete abachenu ;
49005004	gose eubi , gose amang'ana ay'obokayayu , gose ogosekereria aya tagwenereti ; korende mbuya kobua koiraneria ng'a mbuya mono .
49005005	Naki ring'ana eri mwarimanyire kegima , ng'a tari omotomani , gose oyo bw'eubi , gose omonto bw'okorengereria , nere omosabi esanamu , ore nomwando as'obonda bwa Kristo na Nyasaye .
49005006	Omonto tabang'aina as'amang'ana atari nengecho , ekiagera as'aya okobea kwa Nyasaye iga gogochera abana b'ogosaria .
49005007	Gaki timobwatana nabarabwo .
49005008	Naki kare mwarenge omosunte , korende bono omobaso as'Omonene ; genda buna abana b'omobaso
49005009	( naki okwama kw'omobaso nas'obuya bwonsi noboronge nekeene ) ,
49005010	komoramanye ekemogwenerete Omonene .
49005011	Gose timobwatana nogokora gotakwama okw'omosunte , korende mogokanie ;
49005012	naki nobosoku nonya nokoyakwana amang'ana ayio agokorwa nabwo ase bobisi .
49005013	Korende onsi ayakanire naorokigwe nomobaso ; naki ker'egento kiaorokigwe nomobaso .
49005014	As'ayio otebire , Boka , aye osundogete , boka korwa as'amakweri , na Kristo nakobarerie .
49005015	Rigereria mono , gaki , buna mokogenda , tari buna abanto batari nobong'aini , korende buna abare nobong'aini ;
49005016	nagogekorera ekero , ekiagera amatuko aya namabe .
49005017	As'engecho eye timoba abariri , korende abanto bakoinyora ng'a inki obwanchani bw'Omonene .
49005018	Naende timotinda as'edivai , ekiagera mboreo obokayayu , korende moichorwe n'Omoika ;
49005019	motchereranie as'esaburi , nomosasoko nogotera kw'emioyo , motere namokomogokera Omonene ase chinkoro chiaino ;
49005020	mokomoakera mbuya mono Nyasaye Tata amatuko onsi , as'amang'ana onsi , as'erieta riaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ;
49005021	mogokorerana as'okoiroka gwa Kristo .
49005022	Inwe abakungu , bakorere abasacha baino buna okomokorera Omonene oito .
49005023	Naki omosacha nomotwe bw'omokungu , buna Kristo are omotwe bw'ekanisa , nere nomokonyi bw'omobere .
49005024	Naboigo buna ekanisa ekomokorera Kristo , naboigo nabakungu babakorere abasacha babo ase kera ring'ana .
49005025	Nainwe abasacha , banche abakungu baino , buna Kristo anchete ekanisa , akerua as'engecho yaye ;
49005026	erinde ng'a anyare koyesibia as'amache , nase ring'ana ;
49005027	erinde anyare kwenyorera ekanisa y'obonene , etari nobobe gose kemoa , gose rinde rionsi buna aya , korende ebe enchenu etari nebimoa .
49005028	Naboigo abagwenerete abasacha kobancha abakungu babo buna emebere yabo abanyene , Oyomwanchete mokaye bweyanchire omobere oye ;
49005029	naki tari omonto obeete omobere oye ; korende iga akoyorisia nakoyorenda , buna Omonene akorerete ekanisa ;
49005030	ekiagera tore ebimo bi'omobere oye , nechinyama chiaye , namauga aye .
49005031	As'engecho eyio omonto natige ise na ng'ina bamenyane na mokaye ; nabarabwo babere babe omobere oyomo .
49005032	Obo nobobisi obonene : korende ngokwanande amang'ana a Kristo nekanisa .
49005033	Korende omonto anche mokaye buna omobere oye omonyene ; nomokungu tamocha koigwera omosacha oye .
49006001	Abana , moigwere abaibori baino as'Omonene : ekiagera obo nabwo oboronge .
49006002	Basike ' so na nyoko ( ogochika oko nakwo ogochika kwe ritang'ani as'eira ) ,
49006003	erinde ebe buya asore , oikaranse mono as'ense .
49006004	Nainwe , abatata , timobachegia abana baino ; korende barere as'amasikani nokworokereria kw'Omonene .
49006005	Abasomba , moigwere abanene baino ase chingecho chi'omobere buna nokomoigwera Kristo ; as'obwoba nokoiguswa , as'obomo bw'omoyo ;
49006006	gose tari as'obosomba bw'amaiso buna abegwenia ase mwanyabanto ; korende buna abasomba ba Kristo , mogokora obwanchani bwa Nyasaye as'enkoro ;
49006007	as'omoyo omuya mokomokorera Omonene gose tari mwanyabanto :
49006008	inomanye ng'a ring'ana rigiya agokora omonto , naegwe erio n'Omonene , karabe omosomba , gose onye nomosibore .
49006009	Nainwe , abanene , bakorere ayio ayio , motige kobairokia : momanye ng'a ere oyore Omonene obo noyoino oyore igoro , nasare gwanchereria tikoiyo .
49006010	Abaminto , mobe abakong'u as'Omonene , nas'okobua gwe chinguru chiaye .
49006011	Eboe ebinto bionsi bi'esegi bia Nyasaye , monyare gotenena korwania obong'ainereria bwa saitani .
49006012	Naki okoamererania gwaito tari igoro as'amanyinga nechinyama , korende igoro as'oboruoti nokobua , igoro as'abanene b'omosunte bw'enseye , naigoro y'emeganda y'ebirecha ebibe as'ense y'omoika .
49006013	As'ayio bogoria ebinto bionsi bi'esegi bia Nyasaye , monyare koamererania nerituko ri'obobe , na kamwaikeranirie onsi , gotenena .
49006014	Tenena , gaki , mweboyie ekeene ebinema biaino , nakobeka oboronge ebikuba biaino ,
49006015	nagosiberwa amagoro engecho y'okoba ang'e twanyorire as'enchili y'omorembe ;
49006016	kobua onsi bogoria enguba y'okwegena , as'eyio namonyare korimia emegwe yonsi y'omorero y'oria omobe .
49006017	Naende moyenyore egutwa y'ogokonyeka , nomoro bw'Omoika , oro nering'ana ria Nyasaye ;
49006018	as'ogosasima gwonsi nogosaba mogosasima ker'ekero gionsi as'Omoika , nagotagesia ase ring'ana erio , mogokora omokia mono , nakobasabera abachenu bonsi ,
49006019	amo nainche , ng'egwe ogokwana , as'okomanora omonwa one , as'oboremu , ndandie obobisi bw'enchili ,
49006020	as'ayio nigande omogai as'egesibo ; nyore oboremu as'ogokwana chingecho chingwenerete gokwana .
49006021	Korende inwe nainwe monyare koyamanya amang'ana ane engecho are , Tukiko , oyominto omwanchwa , omokori omwegeni , as'Omonene , nabatebie amang'ana onsi :
49006022	ere namotomete asemore as'engecho eye eye monyare koyamanya amang'ana aito , nere nabaremie chinkoro chiaino .
49006023	Omorembe as'abaminto , nobwanchani amo nokwegena , bokorua ase Nyasaye Tata , nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
49006024	Obuya bobe amo nabonsi abamwanchete Omonene oito Yesu batari nabobe .
50001001	Paulo na Timotheo abatomwa ba Yesu Kristo , as'abachenu bonsi ase Kristo Yesu , abare hilipu amo nabatang'ani , nabakori :
50001002	Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe bokorua ase Nyasaye Tata nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
50001003	Namoakeire ng'a mbuya mono Nyasaye one engaki nkobamyora ,
50001004	amatuko onsi nkobasabera inwe imwensi , nkwana ogosasima kwane nomogoko ,
50001005	naki okobwatana kwaino as'okorandia enchili , korwa amatuko omochakano goika iga rero ;
50001006	erinyanchete nario eri , ng'a ere oyochagete emeremo emiya emioyo yaino ime nayekore goika rituko ria Yesu Kristo :
50001007	buna bore boronge asende korengereria aya igoro asemore mwensi , ekiagera nainwe more enkoro yane ime ; ekiagera as'ogosibwa kwane nas'emeremo y'okoyerenda enchili nakoyebeka chinguru , nainwe imwensi mwabwatanire nainche nobuya obo .
50001008	Naki Nyasaye nkirori one , engecho mbarengereretie inwe as'amabera are ime ase Kristo Yesu .
50001009	Noko nakwo ogosaba kwane , obwanchani bwaino bomenteke bobe obonge mono , as'obong'aini nokoinyora gwonsi .
50001010	Monyare koyancha ayare amaya , erinde mobe nemioyo emerabu , motari nakomocha , goika rituko ria Kristo ;
50001011	mwaichoirwe nokwama kw'oboronge as'enchera ya Yesu Kristo , nas'obonene nokobakwa kwa Nyasaye .
50001012	Korende , abaminto , narigirie momanye ng'a amang'ana onsi anyorete achire kobua as'okogendereria enchili ;
50001013	goika ogosibwa kwane kwarorekanire maiso marore ase Kristo , nas'abarendi bonsi b'omoruoti , nas'abande bonsi .
50001014	Nabare abange baminto bare as'Omonene , bakanyara goikerania as'engecho y'ogosibwa kwane , bamentekanire mono korikwana ring'ana ri'Omonene batari nobwoba .
50001015	Abande nkorandiabare amang'ana a Kristo , as'engecho y'emoko neriomana ; nabande barandia as'omoyo omuya :
50001016	naba abande as'obwanchani , bakomanya ng'a nabekirwe erinde inyerende enchili .
50001017	Aba bakomorandia Kristo as'esugu gose tari as'omoyo omorabu , bakaga ng'a nkomentabare obororo bwane nogosibwa kwane ;
50001018	Inki rende ? korende ase chinchera chionsi , onye nas'obobe , ao gose nas'ekeene , Kristo akorandigwa ; nas'ayio nagokire , ee , ningoke .
50001019	Naki namanyire ng'a aya nang'onchokere koba ogokonyeka kwane , as'engecho y'ogosaba kwaino nekeegwa ki'Omoika o Yesu Kristo ,
50001020	koreng'ana nokoganya , nogosemeria kwane , ng'a tingosokigwa nagento gionsi , korende as'oboremu bwonsi , buna amatuko onsi , na bono naende Kristo nabakwe as'omobere one , kerabe as'obogima bwane , ao as'ogokwa kwane ;
50001021	naki asende inche koba moyo Kristo , nogokwa nokonyora .
50001022	Korende kerabe koba moyo as'omobere , â asende inche nokwama kw'emeremo yane , gaki erindigetie gochora timanyeti .
50001023	Namigirwe as'egati y'amang'ana abere , iga ndengereretie kogenda bwone imenye na Kristo ; naki mbuya kobua :
50001024	korende koba as'omobere nkorigirie mono as'engecho yaino .
50001025	Nainche kondasemerie aya , namanyire ng'a nimenye nagoikaransa amo nainwe , erinde mogenderere monyare kogoka as'okwegena ;
50001026	erinde ogwetogia kwaino konyare komenteka ase Kristo Yesu as'engecho yane , as'engecho y'okoba kwane amo nainwe imwensi naende .
50001027	Korende orogendo rwaino robe buna egwenerete enchili ya Kristo , erinde ngocha kobarora inwe , ao gose ntaiyo nyaigwe amang'ana aino , ng'a moteneine bokong'u as'omoika oyomo , as'omoyo oyomo mokorwanera okwegena gw'enchili ;
50001028	gose timoiroka ababisa baino , as'ing'ana rinde rionsi : as'abwo negekone kere maiso marore ki'ogosira , korende asemore inwe egekone ki'ogokonyeka kia Nyasaye .
50001029	Korende mwaeirwe as'engecho ya Kristo , tari okomwancha gwoka , korende nogochandwa as'engecho yaye .
50001030	Kamorabe nokoamererania koria koria mwarorire asende , mokoigwa ng'a ninde nakwo goika bono .
50002001	Gaki gakorabe okoremia konde gwonsi ase Kristo , gose ogokiria kw'omoyo konde gwonsi kw'obwanchani , gose okobwatana kw'Omoika , karabe amabera ande onsi namabebe ,
50002002	ichorerania omogoko one , erinde mobe nokorengereria okomo , abanyene obwanchani obomo , abanyene omoyo oyomo , nokorengereria okomo .
50002003	Timokora ing'ana rinde rionsi as'okoamererania nas'oboenenu , korende as'oboitongo , ker'omonto amobare oyomwabo ng'a nomuya komobua omonyene .
50002004	Ker'omonto tarigereria ebinto biaye omonyene , korende ker'omonto arigererie ebinto bi'abande .
50002005	Naki mobe nomoyo oyo ime yaino oyoreiige ime ase Kristo Yesu :
50002006	Ere omochakano igarenge omogwekano buna Nyasaye , nere tabarete gose ngento koba koreng'ana buna Nyasaye ,
50002007	korende agekora buna tari nobonene , akaimokia omogwekano bw'omosomba , akaba omogwekano bw'abana ba mwanyabanto ;
50002008	naende , ochia kororekana igare nekieni buna mwanyabanto , agakanyeka , akaba omoigweri goika amakweri , naro namakweri ay'omosalaba .
50002009	As'ayio naende Nyasaye akamoimokia mono , akamoa erieta riria ribuete ker'erieta ;
50002010	erinde as'erieta ria Yesu kera riru riringwe , eri'ebinto bi'igoro , nebinto bi'ense , nebire inse as'ense ,
50002011	ker'oromeme rwatore ng'a Yesu Kristo n'Omonene , as'obonene bwa Nyasaye Tata .
50002012	Gaki , abanchwa , buna mwaigwete amatuko onsi , tari ekero narenge aroro , korende bono kobua ekero inche ntaiyo , isaneria ogotoreka kwaino abanyene as'okwoboa nokoiguswa ;
50002013	naki Nyasaye ogokora ime yaino , okorigia kwaino nogokora kwaino , as'engecho y'omogoko oye omuya .
50002014	Yakore amang'ana onsi motari nokwemurungania nokoamererania ;
50002015	monyare koba abana ba Nyasaye , abatari nekemoa , gose okong'ainereria , gose motari nobobe gati y'ekegori ekere ekebe nekia bogeka , aroro as'egati yabwo mororekane koba buna emebaso as'ense ,
50002016	mobwatete ring'ana ri'obogima ; inyore engecho y'okwebaka ase rituko ria Kristo , ng'a tinaminyogete bosa , gose tinkoreti emeremo bosa .
50002017	Ee , kondaiterwe igoro y'ekeng'wanso nogokora gw'okwegena kwaino , nagokire ; naende nagokire amo nainwe imwensi .
50002018	Ninwe naboigo goka , naende goka amo nainche .
50002019	Korende nasemeirie as'Omonene Yesu komotoma Timotheo achiche bwango asemore , ndemigwe nainche kondamanye buna more .
50002020	Naki tindi nomonto onde ore nomoyo oyomo nainche , oranyare korigereria buna more ekeene .
50002021	Naki bonsi nebiabo bakorigia abanyene , tari ebia Yesu Kristo .
50002022	Korende ekerengo kiaye , ng'a koreng'ana omwana akomokorera ise , nabo ankorerete inche as'okorandia enchili .
50002023	Gaki , nasemeirie komotoma oyo ekero ndanyare komanya ayaranyare konyora .
50002024	Korende negenire as'Omonene ng'a inche ninchiche omonyene bwango .
50002025	Korende nkarora yangweneire gotoma Epafrodito , oyominto , omokori emeremo amo nainche , omorwani amo nainche ; naende nomotomwa oino nomokori bw'okorigia kwane .
50002026	Ekiagera abarengereretie inwe imwensi mono , naende agaichana mono , ekiagera mwaigwete ng'a igarenge omorwaire .
50002027	Naki arenge omorwaire ekeene , ang'e nogokwa : korende Nyasaye akamwabera , gose tari as'ere bweka , korende as'inche nabo , timba nogoichana igoro as'ogoichana .
50002028	Gaki nakorire omokia omonge komotoma naende , erinde , ekero moramorore , monyare kogoka , nainche ninkeanerigwe ogoichana kwane .
50002029	Moroisie gaki as'Omonene , as'omogoko bwonsi ; erinde mobare abanto bare buna oyo koba abanto bagosikwa .
50002030	Ekiagera as'engecho y'emeremo ya Kristo akaba ang'e as'ogokwa , tarenda obogima bwaye as'engecho y'ogoisaneria ayaremete as'ogokora kwaino asende .
50003001	Omoerio , abaminto , goka as'Omonene . Kobarikera inwe aria aria tanchandete inche , korende nokobagwenere inwe .
50003002	Mwerende nechisese , mwerende nabwo bagokora amabe , erende nabwo bakwenacha .
50003003	Naki intwe abwo twarogete , togosasima Nyasaye as'Omoika , nagwetogia ase Kristo Yesu . titosemereti omobere :
50003004	korende nonya inche kondasemerie omobere , omonto onde bwonsi karerore ng'a nare nengecho y'ogosemeria omobere , inche nkobua :
50003005	narogete rituko ria gatano nagatato , nomonto bw'egesaku ki'Abaisiraeli , bw'egesaku kia Benjamin , Omoibirania bw'Abaibirania ; as'amang'ana ogotunya amachiko , Omofarisai ;
50003006	as'amang'ana omonyene ogochanda ekanisa , as'engecho y'oboronge bokonyorekana as'amachiko , tinarenge nakomocha .
50003007	Korende amang'ana aria arenge kogwenera asende , nkayarora abaire bosa as'engecho ya Kristo .
50003008	Ee , nayabarire onsi , ng'a abaire bosa as'engecho y'obuya bo tari nekerengo gi'okomomanya Kristo Yesu , Omonene one ; korende as'engecho yaye nanyorire ogosira kw'ebinto bionsi , nakobibara ng'a biabaire buna esike , erinde imonyore Kristo ,
50003009	naende ndorekane asere , timba noboronge boria bokonyorekana as'amachiko , korende boria bokonyorekana as'okwegena kore ase Kristo , oboronge boria bokorua ase Nyasaye , as'okwegena :
50003010	imomanye ere , nokobua gw'okobokigwa kwaye , nobomo bw'ogochandwa kwaye , kondagwekanigwe nogokwa kwaye ;
50003011	erinde inyore as'enchera ende yonsi goikera okobokigwa kw'abakure .
50003012	Tari ng'a natiekire goika , gose natiekire koba omoikeranu : korende ngotunyande ndibwate riria erio as'engecho yaye nabwatirwe na Kristo Yesu .
50003013	Baminto , tinyekageti omonyene ng'a natiekire kobwata : korende ninkore egento ekemo gioka ; kweba ayare nyuma , ndambarie ayatang'aine ,
50003014	nakong'irie orogendo , ng'ikere eng'eria y'okorangerigwa okonene kwa Nyasaye ase Kristo Yesu .
50003015	Gaki intwe abwo tore abaikeranu torengererie ayio ; komorabe nokorengereria ayande onsi , Nyasaye nabaigorere erio narirorio .
50003016	Korende , agwo twaigete togende as'engecho eyio eyio .
50003017	Mobe abegi bane , abaminto , morigererie abwo bakogenda as'ogotunyana omogwekano oria oito twabaete .
50003018	Naki abange bakogenda , nabatebirie amang'ana abo botambe , nonya mbono nabatebirie as'amariga , ng'a nababisa b'omosalaba o Kristo ;
50003019	omoerio obo nogosareka , nyasaye obo nenda , obonene bwabo nas'obosoku bwabo , bakorengereria amang'ana ense .
50003020	Naki intwe , obomenyo bwaito igoro bore ; korwa agwo naende ntomoganyete omokonyi , Omonene Yesu Kristo :
50003021	oranyare koonchora omobere oito bw'obosoku , onyare kogwekana nomobere oye bw'obonene , as'okoreng'ana ogokora kwaye aranyare kobibeka ebinto bionsi inse asare .
50004001	Gaki , abaminto , abanchwa bane , abwo nabaroreire amaiga , omogoko one , negutwa yane , tenena bokong'u as'Omonene , abanchi bane .
50004002	Namosoroire Euodia , namosoroire na Suntoke babe nomoyo oyomo as'Omonene .
50004003	Ee , nagosoroire naye bo , omobwatani bw'ekeene , obakonye abakungu abwo , ekiagera bakorete emeremo y'enchili amo nainche , na Klementi nere , nabaria abande bakorete emeremo amo nainche , abwo amarieta abo are ime as'ebuku y'obogima .
50004004	Goka as'Omonene amatuko onsi : neria kabere natebire , Goka .
50004005	Obwororo bwaino bomanyekane as'abanto bonsi . Omonene ng'ang'e are .
50004006	Timwechandera ing'ana rinde rionsi ; korende ase kera ring'ana as'ogosasima nogosaba , amo nokoiraneria ng'a mbuya mono , okorigia kwaino komanyekane ase Nyasaye .
50004007	Nomorembe o Nyasaye obuete obong'aini bwonsi , norende chinkoro chiaino , nebirengererio biaino ase Kristo Yesu .
50004008	Omoerio , abaminto , onsi ayare ay'ekeene , onsi ayare ay'ogosika , onsi ayare ayaboronge , onsi ayare amachenu , onsi ayagwenerete , onsi ayagokuma buya ; kobore obuya bwonsi , gakorabe ogotogigwa okuya gwonsi , yarengererie aya .
50004009	Amang'ana mweorokereretie asende nakoyabwata , nakoyaigwa , nakoyarora asende , yakore aya : na Nyasaye bw'omorembe nabe amo nainwe .
50004010	Nagokire mono as'Omonene , ekiagera bono as'omoerio , mwabokirie ebirengererio biaino as'engecho yane ; buna mwarenge korengereria okoba kwane , korende timwanyora ribaga .
50004011	Tari ng'a nakwana aya , ekiagera inde nokoremerwa : naki neorokereirie , nimba as'engecho ere naki , goisanerwa nero .
50004012	Namanyire ogokeyigwa , naende namanyire okomenteka : as'engecho yonsi ? nas'amang'ana onsi , norokererigwe okoigota nakorora enchara , nokomenteka , nokoremerwa .
50004013	Ninyare gokora amang'ana onsi as'ere ombekire chinguru .
50004014	Korende mwakorete buya mono , mwabwatanete nainche as'emechando yane .
50004015	Nainwe mwensi , inwe abanyene mwamanyire , inwe Abafilipi , ng'a as'omochakano bw'enchili , ekero naruete Makedonia , ekanisa ende tiyarenge yabwatanete nainche as'amang'ana aya y'okorua nokonyora , tatiga inwe mweka .
50004016	Naki nonya nase Thesaloniki mwandeterete ogokonywa gw'okoremerwa kwane gose tari ara rimo rioka .
50004017	Tari ng'a ninkerengereretie keria ekeegwa ; nindengereretie okwama gokomenteka koba okonge , as'okobara kwaino .
50004018	Korende ninde nebinto bionsi nakobua ; naende naichoire mono , nanyorire as'okoboko kw'Epafrodito ebinto biaruete asemore , ogotioka kw'amanukato , esadaka yancheirwe , emogwenerete Nysasaye .
50004019	Na Nyasaye nabaichorerie ker'eke morigetie as'ekerengo ki'obonda bwaye , as'obonene ime ase Kristo Yesu .
50004020	Bono Nyasaye , Tata oito , abakwe kare nakare Amin .
50004021	Monkwanerie ker'omochenu ase Kristo Yesu . Abaminto bare amo nainche babakwanirie .
50004022	Abachenu bonsi babakwanirie , kobua abwo bare b'enyomba ya Kaisari .
50004023	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nemioyo yaino .
51001001	Paulo , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , na Timotheo oyominto ,
51001002	as'abaminto abachenu nabegeni abare ime ase Kolosai : Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe okorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
51001003	Twamoakeire ng'a mbuya mono Nyasaye , Ise Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , amatuko onsi twabasabeire ,
51001004	ekero twaigwete amang'ana aya okwegena kwaino ase Kristo Yesu , nobwanchani more nabwo as'abachenu bonsi ,
51001005	as'engecho y'ogosemeria mwagacheirwe emonga igoro , amang'ana aya mwayaigwete kare ase ring'ana ri'ekeene as'enchili ,
51001006	yaikire asemore buna ere as'ense yonsi , ekwama amatunda nagokina , buna yakinire asemore , korwa rituko mwaigwete nakoinyora mono obuya bwa Nyasaye as'ekeene ;
51001007	buna mworokereretigwe na Epafra omogisangio omwanchwa oito , ore omokori omwegeni ase Kristo as'engecho yaino ,
51001008	nere agatworokereria obwanchani bwaino as'Omoika .
51001009	Naki as'ayio naintwe korwa rituko twaigwete , titotigeti kobusabera , nogosaba asemore , moichorigwe chisemi chi'obwanchani bwaye as'obong'aini bwonsi , nokoinyora kw'omoyo ime ;
51001010	mogende buna abagwenerete as'Omonene , momogwenere kegima ; ase ker'emeremo emiya mokwama amatunda , momenteke ase chisemi chia Nyasaye ;
51001011	momentwe chinguru as'okobua gwonsi , as'okoreng'ana gwe chinguru chi'obonene bwaye , as'oboremereria bwonsi amo nomogoko ,
51001012	mokomoakera ng'a mbuya mono Tata , oyotogweneirie intwe tonyore ensemo y'omwando bw'abachenu as'omobaso ;
51001013	otokonyete korwa chinguru chi'omosunte , agatong'anyia nagotosoyia as'obonda bw'obwanchani bwaye ;
51001014	ekiagera asere ntore nokoborigwa as'amanyinga aye , okwabera kw'ebibe :
51001015	nere nomogwekano o Nyasaye otarikororekana , omotongi as'ebitongwa bionsi ;
51001016	naki asere ebinto bionsi bigatongwa , ebire igoro nebire igoro as'ense , ebikororekana , nebitarikororekana , nonya nebirogo bi'obonene , gose oboruoti , gose obonene gose okobua ; ebinto bionsi bigatongwa as'enchera yaye , nas'engecho yaye ;
51001017	nere igo arengeo ritang'ani ri'ebinto bionsi , nebinto bionsi bibwataine asare .
51001018	Nere nomotwe bw'omobere , engecho yaye ekanisa : nere nomochakano , omoiborwa bwe ritang'ani as'abakwete ; erio abe omotang'ani ase bionsi .
51001019	Naki ise agancha boria bwonsi oboikeranu boikaranse asare ;
51001020	nas'ere kobibwatania ebinto bionsi nere , gakorire omorembe as'amanyinga omosalaba oye ; nas'ere kobirabe ebinto hire igoro as'ense , gose ebire igoro .
51001021	Nainwe , igoniwareuge agwo ritang'ani , mwatananetwe nere , nababisa as'ebirengererio biaino , as'ogokora kwaino okobe , obasang'ananirie bono ,
51001022	as'omobere bw'euyama yaye as'ogokwa kwaye , erio abarente inwe as'obosio bwaye , abachenu , motari nokomocha gose kemoa :
51001023	komoraikaranse botambe as'okwegena , mwabaire igoro as'oboroso naende abakong'u , motaonchoiri nagotiga ogosemeria gw'enchili mwaigwete amang'ana aye , arandigwe as'ebitongwa bionsi bire inse as'erioba ; as'ayio inche Paulo ngakorwa omokori oye .
51001024	Bono nagokeire ogochandwa inde nakwo as'engecho yaino ; naende nayaikeranirie aria aremete as'ogochandwa gwa Kristo as'omobere one , as'engecho y'omobere oye , engecho yaye ekanisa yayej
51001025	as'ayio nabaire omokori oye , as'oborendi bwa Nyasaye , naetwe ensemo yaino , ng'ikeranie ring'ana ria Nyasaye ,
51001026	obobisi boria bwabisetwe korwa kare nakare , nakorwa ebigori bionsi : korende bono bwaigoreirwe as'abachenu baye .
51001027	Korende Nyasaye agancha koborokia engecho y'obotenenku bw'obonene bw'obobisi obo as'Ebisaku , nario Kristo ime yaino , ogosemeria kw'obonene :
51001028	ere twarandirie amang'ana aye , komokurera ker'omonto , nakomworokereria ker'omonto ase chisemi chionsi , tonyare komoreta ker'omonto omoikeranu ase Yesu Kristo ;
51001029	nainche ngokorande emeremo as'engecho eyio , nagokora omokia koreng'ana as'ogokora kwaye , ogokora emeremo asende ase chinguru .
51002001	Korende nindigetie momanye omokia one inde noro as'engecho yaino , nase baria ba Laodikia , nabaria batarandora obosio bwane as'omobere ;
51002002	erinde baremigwe chinkoro chiabo , kobarabwatanigwe as'obwanchani , banyore obotenenku bwonsi bw'okoinyora oboikeranu , banyare komanya kegima obobisi bwa Nyasaye , engecho yaye Kristo ,
51002003	ime asare nchireo chinibo chionsi chi'obong'aini nechisemi chibisekanete .
51002004	Nakwanire ring'ana eri , omonto tacha kobang'aina as'amang'ana ay'okoebereria .
51002005	Naki nimba tindi aroro as'omobere , igande amo nainwe as'omoika , kondagoke nakorora okorobera kwaino , noboremu bw'okwegena kwaino ase Kristo .
51002006	Gaki buna mwamonyorire Yesu Kristo Omonene , genda boigo asere ,
51002007	abanyene emeri , nokoagachwa asere , mwakorirwe abakong'u as'okwegena , buna niworokereretigwe , momenteke as'okoiraneria ng'a mbuya .
51002008	Rigereria monto onde tabaisa kobasiria as'obong'ainereria bwaye , nokong'aina kwa bosa , as'engecho y'ogotunyana chisemi chia mwanyabanto , as'engecho y'okworokereria gw'ense , korende tari as'engecho ya Kristo :
51002009	naki asere nao boikaransere oboikeranu bwonsi Obonyasaye as'engecho y'omobere .
51002010	Nainwe mwaichoirwe asere , oyore omotwe bw'obonene bwonsi nokobua :
51002011	asere mwarokigwe as'okwaroka ogotakoregeti as'amaboko , as'okorusia oria omobere bwe chinyama , as'okwaroka gwa Kristo ;
51002012	kamoratindekwe amo nere as'ebatiso , nas'okwo mwabokigwe amo nere , as'okwegena ogokora kwa Nyasaye oyomobogetie korwa as'amakweri .
51002013	Nainwe , konyora mwakure ekiagera as'okomocha kwaino nas'ogotaroka kw'emebere yaino , akabakora moyo amo nere , gatiekire gotwabera okomocha gwaito gwonsi ;
51002014	gatiekire gotinyia riria rirube riarigetwe as'amachiko , rigotosoera ; eriarenge nobobisa asetore : oritigeirie , tiriba gati yaito nere , akariakeraas'omosalaba ;
51002015	gatiekire kwerusia obonene nokobua , akabiorokia maiso marore , akagoka igoro ase biro bio as'omosalaba .
51002016	Gaki , monto tabagambia inwe as'endagera gose ebikonyugwa , gose as'engecho ye rituko rinene gose okooroka kw'omotienyi , gose esabato :
51002017	amang'ana ayio nekiriri as'amang'ana agocha gocha ; korende omobere noyo Kristo .
51002018	Monto onde tabaura ekeegwa kiaino as'okorigia kwaye , as'okweororobia as'ogosasima amalaika , nakwebeka as'amang'ana ayarorire , nakoenena bosa as'obong'aini bw'omobere oye ,
51002019	korende tabwateti Omotwe , ekiagera korwa as'oro , omobere bwonsi okonyora onsi nakobwatanigwa ase chinengo nemeki , gokina as'ogokina koruete ase Nyasaye .
51002020	Gaki onye mwakure amo na Kristo mogatiga okworokereria gw'ense , naseki mokoba inse as'ekina , buna nabamenyete as'ense ,
51002021	timobwata , timoigwa , timokuna .
51002022	( Amang'ana ayio onsi igagosareka ekero ki'ogokorerwa ) , komokobwata amachiko nokworokereria kwa mwanyabanto ?
51002023	Amang'ana ayio arorekanire buna nare nechisemi , nase chingecho cht'ogosaba , nobokanyeku , mwekoreire inwe mweka , nas'okogambera omobere as'obotindi ; korende takogwenera gento as'okorengereria kw'omobere .
51003001	Gaki onye mwabokire amo na Kristo , rigia ayare igoro aase Kristo aikaransete , as'okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye .
51003002	Rigia ayare igoro , tari ayare as'ense .
51003003	Ekiagera mwakwete , nobogima bwaino bwabisirwe amo na Kristo ase Nyasaye .
51003004	Kristo karache kororekana oyore obogima bwaito , erio nainwe namororekane amo nere as'obonene bwaye .
51003005	Gaki biite ebimo biaino bire as'ense ; obotomani , eubi , okorengereria okobe , okogania okobe , nokorengereria , nakwo ogosasima esanamu ;
51003006	as'engecho y'ayio endamwamu ya Nyasaye yabaikeire abana b'ogosaria .
51003007	As'ayio nainwe igo mware gotara kare , iga mwabete as'aya .
51003008	Korende bono yabeke are aya onsi ; okobea , endamwamu , nobobe , nokorama , nogokwana okobe gokorua as'emenwa yaino :
51003009	timotebania oborimo ; ekiagera mwamorusirie omonto okare , amo nogokora kwaye ,
51003010	mwamobekire omonto omoyia , okorirwe omoyia anyore chisemi as'omogwekano oye ere oyomotongete .
51003011	Agwo tari Omoyunani gose Omoyahudi , okwarokigwa gose ogotarokigwa , oyotamunyeti gento , gose Omosikuthi , omosomba , gose omobiare ; korende Kristo nas'onsi , nase bonsi .
51003012	Gaki ekiagera more abachore ba Nyasaye , abachenu banchire , beka omoyo bw'amabera , obuya , oboitongo , obwororo , oboremereria ;
51003013	mobogoreranie , nakwaberana , omonto karabe nering'ana igoro as'omonto onde ; buna Kristo ababerete inwe , naboigo nainwe kora boigo .
51003014	Igoro as'aya onsi beka obwanchani , nabwo egesibo ki'oboikeranu .
51003015	Nomorembe o Nyasaye ogambe ase chinkoro chiaino , noro mwarangererigwe as'omobere oyomo ; mobe abanto bakoiraneria ng'a mbuya mono .
51003016	Ring'ana ria Kristo rikaranse as'obonge ime yaino ase chisemi chionsi , mworokereranie nagokanania as'esaburi nogotera , nogotera kw'omoyo , as'obuya mokomoterera Omonene ase chinkoro chiaino ime .
51003017	Na kera erimogokora , ase ring'ana gose ogokora , kora onsi as'erieta ri'Omonene Yesu , mokoiraneria ng'a mbuya Nyasaye Tata asere .
51003018	Inwe abakungu , igwera abasacha baino , buna egwenerete as'Omonene .
51003019	Nainwe abasacha , ancha abakungu baino , timoba nobororo asebare .
51003020	Nainwe abana moigwere abaibori as'amang'ana onsi ; naki ring'ana eri ndigwenerete as'Omonene ,
51003021	Nainwe abatata , timochegia abana baino , tibabaisa gokwa emioyo .
51003022	Nainwe abasomba mobaigwera abwo bare as'omobere ng'a nabanene baino ; as'amang'ana onsi , tari obosomba bw'amaiso buna abakwegwenia ase mwanyabanto , korende as'obuya bw'enkoro , mokomosika Nyasaye ,
51003023	Rinde rionsi mogokora , rikore as'omoyo , buna as'Omonene , gose tari ase mwanyabanto ;
51003024	komoramanye ng'a namonyore as'Omonene eng'eria y'omwando ; ekiagera mokomokorera Omonene Kristo .
51003025	Naki oyorakore bobe , igo aranyore naende obobe bwaye akorire : korende gwanchereria tikoiyo .
51004001	Ninwe abanene bae abasomba baino ekere kia boronge , mokomanya ng'a nainwe more n'Omonene igoro .
51004002	Kora mono as'ogosaba , komokorenda as'ogosaba nakoiraneria ng'a mbuya ;
51004003	nogotosabera naintwe twensi , Nyasaye atoigorere egesieri ase ring'ana riaye , tokwane obobisi bwa Kristo , naki as'engecho yaye nasibirwe ,
51004004	erio ng'orokie , buna ingwenerete gokwana ,
51004005	Genda as'obong'aini as'obosio bw'abwo abare isiko , mogokorera ekero .
51004006	Amang'ana aino abe nobuya amatuko onsi , ansere buna omonyo monyare komanya buna chagwenerete koiraneria ker'omonto .
51004007	Tukiko , oyominto omwanchwa , omosomba omwegeni , omosomba omogisangio one as'Omonene , naborokie amang'ana ane onsi ;
51004008	ere namotomire asemore , as'engecho eyio eyio , momanye amang'ana aito , abaremie chinkoro chiaino ;
51004009	amo na Onesimo , oyominto omwegeni , omwanchwa , ore omonto oino . Nababorokie amang'ana onsi ayare aiga .
51004010	Aristariko , osibetwe amo nainche obakwanirie , na Marko , omoigwa o Baranaba , oyio mwanyorire amachiko as'amang'ana aye ; karaikeasemore moroisie .
51004011	Na Yesu , okorokwa Yusto ; abwo nabanto barogete : abwo boka nabakori emeremo amo nainche as'engecho y'obonda bwa Nyasaye ; nabarabwo igo barenge kondemia .
