51004012	Epafra , ore omonto o seino , omosomba o Yesu Kristo , obakwanirie , okorire omokia amatuko onsi as'engecho yaino as'ogosaba kwaye , erinde motenene abaikeranu abamanyete mono as'obwanchani bwonsi bwa Nyasaye .
51004013	Naki nabaire kirori ng'a nare nomokia omonge as'engecho yaino , nas'engecho y'abwo bare ase Laodikia , nas'engecho yabwo bare Hieropoli .
51004014	Luka , oria omorwaria omwanchwa , obakwanirie , na Dema .
51004015	Bakwanie abaminto bare ase Laodikia , na Numfa , nekanisa ere as'enyomba yaye .
51004016	Rirube eri karirasomwe asemore , tiga risomwe naende as'ekanisa ya Laodikia ; nariria ria Laodikia risomwe nainwe .
51004017	Motebie Arikippo , arigererie mono obosomba boria kwaetwe as'Omonene , erio aboikeranie .
51004018	Ogokwania kwane inche Paulo , as'okoboko kwane inche bweka . Inyora ebisibo biane . Obuya bobe amo nainwe .
52001001	Paulo , na Silivano , na Timotheo , as'ekanisa y'Abathesaloniki , ase Nyasaye Tata , n'Omonene Yesu Kristo : Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe .
52001002	Twamobakire Nyasaye amatuko onsi as'engecho yaino mwensi , igo tokobatora as'ogosaba gwaito ;
52001003	gose titori gotiga koinyora emeremo yaino nokwegena , nogwechanda kwaino as'obwanchani , noboremereria bwaino as'ogosemeria kore as'Omonene Yesu Kristo , as'obosio bwa Nyasaye Tata oito .
52001004	Gatoramanye , abaminto mwanchire na Nyasaye , obochore bwaino .
52001005	Ekiagera enchili yaito tebaikereti as'amang'ana oka , korende nase chinguru , nas'Omoika Omochenu , nas'ogoichora okonge ; buna mwamanyire chingecho chiaito chiarenge asemore , as'engecho yaino .
52001006	Mokaba abatunyani baito , nab'Omonene , mokanyora ring'ana as'ogochandwa okonge , amo nomogoko bw'Omoika Omochenu ;
52001007	goika mokaba omogwekano bw'abanto bonsi abanchete ase Makedonia , nas'Akaya .
52001008	Naki korwa asemore ring'ana ria Nyasaye riaigurwe , tari ase Makedonia na Akaya oka ; korende ker'aas'onsi okwegena kwaino more nakwo ase Nyasaye kwarandire , goika titorigeti gokwana ande onsi .
52001009	Naki barabwo boka baorokirie amang'ana aito , buna engecho yarenge ogosoa gwaito asemore ; na buna mwamoonchokerete Nyasaye , mwachitigete chisanamu , erinde mokorere Nyasaye ore moyo , bw'ekeene ,
52001010	nakomoganya Omwana oye korwa igoro , oyio abogetie korwa as'amakweri , Yesu , otokonyire nendamwamu eranyare gocha .
52002001	Korende inwe mweka , baminto , mwakomanyire ogosoa gwaito asemore , ng'a tikwabete bosa :
52002002	korende gatwatiekire gochandwa ritang'ani nagokorwa bobe , buna mwamanyire , ase Filipi , tokaba noboremu ase Nyasaye oito koyekwana enchili ya Nyasaye asemore , as'okoyeamereraneria mono .
52002003	Naki ogokurera gwaito tikori as'ogosira gose as'eubi , gose as'obong'ainereria :
52002004	korende buna twancheirwe na Nyasaye , koba abarendi b'enchili , nabo togokwana ; tari buna abakogwenera mwanyabanto , korende ase Nyasaye oyogotorenga chinkoro chiaito .
52002005	Naki titwarenge kero kende gionsi namang'ana ayakobagwenera abanto , buna mwamanyire , gose amang'ana akobisa okorengereria , Nyasaye nkirori ;
52002006	titorikorigia ogotogigwa nabanto , gose nainwe , gose nabande , igotwarenge twanyarire kobaritoera buna abatomwa ba Kristo .
52002007	Korende igo twarenge abororo gati asemore , buna omoreri akorenda abana baye omonyene :
52002008	naboigo igo naintwe tobarengereretie as'obwanchani obonge , tokarora omogoko kobaa , tari enchili ya Nyasaye yoka , korende nemioyo yaito yonsi , ekiagera mwabaire abanchi baito .
52002009	Naki , baminto mwainyoire emeremo yaito emekong'u nogokora gwaito : ekiagera omobaso nobotuko togakora emeremo titocha komorarereria monto oino , tokabaranderia enchili ya Nyasaye .
52002010	Nainwe mbirori , na Nyasaye boigo , buna twaikaransire asemore nainwe mwanchire , as'obochenu , nas'oboronge , botari komocha :
52002011	naboigo buna mwamanyire engecho twamokanetie ker'oyomo oino buna ise akobakania abana baye , tokababeka omoyo nagokwana ,
52002012	erio mogende buna ebagwenerete ase Nyasaye , obarangeirie mosoe as'obonda bwaye nobonene bwaye .
52002013	Korende as'ayio intwe naintwe twamoiranerie Nyasaye ng'a mbuya totari gotiga , ekiagera ekero mwanyorete riria ring'ana ri'obotomwa bwa Nyasaye mwaigwete asetore , mokaribwata tari buna ring'ana ria mwanyabanto ; korende buna ring'ana ria Nyasaye ; naboigo rire ekeene ekeene , rigokora emeremo ime asemore inwe abwo mwanchire .
52002014	Naki inwe , baminto , mwarenge abatunyani be chikanisa chia Nyasaye chire ase Boyahudi ase Yesu Kristo ; naki mwanyorete emechando eria eria as'abanto b'egesaku kiaino , banyorete nabwo as'Abayahudi ;
52002015	abamoitete Omonene Yesu nababani babo boka abanyene , bagatoseria intwe , korende tibagwenera Nyasaye , naende tibabwataini nabanto bande ;
52002016	bagatotanga titokwana nebisaku binde binyore ogokonywa ; erio baikeranie ebibe biabo amatuko onsi ; korende endamwamu yabaikeire goika omoerio .
52002017	Korende intwe , baminto gotoratananekane nainwe as'egeka , as'obosio , tari as'enkoro , tokarengereria kobua kobarora amasio aino , namaiga amange :
52002018	as'ayio tokarigia gocha asemore naende , ee , ninche Paulo , erie ritang'ani , neria kabere . Saitani agatotanga .
52002019	Naki ogosemeria gwaito , gose okogoka gwaito ninki ? Gose egutwa y'ogwetogia ninki ? Tari inwe , as'obosio bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ekero ki'ogocha kwaye ?
52002020	Naki inwe nobonene bwaito , nomogoko oito .
52003001	Naboigo as'ayio , ekiagera titwanyarete koremereria kobua , tokarora buya totigwe Athene intwe tweka ;
52003002	tokamotoma Timotheo oyominto , omosomba o Nyasaye , omokori emeremo amo naintwe as'enchili ya Kristo , kobakora inwe abakong'u , nakobaremia inwe as'engecho y'okwegena kwaino ;
52003003	erinde omonto onde taichanigwa nogochandwa oko ; naki inwe mweka mwamanyire ng'a ntogacheire aya .
52003004	Naki ekero twarenge amo nainwe , togatang'ana kobatebia ng'a natonyore ogochandwa , buna abete , nainwe mwamanyire .
52003005	As'ayio inche nainche ekero narenge tinanyarete koremereria naende , ngatoma omonto erinde imanye okwegena kwaino , tacha oria omotemi kobatema , gose emeremo yaito teba eya bosa
52003006	Korende Timotheo ekero atocherete amatuko aya korwa asemore , agatoretera amang'ana amaya ay'okwegena kwaino nobwanchani bwaino , buna ng'a iga mogotoinyora buya amatuko onsi , morengereretie gotorora intwe , koreng'ana buna intwe nainwe ;
52003007	as'engecho eyio tokaremigwa baminto , as'amang'ana aino , as'emechando nogochandwa gwaito gwonsi , as'okwegena kwaino .
52003008	Naki bono tore moyo , kerabe inwe moteneine bokong'u as'Omonene .
52003009	Naki okoiraneria ki toranyare komoa Nyasaye as'engecho yaino , as'omogoko oria bwonsi twagokeire , as'engecho yaino as'obosio bwa Nyasaye oito .
52003010	Obotuko nomobaso togasaba as'omokia , erinde tonyare kobarora obosio bwaino , nakorosia ekiaremire as'okwegena kwaino .
52003011	Naboigo Nyasaye omonyene , Tata oito , Nomonene oito Yesu Kristo atotang'ane enchera yaito toike seino ;
52003012	Omonene abatang'ane nakobamenta nakobaichoria as'ogwanchana , inwe as'inwe , nas'abanto bonsi , buna intwe tore nainwe ;
52003013	anyare gokong'ia chinkoro chiaino chibe chitari nekemoa as'obochenu as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , Tata oito , ekero ki'ogocha kwaye Omonene oito Yesu amo nabachenu baye bonsi .
52004001	Eriatigaire , baminto , twabasoroire , nakoborokereria as'Omonene Yesu , buna mwanyorete asetore , engecho ebagwenerete kogenda nakomogwenera Nyasaye , buna mokogenda , monyare komenteka mono mono .
52004002	Naki mwamanyire amachiko ki twabaire korwa as'Omonene Yesu .
52004003	Naki obo nabwo obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , ogosibigwa kwaino , mwerusananie nobotomani ;
52004004	ker'oyomo oino amanye koyobua omobere oye , as'obonene nogosika ,
52004005	tari as'okorengereria kw'omobere , buna Ebisaku ebitamomanyeti Nyasaye ;
52004006	erinde omonto tasaria , nakomomochera oyomwabo ase ring'ana eri : ekiagera Omonene nere okorusia egesiomba as'aya onsi , buna twabatebirie nakoborokereria mono ritang'ani .
52004007	Naki Nyasaye tatorangereretie as'eubi , korende tobe as'ogosibigwa .
52004008	Gaki ere bwangire , tangeti omwana o mwanyabanto , korende Nyasaye , okobaa Omoika oye Omochenu .
52004009	As'amang'ana obwanchani , timori nokorigia mbarikere : naki inwe mweka mworokererigwe na Nyasaye gwanchana ;
52004010	naki mwakorire ring'ana eri as'abamino bonsi bare ase Makedonia . Korende twabasoroire , baminto , momenteke mono ;
52004011	naende mobe ang'e kweorokereria gokira , nagokora emeremo yaino , nagokora emeremo as'amaboko aino abanyene , buna twabachigete ;
52004012	erinde mogende as'amasikani obosio bw'abwo bare isiko , timoba nokorigia konde .
52004013	Korende , baminto , titorigeti ng'a timoinanya amang'ana abo abwo bararire ; mobaise goichana buna abande , batari nogosemeria .
52004014	Naki onye twanchire Yesu okwete naende akaboka , naboigo nabwo bararire ase Yesu Nyasaye nabarete amo nere .
52004015	Naki twabatebirie aya ase ring'ana ri'Omonene , ng'a intwe abwo tore moyo , twatigaire goika ekero ki'ogocha kwaye Omonene , titokobatang'anera abwo batiekire korara .
52004016	Naki Omonene omonyene , naike korwa igoro neriogi rinene , negeturi kie rilaika rinene , negetureri kia Nyasaye : nabwo bakwete ase Kristo nababoke ritang'ani :
52004017	erio nyuma ntwe abwo tore moyo , twatigaire , natobogorigwe amo nabarabwo as'amare , komorotota Omonene as'omoika gati : erio natobe amo n'Omonene kare nakare .
52004018	Naboigo , remania as'amang'ana aya .
52005001	Korende , as'amang'ana ay'ebiro nechingaki baminto , timori nokorigia mbarikere .
52005002	Naki mwamanyire inwe mweka ng'a ase rituko ri'Omonene igorirache buna omoibi agocha botuko .
52005003	Ekiagera ekero bagoteba , Omorembe nobuya , erio ogosareka gokobachera as'omobosokano bwango , buna obororo bokomochera oyore morito , nabwo tibagokonywa .
52005004	Korende inwe , baminto , timori as'omosunte , obotuko boria bobanyore buna omoibi .
52005005	Naki inwe mwensi nabana b'smasase , nabana b'omobaso : intwe titori ab'obotuko , gose ab'omosunte ;
52005006	nabo titorara buna abande , korende torende , nakoba nokwerita .
52005007	Naki abwo bakorara ba ara botuko . nabwo bagotinda batinda botuko .
52005008	Korende intwe abatore ab'omobaso , tobe nokwerita , tweboyie chikuba okwegena nobwanchani : negutwa yaito ebe ogosemeria kw'ogotoreka .
52005009	Naki Nyasaye tatobegeti as'endamwamu yaye , korende tonyore ogotoreka , as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ,
52005010	oyokwete as'engecho yaito , erio tomenye amo nere , kerabe twarendire gose kerabe twararire .
52005011	Naboigo remania nakoagachana , ker'omonto noyomwabo , nabo buna mogokora .
52005012	Korende , baminto , ntorigetie momanye baria bagokora emeremo as'engecho yaino , nabare igoro asemore as'Omonene , nakobakonya ;
52005013	mobasike mono as'obwanchani , as'engecho y'emeremo yabo . Mobe nomorembe inwe as'inwe .
52005014	Twaba oroire , baminto bakonye abwo bataikaranseti buya , babeke chinguru bare nemioyo ekwete , babogorie abareu , remereria nabanto bonsi .
52005015	Rigereria monto onde bwonsi tamoa oyomwabo obobe as'obobe ; korende amatuko onsi bwatia ayare amaya , inwe as'inwe , nas'abanto bonsi .
52005016	Goka amatuko onsi ;
52005017	saba motari gotiga ;
52005018	iraneria ng'a mbuya ase kera ring'ana naki obo nabwo obwanchani bwa Nyasaye asemore ase Kristo Yesu .
52005019	Timorimia Omoika ;
52005020	timochayaobobani ;
52005021	temabionsi , bwataekereekiya ;
52005022	erusananie nobobe bore kera chingecho .
52005023	Nyasaye bw'omorembe omonyene abasibie kegima ; nainwe emioyo yaino nechinkoro chiaino nemebere yaino erosigwe kegima , etari nakemoa , ekero ki'ogocha kwaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
52005024	Ere nomwegeni obarangeirie , nere nakore .
52005025	Baminto tosabere .
52005026	Obakwanie abaminto as'okonyunyunta ogochenu .
52005027	Nabachikire as'Omonene , basomerwe abaminto bonsi rirube eri .
52005028	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe .
53001001	Paulo , Silivano , na Timotheo , as'ekanisa ya Abathesaloniki ere ase Nyasaye Tata oito , n'Omonene Yesu Kristo ;
53001002	Obuya bobe asemore nokwegena gokorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito , n'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
53001003	Netogwenerete koiraneria ng'a mbuya ase Nyasaye amatuko onsi as'engecho yaino , baminto , buna egwenerete , naki okwegena kwaino kwamentekanire mono , nobwanchani bwa ker'omonto oino as'abamwabo bwabaire obonge .
53001004	Nonya naintwe abanyene twetogirie ase chikanisa chia Nyasaye as'engecho y'oboremereria bwaino , nokwegena more nakwo as'okorosigwa kwaino gwonsi nogochandwa mwaremereirie ;
53001005	ekio nekiorokererio gi'ekina ki'oboronge kia Nyasaye ; erio mogwenere gosoa obonda bwa Nyasaye , ekiagera as'engecho yaye mwachandirwe ,
53001006	Ekiagera mboronge ase Nyasaye kobaakana emechando baria bakobachanda inwe ,
53001007	nakobaakana inwe mogochandwa omogoko amo naintwe ekero ki'okoorokigwa kwaye Omonene Yesu korwa igoro amo namalaika ay'okobua kwaye ,
53001008	as'omorero ogwoka , kobaakana endamwamu barabwo abatamomanyeti Nyasaye , nabwo abataigwereti enchili y'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo :
53001009	abaranyare gochandwa as'ogosareka gwa kare nakare , korwa obosio bw'Omonene nakorua obonene bwe chinguru chiaye ,
53001010	ekero agocha erinde abakwe as'abachenu baye , nagokumigwa ase bonsi abanchete ( ekiagera oborori bwaito bwancheirwe asemore ) ase rituko riria .
53001011	As'ayio twabasabeire inwe amatuko onsi , erio Nyasaye oito ababare ng'a mwagweneire okorangerigwa kwaino , aikeranie ker'okorigia okuya na ker'emeremo y'okwegena , ase chinguru :
53001012	erinde erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu ribakwe asemore , nainwe ime asare , as'obuya bwa Nyasaye oito nobw'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
53002001	Gaki twabasoroire , baminto , as'amang'ana ay'ogocha kwaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , nogosangererekana gwaito obosio bwaye ;
53002002	timotengechigwa bwango nagotiga ebirengererio biaino , gose timoichanigwa , as'omoyo gose ase ring'ana , gose ase rirube rigokagwa ng'a neriaito , ng'a rituko ri'Omonene riabaire ;
53002003	monto onde bwonsi tabang'aina as'enchera ende yonsi : naki tirigocha gotaracha ritang'ani koria ogwatananeka , aorokigwe oria omonto bw'ebibe , omwana bw'ogosira ,
53002004	oria okorwana nakweimokereria igoro omonyene igoro ase ker'egekorokwa Nyasaye gose egegosasimwa ; goika ere omonyene igaikaransete ase hekalu ya Nyasaye , buna Nyasaye , okweorokia omonyene ng'a nere Nyasaye .
53002005	Timorikoinyora ng'a ekero narenge amo nainwe nabatebetie ayio ?
53002006	Na bono erimotangete mwarimanyire , anyare koorokigwa oyo ekero kiaye .
53002007	Naki boria obobisi bw'ogosaria iga bono bwakorire emeremo : koionde nare oyotangete bono , goika arusigwe .
53002008	Erio agwo naorokigwe oria omosaria , oyio Omonene Yesu namoite as'omoika bw'omonwa oye , nakomosiria as'okoorokigwa kwaye kagocha ;
53002009	ere , ogocha kwaye nkore as'omogwekano bw'ogokora emeremo yaye Saitani , as'okobua gwonsi nebikone bi'ogokumia kw'oborimo ,
53002010	nas'okong'aina gwonsi as'obobe bwabo abagosira ; ekiagera tibagianchete ekeene , banyare gotorigwa .
53002011	As'ayio Nyasaye nabaretere chinguru chi'ogosira , babwanche oborimo :
53002012	bagambigwe bonsi abatancheti ekeene , korende abarenge kwegokia as'obobe .
53002013	Korende netogwenerete intwe komoiraneria Nyasaye ng'a mbuya mono amatuko onsi as'engecho yaino , baminto , mwanchetwe n'Omonene , naki Nyasaye obachorire korwa omochakano monyore ogotoreka as'ogosibigwa kw'Omoika nagwancha ekeene :
53002014	ekiabarangereretie inwe as'enchili yaito , as'okonyora obonene bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
53002015	Nabo , baminto , tenena bokong'u , mobwate chingecho mworokereretigwe , onye nas'amang'ana gose ase rirube riaito .
53002016	N'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo omonyene , na Nyasaye Tata oito otwanchete agatoa okoremia gwa kare nakare nogosemeria okuya , as'obuya ,
53002017	abaremie chinkoro chiaino , nagochikora chinkong'u ase kera ring'ana nogokora okuya .
53003001	Omoerio , baminto , tosabere , ring'ana ri'Omonene rirande , ribakwe boigo buna rire asemore ;
53003002	tokonywe nabanto abatari boronge , nababe ; ekiagera tai bonsi bare nokwegena .
53003003	Korende Omonene noyo bw'ekeene , oranyare kobakora mobe abakong'u , nakobakonya noria omobe .
53003004	Naintwe , twamosemeirie Omonene as'amang'ana aino , erinde ng'a mwayakorire ayatwabachigete , naende namoyakore .
53003005	Omonene abatang'ane emioyo yaino monyore obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , noboremereria bwa Kristo .
53003006	Twabachikire , baminto , as'erieta ri'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , erusananie abanyene na ker'oyomino otari kogenda boronge , oyotabwateti chingecho borokereretigwe asetore .
53003007	Naki mwamanyire abanyene buna ebagwenerete gotobwatia : naki titogendeti bobe asemore ;
53003008	gose titorieti endagera y'omonto onde bwonsi bosa , korende nas'enieremo nogokora , omobaso nobotuko , togakora emeremo , erio titomorarereria omonto oino :
53003009	tari ng'a titori nokobua , korende twekorire abanyene tobe ekiorokererio asemore , erinde mototunyane .
53003010	Ekiagera nonya nekero keria twarenge amo nainwe tokabachika ring'ana eri , Ng'a onye omonto tarigeti gokora emeremo , abe takoria ndagera .
53003011	Naki twaigure ng'a mbare abanto asemore batakogenda buya , aba tari gokora emeremo nonya ng'ake , korende igo bakorengereria ayabanto bande .
53003012	Nabo twabachikire abwo nakobakonya as'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , bakore emeremo as'ogokira , nakoria endagera yabo abanyene .
53003013	Korende , inwe , baminto . timorosa gokora amaya .
53003014	Karabe omonto onde bwonsi otabwateti ring'ana riaito ase rirube eri , erusananie nomonto oyio , gose timokwana nere , anyare gosoka .
53003015	Korende timomobara ng'a nomobisa , korende mokonye buna oyomino .
53003016	Bono , Omonene bw'omorembe omonyene , abae omorembe amatuko onsi ase chinchera chionsi . Omonene abe amo nainwe mwensi .
53003017	Ogokwania kwane inche Paulo , as'okoboko kwane inche omonyene , eke nakio ekemanyererio ase kera rirube : naboigo nkorika ,
53003018	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe mwensi .
54001001	Paulo , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'amachiko a Nyasaye Omokonyi oito , na Yesu Kristo ogosemeria gwaito ;
54001002	ase Timotheo , omwana one bori as'okwegena : Obuya , namabera , nomorembe , bikorua ase Nyasaye Tata , nase Yesu Kristo Omonene oito .
54001003	Buna narigetie oikaranse Efeso , ekero narenge kogenda Makedonia , erinde obachike abande tiborokereria okworokereria konde ,
54001004	gose timoigwa emegano ya kare gose koborania amang'ana ase chisokoro atari nomoerio , akoreta okoboria , gose tari oborendi bwa Nyasaye bore as'okwegena ; gaki bono nagochikire boigo .
54001005	Korende ogoikerana kw'amachiko nobwanchani bokorua as'enkoro endabu nebirengererio ebiya , nokwegena gotari nokong'ainereria :
54001006	abande bakomocha ayio basirire , bakoonchokera amang'ana aya bosa ;
54001007	banchete koba aborokia b'amachiko , ko tibamanyeti ayabagokwana gose amang'ana aria bagoteba nechinguru .
54001008	Korende twamanyire ng'a amachiko namaya , omonto karakorere as'enchera y'amachiko ;
54001009	naye omanye ring'ana eri , ng'a amachiko tabekiri as'omonto oboronge , korende as'abakomocha nabatari nokoigwera , nabanto abatamomanyeti Nyasaye , nabakori ebibe , nabatari abachenu , nabatasigeti Nyasaye , nabaiti abaise babo , nabaiti abang'ina babo , nabaiti ,
54001010	nabatomani , nabagwesaria abasacha as'abasacha , nabakoiba abanto , nabanyaborimo , nabakoria eira y'oborimo , na korirabe ring'ana rinde rionsi ritabwataini nokworokereria kw'obogima ;
54001011	koreng'ana buna enchili y'obonene bwa Nyasaye akobakerwa , yabegetwe as'okorendwa kwane .
54001012	Nainche namobakire Kristo Yesu Omonene oito oyombegete chinguru ekiagera nandoche ng'a noyo bw'ekeene , akambeka as'obosomba bwaye ;
54001013	inche narenge ritang'ani omorami , oyokorosia abanto , omonyene obotindi : korende nkaberwa ekiagera nakorete bo as'oboriri nas'ogotaba nokwegena .
54001014	Nobuya bw'Omonene oito bokamenteka mono amo nokwegena nogwancha kore ase Kristo Yesu .
54001015	Nering'ana ri'ekeene , rigwenerete gwancherwa nabanto bonsi , ng'a Kristo Yesu nachete ense abakonye abanyene ebibe ; nainche noyo bwe ritang'ani asebare .
54001016	Korende as'engecho eye nkaberwa , erinde as'inche , buna oyo bwe ritang'ani , Yesu Kristo aorokie oboremereria bwonsi , imbe omogwekano ase baria baranyare komwancha nyuma banyore obogima bwa kare nakare .
54001017	As'Omoruoti o kare nakare , otakonyara korora ogosareka , otakororekana , Nyasaye bwe chisemi ere bweka , asare ere ogosika nobonene kare nakare . Amin .
54001018	Ogochika oko nakoeire kobe emonga , omwana one Timotheo , as'engecho y'amang'ana obobani ayatang'aine igoro asore , erinde as'ayio orwane esegi engiya ;
54001019	obe omonyene okwegena nokorengereria okuya ; abande bachisereria are echio , bagasaria engecho y'okwegena .
54001020	As'abwo mbareo Humenayo na Iskanderi , abwo nabaire Saitani , erinde borokererigwe tibarama Nyasaye .
54002001	Gaki ritang'ani as'amang'ana onsi , ogosorora , nogosaba , nokoboria Nyasaye , nokoiraneria ng'a mbuya mono , akoreke as'engecho yaino .
54002002	As'engecho y'abaruoti , na bonsi abare nobonene , erinde tonyare koba as'obogima bw'oboitongo nomorembe as'okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye nogosika .
54002003	Naki eri nerigiya , naende ndiancheire as'Omokonyi oito Nyasaye ;
54002004	origetie abanto bonsi bakonywe banyare komanya mono ayare ay'ekeene .
54002005	Naki Nyasaye noyomo , nomobwatania egati ya Nyasaye namwanyabanto noyomo , ere oyore Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , Kristo Yesu ,
54002006	bweruete omonyene koba omokonyi as'engecho ya bonsi , oranyare gwatorwa as'ekero kiaye ;
54002007	as'engecho y'ayio nkabekwa imbe omorandia nomotomwa ( natebire ekeene , tintebeti oborimo ) , omworokia bw'Ebisaku as'okwegena nekeene .
54002008	Gaki nindigetie abasacha basabe aas'onsi , bakoimokia amaboko amachenu , atari nendamwamu nakoamererania .
54002009	Naboigo abakungu beboyie chianga chi'ogosika amo nogosika okuya , nobong'aini boisanete ; tari as'okomina etukia , gose as'ethahabu neruru , gose ase chianga chie rigori rinene ;
54002010	korende ( buna ebagwenerete abakungu bakoorokia chingecho chia Nyasaye ) as'ogokora okuya .
54002011	Omokungu tiga eorokererie as'ogokira nokoigwera ker'engecho .
54002012	Ting'eti omokungu ribaga kworokia , gose komogambera omosacha , korende abe as'ogokira .
54002013	Naki Adamu nere otongetwe ritang'ani , na Hawa nyuma .
54002014	N'Adamu tang'ainetwe , korende omokungu akang'ainwa agasoa as'okomocha .
54002015	Korende nakonywe , ase roria oroiboro , kabarakore as'okwegena nobwanchani nobochenu amo nobong'aini boisanete .
54003001	Ring'ana eri neri'ekeene , Omonto karigetie emeremo y'oboaskofu , ( omotang'ani ) orengereirie emeremo emiya .
54003002	Gaki nagwenerete omoaskofu koba omonto otari kwomanigwa , omonto ore nomokungu oyomo , omweriti , nakwerenga ne chisemi , omonyene chingecho chigwenerete , omoroisia abageni , omworokereria ;
54003003	tari omonto onarete edivai , tari omoaki , tari omonto bwanchete chifetha ; korende abe omwororo , taba omonto okoamererania ;
54003004	ab'omonto otenenetie enyomba yaye buya , omanyete kobakania abana baye amo nobong'aini boisanete ;
54003005	( omonto otamanyeti gotenenera enyomba yaye buya omonyene , naki ararende ekanisa ya Nyasaye ? )
54003006	tari omonto omoyia , tabaisa gocha koenena , agwe as'ekina kia saitani .
54003007	Nagwenerete gwatorwa ng'a nomuya nabanto bare isiko , tabaisa kogwa as'obobe nobeto ya saitani .
54003008	Naboigo nabadikoni , babe abanto b'obokanyeku , tari abare nemenwa ebere , tari abanto bakonywa edivai enyinge , babe abanto batakorengereria chifetha chi'obosoku ;
54003009	babwate obobisi bw'okwegena as'ebirengererio ebiya .
54003010	Naba bonsi batemwe ritang'ani ; nyuma bakorere obodikoni kobatiekire kororekana batari nabibe .
54003011	Naboigo abakungu babe abanto b'obokanyeku , tari abang'achi , abanto aberiti , ab'ekeene as'amang'ana onsi .
54003012	Abadikoni babe nomokungu oyomo , nakobatenenera abana babo buya nechinyomba chiabo .
54003013	Naki abagokora emeremo y'obodikoni buya , benyoreire obonene obuya , noboremu obonge as'okwegena kore ase Kristo Yesu ,
54003014	Nakorikeire aya , nindengereretie gocha asore bwango .
54003015	Korende kondatebane onyare komanya mono buna ebagwenerete abanto kogenda as'enyomba ya Nyasaye , ere ekanisa ya Nyasaye ore moyo , esiro noboroso bw'ekeene .
54003016	Naende nering'ana ritari nokoamererania nobobisi bw'okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye ; Ere oorogetigwe as'omobere , akabarerwa oboronge as'omoika , akarorekana namalaika , akarandigwa as'ebisaku , akegenwa as'ense , akabogorigwa igoro as'obonene .
54004001	Omoika okwanire maiso marore , ng'a ekero ki'omoerio abanto ng'abeatanane nokwegena , bakoigwera emeika y'okong'ainereria , nokworokereria kw'ebirecha .
54004002	As'okong'ainereria kw'abanto bagokwana oborimo , basambwa ebirengererio biabo nekioma ki'omorero ;
54004003	babakania abanto tibanyuoma , nakobachika beatanane nendagera eye Nyasaye atongete enyorwe as'okobaka as'abwo bare nokwegena nabare bamanyete mono ekeene .
54004004	Naki ker'egetongwa kia Nyasaye nekiya , gose tikeri gekwangwa , onye kianyorirwe as'okobakwa :
54004005	naki giasibigwe ase ring'ana ria Nyasaye nogosaba .
54004006	Korabainyorie abaminto ayio , nobe omokori omuya o Yesu Kristo , nomonarigwa amang'ana okwegena , nokworokereria okuya koria gwatunyanete :
54004007	korende emegano ey'okorama ney'abang'ina , oyiange . Naria omoyo oo as'okogenderera koba nechingecho chia Nyasaye :
54004008	naki koba ang'e konyora chinguru chi'omobere nkogwenerete ake ; korende okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye nkogwenerete as'amang'ana onsi , naki nkore neira y'obogima bwa bono nakoria korache koba .
54004009	Ring'ana eri neri'ekeene , ndigwenerete gwancherwa na bonsi .
54004010	Naki twerosirie na koba ang'e ase ring'ana eri , ekiagera tomosemeretie Nyasaye ore moyo , ore omokonyi bw'abanto bonsi , kobua as'abwo banchire .
54004011	Obachike abanto ayio nakoborokereria bo .
54004012	Omonto tachaya obosae bwao ; korende obe omogwekano as'abwo banchire , as'ogokwana , nas'orogendo , nas'obwanchani , nas'okwegena , nas'obochenu .
54004013	Goika nchiche kora omokia as'ogosoma , nas'okorandia , nas'okworokereria .
54004014	Totiga gokorera keria ekeegwa kere ime asore , kwaetwe aye as'obobani , nas'okobekerwa amaboko ay'abagaka .
54004015	Oyarengereria ayio ; bwerue kegima as'ayio ; okogenderera kwao kobe okuya as'abanto bonsi .
54004016	Erende omoyo oo , nokworokereria kwao . Kora ayio botambe ; riaki as'ogokora iga nabwekonye omonyene , nabwo bakoigwa asore .
54005001	Totogonyera omogaka , korende omosorore buna isoo ; nabake bao buna abamino :
54005002	abakungu abang'ina buna abanyoko ; abakungu abasubati buna abamino , as'obochenu bwonsi .
54005003	Basike ababoraka abare ababoraka b'ekeene .
54005004	Korende omoboraka karabe nabana gose abachokoro , beorokererie ritang'ani babe nobuya as'enyomba yabo abanyene , nakobaakana abaibori babo : naki ring'ana eri nerigiya , ndigwenerete as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
54005005	Korende ere oyore omoboraka ekeene ekeene , nagotigwa bweka , nasemeretie ase Nyasaye , igakoba as'ogosaba nogosorora obotuko nomobaso .
54005006	Ere oyokwerigeria omogoko , okure nonya ore moyo ,
54005007	Obachike aya , erinde babe tibari nekemoa .
54005008	Korende omonto otarendeti abare abaye , ko kobua ab'enyomba yaye , okanire okwegena , naende nomobe kobua oyotancheti .
54005009	Omoboraka onde bwonsi tarikwa , onye emiaka yaye etaraika emerongo etano nomo , nere oyorenge omokungu bw'omosacha oyomo ,
54005010	nagwatorwa as'ogokora okuya ; onye okinirie abana , onye obaroisirie abageni , onye obasibirie abachenu amagoro , onye obakonyire abagochandwa , onye obwatete ker'ogokora okuya ,
54005011	Korende ababoraka abare abake bwange kobarika : naki ekero baranyore okorengereria gotabwataini na Kristo , nabarigie konyuomwa ;
54005012	nabwo mbare nekina ekiagera batigire okwegena kwabo kwe ritang'ani .
54005013	Amo nayio beorokereirie koba aboro , bagoetanana enyomba as'enyomba ; gose tari aboro boka , korende abatoratoria , bakwerosia namang'ana ay'abande , bagokwana amang'ana atabagwenereti .
54005014	Gaki nanchire ababoraka batari abang'ina banyuomwe , baibore abana , barende amang'ana a nyomba , libaa omobisa ribaga ri'okorama :
54005015	naki abande batiekire koonchoka nagotunyana saitani .
54005016	Omosacha gose omokungu bwanchete , karabe nababoraka bamwabo , abakonye , ekanisa terarerigwa ; erinde ebakonye baria bare ababoraka ekeene .
54005017	Abagaka abagambi mbuya baegwe ogosika ara kabere , korende kobua abwo bare nemeremo ye ring'ana nakworokia .
54005018	Naki amariko atebire , Tobaisa kobeka eng'ombe ekeokio ekero egotindacha engano as'okoora , naende , Omokori emeremo nagwenerete eng'eria yaye .
54005019	Tibwancha ogosoerwa as'omogaka tatiga as'emenwa y'aburori babere gose batato .
54005020	Baria bagokora ebibe bakanie as'obosio bw'abanto bonsi , erinde abande bairoke .
54005021	Nagochikire as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , nase Kristo Yesu , nas'amalaika amachorwa , oyabwate ayio otari nokorega , tokora ring'ana rinde rionsi as'ogwanchereria .
54005022	Tobekera omonto amaboko bwango , gose tobwatana nebibe bi'abanto bande : bwerende omoyo oo obe omochenu ,
54005023	Korwa bono tonywa amache oka , korende onywa edivai enke , as'engecho y'enda yao namarwaire akonyorire ebika ebinge .
54005024	Ebibe bi'abanto bande iga bire maiso marore , biatang'anire kogenda ekina , abanto bande ebibe biabo iga bikobatunya .
54005025	Naboigo ogokora okuya iga kore maiso marore , nakoria gotari maiso marore tigokonyara kobiswa .
54006001	Bonsi bare inse as'ebisibo as'obosomba , babare abanene babo ng'a mbagwenerete ogosikwa gwonsi , erieta ria Nyasaye tiriramwa gose okworokereria gwaito .
54006002	Na baria bare nabanene banchete , tibabachaya ekiagera nabamwabo ; korende mbuya babakorere , ekiagera abwo babwataine eria emeremo emiya babaire abanyene okwegena nogwanchwa . Oborokie amang'ana aya nakoyakwana .
54006003	Omonto karorokie okworokereria konde okoao , nere tancheti amang'ana ayagwenerete ay'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , gose okworokia kobwataine nechingecho chia Nyasaye ;
54006004	oenenire , nere tainyoreti ring'ana rinde rionsi , korende engecho yaye buna ney'omonto omorwaire , as'amang'ana okoboria nokoamererania namang'ana , naki as'ayio boreta okogecha , neriomana , nokorama , nokorengereria okobe ,
54006005	nokoamererania kw'abanto basarigwe obong'aini bwabo abamochete ekeene , bakaga ng'a okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye nenchera y'okonyora ; eatanane nabanto buna abwo :
54006006	korende okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye amo nomogoko bw'omoyo , nokonyora okonene .
54006007	Naki titocheti nagento as'ense , naende titokonyara koimoka nagento ;
54006008	korende gatorabe nendagera nechianga natoisanere nebinto ebio .
54006009	Abarigeti koba abanda igabakogwa as'ogotemwa nobeto nokorengereria gotari nangecho , echi'ogosaria , chikorimeria mwanyabanto as'ogosira nogosareka .
54006010	Naki ritina ri'obobe bwonsi nogwancha chishilingi : naki abande kobakorengereria ayio iga bagwatananekana nokwegena , nakwebeta emebere yabo as'obororo obonge .
54006011	Korende aye , omonto o Nyasaye , tama ayio ; otunyane oboronge , nechingecho chia Nyasaye , okwegena , obwanchani , oboremereria , obwororo .
54006012	Rwana esegi ere engiya y'okwegena , bwata obogima bwa kare nakare , kwarangereretigwe , kwaorogetie okoorokia okuya as'obosio bw'abarori abange .
54006013	Nagochikire , as'bbosio bwa Nyasaye oyokobia ebinto bionsi obogima , nase Kristo Yesu , oorogetie okoorokia okuya ase Pontio Pilato ,
54006014	renda ogochika oko gotari nakemoa , gotari nokomocha , goika okooroka kwaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo :
54006015	naki as'ekero kiaye omonyene naorokie , ere oyosesenetigwe , nomonyene okobua gwonsi , Omoruoti bw'abaruoti , Omonene bw'abanene ;
54006016	ere bweka otari konyorekana namakweri , oikaransete as'omobaso otanyare goikwa ang'e ; gose tari onde mwanyabanto omoroche , gose oranyare komorora : asare ere abe nogosika nokobua gwa kare nakare . Amin .
54006017	Obachike abwo bare abanda as'ense eye tibaenena , gose gosemeria obonda bogosira , korende Nyasaye ore moyo ogotoa ebinto bionsi as'obonge , tobikorere as'omogoko ;
54006018	bakore amaya , babe abanda as'ogokora okuya , babe ang'e korua enibo yabo , babwatane nabande as'omoyo ;
54006019	bebekere emonga ebe oboroso obuya as'ekero kegocha erinde banyore obogima bwa kare nakare .
54006020	Timotheo renda ayabekirwe asore , bweatanane namang'ana atari ay'edini , atari nengecho , nokoamereria obong'aini bokorokwa obong'aini bw'oborimo ;
54006021	abande bagwatora ayio bamochire okwegena . Obuya bobe amo naye .
55001001	Paulo , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'ogwancha kwa Nyasaye , as'eira y'obogima bore ase Yesu Kristo :
55001002	ase Timotheo omwana one omwanchwa : Obuya , namabera , nomorembe , bikorua ase Nyasaye Tata nase Kristo Yesu Omonene oito .
55001003	Namoiranerie Nyasaye ng'a mbuya , nare gosasima korwa abagaka bane ba kare as'okorengereria ogochenu , buna ngokoinyora aye botambe as'ogosaba kwane , mobaso na botuko ,
55001004	nindengerereti mono gokorora , nkoinyora amariga ao , erinde ng'ichore omogoko ;
55001005	gonkoinyora okwegena ore nakorokwo gotari nokong'ainereria , kwarenge ritang'ani ase nyogokoro oo Loisi , na nyoko Eunike ; nainche nanchire ng'a naye nobwate .
55001006	As'engecho eyio nakoinyoirie , igereria ekeegwa kia Nyasaye kere ime asore as'okobekerwa amaboko ane .
55001007	Naki Nyasaye tatoeti omoika bw'okoiroka ; korende oyo bwe chinguru , noyo bw'obwanchani nomoyo bw'okwerenga nobong'aini .
55001008	Gaki tosokera oborori bw'Omonene oito , gose inche omosibwa oye : korende oremererie emechando amo nenchili koreng'ana nechinguru chia Nyasaye ;
55001009	oyotokonyete , agatorangeria as'okorangerigwa ogochenu , tari koreng'ana nogokora gwaito , korende koreng'ana nokorigia kwaye omonyene nobuya bwaye , twaetwe intwe ase Kristo Yesu ritang'ani as'ekero gia kare ,
55001010	na bono bwaorokigwe as'okomanorwa kwaye Omokonyi oito Yesu Kristo , oonchoreretie amakweri , nakoorokia obogima nagotasareka maiso marore , as'enchera y'enchili ,
55001011	oyonkorete omorandia , nomotomwa , nomworokia bw'Ebisaku .
55001012	As'engecho eyio nanyorire emechando eye : korende tingosoka , naki namomanyire ere oyonyegenete , nagwancha ng'a nanyare gokerenda keria nabegete asare goika amatuko aria .
55001013	Bwata ekiorokererio ki'amang'ana obogima ayakwaigwete asende , as'okwegena nobwanchani bore ase Kristo Yesu .
55001014	Renda keria ekiya kiabegetwe asore , okerende as'Omoika Omochenu oikaransete ime asetore .
55001015	Kwamanyire eri , ng'a bonsi bare ase Asia bantigire ; nas'abwo Figello na Hermogene .
55001016	Omonene abae amabera abare b'enyomba y'Onesiforo ; naki ebiro ebinge agantimokia , gose tasokereti ekenyuri kiane ;
55001017	korende ekero arenge ase Rumi , akandigia nomokia , akanyora .
55001018	( Omonene namoe anyore amabera , as'Omonene rituko riria ) na buna are gonkorera as'ebinto ebinge as'Efeso , aye kwamanyire mono .
55002001	Gaki aye , omwana one , obe nechinguru as'obuya bore ime ase Kristo Yesu .
55002002	Naria kwaigwete asende as'abarori abange , oyabeka ayio as'abanto abegeni , abagwenerete koborokia abande boigo .
55002003	Bwatana nemechando amo nainche , buna omorwani omuya o Yesu Kristo .
55002004	Tari omorwani esegi orebeke ase chingecho chi'obogima obo , erinde amogwenere ere oyomorigete abe omorwani .
55002005	Gose omonto karaamereranie as'okoamererania , takoegwa egutwa ataamereraneti boronge .
55002006	Nemogwenerete omoremi oyobwechandeire emeremo , abe oyo bwe ritang'ani koria amatunda .
55002007	Yamanye mono ayio ngoteba ; naki Omonene nakoe obong'aini as'amang'ana onsi .
55002008	Moinyore Yesu Kristo , oyobogete korwa as'abakure , bw'oroiboro rwa Daudi , koreng'ana buna enchili yane :
55002009	as'eyio ngachandwa goika ngasibwa , buna omokori amabe , korende ring'ana ria Nyasaye tirigosibwa .
55002010	As'engecho y'eyio naremereirie onsi , as'engecho y'abachorwa , erinde barabwo banyore ogotoreka kore ase Kristo Yesu amo nobonene bwa kare nakare .
55002011	Ring'ana eri nering'ana ri'ekeene : Naki onye togokwa amo nere natobe moyo amo nere intwensi :
55002012	onye tokoremereria , natogambe amo nere : onye tokomokana ere , nere natokane intwe :
55002013	onye titwegeneti , ere igakoba oyo bw'ekeene ; takonyara gwekana omonyene .
55002014	Obainyorie ayio , gokobakania as'Omonene , tibaba nokoamererania kw'amang'ana atagwenereti , korende basaria abakoigwa .
55002015	Kora omokia kweorokia ng'a gwancheirwe na Nyasaye , omokori emeremo otagosokigwa , ogokorera boronge ring'ana ria Nyasaye .
55002016	Eatanane namang'ana atari nengecho , amo nogochaya nokorama Nyasaye :
55002017	naki rikoria buna rikwege ri'esiri , as'abwo Humenayo na Fileto ;
55002018	abamochete ekeene bakobora ng'a okobokigwa gwatiekire koba , nabwo baonchora okwegena kw'abanto bande .
55002019	Korende oboroso bwa Nyasaye bore nechinguru mboteneine , abare nekemanyererio eke , Omonene obamanyire abare abaye : naende , ker'oyogwatora erieta ri'Omonene tiga atige obobe .
55002020	Gaki as'enyomba tibiri ebinto bie chithahabu nechifetha chioka , korende nebio omote , nebia amaroba ; ebinde mbire nogosika , ebinde tibiri nogosika .
55002021	Gaki karabe omonto ogwesibia as'ogweatanana naba , nabe egento gekonyora ogosikwa , giasibigwe , kemogwenerete Omonene , kiarosigwe ase ker'emeremo ere emiya .
55002022	Korende tama okorengereria kw'obosae , tunyana oboronge , nokwegena , nobwanchani , nomorembe , amo nabwo bakomorangeria Omonene as'enkoro enchenu .
55002023	Korende kwange okoboria kw'obokayayu , gotari nobong'aini , gokwamanyire ng'a igakorarete eriomana .
55002024	Naende tai buya omosomba bw'Omonene koba omonyariomana , korende koba omwororo as'abanto bonsi , oranyare kworokia , omoremereria ,
55002025	abakanye as'obwororo abwo bakoamererania nere , erinde gose keranyarekane , Nyasaye abae okoonchoka nobong'aini bw'ekeene ,
55002026	banyare komanya nagosoka korwa as'obeto ya saitani , basakorwe nomosomba bw'Omonene , koyakora ayanchete Nyasaye .
55003001	Korende omanye ring'ana eri , ng'a amatuko ay'omoerio nakebe ekero ki'emechando .
55003002	Naki abanto nababe abanvene gweancha emebere yabo , abanchete chifetha , abagwetogia , abakoenena , abarami , abatakoigwera abaibori babo , abatari koiraneria ng'a mbuya , abatari abachenu ,
55003003	abatari nobwanchani bogwenerete , abatarigetie kobwatana , abagenkani , abatari gwetanga , abatindi , abatancheti amaya ,
55003004	abasigani , abatagokanigwa , abaenenu , abanchete kwegokia kobua komwancha Nyasaye ;
55003005	abare nomogwekano bw'okoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye , korende bakana chinguru chiaye ; bweatanane nabwo .
55003006	Naki as'aba mbare baria bagwesoyia ase chinyomba chi'abanto , nagosakora abakungu abariri bare nechigurube chi'ebibe , abairetwe nokorengereria gwe chingecho chinyinge ,
55003007	bakweorokereria amatuko onsi , tibanyara kegima goikera obong'aini bw'ekeene .
55003008	Naboigo buna Yanne na Yambare barwanete na Musa , naboigo naba bakorwana nekeene ; nabanto basarekire obong'aini bwabo , bangirwe as'amang'ana okwegena .
55003009	Korende tibakogenderera mono : naki obokayayu bwabo nabobe maiso marore as'abanto bonsi buna nabwo barenge .
55003010	Korende ave kwabwatire okworokia kwane , norogendo rwane , nokorigia kwane , nokwegena , nobwororo , nobwanchani , noboremereria ,
55003011	nokorosigwa kwane nemechando yanyorete ase Antiokia , ase Ikonio , na Lustra ; kera chingecho chi'okorosigwa echi naremereretie : nere Omonene agankonya as'onsi .
55003012	Ee , nabonsi banchete koba moyo ase chingecho chingiya ase Kristo Yesu nabachandwe .
55003013	Korende abanto ababe abang'ainereria nabamentekane kobua as'obobe , bakong'aina na kong'aineka .
55003014	Korende aye kabe as'aria kworokereretigwe nagoikeranigwa , ekiagera kwamanyire ning'o kweorokereretie asare ;
55003015	naki korwa obwana kwayamanyire amariko amachenu , ayaranyare gokong'ainiyia goika onyore ogotoreka as'okwegena kore ase Kristo Yesu .
55003016	Kera ririko , rire nomoika o Nyasaye , ndigwenerete as'okworokia , nas'okobakonya abanto okomocha kwabo , nas'okobatang'ana , as'okobankonya as'enchera y'oboronge :
55003017	erinde omonto o Nyasaye abe oisanerete , oisanerigwe erinde akore ker'ogokora okuya .
55004001	Nagochikire as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , n'Omonene Yesu Kristo , oranyare kobagambia abare moyo nabakure , as'okooroka kwaye nas'obonda bwaye ;
55004002	randia ring'ana , kora omokia , ekero kegwenerete nekero getagwenereti : kania , nakwomania , okonya as'oboremereria bwonsi nokworokereria .
55004003	Naki nageche ekero baranyare kwanga okworokereria kw'obogima ; korende as'ogotunyana okorengereria kw'emebere yabo boka ng'abenyorere aborokia abange mono , ekiagera mbare namato ekiagaso .
55004004	Nabwo nabeatanane nokoigwa ayare ay'ekeene , nabaonchokere emegano y'oborimo .
55004005	Korende aye obe nekerengo as'onsi , remereria emechando , kora emeremo y'omorandia , ikerania ogokora kw'obosomba bwao .
55004006	Naki inche bono naiteirwe , nerituko ri'ogosiborwa kwane riaikire .
55004007	Narwanire esegi ere engiya , narokorire orogendo , nakorendire okwegena :
55004008	nyuma as'aya nagacheirwe egutwa y'oboronge , eyio Omonene omogambi bw'oboronge arang'e ase rituko riria : gose tainche bweka , korende abanto bonsi abanchete okooroka kwaye .
55004009	Kora omokia gocha asende bwango :
55004010	naki Dema ontigire , otiekire koyiancha ens'eye ya bono , akagenda Thesaloniki ; Kreske ase Galatia , Tito ase Dalamatia .
55004011	Luka bweka ore aiga amo nainche . Bogoria Mariko , omorete amo naye ; naki ongweneire as'emeremo y'ogonkorera .
55004012	Korende Tukiko namotomire Efeso .
55004013	Eanga namotigerete Karipo ase Teroa , korache retana , nebio ebitabu , kobua biria bi'amasankwa .
55004014	Iskander omoturi chitai agankorera amabe amange : Omonene namoakane koreng'ana nogokora kwaye .
55004015	Naye erende noyo , naki nagechete mono amang'ana aito .
55004016	As'okoiraneria kwane kwe ritang'ani tari monto oteneine amo nainche , korende bonsi bagantiga : tibabarerwa ebibe ase ring'ana eri .
55004017	Korende Omonene agatenena amo nainche akambeka chinguru , erinde as'emeremo yane boria obotomwa borandigwe as'ogoikerana , Ebisaku bionsi bigwe : ngakonywa as'omonwa bw'esibwori .
55004018	N'Omonene nankonye ase ker'ogokora okobe , nagonkonya goika boche obonda bwaye bwa kare nakare . Amin .
55004019	Nkwaneria Priska , na Akula , nenyomba ya Onesiforo .
55004020	Erasto akamenya Korintho : korende Trofimo nkamotiga Mileto omorwaire .
55004021	Kora omokia gocha ritang'ani ri'ekero ki'obokendu . Eubulo ogokwanirie , na Pudente , na Lino , na Klaudia , nabaminto bonsi .
55004022	Omonene Yesu Kristo abe amo nomoyo oo . Obuya bobe nainwe .
56001001	Paulo , omosomba o Nyasaye , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'ekerengo gi'okwegena kw'abachorwa ba Nyasaye , nobong'aini bw'ekeene bokoreta chingecho chia Nyasaye .
56001002	As'ogosemeria kw'obogima bwa kare nakare , naki Nyasaye takonyara gokwana oborimo , ariete eira ritang'ani as'ekero gia kare ;
56001003	akamanora ring'ana riaye as'ekero kiaye as'amang'ana aria , nancheretwe inche as'ogochika kw'Omokonyi oito , Nyasaye .
56001004	Ase Tito , omwana one as'okwegena tobwateranete : Obuya nomorembe bikorua ase Nyasaye Tata nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo , Omokonyi oito .
56001005	As'engecho eye nkagotiga Krete , erinde oyarosie ayatigarete , nakobeka abagaka ase ker'omochie , buna nagochigete ;
56001006	onye omonto okororekana tari nebimoa , nere nomosacha bw'omokungu oyomo , ore nabana banchete , batagosoerwa ng'a nabakayayu nabatakoigwera .
56001007	Naki nemogwenerete omoaskofu ( omotang'ani ) abe omonto okororekana atari nekemoa , ekiagera nomorendi o Nyasaye ; taba omonto oyokwegwenera omonyene , taba omwango bw'okobea , taba omonari edivai , taba omoaki , taba omwanchi enibo y'obosoku ;
56001008	korende abe omoroisia , omwanchi amaya , ore nobong'aini boisanete , omonyene oboronge , omochenu , oyokwerita omobere oye ;
56001009	obwatete ring'ana ri'okwegena buna orokereretigwe , anyare kobakonya abanto as'okworokereria kw'obogima , na kobabua abakorwana nere .
56001010	Naki mbare abange abatari nokoigwera , abare namang'ana atari nengecho , abang'ainereria , korende kobua baria barogete ,
56001011	naki mbagwenerete basiekwe emenwa yabo ; abwo nkoonchorabare chinyomba chingima , bakworokereria ayatabagwenereti , as'engecho y'enibo y'obosoku .
56001012	Omonto obo oyomo , omobani obo abanyene , otebire , Abakrete nabanyaborimo amatuko onsi , ching'iti chi'orosana chimbe , abaribobe batagokora emeremo .
56001013	Ogokwana oko nogwe ekeene . As'engecho eyio bakanie bokong'u banyore obogima as'okwegena ,
56001014	tibategerera emegano y'Abayahudi , namachiko a mwanyabanto beatananire nekeene .
56001015	Ebinto bionsi nebichenu as'abwo bare abachenu : korende tikeri ekere egechenu as'abwo bare neubi , abatancheti ; korende obongo bwabo nebirengererio biabo bionsi biabaire neubi .
56001016	Batora ng'a mbamomanyete Nyasaye , korende as'ogokora kwabo bamokana ; nabare nobobe , abatari nokoigwera , ase ker'ogokora okuya tibagwenereti .
56002001	Korende aye kwana amang'ana agwenerete okworokereria kw'obogima ,
56002002	ng'a abagaka babe abanyene okwerita emebere yabo , abare nogosika , abare nobong'aini boisanete , abagima as'okwegena , nas'obwanchani , nas'oboremereria .
56002003	Nabakungu abagotu naboigo babe norogendo rw'obochenu , tibaba abang'achi , tibaba abakonywa edivai enyinge , korende abakworokia ayare amaya ;
56002004	erinde bakworokereria abakungu abasubati banche abasacha babo , nagwancha abana babo ,
56002005	nakoba abare nobong'aini boisanete , nakoba abaya , abanyene ogokora emeremo chinyomba chiabo ime , abororo , koigwera abasacha babo abanyene , erinde ring'ana ria Nyasaye tiriramwa .
56002006	Nabamura naboigo obakanie koba nobong'aini boisanete .
56002007	As'amang'ana onsi bweorokie koba ekiorokererio ki'ogokora okuya , as'okworokereria kwao gokoborokia ayatasaregeti , nobokanyeku ,
56002008	namang'ana are nobogima atanyare kogambigwa , erinde oria okorwana naye asoke , ekiagera tari nering'ana ribe ri'ogokwana igoro asetore .
56002009	Abasomba babaigwere abanene babo , babagwenere as'amang'ana onsi ; tibaba abakoiraneria ;
56002010	tibaba abaibi , korende baorokie obwegeni nobuya bwonsi , erinde bakweboyie okworokereria kw'Omokonyi oito as'amang'ana onsi .
56002011	Naki obuya bwa Nyasaye bogokonya mwanyabanto bonsi bwarorekanire ;
56002012	bogotworokia kwanga obobe nokorengereria gw'ense , nakoba moyo as'obong'aini boisanete , noboronge , nakoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye , as'ense eye ya bono ;
56002013	gatorigereretie ogosemeria gosesenirie , nokoorokia kw'obonene bwa Nyasaye omonene Omokonyi oito Yesu Kristo ;
56002014	oyobweruete omonyene as'engecho yaito , erinde atoborie nogosaria gwonsi , nagwesiberia abanto babe abanyorwa baye , abare nomokia as'ogokora okuya .
56002015	Kwana amang'ana ayio , naende orokereria nagokania as'okobua gwonsi . Omonto onde bwonsi tagochaya .
56003001	Bainyorie bakanyeke as'abagambi , nabare nokobua , nakoba nokoigwera , babe ang'e ase ker'emeremo emiya ,
56003002	tibakwana bobe as'omonto onde bwonsi , tibaba abanyariomana , babe abororo , bakoorokia obwororo bwonsi as'abanto bonsi .
56003003	Naki intwe agwo kare iga twarenge titori nobong'aini , abasaria , twang'ainetwe , gokorera okorengereria gwe chingecho chinyinge chi'okwegokia , tokogenda as'omoyo bw'okogechana , nemoko , abanyene okobea , tokobeana .
56003004	Korende ekero obuya bw'Omokonyi oito Nyasaye nobwanchani bwaye ase mwanyabanto bwarorekanete ,
56003005	agatokonya , tari as'ogokora kw'oboronge twakorete , korende as'amabera aye , as'ogosibigwa gw'okoiborwa gwa kabere , nagokorwa omoyia as'Omoika Omochenu ,
56003006	oyio atoitererete obonge as'enchera ya Yesu Kristo Omokonyi oito ;
56003007	erinde , gotwabarirwe abanyene oboronge as'obuya bwaye , tonyare gokorwa abanyori omwando bw'obogima bwa kare nakare , buna kore ogosemeria gwaito .
56003008	Ring'ana eri neri'ekeene , namang'ana ayio nindigetie oyakwane nechinguru , erinde baria bwamwanchete Nyasaye bainyore kogenderera as'ogokora okuya . Aya namaya , naende nagwenerete ase mwanyabanto .
56003009	Korende okoboria kwa bosa , namang'ana e chisokoro , neriomana , nokoamererania kw'amachiko ; weatanane naro , ekiagera tagwenereti , naende mbosa are .
56003010	Omonto omobe ekero kwamokanitie ritang'ani , neria kabere , mwange ;
56003011	gokwamanyire ng'a omonto buna oyo oonchokeire are , naende okorire ebibe , bwenacheire ekina omonyene .
56003012	Kondamotome Artema asore gose Tukiko , kora omokia gocha asende goika Nikopoli : naki aria narengereretie komenya ekero ki'obokendu .
56003013	Zena omomanyi amachiko , na Apollo obatome as'omokia , tibaremerwa kende gionsi .
56003014	Abanto baito tiga beorokererie kogenderera nogokora okuya as'ogokora kogwenerete , erinde tibaba tibari kwama .
56003015	Abanto bonsi bare amo nainche bagokwanirie . Tokwanerie baria batwanchete as'okwegena . Obuya bobe amo nainwe mwensi .
57001001	Paulo , omosibwa o Kristo Yesu , na Timotheo ore oyominto , ase Filemon omwanchwa oito , omokori emeremo amo nainche ,
57001002	nas'Appia , oyominto , nas'Arikippo omorwani omogisangio oito , nas'ekanisa ere as'enyomba yao :
57001003	Obuya bobe nainwe nomorembe bikorua ase Nyasaye Tata oito , nas'Omonene Yesu Kristo .
57001004	Namobakire Nyasaye one , amatuko onsi ngokoinyora as'ogosaba kwane ,
57001005	nkoigwa amang'ana obwanchani bwao , nokwegena ore nakwo as'Omonene Yesu as'abachenu bonsi ;
57001006	erinde okobwatana gw'okwegena kwao okore emeremo yaye as'obong'aini bwa ker'egento ekiya kere asemore ase Kristo Yesu .
57001007	Naki narenge nomogoko omonge nokoremia as'engecho y'obwanchani bwao , ekiagera chinkoro chi'abachenu chiatimokigwe naye , oyominto .
57001008	As'ayio , nimba noboremu bwonsi ase Kristo kogochika erikogwoierete ,
57001009	korende , as'engecho y'obwanchani nagosoroire , ekiagera buna nde Paulo omogaka , na bono omosibwa o Yesu Kristo .
57001010	Nagosoroire as'engecho y'omwana one naiborete as'egesibo kiane , Onesimo ,
57001011	ere kare takogwenerete , korende bono okogweneire mono , aye nainche :
57001012	namotomire asore as'omobere oye omonyene , engecho yaye , nenkoro yana :
57001013	naki inche namorigetie abe nainche , anyare gonkorera ribaga riao as'ebisibo bi'enchili ;
57001014	korende tinarigetie gokorabo otatiga as'amang'ana ao , erinde obuya bwao tiboba buna obw'okobetereria , korende as'ogwancha kwao .
57001015	Naki ande , nakio kiagerete agatananwa naye as'ekero , erinde obe nere naende kare nakare ;
57001016	korwa bono tari buna omosomba , korende kobua as'omosomba , oyominto omwanchwa , asende inche mono , nasore aye kobua mono , as'omobere nas'Omonene .
57001017	Gaki korambare inche nomobwatani naye , mwanche oyo buna inche .
57001018	Na onye okomocheire , gose okorire esira egento , okerike asende .
57001019	Inche Paulo narikire as'okoboko kwane omonyene , ning'akane . Tingotebeti ng'a nore nesira nainche , nonya nomobere oo .
57001020	Ee , oyominto , nyore omogoko asore as'Omonene ; ontimokie enkoro yane ase Kristo .
57001021	Kondegene okoigwera kwao nakorikeire , namanyire ng'a nokore kobua as'ayio ngokwana .
57001022	Namo nayio ombekere ang'e aase nkomenya ; naki nasemeiri as'ogosaba kwaino , namwancherwe konyora .
57001023	Epafara osibetwe amo nainche ase Kristo Yesu , ogokwanirie ;
57001024	na Mariko , na Aristariko , na Dema , na Luka , abakori emeremo amo nainche .
57001025	Obuya bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bobe amo nemioyo yaino . Amin .
58001001	Ase chinsemo chinyinge nase chingecho chinyinge Nyasaye kare agakwana nabatata baito as'ababani ,
58001002	omoerio bw'amatuko aya okwanire naintwe as'Omwana oye , abegete koba omonyamwando bw'ebinto bionsi , as'ere okorete ense .
58001003	Ere ekiagera nomobaso bw'obonene bwaye , nekieni ki'omobere oye , akabirosia ebinto bionsi ase ring'ana ri'okobua kwaye , gatiekire gokora ere bweka ogosibigwa kw'ebibe biaito , agaikaransa as'okoboko gw'okorio kw'obonene ;
58001004	agakoreka buya mono kobua amalaika , ekiagera onyorire erieta ri'obonene ribuete barabwo .
58001005	Naki rilaika ki atebetie kero kende gionsi , Naye nomwana one , Inche rero nakoiboire ? naende , Inche nimbe asare ise , Nere asende abe omwana one ?
58001006	Ekero akoreta omobiare bwe ritang'ani as'ense , okwanire , Amalaika bonsi ba Nyasaye bamosasime .
58001007	Nas'amang'ana amalaika okwanire , Okorire amalaika aye koba chimbeo , Nabasomba baye koba chinsase chi'omorero :
58001008	Korende as'amang'ana Omwana otebire , Ekerogo kiao , Nyasaye , nekia kare nakare ; Nenyimbo y'oboruoti bwao , nenyimbo ya boronge .
58001009	Gwanchire oboronge , kwagechire amabe ; As'engecho eyio Nyasaye , Nyasaye oo , okobekire amaguta , Amaguta omogoko kobua abasani bao .
58001010	Naye , Omonene , omochakano okabeka ense oboroso , N'igoro nemeremo y'amaboko ao ;
58001011	Ebi nabisareke , korende aye noikaransete : Ebi nabigote buna eanga ;
58001012	Nochiringe buna eanga , Nachirochio nachionchoke : Korende aye naye oria , Nemiaka yao tekoera .
58001013	Inee , ndire rilaika rinde riatebetigwe nere amang'ana aya kero kende gionsi , Oikaranse okoboko kwane gw'okorio , Goika mbeke ababisa bao inse ase chimbaratero chi'amagoro ao ?
58001014	Abwo bonsi tari emeika y'ogokorera bagotomwa kobakorera baria bagocha koira omwando bw'ogokonyeka ?
58002001	As'ayio yatogweneire koyarigereria kobua ayatwaigure titocha koyamocha .
58002002	Naki onye riria ring'ana riakwanetwe namalaika igo riarenge nechinguru , na ker'okomocha nogosaria nkwanyorete eng'eria ya boronge ;
58002003	intwe rende , inee , naki toranyare gwekonya totarendeti ogotoreka okonene okore buna oko ? okwo ritang'ani gwakwanetwe n'Omonene , naende gogaikeranigwa asetore nase baria baigwete ;
58002004	Nyasaye nere akaba kirori amo nabarabwo , as'ebikone bi'ogokumigwa , nechinguru , ase chingecho chinyinge , nas'ebiegwa bi'Omoika Omochenu , buna anchete ere omonyene .
58002005	Naki atayebegete inse y'amalaika ense eria egocha togoteba .
58002006	Korende omonto oyomo okwanete iga , aase gete , Omwana o mwanyabanto ninki goika omoinyore ? Gose omwana o mwanyabanto goika omorigererie ?
58002007	Kwamokorire omoke kobua amalaika ; Kwamobekire egutwa y'obonene nogosika , Kwamobekire igoro as'emeremo y'amaboko ao :
58002008	Kwabekire ebinto bionsi inse ase chimbaratero chiaye . Naki obibekire ebinto bionsi asare inse , tatigete egento getabekiri inse asare . Korende bono titorarora ebinto bionsi bikobekwa asare inse .
58002009	Korende twamororire ere okoretwe omoke ake kobua amalaika , nere Yesu , ekiagera as'ogochandwa kw'amakweri , obekirwe egutwa y'obonene nogosika , erinde as'obuya bwa Nyasaye aigwe amakweri as'engecho ya ker'omonto .
58002010	Naki yamogwenerete ere , as'engecho yaye nas'emeremo yaye , ebinto bionsi biabaire , as'okoreta abana abange goika obonene , komoikerania omotang'ani omonene bw'ogokonyeka kwabo as'ogochandwa .
58002011	Naki ere oyogosibia nabarabwo bagosibigwa bonsi iga bakorua as'oyomo . as ' engecho yaye takorora obosoku kobaroka abamwabo ,
58002012	okobora , Nindirandie erieta riao as'abaminto , Egati gati , y'ekanisa nintere ogotogigwa kwao ,
58002013	Naende , Nimosemerie . Naende , Rora , inche nao inde aiga nabana naetwe na Nyasaye .
58002014	Gaki , ekiagera abana babwatanire namanyinga nomobere , ere nere naboigo abwatanete nayio ayio ; erinde as'enchera y'amakweri amosarie ere oyorenge nechinguru chi'amakweri , engecho yaye saitani ;
58002015	abakonye baria bonsi , abwo abarenge koiroka amakweri , barenge as'obogima bwabo bwonsi inse as'obosomba .
58002016	Naki namaene , tari kobwata engecho y'amalaika , korende abogorie oroiboro rw'Ibrahimu .
58002017	As'ayio yamogwenerete agwekanigwe buna abamwabo as'amang'ana onsi , erinde anyare koba omokuani omonene omonyene amabera , omwegeni as'amang'ana a Nyasaye , akore okorusia as'ebibe bi'abanto .
58002018	Naki achandetwe garemirwe , nanyare kobakonya abwo bagotemwa .
58003001	As'ayio abaminto abachenu , abanyene babwataine nokorangerigwa kw'igoro , morengererie mono Omotomwa , n'Omokuani Omonene bw'okoorokia gwaito ,
58003002	Yesu , oyorenge omwegeni asare ere omokorete , buna Musa arenge as'enyomba yaye yonsi .
58003003	Naki oyo obarirwe ng'a nagwenerete obonene kobua Musa , buna ere arosetie enyomba arenge nogosika kobua enyomba eyio .
58003004	Naki ker'enyomba igekorosigwa nomonto ; korende ere oyorosetie ebinto bionsi Nyasaye .
58003005	Na Musa igo arenge omwegeni as'enyomba yaye yonsi buna omosomba , abe kirori as'amang'ana arache gokwanwa .
58003006	Korende Kristo , buna omwana , igoro as'enyomba yaye ; ere enyomba yaye nintwe , gatorabwatane bokong'u noboremu bwaito nokwebaka gwaito as'ogosemeria goika omoerio .
58003007	As'ayio buna Omoika Omochenu okwanire , Rero , komoraigwe eriogi riaye ,
58003008	Timokora emioyo yaino emekong'u , buna ekero ki'okongechia , Buna rituko ri'ogotemwa as'eroro ,
58003009	Agwo abaiso baino bagantema , as'okondenga , Bakarora ogokora kwane emiaka emerongo ene .
58003010	As'ayio nkagechigwa nekegori eke , Ngateba , Abanto aba igo bakomocha botambe ase chinkoro chiabo : Tibamanyeti chinchera chiane ;
58003011	Buna narire eira as'endamwamu yane , Tibagosoa as'ogotimoka kwane .
58003012	Rigereria , abaminto , taba as'oyomo oino , omoyo omobe bw'ogotancha , as'okwerusanania na Nyasaye ore moyo :
58003013	korende mokonyane kera rituko , ekero gekorokwa ekia Rero ; oyomo oino takorwa omokong'u as'okong'ainererigwa kw'ebibe :
58003014	naki twabaire ababwatani na Kristo , onye tokobwatana nomochakano bw'okwegena gwaito goika omoerio ;
58003015	Agwo gegokwanwa , Rero , komoraigwe eriogi riaye , Timokora emioyo yaino emekong'u buna ekero gi'okongechia .
58003016	Naki mbarabi bamogechetie , ekero bamoigwete ? Tari baria bonsi baruete ase Misiri batang'anetwe na Musa ?
58003017	Ning'o ogechetwe , nabarabwo emiaka emerongo ene ? tari baria bamochete , abwo amabego agwete as'eroro ?
58003018	Ning'o obarierete eira ng'a tibagosoa as'ogotimoka kwaye , tari baria batanchete ?
58003019	Gaki twarorire ng'a tibanyarete gosoa as'engecho y'ogotancha kwabo .
58004001	Gaki , onyore ner'aroro eira y'ogosoa as'ogotimoka kwaye , natoiroke , oyomo oino tanyara kororekana oyemochire .
58004002	Naboigo nekeene , intwe naintwe twaranderigwe amang'ana amaya buna barabwo : korende ring'ana riria riaigwetwe tiriabagwenerete barabwo , ekiagera tiriasang'anete nokwegena ime yabo abaigwete .
58004003	Naki intwe twegenete iga togosoa as'ogotimoka koria buna akwanete , Narire eira as'endamwamu yane , Tibagosoa as'ogotimoka kwane : nonya eria emeremo yaerete korwa ense yabegetwe oboroso .
58004004	Naki otebire rituko riatano nabere aase gete iga , Nyasaye agatimoka rituko riatano nabere , agatiga emeremo yaye yonsi ;
58004005	naiga naroro , Tibagosoa as'ogotimoka kwane .
58004006	Gaki , ekiagera atigaire ng'a mbare abanto barache gosoa , nabaria baranderetigwe amang'ana amaya kare bamochete gosoa ekiagera as'okomocha kwabo ,
58004007	obekire naende rituko gete , ogoteba ase Daudi nyuma y'ekero ekenge buna iga , Rero : buna yakwanetwe korwa kare , Rero onye namoigwe eriogi riaye , Timokora chinkoro chiaino chinkong'u .
58004008	Naki onye Yoshua nabaete ogotimoka , anga takwanete rituko rinde korwa nyuma .
58004009	Bono , gwatigaire gaki ogotimoka gw'esabato as'abanto ba Nyasaye .
58004010	Naki ere oyosoire as'ogotimoka kwaye otimokire ere omonyene korwa as'emeremo yaye , buna Nyasaye atimogete korwa as'emeremo yaye .
58004011	Gaki , tokore omokia gosoa as'ogotimoka koria , monto onde tacha kogwa as'omogwekano oyio oyio bw'ogosaria .
58004012	Naki ring'ana ria Nyasaye iga rire moyo , naende ndire nechinguru , naende ndire nobwoge kobua obwoge bw'omoro okonacha chinsemo ibere , naende igo rikobeta as'ogwatanana omobere nomoyo , nechinengo nebitinya bire ime yaye , neriango kobimanya ebirengererio nokorenga gw'enkoro .
58004013	Naende egetongwa kende tikeri getari maiso marore as'obosio bwaye : korende ebinto bionsi mbire bosa , nakomanorerwa as'amaiso aye , ere oyore namang'ana aito .
58004014	Gaki , onye tore nomokuani omonene osoete igoro , Yesu , Omwana o Nyasaye , tobwate mono okoorokia gwaito .
58004015	Naki titori nomokuani onde otanyare kobogoria amang'ana aito ay'oboreu ; korende ere igatemetwe koreng'ana buna intwe as'amang'ana onsi , atari nabibe .
58004016	Gaki toike ang'e as'ekerogo ki'obuya , erinde tonyore amabera , nakonyora obuya bogotokonya as'ekero gi'okorigia .
58005001	Naki ker'omokuani omonene orusetigwe ase mwanyabanto , obekirwe as'engecho ya mwanyabanto as'amang'ana amogwenerete Nyasaye , erinde arue ebiegwa nebing'wanso as'engecho y'ebibe :
58005002	oranyare kobabogoreria as'obwororo barabwo batamanyeti , nabaria bagosira , ekiagera ere omonyene igaetananire noboreu ;
58005003	nas'engecho as'ayio yamogweneire , buna as'engecho y'abanto , naboigo as'engecho yaye omonyene , korua ekeng'wanso as'engecho y'ebibe .
58005004	Tari monto onde bwebogoreirie ogosika oko , korende ere oyorangerigwe na Nyasaye buna Haruni .
58005005	Naboigo Kristo ere tetogeti omonyene akorwe omokuani omonene , korende ere oyokwanete nere : Omwana one naye , Inche rero nakoiboire :
58005006	Buna akwanete aase ande , Aye nomokuani okare nakare , As'omogwekano bw'ekerengo kia Melkizedeki .
58005007	Ere amatuko ayio omobere oye , akamoruseria ere , oranyare komokonya nakomorusia as'amakweri , ogosaba nagosorora amo nokorera mono namariga , akoigugwa as'engecho y'ogosika kwaye ,
58005008	nonya orenge Omwana , akeorokereria okoigwera as'emechando eye yamonyorete ;
58005009	nere gatiekire goikeranigwa , akaba as'engecho y'ogokonyeka gwa kare nakare as'abanto bonsi baranyare komoigwera ;
58005010	bwatoirwe na Nyasaye , ng'a nomokuani omonene as'omogwekano bw'ekerengo kia Melkizedeki .
58005011	Korende more namang'ana amange togokwana as'amang'ana aye ; nakong'u koyaorokia , ekiagera mwabaire aboro as'okoigwa .
58005012	Naki igebagwenerete koba aborokia ekiagera ebiro ebinge biaetire , morigetie kworokererigwa nomonto okworokereria kwe ritang'ani kw'amang'ana a Nyasaye ; nainwe mwabaire buna abarigetie amabere gose tari endagera enkong'u .
58005013	Ekiagera ker'omonto okoriera amabere tamanyeti mono ring'ana ri'oboronge ; naki nomwana omoke .
58005014	Korende endagera enkong'u ney'abanto abanene , abwo chisemi chiabo , as'ogokorerwa , chianarigwe gwatanana amaya namabe .
58006001	As'engecho y'ayio totige gokwana okworokereria kwe ritang'ani gwa Kristo , tokong'ie orogendo toikerere oboikeranu ; titobeka oboroso bonde naende bw'okoonchoka kw'emeremo y'amakweri , nokwegena ase Nyasaye ,
58006002	nokworokereria kwe chibatiso , nakobekera amaboko , nokobokigwa kw'abakure , nekina gia kare nakare .
58006003	Natokore ayio Nyasaye karatokonye .
58006004	Naki as'abwo batiekire koegwa omobaso , nakomena ekeegwa keria ki'igoro , nagokorwa ababwatani b'Omoika Omochenu ,
58006005	nakomena ring'ana rigiya ria Nyasaye , nechinguru chia kare chirache gocha ,
58006006	erio bakogwa nyuma y'ayio , tekonyarekana bakorwe abayia naende ase okoonchoka ; ekiagera bamoitire Omwana o Nyasaye eria kabere as'emebere yabo , nakomosokia maiso marore .
58006007	Naki nense ekonywa embura egotwa , egocha naende , naende , nakwama chinyeni chigwenerete as'engecho y'abwo bakoyerema , yanyora egesio kia Nyasaye ;
58006008	korende gekwama amagwa namageri , yangwa nakoba ang'e nokoragererigwa ; omoerio oye nogosambwa .
58006009	Korende , abanchani , nonya togokwana ayio , twamanyire ng'a namochore amang'ana ayare amaya kobua , ayakoreta ogotoreka :
58006010	naki Nyasaye tari omobe goika ebe emeremo yaino , nogwancha koria mwaorogetie as'erieta riaye , ekiagera mwabakoreire abachenu , na goika iga bono nkobakoreramore .
58006011	Naintwe twarigirie ker'oyomo oino aorokie omokia oria oria as'oboikeranu bw'ogosemeria oko goika omoerio :
58006012	korende timoba aboro , korende mobe abatunyani babo b'omwando bw'eira as'okwegena nokoremereria .
58006013	Naki Nyasaye , ekero amoete Ibrahimu eira , ekiagera arenge tari omonene kobua omonyene , bw'okomoriera eira , akaria eira omonyene ,
58006014	agateba , Ekeene ogosesenia ningosesenie , okomenteka , ninkomentere .
58006015	Naboigo as'okoremereria akanyora eira eria .
58006016	Naki abana ba mwanyabanto igo bakomoriera eira ere oyore omonene : nomoerio bw'okoamererania kwabo gwonsi kw'amang'ana , nemuma ekoyaikerania ,
58006017	Ase ring'ana erio Nyasaye , akarigia koborokia abaraire omwando oria bw'eira chingecho buna atanyare koonchora ebina biaye , akabeka emuma gati gati :
58006018	erinde as'ebinto bibere bitanyare koonchora , ime as'ebio Nyasaye takonyara gokwana oborimo , tonyore okoremia kore ogokong'u , intwe abwo twatameire obotamero kobwata ogosemeria koria kwabekirwe as'obosio bwaito ;
58006019	tore nakwo buna ekerochi ki'omoyo , ogosemeria kore nechinguru gotari goonchoka , egosoa aria are ime as'epasia ( egetambaa gi'okonacha ) ;
58006020	asoete Yesu as'engecho yaito , omotang'ani oito obaire omokuani omonene buna engecho ya Melkizedeki goika kare nakare .
58007001	Naki oyo Melkizedeki , omoruoti o Salemi , omokuani o Nyasaye Ore Igoro , oumeranete na Ibrahimu nyuma y'okobaaka abaruoti , akamosesenia ,
58007002	Ibrahimu akamwatananera ensemo y'ikomi y'ebinto biaye bionsi ( ritang'ani , as'okoonchora , Omoruoti bw'oboronge , naende , Omoruoti o Salemi , engecho yaye , Omoruoti bw'omorembe ;
58007003	tari na ise , tari na ng'ina , tari nechisokoro chiaye , tari nomochakano bw'amatuko aye , gose omoerio bw'obogima bwaye korende ogwekanigwe buna Omwana o Nyasaye ) , igakoba omokuani goika kare nakare .
58007004	Gaki rigereria buna omonto oyo arenge omonene , ere Ibrahimu , tata oito omonene , amoete ensemo y'ikomi y'ogosakora .
58007005	Nas'abana ba Lawi , baria bakonyora obokuani , mbare namachiko koira ensemo y'ikomi y'abanto as'engecho y'amachiko , engecho yaye , abamwabo , nonya barure as'oroiboro rw'Ibrahimu .
58007006	Korende ere , ekiagera chisokoro chiaye tichiabaretwe ng'a iga chiaruete as'abwo , akaira ensemo y'ikomi korwa as'Ibrahimu , akamosesenia ere , oyorenge neira eria .
58007007	Okoamererania tikori nonya ng'ake , ng'a omoke ogosesenigwa nomonene .
58007008	Naiga mwanyabanto abanyene ogokwa , nkonyorabare ensemo y'ikomi ; korende agwo ere oyogwatorwa ng'a moyo are .
58007009	Ninyare goteba ng'a as'enchera y'Ibrahimu , nonya Lawi oyenyorete ensemo y'ikomi , akarua ensemo y'ikomi ;
58007010	naki arenge as'oroiboro rw'ise , ekero Melkizedeki aumeranete nere .
58007011	Gaki , onye oboikeranu bwarenge agwo as'obokuani bwa Lawi ( naki as'obwo abanto baria banyorete amachiko ) , nkogania ki kwarenge naende omokuani onde aimoke as'engecho ya Melkizedeki , gose tari as'engecho ya Haruni ?
58007012	Naki obokuani boria koboraonchoke , ande tari namachiko , nabo araonchoke .
58007013	Ekiagera ere oyokwanetwe ayio igabwataine negesaku kende , korende tarenge omonto bw'egesaku eke oyore gokorera amathabau .
58007014	Naki maiso marore , ng'a Omonene oito igaruete ase Yuda ; as'egesaku ekio Musa atakwanete ring'ana rinde rionsi riakegwenerete as'amang'ana obokuani .
58007015	Naende ayio togokwana igare maiso marore mono kobua , kerabe omokuani onde okooroka as'omogwekano o Melkizedeki .
58007016	Oyotarenge omokuani as'amachiko ay'ekina kere chingecho chi'omobere , korende ase chinguru chi'obogima botari nomoerio :
58007017	naki obaire kirori asare , ng'a , Aye nomokuani okare nakare As'ekerengo kia Melkizedeki .
58007018	Naki nkore okoonchorerigwa as'amachiko aria atang'anete , as'engecho y'oboreu bwaye , nogotagwenera kwaye ,
58007019	( Naki amachiko aria taikeranetie ring'ana ) , amo naya gokareta ogosemeria kore okuya kobua , nas'ayio twamoikire ang'e Nyasaye ,
58007020	nas'okobatikwarenge gotari nemuma ,
58007021	( naki baria bakoretwe abakuani batari nemuma ; korende ere , amo nemuma , as'ere omotebetie , Omonene orire eira , gose tagweitia , Aye nomokuani goika kare nakare ) ;
58007022	Gaki as'ekerengo eke Yesu obaire negiantenenera as'emuma ere engiya kobua .
58007023	Naende baria bakorirwe abakuani abange , ekiagera batangirwe nogokwa tibaikaransa :
58007024	korende ere , ekiagera aikaransete kare nakare , nare nobokuani botari koonchoka .
58007025	As'ayio , nere , nanyare kobakonya kegima abwo bagocha ase Nyasaye as'ere ; ekiagera moyo are amatuko onsi kobasabera .
58007026	Naki omokuani omonene buna oyo igatogwenerete intwe , nere pre omochenu , otarenge nobobe , otarenge nakemoa kende gionsi , orusananetigwe nabasaria , orenge igoro kobua erioba igoro ;
58007027	otarenge nokorigia kera rituko , buna omogwekano bwa baria abakuani abanene bande , korua ritang'ani ekeng'wanso as'engecho y'ebibe biaye omonyene , erio as'engecho y'ebibe bi'abanto : naki ere akorete iga ara rimo , ekero eruete omobere oye .
58007028	Naki amachiko akobabeka abana ba mwanyabanto abare noboreu , babe abakuani abanene ; korende ring'ana ri'emuma , riachete nyuma as'amachiko , riamobekire Omwana , oyoikeranete goika kare nakare .
58008001	Gaki , as'ayio togokwana , ring'ana rire rinene nario eri : Ntore nomokuani omonene ore buna iga , oikaransete okoboko gw'okorio gw'ekerogo ki'Obonene bw'igoro ,
58008002	omokoreri bwe hekalu , noyo bw'eema y'ekeene , eye Omonene abegete , tari mwanyabanto .
58008003	Naki ker'omokuani omonene igakobekwa erinde orua ebiegwa nebing'wanso : as'ayio nagwenerete omokuani omonene oyo , abe negento akorua .
58008004	Onye nabete as'ense , anga tabete omokuani , ekiagera mbare bakorua ebiegwa buna amachiko achigete ;
58008005	abagokorera as'omogwekano nekiriri ki'amang'ana ay'igoro , buna Musa achigetwe na Nyasaye , ekero arenge ang'e gokora eria eema : naki agoteba , Rigereria obikore ebinto bionsi as'omogwekano oria kworogetigwe as'egetunwa .
58008006	Korende bono onyorire obosomba bore obuya kobua , koreng'ana buna are omokonyi bw'emuma ere engiya , yachigetwe ase chiira chiria chingiya nagochiegena .
58008007	Naki onye riria rie ritang'ani ndiarenge tiriri nokomocha anga ribaga tiriarigetwe ase riria riakabere .
58008008	Naki as'okonyora okomocha ime yabo otebire , Rora , amatuko nache , otebire Omonene , Nainche ninyekore enyomba y'Isiraeli nenyomba ya Yuda emuma enyia ;
58008009	Tekoba buna emuma eria nakorete nabaise babo , Ase rituko riria nababwatete amaboko abo mbarusie as'ense ya Misiri ; Naki tibabete as'emuma yane , Nainche tinabarigereria , okwanire Omonene .
58008010	Naki eye nero emuma ndanyare gokorerana nenyomba y'Isiraeli Nyuma y'amatuko aria , okwanire Omonene ; Nimbeke amachiko ane as'ebirengererio biabo , Nase chinkoro chiabo ninyarike : Nainche nimbe Nyasaye obo , Nabarabwo nababe abanto bane .
58008011	Barabwo tibakonyara kworokererania ker'omonto nomogisangio oye , Na ker'omonto noyomwabo , ogoteba , Momanye Omonene : Naki bonsi nabamanye inche , Korwa omoke obo goika omonene obo .
58008012	Naki nimbabere obobe bwabo , Nebibe biabo tinkobinyora naende .
58008013	Ase koria ogokwana , Emuma enyia , oyekorire eria ye ritang'ani koba enkoro . Korende egento gokiabaire egekoro , nakogota , ng'ang'e kere gosira .
58009001	Gaki nonya emuma eria ye ritang'ani yarenge namachiko y'ogokorera ogochenu , ne hekalu yaye , hekalu y'ense eye .
58009002	Naki yarenge eema yarosetigwe eria ye ritang'ani , imeo yarenge etaya , nemesa , nemegati yarenge korugwa ase Nyasaye ; are korokwa , aase Aachenu .
58009003	Na nyuma as'egetambaa gia kabere , eria eema ekorokwa Aachenu ay'aachenu ;
58009004	eyarenge negetabo gi'ethahabu , nesanduku y'amachiko yakunekire nethahabu chinsemo chionsi , imeo kiarenge egetono gi'ethahabu kiarenge nendagera ekorokwa manna , nenyimbo ya Haruni yasebogete , nechibao chi'emuma ;
58009005	na igoro yaye omogwekano bw'amalaika ay'obonene ; are kobekera ekiriri oboikaranso bw'amabera ; korende titori neribaga toratebe amang'ana ebinto ebi ekemo ekemo .
58009006	Korende , ebinto ebi kobiarosigwe igo , abakuani basoa eema ye ritang'ani amatuko onsi , koyaisaneria amang'ana ogokora ;
58009007	korende , eema ya kabere omokuani omonene osoa ere bweka , ara rimo ker'omwaka ; korende takonyara gosoa atari namanyinga , arenge korua as'engecho yaye omonyene , nas'ebibe bi'ogotamanya kw'abanto :
58009008	Omoika Omochenu okworokereria ring'ana eri , ng'a enchera y'ogosoa aachenu teraorokigwa , ekero eema ye ritang'ani eteneine .
58009009	Oyo noro nomogwekano bw'ekero eke kia bono ; as'engecho yaye bikorugwa ebiegwa nebing'wanso ebitanyare komoikerania omonto oyo ogosaba as'ebirengererio biaye ,
58009010	ekiagera namachiko aye chingecho chi'omobere chioka , ebi'okoria , nebinyugwa , nogosibia konde konde , biachigetwe goika ekero gi'okorosigwa okoyia .
58009011	Korende Kristo gatiekire gocha omokuani omonene bw'ayio amang'ana amaya ayaranyare gocha , as'eema , ere enene eikeranete kobua , eyetakoretwe namaboko , engecho yaye , etari ey'ense eye ,
58009012	gose tari as'amanyinga echimbori nechimori , korende as'amanyinga aye omonyene , agasoa ara rimo aas'aachenu gatiekire konyora okoborigwa gwa kare nakare .
58009013	Naki onye amanyinga echimbori naye chieri , neribu ri'amatororo echiombe bare goitororerwa abanyene eubi , asibia goika ogosibigwa kw'omobere :
58009014	korende tari kobua as'amanyinga aye Kristo , ere as'Omoika obotambe akerwa omonyene ase Nyasaye koba ekeng'wanso getari nakemoa , gosibia ebirengererio biaino korwa emeremo ekwete , komokorera Nyasaye ore moyo ?
58009015	As'engecho eye , ere nomokonyi bw'emuma enyia , ekiagera amakweri gatiekire gokoreka as'okoboria okomocha as'emuma ye ritang'ani , barangereretigwe bayenyore eira y'omwando o kare nakare .
58009016	Naki as'emuma y'omwando ere , igegwenerete ab'aroro amakweri aye oyoyekorete .
58009017	Naki emuma nere nechinguru gatiekire gokwa omonto : korende teri nechinguru nonya ng'ake ekero ere oyoyekorete are moyo .
58009018	As'ayio neria ye ritang'ani tiyachagetwe etari namanyinga .
58009019	Naki ker'ogochika gogwatiekire gokwanwa na Musa as'abanto bonsi , buna yachigetwe as'amachiko , akabogoria amanyinga echimori naye chimbori , amo namache namarionya amabariri , jia husopo , akanyororokeria ebuku enyene , nabanto bonsi ,
58009020	agateba , Aya namanyinga emuma mwachigetwe na Nyasaye .
58009021	Neria eema nebinto bionsi bi'ogokora akabinyororokeria amanyinga engecho eria eria .
58009022	Nas'engecho y'amachiko ang'e ebinto bionsi bigosibigwa namanyinga , onye ataiteiri amanyinga , okorusigwa tikori .
58009023	Gaki yagwenerete emegwekano y'ebinto bire igoro bisibigwe as'ebi ; korende ebinto bi'igoro ebinyene as'ebing'wanso bire ebiya kobua ebi ,
58009024	Naki Kristo tasoete aas'aachenu akoretwe namaboko , naro omogwekano bw'aachenu asare aachenu ekeene ; korende agasoa igoro anyene , arorekane bono obosio bwa Nyasaye as'engecho yaito intwe :
58009025	gose tari buna ng'a erue omonyene ebiro ebinge , buna omokuani omonene ogosoa aas'aachenu ker'omwaka namanyinga atari ayaye ;
58009026	onye nabo , anga yamogwenerete achandwe ebiro ebinge korwa ogotongwa gw'ense : korende bono , ara rimo rioka , as'omoerio bw'ense ororekanire , arusie ebibe as'ekeng'wanso ki'omobere oye .
58009027	Buna abanto bagacheirwe ogokwa ara rimo rioka , na nyuma y'ogokwa ekina ;
58009028	naboigo Kristo nere , gatiekire korugwa ekeng'wanso ara rimo , abirusie ebibe bi'abanto abange , eria kabere , atari nabibe , narorekane nabarabwo abamoganyete goika banyore ogotoreka .
58010001	Gaki amachiko nekiriri ki'amaya aranyare gocha , tari ekieni ekenyene ki'amang'ana , as'ebing'wanso biria biria barenge korua ker'omwaka botambe , takonyara ebiro bionsi kobaikerania abwo abagoika ang'e .
58010002	Onyore yanyarete , anga mbatigete kobirua ; ekiagera abwo barenge gosasima , kobatiekire gosibigwa ara rimo rioka , anga tibarenge kwerora ng'a mbare nebibe naende ?
58010003	Korende as'ebio nkore okoinyora kw'ebibe ker'omwaka .
58010004	Naki takonyarekana amanyinga echieri naye chimbori korusia ebibe .
58010005	As'ayio karache ense , otebire , Ebing'wanso nakorua torigeti , Korende omobere kwandosoirie ;
58010006	Ase chisadaka chi'ogosambwa nebing'wanso bi'ebibe togokiri nabirobio :
58010007	Erio ngakwana , Rora , nachire ( as'ensemo y'ebuku narikeirwe ) Mbokore obwanchani bwao , Nyasaye .
58010008	Agwo igoro agokwana agwo , Ebing'wanso nechisadaka , nechio chigosambwa chi'ebibe , tigwachirigetie , gose tikwagogetigwe ( nachirochio echiaruetwe as'amachiko ) ,
58010009	erio akabora , Rora nachire mbokore obwanchani bwao . Orusie ekie ritang'ani erinde ng'a atenenie egia kabere .
58010010	As'obwanchani obwo twanyorire ogosibigwa , as'okorugwa omobere o Yesu Kristo ara rimo rioka .
58010011	Na ker'omokuani iga agotenena kera rituko gokora obosomba , korua ebing'wanso biria biria , ebiro ebinge ; nabirobio tibikonyara nonya ng'ake korusia ebibe :
58010012	korende oyo , ochia korua ekeng'wanso ekemo gioka as'ebibe , gekoba goika kare nakare ; agaikaransa as'okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye ;
58010013	akaganya goika ababisa baye babekwe inse atorere amagoro aye .
58010014	Naki as'okorugwa okomo obaikeranirie goika kare nakare abwo abasibigwe .
58010015	Nomoika Omochenu otobereire kirori : naki nyuma gakwanire ring'ana eri ,
58010016	Eye nemuma ndabae Nyuma y'amatuko ana , okwanire Omonene ; Nimbeke amachiko ane ase chinkoro chiabo , Nas'ebirengererio biabo ninyarike ; erio agateba ,
58010017	Ebibe biabo nogosaria kwabo tinkobinyora naende nonya ng'ake .
58010018	Gaki okorusigwa kw'aya gakorabeo , korusigwa kw'ebibe tigokoba naende .
58010019	Gaki , abaminto , ekiagera more noboremu bw'ogosoa aase aachenu as'amanyinga a Yesu ,
58010020	enchera atochakerete enyia , enchera enyia ere moyo , egoeta as'egetambaa , engecho yaye , omobere oye ;
58010021	nomokuani omonene igoro as'enyomba ya Nyasaye .
58010022	Toike ang'e nenkoro y'ekeene , as'oboikeranu bw'okwegena , twanyororokerigwe chinkoro chiaito , totige ebirengererio bi'ebibe , twasibigwe emebere as'amache amachenu :
58010023	tobwate mono okoorokia gw'ogosemeria gwaito tikoonchoka ; naki ere oriete eira nomonyene oboronge :
58010024	torengereranie ekerengo gi'ogosukania as'obwanchani nemeremo emiya ;
58010025	titotiga gosangererekana amo , buna ere engecho y'abande , korende tworokereranie ; nakobua mono , ekero moroche rituko erio rigoika ang'e .
58010026	Naki gatorakore ebibe nechinguru nyuma y'okonyora chisemi chiria chi'ekeene , tigetigareti naende ekeng'wanso as'engechoy'ebibe ;
58010027	korende korigereria ekinagi'okoondoka , nobotindi bw'omorero ogocha kobaria abwo bakoamererania .
58010028	Omonto oyorenge gochaya amachiko a Musa igarenge gokwa atari namabera , ase ring'ana ri'abarori habere gose batato :
58010029	naki moroche ? temogwenereti obororo obonene kobua omonto oria otachete Omwana o Nyasaye , nakobara amanyinga emuma asibetigwe naro koba egento kia bosa , nagokorera Omoika bw'amabera oboenenu ?
58010030	Naki mwamomanyire ere okwanete , Okorusia egesioinba igakere igoro yane , inche ning'akane . Naende , Omonene nabanachere ekina abanto baye .
58010031	Nering'ana ri'ogoichania kogwa as'amaboko a Nyasaye ore moyo .
58010032	Korende yainyore amatuko eritang'ani , ayio mwatiegete kobekwa omobaso , mokaremereria okoamererania okonene kw'ogochandwa ;
58010033	ake mokarorerigwa as'emerumi nogochandwa ; n'ake , mokabwatana nabaria bakoreretwe ayio .
58010034	Naki mokabarorera amabera baria barenge as'ebisibo , mogancha nomogoko kourwa chinibo chiaino , mokamanya as'emioyo yaino ng'a more nenibo igoro ere engiya kobua etari nomoerio .
58010035	Gaki timotuguta oboremu bwaino , ekiagera mbore neng'eria enene .
58010036	Naki morigetie oboremereria , erinde , kamwatiekire gokora obwanchani bwa Nyasaye namonyore eria eira .
58010037	Naki nkere egeka egesinini mono , Ere oyorache , nache gose tagotebana .
58010038	Korende omonyene oboronge nabe moyo as'okwegena : Nere karasukwane , omoyo one tori nomogoko nere .
58010039	Korende intwe titori amo nabwo bagosukwana nagosire ; korende as'abwo bare nokwegena as'ogokonya emioyo yaito .
