58011001	Gaki okwegena nakwo gokobeka chinguru amang'ana ayio asemeirie , nekeene ki'ayio atarikororekana .
58011002	Naki as'ayio abagaka baito bagotebwa .
58011003	As'okwegena twamanyire ng'a ense igo yakoretwe ase ring'ana ria Nyasaye , nonya nebinto bikororekana tibiakoretwe as'ebinto bire maiso marore .
58011004	As'okwegena Abel akaa Nyasaye ekeng'wanso kere ekiya kobua egia Kain , as'ayio agatorwa ng'a nomonyene oboronge , Nyasaye agatora as'engecho y'ebiegwa biaye : as'ayio nonya okure , ngokwanare goika nonya mbono .
58011005	As'okwegena Enok akang'anyigwa tacha korora amakweri ; tarorekanete ekiagera Nyasaye namong'anyetie : naki ritang'ani ri'ekero gi'okong'anyigwa kwaye igatoretwe ng'a ' namogwenerete Nyasaye .
58011006	Korende okwegena gotaiyo tekonyarekana komogwenera ; naki omonto ogocha ase Nyasaye nagwenerete gwancha ng'a nareo , naende igakobaa eng'eria baria bakomorigia .
58011007	As'okwegena Nuhu gatiekire gokurerwa na Nyasaye amang'ana atararorekana , as'okoba nogosika okuya ase Nyasaye , akarosia obwato , anyare gokonya enyomba yaye ; as'ayio akanachera ense ekina , akaba omoiri omwando oboronge bokonyorekana as'okwegena .
58011008	As'okwegena Ibrahimu gatiekire korangerigwa , akaigwa , akagenda goika aase aria aranyare koanyora koba omwando ; akaimoka tamanya as'agochia .
58011009	As'okwegena akamenya as'ense eria y'eira , buna as'ense etari eyaye , akamenya ase chiema amo n'Isaaka na Yakobo , abanyamwando amo nere as'eira eria eria .
58011010	Naki arigereretie omochie oyore noboroso , korende omonyene oyoagachete nakoyorosia Nyasaye .
58011011	As'okwegena nonya Sara omonyene akanyora okobua koba morito , konyora oeteire ekero kiaye ; ekiagera amoroche ere oyoriete eira ng'a nomwegeni .
58011012	Nas'engecho eyio bakaiborwa as'omonto oyomo , nere igarenge buna oyokure , abanto abange buna ching'enang'eni chi'igoro obonge bwabo ; na buna omokenye ore engegu y'enyancha , otanyare kobarwa .
58011013	Aba bonsi bagakwa as'okwegena , tibanyora chiira chiria , korende bagachirora nagochikwania korwa are , bagatora ng'a igo barenge abageni , nabatari igoro as'ense .
58011014	Naki abagokwana amang'ana buna ayio nkoorokiabare maiso marore ng'a nkorigiabare ense yabo abanyene .
58011015	Na onye mbainyorete ense eria baruete , anga mbanyorete ribaga bakoiranerao .
58011016	Korende bono barengereirie ense ere engiya , engecho yaye , ense y'igoro , as'ayio Nyasaye takorora obosoku korokwa Nyasaye obo ; ekiagera obaroseirie omochie .
58011017	As'okwegena Ibrahimu ochia gotemwa , akarua Isaaka , abe ekeng'wanso ; nere oyoirete chiira nomogoko , akarua omwana oye , oyoiboretwe omomoima ;
58011018	ere natebetigwe , As'Isaaka oroiboro rwao norangerigwe :
58011019	akabara ng'a Nyasaye nanyare komobokia korwa as'amakweri ; akamonyora naende korwa agwo as'omogwekano .
58011020	As'okwegena , Isaaka akabasesenia Yakobo na Esau , goika as'amang'ana arache koba nyuma .
58011021	As'okwegena Yakobo ekero arenge ang'e nogokwa , akamosesenia ker'oyomo as'abana ba Yusufu ; agasasima bwesirerete enyimbo yaye .
58011022	As'okwegena Yusufu , konyora obaire ang'e nomoerio oye , agatora amang'ana okorua kwabo abana b'Isiraeli , akabachikera amauga aye .
58011023	As'okwegena Musa , ekero aiboretwe akabiswa emetienyj etato nabamoibori baye , ekiagera bakarora ng'a nomwana omuya ; gose tibairoka ogochika kw'omoruoti .
58011024	As'okwegena Musa agachia koba omonto omonene , akanga korokwa omwana bw'omoiseke o Farao ;
58011025	agachora ng'a mbuya konyora emechando amo nabanto ba Nyasaye kobua kwegokia as'ebibe egeka ;
58011026	akabara ogochaywa kwaye Kristo nobonda obonge kobua enibo ya Misiri : naki akarigereria goikera eng'eria ya boronge .
58011027	As'okwegena akarua Misiri , tairoka endamwamu y'omoruoti ; naki akaremereria buna oyomororire ere otari kororekana .
58011028	As'okwegena agakora epasaka , nakonyororokeria aria amanyinga , ng'a oyokobaita abana abatangi tabakuna barabwo ,
58011029	As'okwegena bagaeta egati y'enyancha Embariri , buna as'ense enyomo : Abamisiri bagachia koyetema gokora bo bakamerwa .
58011030	As'okwegena chinduaki chia Yeriko chikagwa , gachiaetananirwe amatuko atano nabere .
58011031	As'okwegena Rahabu oria omotayayi , taitwa amo nabaria bataigwerete , ekiagera abaroisetie abaroti nomorembe .
58011032	Nkwane ki naende ? naki ekero tigekonyara kong'isana koreta amang'ana a Gidion , na Baraki , na Samson , na Yefitha ; na Daudi na Samweli nababani ;
58011033	abwo as'okwegena bakabua amanda , bagakora oboronge , bakanyora eira , bagasiba emenwa ye chisibwori .
58011034	Bakarimia chinguru chi'omorero , bagakonyeka nobwoge bw'omoro , bakabekwa chinguru nyuma ; as'okoba abareu , bakaba abatindi as'esegi , bagaseria emeganda y'abageni .
58011035	Abakungu bakanyora abakwete babo babogetigwe : nabande bagachandwa , abatanchete okoborigwa ; banyore okobokigwa okore okuya :
58011036	abande bagatemwa as'echeche nokoakwa , ee , as'ebisibo , nas'okobekwa echela :
58011037	bakaakwa amagena , bakanachwa nechinseke , bagatemwa , bagaitwa nemioro ; bagaetanana ogoetanana bakeboyia chingobo chie ching'ondi nechingobo chie chimbori ; bakaba abaremeru , bakorosigwa , bagakorwa bobe :
58011038	( abanto ense etagwenerete koba nabarabwo ) , igabarenge goetanana ogoetanana ase chiroro nas'ebitunwa nas'amabwago , nase chingoro chi'ense .
58011039	Nabanto aba bonsi kabatieka gotebwa as'engecho y'okwegena kwabo , tibayenyora eira :
58011040	ekiagera Nyasaye otang'anire gotogachera intwe egento ekere ekiya , erinde tibaisanerigwa batari naintwe .
58012001	Nabo naintwe as'engecho eye , ekiagera twaetananirwe nerire rinene ri'abarori buna iga , tobeke ensemo ker'omosigo omorito , nebibe bigotobwata bwango , tominyoke bwango as'okoremereria , as'okoamererania koria kwabekirwe as'obosio bwaito ,
58012002	koniorigereria Yesu , oyochagete okwegena gwaito nagogoikerania , ere oyo as'engecho y'omogoko obekirwe obosio bwaye akayoremereria omosalaba nagochaya obosoku , nere oikaransire okoboko gw'okorio gw'ekerogo ki'obonene bwa Nyasaye .
58012003	Naki morengererie mono ere oyoremereretie ogotangwa okonene buna oko kw'abanyene ebibe igoro as'emebere yabo , timocha kwebutokania nagokwa emioyo yaino .
58012004	Timorarwana esegi as'okoamererania nebibe goika ogoitera amanyinga :
58012005	naende mwebire ogosorora koria , gogokwana nainwe buna abana , Omwana one , tochaya ogokanigwa kwaye Omonene , Gose , tokwa moyo korakanigwe nere ;
58012006	Naki ere Omonene anchete igakomokania , Nakomoaka ker'omwana anchete .
58012007	Ekiagera as'engecho y'ogokanigwa mwaremereria ; ekiagera Nyasaye akobakora buna abana ; naki omwana ki otari gokanigwa naise ?
58012008	Gaki onye mokoba timogokanigwa , nokwo babwataine bonsi , mwabaire abana b'ebimerwa , gose tari abana ba boronge .
58012009	Amo naya ntwarenge nabatata b'omobere oito bagotokania , tokabaigwera ; gaki tari buya mono kwabeka inse ya Tata bw'emioyo yaito nakoba moyo ?
58012010	Naki ekeene barabwo as'amatuko amake batokanetie buna baroche buya abanyene ; korende ere as'okogwenera gwaito , erinde tobwatane nobochenu bwaye .
58012011	Ker'okoakwa engaki yaye gokororekana tikori egento ki'omogoko , korende neki'emechando : korende kwabaruseria barabwo abanarire nakwo amatunda aboronge nay'omorembe .
58012012	As'ayio yaimokie amaboko arorobire , namaru aringakire ;
58012013	mogokorera amagoro aino chinchera chindonge , erinde egento kere ekerema tigesirigwa , korende kobua gekonywe .
58012014	Tunyana omorembe as'abanto bonsi , nobochenu , ekiagera tari ' monto oramorore Nyasaye atari naborobwo :
58012015	mokorigereria mono omonto onde taremerwa obuya bwa Nyasaye ; ritina ri'obororo tiricha gokumbaria nakobachanda , abanto abange babekwe nobobe as'erio ;
58012016	taba agwo omotomani gose oyotasigeti Nyasake , buna Esau , ogorete omwando oye bw'okoiborwa as'engecho y'endagera eyemo .
58012017	Naki mwamanyire goika agachia korigia nyuma omwando bw'ogosesenia agakanigwa ( naki tarora ribaga ri'okoonchoka ) , nonya origetie mono namariga .
58012018	Naki timoraika egetunwa keranyare gokunwa , gegwoka omorero , gose rire rimwamu , nomosunte , nekembobe ,
58012019	nokobuga kw'egetureri , neriogi ri'amang'ana ; erio baria baigwete bagasorora tibatebigwa ring'ana rinde rionsi ;
58012020	naki tibanyarete koremereria ring'ana riria riachigetwe , nonya eng'iti yarenge gokuna egetunwa neakwe amagena , gose yabetwa neritimo ;
58012021	naya arorekanete igarenge ayakwoboyia , goika Musa agateba , Nabwatirwe nobwoba nokoiguswa .
58012022	Korende inwe mwageikeire egetunwa gia Zayoni , nomochie o Nyasaye ore moyo , Yerusalemu o igoro , nemeganda y'amalaika chilifu chinyinge ,
58012023	nekanisa y'omoiborwa bwe ritang'ani barigetwe igoro , na Nyasaye omogambi bw'abanto bonsi , nemioyo y'abanto abanyene oboronge abaikeranirie ,
58012024	na Yesu omonyene okoreta emuma enyia namanyinga akonyororokerigwa agokwana amaya kobua aria Abel ,
58012025	Rigereria timomwanga ere ogokwana . Naki onye baria tibakonyegete abamwangete ere oyobakonyete igoro as'ense , kobua mono intwe titogokonyeka gotoratananeke nere ogotokonya korwa igoro :
58012026	oyio eriogi riaye rianyegeretie ense ekero keria : korende bono orire eira otebire , Ara rimo naende ninyegerie ense gose tari ense yoka , korende naigoro onsi .
58012027	Ring'ana riria , Ara rimo naende , rieorokirie maiso marore kobing'anyia biria bikonyara gotengechigwa buna ebinto biatongetwe , erinde ebinto bitanyare gotengechigwa bikaranse .
58012028	Gaki gotaranyore obonda botanyare gotengechigwa , tobe nobuya , erinde agwo tomoe Nyasaye ekeng'wanso gekomogokia , amo nobokanyeku bw'okoiroka ;
58012029	naki Nyasaye oito nomorero okoria .
58013001	Obwanchani bw'abaminto bobeo .
58013002	Timweba koorokia obwanchani as'abageni ; naki as'enchera eye abande mbaroisetie amalaika batabamanyeti .
58013003	Bainyore abasibetwe buna mwasiberanigwe amo nabarabwo ; barabwo bakoreretwe amabe , ekiagera inwe more as'omobere .
58013004	Enyangi esikwe nabanto bonsi , nebirarero bibe ebichenu ; naki abanyaka nabatomani Nyasaye nabanachere ekina .
58013005	Timoba nengecho y'ogwancha enibo ; mobe nogoisanerigwa nebinto more nabio ; naki ere omonyene otebire , Tingokoremera nonya ng'ake , gose tingogotiga nonya ng'ake .
58013006	Goika twachaka goteba nomoyo omoremu , Omonene nere orankonye ; tinkwoboa : Mwanyabanto inki arankorere ?
58013007	Bainyore baria bare nokobua igoro asemore , ababatebetie ring'ana ria Nyasaye ; naende , korengereria mono omoerio bw'obogima bwabo , ega okwegena kwabo ,
58013008	Yesu Kristo , igoro , na rero , nere oria goika kare nakare .
58013009	Timoirwa nokworokereria kore nechingecho chinde chinde , nokogeni : naki mbuya omoyo obekwe chinguru as'obuya , gose tari as'endagera , as'ero barabwo abagendete nero tiyabanyorerete kogwenera konde .
58013010	Ntore namathabau aria baria bagokorera eema tibari neribaga koria ebinto biaye .
58013011	Naki ching'iti chiria amanyinga abo akorentwa ime aachenu nomokuani omonene as'engecho y'ebibe , emebere yabo yasamberwa isiko as'omochie .
58013012	As'engecho eye Yesu nere , erinde abasibie abanto baye as'amanyinga aye omonyene , agachanderwa as'egesieri isiko .
58013013	Gaki togende asare isiko as'omochie , tobogorie nemerumi yaye .
58013014	Ekiagera aiga titori nomochie oranyare goikaransa , korende toyorigie oria orache .
58013015	Gaki tomoe Nyasaye ekeng'wanso gi'okomotogia botambe ; engecho yaye , amatunda emenwa y'abanto bakoorokia erieta riaye .
58013016	Korende timweba gokora amaya nogokonyana nabanto ; naki ebing'wanso buna ebi nabio bikomogwenera Nyasaye .
58013017	Baigwere abwo bare nokobua igoro yaino , nakweororobia asebare , naki barabwo iga bakorenda as'engecho y'emioyo yaino , buna abanto baranyare korua okobara ; erinde bakore igo as'omogoko gose tari as'okweumia ; naki anga tiyabagwenerete inwe .
58013018	Tosabere : naki rwanchire ng'a ntore nebirengererio ebiya , gatorarigie koba norogendo oruya as'amang'ana onsi .
58013019	Nainche nabasoroire mono kobua gokora ayio erinde ng'iranigwe asemore bwango .
58013020	Bono , Nyasaye bw'omorembe oyomoretete naende korwa as'amakweri , omorisia bwe ching'ondi ore omonene , as'amanyinga emuma ya kare nakare , Omonene oito Yesu .
58013021	Abakore mobe abaikeranu ase ker'ogokora okuya , monyare kobokora obwanchani bwaye , nere ogokora ime yaito erigwenerete as'obosio bwaye , ase Yesu Kristo ; obonene mbore nere kare nakare . Amin .
58013022	Nabasoroire , abaminto , riremererie ring'ana eri rinyene ogosorora : naki nabarikeire as'amang'ana amake .
58013023	Manya ng'a oyominto Timotheo otiekire gosiborwa ; amo nere nimbarore , karache bwango .
58013024	Bakwanie bonsi abwo babatang'aine , nabachenu bonsi . Abwo b'Italia babakwanirie .
58013025	Obuya bobe nainwe imwensi . Amin .
59001001	Yakobo , omosomba o Nyasaye , n'Omonene Yesu Kristo , as'ebisaku ikomi nabibere Ebiatananegete , ogokwania .
59001002	Kara ng'a nomogoko bwoka , abaminto , komoragwe as'ogotemwa kore ao , ao ;
59001003	momanye ng'a ogotemwa okwegena kwaino igagokoreta okoremereria .
59001004	Nokwo okoremereria nakobe nemeremo eikeranete , monyare koba abaikeranu , naende abagima , motaremeiri egento .
59001005	Korende omonto oino kararemerwe chisemi , asabe ase Nyasaye , oyokobaa abanto bonsi as'obonge gose tari gotogonya ; oyio naegwe .
59001006	Korende asabe as'okwegena , atari nogosiereria konde : naki omonyene ogosiereria igare buna emerindo y'enyancha ekoirwa nomwaga , nakoirwa gochia aria naria .
59001007	Naki omonto oria takaga nanyore egento as'Omonene ;
59001008	omonto ore nemioyo ebere , igagotiting'ara ase chinchera chiaye chionsi .
59001009	Korende oyominto otari nobonene agoke as'okoimokererigwa kwaye :
59001010	nomonda ekiagera nairanigwe inse : ekiagera buna egesicha ki'obonyansi naete .
59001011	Naki erioba rikooroka nomwaga ogosamba bwomia obonyansi ; egesicha kiaye kiaroroka , obuya bw'ekieni kiaye bwasira : naboigo nere omonda arasire ase chinchera chiaye .
59001012	Nare negesio oyoraremererie ogotemwa : naki gatiekire gotemwa , nanyore egutwa y'obogima , Omonene abarierete eira abamwanchete .
59001013	Omonto gagotemwa , tateba , natemirwe na Nyasaye : naki Nyasaye takonyara gotemwa namabe , gose ere omonyene tagotema omonto .
59001014	Korende ker'omonto igagotemwa ekero ang'usirwe nokong'ainwa , nebirengererio biaye omonyene .
59001015	Nakoria okorengereria gokwabogoirie oborito bwaibora ebibe ; na biria ebibe bigokina , biareta amakweri .
59001016	Timong'ainwa , abaminto bane abanchani .
59001017	Ker'ekerugwa ekiya , nakera egekorugwa geikeranete , iga gekorwa igoro , geika korwa ase Tata bw'emebaso , asare tikori koonchoka , gose ekiriri kende gekoonchokaonchoka .
59001018	Agancha agatoibora intwe ase ring'ana ri'ekeene , tobe buna ogotongorwa kw'ebitongwa biaye ,
59001019	Abaminto nyanchete mono , momanye ring'ana eri , Ker'omonto abe omwango bw'okoigwa , o ng'ora as'ogokwana , o ng'ora as'endamwamu :
59001020	naki endamwamu ya mwanyabanto terigokora emeremo y'oboronge bwa Nyasaye .
59001021	As'ayio beka are eubi yonsi nobonge bw'amabe , bwata as'obwororo ring'ana riasimekirwe , eriranyare gokonya emioyo yaino .
59001022	Mobe abakori be ring'ana , tari abakoigwa boka , mokweng'aina abanyene .
59001023	Naki omonto karabe omoigwa bwe ring'ana rioka , gose tari omokori , omonto oyo igare buna omonto okwerigereria obosio bwaye omonyene as'ekerore .
59001024	Naki igakwerigereria , naende ogenda as'agochia , erio kegima bweba buna arenge .
59001025	Korende oyorarigererie amachiko amaikeranu , ay'ogosiborwa , nagoikaransa aroro , taba omoigwa omwebi , korende omokori emeremo , oyio nabe negesio as'ogokora kwaye .
59001026	Omonto karakage nare nedini , nere tatangeti oromeme rwaye as'ekeokio , korende bweng'aina enkoro yaye , edini yaye omonto oria tegwenereti .
59001027	Edini ere enchenu , etari neubi as'obosio bwa Nyasaye Tata neye , okobachiera chintakana nababoraka as'emechando yabo , nakwerenda atari nekemoa as'ense .
59002001	Abaminto bane , timoba nokwegena kw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , Omonene bw'obonene , as'ogwanchereria abanto .
59002002	Naki karasoe as'omosangererekano oino omonto omonyene ebonyi y'ethahabu nechianga chingiya , nakarasoe omotaka ore nechianga chimbe ;
59002003	nainwe mwamosika oria bweboetie chianga chingiya , nakomotebia , Ikaransa aye aiga aas'aaya ; nakomotebia oria omotaka , Tenena aye aria , gose ikaransa aa amagoro ane ,
59002004	inee , timori gokora ogwanchereria as'emioyo yaino , naende mwabaire abagambi abanyene okorengereria okobe ?
59002005	Igwa , abaminto abanchani bane ; Nyasaye tabachoreti abataka b'ense babe abanda b'okwegena , nabanyamwando b'obonda as'abwo abarierete eira abamwanchete ?
59002006	Korende inwe mwamosareirie ogosika oria omotaka . Inee , abwo abanda tibabaregeti inwe nakobang'usa goika obosio bw'ebirogo b'ekina ?
59002007	Inee , tibari korirama erieta riria rigiya mwarangererigwe ?
59002008	Korende mogoikerania amachiko ay'obonda buna arikire , Mwanche omogisangi ' oo buna bwanchete omobere oo , mwakora buya :
59002009	korende komorabe nogwanchereria abanto , mwakorire ebibe , nagokanerwa namachiko ng'a nabasaria .
59002010	Naki omonto bwonsi oyoranyare kobwata amachiko onsi , amo nayio , karagochwe ase ring'ana erimo , omochire igoro as'onsi .
59002011	Naki ere oyotebete , Totomana , agateba , Toita , naende . Gaki kerabe totomaneti , korende gwaitire , kwabaire omosaria bw'amachiko .
59002012	Kwana bo , nakora boigo , buna abanto barache kogambigwa as'enchera y'amachiko atasibiri .
59002013	Naki ekina tikeri namabera as'ere oyotari namabera : namabera igagwetogia igoro as'ekina .
59002014	Nokogwenera ki , baminto , omonto karatebe nare nokwegena , nere tari nogokora ? Inee , koria okwegena nakonyare komokonya ?
59002015	Kerabe oyominto omosacha gose omokungu ore bosa , oremeirwe endagera emoisanete ,
59002016	nomonto oyomo oino amotebie , Gejida as'omorembe , mwote omorero nakoigota ; korende tabaa ebibaremeirwe as'omobere , nagwenere ki ?
59002017	Naboigo nokwegena , gotari nogokora , gwakure okonyene .
59002018	Korende omonto natebe , Aye nore nokwegena , nainche ninde nogokora : nyorokia okwegena kwao nainche ninkworokie okwegena kwane as'ogokora kwane .
59002019	Aye gwanchire ng'a Nyasaye noyomo ; gwakorire buya : ebirecha nabirobio bianchire nokoiguswa .
59002020	Korende norigetie komanya , aye omwana o mwanyabanto otari gento , ng'a okwegena gotari nogokora nokogomba ?
59002021	Inee , tata oito Ibrahimu tabaretwe ng'a nomonyene oboronge as'ogokora , agwo ekero amoruete Isaaka omwana oye igoro as'amathabau ?
59002022	Mwarorire ng'a okwegena ngwakorete emeremo amo nogokora kwaye , nokwegena koria gogaikeranigwa as'ogokora koria .
59002023	Amariko aria agaikeranigwa aregoteba , Ibrahimu igegenete Nyasaye , ekabarwa asare okoba noboronge : nere akarokwa omosani o Nyasaye .
59002024	Mwarorire ng'a Omwana-o-mwanyabanto iga akobarwa ng'a nomonyene oboronge as'ogokora kwaye , tari as'okwegena gwoka .
59002025	Na Rahab , oria omotayayi nere , inee , tabaretwe ng'a nomonyene oboronge as'ogokora , ekero abaroisetie abatomwa , akabasokia isiko as'enchera ende ?
59002026	Naki buna ore omobere otari nomoika okure , naboigo nokwegena gotari nogokora gwakure .
59003001	Timoba aborokia abange , baminto , momanye ng'a natonyore ekina ekenene kobua .
59003002	Naki tokwegocha intwe twensi as'amang'ana amange . Omonto otegocheti as'ogokwana , oyio nomonto omoikeranu , oranyare gotanga nomobere oye bwonsi buna as'ekeokio .
59003003	Rigereria , twabekire ebiokio as'emenwa ye chibarasi , erinde chitoigwere , naende togoonchora emebere yabo yonsi .
59003004	Yarigererie amato , nonya are amanene naki , nakoirwa nomwaga omotindi , aonchorwa nekeonchori egeke mono , onsi arengereretie kogenda oria omoiri .
59003005	Naboigo oromeme narororwo nekimo egeke , narororwo rwetogia as'amang'ana amanene . Rigereria buna omorero omoke ogosamba chinko chinyinge mono .
59003006	Noruo oromeme nomorero , ense y'obobe . Naro amang'ana oromeme as'ebimo biaito , igarokobeka ebimoa omobere bwonsi , nagotongia omorero goetanana egesingo ki'ogotongwa , nachirochio chiatongigwa omorero bwe chanaam .
59003007	Naki ker'ebisaku bie ching'iti , nebie chinyoni , nebie ching'iti chikwagura , nebi'ebinto bire enyancha ime , igabigotugeka , nabirobio bianyarire gotugwa na mwanyabanto .
59003008	Korende oromeme tari mwanyabanto oranyare korotuga ; nobobe botagokira , boichire obosongo bokoreta amakweri .
59003009	As'oruo twamosesenia Nyasaye Tata oito ; nas'oruo twabaragereria mwanyabanto bakoretwe as'omogwekano o Nyasaye :
59003010	as'omonwa oria oria orua ebisio nokoragereria . Baminto amang'ana aya tagwenereti koba igo .
59003011	Inee , ensoko as'entuboka eyemo nerete amache amaya namache amaroro ?
59003012	Baminto , omoko nonyare kwama amazeituni , gose omosabibu amako ? Nabo oroche tirokonyara koreta amache ay'omonyo namache amaya .
59003013	Ning'o ore nobong'aini nokoinyora asemore ? naorokie emeremo yaye as'orogendo rwaye oruya , as'obwororo bw'obong'aini .
59003014	Korende , komorabe neribero abanyene obotindi neriomana emioyo yaino timwetogia , gose timokwana oborimo igoro y'ekeene .
59003015	Obong'aini obo tari boria bogocha korwa igoro , korende nobw'ense , naende nobwe chingecho chia mwanyabanto , nechia ebirecha .
59003016	Naki agwo ribero rire , nokoamererania , nao eriomana rire , na ker'ogokora kw'obosoku ,
59003017	Korende obong'aini bokorua igoro , ritang'ani nobochenu , naende nobw'omorembe , nobwororo , bore ang'e koigwa amang'ana abanto , igoboichire namabera namatunda amaya , atari neriomana gose obong'ainereria .
59003018	Amatunda ay'oboronge igagosimekwa as'omorembe ase baria bagokora omorembe .
59004001	Esegi nokorwana ere gati yaino ng'ai ekorua ? tari aroro as'okorengereria kwaino gogokora esegi as'ebimo biaino ?
59004002	Morengereria , ko timori nagento ; moita , nagokora ribero , natimokonyara konyora . Mokora esegi nakorwana , korende timori nagento ekiagera timori gosaba .
59004003	Ngosabamore ko timorikonyora , ekiagera iga mogosaba bobe , erinde mobikorere as'okorengereria kwaino .
59004004	Inwe abatomani abasacha nabakungu , timomanyeti ng'a obosani bw'ense nobobisa ase Nyasaye ? Gaki oyorigetie koba omosani bw'ense bwekorire koba omobisa o Nyasaye .
59004005	Gose iga mogokaga ng'a amariko igagoteba bosa ? Omoika oikaransete ime yaito igokorengereria ekerengo gi'okorora ribero ?
59004006	Korende otoire intwe obuya obonge kobua . As'ayio otebire , Nyasaye igagotanga abagwekinia , korende abaa obuya abaitongo .
59004007	Gaki mwebeke inse ase Nyasaye ; mwange Saitani , nere nabatame .
59004008	Moike ang'e Nyasaye , nere nabaike ang'e nainwe . Esibie amaboko aino , inwe abanyene ebibe ; chisibie chinkoro chiaino , inwe abanyene emioyo ebere .
59004009	Eichanie , nakweng'ereria , nakorera . Ogoseka kwaino goonchorwe kobe okweng'ereria , nomogoko oino koba ogoichana .
59004010	Ekanye abanyene as'obosio bw'Omonene , nere nabaimokereria igoro .
59004011	Timong'achana baminto : oyokong'acha oyomwabo , gose komogambia oyomwabo . igakong'acha amachiko nakogambia amachiko . Korende ekero oragambie amachiko , tori omokori amachiko , korende omogambia .
59004012	Omorusia amachiko nomogambia noyomo bweka , oranyare gokonya nagosiria : naye ng'o okomogambia omogisangi'oo ?
59004013	Gaki , inwe bono abwo mogoteba , Rero gose ankio natosoe omochie gete nagoikaransa aroro omwaka omogima , nagokora ogoonchoreria nakonyora ebitoki :
59004014	nainwe timomanyeti ayarabe ankio . Obogima bwaino ninki ? Naki inwe neritaturi rikororekana as'egeka , naende riasira .
59004015	Naki mogwenerete goteba , Omonene karanche , natobe moyo , nagokora iga , gose iga .
59004016	Korende bono iga mogwetogia as'oboenenu bwaino : ogwetogia gwonsi konga buna oko nokobe ,
59004017	Nabo ere oyomanyete gokora amaya , ko tayakora , asare oyo nebibe .
59005001	Gaki bono inwe , abanda , rera nakoaka egeturi , ekiagera emechando yaino yabacheire .
59005002	chinibo chiaino chiagundire , nechianga chiaino chiarirwe nobobosu ,
59005003	chithahabu chiaino ne chifetha chiaino chiasoirwe nobobosu ; nobobosu bwaye bwabaire kirori asemore , naborobwo naborie emebere yaino buna omorero . Mwegacheire emonga as'amatuko ay'omoerio .
59005004	Rigereria , eng'eria y'abaremi bagesire emegondo yaino , yatangirwe nainwe as'okoura , yaakire eriogi : nebirero biabo abagesete biasoire amato Omonene o Sabaothu .
59005005	Mwarire ebio omogoko as'ense , nakwegokia as'okorengereria ; mwerageirie chinkoro chiaino buna rituko ri'okonyenya .
59005006	Mwamogambire omonyene oboronge nakomoita : nere taamereranetie nainwe .
59005007	Nabo remereria , abaminto , goika ogocha kwaye Omonene . Morigererie omoremi , igakoganya okwama gw'ense okore kwe rigori , aremereria as'engecho yaye goika anyore embura ye ritang'ani ney'omoerio ,
59005008	Nabo , nainwe remereria ; kong'ia chinkoro chiaino , naki ogocha kwaye Omonene kwabaire ang'e .
59005009	Timwemurungananerania , baminto , timocha kogambigwa . Rigereria omogambi otenenire obosio bw'egesieri .
59005010	Bwatia ababani abaminto , abakwanete as'erieta ri'Omonene babe omoreng'anio bw'okoremereria obobe , noboremereria .
59005011	Rigereria , twabarokire abanyene egesio abwo bakoremereria . Mwaigure amang'ana okoremereria kw'Ayubu , mwarorire omoerio bw'Omonene , ng'a Omonene nomonyene amabebe amange namabera .
59005012	Korende kobua onsi , abaminto , timoria emuma ende yonsi , as'igoro gose as'ense ; korende ee yaino ebe ee , na yaya yaino ebe yaya ; timocha kogwa inse as'ekina .
59005013	Omonto oino karanyorekane nemechando tiga asabe . Onde oino nare nomoyo bw'ogosasoka ? tiga atere ogotera .
59005014	Omonto oino obaire omorwaire ? arangerie abagaka b'ekanisa bamosabere , bainoake amaguta as'erieta ri'Omonene :
59005015	na koria ogosaba gw'okwegena nakomokonye omorwaire oria , n'Omonene namotenenie ; onye okorire ebibe , naberwe .
59005016	Orokia ebibe biaino inwe as'inwe , nagosaberana , monyore ogokonywa . Ogosaba kwaye omonyene oboronge nkogwenerete mono , karasabe nomokia .
59005017	Elija igarenge omonto omonyene chingecho echimo naintwe , agasaba nomokia embura tetwa : nembura tiyatwa igoro y'ense egeka ki'emiaka etato nemetienyi etano nomo .
59005018	Agasaba naende , igoro ekareta embura , ense ekama amatunda aye .
59005019	Baminto , kerabe omonto oino karasire nagotiga keria ekeene , nomonto onde amoiranie ;
59005020	amanye ng'a ere omoiranirie omonyene ebibe , arwe as'enchera y'ogosira , nakonye omoyo oye omonto oria korwa as'amakweri , nagotuba obonge bw'ebibe .
60001001	Petero , omotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'abachore b'Ogwatananeka , baikaransete abageni ase Ponto , Galatia , Kappadokia , Asia na Bithunia ,
60001002	buna Nyasaye atang'anire kobamanya korwa kare as'ogwesibia kw'Omoika , goika okoigwera na konyororokerigwa amanyinga a Yesu Kristo : Obuya nomorembe bimenteke asemore .
60001003	Nabakwe Nyasaye Tata bw'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , ere as'amabera aye amange , agatoibora eria kabere tonyore ogosemeria okonyene obogima as'okobokigwa kwaye Yesu Kristo ,
60001004	tonyore omwando otagosareka , otari neubi , otari gosira , ogachire igoro as'engecho yaino ,
60001005	abwo morendire nechinguru chia Nyasaye as'enchera y'okwegena monyore ogotoreka kore ang'e koorokigwa ekero ki'omoerio .
60001006	Mwagokire mono as'engecho yaye , nonya bono as'ekero egeke , onye negwenerete , moichanigwe as'ogotemwa chingecho chire ao ao ,
60001007	erinde ogotemwa gw'okwegena kwaino , kore nerigori rinene kobua ethahabu egosira , nonya egotemwa as'omorero , erorekane koba as'ogotogigwa nobonene nogosikwa , as'okoorokigwa kwaye Yesu Kristo ;
60001008	ere mwamwanchire , nonya timoramorora ; ere nonya timomorochi bono , mwamwegenire , nakogoka mono as'omogoko otarigotebeka oichire nobonene :
60001009	mokonyora omoerio bw'okwegena kwaino , ogotoreka kw'emioyo yaino .
60001010	As'amang'ana ogotoreka okwo bakarigiarigia nakounaunia ababani babanete amang'ana ay'obuya boranyare kobachera :
60001011	bakorigia nkero ki , naende nkero buna kereki kiaorokigwe n'Omoika o Kristo orenge ime yabo , otang'anete koyiatora emechando eramonyore Kristo , nobonene borache koba nyuma as'ayio .
60001012	Baigoreretwe tari as'engecho yabo abanyene , korende as'engecho yaino , barenge gokora as'amang'ana ayio , ayio bono akorandigwa asemore nabaria babaranderetie inwe enchili as'Omoika Omochenu otometwe korwa igoro ; amang'ana ayio amalaika mbarengereretie koyarigereria .
60001013	As'ayio eboe ebinema bi'ebirengererio biaino , mobe nobong'aini , as'oboikeranu kobosemeria boria obuya morareterwe as'okomanoka kwaye Yesu Kristo .
60001014	Buna abana b'okoigwera timwereng'ania nokorengereria kwaino kwe ritang'ani , kw'oboriri bwaino :
60001015	korende buna ere oyobarangeirie are omochenu , inwe nainwe mobe abachenu as'orogendo rwaino rwonsi ;
60001016	ekiagera nerikire , Namobe abachenu ; naki inche nomochenu .
60001017	Na kerabe mokomoroka Tata , ere oragambie ker'omonto atari nogwanchereria , as'ekerengo ki'emeremo yaye , genda nokoiroka as'ekero kiaino gi'ogoikaransa aiga buna abageni ;
60001018	momanye ng'a timogoriri as'ebimo bigosareka , ase chifetha gose chithahabu , monyare korua as'orogendo rwaino rotagwenereti mwanyorete as'abaiso baino ;
60001019	korende as'amanyinga aye rigori , buna ay'emanwa y'eng'ondi etari nobobe , etari nabimoa , amanyinga a Kristo :
60001020	omanyekanete korwa kare , ritang'ani ense etarabekwa oboroso ; korende akaigorerwa omoerio bw'ekero as'engecho yaino ,
60001021	ere as'ere mwamwanchire Nyasaye , omobogetie korwa as'amakweri , akamoa obonene ; erinde okwegena kwaino nogosemeria kwaino kobe ase Nyasaye .
60001022	Komwaikire gwesibia emioyo yaino as'okoigwera keria ekeene , koboikera obwanchani bw'abamino botari nokong'ainereria , gaki anchana bono korwa as'enkoro :
60001023	ekiagera mwaiboirwe eria kabere , tari as'embusuro egosareka , korende eyetari gosareka , ase ring'ana ria Nyasaye rinyene obogima , na rikobao goika kare nakare .
60001024	Naki , Omobere bwonsi buna obonyansi , Nobonene bwaye bwonsi buna egesicha ki'obonyansi . Obonyansi igabokwoma negesicha kiaye kegwa ;
60001025	Korende Ring'ana ri'Omonene iga rikobao goika kare nakare . Nering'ana erio nering'ana rigiya riarandetigwe asemore .
60002001	Gaki komorabeke are obobe bwonsi nokong'aina gwonsi , nobong'ainereria bwonsi , nemoko , nogokwana okobe gwonsi ,
60002002	buna abana abake , baiboirwe bono yarengererie amabere aria ay'obong'aini atari nobong'ainereria , erinde as'ayio monyare gokina naro goika as'ogotoreka ;
60002003	kerabe onye mwatemire ng'a Omonene nomonyene amaya :
60002004	komoramochiere ere , rigena rire moyo , riangetwe na mwanyabanto , korende ase Nyasaye nerichore , rire nerigori ,
60002005	nainwe nabo , buna amagena ayare moyo , mwaagachirwe mobe enyomba y'Omoika , obokuani obochenu , morue ebing'wanso bi'omoika , biranyore ogwancherwa ase Nyasaye ase Yesu Kristo .
60002006	Ekiagera naro are ime as'amariko , Rigereria , nabekire ase Zayoni rigena rinene ri'ekoiia , richore , rire nerigori : Na ker'oyoramwanche takonyara gosokigwa .
60002007	Naki rigori eri asemore inwe abamwanchire , korende as'abwo abatancheti , Rigena bangete abaagachi . Riabaire rigena rinene ri'ekona ;
60002008	Naende , Rigena ri'okogocha okogoro , negetare gi'okoiyeria ; naki begocha ase ring'ana riria , ekiagera tibakorigwera : nabarabwo igababegetwe banyore ayio .
60002009	Korende inwe nabaiborwa abachore , obokuani bw'oboruoti , egesaku egechenu , abanto b'obogambi bwa Nyasaye , monyare gotaria amaya aye oyobarangeretie morue omosunte , mosoe as'amasase aye ay'ogokumia :
60002010	inwe mwarenge ritang'ani tari egesaku , korende bono negesaku kia Nyasaye : igamwarenge timwanyorete amabera , korende bono mwanyorire amabera .
60002011	Abanchani , nabasoroire inwe buna abaei i nubageni , eatanane nokorengereria kw'omobere gokorwana nomoyo ;
60002012	mobe nechingecho chingiya egati y'Ebisaku , erinde nonya bakobang'acha ng'a iga mogokora amabe , banyare korora ogokora kwaino okuya , bamotogie Nyasaye rituko ri'ogocha kobarora .
60002013	Mwebeke inse ase ker'egiachikirwe nabanto , as'engecho y'Omonene : onye nomoruoti , buna omonene ;
60002014	onye abanene , buna batomirwe nere okobaakania egesiomba abakori amabe nakobatogia abakori amaya ;
60002015	naki nabwo obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , as'ogokora amaya mosieke emenwa y'oboriri bw'abanto abakayayu :
60002016	buna abasibore , nabatari gokorera obosibore as'ogotuba obobe , korende buna abasomba ba Nyasaye .
60002017	Basike abanto bonsi . Ancha abamino . Mosike Nyasaye . Moe ogosika omoruoti .
60002018	Inwe abasomba , baigwere abanene baino as'okoiroka gwonsi ; tari as'abwo bare abaya nabanyene obwororo boka , korende nabwo abare abatindi .
60002019	Naki obo nabwo obuya mono omonto kararemererie ogoichana as'okomoinyora Nyasaye , ogochandwa gotari kwa boronge .
60002020	Naki ngotogigwa ki koremereria , komogokora ebibe nakoakwa chindoe ? korende koremereria , komogokora amaya nakonyora emechando obo nabwo obuya obonene as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
60002021	Naki naro mwarangereretigwe : ekiagera Kristo nere igachandetwe as'engecho yaino , obatigeire omogwekano , motunye chimbaratero chiaye :
60002022	ere takorete ebibe , gose obong'ainereria tibwarorekanete omonwa oye ;
60002023	ere , gakoramwa , tairanetie okorama ; gachandetwe , tatianete ; korende akebeka asare ere oyokogamba as'oboronge :
60002024	ere omonyene akabogoria ebibe biaito as'omobere oye igoro as'omote , erinde , gatwakure as'amang'ana ay'ebibe , tobe moyo as'amang'ana ay'oboronge ; as'okoakwa kwaye mwagwenigwe .
60002025	Naki iga mware buna ching'ondi chiasirire ; korende bono mwairanire as'Omorisia n'Omoaskofu bw'emioyo yaino .
60003001	Naboigo , inwe abakungu , mwebeke inse as'okobaigwera abasacha baino ; erinde onye , abande mbare aroro abataigwereti riria ring'ana , banyorekane as'orogendo rw'abakungu babo , batari nering'ana riria ;
60003002	bakorora orogendo rwaino orore oruya , orore nokoiroka .
60003003	Okweboa kwabo , tikoba okweboa gw'isiko , as'okomina chitukia , nakobeka ebinto bie chithahabu , nakweboa chianga ;
60003004	korende as'omonto bw'enkoro otari kororekana , as'okweboa okwo gotarigosareka ; nomoika bw'obwororo nobokanyeku obore rigori rinene as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
60003005	Naki okwo nakwo okweboa kw'abakungu abachenu ba kare , abamosemeretie Nyasaye , bakobakorera abasacha babo ;
60003006	buna Sara amoigwerete Ibrahimu , akamoroka omonene : nainwe nabana baye komogokora amaya , gose timokoirokigwa as'ogoichana konde gwonsi .
60003007	Nainwe abasacha boigo , ikaransa nabakungu baino ase chisemi ; mokomoa omokungu ogosika buna egento getari nechinguru , na buna abanyamwando amo nobuya bw'obogima ; erinde ogosaba kwaino tigotangwa .
60003008	Ring'ana ri'omoerio neri ; mobe nomoyo oyomo , abakororerana amabera , gwanchana buna abamwabo , abare nemioyo y'amabera , abanyene obokanyeku :
60003009	abanto batari koakanana amabe as'amabe , gose okorama as'okorama ; korende abagosesenia ; ekiagera naro mwarangererigwe ng'a monyore omwando bw'ebisio .
60003010	Naki , Oyorigetie gwancha obogima , Nakorora amatuko amaya , Arotange oromeme rwaye takwana amabe , Nebikoba biaye tibikwana obong'ainereria :
60003011	Atige amabe , akore amaya ; Arigie omorembe , ayotunye mono .
60003012	Naki amaiso Omonene igare igoro as'abanyene oboronge , Namato aye igakoigwa ogosaba kwabo : Korende obosio bw'Omonene igabore igoro as'abwo abagokora amabe .
60003013	Nere ning'o orabakorere amabe , komorabe nomokia as'ayare amaya ?
60003014	Korende komorachandwe as'engecho y'oboronge , more negesio : timoiroka okoirokia kwabo , gose timoichana ;
60003015	korende mosibie Kristo Omonene ase chinkoro chiaino ; mobe ang'e amatuko onsi komoiraneria ker'omonto okobaboria amang'ana ay'ogosemeria kore ime yaino , as'obwororo nas'okoiroka ;
60003016	komorabe nokorengereria okuya , mwang'achirwe ng'a nabakori amabe , erinde basokigwe baria bakorama orogendo rwaino oruya ase Kristo .
60003017	Naki mbuya gochandwa as'ogokora amaya , kaborabe nabwo obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , kobua as'ogokora amabe .
60003018	Ekiagera Kristo nere agachandwa ara rimo as'engecho y'ebibe , omonyene oboronge , as'engecho y'abwo batan ba boronge , erinde atorete ase Nyasaye ; omobere oye ogaitwa , korende ogakorwa moyo as'omoika .
60003019	As'ayio agachiera emeika yaikaransete as'ebisibo ,
60003020	akabaranderia abanto bataigwerete agwo kare , okoremereria kwa Nyasaye kwaganyete amatuko a Nuhu , ekero obwato bwarenge korosigwa , ime yaye abanto abake , engecho yaye , abanto batano nabatato bakonyegete as'amache .
60003021	Omogwekano bw'amang'ana aya nebatiso , erabakonye nainwe amatuko aya ; tari okobeka are eubi y'omobere , korende okoiraneria kw'ebirengererio bire ebiya obosio bwa Nyasaye , as'okoboka kwaye Yesu Kristo ;
60003022	oyore okoboko gw'okorio kwa Nyasaye , ochire igoro ; amalaika nokobua nechinguru biaigwerigwe inse asare .
60004001	Nabo ekiagera Kristo achandetwe as'omobere oye , nainwe naboigo eboyie omoyo oria oria buna ebinto bi'esegi ; naki ere ochandirwe as'omobere , otiganire nebibe ,
60004002	korwa bono titogenderera as'okoba moyo as'okorengereria kwa mwanyabanto , korende as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , ekero giaito ki'ogoikaransa aiga ense getigarete .
60004003	Naki ekero ki'obogima bwaito giaetire bwaisanire as'ogokora ayabianchete Ebisaku , okogenda ase chingecho chi'omobere , nokorengereria , nokonywa , nemeyega y'okoria bobe , nogotinda , nogosaba chisanamu chitari chia boronge :
60004004	as'ayio barabwo bakorora ng'a nogokumia as'inwe motari kogenda amo nabarabwo bwango goika as'obokayayu botari nekerengo , bakobarama :
60004005	baranyare korusia okobara asare ere oyore ang'e kobagambia abare moyo nabakure .
60004006	Naki as'engecho y'ayio nabarabwo abakure mbaranderetigwe enchili , erinde bagambigwe as'omobere koreng'ana buna mwanyabanto ; babe moyo as'omoika as'okomoigwera Nyasaye .
60004007	Omoerio bw'amang'ana onsi oikire : nabo , kabe nobong'aini , morende as'ogosaba :
60004008	kobua as'onsi mobe nomokia as'ogwanchana , naki obwanchani igabokobisia obonge bw'ebibe :
60004009	mobe abaroisania inwe as'inwe , motari nokwemurungania :
60004010	kera oyomo koreng'ana as'ekerengo anyorire , gekorere as'ogokorerana ; buna abarendi abaya b'obuya bwa Nyasaye bore chingecho chinyinge .
60004011	Omonto karakwane , nakwane buna amachiko a Nyasaye ; omonto karakorere nakore ase chinguru aeirwe na Nyasaye : erinde Nyasaye atogigwe as'amang'ana onsi ase Yesu Kristo , obonene nokobua nobwaye goika kare nakare . Amin .
60004012	Abanchani , timorora ng'a nogokumia eria emechando yabanyorire buna omorero ng'a niotemwe , onye gose negento ekegeni kiabanyorire :
60004013	korende buna mwahwatanete nemechando ya Kristo goka ; erinde as'okomanoka kw'obonene bwaye mogoke as'ogosasoka .
60004014	Komorachaywe as'engecho y'erieta ria Kristo more negesio ; ekiagera Omoika bw'obonene , noyo Nyasaye igoikaransete igoro yaino ; as'abwo akoramwa , korende as'inwe abakwe .
60004015	Naki oyomo oino tachandwa buna omoiti , gose omoibi , gose omokori amabe , gose buna omonto okwerosia namang'ana ay'abanto bande .
60004016	Korende kerabe omonto ogochandwa as'engecho y'Obokristo , tarora obosoku ; korende amobake Nyasaye as'erieta eri .
60004017	Naki ekero giaikire ekina gechakere enyomba ya Nyasaye ; na gokerachake asetore , ninki omoerio obo abwo batayeigwereti enchili ya Nyasaye ?
60004018	N'omonyene oboronge karakonyeke as'emechando , oria otamoirogeti Nyasaye nomonyene ebibe ng'ai ararorekane ?
60004019	Nabo abwo bagochandwa buna Nyasaye anchete bamobekere emeika yabo egachwe asare , as'ogokora amaya , buna as'Omotongi omwegeni .
60005001	Nabasoroire abagaka bare asemore , inche inde omogaka omogisangi obo , na kirori bw'ogochandwa kwa Kristo , nomobwatani bw'obonene borache koigorerwa naende :
60005002	ririsie riicho ria Kristo rire asemore , na koritenenera , tari as'okobetererigwa , korende as'ogwancha ; buna ase Nyasaye ; tari as'okorigia chifetha chi'obosoku , korende nas'omoyo bw'ogwancha ;
60005003	tari gwekora abanene igoro as'abwo mwaetwe , korende as'ogwekora omogwekano ase riria riicho .
60005004	N'Omorisia omonene karaoroke namonyore egutwa y'obonene eria etari gosareka .
60005005	Naboigo abake baigwere abagaka . Nabo imwensi eboe oboitongo buna orokini , monyare gokorerana : naki Nyasaye igakoamererania nabanyene oboenenu , nakobaa abaitongo obuya .
60005006	Nabo ebeke inse as'okoboko kwa Nyasaye okore ogokong'u , nabaimokererie igoro as'ekero kiaye ;
60005007	mokomotweka emechando yaino yonsi , naki ere igakwerosia mono as'engecho yaino .
60005008	Kabe nobong'aini bw'okwerira , renda , ekiagera omobasoeri oino saitani , buna esibwori ekoruma , egoetanana tanana , ekorigia omonto emorie ;
60005009	mwange , mobe abakong'u as'okwegena , momanye ng'a ogochandwa koria koria gwaikeranigwe as'abamino abare as'ense .
60005010	Na Nyasaye bw'obuya bwonsi obarangeirie mosoe obonene bwaye bwa kare nakare ase Kristo , komwatiekire gochandwa as'ekero egeke , ere omonyene nabaroisie , nabaikeranie , ababeke chinguru .
60005011	Okobua nokwaye ere goika kare nakare . Amin .
60005012	As'okoboko kwa Silivano , oyominto omwegeni buna ndoche , nabarikeire as'amang'ana amake , koborokereria nagoteba ng'a obo nabwo obuya bw'ekeene kia Nyasaye : tenena bokong'u as'ekio .
60005013	Ere ( ekanisa ) enchore , omogisangi oino ore ase Babel , obakwanirie , na Mariko omwana one .
60005014	Kwanania as'okonyunyuntana kw'obwanchani . Omorembe obe asemore mwensi , ase Kristo Yesu .
61001001	Simon Petero , omosomba nomotomwa o Yesu Kristo , as'abwo banyorete okwegena okomo naintwe , kore nerigori , as'oboronge bwa Nyasaye oito , n'Omokonyi oito Yesu Kristo .
61001002	Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe omentwe as'okomomanya Nyasaye na Yesu Omonene oito ;
61001003	ekiagera okobua kwa Nyasaye gwatoire ebinto bionsi ebinyene obogima nakoba nechingecho chia Nyasaye , as'okomomanya ere otorangeretie as'obonene bwaye nobuya bwaye omonyene ;
61001004	as'ayio twaeirwe chiira chinene mono chie rigori ; erinde as'echio monyare koba ababwatani be chingecho chia Nyasaye , komorakonywe nogosareka kore ense as'engecho y'okorengereria .
61001005	Ee , as'engecho eyio eyio inwe momentwe omokia omonge , as'okwegena kwaino lneiua ubuya , nas'obuya bwaino chisemi ;
61001006	nase chiseini chiaino okwerita ; nas'okwerita kwaino okoremereria ; nas'okoremereria kwaino nokoba nechingecho buna Nyasaye ;
61001007	nas'okoba nechingecho buna Nyasaye ogwanchana kw'abamino ; nas'ogwanchana kw'abamino , obwanchani .
61001008	Naki amang'ana ayio karabe ayaino nagoichora , nabakore inwe koba tari aboro gose tari abanto batari nokwama as'okomomanya Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
61001009	Naki ere oyotari naya nomouko , takonyara korora ebinto bire are , bwebire koria ogosibigwa ebibe biaye bia kare .
61001010	As'ayio baminto , kora omokia kobua gokora okorangerigwa kwaino nogochorwa kwaino kobe ogokong'u : naki komorakore ayio timokogochwa nonya ng'ake .
61001011	Naki iga narentwe asemore as'obonge mosoe obonda bwa kare bw'Omonene oito , Omokonyi Yesu Kristo .
61001012	As'ayio tinkomocha kobainyoria ayio amatuko onsi , nonya moyamanyete , nagoikeranigwa ase keria ekeene kiabaikeire .
61001013	Nainche narorire ng'a mboronge , ekero nde inche as'obomenyo obo , kobatura as'okobainyoria ;
61001014	nakomanya ng'a koria okobeka are obomenyo bwane gwachire bwango , buna Omonene oito Yesu Kristo anyorogetie boronge .
61001015	Korende ninkore omokia , ng'a ker'ekero nyuma y'ogokwa kwane monyare koyainyora amang'ana aya .
61001016	Naki titotunyaneti emegano yaganetwe ase chisemi , ekero twabatebetie inwe chinguru chiaye Omonene oito Yesu Kristo nogocha kwaye , korende igatwarenge abarori b'obonene bwaye .
61001017	Naki iganyorete ase Nyasaye Tata ogosikwa nobonene , agwo areteretwe eriogi riaruete as'obonene mono buna iga , Oyo nere omwana one nyanchete , asare nagweneirwe nere .
61001018	Neriogi eri nario twaigwete rikorua igoro ekero twarenge amo nere as'egetunwa keria egechenu .
61001019	Naintwe ntore nering'ana riria ri'obobani rire rikong'u kobua , ase rirorio morakore buya komoraririgererie buna etaya ekobara aas'are omosunte , goika kobogokia , neng'enang'eni ya mambia ekooroka ase chinkoro chiaino .
61001020	Komoramanye ring'ana eri ng'a obobani bonde tibori as'amariko bokonyara goonchorwa buna anchete omonto gete bweka .
61001021	Naki obobani tibwaretetwe kare as'obwanchani bwa mwanyabanto : korende mwanyabanto abachenu ba Nyasaye , bagakwana , as'ogotang'anwa n'Omoika Omochenu .
61002001	Korende bakaimoka ababani b'oborimo as'egati y'abanto , buna arabe asemore baranyare koba aborokia b'oborimo , baranyare gosoyia bobisi as'okworokereria gotagwenereti kw'ogosiria , bakomokana nonya Omonene obagorete , bakweretera ogosareka gotari gotebana .
61002002	Nabange nabatunye ogokora kwabo kw'omobere ; as'abwo enchera y'ekeene nekwanwe nobobe .
61002003	Nas'okorengereria nabenyorere okwegwenera asemore as'amang'ana arosigwe : ekina kiabo korwa kare tigegotebana , gose ogosira kwabo tigokorara .
61002004	Naki buna Nyasaye atababerete amalaika ekero bamochete , korende akabaruta engorg , akababeka as'ebisibo bi'omosunte , barendwe goika ekina geche ;
61002005	gose tayiaberete eria ense ya kare , korende akamokonya Nuhu omosomba bw'oboronge , nabanto bande batano nababere , agwo ekero aretete amache igoro as'ense y'abatamosigete Nyasaye ;
61002006	akayenachera ekina emechie ya Sodomu na Gomora , akayeonchora akayekora ribu , akayekora ebe ekiorokererio as'abanto batanyare komosika Nyasaye nyuma y'aya ;
61002007	akamokonya Lut , omonyene oboronge , ore goichanigwa norogendo rw'obotomani bw'abwo abasaria ;
61002008	( naki omonto oyo omonyene oboronge akamenya asebare , as ' okorora nokoigwa , agechanda as'omoyo oye omonyene oboronge , amatuko as'amatuko , as'ogokora kwabo gotari namachiko ) ;
61002009	Omonene namanyete kobakonya abamosigete korwa as'ogotemwa , nakobabeka abatari ba boronge inse as'okoakwa goika rituko ri'ekina ;
61002010	ko kobua baria bakobwatia omobere as'okorengereria kw'amang'ana eubi , nagochaya obonene . Abatari koiroka , abanyene oboenenu , tibakoiguswa kobakoborama obonene :
61002011	nonva amalaika , bare abanene kobua as'okobua nechinguru , tibarikoreta ogosoera okobe igoro as'obosio bw'Omonene .
61002012	Korende abwo buna ching'iti chitari nobong'aini , iga bare agwo ching'iti chioka chikobwatwa nagosirigwa , bakorama as'amang'ana batamanyeti , nabasirigwe as'ogosirigwa kwabo ,
61002013	bakonyorwa nobobe buna eng'eria y'ogokora okobe ; bagokaga nogotinda nokwegokia ekero ki'omobaso nobwansu ; nebimoa nobosoku , bagotunyana okwegokia as'emeyega yabo y'obwanchani , kobagokora omoyega amo nainwe ;
61002014	abanyene amaiso aichoire nobotomani , abanto batari gotiga gokora ebibe , igabakobang'aina abare nemioyo etari nechinguru ; abanyene chinkoro chianarigwe nokorengereria , abana b'okoragereria ;
61002015	abatigire enchera erambogete , bagasira , bagatunya enchera ya Balaam omwana o Bosor , bwanchete eng'eria y'ogokora okobe ;
61002016	korende agakanigwa as'ogosaria kwaye omonyene : etigere etari gokwana , egakwana as'eriogi ri'omwana o mwanyabanto , gotanga obobarimo bwaye omobani oria .
61002017	Abaiga nechinsoko chitari namache , namare akoirwa nomwaga ; naki babekeirwe obomwamu bw'omosunte .
61002018	Naki bagokwana amang'ana ay'oboenenu obonene mono , as'okobang'usa as'okorengereria kw'omobere nas'obotomani , abwo bachakire kobatama baria bare as'obong'ainereria ;
61002019	bakobarigeria ogosiborwa , nabarabwo abanyene nabasomba b'ogosareka . Naki omonto karabugwe nomonto , igakoba omosomba bw'omonto oria .
61002020	Ekiagera baria batiekire koyetama eubi y'ense as'okomomanya Omonene , Omokonyi Yesu Kristo , bakobwatwa naende nakobugwa nero , engecho yabo y'omoerio nebe embe kobua eria ye ritang'ani .
61002021	Naki anga igabete buya onye tibayemanyete enchera y'oboronge , kobua koyemanya , nakoirana nyuma as'ogochika ogochenu baetwe .
61002022	Korende obaikeire omoreng'anio oria bw'ekeene , Esese yairaneire amaroki aye enyene , nengurue yasibigwe kwegaragaria as'etintira .
61003001	Abanchani , rirube eri nario ria kabere nabarikeire inwe ; as'ayio nabibokirie ebirengererio biaino ebiya as'okobainyoria ,
61003002	monyare koyainyora amang'ana akwanetwe kare nababani abachenu , naria amachiko Omonene Omokonyi aretetwe nabatomwa baye .
61003003	Momanye ritang'ani ring'ana eri ng'a as'amatuko omoerio nabache abanto abanyene esekererio , bagotunyana okorengereria kwabo abanyene ,
61003004	nagoteba , Ng'ai ere eira eria y'ogocha kwaye ? naki , korwa agwo chisokoro chiaito bararete , ebinto bionsi igobikaransete engecho eyio eyio , korwa omochakano bw'ogotongwa .
61003005	Naki igabamiametie amaiso abo tibarora ring'ana eri , iga yarenge aroro igoro korwa kare , nense boigo , egakorwa as'amache ekarua as'amache , ase ring'ana ria Nyasaye ;
61003006	as'ayio ense eria y'ekero keria egasarigwa namache , egasira .
61003007	Korende igoro ya bono nense biagachirwe emonga as'omorero , ase ring'ana erio erio , birendwe goika rituko ri'ekina , neri'ogosirigwa kwabo mwanyabanto abatamosigeti Nyasaye .
61003008	Korende , abanchani , timorieba ring'ana eri , ng'a as'Omonene rituko erimo igarire buna emiaka elifu , nemiaka elifu buna rituko erimo .
61003009	Omonene tatchaneti goikerania eira yaye , buna abande bakobara ogotebana ; korende igaremereretie asemore , tancheti monto onde bwonsi asire , korende bonsi baikere ogoonchoka .
61003010	Korende rituko ri'Omonene nariche buna omoibi ; ase rituko erio igoro naruo as'eriogi rinene , nebitongwa bi'igoro nabisire nomorero ogotetenya , nense nemeremo ereo ime yaye neyie .
61003011	Naboigo ekiagera ebinto ebi bionsi nabisire , nebagwenerete inwe koba abanto b'engecho ki as'orogendo orochenu nechingecho chia Nyasaye ,
61003012	mokorigereria nagosemeria mono goika riche rituko riria ria Nyasaye , ekiagera as'ayio igoro nesirigwe nakoyia , ebitongwa bionsi nabinyititoke nomorero omonene .
61003013	Korende , as'engecho y'eira yaye toganyete igoro ayia nense enyia , as'eyio oboronge bwaye boikaransete ime yaye ,
61003014	As'ayio , abanchani , ekiagera moganyete ayio , kora omokia erinde mororekane ng'a timori nabimoa gose obosoku as'obosio bwaye as'omorembe .
61003015	Bara okoremereria kw'Omonene oito ng'a nogotoreka ; buna oyominto omwanchani Paulo abarikerete ase chisemi aetwe ;
61003016	naende buna amarube aye onsi akoreta amang'ana ayio ; imeo nareo amang'ana ayare amakong'u koyamanya , namang'ana ayio abanto batari nobong'aini , batari nechinguru bayasaria , buna basaririe namariko ande , as'ogosira kwabo abanyene .
61003017	Gaki abanchani , komwatang'anire koyamanya aya , erende , timobaisa gosirigwa nokomocha kwabo abw'abasaria , mogwe nagotiga obokong'u bwaino .
61003018	Korende kina as'obuya , nas'okomomanya Omonene oito , Omokonyi oito Yesu Kristo . Obonene nobwaye ere bono na goika kare nakare . Amin .
62001001	Naro arenge korwa omochakano , twaigwete , twaroche namaiso aito , twarigereretie , namaboko aito akabwata , ase Ring'ana ri'obogima ,
62001002	( nobogima obwo bokaorokigwa , naintwe tokarora , twabaire kirori , nakobaranderia boria obogima bwa kare nakare , bwarenge ase lata , bokaorokigwa asetore ) ;
62001003	naro twayarorire nakoigwa , twabarandeine nainwe , erinde nainwe monyare kobwatana amo naintwe : nokobwatana gwaito iga kore amo na Tata , n'Omwana oye Yesu Kristo :
62001004	naya twabayerikeire , erinde omogoko oino oikeranigwe .
62001005	Naya naro amang'ana twaigwete asare , twarandirie asemore , ng'a Nyasaye nomobaso , nonya ' mosunte onde bwonsi tori ime asare .
62001006	Gatogoteba twabwatanire nere , naende gatoragende as'omosunte , twatebire oborimo , titogokora eria ekeene ,
62001007	korende gatoragende omobaso ime , buna ere are as'omobaso , twabwatanire intwe as'intwe , namanyinga aye Yesu Kristo , Omwana oye natosibie ebibe biaito bionsi .
62001008	Gatoratebe titori nabibe , iga tokweng'aina , nonya nekeene tikeri asetore .
62001009	Gatorabioorokie ebibe biaito , ere nomonyene ekeene noy'oboronge natorusie ebibe biaito , nagotosibia obobe bwonsi .
62001010	Gatoratebe titokoreti ebibe , twamokorire omorimo , nonya nering'ana riaye tiriri asetore .
62002001	Abana bane abake , nabarikeire aya , erinde timokora ebibe . Nonya omonto nakora ebibe , ntore n'Omosaberi ase Tata , Yesu Kristo omonyene oboronge :
62002002	nere nomobwatania as'ebibe biaito ; gose tari as'ebibe biaito bioka , korende nebi'ense yonsi .
62002003	Naiga twamanyire ng'a twamomanyire , onye twabwatire amachiko aye .
62002004	Ere oyogotcha , namomanyire , nere takobwata amachiko aye , nomorimo , nekeene tikeri ime asare :
62002005	korende ere oyokobwata ring'ana riaye , as'oyio obwanchani bwa Nyasaye bwaikeranire ime asare ekeene ekeene . Iga twamanyire ng'a iga tore ime asare .
62002006	Ere oyogoteba ng'a iga aikaransete ime asare , nagwenerete kogenda omonyene buna ere are kogenda .
62002007	Abanchani , timbarikereti ogochika okoyia , korende koria gwa kare mwarenge nakorokwo korwa omochakano : nakona ogochika gwa kare nakwo ring'ana mwaigwete korwa omochakano .
62002008	Naende , nabarikeire ogochika okoyia , ring'ana rire ekeene ime asare n'ime yaino , ekiagera omosunte oetire , noria omobaso bw'ekeene otiekire kobara .
62002009	Ere oyogoteba ng'a igare as'omobaso , nere namogechete oyomwabo , igare as'omosunte ime nonya mbono .
62002010	Ere oyobwanchete oyomwabo , igaikaransete as'omobaso , nonya ime asare kogochwa tikoiyo .
62002011	Korende ere oyomogechete oyomwabo igare as'omosunte , naende igakogenda as'omosunte , tamanyeti nonya nas'agochia , ekiagera omosunte omoribirie amaiso .
62002012	Nabarikeire inwe , abana abake , ekiagera mwabeirwe ebibe biaino , as'engecho y'erieta riaye .
62002013	Nabarikeire inwe , abatata , ekiagera mwamomanyire ere oyorenge korwa omochakano . Nabarikeire inwe abamura , ekiagera mwamobuire oria omobe . Nabarikeire inwe abana ekiagera mwamomanyire Tata .
62002014	Nabarikeire inwe abatata , ekiagera mwamomanyire oyorenge korwa omochakano . Nabarikeire inwe abamura , ekiagera more nechinguru , nering'ana ria Nyasaye riaikaransire ime asemore , namwamobuire oria omobe .
62002015	Timwancha ense , nonya nebinto bireo as'ense . Omonto karanche ense , okomwancha Tata tikoiyo asare .
62002016	Naki ekereo ime ense , nokorengereria kw'omobere , nokorengereria kw'amaiso , noboenenu bw'obogima obwo , tiborueti ase Tata , korende iga boruete as'ense .
62002017	Nense igegoeta , nokorengereria kwaye : korende ere oyogokora obwanchani bwa Nyasaye igakobao goika kare nakare .
62002018	Abana , nekero ki'omoerio : na buna mwaigwete ng'a omobisa o Kristo ochire , nonya mbono ababisa abange ba Kristo batiekire kobao ; ekiagera as'ayio twamanyire ng'a nekero ki'omoerio .
62002019	Abaruete asetore , korende tibarenge asetore ; ekiagera onye mbarenge asetore , anga mbaikardnsete amo naintwe : korende barureo erinde baorokigwe ng'a tai bonsi bare asetore .
62002020	Nainwe mwaakirwe amaguta nere oyore Omochenu namwamanyire onsi .
62002021	Timbarikereti inwe , ekiagera timokemanyeti ekeene , korende nekiagera mokemanyete , naende nonya noborimo tibori bonde bwonsi bokorua as'ekeene .
62002022	Ning'o ore omorimo tatiga ere oyogokana ng'a Yesu nere Kristo ? Oyio nere ore omobisa o Kristo , okomokana Tata n'Omwana .
62002023	Ker'oyokomokana Omwana , tari na Tata ; ere oyogwatora omwana igare na Tata nere .
62002024	Nabo aikaranse ime asemore amang'ana aria mwaigwete korwa omochakano . Ring'ana riria mwarigwete korwa omochakano koriraikaranse asemore , nainwe namoikaranse ime as'Omwana , na ime ase Tata .
62002025	Neye nero eira abaire inwe , obogima bwa kare nakare .
62002026	Nabarikeire aya as'amang'ana abanto bakorigia kobasiria .
62002027	Nainwe , amaguta aria mwanyorete asare aikaransire ime asemore , nainwe timori nokorigia omonto okoborokereria ; korende buna aria amaguta mwaakirwe abarokererie amang'ana onsi , naende nekeene , tan borimo , na buna abarokererie , mwaikaransire ime asare .
62002028	Na bono , abana bane abake , ikaransa ime asare ; erinde , gakorigia koorokigwa , tobe noboremu , titoba nobosoku as'obosio bwaye as'ogocha kwaye .
62002029	Komokomanya ng'a ere nomonyene oboronge , manya ng'a oyogokora boronge oiboirwe nere .
62003001	Rora , obwanchani bore naki atoeire lata , erinde torokwe abana ba Nyasaye : nabo tore . Naki as'engecho eye ense tetomanyeti , ekiagera temomanyeti ere .
62003002	Abanchani , bono ntore abana ba Nyasaye , korende taraorokigwa buna torache koba . Korende twamanyire ng'a rigoro araoroke , natogwekane nere ; naki natomorore buna are .
62003003	Naende omonto bwonsi oyomosemereti iga , igagwesibia , buna ere are omochenu .
62003004	Ker'oyogokora ebibe , igagokora ogosaria ; ekiagera ebibe nogosaria .
62003005	Naende mwamanyire ng'a ere igaorogete erinde arusie ebibe biaito ; nabibe tibiri ime asare .
62003006	Ker'oyoikaransete ime asare tagokora ebibe : ker'oyogokora ebibe tamorochi , nonya nkomomanya .
62003007	Abana bane abake omonto onde bwonsi tabasiria : oyogokora oboronge nare noboronge , buna ere are noboronge :
62003008	oyogokora ebibe noyo o saitani ; naki saitani igakorete ebibe korwa omochakano . As'engecho eye Omwana o Nyasaye akaorokigwa , erinde ayesarie emeremo ya saitani .
62003009	Ker'omonto oiboretwe na Nyasaye tagokora ebibe , ekiagera oroiboro rwaye roikaransete ime asare ; korende takonyara gokora ebibe ekiagera oiboirwe korwa ase Nyasaye .
62003010	Naboigo abana ba Nyasaye bare maiso marore , nabana ba saitani : omonto bwonsi otari gokora boronge tarueti ase Nyasaye , nonya noyotancheti oyomwabo .
62003011	Naki aya naro amang'ana twaigwete korwa omochakano , twanchane intwe as'intwe ;
62003012	tari buna Kain arenge bw'oria Omobe , akamoita oyomwabo . Nere igamoitete aseki ? Ekiagera ogokora kwaye kwarenge okobe , nokw'oyomwabo kwarenge okwa boronge .
62003013	Timokumia , baminto , ense kerabageche .
62003014	Intwe twamanyire ng'a twaetire korwa amakweri goika as'obogima ekiagera twabanchire abaminto . Oyotancheti , igaikaransete as'amakweri .
62003015	Oyomogechete oyomwabo nomoiti : namwamanyire omoiti tari nobogima bwa kare nakare ime asare .
62003016	Iga twabomanyire obwanchani , ekiagera obekire obogima bwaye as'ense asetore : naintwe ntogwenerete kobeka obogima bwaito inse as'abaminto .
62003017	Korende oyore nebinto bi'ense eye , amorore oyomwabo oyoremeirwe , atange amabera aye komoikera , inee , naki obwanchani bwa Nyasaye borabe ime asare oyio ?
62003018	Abana bane abake , titwancha ase ring'ana gose as'oromeme , korende as'ogokora nas'ekeene .
62003019	Iga natomanye ng'a iga tore ab'ekeene , nas'obosio bwaye natoremie chinkoro chiaito :
62003020	ase ring'ana rinde rionsi chinkoro chiaito chigotogainbia ; ekiagera Nyasaye nomonene kobua chinkoro chiaito , nere igayamanyete onsi .
62003021	Abanchani , chinkoro chiaito chitatogambeti , ntore noboremu ase Nyasaye ;
62003022	naende rinde rionsi togosaba , iga tokorinyora asare ; ekiagera toyabwatete amachiko aye , naende tokoyakora ayamogwenerete as'amaiso aye .
62003023	Korende oko nakwo ogochika kwaye , torianche erieta ri'Omwana oye Yesu Kristo , nagwanchana , buna atoete ogochika .
62003024	Naende ere oyokoyabwata amachiko aye igagoikaransa ime asare , nere ime asare . Naende iga twamanyire ng'a iga aikaransete ime asetore , as'Omoika atoeire .
62004001	Abanchani , timwancha ker'omoika , korende yeteme emeika , onye eruete ase Nyasaye : ekiagera ababani b'oborimo abange baorokire as'ense .
62004002	Iga mwayomanyire Omoika o Nyasaye : ker'omoika ogoteba ng'a Yesu Kristo ochire as'omobere orure ase Nyasaye :
62004003	naende ker'omoika otagoteba ng'a Yesu Kristo ochire as'omobere , torueti ase Nyasaye . Naende oyo noro omoika omobisa o Kristo buna mwaigure ng'a ngochare ; na bono otiekire kobao as'ense ime .
62004004	Inwe , abana bane abake , mwarure ase Nyasaye ; naende mwababuire : ekiagera oyore ime asemore ere nomonene kobua ere oyore as'ense .
62004005	Abwo nab'ense : as'ayio iga bagokwana ay'ense , ense ebaigwera .
62004006	Intwe iga tore aba Nyasaye : ere oyomanyete Nyasaye igagotoigwera , ere oyotari oyo Nyasaye tagotoigwa . Iga twayomanyire Omoika bw'ekeene , nomoika bw'ogosira .
62004007	Abanchani , twanchane : ekiagera obwanchani nobwa Nyasaye ; na ker'oyobwanchire oiboirwe na Nyasaye , nere omomanyire Nyasaye .
62004008	Oyotancheti , tamomanyeti Nyasaye ; naki Nyasaye nobwanchani .
62004009	Iga obwanchani bwa Nyasaye bwarorekanire asetore , ekiagera Nyasaye omotomire Omwana oye omomoima as'ense , tonyore obogima asare .
62004010	Obo nabwo obwanchani , korende tai intwe gose twamwanchire Nyasaye , korende nere otwanchire intwe , akamotoma Omwana oye koba omobwatania as'ebibe biaito .
62004011	Abanchani , onye Nyasaye otwanchete iga , ntogwenerete naintwe gwanchana intwe as'intwe .
62004012	Tari omonto omororire Nyasaye kero kende gionsi . Gatoranchane , Nyasaye igaikaransete ime asetore , nobwanchani bwaye bwaikeranigwe ime asetore .
62004013	Iga twamanyire ng'a iga toikaransete ime asare , nere ime asetore , ekiagera otoeire as'Omoika oye .
62004014	Naintwe twarorire , nagoteba ng'a Tata omotomire Omwana koba Omokonyi bw'ense .
62004015	Ker'oyogoteba ng'a Yesu n'Omwana o Nyasaye , Nyasaye igaikaransete ime asare nere ase Nyasaye .
62004016	Naintwe twabomanyire obwanchani obware nabwo Nyasaye ime asetore nakobwancha . Nyasaye nobwanchani , nere oyogoikaransa as'obwanchani , igagoikaransa ime ase Nyasaye , na Nyasaye ime asare .
62004017	Iga obwanchani bwaikeranigwe asetore erinde tobe noboremu ase rituko ri'ekina ; ekiagera , buna ere are , naboigo tore naintwe as'ense ime .
62004018	Obwanchani tibori nokoiroka : korende obwanchani oboikeranu iga bogotuguta okoiroka isiko , ekiagera okoiroka nkore nokoakwa ; nomonyene okoiroka taikeraniri as'obwanchani .
62004019	Intwe twanchire ekiagera ere ritang'ani natwanchete intwe .
62004020	Omonto karabore , Namwanchire Nyasaye , nere namogechete oyomwabo , nomorimo : naki oyotamwancheti oyomwabo ere oyo aroche , takonyara komwancha Nyasaye ekiagera tamorochi .
62004021	Nogochika oko twaeirwe nere , ere oyobwanchete Nyasaye , anche noyomwabo boigo .
62005001	Ker'omonto oyoranche ng'a Yesu nere Kristo , oiboirwe na Nyasaye : na ker'oyoramwanche omonyene okomoibora omwanchire noyo oiboirwe nere .
62005002	Ase ring'ana eri twamanyire ng'a twabanchire abana ba Nyasaye , gatoramwanche Nyasaye , nakobwata amachiko aye .
62005003	Naki obwo nabwo obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , ng'a tonyare kobwata amachiko aye : nayio amachiko aye tari amarito .
62005004	Naki ker'ekiaiboirwe na Nyasaye , iga gekobua ense : nokwo okobua gokobua ense , nokwegena gwaito .
62005005	Omonyene okobua ense ning'o , tatiga ere oyobwanchire ng'a Yesu n'Omwana o Nyasaye ?
62005006	Oyo nere ochire as'amache nas'amanyinga , Yesu Kristo ; tari as'amache oka , korende nas'amache namanyinga .
62005007	N'Omoika noro obaire kirori ekiagera Omoika noro ekeene .
62005008	Naki batato aba babaire kirori , Omoika , namache , namanyinga : nabatato aba iga babwataine as'amang'ana ayamo .
62005009	Gatorabwate oborori bwa mwanyabanto , noborori bwa Nyasaye nobonene kobua : ekiagera oborori bwa Nyasaye nobo , ng'a etiekire koba kirori as'Omwana oye .
62005010	Ere oyogwancha asare Omwana o Nyasaye nere ore noborori ime yaye : ere oyotancheti Nyasaye otiekire komokora omorimo ; ekiagera atancheti boria oborori bwarorirwe na Nyasaye as'Omwana oye .
62005011	Nabwo oborori , ng'a Nyasaye otoeire obogima bwa kare nakare , nobogima obwo iga bore as'Omwanaoye .
62005012	Oyore nere Omwana , nare nobogima ; oyotari nere Omwana o Nyasaye tari nobogima .
62005013	Nabarikeire amang'ana aya , erinde momanye ng'a more nobogima bwa kare nakare , inwe abwo mwarianchire erieta ri'Omwana o Nyasaye .
62005014	Nobo nabwo oboremu tore nabwo asare , erinde , gatorasabe egento buna anchete , igagotoigwa .
62005015	Naende gatoramanye ng'a igagotoigwa , eki togosaba gionsi , twamanyire ng'a intwe ntore na keria twasaba .
62005016	Omonto karamorore oyomwabo ogokora ekebe , getari ki'amakweri , nasabe , nere Nyasaye namoe obogima as'engecho y'abwo bagokora ebibe bitari bi'amakweri . Nkere ekebe kia amakweri : tintebeti ng'a asabe as'engecho y'ekio .
62005017	Kera eritari eria boronge nebibe : nkere ekebe getari ki'amakweri .
62005018	Twamanyire ng'a ker'omonto oiboirwe na Nyasaye takomocha ; korende ere oyoiboirwe na Nyasaye igakwerenda , noria omobe takomokuna .
62005019	Twamanyire intwe igatore aba Nyasaye , ense yonsi igeifearansete as'oria omobe .
62005020	Twamanyire ng'a Omwana o Nyasaye otiekire gocha , nere otoeire obong'aini , erinde tomomanye ere oyore bw'ekeene , naintwe iga tore ime asare ere oyo bw'ekeene , ime as'Omwana oye Yesu Kristo . Oyio nere ore Nyasaye bw'ekeene naende obogima bwa kare nakare .
62005021	Abana bane abake , erende emioyo yaino ase chisanamu .
63001001	Omogaka as'omokungu omochore , nabana baye nyanchete as'ekeene : korende tari inche bweka , korende baria bonsi bakemanyete keria ekeene ;
63001002	as'engecho ya keria ekeene geikaransete ime asetore , nakerokio nakebe amo naintwe goika kare nakare ,
63001003	Obuya , namabera , nomorembe bikorua ase Nyasaye Tata nas'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo bibe amo naintwe as'ekeene nas'obwanchani .
63001004	Nagokire mono ekiagera nabarorire abande as'abana bao bakogenda as'ekeene , buna twanyorete ogochika ase Tata .
63001005	Na bono omokungu , nagosabire , tari ng'a nakorikeire ogochika okoyia , korende koria twarenge nakorokwo korwa omochakano , ng'a twanchane .
63001006	Nobwo nabwo obwanchani , togende toyatunyane amachiko aye . Oko nakwo koria ogochika buna mwaigwete korwa omochakano ng'a mogende as'okwo .
63001007	Naki abang'ainereria abange basoire as'ense , abatari koorokia ng'a Yesu Kristo ngochare as'omobere . Oyio nere oria omong'ainereria naende omobisa o Kristo .
63001008	Erigererie emioyo yaino timoyasiria ayatwakorire , korende monyore eng'eria eng'ikeranu .
63001009	Ker'oyokogenderera atang'ane , ataikaranseti as'okworokereria kwa Kristo , tari na Nyasaye : ere oyoikaransete as'okworokereria kwa Kristo , omonto oyio nare na Tata n'Omwana nere .
63001010	Omonto karache asemore , nere atareteti okworokereria oko , timomoroisia as'enyomba yaino , gose timomokwania :
63001011	naki oyoramoe ogokwania obwatanire nemeremo yaye emebe .
63001012	Ekiagera ninde namang'ana amange aya nkobarikera , tindigeti koyarika as'ekaratasi newino : korende ninsemeretie gocha asemore gokwana nainwe obosio as'obosio , erinde omogoko oino oikeranigwe .
63001013	Abana b'omosubati omino ore omochore , bagokwanirie .
64001001	Omogaka ase Gaio omwanchani oyonyanchete as'ekeene .
64001002	Omwanchani , nasabire ogenderere buya as'amang'ana onsi , naende koba nobogima obuya , buna omoyo oo ore buya .
64001003	Naki nagogete mono ekero bachete abaminto nagoteba ekeene kiao , buna okogenda as'ekeene .
64001004	Tindi nomogoko ore omonene kobua oyo , koigwa ng'a abana bane bakogenda as'ekeene .
64001005	Omwanchani , gwakorire emeremo y'ekeene ase ker'emeremo kwabakoreire abwo abare abaminto nabageni ;
64001006	abarenge kirori as'obwanchani bwao as'obosio bw'ekanisa : nokore buya korabakobe as'erogendo rwao buna egwenerete ase Nyasaye .
64001007	Ekiagera as'engecho y'Erieta erio , bagasoka , tibanyoreti egento as'Ebisaku .
64001008	Nabo etogwenerete intwe kobaroisia abanto buna abwo , erinde tobe abakori emeremo amo nekeene .
64001009	Narigete ring'ana as'ekanisa , korende Diotrefe oyobwanchire koba oyo bwe ritang'ani gati asebare , tatwancheti .
64001010	As'ayio kondache , nimoinyorie ogokora kwaye agokora , agokwana obebe igoro asetore amang'ana amabe : gose taisaniri nayio , ere omonyene tari kobaroisia abaminto , nabaria bakorigia kobaroisia abatanga , nakobarusia as'ekanisa .
64001011	Omwanchani , tibwega obobe , korende ega ekere ekiya . Ere oyogokora amaya noyo Nyasaye : ere oyogokora amabe tamorochi Nyasaye .
64001012	Demetrio bwatoirwe nabanto bonsi , naende nakeria ekeene ekenyene . Naintwe intwensi twarorire , naye kwamanyire ng'a oborori bwaito nobw'ekeene .
64001013	Narenge namang'ana amange ngokorikera , korende tinyancheti gokorikera as'ewino nekaramu :
64001014	korende ninsemeretie gokorora ang'e nagokwana naye obosio as'obosio . Omorembe obe asore . Abasani baito bagokwanirie . Bakwanie abasani , ker'omonto as'erieta riaye .
64001015	
65001001	Yuda , omosomba o Yesu Kristo , oyomwabo Yakobo , as'abwo banchirwe ase Nyasaye Tata , barendire as'engecho ya Yesu Kristo , nyuma y'okorangerigwa .
65001002	Amabera nomorembe nobwanchani momenterwe .
65001003	Abanchani , ekero narenge gokora omokia mono kobarikera amang'ana ogotoreka gwaito intwe twensi , nkarora ng'a nengwenerete mbarikere , mborokererie moamereranie nomokia mono as'okwegena gwaetwe abachenu ara rimo rioka .
65001004	Naki mbare abanto besoine ase bobisi , abanto barikeretwe kare ekina eke , abanto batari ba boronge bakoonelmra obuya bwa Nyasaye oito bobe okorengereria kw'obotomani , nabarabwo bamokana Omonene oito ore bweka , n'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo .
65001005	Bono nanchire kobainyoria , nonva mwatiekire komanya aya onsi , buna Omonene nyuma y'okobakonya abanto as'ense ya Misiri , nabasiretie abatamwegenete .
65001006	Namalaika batarendete obonene bwabo , bakabotiga obomenyo bwabo , obabekire as'ekina keria ekenene as'ebisibo bia kare nakare inse as'omosunte .
65001007	Buna Sodomu na Gomora , nemechie yaetanaine , batunyanete obotomani as'engecho eyemo naba , bakagenda batunyane amang'ana ay'omobere atari aya boronge , yabekirwe koba ekiorokererio , bakonyora ekina ki'omorero o kare nakare .
65001008	Nabo naba , as'okorota kwabo . babeka omobere eubi , banga okogamberwa , barama obonene .
65001009	Korende Mikael , rilaika rinene , ekero aamereranetie na saitani nakwomana nere as'engecho y'omobere o Musa , tanyara komosoera as'amang'ana amabe , korende agateba , Omonene agokanie .
65001010	Korende abanto aba igabakorama amang'ana ayabatamanyeti : namang'ana bamanyete as'oboronge besaria naro buna ching'iti chitari nobong'aini .
65001011	Obobe nobwabo ! naki bagendete as'enchera ya Kain , na gwetuguta as'okomocha kwa Baalam , as'engecho y'eng'eria , nabarabwo basirire as'okomocha kwa Kora .
65001012	Abanto aba nebitare ebinyene emechando as'emeyega yaino y'obwanchani , abagbkora emeyega amo nainwe , nabo nabarisia abanyene bakwerisia , batari koiroka , namare atari namache , akoirwa nomwaga ; nemete yaarorokire amato etari namatunda , yakure eria kabere , nagosimorwa kegima ;
65001013	nemermdo y'enyancha etagotangeka , ekoorokia obosoku bwabo abanyene buna riuro , neching'enang'eni chigosira , echio omosunte noro emonga yabo chiabekeirwe kare nakare .
65001014	Na Enok , o gatano nakabere nyuma y'Adamu , nakwanete amang'ana ay'obobani igoro y'abwo , ogoteba , Rigereria Omonene nache nechilifu ikomi chi'abachenu baye ,
65001015	erinde abanachere abanto bonsi ekina , nakobanachera bonsi abatari nechingecho chia Nyasaye , as'engecho y'emeremo yabo yonsi baregokora as'ogotamosika Nyasaye , nas'engecho y'amang'ana amakong'u onsi abwo abanyene ebibe batamosigeti Nyasaye bagokwana igoro yaye .
65001016	Abanto aba nabanyene okwemurungania , nabanyene okwerera , bakogenda as'okorengereria kwabo , nemenwa yabo ekwana amang'ana ay'oboenenu amanene mono , banchereria abanto abanyene enibo as'engecho y'okwegwenera .
65001017	Korende inwe , abanchani , yainyore amang'ana akwanetwe kare nabatomwa b'Omonene oito Yesu Kristo ,
65001018	buna babatebetie as'ekero ki'omoerio , Nababeo abanto abanyene esekererio , bagotunya okorengereria kwabo abanyene .
65001019	Abanto abwo nabwo bakoreta ogwatananeka , abanto b'ense eye yoka , batari n'Omoika .
65001020	Korende inwe , abanchani , mweagache as'okwegena kwaino kore ogochenu , nagosaba as'Omoika Omochenu ,
65001021	erende as'obwanchani bwa Nyasaye , mokoganya amabera a Omonene oito Yesu Kristo , goika monyore obogima bwa kare nakare .
65001022	Babere abande abare nogotiting'ara ;
65001023	Korende abande bakonye as'okobataboria korwa omorero ; abande mobabere nokoiroka ; mokoyegechia eria eanga ebekire riko nomobere .
65001024	Asare ere oranyare kobarenda inwe timogochwa , nakobatenenia as'obosio bw'obonene bwaye motari nebimoa as'omogoko omonene ,
65001025	ere ore Nyasaye bweka Omokonyi oito ; asare ere obonene , nobonguru , nokobua , nechinguru ase Yesu Kristo korwa kare , na bono , na goika kare nakare . Amin .
66001001	Okomanoka kwa Yesu Kristo aetwe na Nyasaye , aborokie abasomba baye amang'ana agwenerete goikeranigwa bwango : agatoma as'okoboko kwe rilaika riaye komworokia omosomba oye Yohana ;
66001002	oyorenge kirori ase ring'ana ria Nyasaye nokogana kwa Yesu Kristo , amang'ana onsi ayaroche .
66001003	Nare negesio ere oyogosoma , nabarabwo bakoyaigwa amang'ana ay'obobani obo , nakoyakora ayarikireo : ekiagera ekero ng'ang'e kere .
66001004	Yohana ase chikanisa isano naibere chire as'Asia : Obuya bobe asemore nomorembe okorua asare ere oyoreo , noyorengeo , naende oyorache kobao ; nakorwa as'emeika etano nebere ere as'obosio bw'ekerogo kiaye ki'obonene ;
66001005	na korwa ase Yesu Kristo , oyore omorori omwegeni , omoiborwa bwe ritang'ani bw'abakure , nomogambi bw'abaruoti b'ense . Asare ere oyotwanchete nagotosibia ebibe biaito as'amanyinga aye ;
66001006	naende agatokora koba oboruoti , nabakuani ase Nyasaye , Is'oye ; nobonene nobonguru iga bore asare ere goika kare nakare . Amin .
66001007	Rigereria ngochare namare ; na ker'eriso narimorore , nabwo bamobetete ; nebisaku bionsi bi'ense nabirere as'engecho yaye . Nabo , Amin .
66001008	Inche n'Alifa n'Omega , omochakano nomoerio , otebire Omonene Nyasaye , oyoreo , oyorengeo , noyorache kobao , Omobui .
66001009	Inche Yohana , omomura omino nomobwatani amo nainwe as'emechando noboruoti noboremereria bore ime ase Yesu Kristo , narenge as'egesinka gekorokwa Patimo , as'engecho ye ring'ana ria Nyasaye nas'okogana kwa Yesu .
66001010	Narenge as'Omoika rituko ri'Omonene , nkaigwa eriogi rinene nyuma yane , buna eriogi ri'egetureri ,
66001011	rikobora , Inche n'Alifa n'Omega , oyo bw'omochakano , noyo bw'omoerio . Ebi kwarora birike as'ebuku , oyetome ase chikanisa isano naibere chire as'Asia ; as'Efeso , na Sumurina , na Perigamo , na Thuatera , na Saridi , na Filadelifia , na Laodikia .
66001012	Ngeonchora ndirore riria eriogi rigokwana nainche . Ngachia gweonchora , nkarora ebibekerero bie chitaya bitano nabibere bi'ethahabu ;
66001013	gati gati ase biria ebibekerero nkarora omonto omogwekano bw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , bweboeti eanga eigete amagoro , nagosibwa norokini rw'ethahabu egekuba .
66001014	Omotwe oye netukia yaye iga yarenge endabu buna amarionya amarabu , buna amagena embura ; namaiso aye buna ogwoka kw'omorero ;
66001015	namagoro aye buna etai yatinyigwe mono buna iga yasibigwe ase eriko ri'omorero ; neriogi riaye buna eriogi ri'amache amange ,
66001016	Nere igarenge neching'enang'eni isano naibere as'okoboko kwaye gw'okorio : nomoro ore omwoge chinsemo ibere , okorua as'omonwa oye : nobosio bwaye buna amasase erioba akobara ase chinguru chiaye .
66001017	Ngachia komorora nkagwa as'amagoro aye buna omonto okure . Akabeka okoboko kwaye gw'okorio igoro asende , agantebia , Toiroka : Inche noyo bw'omochakano noyo bw'omoerio ,
66001018	oyore Moyo ; nainche konya nakure , narigereria igande moyo goika kare nakare . Nainche ninde nebigorero bi'amakweri nebie chimbera .
66001019	Nabo , yarike amang'ana ayakwaroche , nayareo , naro arache koba nyuma as'ayio .
66001020	Obobisi bwe ching'enang'eni chiria isano naibere kwaroche as'okoboko kwane gw'okorio , nabiria ebibekerero bie chitaya chi'ethahabu bitano nabibere . chiria ching'enang'eni isano naibere namalaika a chiria chikanisa isano naibere , nabiria ebibekerero bitano nabibere kwaroche nechikanisa isano naibere .
66002001	Ase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere as'Efeso rika : Ayagokwana ere oyochibwatete ching'enang'eni isano naibere as'okoboko kwaye gw'okorio , oyokogenda gati gati ase biria ebibekerero bitano nabibere bi'ethahabu :
66002002	namanyire ogokora kwao , emechando yao , noboremereria bwao , nekiagera otari konyara kobwatana nabanto ababe , naende okabatema baria bakweroka abatomwa , nabarabwo taibo , okabarora ng'a nab'oborimo ;
66002003	naende okaremereria , nas'engecho yane , naende toroseti .
66002004	Korende ninde nering'ana eri igoro asore , ekiagera gwatigire obwanchani bwao bwe ritang'ani .
66002005	Nabo , inyora ase kwagwerete , oonchoke , okore ogokora kwao kwe ritang'ani . Korende , otakoreti bo , ninchiche asore bwango , nindusie ekebekerero kiao aas'aye , otaonchogeti .
66002006	Korende nore nering'ana eri buna kwagechire ogokora kw'Abanikolaiti , okwo ngechete nainche .
66002007	Ere oyore namato , aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitchia chikanisa . Ere oyorabue , nimoe koria amatunda ay'omote bw'obogima ore gati gati as'Omogondo o Nyasaye .
66002008	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere ase Sumurina rika : Ayagokwana ere oyore bw'omochakano nomoerio , orenge konya okure , akaba moyo .
66002009	Namanyire ogochandwa kwao nobotaka bwao ( korende nore nobonda ) , nokoramwa kwabo bagoteba ng'a n'Abayahudi , nabarabwo taibo , nesunagogi ya Saitani ,
66002010	Toiroka ayio arache gogochanda bwango : rigereria , omosoeri nabarute abande asemore echela ime monyare gotemwa ; nainwe namobe nogochandwa amatuko ikomi . Obe omwegeni goika ogokwa , nainche ninkoe egutwa y'obogima .
66002011	Oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitebia chikanisa . Ere oyorabue takonyorekana nobororo bw'amakweri akabere .
66002012	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere Perigamo , rika : Ayagoteba ere oyore nomoro omwoge chinsemo ibere :
66002013	namanyire aas'oikaransete , nao as'ekerogo ki'obonene bwa Saitani : naye noribwatete mono erieta riane , naye togokaneti okwegena kwane , nonya nas'amatuko Antipa omorori one , omwegeni one , oyoitetwe egati yaino , agwo aas'aikaransete Saitani .
66002014	Korende ninde namang'ana amake igoro asore , ekiagera nore nabanto aria babwatete okworokereria kwa Balaam , ere oyomworogetie Balaki abeke okogochwa as'obosio bw'abana b'Isiraeli , as'okobiria ebinto biaruetwe ebing'wanso ase chisanamu , nagotomana .
66002015	Naboigo aye naye nore nabanto bakobwatete okworokereria kw'Abanikolaiti , okwo ngechete .
66002016	Onchoka ; otaonchogeti ninchiche asore bwango , ninkore esegi igoro as'abwo nomoro bw'omonwa one .
66002017	Ere oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitebia chikanisa . Ere oyorabue nimoe koria ensemo ya maana abisire , nainche nimoe rigena rirabu , n'igoro ase rigena erio ririkwe erieta riyia , erieta ritamanywe nomonto tatiga ere oyorieirwe .
66002018	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere ase Thuatera rika ; Ayagokwana Omwana o Nyasaye , ere oyore namaiso buna ogwoka kw'omorero , namagoro aye omogwekano bw'etai yatinyigwe mono .
66002019	Namanyire ogokora kwao , nobwanchani bwao nobosomba bwao nokwegena kwao noboremereria bwao : naende ogokora kwao kw'omoerio , kwabuire koria kwe ritang'ani ,
66002020	Korende ninde namang'ana aya igoro asore , ekiagera kwamotigire oria omokungu Yezebel , ere oyokweroka omobani ; nere iga akworokereria abasomba bane nakobasiria , banyare gotomana , nakoria ebinto biarurue ebingwanso ase chisanamu .
66002021	Nainche namoeire ribaga anyare goonchoka ; nere tarigeti goonchoka atige obotomani bwaye .
66002022	Rigereria , nimotugute as'oborere , nabwo batomanire amo nere banyore ogochandwa okonene , bataonchogeti ogokora kwabo .
66002023	Nainche nimbaite abana baye namakweri . Nechikanisa chionsi nachimanye ng'a inche ninyare komana ebirengererio bi'emioyo ime : ninche nimoe ker'oyomo oino koreng'ana nogokora kwaino .
66002024	Korende nabatebirie inwe , abande bare ase Thuatera , abwo bonsi batari nokworokereria oko , batabomanyeti obobisi bwa Saitani , buna bagoteba ; Tinkobeka igoro asemore egurube ende .
66002025	Korende eki more nakio kebwate , goika nchiche .
66002026	Nere oyorabue nagokorenda ogokora kwane goika omoerio , nimoe okobua igoro as'ebisaku :
