66002027	nere nabagambie nenyimbo y'ekioma , buna ebinto bi'omokori chinyongo bigwatwa ebisamunye ; buna nanyorete ase lata one :
66002028	nainche nimoe eng'enang'eni ya mambia .
66002029	Ere oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitchia chikanisa .
66003001	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere ase Saridi rika : Ayagokwana ere oyore nemeika etano nebere ya Nyasaye , nachiria ching'enang'eni isano naibere : Namanyire ogokora kwao , ekiagera nore nerieta ng'a'igore moyo , naye gwakure .
66003002	Obe omorendi , oyakore amang'ana ayatigarete , ayare ang'e gokwa : naki tindochi ogokora kwao gwaikeranire as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
66003003	Nabo inyora buna kwanyorete , naende buna kwaigwete ; yabwate ayio nakoonchoka . Korende otarendeti ninchiche asore buna omoibi , naye tokomanya ensa ngocha asore .
66003004	Korende nore namarieta amake ase Saridi , abanto batachibegeti chianga chiabo eubi : nabarabwo nabagende amo nainche ase chianga chindabu , ekiagera bagweneire .
66003005	Ere oyorabue nabekwe chianga chindabu ; nainche tinkoritinyia erieta riaye korwa as'ebuku y'obogima nonya ng'ake , nainche nindiatore erieta riaye as'obosio bwa Tata one , nas'obosio bw'amalaika aye .
66003006	Ere oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitebia chikanisa ,
66003007	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere ase Filadelifia rika ; Ayagokwana ere oyore omochenu , ore bw'ekeene , oyore nekeigorero gia Daudi , oyokoigora naende onde tari ogosieka , nere ogosieka gose onde tari okoigora .
66003008	Namanyire ogokora kwao . ( Rora , nakoeire egesieri keigoire as'obosio bwao , gose onde tari oranyare gosieka ) , ekiagera nore nechinguru chinke , naye kwarirendire ring'ana riane , gose torikaneti erieta riane .
66003009	Rora , nakoeire abare b'esunagogi ya Saitani , bagoteba ng'a barabwo n'Abayahudi , nabarabwo taibo , korende iga bagoteba oborimo . Rora , nimbakore bache batung'ame amagoro ao , nakomanya ng'a ningwanchete .
66003010	Ekiagera kwaribwatire ring'ana ri'oboremereria bwane , nainche ninche ninkorende orue as'ensa y'ogotemwa , eyere ang'e gochera ense yonsi , kobatema abaikaransete igoro as'ense .
66003011	Rigereria , ninchiche bwango : bwata mono ekiore nakio , tacha omonto ayeire egutwa yao .
66003012	Ere oyorabue , nimokore esiro ase hekalu ya Nyasaye one , nere tagosoka koruao nonya ng'ake : nainche nindike igoro yaye erieta ria Nyasaye one , nerieta ri'omochie o Nyasaye one , Yerusalemu ore omoyia , ogoika korwa igoro ase Nyasaye one , nerieta riane omonyene , rire riyia .
66003013	Ere oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitebia chikanisa .
66003014	Nase rilaika ri'ekanisa ere ase Laodikia rika ; Ayagoteba ere oyore Amin , omorori oyore omwegeni , omochakano bw'ebitongwa bia Nyasaye .
66003015	Namanyire ogokora kwao , ng'a tori omokendu gose tori ' morero ; anga mbuya onye nkwaba omokendu gose ' morero .
66003016	Nabo , ekiagera ore igatwa , gose tori omokendu gose omorero , ningotwe buna amate korwa as'omonwa one .
66003017	Ekiagera ogoteba , Inche nomonda , netenenkirie , tindigeti ' gento ; naye tomanyeti ng'a igore omonto bw'emechando , noyogochandeka , nomotaka , nomouko , nagetirianda :
66003018	ninkorigetie ogore asende ethahabu yasibigwe as'omorero , onyare koba omonda ; nechianga chindabu onyare kweboyia obosoku bw'egetirianda kiao tibororekana ; neriogo ri'amaiso okweaka amaiso ao , onyare korora .
66003019	Inche iga nkobakania bonsi abanyanchete , nakobaaka : nabo obe nomokia , nakoonchoka .
66003020	Rigereria , natenenire egesieri gotura ; omonto karaigwe eriogi riane nakoigora egesieri , ninsoe asare , nindagere amo nere , nere amo nainche .
66003021	Ere oyorabue , nimoe goikaransa amo nainche as'ekerogo kiane ki'obonene , buna inche nabuete ngaikaransa amo na lata one as'ekerogo kiaye ki'obonene ,
66003022	Ere oyore namato aigwe ring'ana eri Omoika ogochitebia chikanisa .
66004001	Erio nyuma as'aya nkarora , rora egesieri gekaigoka igoro , neriogi rie ritang'ani naigwete buna eriogi ri'egetureri , rigokwana nainche , rikobora , Rina goika aria , nainche ninkworokie amang'ana agwenerete koba korwa nyuma as'ayio .
66004002	Erio kegima narenge as'Omoika ; rora , ekerogo ki'obonene kiabekirwe igoro , n'igoro ase keria ekerogo naikaransete oyomo ;
66004003	nere oyoikaransete igarenge omogwekano buna rigena ria yasipi na saridio , nomokubinyongo bw'embura ogogeetanana ekerogo keria ki'obonene , buna zumaridi .
66004004	Nebirogo emerongo ebere nabine , bigeetanaine ekerogo ki'obonene : n'igoro ase biria ebirogo , nkarora abagaka emerongo ebere nabane , baikaransete , babekire chianga chindabu ; n'igoro as'emetwe yabo barenge nechigutwa chi'ethahabu .
66004005	Nase keria ekerogo ki'obonene gokorua okomesa nokogukura gw'enkoba namariogi . Nechitaya isano naibere chi'omorero chigwoka as'obosio bw'ekerogo keria ki'obonene , nero Emeika etano nebere ya Nyasaye .
66004006	Nas'obosio bwa keria ekerogo ki'obonene , omogwekano bw'enyancha y'ekerore ekerabu se , buna kirusitallo ; na gati gati keria ekerogo ki'obonene , nechinsemo chionsi chie keria ekerogo , ching'iti inye , chichire amaiso as'obosio na nyuma .
66004007	Neng'iti ye ritang'ani iga yarenge omogwekano bw'esibwori , neng'iti ya kabere omogwekano bw'emori , neng'iti ya gatatu enyene obosio buna obosio bw'omwana o mwanyabanto , neng'iti ya kane omogwekano bw'ensoti ekoiruruka .
66004008	Nechi ching'iti inye chire moyo , ker'eyemo iga yarenge nechimbaba isano nemo , chinsemo chionsi , na ime iga chichire namaiso : nachirochio tichigotimoka ' mobaso na ' botuko , iga chigoteba , Omochenu , omochenu , omochenu , n'Omonene Nyasaye Omobui , oyorenge aroro , nere nao are , nere oyorache kobao .
66004009	Nechi ching'iti chire moyo , chiramoe ere oikaransete igoro as'ekerogo ki'obonene ere ore moyo goika kare nakare , obonene nogosika , nokobaka ,
66004010	erio aba abagaka emerongo ebere nabane nabagwe as'obosio bwaye oyoikaransete as'ekerogo ki'obonene , nabarabwo nabamosasime ere oyore moyo goika kare nakare , nabarabwo nabatugute chi gut wa chiabo as'obosio bw'ekeiogo ki'obonene , bagoteba ,
66004011	Kwagweneire , Omonene , Nyaiaye oito , kobonyora obonene nogosika nokobua : naki aye naye kwabitongete ebinto bionsi ; nekiagera as'obwanchani bwao iga biabete aroro , bigatongwa .
66005001	Nkarora as'okoboko gw'okorio kw'oyoikaransete igoro as'ekerogo ki'obonene ebuku erikire ime na nyuma , yabekirwe chimanyererio bitano nabibere .
66005002	Nkarora rilaika omonyene chinguru okorandia negeturi ekenene , Ning'o ogwenerete koyeigora ebuku nagosibora ebimanyererio biaye ?
66005003	Tarenge monto igoro , nonya igoro as'ense , nonya inse as'ense , oyonyarete koyeigora ebuku gose koyerigereria .
66005004	Nkarera mono ekiagera atarorekanete omonto ogwenerete koyeigora ebuku na koyesoma , gose koyerigereria .
66005005	noyomo bwa baria abagaka agantebia , Torera ; rora , Esibwori ere as'egesaku kia Yuda , ritina ria Daudi , ere onyorire okobua gw'okoigora ebuku nakobisansora biria chimanyererio bitano nabibere .
66005006	Nkarora , gati gati y'ekerogo ki'obonene neve ching'iti inye echire moyo , na gati gati ya baria abagaka , Emanwa y'Eng'ondi eteneine , igere buna yaitirwe , enyene chingunchara isano naibere , namaiso atano nabere , eichire n'Emeika etano nebere ya Nyasaye , yatomirwe as'ense yonsi .
66005007	Agacha , akayebogoria ebuku as'okoboko gw'okorio kwaye oyoikaransete igoro as'ekerogo keria ki'obonene .
66005008	Goika ochia koyebogoria ebuku eria , ching'iti inye chire moyo nabaria abagaka emerongo ebere nabane bakagwa as'obosio bw'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi , ker'oyomo obo nare nobokano , nchitabo bi'ethahabu , bichire amanukato , ekiagera naro nogosaba kw'Abachenu .
66005009	Nabarabwo bagotera ogotera okoyia bagoteba , Kwagweneire aye koyebogoria ebuku nakobigora chimanyererio biaye , naki ngwaitetwe , okamogorera Nyasaye as'amanyinga ao abanto ba ker'eamate , nemenwa , nabanio , nchisaku .
66005010	okabakora koba oboruoti nabakuani ase Nyasaye oito : nabarabwo bakogamba igoro as'ense .
66005011	Nkarora , nkaigwa eriogi ri'amalaika abange chinsemo chionsi chia keria ekerogo ki'obonene , nachiria ching'iti chire moyo , nabaria abagakaj nokobara kwabo , chilifu ikomi ara chilifu ikomi , ne chilifu ara chilifu ,
66005012	bagoteba as'eriogi rinene , Yagweneire Emanwa y'Eng'ondi eyaitetwe konyora okobua , nobonda , nobong'aini , nechinguru , nogosikwa , nobonene , nogosesenigwa .
66005013	Na ker'egetongire ekere igoro , n'igoro as'ense , n'inse as'ense , n'igoro as'enyancha , nebinto bionsi bire ime aroro , nkabigwa , bigoteba , Egesio nogosika nobonene nokobua nas'ere oyoikaransete igoro as'ekerogo ki'obonene , nas'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi goika kare nakare ,
66005014	Na chiria ching'iti inye chire moyo chikabora , Amin . Nabaria abagaka emerongo ebere nabane bakagwa bakamotung'amera ere ore moyo kare nakare .
66006001	Nkarora agwo ekero Emanwa y'Eng'ondi egachia koigora ekemo ase biria ebimanyererio , nkaigwa eyemo ase chiria ching'iti chire moyo ekobora , buna eriogi ri'okogukura , Nchuo , orore .
66006002	Nkarora , naende rora , ebarasi endabu , nere oyoyerinete narenge nobota ; akaegwa egutwa : agasoka , akabua naende anyare kobua .
66006003	Agachia koigora ekemanyererio gia kabere , nkayeigwa eng'iti ya kabere ekobora , Inchuo orore ,
66006004	egasoka ebarasi ende embariri mono , nere oyoyerinete naetwe koyorusia omorembe as'ense , erinde baitane barabwo ase barabwo : ekaegwa omoro omonene .
66006005	Agachia koigora ekemanyererio gia gatato nkayeigwa eng'iti ya gatato ere moyo ekobora , Inchuo , orore . Nkarora , ebarasi emwamu , nere oyoyerinete narenge neratili y'okorenga as'okoboko kwaye .
66006006	Nkaigwa eriogi gati gati ye ching'iti inye chire moyo , rikobora , Ekemunu ki'engano as'eshilingi , nebimunu bitato bia shairi as'eshilingi , toyasaria amaguta nedivai .
66006007	Agachia koigora ekemanyererio gia kane , nkaigwa eriogi ri'eng'iti ya kane ekobora , Inchuo , orore ,
66006008	Nkarigereria , nkarora , ebarasi y'erangi ematosi : nere oyoyerinete erieta riaye n'Amakweri , ne chimbera chimotunyaine . Bakaegwa okobua igoro as'ensemo ya kane y'ense baite as'omoro bw'esegi , nas'enchara , nas'amakweri , nase ching'iti chi'orosana chi'ense .
66006009	Agachia koigora ekemanyererio gia gatano , nkarora inse as'amathabau emeika yabo abwo baitetwe as'engecho ye ring'ana ria Nyasaye , nas'engecho y'obogani barenge nabwo .
66006010	Bakarera neriogi rinene , bagoteba , Aye Omonene , omochenu , omonyene ekeene , ngoika ririri orabanachere ekina nakorusia egesiomba amanyinga aito as'abwo baikaransete igoro as'ense ?
66006011	Bakaegwa ker'oyomo eanga entambe endabu ; bagatebigwa batimoke ake ekero egeke , goika goikerane okobara kw'abachore barabwo nabamwabo baranyare goitwa buna barabwo .
66006012	Nkarora , gakoigora ekemanyererio kia gatano narimo , norenge omotengecho omonene bw'ense ; erioba rikaba rimwamu buna etukia y'egunia emwamu , omotienyi okaba buna amanyinga ;
66006013	ching'enang'eni chikagwa igoro as'ense buna omoko okoiyeria amako aye , gokonyegerigwa nembeo enyinge .
66006014	Igoro ekarusigwa buna risankwa rikoringwa , na ker'egetunwa negesinka bikang'anyigwa birue aas'abo ,
66006015	Nabaruoti b'ense , nabanene , nabanda , nabatang'ani esegi , abanyene chinguru , na ker'omosomba , nomobiare , bakebisa as'amabwago ense , nas'ebitare bi'ebitunwa ;
66006016	bakabitebia ebitunwa nebitare , Togwere , totube , titorora obosio bwaye oyoikaransete as'ekerogo ki'obonene , nonya nendamwamu y'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi :
66006017	naki rituko rire rinene ri'endamwamu yabo yachire ; ning'o oranyare gotenena ?
66007001	Nyuma as'aya nkarora amalaika bane bateneine ase chinsemo inye chi'ense , bagochitanga chimbeo inye chi'ense , embeo tegusa igoro as'ense , nonya igoro as'enyancha , nonya igoro as'omote onde bwonsi .
66007002	Nkarora rilaika rinde , rikorina korwa aas'erioba rikorua , ore nekemanyererio kia Nyasaye ore moyo : akabaakera egeturi as'eriogi rinene , baria amalaika bane baetwe gosaria ense nenyancha ,
66007003	bagoteba , Timosaria ense gose enyancha , nonya nemete goika ekero toratieke kobabeka ekemanyererio abasomba b'Omonene Nyasaye igoro as'amasio abo .
66007004	Nkaigwa okobara kwabo ababekirwe ebimanyererio , ase ker'egesaku ki'abana b'Isiraeli , abanto chilifu emia nemerongo ene nabane .
66007005	Ab'egesaku kia Yuda chilifu ikomi naibere ababekirwe ekemanyererio : Ab'egesaku kia Reuben chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Gad chilifu ikomi naibere :
66007006	Ab'egesaku ki'Asher chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Nafutali chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Manase chilifu ikomi naibere :
66007007	Ab'egesaku kia Simion chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Lawi chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku ki'Isakaru chilifu ikomi naibere :
66007008	Ab'egesaku kia Zabulon chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Yusufu chilifu ikomi naibere : Ab'egesaku kia Benjamin chilifu ikomi naibere ababekirwe ekemanyererio .
66007009	Erio nyuma as'aya nkarora , rora omosangerereko omonene mono ekiagera omonto tarenge ore konyara koyobara , abanto ba ker'ebisaku , neamate , nabanto , nemenwa , bateneine as'obosio bw'ekerogo keria ki'obonene , nas'obosio bw'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi , babekirwe chianga chindabu , bare namato amakendo amaboko abo ;
66007010	bakorera as'eriogi rinene bakobora , Ogotoreka ase Nyasaye oito oyoikaransete as'ekerogo ki'obonene , nas'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi .
66007011	Namalaika bonsi bateneine chinsemo chionsi chi'ekerogo ki'obonene , nase chinsemo chi'abagaka nase biria ebitongwa bine bire moyo ; bakagwa maumama as'obosio bw'ekerogo ki'obonene , bakamosasima Nyasaye ,
66007012	bakobora , Amin : Ogosesenigwa , obonene , nobong'aini , nokobaka , nogosika , nokobua , nechinguru , ase Nyasaye oito goika kare nakare . Amin .
66007013	Akairaneria oyomo bwa baria abagaka agantebia , Abanto aba babekirwe chianga chindabu mbarabi ? ng'ai barure ?
66007014	Nkamotebia , Omonene one kwamanyire aya aye . Agantebia , Aba nabwo barure as'emechando eria emenene , nabarabwo basibirie chianga chiabo bagachikora chindabu as'amanyinga Emanwa y'Eng'ondi .
66007015	As'ayio nakio kiagera bare as'obosio bw'ekerogo ki'obonene kia Nyasaye ; nabarabwo iga bakomokorera ' mobaso nabotuko ase hekalu yaye ; nere oyoikaransete as'ekerogo ki'obonene narambore eema yaye igoro asebare .
66007016	Tibakoigwa enchara naende , tibakoigwa erang'o naende ; nonya nomobaso tokobaaka , nonya neriberera rinde rionsi .
66007017	Naki Emanwa y'Eng'ondi ere gati gati as'ekerogo ki'obonene nabarisie , nere nabarae ase chinsoko chi'amache are moyo ; na Nyasaye nayatinyie amariga onsi as'amaiso abo .
66008001	Goika agachia koigora ekemanyererio gia gatano nakabere igoro agakirakiri as'ekero gi'enusu y'ensa .
66008002	Nkabarora amalaika batano nababere bateneine as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , bakaegwa ebitureri bitano nabibere .
66008003	Rilaika rinde rigacha rigatenena obosio bw'amathabau , ore negetabo gi'ethahabu , akaegwa amanukato amange anyare koyabeka amo nogosaba kw'abachenu bonsi igoro as'amathabau y'ethahabu are as'obosio bw'ekerogo ki'obonene .
66008004	Nerioki ri'aria amanukato rikarina amo nogosaba kw'abachenu , as'okoboko kwa rilaika , as'obosio bwa Nyasaye .
66008005	Rilaika rigakebogoria egetabo , rigageichoria omorero bw'amathabau , akayoruta igoro as'ense ; ekaba neriogi nenkoba nokomesa nomotengecho bw'ense .
66008006	Nabaria amalaika batano nababere abanyene ebitureri bitano nabibere bakebeka ang'e banyare kobibugia .
66008007	Rilaika rie ritang'ani rikabugia egetureri , ekaba embura y'amagena nomorero bisang'aine namanyinga , bikarutwa igoro as'ense : ensemo ya gatato y'ense egasambwa , ensemo ya gatato y'emete egasambwa , obonyansi bwonsi obobese bogasambwa .
66008008	Rilaika ria kabere rikabugia egetureri , negento buna omogwekano bw'egetunwa ekenene gegwoka omorero , gekarutwa as'enyancha : ensemo ya gatato y'enyancha ekaba amanyinga .
66008009	Bigakwa ensemo ya gatato y'ebitongire bire as'enyancha , ebire moyo ; ensemo ya gatato y'amato agasarigwa .
66008010	Rilaika ria gatato rikabugia egetureri , eng'enang'eni enene ekagwa korwa igoro , yarenge gwoka buna etaya , ekagwa igoro as'ensemo ya gatato ye chindoche , n'igoro ase chinsoko chi'amache .
66008011	Nerieta riaye eng'enang'eni eria iga ekorokwa Abisintho : nensemo ya gatato y'amache ekaba abisintho ; nabanto abange bagakwa as'amache ayio ekiagera abekirwe obororo .
66008012	Rilaika ria kane rikabugia egetureri , ensemo ya gatato y'erioba ekaakwa , nensemo ya gatato y'omotienyi , nensemo ya gatato ye ching'enang'eni , erio ensemo ya gatato ebekwe omosunte , omobaso tobara ensemo ya gatato yaye , nonya noboruko boigo .
66008013	Nkarora , nkaigwa ensoti ekoiruruka gati gati igoro , egokwana neriogi rinene , Obobe , obobe , obobe , nobwabo , abaikaransete igoro as'ense , as'engecho y'eriogi ritigarete ri'ebitureri bi'amalaika batato , bare ang'e kobugia .
66009001	Rilaika ria gatano akabugia egetureri , nkarora eng'enang'eni ekorua igoro , ekogwa igoro as'ense ; akaegwa ekeigorero ki'engoro y'eora .
66009002	Akayeigora engoro y'eora ; erioki rigasoka korwa engoro eria buna erioki ri'eriko rinene ; nerioba nomoika bikabekwa omosunte as'engecho y'erioki riria ri'engoro .
66009003	chingige chikarua as'erioki riria , chikagenda igoro as'ense , chikaegwa chinguru buna chinguru chia nge y'ense .
66009004	chigatebigwa tichiria obonyansi bw'ense nonya negento kende gionsi kere ekebese , gose omote onde bwonsi , tatiga abanto baria batari nekemanyererio kia Nyasaye as'amasio abo .
66009005	Bakaegwa ogochika tibabaita , korende babachande emetienyi etano : nokoromwa kwabo iga kwarenge buna okoromwa kwa nge , gekoroma omonto .
66009006	Nas'amatuko aria mwanyabanto nabarigie amakweri , nabarabwo tibakoyarora ; nabarigie ogokwa , namakweri nabatame .
66009007	Nebieni bie chingige chiria iga bire buna chibarasi chiabekirwe ang'e as'esegi ; n'igoro as'emetwe yabo buna chigutwa , omogwekano obo nethahabu , namasio abo igare buna amasio aya mwanyabanto .
66009008	Nigo barenge netukia buna ney'abakungu . Namaino abo igarenge buna amaino chisibwori .
66009009	Nabarabwo iga barenge namasabo buna chiganchwa chi'ebioma ; neriogi rie chimbaba chiabo iga riarenge buna eriogi rie chigari , na buna chibarasi chinyinge chikogenda bwango as'esegi .
66009010	Naende nchire nebimincha buna ebia nge , igachire nemchurera as'ebimincha biabo . Nechinguru gochanda mwanyabanto emetienyi etano .
66009011	N'igoro asechire nchire nomoruoti , rilaika ri'eora : erieta riaye as'Ekeibirania Abaddon , nas'Ekeyunani erieta riaye Apollion .
66009012	Obobe bwe ritang'ani bwaetire , Rora , amabe abere atigarete , arache nyuma .
66009013	Rilaika ria gatano narimo rikabugia egetureri , nkaigwa eriogi erimo rikorua use chiria chingunchara chi'amathabau ay'ethahabu , ayare as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ,
66009014	rikoritebia riria rilaika ria gatano narimo orenge negetureri , Basibore amalaika bane basibire as'oroche oronene Eufarati .
66009015	Baria amalaika bane bagasiborwa , ababegetwe ang'e as'ensa eria nerituko nomotienyi nomwaka , banyare goita ensemo ya gatato ya mwanyabanto .
66009016	Nokobara kw'emeganda erinete chibarasi ne chimilion chimia ibere .
66009017	Naboigo nachiroche chibarasias'okorora kwane , nabwo baikaransete igoro ase chire , mbare nebioma ebikuba biabo buna nebi'omorero , na samawati , nekebiriti : nemetwe ye chibarasi echio buna emetwe ye chisibwori ; nakorua as'emenwa yabo yaruete omorero nerioki nekebiriti .
66009018	Ensemo ya gatato ya mwanyabanto bagaitwa as'atato ayio , as'omorero oyio nerioki erio nekebiriti ekio , kiaruete as'emenwa yabo .
66009019	Naki chinguru chiabo chibarasi nas'emenwa yabo , nas'ebimincha biabo : naki ebimincha biabo nomogwekano bwe ching'iti , echire nemetwe , ase ero iga chikoroma .
66009020	Na mwanyabanto batigarete , bataitetwe as'amaakwa ayio , tibeitetie as'emeremo y'amaboko abo erinde tibasasima ebirecha , nechisanamu chi'ethahabu , nechi'efetha , nechi'etai , nechi'amagena , nechi'emete ; chitakonyara korora , nonya nkoigwa , gose kogenda :
66009021	nonya nogoita kwabo tibeitetie , nonya noborogi bwabo , nonya nobotomani bwabo , nonya nokoiba kwabo .
66010001	Nkarora rilaika rinde rire nechinguru ogoika korwa igoro , bweboete rire ; nomokubinyongo bw'embura igoro as'omotwe oye , obosio bwaye bwarenge buna erioba , namagoro aye buna chisiro chi'omorero ;
66010002	nas'okoboko kwaye narenge nebuku enke yamanoirwe : akabeka okogoro kwaye gw'okorio igoro as'enyancha , nogw'okobee igoro as'ense ;
66010003	akarera as'eriogi rinene , buna esibwori ekoruma : agachia korera buna chinkoba isano naibere chikoaka eriogi riabo .
66010004	Ekero chinkoba isano naibere chigachia koaka eriogi riabo nkaba ang'e korika : nainche nkaigwa eriogi rikorua igoro rigoteba , Yabeke ekemanyererio amang'ana aya atebwa nechinkoba isano naibere , toyarika .
66010005	Na riria rilaika naroche agatenena igoro as'enyancha na igoro as'ense akaimokereria okoboko kwaye korigereria igoro .
66010006	Agatiana as'ere ore moyo goika kare nakare , oyotongete igoro nebinto bireo , nense nebinto bireo , nenyancha nebinto bireo , ng'a tigekoba ekero nyuma as'aya :
66010007	tariga as'amatuko aria aya rilaika ria gatano nakabere karabe ang'e koaka , erio agwo obobisi bwa Nyasaye naboikeranigwe , buna aria amang'ana amaya abarandeitie abasomba baye ababani .
66010008	Neriogi riria naigwete korwa igoro riakwanete nainche naende , rigateba , Genda oyebogorie ebuku eria enke yamanoirwe as'okoboko kwa riria rilaika riteneine igoro as'enyancha n'igoro as'ense .
66010009	Nkarigendera rilaika riria nkamotebia , Ing'a ebuku eria enke . Agantebia , yebogorie , oyerie ; nero nekobeke obororo enda yao , korende as'omonwa oo nebe enyansu buna oboke .
66010010	Nkayebogoria ebuku eria enke as'okoboko kwa rilaika riria nkayeria ; nero akaba enyansu buna oboke as'omonwa one , ngachia koyeria enda yane ekabekwa obororo .
66010011	Agantebia , Nekogwenerete kobana naende igoro as'abanto abange nas'ebisaku , nemenwa , nabaruoti .
66011001	Nainche nkaegwa emoti omogwekano bw'enyimbo : oyomo agantebia , Imoka , oyerenge hekalu ya Nyasaye , namathabau , nabwo bagosasima aroro .
66011002	Nekio ekeoreri kere isiko ase hekalu , ogetige isiko , tokerenga ; naki ebisaku biakeeirwe ekio : nabarabwo nabayotache omochie omochenu emetienyi emerongo ene nebere .
66011003	Nainche nimbae abwo abarori bane babere , nabwo nabaorokie obobani amatuko elifu eyemo nechimia ibere namerongo etano nomo , babekirwe chianga chie chigunia .
66011004	Abwo nabwo eria emezeituni ebere nabiria ebibekerero bie chitaya bibere biteneine as'obosio bwa Nyasaye bw'ense .
66011005	Nomonto kararigie kobachanda , omorero norue as'emenwa yabo nakobaria ababisa babo : nomonto kararigie kobachanda , naboigo emogwenerete aitwe .
66011006	Aba mbare nokobua gosieka igoro , embura tenyara gotwa as'amatuko ay'obobani bwabo : naende mbare nokobua igoro as'amache koyaonchora koba amanyinga , nakoyeaka ense ase ker'okoakwa , koreng'ana buna barigetie .
66011007	Ekero barakore oborori bwabo , eria eng'iti ekorua as'eora nekore esegi nabarabwo , nere nababue nakobaita .
66011008	Nebitondo biabo nabibe as'enchera y'omochie oria omonene okorokwa as'engecho y'omoika Sodomu , na Misiri , aas'Omonene obo abambetwe .
66011009	Na korwa as'abwo abanto , neamate , nemenwa , nebisaku , nababirigererie ebitondo biabo amatuko atato nenusu , tibagotiga ebitondo biabo bibekwe embera ime .
66011010	Nabarabwo abaikaransete igoro as'ense nabakore omogoko igoro asebare nagochenga : nabairerane ebiegwa ; ekiagera ababani abwo babere bakabachanda barabwo abaikaransete igoro as'ense .
66011011	Brio nyuma as'amatuko atato nenusu omoika ore moyo okorua ase Nyasaye okabasoa , bagatenena ; okoiroka okonene gokabagwera abanto babaroche .
66011012	Bakaigwa eriogi rinene korwa igoro rikobatebia , Rina goika aria . Bakarina igoro as'amare ; ababisa babo bakabarigereria .
66011013	Nas'ensa eria ekaba omotengecho bw'ense omonene , nensemo y'ikomi y'omochie ekagwa ; abanto chilifu isano naibere bagaitwa as'omotengecho oria : nabatigarete bagasogwa nomoondoko , bakamotogia Nyasaye o igoro .
66011014	Obobe bwa kabere bwaetire : rora , Obobe bwa gatato naboche bwango .
66011015	Rilaika ria gatano nakabere rikabugia egetureri ; akaba amariogi amanene igoro , agoteba , Oboruoti bw'ense bwabaire oboruoti bw'Omonene oito , nobwa Kristo oye : nere nagambe goika kare nakare .
66011016	Nabaria abagaka emerengo ebere nabane baikaranseteo as'obosio bwa Nyasaye as'chirogo bi'obonene biabo bakagwa maumama , bakamosasima Nyasaye ,
66011017	bagateba , Twakobakire Omonene Nyasaye , Omobui , oyore aroro , naende kwarenge arero , ekiagera kwabogoirie okobua kwao kore okonene , okagamba .
66011018	Nebisaku bikabea , endamwamu yao egacha , nekero bakogambigwa abakure , nekero gi'okobaa eng'eria yabo abwo abatomwa bao ababani , nabachenu , nabwo basigete erieta riao , abake nabanene , nakobasaria abwo bakoyesaria ense .
66011019	Hekalu ya Nyasaye ekaigorwa igoro ; nesanduku y'emuma ekarorekana ime ase hekalu yaye ; bikaba nokomesa , negeturi , nenkoba , nomotengecho , nembura y'amagena enyinge mono .
66012001	Negekone ekenene gekarorekana igoro , omokungu bweboetie erioba , nomotienyi orenge inse as'amagoro aye , n'igoro as'omotwe oye egutwa ya ching'enang'eni ikomi naibere .
66012002	Nere igsrenge morito : akarera , akaba nobororo nakoromwa aibore .
66012003	Egekone kende gekarorekana igoro ; rora enchoka enene embariri , eyarenge nemetwe etano nebere , nechingunchara ikomi , n'igoro as'emetwe yaye chigutwa isano naibere .
66012004	Nekemincha kiaye gegakurura ensemo ya gatato ye ching'enang'eni chi'igoro , nagochiyeria as'ense . Neria enchoka egatenena as'obosio bw'omokungu oria ore ang'e koibora , erio okoibora emorie omwana oye .
66012005	Akaibora omwana omoisia , oranyare kobigambia ebisaku bionsi nenyimbo y'ekioma ; nomwana oye akabogorigwa goika ase Nyasaye nas'ekerogo kiaye ki'obonene .
66012006	Omokungu oria agatama gochia eroro aas'aroseretigwe na Nyasaye , erio bamorende aroro amatuko elifu eyemo nechimia ibere nemerongo etano nomo .
66012007	Yarenge esegi igoro : Mikael namalaika aye bakarwana nenchoka ; enchoka ekarwana namalaika aye amo ;
66012008	nabarabwo tibabua nonya naase abo tarorekana naende igoro .
66012009	Enchoka egatugutwa , eria enene , eng'iti ya kare , ekorokwa Omogenki na Saitani , omong'ainereria bw'ense yonsi ; egatugutwa goika inse , namalaika aye agatugutwa amo nero .
66012010	Nkaigwa eriogi rinene igoro , rigoteba , Bono ogotoreka gwaito kwabaire , nokobua , nobonda bwa Nyasaye oito , nokobua gwa Kristo oye ; naki otugutirwe omosoeri bw'abaminto , okobasoera as'obosio bwa Nyasaye oito , omobaso nobotuko .
66012011	Nabarabwo bakamobua as'amanyinga Emanwa y'eng'ondi , nase ring'ana ri'okogana kwabo ; tibancha obogima bwabo nonya ngoika ekero gi'ogokwa .
66012012	As'ayio goka , igoro , nainwe abamoikaranseteo . Obobe nobw'ense nenyancha : ekiagera oria omogenki oikire asebare omonyene endamwamu enyinge , omanyire ng'a igare nekero egeke .
66012013	Nenchoka eria egachia korora ng'a yatugutirwe as'ense , ekamochanda omokungu oria omoiborete omwana omoisia .
66012014	Omokungu oria akaegwa chimbaba ibere buna echi'ensoti eria enene , anyare koiruruka agende as'eroro , goika aas'aye , agwo akorendwa ekero , nebiro , nenusu y'ekero , arue as'obosio bw'eyio enchoka .
66012015	Enchoka ekarusia as'omonwa oye , nyuma y'omokungu , amache buna oroche , amokore kobogorigwa noroche roria .
66012016	Ense ekamokonya omokungu , ense ekamanora omonwa oye , ekaromera oroche roria yarusetie eria enchoka as'omonwa oye .
66012017	Enchoka ekamobeera omokungu , ekagenda erinde ekore esegi igoro as'oroiboro rwaye rwatigarete , abayabwatete amachiko a Nyasaye , nakoba nokogana kwa Yesu Kristo .
66013001	Ngatenena igoro as'omokenye bw'enyancha . Nkarora eng'iti ekorua as'enyancha eyere nemetwe etano nebere , nechingunchara ikomi , n'igoro ase chingunchara chiria chigutwa ikomi , n'igoro as'emetwe yaye amarieta ay'okorama .
66013002	Neria eng'iti naroche iga yarenge omogwekano bw'egwachi , namagoro aye igarenge buna amagoro edubba , nomonwa oye buna omonwa bw'esibwori ; eria enchoka ekayea chinguru chiaye , nekerogo kiaye ki'obonene , nokobua okonge .
66013003	Nkarora oyomo bw'emetwe yaye buna bwatekire orogoma rw'amakweri , Okoakwa kwaye kw'amakweri gokagwenigwa ; ense yonsi egakumia nyuma as'eng'iti eria .
66013004	Bakayesasima eria enchoka , bakabora , Ning'o oreng'aine neng'iti ? Ning'o oranyare gokora esegi nero ?
66013005	Ekaegwa omonwa ogokwana amang'ana amanene , ay'okorama . Ekaegwa okobua gokora emeremo yaye emetienyi emerongo ene nebere .
66013006	Ekamanora omonwa oye emorame Nyasaye , nakorirama erieta riaye , nobomenyo bwaye , nabwo bamenyete igoro .
66013007	Ekaegwa gokora esegi nabachenu nakobabua : ekaegwa okobua igoro as'eamate , nabanto , nemenwa , negesaku .
66013008	Abanto bonsi abamenyete igoro y'ense nabayesasime , ker'oyomo erieta riaye ritarikiri as'ebuku y'obogima y'Emanwa y'eng'ondi yaitetwe ritang'ani ense etarabekwa oboroso .
66013009	Omonto karabe namato , aigwe .
66013010	Omonto karasakore , nasakorwe . Omonto karaite as'omoro , naitwe as'omoro . Naboigo kore okoremereria nokwegena kw'abachenu .
66013011	Nkarora eng'iti ende egotira korwa inse ; nero iga yarenge nechingunchara ibere omogwekano buna emanwa y'eng'ondi , egakwana buna enchoka .
66013012	Egokbrera okobua gwonsi kw'eng'iti eria ye ritang'ani as'obosio bwaye . Nakoyekora ense nabonsi abamenyeteo ime bayesasime eng'iti ye ritang'ani , ero eyio orogoma rwaye rw'amakweri rwagwenigwe .
66013013	Nero yakorire ebikone ebinene , erinde ekore omorero goika korwa igoro as'ense , as'obosio bwa mwanyabanto .
66013014	Nero ekobang'aina abamenyete igoro as'ense , as'engecho y'ebikone biria yaetwe kobikora as'obosio bw'eng'iti , ekabatebia abamenyete igoro as'ense , koyekorera esanamu eng'iti eria , yarenge norogoma rw'amakweri , ekaba moyo .
66013015	Ekaegwa kobeka omoika as'esanamu y'eng'iti , goika eria esanamu y'eng'iti ekwane , nagokora bonsi abatasasimeti esanamu y'eng'iti baitwe .
66013016	Nere obakorire bonsi , abake nabanene , abanda nabataka , abasibore nabasomba , babekwe ekemanyererio as'okoboko kwabo gw'okorio , gose as'amasio abo ;
66013017	erinde omonto onde bwonsi tagora gose gotonda , tatiga ere oyore nekemanyererio keria gose erieta ri'eng'iti eria , gose okobara kw'erieta riaye .
66013018	Obong'aini naiga bore . Ere oyore nechisemi , nabare okobara kw'eng'iti eyio ; naki nokobara kw'omwana o mwanyabanto : nokobara kwaye ne chimia isano nemo , namerongo etano nomo naisano nemo .
66014001	Nkarora , na rora , Emanwa y'eng'ondi yatenenire igoro as'egetunwa kia Zayoni , abanto chilifu emia nemerongo ene nainye , amo nere , abare nerieta ri'Ise oye , riarikirwe as'amasio abo .
66014002	Nkaigwa eriogi korwa igoro buna eriogi ri'amache amange , naende buna eriogi ri'enkoba enene : nkaigwa eriogi abakobugia amakano , bakoyabugia amakano abo :
66014003	nabarabwo bagotera ogotera , okore buna nokoyia as'obosio bw'ekerogo ki'obonene , nas'obosio bwe ching'iti inye echire moyo , nabaria abagaka : omonto tari oranyare kwegera ogotera koria tatiga baria chilifu emia namerongo ene nainye , abagorirwe korwa as'ense .
66014004	Aba nabwo batabekiri nobobe amo nabakungu , naki nabekungi . Aba nabwo bakoyetunya Emanwa y'eng'ondi ker'aas'ekogenda . Abagorirwe korwa as'ense , babe abe ritang'ani ba Nyasaye nas'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi .
66014005	Nas'emenwa yabo oborimo bonde tibwarorekanete : ekiagera tibari nakemoa as'obosio bw'ekerogo ki'obonene bwa Nyasaye .
66014006	Nkarora rilaika rinde rikoiruruka gati gati igoro , omonyene enchili ya kare nakare , okobaranderia abamenyete igoro as'ense , na ker'egesaku neamate nemenwa nabanto ;
66014007	agateba as'eriogi rinene , Sika Nyasaye , mobake ; naki ensa y'ekina kiaye yachire : mosasime ere oyekorete igoro nense nenyancha nechinsoko chi'amache .
66014008	Rilaika rinde rikamotunya , rikabora , Ogure , ogure Babeli , omochie oria ore omonene , ekiagera noro onyoisirie ebisaku bionsi edivai y'endamwamu y'obotomani bwaye .
66014009	Rilaika ria gatato rikabatunya , rigakwana as'eriogi rinene , Omonto karayesasime eng'iti nesanamu yaye , nakonyora ekemanyererio as'obosio bwaye gose as'okoboko kwaye ,
66014010	nere nanywe edivai y'endamwamu ya Nyasaye eyarosigwe etasang'anirie namache as'egekombe ki'endamwamu yaye ; nere naromwe as'omorero nekebiriti obosio bw'amalaika abachenu , naende as'obosio bw'Emanwa y'eng'ondi .
66014011	Nerioki ri'obo roro bwabo rikorina igoro goika kare nakare ; nabarabwo tibari nogotimoka omobaso nobotuko , abwo bayesasimire eng'iti nesanamu yaye , na ker'oyokenyorire ekemanyererio ki'erieta riaye .
66014012	Agwo nao okoremereria kw'abachenu , babwatete amachiko a Nyasaye , nokwegena kwa Yesu .
66014013	Nkaigwa eriogi korwa igoro rigoteba , Rika , Mbare negesio abakure , abagokwa as'Omonene korwa bono : ee , ogoteba Omoika , banyare gotimoka korwa as'ogokora emeremo yabo ; naki ogokora kwabo igo gokobatunyana .
66014014	Nkarora , na rora , rire rirabu ; n'igoro ase rire erio naikaransete oyomo , omogwekano bw'Omwana-o-mwanyabanto , oyore negutwa y'ethahabu igoro as'omotwe oye , nas'okoboko kwaye omoyio omwoge .
66014015	Rilaika rinde rigasoka korwa hekalu , as'eriogi rinene okomorera ere oyoikaransete igoro ase rire riria , Beka omoyio oo , ogese : naki ensa ya rigesa yachire ; ekiagera rigesa ri'ense riomire mono .
66014016	Nere oyoikaransete igoro ase rire akaruta omoyio oye igoro as'ense , ense ekageswa .
66014017	Rilaika rinde rikarua ase hekalu ere igoro , nere boigo nare nomoyio omwoge .
66014018	Ne rilaika rinde rikarua as'aria amathabau , omonyene chinguru igoro as'omorero ; as'eriogi rinene akamorera oria omonyene omoyio oria omwoge , akabora , Beka omoyio oo omwoge , sangereria ebisago bi'omosabibu bw'ense , naki emesabibu yaye yatobire mono .
66014019	Rilaika riria rikaruta omoyio oye goika ense , agasangereria omosabibu bw'ense , akaruta as'ekemitero , y'endamwamu ya Nyasaye , eria enene .
66014020	Ekemitero keria gegatachwa isiko as'omochie , amanyinga akarua as'ekemitero goika as'ebiokio bie chibarasi , orogendo rwa chimaili chimia ibere .
66015001	Nkarora egekone kende as'igoro , ekenene gi'ogokumia , amalaika atano nabere amanyene amaakwa atano nabere ay'omoerio ; naki ime as'aro endamwamu ya Nyasaye yaikeranire .
66015002	Nkarora omogwekano bw'enyancha y'ekerore esang'aine nomorero ; nabarabwo abanyene okobua nagweatanana neria eng'iti , nesanamu yaye , nekemanyererio kiaye , nokobara kw'erieta riaye , batenenire igoro as'enyancha y'ekerore , abanyene amakano a Nyasaye .
66015003	Nabarabwo bagotera ogotera kwa Musa omosomba o Nyasaye , nogotera kw'Emanwa y'eng'ondi , bagoteba , Okonene kw'ogokumia ogokora kwao , aye Omonene Nyasaye , Omobui ; echi'ekeene , nechi'oboronge chinchera chiao , aye Omoruoti bw'abachenu .
66015004	Ning'o otagosigeti , Omonene , nakoribaka erieta riao ? naki aye bweka ore omochenu : naki ebisaku bionsi nabiche nagosasima as'obosio bwao ; ekiagera ogokora kwao nokw'oboronge gwatiekire koorokigwa .
66015005	Nyuma as'aya nkarora , hekalu y'eema y'okogana as'igoro ekaigorwa :
66015006	nabaria amalaika atano nabere , abanyene amaakwa atano nabere , bakarua ase hekalu , babekirwe chianga chi'egatani engiya endabu , basibirwe ebikuba biabo nechinkini chi'ethahabu .
66015007	Neyemo ya chiria ching'iti inye chire moyo , ekabaa amalaika aria atano nabere ebitabo bitano nabibere bi'ethahabu , bichire endamwamu ya Nyasaye , ore moyo goika kare nakare .
66015008	Hekalu egaichorwa nerioki rikorua as'obonene bwa Nyasaye nokobua kwaye ; tarenge omonto oranyare gosoa ime ase hekalu goika aikeranigwe amaakwa atano nabere a baria amalaika atano nabere .
66016001	Nkaigwa eriogi rinene korwa hekalu ime , rikobatebia baria amalaika atano nabere , Genda , mobitere biria ebitabo bi'endamwamu ya Nyasaye igoro as'ense .
66016002	Akagenda oyo bwe ritang'ani , agaitera egetabo kiaye igoro as'ense ; ekaba rigumba ribe ri'obobe , igoro ase baria abanto abanyene ekemanyererio ki'eng'iti , nabaria abagosasima esanamu yaye .
66016003	Rilaika ria kabere rigaitera egetabo kiaye igoro as'enyancha ; ekaba amanyinga buna amanyinga ay'omonto okure , ebinto bionsi bire moyo bigakwa as'enyancha .
66016004	Rilaika ria gatato rigaitera egetabo kiaye igoro ase chindoche , nase chinsoko chi'amache , chikaba amanyinga .
66016005	Nkaigwa rilaika ri'amache rigoteba , Aye nomonyene oboronge , aye oreo , noyorengeo , Omochenu , ekiagera kwanachire iga :
66016006	naki baiterete amanyinga ay'abachenu nababani , naye kwabaeire amanyinga bayanywe : nabarabwo bagweneire .
66016007	Nkaigwa amathabau agoteba , Nabo , Omonene Nyasaye , Omobui , nebi'oboronge , nebi'ekeene ebina biao .
66016008	Rilaika ria kane rigaitera egetabo kiaye igoro as'erioba ; rikaegwa kobarura abana ba mwanyabanto as'omorero .
66016009	Na mwanyabanto bakarurwa neriberera rinene ; bakarirama erieta ria Nyasaye oyore nokobua igoro as'amaakwa onsi , gose tibeitetie nakomoa obonene .
66016010	Rilaika ria gatano rigaitera egetabo kiaye igoro as'ekerogo ki'obonene ki'eria eng'iti ; oboruoti bwaye bokabekwa omosunte ; bagatakuna chimeme chiabo as'engecho y'obororo bwabo ,
66016011	bakamorama Nyasaye o igoro as'engecho y'obororo bwabo , nekiagera as'amagumba abo ; gose tibeitetie as'ogokora kwabo .
66016012	Rilaika ria gatano narimo rigaitera egetabo kiaye igoro as'oroche roria oronene Eufarate ; amache aye agakama , erio enchera erosigwe as'abaruoti bakorua as'erioba rikorua .
66016013	Nkarora emeika etato y'eubi buna ebioto , ekorua as'omonwa bw'eria enchoka , nas'omonwa bw'eria eng'iti , nas'omonwa bw'oria omobani bw'oborimo .
66016014	Naki eyio nemeika y'ebirecha , egokora ebikone , ekorua nakobagendera abaruoti b'ense yonsi , kobasangereria as'esegi ye rituko riria rinene ria Nyasaye , Omobui .
66016015	( Rigereria , ngochande buna omoibi . Nare negesio oyokorenda , noyokorosia chianga chiaye , tagenda getirianda , barore obosoku bwaye . )
66016016	Akabasangereria goika aase akorokwa as'Ekeiberania , HariMagedon .
66016017	Rilaika ria gatano nakabere rigaitera egetabo kiaye as'omoika ; eriogi rinene rikarua ase hekalu y'igoro , nas'ekerogo keria ki'obonene , rigoteba , Yatiekire koba :
66016018	ekaba eriogi nenkoba nokomesa ; okaba omotengecho bw'ense omonene , korwa ekero abana ba mwanyabanto babete igoro as'ense tiyanya koba buna igo , omotengecho omonene buna oyio .
66016019	Nomochie oria omonene ogatananeka chinsemo isato , nemechie y'ebisaku ekagwa : na Babeli oria omonene okainyorwa as'obosio bwa Nyasaye , amoe egekombe ki'edivai y'obotindi bw'endamwamu yaye .
66016020	Ker'egesinka gegatama , nebitunwa tibiarorekana naende .
66016021	Nembura y'amagena enene mono , ey'amagena amarito buna etalanta , egaika korwa igoro as'abana ba mwanyabanto . Mwanyabanto bakamorama Nyasaye as'engecho y'okoakwa koria kw'embura y'amagena ; naki okoakwa kwaye nokonene mono .
66017001	Agacha oyomo bw'amalaika aria atano nabere omonyene biria ebitabo bitano nabibere , agakwana nainche , agateba , Nchuo aiga , ninkworokie ekina ki'oria omotomani omonene oikaransete igoro as'amache amange ;
66017002	er'oyio abaruoti b'ense batomanire nere , nabwo bamenyete as'ense batindire as'edivai y'obotomani bwaye .
66017003	Akambogoria as'Omoika goika eroro : nkarora omokungu oikaransete igoro as'eng'iti embariri mono , eichire namarieta ay'okorama , ere nemetwe etano nebere nechingunchara ikomi .
66017004	Nomokungu oria igarenge obekirwe eanga y'omonyinga nembariri , orosigwe as'ethahabu namagena ayare nerigori nechiruru , ore negekombe gi'ethahabu okoboko kwaye geichire obobe , neubi y'obotomani bwaye .
66017005	Nas'obosio bwaye narenge nerieta , riarikirwe , Obobisi , Babeli Omonene , Ng'ina Abatomani Nobobe Bw'ense ,
66017006	Nkamorora oria omokungu otindire as'amanyinga abachenu , namanyinga abarori ba Yesu , Ninche ngachia komorora ngakumia nogokumia okonene .
66017007	Riria rilaika rigantebie , Naki ogokumia ? Ningotebie obobisi bw'omokungu oyio , neng'iti emobogoretie , ere nemetwe eria etano nebere , nachiria chingunchara ikomi .
66017008	Eria eng'iti kwaroche yarenge aroro , nero terio ; nero ng'ang'e ere korina korwa as'eora , nakogenda as'ogosira . Nabarabwo abamenyete igoro as'ense , abatarikiri amarieta abo as'ebuku y'obogima korwa ekero ense ekobekwa oboroso , nabakumie bakoyerora eria eng'iti , buna yarenge aroro , nero teiyo , nero nebeo .
66017009	Agwo nao bore obong'aini nechisemi , Eria emetwe etano nebere nebitunwa bitano nabibere as'aikaranserete omokungu oria :
66017010	nabirobio nabaruoti batano nababere ; batano batiekire kogwa , noyomo nareo , noyonde taracha ; nere karache nemogwenerete aikaranse ekero egeke .
66017011	Neria eng'iti yarenge aroro nero teiyo , ero nero y'isano naisato , nero neyemo ya chiria isano naibere ; nero nkogendere as'ogosira .
66017012	Na chiria chingunchara ikomi kwaroche nabaruoti , abatarabonyora oboruoti goika bono ; korende banyorire chinguru buna abaruoti as'ensa eyemo amo neria eng'iti .
66017013	Aba mbare nokorengereria okomo , nabarabwo bayeeire eng'iti eria chinguru chiabo nokobua kwabo .
66017014	Aba nabakore esegi n'Emanwa y'eng'ondi , n'Emanwa y'eng'ondi nebabue , naki n'Omonene bw'abanene , n'Omoruoti bw'abaruoti ; nabwo abarangerigwe , abachore , abegeni , nababue amo nere .
66017015	Agantebia , Amache aria kwaroche , as'aikaransete oria omotomani , nabanto nemesangerereko , nebisdku , nemenwa .
66017016	Nachiria chingunchara ikomi kwaroche igoro as'eng'iti , abwo nabamogeche oria omotomani , nabamokore koba bosa negetirianda , nabamorie chinyama chiaye , nabamosambe kegima nomorero .
66017017	Naki Nyasaye obekire emioyo yabo gokora okorengereria kwaye , nagoikera okorengereria okomo , nakoa eria eng'iti oboruoti goika amang'ana a Nyasaye aikeranigwe .
66017018	Noria omokungu kwaroche , noro oria omochie omonene , omonyene oboruoti igoro as'abaruoti b'ense .
66018001	Nyuma as'aya nkarora rilaika rinde rigoika korwa igoro , omonyene chinguru chinene ; ense ekarabigwa as'obonene bwaye .
66018002	Akarera nechinguru , as'eriogi rinene , ogoteba , Ogure , ogure Babeli oria omonene , obaire obomenyo bw'ebirecha , noborendi bwa ker'omoika bw'eubi , noborendi bwa ker'enyon y'eubi enyene okogechia .
66018003	Naki ebisaku bionsi biagure as'edivai y'endamwamu y'obotomani bwaye ; nabaruoti b'ense batomanire nere , nabanda b'ense banyorire enibo ase chinguru chi'oboenenu bwaye .
66018004	Nkaigwa eriogi rinde korwa igoro , rigoteba , Karue asare , inwe abanto bane , timobwatana nebibe biaye , erinde timonyora okoakwa kwaye ,
66018005	Naki ebibe biaye biaikire nonya igoro , na Nyasaye oinyoire obobe bwaye .
66018006	Moakane buna aruete , momoe ara kabere koreng'ana buna emeremo yaye ; as'egekombe ekio asang'ananirie mosang'ananerie ara kabere .
66018007	As'okoreng'ana buna etogirie nagokora obwansu , moe obororo nogoichana koreng'ana boigo : naki otebire as'enkoro yaye , Naikaransire eting'ana omoruoti , nainche tindi omoboraka , gose tinkorora ogoichana nonya ng'ake .
66018008	As'ayio amaakwa aye nache ase rituko erimo , amakweri , ogoichana , nenchara ; nere nasambwe nomorero : naki Omonene Nyasaye omogambetie nare nechinguru .
66018009	Nabaruoti b'ense batomanire nere nagokora obwansu amo nere nabarere nakomweumeria , kobakorirora erioki ri'okoyia kwaye ,
66018010	bagotenena are as'okoiroka obororo bwaye , bagoteba , Obobe , obobe nobwaye omochie oria ore omonene , Babeli , omochie oria ore nechinguru , naki as'ensa eyemo ekina kiao giachire .
66018011	Nabanda b'ense barerire nakomweumeria , naki omonto tari oragore ebinto biaye naende ;
66018012	ebinto bi'ethahabu , nebi'efetha , nebi'amagena aye rigori rinene , nechiruru , negatani nomonyinga , nariri , neanga embariri ; na ker'omote bw'ogotioka , na ker'egento kerosirie namaino enchogu , na ker'egento ki'omote bwe rigori rinene , negi'etai , negi'ekioma , neki'amagena akomekameka ;
66018013	na mdalasini , n'uvumba , namanukato , n'ubani , nedivai , namaguta ay'emezeituni , nobosie obuya , nengano , nechiombe , neching'ondi , ne chibarasi , nechigari chi'esegi , nemebere ; nemeika y'abana ba mwanyabanto .
66018014	Namatunda arengereirie nomoyoo agosireirie , nebinto bionsi bire ebiterere nebinto bi'obonene biagosireirie ; gose tokonyara kobirora naende nonya ng'ake .
66018015	Nabaonchoreria b'ebinto ebio , banyorire enibo asare , nabatenene are , as'okoiroka obororo bwaye , bakorera nakweumia :
66018016	bagoteba , Obobe , obobe nobwaye omochie oria omonene obekire egatani , nomonyinga , neanga embariri , nakorosigwa as'ethahabu nerigena rie rigori rinene neruru !
66018017	Naki as'ensa eyemo obonda obonge bore buna iga bwabaire bosa . Na ker'omonene bw'obwato , na ker'oyokogenda ime as'obwato , nabairi obwato , nabwo bonsi bagokora emeremo as'enyancha , bagatenena are ,
66018018	bakarera mono , kobachia korirora erioki ri'okoyia kwaye , bagateba , Omochie ki ore omogwekano bw'omochie oyio omonene ?
66018019	Bakaruta ebuse igoro as'emetwe yabo , bakarera , bakaiyeria amariga , nakweumia , bagoteba , Obobe , obobe nobwaye omochie oria ore omonene , or'oyio ime yaye bonsi abanyene amato ase chinyancha banyorire enibo as'obonda bwaye ; naki as'ensa eyemo obaire ritongo .
66018020	Goka igoro yaye , inwe igoro , nainwe abachenu , nabatomwa , nababani ; naki Nyasaye onachire ekina kiaino igoro asare .
66018021	Rilaika rinde rire nechinguru rikaimokia rigena , buna rigena rinene rigosia , akariruta as'enyancha , akabora , Iga ase chinguru chinyinge norutwe Babeli , omochie oria omonene , gose tokonyara kororekana nonya ng'ake .
66018022	Neriogi ri'ababugia amakano , nebinanda , nechisirimbi , nebitureri , tibikoigugwa ime asore naende nonya ng'ake ; nonya nomorosia onde bwonsi bw'emeremo ende yonsi takororekana ime asore naende , nonya ng'ake ; nonya neriogi ri'orogena rogosia tirikoigugwa ime asore naende nonya ng'ake ;
66018023	Nonya nokobara gw'etaya tekomoreka ime asore naende nonya ng'ake , nonya neriogi ri'omonene bw'enyangi nomoriakari bw'enyangi tirikoigugwa ime asore naende ; naki abaonchoreria asore iga barenge abanene b'ense ; ekiagera ebisaku bionsi biang'ainirwe as'oborogi bwao .
66018024	Na ime yaye akarorekana amanyinga ababani nay'abachenu , naya baria bonsi abaitetwe igoro as'ense .
66019001	Nyuma as'aya nkaigwa eriogi ri'emeganda emenge , eriogi rinene as'igoro , rigoteba , Haleluya ; Ogotoreka , nobonene , nechinguru , igachire as'Omonene Nyasaye oito :
66019002	naki ebina biaye nebi'oboronge nebi'ekeene : naki omogambirie oria omotomani omonene , oyoyesaririe ense as'obotomani bwaye , oakanire as'egesiomba amanyinga abasomba baye as'amaboko aye .
66019003	Bagateba eria kabere , Haleluya . Nerioki riaye rikaimokerera igoro goika kare nakare .
66019004	Nabaria abagaka emerongo ebere nabane , nachiria ching'iti inye chire moyo chigatung'ama gosasima Nyasaye oikaransete as'ekerogo ki'obonene , bagoteba , Amin ; Haleluya .
66019005	Eriogi rigasoka korwa as'ekerogo ki'obonene rigoteba , Mobake Nyasaye oito , inwe abasomba baye bonsi , inwe abamosigete , abake nabanene .
66019006	Nkaigwa eriogi buna eriogi ri'emeganda emenge , naende buna eriogi ri'amache amange , naende buna eriogi ri'enkoba ere nechinguru , rigoteba , Haleluya : naki Omonene Nyasaye oito , Omobui , ogambire .
66019007	Togoke , tochenge , tomoe obonene bwaye : naki enyangi y'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi yachire , nomokungu oye bwebekire ang'e .
66019008	Nere oeirwe kobekwa negatani engiya , ekomekameka , endabu : naki egatani eyio nogokora kw'oboronge kw'abachenu .
66019009	Agantebia , Rika , Mbare negesio abarangerigwe as'omoyega , bw'enyangi y'Emanwa y'eng'ondi , Agantebia , Amang'ana aya nay'ekeene a Nyasaye .
66019010	Nkagwa as'amagoro aye , komosasima . Agantebia , Rora , tokora iga : inche nomosomba omogisangi oo , naende oyomo bw'abamino bare nokogana kwa Yesu : mosasime Nyasaye : naki okogana kwa Yesu nomoika bw'obobani .
66019011	Nkarora igoro aigokire ; na rora , ebarasi endabu , nere oyoyerinete , okorokwa Omwegeni , n'Oyo bw'ekeene , nere as'oboronge akogamba nagokora esegi .
66019012	Namaiso aye igarenge buna ogwoka kw'omorero , naende igoro as'omotwe oye chigutwa chinyinge ; nere nare nerieta ririkire , ritamanyiri nomonto tatiga ere omonyene .
66019013	Nere obekeirwe eanga yatobekirwe as'amanyinga : nerieta riaye iga akorokwa Ring'ana ria Nyasaye ,
66019014	Nemeganda ere igoro ekamotunya , barinete chibarasi chindabu , naende chibekire egatani engiya endabu .
66019015	Nomoro omwoge okarua as'omonwa oye , abiake ebisaku as'oyio : nere nabagambie as'enyimbo y'ekioma : nere otachire ekemitero ki'edivai y'obotindi bw'endamwamu ya Nyasaye Omobui .
66019016	Nere nare nerieta riarikirwe as'eanga yaye , Omoruoti Bw'Abaruoti , Nomonene Bw'Abanene .
66019017	Nkarora rilaika rinde riteneine as'erioba ; okorera as'eriogi rinene , ogochitebia chinyoni chionsi chikoiruruka gati gati y'igoro , Nchuo mosangerereke as'omoyega o Nyasaye omonene ;
66019018	monyare koria chinyama chi'abaruoti , nechinyama chi'abatang'ani b'esegi , nechinyama chi'abanto bare nechinguru , nechinyama chie chibarasi , nechi'abanto bagochirina , nechinyama chi'abanto bonsi , ababiare nabasomba , abake nabanene .
66019019	Nkayerora eng'iti , nabaruoti b'ense , nemeganda yabo , basangererekanire gokora esegi nere oikaransete igoro y'ebarasi eria , nemeganda yaye .
66019020	Eria eng'iti ekabwatwa , nomobani bw'oborimo ore amo nere , ere oyokorete ebikone as'obosio bwaye , as'ebio igabang'ainete abanto baria babwatete keria ekemanyererio ki'eng'iti , nabarabwo abasasimete esanamu yaye : abwo babere bakarutwa bare moyo ase riria riera ri'omorero ogwoka bw'ekebiriti :
66019021	nabaria batigarete bagaitwa nomoro oye ere oyoikaransete igoro as'ebarasi eria , okorua as'omonwa oye : nechinyoni chionsi chikaigota nechinyama chiabo .
66020001	Nkarora rilaika rigoika korwa igoro , omonyene ekeigorero ki'engoro , nekenyuri ekenene as'okoboko kwaye .
66020002	Akayebwata enchoka , eria enchoka ya kare , ere Engenki , Saitani , akayesiba emiaka elifu ,
66020003	akayetuguta as'engoro , akayebeka ekemanyererio igoro asere , erinde tenyara kobang'aina ebisaku naende , goika emiaka eria elifu eere ; na nyuma as'aya nemogwenerete esiborwe ekero egeke ,
66020004	Nkarora ebirogo bi'obonene , bagaikaransa igoro asebire , bakaegwa ekina : nkarora emeika yabo abanachetwe emetwe as'engecho y'obogani bwa Yesu , nas'engecho ye ring'ana ria Nyasaye , nabwo batasasimete eng'iti , nonya nesanamu yaye , gose kobwata ekemanyererio kiaye as'amasio abo , gose as'amaboko abo ; bakaba moyo , bakamenya amo na Kristo emiaka elifu .
66020005	Nebitondo biatigarete tibiaba moyo , goika ekaera eria emiaka elifu . Okwo nakwo okobokigwa kwe ritang'ani .
66020006	Nare negesio , omochenu , oyore nensemo as'okobokigwa kwe ritang'ani ; igoro as'abwo amakweri akabere tari nechinguru , korende nababe abakuani ba Nyasaye na Kristo , nabarabwo nabagambe amo nere emiaka elifu .
66020007	Neria emiaka elifu keraere , Saitani nasiborwe arwe as'egesibo kiaye ,
66020008	nere nasoke kobing'aina ebisaku bire ase chinsemo inye chi'ense , Gog na Magog , kobasangereria as'esegi : okobara kwabo iga kore buna omokenye o ' nyancha .
66020009	Bakarina igoro as'obogare bw'ense , bakanaria omochie bw'abachenu , nomochie bwanchire : omorero ogaika korwa igoro korwa ase Nyasaye , okabaria .
66020010	Noria omogenki , oria obang'ainete , akarutwa ase riera ri'omorero nekebiriti , as'ere eria eng'iti noria omobani bw'obonmo . Nabaromwe omobaso nobotuko goika kare nakare .
66020011	Nkarora ekerogo ki'obonene , ekerabu , ekenene , nere oyoikaransete igoro asekere ; ense n'igoro chigatama as'obosio bwaye , n'aase abo tarorekana .
66020012	Nkarora ebitondo ebinene nebike , biteneine as'obosio bwa Nyasaye ; chibuku chikamanorwa : ebuku ende ekamanorwa ere y'obogima ; ebitondo bikagambigwa as'amang'ana arikire ase chibuku , koreng'ana nogokora kwabo .
66020013	Enyancha ekabirusia ebitondo bire ime yaye , Amakweri ne chimbera chikabirusia ebitondo bire ime yabo : bakagambigwa ker'omonto koreng'ana nogokora kwabo .
66020014	Amakweri ne chimbera chigatugutwa ase riria riera ri'omorero . Aya naro amakweri akabere , engecho yaye enyancha y'omorero .
66020015	Na kerabe omonto tarorekaneti orikire as'ebuku y'obogima , narutwe ase riera riria ri'omorero .
66021001	Nkarora igoro ayia nense enyia : naki igoro ye ritang'ani nense ye ritang'ani chiatiekire goeta ; nonya nenyancha teri naende .
66021002	Nainche Yohana nkayorora omochie oria omochenu , Yerusalemu omoyia , ogoika korwa igoro ase Nyasaye , obekirwe ang'e buna omoriakari bw'enyangi oyotiekire korosigwa as'omosacha oye .
66021003	Nkaigwa eriogi rinene rikorua igoro rigoteba , Rora , obomenyo bwa Nyasaye mbore amo na mwanyabanto , nere namenye amo nabarabwo , nere nabe Nyasaye obo .
66021004	Nere natinyie kera ririga as'amaiso abo ; amakweri takobao naende ; nonya nokweumia , nonya nokorera , nonya nobororo tibokobao naende : ekiagera amang'ana eritang'ani atiekire goeta .
66021005	Nere oyoikaransete igoro as'ekerogo ki'obonene agateba , Rora , nakorire onsi koba amayia . Agantebia , Rika ; naki aya namang'ana ay'ekeene , nay'obwegeni .
66021006	Agantebia , Atiekire koba . Inche n'Alifa n'Omega , omochakano nomoerio . Inche nimoe omonyene erang'o amache ay'ensoko y'amache obogima , bosa .
66021007	Ere oyorabue nayanyore aya ; nainche nimbe Nyasaye oye , nere nabe Omwana one .
66021008	Korende aboba , nabatancheti , nabagokora bobe , nabaiti , nabatomani , nabarogi , nabwo bagosasima chisanamu , nab'oborimo bonsi , ensemo yabo nase riria riera rigwoka omorero nekebiriti . Aya naro amakweri akabere .
66021009	Agacha oyomo bwa baria amalaika atano nabere oyorenge nebitabo biria bitano nabibere bichire aria amaakwa atano nabere ay'omoerio ; agakwana nainche , ogoteba , Nchuo aiga , nainche ninkworokie oria omoriakari , omokungu bw'Emanwa y'eng'ondi .
66021010	Akambogoria as'Omoika goika egetunwa ekenene , egetambe , akanyorokia omochie oria omochenu , Yerusalemu , ogoika korwa igoro ase Nyasaye ,
66021011	oyore nobonene bwa Nyasaye : nokomekameka kwaye kwarenge buna rigena rire nerigori rinene , buna rigena ria yasipi , buna ekeraori :
66021012	oyorenge noruaki oronene , norotambe ; oyore nebisien ikomi nabibere , nase biria ebisieri amalaika ikomi nabere ; namarieta arikire , korende namarieta ebisaku ikomi nabibere bi'abana b'Isiraeli .
66021013	Ensemo ya mocha ebisieri bitato ; nensemo ya irianyi ebisieri bitato ; nensemo ya sugusu ebisieri bitato ; naende ensemo ya bosongo ebisieri bitato .
66021014	Noruaki rw'omochie rwarenge amaroso ikomi nabere , n'igoro yabo amarieta abatomwa ikomi nababere b'Emanwa y'eng'ondi .
66021015	Nere oyokwanete nainche igarenge nemoti y'ethahabu anyare korenga omochie nebisieri biaye noruaki rwaye .
66021016	Noria omochie noyo bw'omoraba , nobotambe nobogare bwaye iga boreng'aine . Akayorenga omochie as'emoti eria , chimaili elifu eyemo nachimia isano ; obotambe , nobogare bwaye , nakogenda igoro kwaye areng'aine .
66021017	Akarorenga oruaki rwaye , nechiwari emerongo etano nebere naibere , as'ekerengo kia mwanyabanto , engecho yaye , eki'amalaika .
66021018	Noboagacho bw'oruaki roria nobwa yasipi : nomochie oria nethahabu engiya , omogwekano bw'ekerore ekiya .
66021019	Namaroso ay'oruaki rw'omochie bwarosigwe ase ker'amagena aya rigori rinene . Oboroso bwe ritang'ani yasipi ; obwa kabere sapfiro , obwa gatato kelkedo ; obwa kane smaragdo ;
66021020	obwa gatano sardonuksi ; obwa gatano narimo sardio ; obwa gatano nakabere krusolitho ; obwa gatano nagatato berullo ; obwa kianda topazio ; obwa ikomi krusopraso ; obwa ikomi nomo obwa huakintho ; nobwa ikomi nakabere amathusto .
66021021	Nebisieri ikomi nabibere nechiruru ikomi naibere : ker'egesieri neruru eyemo . Nenchera y'omochie nethahabu engiya buna ekerore getagotanga omobaso .
66021022	Nainche tinarora hekalu imeo ; naki Omonene Nyasaye Omobui , n'Emanwa y'eng'ondi , ne hekalu yaye .
66021023	Nomochie oria torigetie erioba nonya nomotienyi bimoreke : naki obonene bwa Nyasaye bwabekire amasase , netaya yaye n'Emanwa y'eng'ondi .
66021024	Nebisaku abwo bakonyirwe nabatare as'amasase aye : nabaruoti b'ense nabarete obonene bwabo nogosika kwabo imeo .
66021025	Nebisieri biaye tibigosiekwa nonya ng'ake ' mobaso ( naki agwo tibori obotuko ) :
66021026	Nabarete obonene nogosika kw'ebisaku imeo .
66021027	N'imeo tigegosoa nonya ng'ake kende gionsi kere ekioro , gose ere ogokora amabe noborimo : tatiga baria barikire as'ebuku y'obogima y'Emanwa y'Eng'ondi .
66022001	Akanyorokia oroche rw'amache ay'obogima , rokomekameka buna ekeraori , rokorua as'ekerogo ki'obonene bwa Nyasaye , nekia Emanwa y'eng'ondi ,
66022002	gati gati y'enchera enene yaye . Ensemo nensemo ende y'oroche , norenge omote bw'obogima , okwama amatunda ikomi nabere , okorua amatunda aye ker'omotienyi : namato omote oyio ayakobigwenia ebisaku .
66022003	Okoragererigwa konde gwonsi tigokobao naende : nekerogo ki'obonene kia Nyasaye neki'Emanwa y'eng'ondi nakebe imeo : nabasomba baye nabamokorere ;
66022004	Nabarabwo nabamorore obosio bwaye ; nerieta riaye naribe as'amasio abo .
66022005	Obotuko tibokobao naende ; gose tibarigeti etaya gose amasase erioba ; naki Omonene Nyasaye obabekire amasase , nabarabwo nabagambe goika kare nakare .
66022006	Agantebia , Aya namang'ana ay'obwegeni nay'ekeene : Omonene Nyasaye bw'ababani abachenu atomete rilaika riaye koborokia abasomba baye amang'ana ayagwenerete koba bwango .
66022007	Rigereria , ninchiche bwango . Nare negesio ere oyoyabwatete amang'ana ay'obobani bw'ebuku eye .
66022008	Inche Yohana , ninche inde omonyene naroche aya nakoyaigwa . Ngachia koyaigwa nakoyarora nkagwa nsasime as'obosio bw'amagoro rilaika riria rianyorogetie aya .
66022009	Agantebia , Rigereria , tokora iga : inche nomosomba omogisangi oo amo nabamino ababani , n'amo na baria babwatete amang'ana ebuku eye : mosasime Nyasaye ,
66022010	Agantebia , Timoyabeka ekemanyererio amang'ana obobani bw'ebuku eye , naki ekero ekio giaikire .
66022011	Omonyene ogokora bobe nakore obobe naende ; nomonyene eubi nabe neubi naende , nomonyene oboronge nakore oboronge naende , nomochenu abe omochenu naende ,
66022012	Rigereria , nachire bwango : neng'eria yane igere amo nainche , komoa ker'omonto buna emeremo yaye ere .
66022013	Ninche Alifa n'Omega , omochakano nomoerio , oyo bwe ritang'ani noyo bw'omoerio .
66022014	Mbare negesio abasibirie chianga chiabo , abwo nabanyare koyogendera omote bw'obogima , nagosoa omochie as'ebisieri biaye .
66022015	Korende isiko nchireo chisese , nabarogi , nabatomani , nabaiti , nabwo bagosasima chisanamu , na ker'omonto bwanchete oborimo nakobokora .
66022016	Inche Yesu natomire rilaika riane kobatebia inwe amang'ana ayio ase chikanisa . Inche ninche ritina noroiboro rwa Daudi , eria eng'enang'eni ekoraba , ya mambia .
66022017	N'Omoika nomoriakari bw'enyangi bagoteba , Nchuo . Nere oyokoigwa atebe , Nchuo . Nere oyore nerang'o nache ; oyobwanchete ayabogori amache obogima bosa .
66022018	Namotebirie ker'omonto okoyaigwa amang'ana obobani bw'ebuku eye , Omonto onde bwonsi karayamente , Nyasaye namomentere amaakwa ayarikire as'ebuku eye :
66022019	nomonto onde bwonsi kararusie ensemo y'amang'ana obobani bw'ebuku eye , Nyasaye narusie ensemo yaye as'oria omote bw'obogima , nas'oria omochie omochenu , oyio amang'ana aye arikire as'ebuku eye .
66022020	Ere omonyene okoyateba aya otebire , Nabo : ninchiche bwango , Amin : oche Omonene Yesu ,
66022021	Obuya bw'Omonene Yesu Kristo bobe amo nainwe imwensi . Amin .
